name: Apartment Rua do Monte, Bagunte On the Camino
summary: Located in the Village of Bagunte our Cozy Apartment with central heating in an updated large family home. Serene garden with access to shared pool area and barbeque in a quiet village outside the city. 30 minute drive to Porto, Braga, , 15 minute drive to Vila do Conde, beach. Parking available. On the Camino Frances 5.9 kms north of Vilarinho.  Internet  and cable TV are included along with laundry. Feel free to email for any questions and further information.
description: Located in the Village of Bagunte our Cozy Apartment with central heating in an updated large family home. Serene garden with access to shared pool area and barbeque in a quiet village outside the city. 30 minute drive to Porto, Braga, , 15 minute drive to Vila do Conde, beach. Parking available. On the Camino Frances 5.9 kms north of Vilarinho.  Internet  and cable TV are included along with laundry. Feel free to email for any questions and further information. Guests will have access other than their private space will have access to parking , the spacious yard barbque and pool. Its a family home therefore if I am not available one of the family members will be more than happy to assist to make your stay an enjoyable one. Sameiro bridge from records construction began in 1209, Watermill remains fro
neighborhood_overview: The setting is a very quiet section of Bagunte minutes from center , local café is a 2minute walk, Bakery 5 minutes, Mini Market 2 minutes to stock up. A short stroll to Rio Ave and The D. Sameiro bridge from records construction began in 1209, Watermill remains from the same time period. The Cividade de Bagunte, also known as a Castro an Iron age settlement is  quite prominent archeological site yet to be investigated dates to roman occupation. Its a 15 min walk away. We are 300 metres from the Camino Frances main route north of Vilarinho.
access: Guests will have access other than their private space will have access to parking , the spacious yard barbque and pool.
interaction: Its a family home therefore if I am not available one of the family members will be more than happy to assist to make your stay an enjoyable one.
house_rules: - No smoking indoors, As a family home we just ask that you respect normal hours of activity no noise after 10 pm reasonable hours.  - No parties, no other guests other than the booked individuals unless notified. - If more people than what was agreed show up, keys will not be given. This includes children.

reviews.comments: Aunque la casa estaba un poco alejada y escondida, la experiencia fue muy buena. Los padres de Antonio fueron unos grandes anfitriones, ofreciéndonos ayuda en todo lo que necesitábamos. La casa es muy chula, volveremos sin duda si vamos por la zona de nuevo.
buena calidad precio,limpio,familiar aunque poco accesible y alejado

Wir waren eine Nacht in der Wohnung und haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt!
Sehr nett empfangen worden.
Sauber und geräumig.

Immer wieder gerne!

Vielen Dank!
Konrad
La casa estaba genial! Un poco difícil de encontrar, pero la estancia ha sido muy agradable.
Everything was great! I totally recommend
Inmejorable

Merci pour le séjour. Tout était parfait. La maison dispose de tout ce dont on a besoin, elle est décorée avec goût et surtout très très propre et soignée. La piscine est très agréable et elle aussi très propre et surtout il est bon de faire la sieste dans les hamacs. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Je recommande la maison.

We had a great time!! Communication was easy and Antonio's apartment is simply perfect for a calm and varied holiday with the family. I stayed there with my husband and our baby and we loved it hanging around in the garden and making trips to the many beautiful places nearby, like Porto, Viana do Castelo, Braga... The apartment is very clean and we'll equipped and Antonio's family is very friendly. Thanks a lot!!!
Very beautiful and calm. The pool was amazing.
Nous avons une très bonne nuit dans le logement d'Antonio, tout était parfait. Je recommande
Très joli petit village, maison très accueillante et agréable mais je déconseille aux personnes non véhiculé car les transports en communs sont très limités.

Ruime rustige plek, van alle gemakken voorzien met een comfortabel bed en vriendelijke mensen. Het is wel wat lastig te bereiken als je niet met een auto wilt komen, ook om een hapje te eten moet je een stukje rijden. Er zaten wel veel muggen dus bereid je daar op voor.

La casa es estupenda, para una estancia corta o larga. En mi caso han sido tres meses, donde me he sentido como en mi casa. La casa tiene de todo y la cocina está equipadísima. La cama muy cómoda. La ubicación es muy tranquila y, eso sí, requiere de coche para moverse. Pero la situación es ideal para conocer Porto, Guimarães, Braga, Viana do Castelo y de más, ya que tiene distintas salidas de lautovías muy cercana. Además los padres de Antonio son muy agradables, simpáticos y atentos. El jardín es una gozada. Recomendable 100%. Para repetir. Muchas gracias por todo :)

Logement à conseiller pour un séjour pour couple désirant la tranquillité!
Propre et sérieux, belle maison.
What a hospitality, we received a bottle of wine and because everything was closed when we arrived they made dinner for us... super
Très bon sejour dans cette petite ville au calme. La piscine du logement est tres appreciable quand il y a trop de vent à la mer. Par contre il faut etre véhiculé pour grande liberté de déplacement.
Accueil chaleureux rapport qualité prix imbattable, logement très propre et spacieux

Antonio es un anfitrión muy especial. Su lugar es muy bonito y tiene todo lo necesario para descansar y relajarse.
A cualquiera le encantará este lugar
Maison propre et agreable!hôte tres accueillant
Hébergement à conseiller pour des personnes ayant un moyen de déplacement
appartement très propre et très  bien équipé.

Le logement de Antonio est très propre. La piscine est idéale et au soleil toute la journée. Parfait pour quelques jours de vacances au soleil. En revanche, il est nécessaire d'avoir une voiture car le logement est à plusieurs kilomètres des villes. Excepté le besoin d'une voiture le logement est idéal. Je le recommande.
Antonio is very pleasant man. The appartment was very clean and beautiful. Thank you! I Recommend!

Excellent logement, très propre et familial, excellent rapport qualité prix et un accueil très chaleureux et plein de bons conseils. La localisation permet de visiter toute la région mais il faut un véhicule. Je recommande!
Antonio était très serviable, de très bons conseils, et sa maitrise du portugais, anglais et français, parfaite pour nous. Séjour Splendide. Logement parfait.
A really nice place, a big  brightly flat, a green garden with a fantastic pool and a lovely family.
La maison était conforme à l'annonce, nous avons bien était accueilli et Antonio a été de bon conseil et á l'écoute. Véhicule indispensable.

Des vacances merveilleuses au sein d'une belle famille. Nous avons eu un accueil exceptionnel et nous avons eu la chance de partager des moments exceptionnels au cœur de cette famille. La maison est très bien, propre, parfaitement équipée. La piscine très bien. L'hospitalité est telle que j'ai eu l'impression d’être en famille. Merci pour ses moments merveilleux, je retourne en août 2020 et j’espère pouvoir de nouveau réserver ce logement.

La casa es genial, en todos los sentidos.  Cómoda, equipada, con (Website hidden by Airbnb) piscina desde luego es un punto genial a su favor. Aunque hay que decir que convives con los padres de Antonio. Estás en un lado de la casa y ellos en el otro, son muy amables, pero a veces da un poco de reparo, sobretodo si estás en la zona del jardín. Está alejado, pero nosotros lo preferiamos, a estar en el centro, queríamos relajarnos y eso está asegurado. Si que tiene wifi, aunque no lo ponga, y secador.

fomos mal recebidos e ate agora não compreendo porquê?
se tudo foi combinado por mensagens. a nossa recepção foi pessima.
Séjour agréable mais voiture indispensable ! Le jardin et la piscine ont été très appréciés.

Clean, spacious and well fournished.
Fresh and confortable

We had a great weekend at Antonio's apartment. It is a very spacious and clean place with all necessary facilities. Antonio was not there but his parents (I assume) who live in the same building were very friendly even though communication was difficult because we don't speak portuguese and they don't speak english. We felt very comfortable there anyway and enjoyed the beautiful pool. Thanks again!

Logement situé dans une petite ville à la campagne. Environ 15 min pour faire ses courses. Logement très très propre et spacieux. Hôte très arrangeant. Piscine et barbecue très appréciables. Les hôtes sont très accueillants même  si nous ne parlions pas la même langue. Nous recommandons fortement.

We loved it, great location from Porto. Small little village with a grocery shop. Host were lovely and the flat was super clean and everything you need inside. You have your private terrace and access to the swimming.
Amazing place to stay , great location to visit Porto isn’t too far. Amazing host ! Would recommend to anyone !!
Net appartement
Very good place to stay. Apartament is clean, confortable and  well fournished. Good location to visit Porto, Braga, Bom Jesus do Monte, Guimaraes. Would recommend to anyone.

This is an excellent place to stay in the heart of rural north Portugal.
In reach of many historical sites by car.   Easy to get to and fro.
Very safe, clean and comfortable.  A home away from home.
Definitely your monies worth.

space: The apartment is located on the third floor of a walk up building, no lift unfortunately! It is however completely brand new with a hotel quality queen size Serta Mattress, Video On Demand cable box and loads of amenities.

host.host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

address.street: Hong Kong Island, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: Open Style Suite w/Island Touches, WiFi, Full Kitchen, Lanai–Kiahuna Plantation #2334
summary: Tasteful Hawaiian decor makes this home away from home a dream with its full kitchen, furnished lanai, WiFi, ceiling fans, flat screen TV and DVD. It’s the easy life on Kauai’s sunny Poipu shore!
space: An open-design kitchen flowing into the stylish living area brings a fresh attitude to this 690sf home. Begin the day with tropical fruits on the furnished lanai. Explore Kauai’s south shore, and then relax in the living area with ceiling fan, WiFi, flat screen and DVD. Sleeps 4 in 1 King & 1 Sofa bed. Fringing Poipu Beach, this plantation-style retreat immerses you amid 35 acres of tropical gardens. Individually decorated one- and two-bedroom suites feature full kitchens, and ceiling fans. Onsite amenities add appeal with a pool, jet spa, beach hut, tennis courts, barbecue areas and restaurant.

The staff at Kiahuna Plantation  are absolutely 
wonderful, friendly and professional and will do their utmost to make your stay there a most memorable one. And we will most certainly return for our fourth time and probably more!

name: Single Rm@Inn Square, Jordan, TST#13
summary: ‘Inn Square’ provides a SINGLE BED and a private bathroom room. We provides a comfy and tidy place at an affordable rate for travelers. The room size is 80 sqf. Quiet and comfy sleeping condition is guaranteed.
space: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.

Quiet and comfy sleeping condition is guaranteed. The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse. notes: All the rooms have private bathroom and ventilation system, and are equipped with full set of toiletries: shampoo, shower gel, soap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle, complimentary bottle water and coffee and tea. Housekeeping is provided on the daily basis. Once per week cleaning will be done for every booking over a week.Free Wifi is provided with no speed limitation.  Regular check-in time starts from 3pm. Early check-in is flexible only if the previous guest checks out early and the room is cleaned up by then. In case the room is not ready yet by the time of your arrival, you could leave the luggage at the reception. We will arrange in first priority to have your room cleaned up. Regular check-out time is 11am, special request for late check-out will be considered according to the availability of the room of the day. Any unapproved late check-out after 2pm will be subject to a charge of a minimum of 50% of room rate of the day.
transit: 5 minutes of walk to Temple street & Jade Market;  10 minutes of walk to China Ferry Terminal to Macau;  15 minutes of walk to Harbour City;  20 minutes of walk to Star Ferry Pier, Avenue of Stars, Space Museum, Museum of Art, Museum of History & Science Museum;  10 minutes of walk to Elements & Kowloon Station for Airport Express & MTR Tung Chung Line;  22 minutes to Airport by the Express from Kowloon Station;  25 minutes to AsiaWorld Expo by the Express from Kowloon Station;  27 minutes to Ngong Ping 360 from Kowloon Station;  3 minutes of walk to MTR Austin Station;  30 minutes to Disneyland from Austin Station;  10 minutes of walk to MTR Jordan Station;  6 minutes to Admiralty Station from Jordan Station, where you can take shuttle bus #629 to OCEAN PARK;  5 minutes to Hong Kong Station from Kowloon Station, Exit J2 to Tram Terminus to the Peak; Exit D2 to SOHO & Lan Kwai Fong;  10 minutes to Wan Chai Station from Jordan Station, where you can walk to HKCEC;  20 minutes to Wan Cha

host.host_about: Opened in May 2015, INN SQUARE is a TRENDY and COZY HOSTEL in Hong Kong, designed for the modern day global travelers. Owned and operated by a friendly Canadian, we are located in the heart of the bustling streets of Kowloon West, seconds away from the Austin MTR station and within walking distance to the Elements shopping mall, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates and of course many local fabulous eateries catered to the unique taste of our backpackers.

reviews.comments: 床單棉被整潔上有待加強  其他正常
Great value pls keep up the good work

Great location and great price (compare to others accommodation in HK). But the room is very very small, it could only fit in one person, if you have a large luggage, it's probably will block your way in the room too. Its suitable for backpacker.
Great place in center of Kowloon! Great price too. Would def stay here again when i return
It was great
Great space, and location. No complaints. Also good value. Easy check in and out. Communication was fast!
The area is a little difficult to get to but the room was alright. Towels weren't replaced I had to grab my own and I killed a few bugs. The room looks over all alright and was clean.
Cosy space, great for a solo traveler

name: Modernist apartment principal
summary: This is an amazing 250 sqm apartment with 4 double and 2 single bedrooms, spacious dinning room next to a relax area in a glass gallery, equiped kitchen, and 2 full bathrooms. The view is very pretty. In the surroundings you will find supermarkets and some great spots to walk and wander. It is also easy to reach all main attractions. You will find it very easy to get around.  Luxurious building of modernist architecture located in the city centre, close to Diagonal Avenue and Paseo de Gracia.

name: Spacious Master Room M with ensuite,AC, study desk
summary: The premises is a 5 bedroom shared house. Our queen sized bed very comfortably sleeps 2 people. With facilities such as an ensuite bathroom, built in wardrobe, fresh linen, free parking and a concierge service, this is the perfect place to stay for a quiet relaxing getaway in metropolitan Sydney. Early flight? Use our shared facilities including bathroom from 8am on check-in day. We also have two smaller rooms available for a lower price. Feel free to message us for further details. **NO KIDS**
space: Our space is unique in that we offer the following: 1. ANYTIME CHECK-IN/LATE CHECK-OUT. Have an early flight? Want to have a late night out? No problem. Feel free to ask us for early or late check-in. Even if early check-ins are not available, you can use shared facilities include a fully stocked kitchen, laundry, bathroom and dining room, from 8am on your check-in day. Late check-outs are also available, as long as these times are available and do not clash with other guests bookings. The latest time for checkouts is 4pm, as we have cleaners that need to clean the room and shared facilities in preparation for the next guest.  2. FREE PARKING. Our street has a 2hour free parking limit. However, we have a parking permit available, which allows unlimited free parking in the area during your stay. 3. CONCIERGE SERVICE. Have any special requests? Don't hesitate to ask us and we will strive to accommodate your request. Please only contact us during the hours of 9am-12am. 4. FOCUS ON IMPROVE

neighborhood_overview: North Ryde is located in the middle of the Sydney metropolitan area, so almost everything is a short drive, bus or train ride away. The property is within a 750m walk of Macquarie Park station.
transit: Getting around from the property is extremely easy, as public transport is readily available nearby. Some common places of interest and how to get there is included for your convenience below: MACQUARIE PARK STATION: (8 min travel time) 1. Walk southeast on Paul St towards Lane Cove Road. 2. Turn left onto Lane Cove Road. Walk 500m and station is on left. MACQUARIE SHOPPING CENTRE: (Approx 13 min travel time) 1. Walk to Macquarie Park Station (see above) 2. Catch the train on Platform 2, T1 North Shore, Northern and Western Line towards Hornsby Station. 3. Get off the train at Macquarie University Station (1 stop). CENTRAL STATION: (Approx 36 min travel time) 1. Walk to Macquarie Park Station (see above) 2. Catch the train on Platform 1, T1 North Shore, Northern and Western Line towards Central Station 3. Get off the train at Central Station. TOP RYDE SHOPPING CENTRE: (Approx 15 min travel time) 1. Walk southeast onto Lane Cove Road. Turn right and cross the road to reach bus stop at L
access: Guests will be able to access the master bedroom, and all shared facilities, including the kitchen and living room. Please note you will be sharing with some other people, but the shared areas will be cleaned regularly to ensure maximum guest satisfaction.
interaction: We can be contacted via AirBNB, text messaging, or phone call from 9am-6pm everyday.

reviews.comments:
This accomodation is located in a nice place near to the main road. Easy to commute on public transport or your own. Very well connected. 
My room was nice and cosy. It has your own big screen TV and an updated ensuite. 
Cleanliness outside can be an issue but considering other guests staying there is understandable. I generally kept to my room and was happy.
Judy is an excellent host and is quick to resolve issues if you have any. I had a few hiccups the first day and she was quick to address them.
I don't mind staying here again if required. Very reasonably priced for what you get.

Judy's place is a Boarding house with many bedrooms. We had the bedroom with the on-suite. There was no-body to greet us and another tenant helped us. We called to get two towels for us and then for toilet paper but found that the TV did not work and we could not make contact the third time. The cupboard with the towels looked a mess just chucked in. The fridge was full of food and some looked as if it had been there for quite some time. The kitchen floor tiles are cracked and dirty, the rubbish bin is open and we found some cockroaches in our bedroom. No one there to organise the house in general. We had better value.
The place is very clean with all amenities and also at a location walkable to public transit. I had to extend my stay and I rebooked the same place as I liked it .
Great Location, large, clean Master bed room with great ensuite
Great place, great host!

House is in a quiet street. Lane becomes quite dark at night. Bus stop and train station are also near by. Good location for offices situated in maquarie park.

As for the room, master bed is quite big and well furnished. The heater (split invertor) is quite noisy. Did use the kitchen but it was also ok. Laundry setup was also good. Communication with Judy was excellent. I asked for tv remote batteries and car parking pass ad  arranged quickly.

Restaurants and shops are not near by. Nearest is at Lane cove road opposite to marriot or at macquarie center.
Really good bedroom, the bed is confortable and the room is clean!
Judy was great to communicate with and easy to reach via email and messages!  Took care of issues quickly when we accidentally locked our keys in our room.

This house is shared house, host doesnt live here or I havnt met her during my stay of 6 days, only available through emails. Room was good but Shower was bit clogged n had hairs when asked to clean no answer. Same thing was with bed linen, was used before, host didnt change even when asked.  
Kichen was mess at times as it is shared house.
Great location, clean room and bathroom!
Great location on a quiet street. The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable. Judy was also a great host. I had a very pleasant stay.
Great place, stayed several  times now!

The room with en suite is in a bit of a share house, so it's not like a lot of AirBnB places. A bit more anonymous and private. Judy, however, does respond super quickly to any requests, and I had no trouble getting what I needed. The street is very close to Epping Road, so there is a bit of noise that comes over from this busy street, but that also makes the location very convenient (so there's two sides to every trait). I would certainly stay again.
A nice simple room with a very comfy bed! Judy was great, very responsive to my messages although I didn't get to actually meet her in person.
The room is perfect, fit two people confortable. There are good space in the wardrobe. The bathroom is amazing.
A lovely, comfortable, room in a very nice house. Everything was clean and it was within walking distance of Macquarie Park and University.
Such a nice place, very clean and tidy. Flexible for check in time as my friend arrived a bit earlier.

Nice and tidy. 
Good place to stay for a short term.
Great room, always clean - have stayed numerous times.

Room was spacious and comfy. Very easy check in. 
But it was too far from airport. We've spent $100 more for the taxi from airport due to the late arrival.
As always - great place to stay, clean and easy

Judy's place is a great place to stay. It is very clean, well managed and comfortable. It is 2min walk from the bus station and 6min walk from train station. Amenities are best in class and Judy is a great host. She responds immediately to any request or need.
Very comfortable stay. Great amenities. Easy check in. Will book again
Very good and peaceful stay. Internet  Kitchen was up to the expectation.Thanks for a comfortable stay.

Thanks Judy for being a great host. It was one my most comfortable stay in Sydney. I liked the room, cleanliness, privacy, and location. In future, your place would always be in my first preference list.

It was a great experience staying at Judy’s. The arrangements were just perfect. The room was spacious with ensuite bathroom and had all quick needed facilities in the room. Best thing was it is a laptop friendly place. The room was attached to a porch which again was very pleasant and relaxing. The kitchen amenities were great too. All utilities were rightly labelled. The entire house and the kitchen were clean. I enjoyed my privacy here. Also, this place is pretty close to the train station which saved me from long walks.

Judy was very prompt with her responses whenever I tried getting in touch with her. I would definitely opt for this place again for my next visit to Sydney.

Eine tolles Zimmer! Das eigene Bad war prima, die Terrasse wunderschön. Judy war schnell zu erreichen und die Wohnung sehr sauber.

Unbedingt zu empfehlen!
Great stay at Judy’s place. Walking distance to my course and train station. Highly recommended :)
Great spot will stay again

Thanks for a good stay! Room was big and clean - only issue was the shared kitchen space could get a little messy and there were ants in the bathroom but not a major issue! Heater worked well, bathroom big and clean, very close to big shopping mall with restaurants and close to the train line! Simple but good! Only addition I would include would be a mini fridge in the bedroom - there’s space for it and would make it a more private space without the hassle of a shared kitchen - especially as I was visiting on a work trip and had to leave very early in the morning and was worried I’d disturb other guests.
Best accomodation experience in a long time - will be back 10000% for sure
Own bathroon was wonderful. Room was clean and comfortable and as described. Only issue for me was that the A/C is very loud hard to sleep when its on.

I stayed at Judy's place for longer durations and it was quite amazing. The place' description was very accurate and it has various room types. Some rooms are equipped with private bathroom which was clearly described.

Internet speed was good and decent coverage across all the room. For master bedroom M there  is a separate wifi connection. 

I have found common kitchen space to be tidy. There is a separate portion allocated within refrigerator for all guests. 

Overall, I would highly recommend this place.
Great house. Good privacy, barely saw anyone during my stay. Master room is well equipped for a comfortable stay. Not far from Macquarie Park Station.
Great everytime!
Opted Judy’s place for the second time. Arrangements were perfect. Happy with the service and prompt responses whenever needed. Would definitely prefer staying here during my next visit as well.
Was a great stay, would stay again.
WIFi connection is not good.
exactly as described
I stayed here for an extended period for work and found the place very suitable to my needs. The garden area was lovely and the room as expected. Would recommend.

Judy's place is all that is expected, possibly more. The individual locks on doors and entry to the house is excellent and very safe. Even though there were other people in the house during my stay, I very rarely saw anyone else. I would definitely stay here again.
Very easy to check in and out. Feels like a hotel! Will stay again.
Place was as described. The self check-in was very easy. Small issue with the missing parking permit was quickly fixed and everything else was perfect. Good stay all around

The apartment was very clean and the Organisation between the other guests was good. The location it’s a little bit to far from the CBD. The train station was out of order for the time and we should take all the time the bus. The station for the bus was close to the apartment.

Check in very easy. Room with ensuite and study desk was exactly as advertised. Very clean and well maintained. Although close to busy highways, traffic noise was hardly audible.
Kitchen and laundry facilities very good and clean - especially the 'fridge.

I will be happy to stay there again.
Good place

name: Statue of Liberty views & subway on corner!
summary: Sun drenched, quiet, and cozy entire one bedroom apartment in South Slope with views of Statue of Liberty and quick access to the city via the R subway at the corner. The area is quiet but lively, one avenue away from 5th Ave loaded with restaurants and bars. After a bad experience, I now have a policy of only hosting guests with prior trips and positive reviews. If you request to stay without any reviews, I will politely decline.
space: The bedroom has a full size bed and you will be able to hang clothes on a hook outside the closet. The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa, side chair, and Sling/Roku TV. One additional guest can stay on the large sofa (or a twin air mattress if requested). The kitchen is fully equipped with a large sink, fridge, stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. You will have access to dishes, utensils, pots, pans and whatever else you might need for cooking.  My apartment is ~400 sq feet, so please book elsewhere if you're looking for more space.
description: Sun drenched, quiet, and cozy entire one bedroom apartment in South Slope with views of Statue of Liberty and quick access to the city via the R subway at the corner. The area is quiet but lively, one avenue away from 5th Ave loaded with restaurants and bars. After a bad experience, I now have a policy of only hosting guests with prior trips and positive reviews. If you request to stay without any reviews, I will politely decline. The bedroom has a full size bed and you will be able to hang clothes on a hook outside the closet. The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa, side chair, and Sling/Roku TV. One additional guest can stay on the large sofa (or a twin air mattress if requested). The kitchen is fully equipped with a large sink, fridge, stove, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. You will have access to dishes, utensils, pots, pans and whatever else you might need for cooking.  My apartment is ~400 sq feet, so please book elsewhere if you're looking for more space. You will
neighborhood_overview: Quiet area but close to the action in Park Slope, Gowanus, & Carrol Gardens.
notes: While there is no street parking on my street, there is a parking lot one block away with FREE parking under the Brooklyn Queens Expressway at 3rd Avenue beginning at 18th street. It is open parking and you will not need to move your car for alternate side parking rules.
transit: Subway: The Prospect Avenue R (yellow) stop is at my corner (0.1 miles away) and you are just three stops from Atlantic Ave/Barclays Center with transfer to nearly every single subway line and efficient access to lower Manhattan with a cross platform transfer to the N or D express trains.  Other transfers from the R to Manhattan include:  @4 Ave-9th St: F (orange) or G (lime green) @Barclays: N (yellow) or D (orange) across the platform form the R. Inter station connection: 2 or 3 (red) and 4 or 5 (green) and Long Island Rail Road (LIRR) with access to JFK airport   @Dekalb: across platform to the B (orange) and Q (yellow)  @Jay St Metro Tech:  A or C (blue) or F (orange) @Court St: 2/3 (red) or 4/5 (green)  Taxi/Uber/Lyft:  10 minute drive to downtown Brooklyn and ~25 min drive into lower Manhattan
access: You will have access to my entire apartment while I am away. Please make yourself feel at home but be respectful of my belongings.
house_rules: After a bad experience, I now have a policy of only hosting guests with prior trips/reviews. If you request to stay without any reviews, I will politely decline.  • Please treat my apartment with the same respect you would your own  • No shoe policy- please take your shoes off when you enter • No smoking in the apartment • Please take all food items with you upon check-out

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Growing up in Louisiana and Texas, I moved to New York 7 years ago but never forgot the southern hospitality in my roots. I sacrificed Manhattan for Brooklyn in 2017 to finally have my own place, but love the escape from the city and feel good vibes resonating in Park Slope. 

I’m an avid decorator and love taking on my next DIY. I’m obsessed with cinnamon, avocados, and lavender. I have traveled around North America,  France, Norway, Japan, and Southeast Asia. Where should I go next?

Given I live in a cozy 1 bedroom, I’ll be renting you my apartment while I’m out of town and traveling myself. I’m always happy to accommodate early/late check in/outs where I can- so just ask! I am very picky with my guests as you are staying in my personal space, so please be mindful of what you share in your request so I can get to know you and your reason for visiting NYC! Happy and safe travels!

reviews.comments: Amanda's place is exactly what is depicted in the pictures! Her place is comfortable and extremely clean! Four stops away from the Barclays Centre (at the Atlantic Terminal) allows for access to Queens, Manhattan and Harlem! The neighbourhood is quiet. There is convenience store right at the corner where you can grab breakfast, lunch or dinner. Overall I would recommend anyone to stay here!! Her place is really comfortable and has a homey feeling!

My stay at Amanda's was great! She was very responsive and her home was VERY clean. Great location, safe and convenient one block from the train. I would stay at Amanda's the next time I'm in the city, without a doubt. Southern hospitality at its finest.
Amanda's place is very cute, clean and a short walk to the subway. Perfect for a long weekend filled with activities all around the city.

Amanda's place is well located close to a metro station. The place is perfect for a short stay and there is all you need. The place is well decorated and functional. Communication was great and  Amanda has done everything to make the stay enjoyable.

Amanda was a very responsive host, even though we did not get to meet.
She answered any questions very quickly and the check-in and check-out process was seamless. Right now the nearest subway station is closed, but the next one is still walkable (10 min walk). It was surprisingly quiet for a New York City apartment! It had everything we needed, and plenty of stores nearby.
We would stay again!

Amanda's home was perfect. I'm originally from Brooklyn and was visiting from buffalo with my boyfriend. The home is cozy and perfect for 2 ppl and looks exactly like the photos. We didn't use public transportation  during this trip but the location is great for driving to and  from manhattan only about a 30 minute drive . Corner store and deli were convenient.  The people in front of the building were friendly never bothered us . The building was quiet and the neighborhood was safe we came in pretty late the days we were there. I could be a bit bias being that my family and friends live in Parkslope but I  would definitely recommend her home to everyone .
Solid place, very comfortable and clean
Cute, clean, well appointed apartment!

Amanda's place was clean, bright & comfortable. The space is small, but enough for 2. There are shops, restaurants & bars within walking distance as well as a subway station (though it was closed during our stay.) You'll get a workout traversing the stairs but its worth it to get a peek at the Statue of Liberty through the windows. Check in was easy & we didn't need to meet up. Amanda always responded quickly & we had no issues or complaints. Will definitely stay again!

This is a great place to stay in Brooklyn. A 30-min drive to JFK (or 90mins and 3 changes on public transit). It's a small place, but for the two of us, we didn't feel like it was tiny (really, Amanda's done a great job with setting it up to maximize the space). The bathroom can feel cramped, but hey this is NYC, you have to sacrifice something. The AC's are great after an arduous walk upstairs. I loved the artwork in the apartment (I'll buy the System of Colours poster for myself, Amanda). Check-in was smooth, and while we didn't meet up, Amanda was always responsive and helpful. Will definitely stay again!
We had a great stay, everything was just as described. Close access to the subway makes getting around very easy. Quiet neighborhood, great apartment and wonderful host!

This was a cozy, clean and welcoming apartment to stay in for a weekend trip to Brooklyn. Was great to find clean towels and everything meticulous and tidy. Directions were clear and my wife and both felt safe throughout our stay. We could also see the statue of liberty from our kitchen window. Thank you so much Amanda!
Another 5 star stay. Please see my previous review for full details.
Really snug and stylish flat in the heart of Park Slope. Very clean and homely. Close to the subway and some nice cafes. We had a great time and felt like locals -would definitely recommend!

Amanda was a great host!  Her apartment was so clean and cozy, it felt like Home.  We appreciated her thoroughness and detail to checking in straight to checking out.  Would highly recommend Amanda and her cozy apartment if you are looking to stay in Brooklyn.
Great place to stay. Great TV set up

Amanda was a fantastic host. She gave super clear instructions and her place was just what we needed for a quick weekend trip to NYC. The apartment was clean and very stylish and easy to get to from the metro.
Wonderful place!  We enjoyed our stay.  Great neighborhood, convenient to subway.  Apartment was clean and very comfortable.
Great stay at a great place in a great neighborhood... great ;-)
Amanda’s apartment is the perfect place for one person or a couple. The bed was super comfortable. Communication was easy and speedy. A great spot in Park Slope for the price.

Amanda’s Place is lovely - beautifully decorated and super charming! Also very clean. The apartment is small, but that’s pretty standard for NYC. It’s in Brooklyn, but close to the subway so you have easy access into Manhattan. Amanda left us very clear instructions for checking in and she was able to be flexible with check out! Love staying here and would definitely recommend to anyone who wants a stylish retreat in the city!

This place was spotless, great but non-pretentious neighborhood, close the R and Q making it easy to get to and from. A nice walk to prospect park and quiet enough when you get back to sleep. I never met Amanda but she seems cool, the place is a well put together example of a youthful, cozy one bedroom in a part of Park Slope that won’t make you feel out of place if you are as cool as Amanda and I are. If you want to look down your nose or want to be foot steps from Guy Fieri’s  trash excuse for a restaurant (sorry) don’t come. If you want good vibes, an affordable stay, and to get a few decorating inspirations this is the place. 
5 Gold Stars

Looking for a cute, cozy and stylish place in Brooklyn? This is your spot! With a view (far, but still a view) of the Statue of Liberty from the kitchen, Amanda's place is warm and inviting. You also will be sure to get a good night's rest with her HEAVENLY bed and pillows. The location was conveniently located next to the R train with easy access to the rest of Brooklyn and into Manhattan. Thanks, Amanda!
Clean cozy place close to the subway. The building is old but it is worth it for the location
Very convenient location, great place to make you feel home with so many nice details. Amazingly quick responses by Amanda. Great choice!
Very clean, great location. Thank you for everything !!
Clean apartment in a great location!
The area is a bit far away

name: Bachelor for a perfect time in Montréal
summary: My accommodation is within a 10 minute walk from the Cadillac metro station which takes you directly to the city center. I also have the BIXI service located within 30 seconds from home. You will enjoy my housing for comfortable bed, brightness and the neighborhood. My accommodation is perfect for single travelers, or couples. Place nearby: Located within 2 subway stations to the Olympic Stadium (Impact of Montreal), the Biodôme, the Botanical Garden, the Parc Maisonneuve, the Planetarium. Easy parking access on the street.

My accommodation is perfect for people traveling solo, couple. neighborhood_overview: Located on a very quiet side street with free parking nearby.
notes: Bien important quand vous réservez mon bachelor, de ne pas être bruyant la nuit parce que j'ai la chambre des enfants juste au dessus.
transit: Metro Cadillac 10 minutes walk and bus stop 1 minute walk.
interaction: I am present during my passenger "check-in" and I explain what is included in my accommodation.
house_rules: Les voyageurs peuvent faire la vaisselle si ils veulent le faire j'ai tout le nécessaire. Sa serait préférable d'enlever ses chaussures à l'entrée. Concerant aussi pour les fumeurs de cannabis puisque que c'est rendu légal au Canada, sa aussi je interdit sa dans mon logement. Si vouz voulez fumer du cannabis sa va être à l'extérieur comme la cigarette.

reviews.comments: Vraiment très bien peux pas demander mieux j'ai eu des questions Steven ma répondu très rapidement j'ai juste de bon commentaires

Tout est équipé, cuisine et télévision. Mais nous sommes venus car, selon la description, il y a une chambre et un canapé lit dans le séjour. Mais il n y a pas de chambre et il est impossible de dormir sur le canapé lit.
Dommage pour la fausse description parce qu'à part ça, c'est un beau logement.
C'est un appartement très agréable, propre, tout équipé. Mon copain et moi même avons adoré notre séjour dans ce logement. Je vous le recommande.

The room is clean and independent. 
Steven is very kind and I stayed very comfortably.

L'appartement de Steven était parfait! 
Beaucoup de stationnements gratuits autour et c'est un endroit calme. Moi et ma collègue, nous étions en voyage d'affaire et l'endroit était parfait pour nos besoins. Le lit est très confortable également. Nous n'hésiterons pas si nous avons encore besoin lors de notre prochain séjour à Mtl.
It was a very clean and nice, cozy apartment. There was nothing uncomfortable because everything was all there. Downtown can be reached by subway. Recommend for everyone!!
Steven's place is as pictured… Clean, cozy, convenient and very comfortable! It was definitely a great place to stay and if I find my way back to Montreal again I would love to stay there!
Un bon endroit , tranquille et propre
Logement très propre à proximité du métro et pour l'impact ! Logement parfait pour 2!  Je vous le recommande.

Très belle expérience chez Steven! Très bon rapport qualité/prix. L'appartement était bien situé, propre, pratique, chaleureux et bien équipé! Steven était très sympathique. Il a pris le temps de nous accueillir et de tout nous expliquer. Je séjournerais de nouveau dans cet appartement sans hésiter! Merci Steven!
Wonderful place to stay! Clean, well equipped, walking distance to many amenities and public transportation. Would definitely recommend. Host is very accommodating and friendly!

Nous avons été extrêmement satsfait des lieux et le recommandons sans hésitation.  Beau, propres, très propres!, tranquille, bel accueil, stationnement gratuit sur la rue.   L'apartement a été  complètement rénové avec goût.  Bon séjour!
Great Studio. Well-equipped kitchen and bathroom... very cosy and very clean. Excellent location closed to a park and shopping centres. I can't wait to go back. Thank You Steven.
The place was clean and very close to public transport. It is nice for 2 people. The host was helpful and prompt in responding.

Steven's place was wonderful, better than we expected.  The location was great,  within a four block walk to the metro. The accommodation was very clean and modern and the bed was very comfortable.  The price was really fair, especially for the quality of the furnishings. Steven was very accommodating and was a great help at check in.  Thanks again Steven.

This was the first time we booked on Airbnb and it was a wonderful experience. Steven was very prompt in answering our questions and was also very welcoming.  We had no difficulty finding this apartment as it was near to the Cadillac metro station. It was very clean and everything inside has been remodeled so had a feeling of luxury.  It had everything we needed from towels to kitchenware and refrigerator and microwave and toaster.  The TV was right in front of the bed and was filled with Netflix and other apps so you can choose movies or TV shows from a large variety of choices. The apartment was about 2 blocks from the metro so it was very convenient to get to downtown, maybe in about 8 minutes. 

I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Montreal!
Great place, close to central montreal. Thank you Steven! Would def recommend!

Our place was tidy and cozy. There was everything a traveler would need, including all the utilities needed to cook and clean with, as well as extra towels and bathroom amenities. Our neighbors upstairs were a little noisy (you can hear their footsteps), as they had a small child or perhaps several who would run around in the mornings as well as late in the night. When their doorbell rings, the lights inside the apartment will flash, and an alarm will sound. It is in a basement, but the location is fantastic. There was a nice park across the street, and it was only a few hundred meters from the subway, which will take you into the city in less than a half hour. Unfortunately, we did lose our key, and had to pay the most expensive option to regulate the situation. If this happens to you, purchase a Weiser SmartKey Relocking set at Walmart or Home Depot, a few kilometers away from the apartment for $15 to re-key it yourself, as the lock is a Weiser Smartkey lock, which does not need to be replaced to be re-keyed. With that said, be advised that since there is no security deposit, any potential damages will have to be discussed between you and your host. Other than losing our key and having to replace an entire lock rather than getting a new set of keys, we had a great time in Montreal and enjoyed our stay in Steven's lodging.
Prima kamer op een goede locatie!

A great experience! This was our first time visiting Montreal and the location of this apartment worked out very well. What a great value! It took us about 7 minutes or so to walk to the Metro in the morning which was incredibly easy to use. The area where the apartment is located is quiet and residential. The apartment was clean and felt brand new. Steven was very helpful and easy to communicate with. Easy and straightforward check-in and check-out. If (when) we're back in Montreal, we'll certainly book again!

Logement agréable, Propre je dirais entièrement rénové avec possibilité de ce garer pas loin.
A environs 300 m à pied du metro, 20 m à pied d'un parc, 2 km environs du parc olympique.
Propriétaire sympas et explicite.
Un grand merci !
On recommande.
This place was exactly as advertised. We had a great time in Montreal and a pleasant stay here.

Super clean, though small, apartment with easy parking (except monday afternoons!) and easy access to rentable bikes (10 minute ride to botanical gardens, 5 minutes to biodome. Attn: when you rent the bikes, you'll be charged extra for trips over 30 minutes). 
About 20 minute drive to downtown Montreal. Not a great food scene nearby, so expect to drive or bike your way to something. 
Apartment itself is fine-- a bit warm in the summer-- bed isn't super comfortable, but that was our only complaint.  Super clean, newly renovated, quiet area. Great value!

Excellente expérience! Appartement conforme aux photos, bien équipé et très bien propre, proche du métro Cadillac. Proche supermarchés et quelques restaurants aussi. 
Steven n'a pas pu nous recevoir à notre arrivée, mais il a laissé son voisin s'en charger et nous avons été très bien accueillis. 
Excellent rapport qualité/prix.
Si nous retournons à Montréal, nous irons sans hésiter chez Steven.

Stevens place was great! So clean and new and had everything we needed right  there available for us. He was very accommodating, and friendly and easy to deal with. Great price, great value. Highly recommend!

Fidele aux photos le bachelor est en partie renove, propre et le lit est comfortable.Steven est tres acceuillant et professionnelle,et de bon conseil.L' appartement est un peu retiree par rapport au metro (800 metres) mais est deservie par le bus (200 metres) donc assez bien (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande

Studio à la décoration soignée et très propre. Nous vous le recommandons vivement. Steven sait se montrer disponible pour nous et toujours prêt à être arrangeant. Quartier calme et résidentiel à moins de 10min du métro. Très bon séjour, même s'il fut court, dans ce logement.
je n'ai pas été décu de monséjour près de toutes les commodités : metro magasins verdure et le calme

Phenomenal spot if you are traveling alone! Close to the Metro but in a nice residential area so that you are not among the hustle and bustle of the city. This apartment is very clean and well-kept. I would recommend it to anyone!
Perfect for couple I love this place

Photos are accurate; place is very nice and clean. Metro station is about a 10 min walk away which isn't bad. He didn't meet us but he was very good with communicating with me through messages so everything was clear. I could ask questions if I had any and they were answered very quickly. Overall it was a perfect stay for me!
Great place! Would definitely recommend to friends and family going to visit Montreal.
Appartement conforme aux photos. La communication avec Steven s est très bien passée.
Nice place. We arrived very late and Steven still welcomed us and showed us around.

A casa do Steven é muito confortável. Fica próxima a uma estação de trem, de onde conseguimos nos locomover para toda a cidade. Steven estava nos esperando para fazer o check in e nos explicou tudo sobre o imóvel e nos deu dicas sobre a cidade. A vizinhança é muito tranquila e segura.
Great host, Nice place. Will definitely stay again.

Steven was very welcoming! The place was small but very cozy for a 2 night stay. Parking near the place was pretty easy even during the weekend since it’s  close to a park. It was a very comfortable stay and we will definitely be back if we decide to visit Montreal again!

Steven est très accueillant, un appartement très confortable et très pratique!!! On reviendra chez lui quand on reviendra à Montréal! 
Je le recommande fortement.
Steven was welcoming and communicative. The place is clean and has everything you would need for travel.
Steven est tres accueillant, le logement est proche des transports, propre et bien décoré.
Appartement très propre et conforme aux photos. Stationnement facile à proximité. Je le recommande sans hésiter.
Home away from home. Perfect stay from check-in to check-out.
Très propre et cocoon, ce fut un réel plaisir de passer quelques jours à Montréal dans l'appartement de Steven.

Super appartement proche des transports en communs reliant toute la ville ! Steven est super sympa et très flexible. Son Bachelor est nickel, propre et bien aménagé !
Nous recommandons chaudement de loger dans ce bien, ce fut vraiment un super séjour !
The apartment is very clean and included everything we needed. The fold-out bed was comfortable.  It is located near metro, stores, and laundry. We enjoyed our stay and highly reccomend it.

I couldn’t get a chance to meet Steven face to face but he was always in touch and very helpful. 
The place is small but very nice and cozy. 
The location is good since it’s near a metro station.

This was a fantastic place to stay!
CLEAN, modern and easy to find.
Great communication and lots of parking on the street. Thank you Steven!

위에 사진에 보이는 곳 6211이 집이 아니라 차고로 들어가면 오른쪽에 보이는 집이 스티븐 집이에요! 캐나다 유심을 개통안하고 간지라 down the driveway라고는 했지만 에어비앤비에 나왔던 사진은 저 6211이라 먼저 저곳에 가서 실례를 범해버렸네요ㅠㅠ 정확한 집사진이랑 어떻게 가는지 찍어줫으면 더 좋았을거같아요ㅠㅠㅠ 그래더 방은 넓고 쾌적하고 친구랑 쓰기 너무 좋았어요!
Rien à dire tout était impeccable!! Merci Steven je vais y retourner c'est sur!
Très bel appartement et très propre beaucoup de confort, endroit calme et pas loin du centre ville.
Great location, great deal, greal host.

The best thing about Steven's place is:  it's exactly what is shown in the pictures. There is no mistake! It is close to the subway station, it's easy to find the place and it is spotless. Also, he is so gentle. We definitively would like to stay at his place in a future opportunity to visit Montreal.
Quartier bien tranquille. Très bonne communication avec Steven. Une adresse de plus dans mes références.
Nice place, great price.

Tres bizzard comme personne Jai oublier dès chose dans l'appartement à un endroit visible et je suis revenu 10m apres detre partie et il avais cacher mon sac dans un pagnier a vêtement sale méfiez vous

Steven is an excellent host and very accommodating.This property is close to metro station which means you have easy access to all the key places in Montreal.Will highly recommend this Clean and cozy place .

Steven prend soin de son appartement. Très propre, bien équipé et proche de tout. Je remercie Steven pour sa ponctualité, sa disponibilité et surtout la qualité de son accueil. Je n'hésite pas à y revenir.
I would stay here again! Very cozy cute apartment!

Excellent place for a great price.  The inside is well furnished and newly renovated.  Everything is clean.  The bathroom was a good size, the kitchen included the necessities and the bed space/living area was comfortable, as a bonus the host includes free netflix and wifi.  I would return to this location in the future.
Great stay! Very clean and spacious.
Steven was an awesome host. Very dedicated to making sure everything was running smoothly for me. His space was pretty neat and sparkly.  I highly recommend this place.
Super clean. Great communication. Lots of parking. Will stay again.

Such a cute bachelor apartment, loved the murphy bed! Great location, lots of parking around in the neighbourhood if you're going to be driving. TV, wifi, kitchen and all the amenities you can think of. Most importantly, it's sparkling clean! Steven is very nice, hospitable and communicative.

The place is super clean and really looks like the pictures. Steven answered fast. It looks like a big and comfort hotel room. The shower cabin is small though. I will definitely stay here next time and I highly recommend it.

Steven was a great host, very responsive through text when our flight came in late. He waited an additional hour to greet us and show us around the apartment upon arrival. While not close to downtown Montreal, it was very close to transit which made commuting very easy. Space was clean and as advertised.

Steven’s place is clean, has every basic necessity, and is semi close to a subway station (10 minute walk, then 30 minute subway ride to the city centre). I would definitely recommend this if you’re looking for a cheap place in a quiet neighborhood.

Steven’s place is so cute and cozy. It is as described or even better. It has absolutely all you need for a comfortable stay. Plus he was very nice taking his time for the check in to show us how everything worked in the apartment. Thank you Steven!
Nice place at a good price.
Cute apartment to stay in while in Montreal, short walk to the metro. Very clean and Steven was a great host!

Great value. Conveniently located between 2 metro stations and Bixi bike station around the corner. About 30 minutes from Old Montreal. 
Steven was a welcoming host and very welcoming - we had a late check-in but he was flexible. The place is clean and comfortable. Definitely recommend if you don't mind not being walking distance to everything and looking for a bargain.
Great place for a great price

Unbeatable for the price! Extremely clean space equipped with everything you would need for your stay. Just a few minutes walk from the metro which takes you right downtown. Nice and quiet neighbourhood. Check-in and check-out were both super easy. All in all, I would definitely stay at Steven’s place again!
Un grand merci à Steven pour son accueil et pour son logement. Il est très bien situé dans un quartier résidentiel et proche du métro. L'appartement est vraiment bien pour un w.e à Montréal

Great location,  so easy to get around via subway, supermarket etc very close, Steven was more than obliging when we were running a bit late which we were very grateful for after our long drive.  He came to meet us in person and showed us everything in the studio. It’s a downstairs basement unit with a great kitchen. Bed was comfortable, parking is on the street which was a bit busy at times but still managed to get one pretty close by, would definitely book again.
Overall very good.  Would consider using again
parfaitement comme sur l'annonce, très propres et chaleureux, idéal pour un couples !!
Steven's place is a nice and small apartment located a short drive from downtown Montreal. He was incredibly responsive to queries and very accommodating overall!
Cette appartement est juste parfait à tout les niveaux! Au delà de mes attentes! Je loue souvent des Airbnb et celui-ci est idéal pour Montréal! Steven est toujours disponible!
Steven is a great host & the place is very clean and Comfortable. It’s a pretty nice place !!!

Steven was great. Althought my check in time did not fit his schedule he made sure the process was seamless for me. Also very quick to respond and handle any knod of questions or worries. 
Thank u steven!
Parfaitement propre.  Parfait pour voyageurs minimalistes.  L'hôte a été très accommodant.
A beautiful space for a cozy getaway to Montreal :)
Everything was perfect. 15-20mins away from downtown. The place was sparkly clean and everything was more than I expected. Overall, it was a great stay.
Well maintained & cozy apartment!
Chouette petit appartement bien situé ! Steven est très réactif aux messages :) Je recommande
Steven is a great host. His place was very clean, organized and tidy. The place was also near subway station which made transportation easier.
Batchelor très accessible très propre , soigné je recommande sans hésiter hôte très réceptif a nos demande.

The room is cozy but is bright and breezy, perfect for those looking to spend more time relaxing  outdoors on the wonderful balcony or down enjoying the Bondi Beach instead of sitting in your room.

Laura (his housemate) and him made sure we had everything we needed, respecting our privacy and being very open during encounters. They are both very laid back and enjoyable. We stayed there for a month and ended up becoming great friends, they are very lovely!

name: Stylish urban loft in Verdun
summary: Bright modern fully renovated urban loft located on the 2nd floor of a typical 1920's Montreal house. Ideally located at the heart of the trendy up-and-coming neighbourhood of Verdun, near indy coffeeshops, bars and groceries. Only 5 minutes walk to the metro which will take you to downtown/old town Montreal in less than 10 minutes. A quiet, confortable and stylish retreat just one step away from the action!

The host was easily available and answered any and all questions promptly. The loft was beautiful and well lit.

This apartment is very clean, stylish and up-to-date.  I highly recommend it.  The neighborhood is a lot of fun too - Rue Wellington, two blocks away, is a bustling, gentrifying (but not yet ruined) street with lots of funky small businesses, restaurants etc.  Catherine responded to my communications immediately.  A wonderful base from which to check out a great city.
appartement très propre et proche d'une station de métro!

A perfect location for an escape to Montreal. Close to public transport and easy to drive to with plenty of street parking. Very friendly and safe neighbourhood. The apartment is better than the photos; large and bright throughout. Shower is like a spa! Bed is really comfy and kitchen is very spacious and easy to cook in. We will definitely return to Catherine's, when we come back to fabulous Montreal!
newly renovated and very bright clean space.  Central to all that is happening in Verdun and nice quiet neighborhood.
Un lugar muy limpio.
A great place close to public transportation. Was able to reach Catherine very easily,

This place was absolutely perfect! We were here for the May Long Weekend and it was such a great experience. The place is well equipped with everything you need! The bed is comfy and the place is very modern and beautiful! Transit is close by which makes it easy to get to downtown Montreal. The area it is located in is very friendly and has many places for you to dine or check out! 
It was such a great time and we will definitely try to book Catherine's place again the next time we are booking a trip to Montreal!

Thank you so much ! Our stay in Montreal was fantastic Catherine was both very pleasant and there for any questions or help we needed, I stayed at Catherine's apartment with my 10 yr old son and a friend over the Canadian F1 championship weekend. We found the area to be great for both us and my son, we had great restaurants near by and a parks to walk/play in. Parking was plentiful and if you was unlucky not to get a space directly outside the apartments you could find one close by. Overall we enjoyed the stay. Only one thing could make it more comfortable and that would be A/C, they may have been this but I was not able to locate the controls but this should not stop you booking a very nice beautiful apartment with a very  good host
Très bel appartement bien situé et calme
Nice flat in lively neighbours

Catherine's place was perfect for my stay in Montreal. The space was clean, comfortable and conveniently located in the lovely community of Verdun (~20 mins to downtown Montreal). Communication was efficient and timely and pretty sparse since everything was easy to locate in the studio. I look forward to staying there again next time I am in town.!

Having never been to Verdun before, we were not sure what to expect. We ended up loving the apartment and area and didn't even make it into the city or Old Montreal. There is lots to do and explore on foot and by bike (using the Bixi bike rentals located around the city). We loved a local restaurant that is just around the corner called Piquillo Bistro. Food is delicious and the owners are extremely friendly. The apartment was the perfet place to finish a long day. The bed is very comfortable and communication was with Catherine very quick. Would definitely come back!
Great location and space!
Appartement bien situé dans un quartier calme . Fidèle à la description et très bien équipé . Merci à Catherine pour sa disponibilité.

Great spacious loft. The check in was straight forward and Catherine communicated in both French and English. It's so close to public transport and restaurants and in 5-15 minutes  you're on either side of downtown Montreal.

The apartment was very neat and nice, well  aquipped, not far away from the city center, we enjoyed it! The little communication we had with Catherine was pleasent and efficient. Definitely would stay again.
This place was very clean, cozy, and perfect place for a couple to stay!
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great apartment in a great location! Steps from a trendy street with all the shops you could need, tons of cafes and restaurants. Two blocks from a great walking/running/biking path along the St.Lawrence River! Three blocks from two metro stations that connect you to the downtown core in minutes. The area is very safe. As a single female, I lived here for just under a month and never felt anxious walking at night. The apartment is beautiful, lots of modern touches and basic kitchen facilities. Would highly recommend booking this loft - and would book again myself!
The host canceled this reservation 97 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Horrible horrible experience!! This apt. totally ruined our vacation in Montreal. We had just came from another airbnb in Quebec City that was just amazing and above expectations and landed in a dirty, small and noisy airbnb with a host that had no sense of hospitality at all!. The floor was sticky, the dishes were still in the dish washer, the bed was not made and only had 2 pillow covers out of the 4 and they smelled like a sweaty man, there were only 3 small towels that were stained and did not smell fresh and were also located in the kitchen?? There was a nutella pot outside full of cigarettes. You could hear every step and laugh from the neighbors upstairs. Even though this was not unavoidable for the host she should still warn the guests about it. The 2 bar chairs in the pictures were not even there and there were many light bulbs that did not work. So what you saw in the pictures was different in person. There was no closet available to the guest so we had to keep everything in our suitcases which made the apt. even smaller. There was no toaster, water cooker nor a coffee machine. Just essential things!! So we had to literally go out for a cup of coffee. The trash can didn’t even have a bag in it. It was literally walk in clean and tidy up the apt. (That’s not even yours to begin with) before we could actually get some sleep. We left after 3 days in stead of staying our full 6 days and only because there were no other airbnb’s available in such a short notice and we had our 3year old daughter with us. Other wise we would not have minded sleeping in the car, at least the car was clean!. We were only refunded €61 out of the €452 even though we only stayed half of the time!. It honestly felt like a rip off and scam. When we contacted to host about our complaints and that we were leaving earlier she said she was sorry and that she would contact the cleaning company to see were it went wrong and get back at us with a solution. We never heard from her again!.

Upon arriving at this home, all of the garbages were full, and the bedsheets hadn’t been washed. Fortunately, this was the only downside to our experience. We contacted the host and received a prompt response. Under the circumstances, the host was extremely apologetic and dealt with the situation well. It seemed to have been a miscommunication with the designated cleaners. 

Despite this, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The pictures are identical to what the place looks like in person. There are several places to eat and shop within walking distance. This place also has a balcony which is quite spacious especially considering the location of the home. Parking is available, however there is one particular day of every week where parking is prohibited from 9:00-11:00 AM. We ended getting a $62.00 ticket because we were unaware. As long as you pay attention to the signs you will be fine. Overall we would certainly recommend staying here, and we plan to book this home again in the future.

Catherine' airbnb is the best one I had the pleasure to stay at ! Neat, clean, totally equipped -better than expected-, at 5 minutes walking from the stores, the metro station,  coffee shops and restaurants. You get to be in one of the loveliest neighbourhood of the city and still at 10 minutes by metro or car to reach downtown and the main attractions. Oh and it's near the St Lawrence river !!!! Book and don't hesitate, Catherine is helpful, courteous and professional.

Artie’s condo is located in the best spot to enjoy the island. Artie is such a thoughtful host to try to meet every need of guest promptly. The condo is good for families. I will choose Artie’s condo on my next trip with no doubt.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location. The apartment was a little messy and dusty. The walls are very thin so we had problems sleeping because of the noise from the neighbors, besides the apartment being very hot (the fan wasn’t enough). Yet, there weren’t enough towels for the four of us (the ones we had were dirty and had a bad smell).

Appartement très bien situé à quelques mns à pied du vieux port, du Vieux Montréal et de toutes les commodités (restaurants, épicerie, station essence, laverie automatique...). Le parc du mont Royal est également accessible à pied pour ceux qui aiment marcher (nous l’avons fait avec 2 enfants de 5 et 8 ans sans soucis), tout comme l’île ST Hélène par le métro (10 mns de l’appart).
Stationnement aisé dans le quartier, il faut juste faire attention aux différents panneaux car il y a des jours et des heures de stationnement spécifiques pour chaque zone.
Immeuble cependant un peux ancien avec un escalier extérieur légèrement dangereux si on a des enfants.

name: Fab luxury apartment  - The Watertower
summary: The Watertower apartment building was an old shoe factory converted in the 1980's. It's located in a central area of Redfern and Sydney.  The apartment has recently undergone a luxurious renovation to a very high standard. Easy access to anywhere by the train less than 1 min walk to Redfern Station - the apartment faces platform 10 exit/entry to the station.  We particularly cater  for business type visitors (attending conferences, courses, special events, short term work periods, etc.)
space: Your private bedroom (including external window for ventailation) is quiet, has Wi-Fi and is beautifully furnished with a comfy double bed, bedside table, reading lamp, all linen, towels, pillows etc. Also the room is individually air-conditioned as needed. Plenty of storage with hanging spaces and drawers in the built-in wardrobe. Having your own private bathroom makes it very comfortable.  As my partner and I will be away, our bedroom and ensuite bathroom will be closed off.  You will have exclusive use of all other areas. The apartment is fully air-conditioned and renovated to a very high standard.

neighborhood_overview: REDFERN - INNER CITY VILLAGE OF CITY OF SYDNEY: Redfern is only 1km from Chinatown and about 2kms from the city centre There's an extensive range of local cafes, restaurants, funky wine bars and pubs Australia Technology Park Channel 7 Carriage Works, performance space and art gallery Eveleigh Markets: Framers market produce every Saturday morning and artisan market the first Sunday of each month Fratelli Fresh Grocer SURROUNDING AREAS: Chinatown; Paddy's Markets, and the Chinese Gardens Dank Street; cafes, restaurants, art galleries and boutique home ware stores Chippendale: cafes, restaurants and art galleries; White Rabbit Gallery Broadway Shopping Centre and Apple Store Newtown: extensive array of cafes, restaurants, pubs, wine / jazz bars Seymour Centre: Theatre and performing arts  The University of Sydney The University of Technology Sydney ABC's (Australia's National Broadcaster) CITY CENTRE: Shopping: QVB, Westfield Shopping Centre, David Jones, Myers Circular Quay - Sydney Op
notes: Watertower access hours: POOL / BBQ: 6am to 11pm daily, other than Sunday which is 8am to 11 pm. GYM: 6am to 9pm daily. Weekends 9am to 9pm.
transit: If you intend to use public transport (trains, buses and ferries) for getting around the greater Sydney,  then purchase an OPAL card (either at the Airport train station or at a city or suburban newsagent outlet).  Getting from the Airport (options): (1) Train (one way $17.60 per person from International / $17.00 from Domestic).  You will need to change train lines at Central station or Wolli Creek station to go to Redfern station. (2) Shuttle "Ready2Go" door to door service (one way $22 per person). Purchase/pickup curb side at airport.  (3) Taxi - price depends on time of day and traffic (approx. $25 to $45)
access: Private bathroom, laundry, TV, fridge, kitchen (prefer cooking for light meals only), wifi, complimentary shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, tea, coffee. BUILDING / APARTMENT ACCESS: Keys will give you easy (and secure) access, so you can come and go as you please. Includes access to the pool, gym, sauna, library etc. and as well a secure car space can usually be arranged.
house_rules: - Shoes off at entrance - Respect neighbors - keep noise down when coming and going - Smoking is not allowed in the apartment nor in the common areas of the building

Квартира очень понравилась, расположение удачное, в минуте ходьбы остановка трамвая, мы часто пользовались этим видом транспорта, до метро минут 6 пешком, рядом много магазинов и мест, где можно вкусно покушать. Квартира расположена на 14 этаже, ночью открывается очень красивый вид. Вход в здание и в квартиру закодирован, что позволяет быть уверенным в безопасности.  В квартире два туалета, что очень удобно, когда путешествуешь с семьей и детьми или большой компанией. Amarjeet замечательный хозяин, отзывчивый и внимательный, очень быстро отвечает на любые вопросы, готов помочь в любой ситуации, если необходимо даже встретить в аэропорту. Наш отдых удался на все 100%, рекомендую данное жилье путешественникам с детьми или компании 4-5 человек. До свидания, Amarjeet, до свидания Гонконг!!!!!
