Amarjeet's place was convenient for big family. It has two rooms and the place is very spacey. The place is a 5-8mins walk to the nearest mtr. He also provides a van transfer from and to the airport. It was very convenient for us since we had a lot of baggages. All in all we had a great sta. Thanks again!

The location was good. It was near the MTR and restaurants and convenience store. The place was clean. Amarjeet answers immediately whenever you have questions. He is very helpful. We had a good stay although we had a little difficulty in checking in after midnight because the security guard cannot speak english and won't let us in. Nonetheless, Amarjeet helped us. Over all, we enjoyed our stay and Amarjeet is a good host. Thank you Amarjeet.

Amarjeet has a great apartment! Great location with convenient access to all kinds of transportation and restaurants. The apartment is spacious in HK standard. It's relatively clean compared to others we'd been to. We'd like to stay there again in the future.

房子位在灣仔熱鬧方便的地方
進出都要用密碼開門 樓下還有保全 安全性很夠
有洗衣機可以洗衣服 所以不用帶太多衣服 很方便
我覺得整個房子空間也不小
住起來很舒服
有機會還要再來這裡住
非常方便!麻雀虽小､五脏俱全!房东非常nice! 推荐!

Veldig sentral leilighet med kort vei til buss, trikk og restauranter. Bra med air condition og stabil WI-FI. Grei størrelse på leiligheten.

Likevel var ikke badet særlig rent. Det største problemet med leiligheten var maur på veggen og på gulvet. Nesten hver gang vi begynte å spise i leiligheten, krøp maurene ut. Derfor unngikk vi å spise. Det var også maur på badet. Det var svært ubehagelig.

The place is near by Wan Chai subway station about 15 mins, very convince. A lots of popular restaurants is about 5 -20 mins' walk. Also near the sea.If you want a warm shower , the water heater butter need to turn on.

i strongly recommend Amarjeet's apartment. it's easily to find it just following Amarjeet's note. it's very spacious with a big livingroon, two bedrooms and two bathrooms. you can put your damp clothes on the clothesline pole on the bedrooms's ceiling. this apartment is near to some well-known commercial areas,like  Causeway Bay and Admiralty and tourist sites. you can walk to them. living in Amarjeet's apartment is low-cost and high effective.

Amarjeet's place is in such a good location. It's in close proximity to bus stops, trams, subway stations, and tons of restaurant in the Wan Chai area. Amarjeet was a great host, checking up on us a few times to see if we needed anything. The apartment itself was clean, spacious, and everything worked as planned. We will definitely be looking for this place again when we return.
第一次去香港就住到这么好的房子,太幸运,房子位置太好,在湾仔轩尼诗道,楼下茶餐厅甜品房都有,地理位置优越,房间有个大客厅,配备齐全,房东很热情教我们开门锁,一直问我们一切都ok吗,人非常好!最重要的是这样的价格性价比实在太高,无可挑剔,太棒了!下次去香港一定会再次入住｡

Had a great stay at Amarjeet's place in Wan Chai. Just a short walk to Wan Chai MTR to get you anywhere. The place was perfect for what we needed, comfortable and great value. We had Amarjeet's driver pick us up from the Airport and drop us right at the door of our place which made it very easy and hassle free. We LOVED Hong Kong and would recommend staying at Amarjeet's place to anyone.

Bien placé pour un access au Tram ou au métro. 
Amarjeet était très aimable et réactif à toutes nos questions et commentaires. 
Il a eu la gentillesse d'organiser un taxi et un accueil à l'appartement alors que nous sommes arrivés vers minuit
总体很不错,楼下有冰室,附近很多7-11,对面有万宁,还有粥屋,交通也很方便,楼下很多巴士,还有铛铛车,可以把你送到香港任何地方
Amarjeet's place so close to public mass transportation such as LTR, MTR (Wan Chai), 7-11 and shop. This place suitable for Group or family and allow to cook. The owner so nice and friendly.

This is an excellent position for traveling HK! Amarjeet is pretty good and nice guys and very patient to lead us to find his place! A lot of delicious restaurants around his apartment and quite close to wanchai MTR station! It is great chose to rent this house.

Amarjeet is a very kind and considerate host, a good communicator who went beyond what was expected to ensure our stay was smooth. The nice apartment is perfect for one, two or three guests and the location is good. I'd definitely book here again for a stay on Hong Kong Island.
ﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰなﾎｽﾄで地下鉄へのｱｸｾｽも徒歩5分ほど!かなり動きやすくて､清潔な家で安心しました!かなりｵｽｽﾒです｡
Fabulous place amd awesome location... Im definitely take this place when my next visit to Hong Kong.
This is a good place for us to stay in HK, the host is so nice and responsive to my questions.

If you are looking for good value accomodation, location & a good host, Amarjeet's unit covers it. We had 6 family members in the unit & were quite comfortable. Ample hot water, airconditioned, easy acces to all transport & well presented.
Amust is to use HARRY Private shuttle service, as recommended by Host Amarjeet. Service second to none. 
You will be dealing with true gentlemen, in Amarjeet & Harry.
位置很好,楼下就是华星冰室,一家很好吃的餐馆,离公交车站很近,就是浴室喷头的热水有点问题｡

Amarjeet is one of the best hosts I've come across. He cares deeply about his guests. He kept checking with me to make sure my check-in was alright and my entire stay (6 days) was fine as well. You can feel the warmth when you communicate with him.

This place is exactly what we were looking for, living among  locals. Each morning we would go to nearby restaurants where the locals eat their breakfast. We had a chance to experience the real local Hong Kong lifestyle.

To the Hong Kong standard his place is larger than what we expected, two large bedrooms with two separate toilets and with shower of course. It was very quiet. We hope we get to come back again and stay at his place in the near future.

This apartment is bigger than my image, since I have stay in other apartment in Wanchai, other is too samll!!
This apartment is big enough for our 3person bussiness trip. 
I love it so much.  Amerjeet is so nice too.

Amarjeet's place is located a HK's style apartment but it is good that it comes with 2 toilets which is wonderful for big group of people. My family and I were enjoyed to stay here as there is quite convenient to everywhere. 
Walking distance 1 to 5 minutes - Ding Ding Tramway station, KFC, McDonald, Watson, restaurants, supermarket (ParkNShop, Wellcome). And we also took away the famous Kam's Roast Goose to Amarjeet's place and skipped the queue as it's just nearby.
Walking distance 5 to 10 minutes - Wan Chai MTR, sport retail shops, Wai Chai wet market. The wet market is happening from the morning till night.
And you can reach Causeway Bay by tramway or walking distance 10 to 15 minutes.
And I would give a credit to Amarjeet for his quick responses to an incident. On the 3rd night, the gas was ran out when we were cooking some vegetables, and he got his assistant to help us to change the gas cylinder at the night. Lastly, you may consider the driver Harry who recommended by Amarjeet, the cost should be cheaper than taxi if you have big group of people or you have many of luggages.
Amazing location and very good value. Spacious with working amenities.

He is very responsive and accommodating host. From booking to check in until checkout he is very keen to response. Plus the location is very good mtr tram and buses are just outside the unit. Will definitely recommend and will surely book again.
Very nice people! Thank you for everything!
The location of the apartment is so good that we can easily go to everywhere.

- good location, accessible to all public transportation
- bedrooms are facing the main roads, may hear people shouts on the street
Amarjeet is a great house owner, always responsive and supportive. The apartment has a very good location, it’s convenient to go nearly everywhere.
房东人很好,沟通不是问题,房子里面该有的都有地方也够我们8大3小住｡吃,购物,交通都非常方便｡地理位置也不错,隔壁就是出名的华星冰室,步行5分钟可以到达湾仔菜市场,湾仔地铁站大约8分钟,下次有去还是会再入住｡

Super convenient location for transport. Airport bus stop nearby, Star ferry to TST a 10-15min walk away, Causeway Bay for shopping is 10mins walk up Hennessy Road. Just really easy getting to either side  of HK from Wan Chai. Buses wherever you want and the tram as well. So many places to eat, from HK style diners, places for dim sum, congee, Korean, Japanese, noodles, egg waffles, coffee shops, fried chicken and sushi, there is everything! There are 711's around and a Park and Shop supermarket just a couple of minutes walk away.

Ameerjet was a great host. We never got to meet him as the apartment is self check in. But any questions or problems we had were dealt with quickly. We really enjoyed the space in the apartment, it was great to have a living room to sit in and watch a bit of telly once the children had gone to bed. The apartment is suitable for 4 people, 5 would be ok too. 

Our only dislike was the bed in the larger bedroom, it was too hard for our liking and led to a couple of uncomfortable night's sleep. We got round it by placing cushions under our knees to take the pressure off our backs.

All in all a great place to stay, we will definitely look it up again next time we are in Hong Kong

The apartment is in very good location, easy access and very convenient to the transportation like MTR, TRAM station and others. It is also convenient to get food in the area,  All kind of cafe, small noodle house and restaurant.
Amarjeet was very responsive as a host, and assisted throughout our stay.  It was most appreciated.
Accessible and very good location.  Amarjeet is nice and kind, very responsive.  We have a very pleasant stay in Hong Kong.
房東人很好,check out當日讓我們留到晚上才離開!令我們好方便｡
Amarjeet's place is really great. The equipments are complete. The place is clean. The location is also strategic. Surely recommended Amarjeet's place to friends who will stay in HK !
Amarjeet's place is centrally located -- very near to public transports and attractions. He also replies fast and has great tips during our trip. We'll definitely stay there again!!
A very good experience, clean and warmly place. Very convenient location. Thanks.
About 5 minutes walk from Wan Chai subway stop, good place for two people looking for seperate rooms. Good communication by host.
性价比挺高的,位置也不错,楼下有公交站,房间干净,房东比较忙,有时候沟通不是很及时,另外,虽然在高层,晚上依然能听到街上的噪音,有点影响睡眠｡

租了一套,房間很大,適合家庭居住｡
電視機不太行,不清晰
媽媽說床單被子味道很重

房子對於4人的家庭來說空間十分足夠,且附近不論是地鐵､巴士､叮叮車各種交通都很方便,到車站距離不會太遠方便到各景點遊玩｡樓下就是華星冰室也靠近甘牌燒鵝在家附近就有不少美食可吃,真的很棒!
另外房東也十分親切,有任何問題都可以隨時提問,回覆速度也很快,若有機會還會再考慮入住!
Amarjeet 是一個十分負責任, 地方位置方便,屋內 設備齊全,我會在推薦朋友｡

Amarjeet's apartment is a very nice base for exploring Hong Kong, and perfectly located with all of Wai Chan in easy walking distance. Amarjeet himself is a real role model of a host, from organizing very convenient airport transportation and personally welcoming us to always instantly and very kindly reacting to all our requests and little questions.
非常好的入住體驗,房屋特別大而且乾淨,交通便利屋主非常nice
Nice comfy clean flat for 3 in very convenient Wanchai. Great communication with the owner. Recommend !
We love this place very much, the room is very clean, very comfortable, very perfect, complete facilities, if next time, I hope we can stay here, at last thank you very much!

Amarjeet is very good host and very responsive to my questions. His place is in very good location for transportation and good chinese local food. Apartment is best for group of family or friends. We will back to this apartment again for our next HK trip.
Nice place and nice budget in Wanchai area

Amarjeet is a good host and is very welcoming and response very quick with (Hidden by Airbnb) . When we were in trouble, he gives us a response in time. The unit is easy to reach, just 5-7 minutes of walking from Wanchai MTR station.  There are lots good restaurants in the short street downstair. The unit  is considered very clean from our standards although style is old fashion, but OK for us. We made few mistakes not read the instruction from Amarjeet carefully, but he is very kind to solved it. we appreciate the host’s kind reception. We were happy to stay there.
This place is in the middle of of Wan Chai. It has great location, access to transportation and restaurants. The host is very responsive and friendly. Would stay here on my next visit to Hong Kong.
Great location, great price.
很好

Amarjeet was a great host! The communication we had made it incredibly easy to find the apartment. 
The apartment was great! Amazing location and was easy to find. My friends and I had a very comfortable time there. Would definitely stay there again if I come back to Hong Kong!

The Amarjeet apartment is located in wanchai but in a safety street. very nice place with 2 bedrooms and all the equipment . Amarjeet is all the time in contact with you if you need and he will help you on all your request. VERY NICE .

The space is more than enough for 4 adults + 2 kids. I might have missed reading this before but was surprised that there are 2 bathrooms. The place has everything you need - stove, microwave, toaster, ref, plates, cups, water heater, iron, hair dryer, tv, wifi, etc. It is also located near the supermarket, prizemart, 360 stores and restaurants including Jollibee (famous in the PH). Train (Wan Chai), bus and tram stations are also near the place. Central/Hongkong station is near - 2 train stations away. Above all, Amarjeet is very nice and answers right away when we have questions. He also makes sure we check-in easily. The video instructions and messages sent before we flew to HK are very helpful. Thank you!!
Great location and Amarjeet was very accommodating.

Amarjeet’s place was amazing. It is located conveniently in the heart of Wan Chai. Many famous restaurants nearby (just a walking distance). Tram station is nearby and MTR is just around 5mins away. Place was clean and amenities were complete. We’re a group of 4 adults and 2 children and we’re able to rest well in this place. Place is quite big for Hong Kong standart. Amarjeet was a great host, very helpful and responsive to our needs and inquires. Will definitely be back here again if we ever go to Hong Kong in the future.

Had a great stay here,location was good,easily get to public transport,choices of food is a lot,a few famous spot was there also...house is comfie and nice to stay in...Amarjeet is very helpful and nice to communicate with...thanks for hosting...recommend this place...

This apartment was so convenient, right in the heart of Hong Kong Island and great for many forms of transport. Great aircon and WiFi and it was clean and spacious too. I have already recommended it it to two friends.

Amarjeet was most gracious and kind. The apartment is a few mins away from the Wan Chai MTR and from the Big bus pick up point (Hop on Hop off option). It was a welcome cozy apartment and can easily be a happy stay for 2 families. 
There are quite a few malls around and lots of great places to eat. Amarjeet graciously offered a good option for airport transfer through an acquaintance (at nominal rates) which made the way to the flat very easy! Certainly a great experience for us

Everything was great! :)
The best airbnb appartement that I or my other family members (4 adults on this trip) had until now. Very clean, very good situated in the heart of Hong Kong, good to reach from the airport, good WiFi, big TV set, the air conditioning worked very well, fridge and washing machine too. Very friendly host (we did not meet him personally, but communication worked perfect via (Hidden by Airbnb) ), many super markets and restaurants nearby, directly at a tram station, only a few minutes walk to the next Underground/Metro station.

Amarjeet was very helpful.He explain everything to me,how to find building,send me a map and give a lot of information.Apartment was good,we had everything that we needed and location for us was perfect.I recommend it.
Good place to stay. Everything you will need is there no need to worry. Clear instructions on how to self check in. Thumbs up for this place!
房东很热情很细心,提供非常详细的资讯以便我容易找到公寓,公寓干净明亮宽大,屋内设备完善,被铺整洁,厨具一应俱全,以这个价钱租到,在香港实属难得｡希望很快再次入住｡
Great location, very clean and a very helpful host. Thanks Amarjeet!
自己预备浴巾,其他的房东都有提供｡

Perfect place to stay with kids. Very good location to start exploring the city. Amarjeet is an amazing host who arranged smooth check in and pick up service at the airport. We would defenitly stay there again!
A clean and tidy apartment with good air conditioning and plentiful hot water. Easy to access with helpful instructions and a host who checked in by phone to make sure all was well. Great location
交通方便,空間也很大很舒適,是我們旅途中很棒的一部分｡

I could not recommend Amarjeet highly enough as a host. If I could give 10 stars for communication and helpfulness I would. As soon as we’d made the booking he sent through detailed and helpful instructions, then helped us find a driver to pick us up and communicated with us to check everything was ok once we were there. The entire process was so smooth.
The location of the apartment was great. It had all the amenities we could possibly need on the doorstep and is a short walk to the underground station.
Thanks again Amarjeet!
Clean convenient pad in a really convenient spot, Amarjeet is a warm and kind man who communicates really really well, we enjoyed our stay and recommend  the place no probs!
Amarjeet’s place is amazing. Would definitely book it again when i come back to  hong kong. The room is neat and comfortable. Lots of shops and restaurants around. My kids loved it!
Had a great stay and very accommodating. All you need to bring is you personal belongings. Will definitely book again on this place. Thank you so much!

The best thing about Amarjeet's place is its location. Very convenient for all the different kinds of transportation and for getting around in the city. We also used Harry (the driver Amarjeet suggested) services and it was very convenient. The apartment is right above many great local restaurants as well as close to fast-food and supermarkets. 
Amarjeet was very attentive and easy to approach and contact. He came by several times because there was a problem with the plumbing that he dealt with.
We are a family of 5 with three children, and the apartment suited us in terms of size. The washing machine was very useful.
Our only complaint was the unexplained odor in the bedroom (Amarjeet suggested it was from our trash in the bathroom and kitchen, but even with no trash there was still a smell), and I hope it will be successfully dealt with soon.
Thank you Amarjeet for your hospitality and attentiveness!
位置极佳,交通非常方便,两家人,4大2小,如果觉得房间床小,可以睡客厅沙发床,性价比很高,干净整洁｡
good, perfect

This apartment is in a great location and very convenient to transportation.  It is a clean, large apartment with very comfortable beds.  We enjoyed our stay here and would recommend this apartment to other travelers
recommended place to stay
Amarjeet is easy to communicate with. his place has 2 bathrooms one common bath and one inside the MBR. Though it's a little small but will certainly help future traveller save time.
The place is clean, and lots of places to eat around , Amarjeet is very helpful and accommodating, a responsible host.

This is my first time staying at Wan Chai and I'm glad to book the apartment here. The location is really convenient with many eateries, cafes, shops and foot massage centres. My family is very happy with the location. The apartment is very clean though not brand new modern apartment it is clean and neat. We arrived very early in the morning at the apartment and left luggages at the small hallway which block his guests from opening the door (our sincere apologies to the guests and Amarjeet). Overall we enjoyed our stay very much.

We were in constant communication with Amerjeet prior to our arrival and that process went very smooth. Amerjeet was a great host and always available when a question arose. The check in process went very smooth and we found the apartment to be very clean and fresh. Everything worked as advertised. The room air conditioners were very much appreciated and when the windows were opened, the street noise was not objectionable due to being on the 14th floor. We felt very safe and secure during our visit and the location in Wan Chai is excellent.  We highly recommend Amerjeet and his apartment. Thank you Amerjeet for making our Hong Kong vacation a pleasure.
Good place, clean. Close to everything you can think of. Will stay again next time in HK.

홍콩에서 이만한 크기의 방을 이 가격으로 예약할 수 있어서 정말 좋았습니다. 저는 친구와 함께 이용했는데 침대 두 개에 화장실도 두 개가 있어서 가족끼리 이용하기에도 좋을 것 같아요. 집기나 식기도 종류별로 구비되어 있어서 장기 숙박하기에도 좋을 것 같구요. 호스트랑 에어비앤비 메시지가 아니라 (Hidden by Airbnb) 이나 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 연락을 해야 해서 어플 설치하는 건 귀찮았지만 답장은 정말 빨리 왔어요 :)

The place is suitably located in the midst of bustling Wan Chai.  The bus station is just around the corner and the MTR is just a mere 5 minute walk.  There are restaurants just beside the building.  Supermarkets and convenient stores are in the next streets.  The unit is clean, quiet and spacious.  I highly recommend the place especially to travelers who haven't tried Airbnb yet..

Overall
- This place was look nice and comforting
Advantage
- Clear and comforting
- Owner is very nice to take car
- Wifi is a quite well signal
Suggestion
- Wifi is unavailable in sometime (but overall is ok)
***Recommended for whoever is looking to see the nice place***

Nice place to stay in Wan Chai area, Hong Kong

Me and my family of 6 (and the baby) stayed in Amarjeet’s place during our one night layover in Hong Kong after our previous trip. Amarjeet was very communicative and provided me with all required information. The apartment itself is well-located with few minutes walk to bus stop and Wan chai MTR.

Thank you Amarjeet for hosting us!
就在湾仔地铁站附近,虽然房东是外国人,不过很热情,特意等着我们入住,大厦很安静,很卫生,华星茶餐厅就在楼下｡
Amarjeet对于我的留言很快回复,在地铁站附近,交通很方便,住的地方挺大,

Amarjeet’s place is great. It can easily accomodate us (4 adults and 4 kids). The aparment is clean, checking in process was very easy as well as communication. Amarjeet was very helpful an easy to contact via whatsaap. The bathroom in master bedroom have been renovated recently and it is bigger than before. The location of the apartment also is great, near to MTR station, restaurant, supermarket and shopping mall.

Das Apartment ist sehr zentral in Wan Chai gelegen. Haltestellen, Restaurants und Supermärkte sind gleich um die Ecke. Das Apartment ist sehr groß und genauso wie beschrieben. Amarjeet ist ein toller Gastgeber und hat sich super um uns gekümmert. Da das Apartment an einer Hauptstraße gelegen ist, ist der Straßenlärm auch nachts da. Wir würden immer wieder kommen, auch wegen der super Lage. :-)

The host is very nice and always gives me prompt reply. He is very caring that take care about if we could successfully checked in and any more things we needed.
The apartment is very nice, neat, tidy and well-equipped. 2 heater fans are provided. Many tablewares, cups and cooking pans are avaible. There are 2 bathrooms that one of them in a bedroom. Spacious living room. 
All 4 of us are very satisfied and will highly recommend it to friends.
just rent and stay, you will have good place with good price
매우 좋은 위치, 주변 편의시설도 거리가 가까움
Wow, what a great host! Excellent and timely communication and the apartment was in a fantastic location, central to everything on Hong Kong Island.
the house is very clean and accesible to shops and restaurant very good location we will book again when we comeback next year

Amarjeet is a very nice host. He had told us the place and how to check in quickly so that we had checked in fast. The house locates very well and it is convenient to go anywhere or find foods. 
Our host is so warm-hearted. I have left my kindle when leaving and he guided me to find it in time. I will still choose this place when next time coming to Hongkong
Best place to stay in Wan Chai, HK

这套房子最大的优点是交通出行非常方便,到各个景点都很方便,出门就有很多公交车站,当当车,超'巿餐厅都很多,楼下就有华星冰室,文华茶餐厅,对推荐对面文华苑的文华炒饭,量足味美,去香港会展中心走走过去就到了,房子的客厅很大,卧室小,最小的只够放一张床,客厅的'沙发估计可以放开成一个双人床,卧室里都是双人大床,就是比较硬,印度式装饰,有炉灶,能自己煮饭,房间清洁卫生总体来说还是比较干净的,两个卫生间,大的有淋浴房,水很热也很大,不要将热水龙头开到最大,当心烫伤,红色按钮是管洗澡的热水器,进屋后一定要打开才有热水,最后,该房的门牌号在轩尼诗道,但实际上大门在克街上,英皇珠宝左边街进去,还是比较好找
Amarjeet is very nice
overall stay is good.
The room is well equipped, clean and tidy, and conveniently located

I highly recommend Amarjeet’s place for future travelers in Hong Kong. The place is clean, cosy, and accessible. The apartment is near to stores, restaurants, market, and transportations. It is easy to check-in at Amarjeet’s place. He will just give code and the check-in time is flexible too. Overall, we had a great time in Hong Kong staying at Amarjeet’s place. I would surely book in his place again when I get back to Hong Kong.

Amarjeet是非常優秀的房東,問題回覆迅速,透過WHATS APP可以即時聯繫｡
住宿地點在灣仔華星冰廳正上方,門口就有城巴可以來往機場,附近有很多知名美食,相當方便｡
房子寬敞乾淨,廚房碗盤飲水機設施一應俱全,適合家庭跟朋友PARTY｡
是我在香港住過的AIRBNB中C/P值最高的,以後來香港會再選擇Amarjeet的房子｡

The owner replies as soon as possible.  Very easy to contact via (Hidden by Airbnb) . He sent the instructions on how to go to the building, how to access the codes for the main gate and the unit door. Location is very convenient, 5-10 mins walk to the MTR station. Restaurants and convenience stores are everywhere if you go out of the building.
房子的地理位置很好,门口就是华星冰室跟靠得住粥店,不远处还有再兴烧腊｡房子的面积较一般民宿大很多,性价比很高,只是家具有点陈旧,不过冲着这个价格也是超值啦~~

Our stay at Amarjeet’s place was perfect for our two day stay in Hong Kong. He was great with communication from the moment I booked his flat until we left. It was a great location, and we had everything we needed for a short stay. It’s a great value for the price, and we would definitely stay there again.
交通很便利,地铁站就在附近,楼下有便利店,房东热情好客,回应也很及时｡房子很干净,厅很大,一次很好的体验｡

Amarjeet's place is superb! Decided to book the place because of good reviews and was so pleased that I did. It was near everything! Fastfoods like KFC, Mcdonalds as well as jollibee are just meters (Website hidden by Airbnb) easy to commute as well since the Wan Chai MTR station is just a minute walk from Amarjeet's place. Going to the Apt and back to the Airport is easy breezy...and on top of it all, Amarjeet is such a wonderful host! Always makes sure that we are doing well. Will definitely recommend the place to my family and friends who will visit HK for a vacation.

name: Cute one bedroom apt. in Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
summary: One Private Bedroom, Kitchen and Living Room.   Full size bed sleeps 1 person or a couple.  Comfortable couch in your living room as well.  I have a separate room with a separate entrance.  The bathroom is shared with me, but otherwise you basically have your own one bedroom apartment.  Please note, no smoking is allowed in the apartment or anywhere in the building.
space: Wifi, Cable TV, full kitchen with coffee maker, stove, fridge, tea pot, lots of pots and pans and dishes.  Save some $ and enjoy cooking in.  Sorry, we have no dishwasher or laundry.   We're on the 3rd floor.  Stairs, no elevator, so take note, might not be ideal for everyone. This is my home, I have lived here for years.  We have neighbors, so please be considerate with noise and cleanliness.  No smoking, no pets or large groups, please.
description: One Private Bedroom, Kitchen and Living Room.   Full size bed sleeps 1 person or a couple.  Comfortable couch in your living room as well.  I have a separate room with a separate entrance.  The bathroom is shared with me, but otherwise you basically have your own one bedroom apartment.  Please note, no smoking is allowed in the apartment or anywhere in the building. Wifi, Cable TV, full kitchen with coffee maker, stove, fridge, tea pot, lots of pots and pans and dishes.  Save some $ and enjoy cooking in.  Sorry, we have no dishwasher or laundry.   We're on the 3rd floor.  Stairs, no elevator, so take note, might not be ideal for everyone. This is my home, I have lived here for years.  We have neighbors, so please be considerate with noise and cleanliness.  No smoking, no pets or large groups, please. You have access to a bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathroom.  I have an apartment on the same floor and I also use that bathroom. I work long hours so I'm more of a hands-off type of p
neighborhood_overview: Apartment is located in popular Greenpoint, Brooklyn.  1/2 block to McGolrick park.  Lots of restaurants, stores nearby.
transit: 10 minute walk to the Nassau Ave G train.  15 minute walk to Lorimer L train.  20 minute walk to Williamsburg and the Bedford Ave L train.  B48 bus access on Nassau Ave.  Street parking in front of building and surrounding blocks, no private parking.
access: You have access to a bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathroom.  I have an apartment on the same floor and I also use that bathroom.
interaction: I work long hours so I'm more of a hands-off type of person.  I am available if you need something, but my guests usually don't see much of me.  This apartment is ideal for independent people who don't need help getting around.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Artist and Project Manager at a set shop.  Love to travel!

reviews.comments: Greg was an awesome host, super responsive and friendly, and the place was beautiful! I would happily stay here again
We had a lovely stay at Greg's. Many thanks! I would definitely recommend.

I had a really nice stay at Greg's place. It was clean and quiet. Greenpoint neighbourhood is really nice and safe. Greg was here but really discreet, i felt like i had the apartment for myself. He was available if needed. I would definitely recommend.

We had a great stay with Greg, the place was clean and and had a lot of space. Greg was very friendly, we had quite a delay on our check in and he was really nice about it, he even would have let us leave our luggage in the building till the evening on our check out day. Also the area and the subway connection to the city was good. Kathrin and Jan
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I spent an amazing time at Greg's place ! Greg made my trip so comfortable ! The flat is amazing and perfectly located !
I higly recommend Greg's place for your future trip !

The apartment and Greg are just amazing. He made everything really easy, communication was fast and he was very flexible about checking in and out. Greg was rarely home, so we pretty much had a whole apartment for a more than fair deal. 
The apartment is comfortable, cozy, clean and really spacious for NY - the private living room is a huge plus. 
The neighborhood is really safe and quiet, while there are a lot of shops & restaurants around, and Williamsburg is an easy walk away. 
All in all we had an amazing stay, thanks for everything, Greg! :)

100% recommend. 

The neighbourhood and the apartment are gorgeous, Greg was a amazing host and we had a great stay.

We higly recommend Greg's apartment.

We loved our stay here! It was in such a great location and Greg was an awesome host. He was super fast to reply to any of our messages and was super helpful when we locked ourselves out. He even invited us to a rooftop on Independence Day, super dooper nice. The place was really great. The aircon worked really well and the bed was really comfortable. We absolutely loved staying here and would defintely stay here again. Also, the place is covered in really awesome paintings which was nice considering we came to New York to look at art. Thanks so much great! You were awesome.

Greg's place was extremely tidy and stocked with anything you could need during your stay. The location was the right in the heart of Brooklyn and a quick subway ride to the city. Greg himself was a great host and very quick and communicative!

We had a great stay in Gregs apartment. The neighborhood was safe and quiet. 
Although we've just seen him once, Greg was an awesome Host. 
The apartment was clean and big. 
We would recommend and would stay there again  :) thanks 
Barbara and Konstantin

We hardly saw Greg but he made us feel very welcome in his lovely flat. Great decor and very nice neighbourhood. 
The flat is perfect for a week stay! 
We lived it there. Thank you!

Greg's place is just as pictured. Very clean, comfortable home. Easy to get around from his neighborhood with lots of shops and food nearby in walking distance. I would absolutely stay here anytime I visit Brooklyn again.

I can only highly recommend to stay at Greg's. The neighbourhood is awesome and surprisingly quiet. The room is like a double room and very comfy. You feel like home and have much privacy. Great place!

Very well placed. The subway station (Line G) is at 5-10 min by walk. There is a lot of restaurant and store near the apartment. It is clean and convenient.
Greg is very busy with his job so it was like the apartment is for us :) and anyway he has his own private entrance. Highly recommanded
Didn't really see much of anyone in the building, but had full reign over the top floor which was decent. Had a good time, nothing negative to say. Cheers, Greg.

El lugar es excelente si uno considera el precio. Es como tener un apto para ti solo. No conocimos a Greg pero todo fue muy bien. Se pone unos 40 minutos en llegar a, manhatan y laa.paradas de.metro estan a 10 y 20 minutos (Website hidden by Airbnb) a que parte se va. Pero si no quieren caminar pueden usar un bus que pasa (Website hidden by Airbnb) y los lleva a la.parada del metro. Muy recomendable
Tutto perfetto

A perfect base to explore both Brooklyn and Manhattan. Greenpoint is a safe, vibrant, area with lots of places to eat, drink, and grab a slice! Greg's place is spotless, quiet, and private with lots of artistic touches, a fully stocked kitchen, and a really comfy bed. Check in was seamless and Greg was easy to communicate with. We would really recommend this as a place to stay, and hope to return in the future!

Greg's place looks exactly like in the pictures and is very close to the G subway station making it super easy to get in and out Manhattan. We haven't actually met Greg but the communication regarding check in and check out was super easy, also it felt like we had the place to ourselves which was nice. The street and the area felt very safe, plus only a short walk from Greenpoint's best bars and restaurants. Overall a great stay.

We enjoyed Greg's place a lot. The location is perfect as you're near the cool spots in Brooklyn, in a quiet and nice neighborhood. The room is large and we had a lot of space and privacy. It seemed like we had the whole place to ourselves. Greg was easy to comunicate with, and the house was really tidy and clean. Would recommend it for sure.

The location is great (the Subway is nearby), the appartement is large, and Greg's place is more than worth the money. It is neat, everything one needs for a (longer) stay is there, and the bed is great. The communication with Greg was good and he responded Quickly. I would definetely recommend this place to anyone who wants to visit new york!

My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Greg's place in Greenpoint. The location was ideal for Greenpoint, very close to Williamsburg, and not too far from the L (20 min) and G (10 min) subways. We stayed for two weeks and went to Manhattan almost every day via subway. The unit was clean, the private bedroom was comfortable, we had full use of the living room, and were able to prepare a lot of meals and coffee in the kitchen, which was great.

We had a great stay at Greg’s. Check in and out was super easy. We never met him, but communication was easy and we felt like we had the apt to ourselves.  10 min to the subway G. The space was  neat and super quiet for NYC.

Greg's place is super spacious, you'll get your own bedroom, living-room and kitchen which is exceptional for New York! Great value for money, I really appreciated the location in Greenpoint. The flat is surrounded by great coffee places bars and restaurants, but still located in a quiet cute street.
Regarding transports, Greg's flat is located a 10-min-walk away from the G train (Nassau Avenue) and 15 minutes away from the L train (Bedford Avenue) so it was very convenient to commute to Manhattan.

Greg's place was super comfy and very practical. He answered all of our messages immediately and was helpful and generous in each case. The room is great because you basically get an entire apt. to yourself, only sharing the bathroom and entranceway. The area is fantastic as well. Quiet street, next to a park, and in the best part of Greenpoint. It's a great place to stay and I can highly recommend it.

We loved staying in Greg's flat, and he was very accomodating of our needs.
It was clean and nicely decorated. We had full access to kitchen and living room. The location is pretty good, just a few minutes walk from the train.
We loved it.

La casa di Greg è un luogo confortevole, ben collegata con i mezzi per raggiungere le altre zone della città. In un quartiene ricco di locali e suermecati ma allo stesso tempo molto silenzioso. Greg è un host molto discreto ma efficientissmo. Raccomandabile per chi voglia visitare New York senza rinunciare a momenti di relax in casa.
Très bien
Great stay
De l'espace, un emplacement exceptionnel dans un quartier calme et vivant, du goût, bref il faut y aller...
Perfect flat, very clean and quiet. The situation was Perfect for visiting NYC. Greg is very discret and you will be very independant ! This was perfect !

Greg's place is as described a nice little cute bedroom perfect for solo travelers, the bed is small and a couple might not be very comfortable staying but can manage if they respect each other sleeping space. it's near to many cafe and bars, few minutes walk to metro, neighborhood is safe and calm with a park nearby.
Greg’s place was great. The location was perfect for what I needed and the space itself was super nice. Recommended!

We had a wonderful time at Gregs place. We didnt meet him but he answered really quickly and let us check in early which was amazing. The place is clean and spacious and we had it practically to our selfs. Be prepared to carry up your luggage two flights of stairs. We struggled a little bit but managed in the end. The neighborhood is really nice and safe. It has a lot of shops, cafes and delis. That made the 10 Minute Walk to the subway shorter. We would definetly recommend!

Greg was very kind and the apartment was fully equipped and very comfortable , we had the living room ,kitchen and bedroom to ourselves.
The only issue for us was the distance to the subway(:

Het was super. Het huis is schoon en alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig. Een erg gezellig appartement. Prima douche met bad ook. Tv ook met Netflix voor wanneer je wilt ontspannen of amerikaanse tv wilt kijken.

Het is een toffe buurt, er is van alles te doen in Greenpoint en Williamsburg. Veel jonge lui, beetje alternatief en hip. Ook veel clubs voor wie er van houdt. En leuke winkeltjes. 
De straat zelf is erg rustig. Geen overlast van auto's of buren.

Het vervoer is erg simpel. Je bent overal snel met een metrokaart. Tip: wij hadden er een voor 7 dagen onbeperkt reizen.
This is a wonderful apartment. The bed is comfy, the shower is great, the neighborhood is safe, the air conditioner is fantastic. I'm hoping to return soon.

Don’t think take it!!
Place is really spacious, cozy and clean. Greg is a very nice host and always helps when you need something but at the same time you have a lot of privacy. It takes 15 min to get to the subway station but the area is very pleasant so you even don’t notice the way :)

With the exception of the shared bathroom, Greg's place is a comfy one bedroom apartment.  I slept on the bed , in a substantial sized bedroom with large closet, writing desk, and bedside table.  My daughter slept on the couch is the roomy living area.  The kitchen has a table for four, and full sized appliances, as well as a coffee maker.  In this apartment, you are only steps away from a lovely park, and full sized supermarket.  There are also many other places to purchase items such as fresh fruit, deli meats, and fresh baked breads and sweets.  We enjoyed the many shops, and eateries.  Since I have vegetarian daughters, it was a bonus that there are so many veggie/vegan choices.  The subway is about a half mile away.  I give Greg's place an A+.

Adresse à conseiller.
L’appartement est très bien. Le partage de la salle de bain n’a posé aucun problème.
Greg's place is very nice and clean. The living room is very large and the kitchen is stylish.

La casa di Greg ha un bell'arredamento ed è adatta per la privacy . Il salone, la cucina e la camera da letto sono a vostra totale disposizione. Il bagno e' condiviso con Greg ma, lui è molto riservato e non l'abbiamo mai incontrato durante il nostro soggiorno.
La cucina dispone di tutti gli utensili necessari al soggiorno , per prepararvi degli ottimi piatti. 
La televisione in salotto, dispone di Netflix gratuito e YouTube, con i quali potrete dilettarvi e vedere film e serie TV in perfetto stile americano.
L'appartamento non è vicinissimo alla metro, dovrete fare una lunga passeggiata per arrivare alla fermata di Nassau . Inoltre, la pulizia va migliorata.
Ma, la casa e' economica e va bene per due persone.

Prima appartement op een super leuke locatie in Brooklyn. 
Rustige straat, en dicht bij de metro. 
Alles was voorzien en de communicatie was snel en duidelijk. 
Greg hebben we niet gezien maar dat was voor ons geen probleem. 
We komen er zeker terug bij het volgende bezoek aan NYC!

Great location and great host! Greg greeted us when we arrived at the apartment and provided us recommendations for lots of cool local spots. The apartment was very stylish and clean, and the area feels safe and is in close walking distance to the subway. Would definitely stay here again :)

We had a great time at Greg’s apartment. 
Everything was perfect for us, the living room, kitchen and bedroom were really clean and with all the equipment we need. 
We recommand Greg’s place for sure

Greg's place was one of the best we had in NYC! Very well located in Greenpoint, only a couple of corners from bars and restaurants + adj East Willliasmburg. We had a whole small apartment just for us (except for the shared bathroom) and didn't had the chance to meet Greg, but all the communications about the apartment were very clear and Greg was quick to answer. It was also very clean and -- a huge highlight -- the bed and sheets were amazingly comfy!! We highly recommend it!

mucha privacidad, es como tener tu propio apartamento con cocina y living. TV con Netflix. Muy recomendable si buscar una buena relación precio calidad. El subte está a unas cuadras y el barrio es seguro y tranquilo con acceso a mercados y bares en las cercanías.
everything at Greg's was perfect I really recommend his place to everyone. thank you :)
Es un espai ampli i lluminos, amb tots els equipaments, practicament el teu apartament com si visquesis a (Website hidden by Airbnb) comunicatiu i de facil acces.

The space and location for Greg’s place were great! It was a short walk to the subway that allowed my guest and I to get where we needed to go (the touristy places). The apartment itself was clean, nice, and cozy. Would highly recommend!

It's really cute apartment, and Greg is really great and very helpful.
The location is great since you're out of the craziness of the city center but you are near the subway and the transit is not usually that long. We really liked the area and the apartment.

I had a great stay at Greg's place! It was a very welcoming and comfortable space, in a nice location in Greenpoint. Greg was also very helpful when I needed help to get the key out of the lockbox, and for any questions I had during the stay, as well as recommendations. I would stay here again!

name: Lovely Gardened House 10 minutes walking to metro
space: It's 10 minutes walking distance to metro. Brand new and very clean house with 1 double and 2 single beds with a washing machine.  My place is very clean and tidy. I have lots of storage space. Since it's a cottage, there are no stairs and upper floors. It is suitable for 4 people, since it has two separate bedrooms, one with a double bed, the other with two single beds. It has a very nice garden. Quiet but very central location, close to main communication arteries and public transport. Free wireless internet and car parking available, free linen, free towels, ... no hidden costs. Great views of the city from the park nearby. Very friendly host with fluent English and Italian. You have a kitchen, 24 hours hot water,washing machine,electric kettle toaster , fridge,and microwave,central heating for winter and FANS available for summer time it is naturally cool enough . Metro and the bus stop from my place is 8 minutes walk and for the grocery shopping, there are nearby stores at walking
description: It's 10 minutes walking distance to metro. Brand new and very clean house with 1 double and 2 single beds with a washing machine.  My place is very clean and tidy. I have lots of storage space. Since it's a cottage, there are no stairs and upper floors. It is suitable for 4 people, since it has two separate bedrooms, one with a double bed, the other with two single beds. It has a very nice garden. Quiet but very central location, close to main communication arteries and public transport. Free wireless internet and car parking available, free linen, free towels, ... no hidden costs. Great views of the city from the park nearby. Very friendly host with fluent English and Italian.
