Metro and the bus stop from my place is 8 minutes walk and for the grocery shopping, there are nearby stores at walking
interaction: I live on the same premises so I am available anytime.

host.host_about: I am from Istanbul. We have three children, two boys 19 and 18 and one 17 year old girl. I am a sport instructor by profession. I enjoy very much going trekking and spending time outdoors with my family. I really enjoy hosting people from all around the world and I always try my best to make them feel at home when they are in Istanbul. I live on the ground floor in the same premises, so I am always at hand and available to help my guests.

reviews.comments:
This is a great place to stay at!
The host are very genourus and kind!
The place are very clean and nice...
I just loved the small house and I will return agin I am sure!

Beyond perfect!
The best!
Everything about it is just amazing...! the place, the price, and the host.
The place is really nice, very confortable, and very clean, it is located in a lovely garden, in a very nice neighborhood. Transportation is very easy, and the lovely host helped us to buy transportation cards, which made our trip less and less expensive..The house is located on top of a hill, with a stunning view. The price is unbelievable for what you get, and we were ready to pay even much more to have such a perfect combination of place and host! 
Tuna (the host), well, I am absolutely speechless about her! She is the most adorable, thoughtful, generous, and engaging person you might come across! 
The first day she came with us (even to the European side) and told us ALL the necessary information we may need..and with her help we were so comfortable, we could feel like a local! We had an amazing time... 
Also ask them to take you-if possible for them, and for you- to the place they have in the countryside, where is a heaven! In weekends they serve the best food, in a lovely wooden restaurant.. amazing!
Well, apparently I can not never describe this place and the host, in words! We were so lucky to find it.
We left the house, as we were all so sad to leave..BUT, we are thankful to have the chance to meet this lovely family! 
(Also I have to mention that it was our first time booking a place via airbnb and I wasn't sure about anything, but it turned out to be THE BEST! )

We've stayed at this place for 7 days and I absolutely love this place. The place is very quite  although  it's located not so  far from the center of the city.

The  house is very comfortable and clean and the price is really  low for such place.

The hosts are very kind, they helped us a lot with our trip and we are happy that we choosed  this place for our visit to Istanbul.

Tuna is amazing, as well as her two children.  She was so nice to meet us at an easy location so that we could bus with her to her home and the house we rented on the other side of her lovely yard.  The house is so nice, all newly remodeled.  Full kitchen with everything we needed to cook anything we wanted.  A very nice bathroom, shower, and 2 bedrooms.  We felt like we had complete privacy which was great for us.  But also we could ask Tuna for anything at any time.  Our first night there she drove us to a good grocery store where we could get food and helped us with any questions.  She made lentil soup for us, it was delicious!  Always she answered her phone and helped us whenever we got lost.  We got excellent directions on how to visit the Egyptian bazaar and walk up to the grand bazaar.  This way we got to go to the places with really good prices, and not waste our money at the overpriced grand bazaar.  This advice was amazing!  The yard/garden was the best.  We ate breakfast out there every morning.  The place is up on a hill and so it has a great view of Istanbul.  Really this is the most amazing place, quiet, peaceful and spacious in a central part of Istanbul.  And any difficulty finding the place or getting somewhere from there is not a problem with Tuna always so kind to help.  For the price, and the experience, and the host it is the best ever.  Just can't say enough good things about Tuna and the lovely house.  Kid, family, couple friendly.  Hope you will stay here, you will enjoy.  Happy to return and stay there in the future Tuna.  Thank you so much! :)

Очень понравилось! Тишина и уют! Прекрасная хозяйка и милые дети! При том что место очень тихое, транспорт, магазины, кафе - рядом. Это уникальное предложение за такую цену.

Everything is wonderful!

The entire stay was wonderful. Tuna made us feel at home from the beginning; she invited us out around town, gave us great travel tips, drove us to the station, and let us use the washing machines. The family was very sweet and their dog was such a treat. The area over looks the city, which was perfect for New Years when we were able to watch the surrounding cities light up their fireworks. Overall, our stay was comfortable, enjoyable, and a wonderful Istanbul experience. 
Thank you Tuna and your family!

Tuna is an excellent and very nice and helpful host
Her children are very nice and friendly. Tuna has done everything to ensure that we felt all around . The house is very clean and with all the things you need.In the bedroom is even a walk-cupboard The  house is beautifully in an great, natural garden. You can have wonderful relaxing. to the bus stop on foot it is only 5 minutes. By bus you can go to Üsküdar in 20  minutes (here is the ferryboat to go to europian side). By ferryboat you need 25 minutes to Eminönü, . A bakery and several supermarkets are in 5 minutes achieve. We are sure to come back again. Me and my kids were totally thrilled .They have made efforts  with Tuna's children. We highly recommend this house in good faith.Thanks to Tuna and her family.  Im sure we see us again.

Tuna's place is spotless and a great appartment to stay if you travel with young children because it has an enclosed garden. She was very friendly and eager to share information about Istanbul and her area.

We stayed with 2 small children (1.5 y.o.) for 2 weeks in may. The house is cozy, nice garden, next to a large park. Many thanks to Tunа and children - very heartwarming and lovely people. Tuna - super hospitable hostess, ready to help with any questions. When we were leaving - was the feeling that say goodbye to the native people.
Sviat & Inna

It was our first experience with Airbnb and obviously not the last one!
Tuna and her family are great hosts. They gave us very detailed instructions regarding all places we would like to visit and their countryside restaurant is absolutely unforgettable! The guest house is exactly as shown in pictures - very clean with enclosed garden and a nice park close by which was very convenient as we traveled with a 17 months old baby. Tuna was so kind to provide us with all kitchen utilities we asked and Antonio helped us to find a road when we got lost in the neighborhood:). Would come there again!

Tuna is a very friendly and hospitable person and she did everything to make us comfortable.
Her place is very clean with garden, green, fruit trees and beautiful flowers is absolutely fantastic!
I highly recommend Tuna's place.

Cheers,
Serkan

My daughters & I just stayed for three days at Tuna's lovely garden home. The house had two spacious bedrooms & a nice small kitchen & bathroom. The kitchen has a small dining table that we enjoyed having our breakfast & snacks looking out the garden. The kitchen had sufficient plates, cups & utensils.  The location is a few minutes walk from Camlica Park with breathtaking city views. The park has two nice moderately priced Restaurants.  Aside from the lovely home, Tuna & her beautiful family are nice, courteous & very kind. We felt home with their kindness & hospitality.  We felt like we have known Tuna & her family for a long time. Her precious son & daughter & off course her husband are so nice & helpful. My daughters enjoyed playing soccer with them & we had a great visit to an Istanbul mall with an Aquarium with Tuna's daughter. We sure will miss them & miss staying at their garden home.

Everything was perfect and I'm sure it's almost impossible to find better place to stay in Istanbul!
The apartment was very nice and clean, with lovely garden - everything was exactly like the pictures show. But the most important thing, which makes this place so special are hosts - Tuna and her family! We are traveling a lot and we had opportunity to meet a lot of nice people from all over the world, but Tuna, Antonio and children are really special! They made us feel at home from the beginning. They are kind, friendly and helpful! I hope we will back soon in Uskudar!

We had a great time in Istanbul. It was nice to have breakfast in the garden and enjoy the view. The appartment was very clean and exactly like the pictures show. Tuna was a very friendly host and helpful. I would highly recommend this place!

I went to Tuna house for 6 days with my family.
The house was amaaaazing ,clean, buetiful and comfortable . The most amazing thng was that Tuna(host) treat with us. She help us alot . Shr also accept from us to made a barbicue in her garden and allow to us to invite our friends .. Icant belive that there is a HOST like Tuna ..
Thank you Tuna for every thing :)

While staying at Tuna's cottage we felt like Istanbul travelers, rather than simply tourists.  Tuna is a lovely, intelligent woman who was as interesting to talk with as she was helpful with every aspect of our stay. The logistics required in getting to the European side were not complicated, but definitely added to our experience of everyday life.  We are grateful for the opportunity to meet Tuna and stay at her place.

Tuna is the best host ever! I have travelled a lot with airbnb and sometimes the hosts can be a bit cold but tuna and her family areso lovely and caring. We forget  to buy bread and in the early morning she brought fresh bread cheese and olives! She gave us a ride when we needed! Super recommended!
Everything was great. I recommend the tuna's house.

Die Familie Tuna ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie konnten uns bei jedem Anliegen behilflich sein. Und sind zudem sehr gastfreundlich. Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben und sehr gemütlich. Falls wir noch einmal so eine Reise planen würden wir dort wieder hin gehen :)

I stayed with my mother for one month at Tuna's house and we had a great time there. She is a very friendly and helpful person, who helped us a lot. The house is very comfortable and clean. Me and my mother liked to stay there, because everything was perfect and we are happy that we chose Tuna's house. Moreover she has got a very cute family.  
Thank you very much Tuna and your family. I hope that we will see us again :)

The Lovely Garden proved indeed to be a lovely garden and home to stay. The property was very clean and cozy with a feel of a real home. The house facilities and the garden turned out exactly how they have been depicted on the photos and even more so.....Most importantly, it was the warmth and hospitality of Tuna and her family, that made our short stay so special. Tuna is a very special, kind and caring host. She helped us with every need, providing guidance and utmost hospitality, including freshly made Turkish pastry and chocolate cake as a surprise.  This place is made even more special by the presence of a gorgeous adopted dog Tamal. He is always kind, hospitable and open for a lively play and a nice piece of bread with cheese :). 

The Lovely Garden is located in a very green, clean and safe neighbourhood in Anatolia (the Asian part of Istanbul), away from the everyday buzz and hectic lifepace. It is immersed in a residential area, very close to a beautiful Camlica public park. The area is nice for comfortable walks, if one is interested to observe local life in a residential part of Istanbul, away from the myriad of tourists, shops, industries and business centers. A number of local restaurants, bakeries and grocery shops are located at a walking distance. 

We would highly recommend the Lovely Garden to someone, who is seeking to stay more in a family atmosphere in a quiet green area, rejuvenating oneself with the energy of trees and the magical sound of the call for prayer, which can be heard from the minarets of the nearby mosque. It is worth mentioning that Tuna's family also runs a cozy lodge in a green area in the vicinity of Istanbul. We would highly recommend this place as well to someone interested in a quiet retreat surrounded by nature. 

We loved everything about the Lovely Garden and we have had a very lovely experience staying there! Above all, we would like to extend our hearty greetings to Tuna's family and thank her, her mother, her sister, her lovely daughter and son, the dog Tamal and her entire family for the warmth, hospitality and kind smiles. Sending you love and smiles from our hearts and wishing you all the best. 
We do hope and look forward to stay in the Lovely Garden again!!! 
Tashekullar, Tuna. 
With warm reegards,
Allan and Nigora

It was our first accommodation on airbnb, so we have no means of comparison. Nevertheless, it was really nice. The accommodation was very clean and we had everything we needed. Tuna and her family were very kind and nice, helpful and always there for us. We felt that we are in good hands. Thanks for the great stay!

Wonderful and pleasure host. The house is very clean and there is also a beautiful garden.
Tuna and her family are very friendly, helpful and made us feel at home. Always ready to answer all our questions, anytime! (And it might be a lot) ;)
We are looking forward to visit you again, all the best!

The house was very clean and cozy with a beatiful garden. Tuna is very hospitality and special, very kind and she helped us for everything. 
The house is located in a very strategic part of Asian  of Istanbul  in a residential area and close to the pubblic transportation .
For all these reasons the house  is nice and very comfortable.
I and my family loved everything about the Lovely Garden and we have had a very lovely experience staying there.

I made a bicycle trip with two friends and stayed 4 nights at Tuna's place in Üsküdar. After a week in Anatolia on our bikes it really felt like coming home. Tuna is a very friendly and concerned host. The house is very comfortable and clean. In the garden we enjoyed a nice cup of tea and coffee Tuna made for us. The garden was especially very appropriate for assembling our bikes. The nearby - unique! - hilltop restaurant meets every breakfast need you have (a huge buffet for 30 lira). Bus connections are at a short walking distance. You cannot find any place like this in Istanbul!

I made a bicycle trip with two friends and stayed 4 nights at Tuna's place in Üsküdar. After a week in Anatolia on our bikes it really felt like coming home. Tuna is a very friendly and concerned host. The house is very comfortable and clean. In the garden we enjoyed a nice cup of tea and coffee Tuna made for us. The garden was especially very appropriate for assembling our bikes. The nearby - unique! - hilltop restaurant meets every breakfast need you have (a huge buffet for 30 lira). Bus connections are at a short walking distance. You cannot find any place like this in Istanbul!

Tuna ist eine sehr liebe Person und ein sehr freundliche Gastgeberin. Eine sehr herzliche und weltoffene Dame, die viel auf der Welt rumgekommen ist. Sie hat sich prima um uns gekümmert. 

Das Häuschen liegt hinter dem Wohnhaus der Familie im Garten. Eine wirkliche Ausnahme für die Weltmetropole in Istanbul, das man in einem Häuschen im Grünen wohnen kann. Das Haus ist sehr Sauber und schön eingerichtet. Es ist herrlich ruhig. Man kann sich in den Garten setzen, ein süßes Kätzchen und ein verschlafener Hund ist inklusive.

Es war das erste Mal für mich, das ich so eine Plattform genutzt habe. Ich hatte anfangs gemischte Gefühle, weil meine Schiegereltern dabei waren. Ich war sehr positiv überrascht und freue mich auf das nächste Mal, wenn ich bei Tuna übernachte.
:-)

We stayed 4 days at the lovely garden. It was an oasis of quiet and relaxation from the hustle and bustle of Istanbul. Communication was great with Tuna. She helped direct the taxi by phone to her home and greeted us at the gate. The garden was a welcome site after a week in Sultanahmet's tiny busy streets. Tuna and her family are beautiful people and were very friendly and accommodating. They showed us around the neighbourhood and helped us get around to where we needed to go. 
The flat was clean, comfortable and roomy and felt like home :)
We would happily stay with Tuna again and highly recommend her flat in the lovely garden.
Die Familie und das Haus waren sehr fantastisch und die Familie war sehr sehr freundlich. Das Haus war bequem und man hatte alles drin, was man braucht. Sehr empfehlenswert.

We stayed at the Lovely Garden Home for a month whilst settling in for a longer term stay in Istanbul with our family. We could not have wished for more: Tuna and her wonderful children made us feel more than welcome right from the start and gave us a sense of being 'home' immediately. They showed us around, taught us traffic-short cuts, provided all that was needed and more. The house has spacious bedrooms, great facilities and as you can see from the pictures a wonderful peaceful garden! It is very special to be in such a lovely location that is also very close to public transport that brings you to the European side quickly. The Kucuk Camlica park is right around the corner and is a wonderful place for a picnic, playgrounds, a Turkish tea and a fantastic view of Istanbul. Grocery shops and fresh baked bread are around the corner. If you want an authentic experience that goes beyond the regular tourist location, we highly recommend this lovely house and above all these lovely hosts!

We stayed 4 nights in Tuna and Antonio's place. They were very warm, so helpful that they left their parking for us and checked whether we are fine or need something everyday. The place is very nice, clean and inside a very lovely garden. We may go there again, when we are back to Istanbul
We spend our new year night in Istanbul and got an awesome place by Tuna, and literally we got warm welcome by our host. They have been so generous and nice to us and we enjoyed our stay over there.

Мы с мужем и нашим маленьким сыном жили в Стамбуле две недели в феврале. Дом в жизни лучше, чем на фотографиях - аккуратный уютный гостевой домик на одном участке с хозяйским, в глубине сада. Дом чистый, постели свежие, на кухне есть всё необходимое для готовки. Надо сказать, что к жилью мы предъявляем высокие требования, поскольку ездим с маленьким ребёнком, и были полностью удовлетворены: тихо, далеко от больших улиц, мы никому не мешали, и нам не докучали, прямо в садике можно погулять с ребёнком, а на соседней улице огромный ландшафтный парк с озером и утками. Район хороший: практически через забор живёт глава района, а в километре-двух резиденция президента страны. В 10 минутах ходьбы несколько продуктовых магазинов, недалеко станция метро. Огромное спасибо за приём хозяйке - Туне. Добрейшей души человек, щедрый, отзывчивый, прекрасный собеседник… Когда она узнала, что мы приехали лечить ребёнка - всячески искренне пыталась помочь, за что мы ей очень благодарны. С хозяйкой, её мужем и двумя детьми мы подружились, это действительно очень хорошая семья. Рекомендуем всецело. Жильё подойдёт и семьям, и молодым парам. 
Everything was great. Clean, comfortable and cosy house, safe and great location. Tuna is a charming and fantastic hostess, whom we now consider a friend. She and her wonderful family made us feel at home. We really enjoyed our stay at Tuna's lovely house and our evening conversations over a cup of tea. Thank you again, dear Tuna, for your kindness and hospitality!

My husband and I stayed in Tuna's cottage for four days on a short vacation in Istanbul as we prepared to move back to the U.S. from Ghana. When we arrived at her place, we were thoroughly exhausted from packing up our lives in Ghana and a few nights of inadequate sleep, and the cottage was the perfect place to rest and recharge. It's fairly unadorned on the inside - just a couple of sparsely furnished bedrooms, a bathroom, and a small kitchen - but that was all we needed! The heat and hot water worked well, the bed was super comfortable, and we had a lovely view of the city from our bedroom window. It was too cold to enjoy the courtyard while we were there, but it looked like an ideal place to drink morning coffee, with two hammocks and a table and chairs.

All that said, what made our experience with Tuna really special was not the accommodation itself but our interaction with her and her family, who were absolutely the most gracious and attentive Airbnb hosts I've ever encountered (and almost all of my Airbnb experiences have been great). They greeted us upon arrival; walked us around the neighborhood to point out pharmacies, ATMs, supermarkets, and the like; and (most essentially) pointed us toward bus stops and even talked to the drivers to make sure we got on the right one. On the Asian side of Istanbul, at least in this particular area, not many people speak English, so this was a huge help - I don't know how we could have navigated the city's massive public-transit systems without it! Tuna invited us to accompany the family to their restaurant/lodge outside of town, where we had a lavish Sunday breakfast and took a short hike up into the hills. Her two teenage children were always happy to answer our questions and show us around. On our last night, they invited us into their home for tea and  a chat, and Tuna helped us arrange for a taxi to the airport that could accommodate all our many bags.

While there are other Airbnb options that put you closer to the major sights in Istanbul, I don't think we would trade our stay with Tuna's family for anything! Highly recommended if you want a more local experience and a truly warm welcome.

I stayed four night at Tuna's place. Tuna is one of the sweetest person I have ever met in my life. She cares about her guests and always ready to help. Her husband, Antonio is such a gentleman; very friendly, knowledgeable and open minded. 
Tuna's sister, Deniz is a  wonderful lady!! I really enjoyed my time with her. Luca and Asia are very smart, easy going and fun to be with them. I loved them! 
Her brother, Ismail, his wife and there beautiful kids are very cute family. Tuna's mother is so sweet. I am in love with the whole family!!

The place is just fantastic - beautiful and clean.  And honestly, we couldn't ask for a better host than Tuna. In fact, she is the very definition of an ideal host -- who truly went out of her way to make us feel welcomed and comfortable.  She showed us around the neighborhood and helped us with just about anything she could.  Just a total pleasure to deal with. Can't wait to come back!

Tuna vous accueille dans un cadre calme et chaleureux . Le logement est simple et propre, situe à côté d'un parc qui offre une vue splendide sur le ville. Le quartier est bien desservi. Des bus pour Uskudar et Kadikoy passent toutes les 5 min. Tuna et sa famille sont généreux et disponibles et font tout pour rendre votre séjour agréable. Une excellente adresse loin de l'agitation touristique. ❤️❤️❤️

per il secondo anno consecutivo ho avuto l'onore di soggiornare nella casa di Tuna. Prima di dare una recensione alla casa ci tengo particolarmente a ringraziare Tuna per l'accoglienza e l'affetto che lei e la sua famiglia ci hanno dato perché è stato un vero piacere passare momenti assieme  a chiacchierare in giardino. Ci siamo sentiti come a casa e Tuna fa di tutto per fare sentire a proprio agio.
La casa è veramente ubicata in una posizione strategica e perfetta per raggiungere in breve tempo punti importanti della città.
Estremamente pulita e dotata di tutti i comfort, Tuna controlla in maniera scrupolosa che tutto sia perfetto per i suoi ospiti. Anche i nostri bambini hanno apprezzato molto la casa e non volevano nemmeno andarsene. Tutto all'interno della casa è esattamente come nella descrizione e nelle foto dell'alloggio. Consiglio di prenotare la casa di Tuna perché è perfetta per soggiorni a Istanbul. Tuna grazie di cuore per la grande opportunità che ci hai dato.
Monica

Highly recommended. 
It is an annexe in a nice garden,a couple of large bedrooms.
Very clean and comfortable beds/linens. 
The host family is very kind and they are lovely people.
Hope to stay again...

On this tour, we met 5 hosts and she was easily the best. The fact that she lived in the same compound meant that we had several  opportunities to interact with her as well as her husband and teenage kids. She picked us up from the bus-stop so we did not have to haul the suitcases to the house. She treated us to tea in the garden immediately on reaching the house. We went to the weekly market in her car to stock up for the next 2 days. She recommended a restaurant in a nearby park which had some of the best views of the town.  
The cottage has been newly furnished and exactly as described in the listing. It was a welcome change from flats in the multi-story buildings we had lived earlier in the tour.
Tuna was prompt in responding to our communications before as well as during our stay . She even offered to keep our Istanbul cart , return it after our departure and send the balance amount. 
I would recommend that one should finish sightseeing from some other accommodation in the city and come here to relax and soak in the local ambiance and hospitality.

Tuna & family are very nice people; location is great and can be reached easy by car; in the garden you have hammock and fresh figs; shops & restaurants are located near by; also bus station to Uskudar is located near by. In the first day Tuna prepared for us a tour of the center and showed us the restaurants with traditional food & sweets, shops and all you need to know about Istanbul public transportation. Each day Tuna picked us up with her car from the bus station, in our way back from the city. Also Tuna arranged to park our car inside the premises, instead of her car. Thank you very much for all, Tuna!
Great place, small paradise in middle of Istanbul. Wonderful host.

Sımsıcak bir aile ve sımsıcak bir dostluk. Böylesi içten ve samimi bir ev sahibi bulmak bu devirde hayli zor. Tuna hanim kadar çok yönlü ve yaşama tutkuyla bağlı birini tanıdığımız için çok memnun olduk. Sevgili eşi Antonio ve sevecen çocuklarını da çok sevdik. Kesinlikle ama kesinlikle öneririz; bizim Istanbul adresimiz belli:)))

Tuna e' stata sempre molto gentile e disponibile. La casa e' pulita ed accogliente, in una zona tranquilla, lontano dal traffico ma vicina alla fermata dell'autobus.
Consiglio questa sistemazione nella parte asiatica di Istanbul.

Gosh. I don't even know where to start. this was, by far, the best vacation EVER and honestly our wonderful host Tuna and her beautiful and warm family play a monumental role! from responding promptly my emails before we visited to the entire tenure of our stay of two weeks, she was an absolutely splendid host. I know I've made a friend for life. We intended to get a place on the Asian side, where we could be far off from the insanity of the tourism commotion but also be able to access it for sight seeing the usual popular sites and that's exactly what tuna's place is. the house was spotless, comfy and very relaxing and warm after a cold day out. The beds were clean, clean towels laid out, it was a lovely little home away from home for me, my husband and my 5 year old daughter. We even enjoyed the garden on sunny days, had tea outside, laid in the hammock and just unwind. the nearby bulgurlu market which is a downhill walk was also a pleasant surprise, the restaurants there were amazing and we got so comfortable with their excellent service ( and much more food for value) compared to the European side that we would have all our meals there. Tuna even took me to the local thursday market where i bought the cheapest and most amazing salmon and nuts and died fruit and she also showed me how best to cook the salmon! the second day tuna even showed us the Cagri departmental stoire which has all the groceries you might need and a lovely bakery where I shopped plenty of times! Right across the street is a wonderful spice shop with all kinds of exotic spices and teas. There is also a dizzying number of amazing bakeries, baklava and sweet houses, even clothes stores, all in the very easy vicinity of Tunas house. also a bus or mini van ride to Uskudar or Kadikoy and you can do all your souvenier and other shopping with much more variety and much cheaper than the European side. There's a 5 lira shop in Kadikoy that I went berserk in! Tuna very kindly explained the whole metro, bus and ferry ride system to us and we barely ever needed a taxi. She helped guide me with the entire itinerary. she was also amazingly helpful when we needed guidance of any kind when we were lost or confused about something, Tuna was just a phone call away! i know words can never suffice but if you want to experience the local warmth and feel of the turkish culture along with all the tourist attractions, this is the absolute best place. This was our first air bnb experience and tuna has set the bar extremely high for any successive air bnb bookings we make! We are definitely returning and this was, at the cost of sounding repetitive, the absolute best vacation ever! Love you Tuna!

Very great experience. Tuna picked up us home the first day. Next day in the morning Tuna first showed us the nearby restaurants and gave us many useful tips about this city, then she took us to the Sultan Ahmad District to see Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, etc. We talked a lot about interesting things in Turkey and China during the walk. Tuna is a very very cool woman, we both love her very very much. At the marathon day, Tuna took us to the start point and said good luck to us. Thank you Tuna, you saved us time and showed the greatest side of the city. The house is very comfortable to live, has everything in it, towels, forks and very fast internet access. In the morning the inner courtyard is so quiet that we both love the morning moment. The traffic is convenient, ferry, metro and minibus are OK between old town and home. Great experience in Istanbul!
超赞的房东,我们都特别喜欢她,五星级推荐｡

Ev sahibimiz Tuna Hanım bizi rahat ettirmek için elinden geleni yaptı. Ev hakkındaki bütün açıklamalar doğru. Gerek konum gerekse konfor olarak beklentileri (Website hidden by Airbnb) evde yokken kedimizle bile ilgilendi :) Ailecek çok sıcakkanlı ve samimiler.  Kış olmasına rağmen ne ısınmada ne sıcak su da hiç problem yaşamadık.

Her şey için çok teşekkürler
Tuna hanıma çok teşekkür ederim çok iyi bir ev sahibi kendisi. Evdende çok memnun ayrıldım. Hem semt hem ev kafa dinlemek için ideal bir yer.
Excellent facilities and lovely family. If we are ever in Istanbul this will be our first choice.

Tuna is a wonderful, hospitable, and well informed global traveler.  So it's not a surprise that this place is a perfect respite for anyone stopping through Istanbul.  Having lived in Istanbul, we ourselves understand how truly unique this house is.  The neighborhood is beautiful, the area is quiet and shops are not far away.  The garden is lovely and the accommodation itself is exceptional.  Tuna herself is what makes this a 5-star accommodation.  We highly recommend.
Beautiful Place in a very quite area .

Tuna was the best in Istanbul! She showed us everything we wanted to see and was absolutly helpfull and nice to us. Her place is clean and there's everything you may need. To have a little garden in the middle of such a huge city like Istanbul is fantasic. If we come again, we will stay sure in her apartment! Thank you for all, Tuna!

Tuna is the best host we ever had in the last few years of frequently using Airbnb in different countries.  The house is also very cute and wonderful for small kids. There is a bit of a view of Turkey from the the yard as the house is on a hill.  It was also nice to have a view of the starry night from the master bedroom.  Tuna is generous enough to offer us rides several times during our stay to make our life easier with two little kids.  She made sure we had a good time and very responsive to all our needs.  Excellent all in all.

Stay in Lovely Gardened House was amazing. Very cozy and friendly atmosphere, nature and calmness inside the huge crowded city - this is something.
From practical side, house is very clean, everything you need is there, if not - you can always ask host. We would recommend this place for those who wants to see real life of Istanbul, investigate not tourists districts, and for families with kids because garden and park nearby are very convenient to let kids relax a bit from big city.
Host, Tuna, is a special gift for travelers, will provide you with lots of information and suggest best places, routs etc.
Highly recommended!
With love to Istanbul, Lovely Gardened House, Tuna and Family - 
from Ukraine

This was our second visit to Turkey and I honestly say that the reason we made this trip was due to how amazing an experience staying at Tunas place was last time. She was generous, sincere and is my friend for life now! It's like a home away from home. I absolutely love the neighborhood. It's quaint and lovely, a true window into this beautiful Turkish culture. Tuna, as always, was an EXCEPTIONAL host. Always available. Extremely helpful. Her kids Luca, Asia and Towfiq are adorable, intelligent individuals, a reflection of their beautiful mother. I will definitely be visiting again and again!!!

Eve vardığımızda Öğlen saatleri idi ve acıkmıştık. Tuna hanım lezzetli bir yemek ve ardından kahve getirdi. Sonra beni Metrobüs durağına aracı ile Bırakma inceliğini gösterdi, istanbulkart'ını kullanmama izin verdi. Akşam eve dönerken de Metrobüs durağından alabileceğini söyledi. Akşam yemek alabilmem için beni yakındaki bir restorana kadar götürüp getirdi. Nazik ve ilgili davrandı.

My husband, daughter and I stayed at Tuna's delightful home for 4 nights. Located behind the families home is a private house in which we were hosted in. The home is very comfortable and quite spacious as well. Even better than the house is the spectacular yard; hammocks, tables, chairs and even a soccer ball! Tuna took us around the city to see different neighborhoods and helped us plan our daily schedule. Upon arriving back in the city after traveling in Greece we came to visit Tuna and her family and spent the day chatting. If I could, I would move into Tuna's backyard and set up camp! :):) My husband and I can't wait to visit again and when we do we will definitely contact Tuna to stay at home again. Thanks for everything Tuna! We miss your home!

Tuna was the most wonderful host you could have wished for. She was always approachable, helped us with everything that came up at any time of day, took us to the local market for grocery shopping every week, even drove me to the metrobus in the morning to get to work! Also, the place is beautiful with its large garden, lots of shade and views of the prince's islands in the Marmara sea. It was absolutely wonderful to stay with Tuna and her family and we would do it again!

Tuna s' lovely gardended house is really a fantastic and beautiful place to stay,so comfortable and clean.Kitchen is equipped with all household necessities. It is located at 5 minutes walk from bus stop and market.Whole Istanbul is at your reach from this place by public transport.
Above all whole family is so lovely,cooperative,concerned and caring that one can't forget their hospitality ever.I wish to get the opportunity to stay there again.

We loved our stay at Tuna's house. Ideal, quiet retreat from the city. Great for us and especially great for the children who enjoyed the garden with its football goal, hammocks, scooters, place to run and the tiny kittens. 

The house is great. Exceptionally clean with everything you could need. 

We enjoyed being on the Asian side of the city. Near a park and good local shops. 

Tuna's help was indispensable. Her generosity is a gift and made the whole stay in Istanbul so much better.

We spent some amazing days in Istanbul, Tuna is a very pleasant Person wo helped us duiring our hollidays a lot, she speaks perfectly english, the house is very clean and comfortable. There is everything you need and I can recommend to spend the hollidays there and we would like to come again.

We spent 4 nights at Tuna's place and it was all so so memorable right from the beginning. We arrived on a cold rainy afternoon in Istanbul greeted with warm hot chocs , yummy sandwiches and Tuna went extra miles  to get us turkish delights . Now that's truly welcoming!  She's a truly remarkable, active, passionate, helpful and warm person and the kids are just so charming and amazing. Its a perfect place for any families with young children (we have 4 with us) and while its quite hilly , taxis are available within minutes and busses are just around the corner. I'd love to return back definitely..and we are all missing her cheese sandwiches by now. Thank you Tuna and big fat hugs from malaysia !
Tuna's place is very comfortable, lovely and liveable. I would like to thanks Tuna for her special effort, kindly help and pleasant welcome...
Great place, first class host, we thoroughly enjoyed the time we spend in Tuna's place and we will definitely try to repeat the experience in the future.

We stayed at Tuna's place for over a month. It was by far our best airbnb experience so far, and we travel a lot. We knew what to expect from the excellent reviews she's got, but we didn't expect it to be that good! 
Tuna is a wonderful, super friendly and thoughtful person and a great host. She made sure we had everything we needed, even when she was away -- big and small things alike. She was always available to us and happy to offer help and advice. 
The house itself is pretty, comfortable, and fully-equipped. It also has a big, lovely garden, which our 8 month old son really enjoyed, not to mention the huge and beautiful Küçük Çamlıca Park, 3 minutes walking distance from the house. It has several playgrounds, lots of open spaces and a lovely duck pond --
 and don't forget to go up the famous hill when you're there, where you will find a nice restaurant overlooking an absolutely incredible view of Istanbul and the Bosphorus. The neighborhood is very nice and peaceful, and there is easy availability of buses, dolmuşs and taxis from the main roads.
We strongly recommend staying at Tuna's if you're in the area; we know that for our next trip to Uskudar, her place will no doubt be our first choice.
Thank you for everything Tuna :-)

Great host, consistently checked we were satisfied. Gave us a tour of the local area and treated us to outstanding food including home-made cakes and Dolma on multiple occasions during the week we stayed. Five-star experience.
I don't have a word to describe hospitality of Tuna and her family. It is the best travel experiance I ever have.

House is very uphill so I wouldn't recommend it for those with elderly. But aside from that- everything else was great and Tuna & family was so helpful in bringing us around in her car and in helping us with all of our needs. We felt very safe and welcomed throughout our whole stay. Thank you SO much!

This is a definetly house of a Super Host. there is nothing to worry about and all you have to do is ask Tuna.  Thanks you very much Tuna for our amazing stay in Istanbul . It's so rare to find such compassionate and genuine people in life anymore. We were so touched by your care and your love that was shared by your family as well. Thanks for picking us from airport, showing us Istanbul, showing us metro system helping us when we needed anything. Thank you for bringing us coffee , cake , borek, breakfast countless times. I dont know how you got some things repaired and fixed in the house every little thing so quickly and even on a public holiday. We really liked the garden house it's such a rare find in a busy city. We wish you all the best in your new ventures and Life itself. I only wish somehow we count return the favor and provide you with similar hospitality. Thanks for looking after my son. He asks for you everyday. Our times with your family in the park and Camilica hill are all unforgettable. Cok tessekurer edrim for a great time in Istanbul. We miss you and your family a lot and hope to see you soon. kind regards

Tuna is a different kind of host who truly puts a lot of effort into her guests. There are few genuine people left in this world and she is one of them. She always had a smile and was always offering to help with everything. Her kids and husband were also wonderful and helpful at all times. Her son Luca especially gave company to my son and played with him everyday. There are no words for Tuna's genuine kindness and caring hospitality. She is truly a one of a kind host. The house is very spacious and the kitchen was well equipped. If we ever needed anything Tuna provided it immediately. The garden is very lush and green and quite huge and we were using all of it. They had fig and plum trees that we enjoyed thoroughly. the location is superb; it's walking distance to 2 metro stations. it is surrounded by shops to buy pretty much anything. The park is very very close and is truly one of the most beautiful and biggest parks in Istanbul. It has a cafeteria and 2 restaurants with breathtaking views of the Marmara sea, Princess Islands and the European side of Istanbul (Sultanahmet). Everything was wonderful and we are already planning our next stay at Tuna's place!
My family & I enjoyed very much our stay at Tuna's place. The house was cozy and clean. Tuna is a great & caring host. The neighborhood is lovely especially the parks where we enjoyed relaxing walks.
c'est un logement que je conseille vivement .Tuna est toujours disponible en plus les transports sont à quelque part de la maison.

Tuna's house is in very peaceful quiet respectable safe area, it sets on a nice private  garden with constant central heating in the cold season, the area has all what you need like grocery  supermarket, fresh quality fruit and veg shop, good restaurants and caffies just 10 minutes walk, fresh bread bakery  2 minutes walk, metro station about 5 minutes walk, very good bus and taxi service and above all knowing Tuna as a host and very nice helpfull lady quick to respond to any queries and goes out of her way to help is beyond value by any measure.

Мы с женой и двумя детьми провели в этом доме все новогодние каникулы. В доме всё так, как описано Tune. Нам очень понравилось постельное белье оно очень хорошего качества. Дома было тепло, хотя в некоторые дни выпадал снег и температура на улице была около 0 градусов, газовое отопление работало хорошо. Дом расположен на холме, если немного спустится, то можно попасть в магазины, где продают вкусный хлеб и ограниченный набор продуктов. Tune и Antonio отвезли нас на машине в супермаркет, где они покупают продукты, потом мы сами ходили в него, порядка 20 ходу мимо станции метро. До ближайшей станции метро M5 10 минут ходьбы с ребенком 3 лет, чтобы добраться до основных достопримечательностей, расположенных в старом городе вам нужно ехать на станцию Uskudar и пересесть на метро Marmaray , чтобы добраться до станции Sirkeci, время поездки на метро около 30 минут. Tune и Antonio пригласили нас отпраздновать Новый год в кругу своей семьи, это было очень интересно и необычно. Они очень хорошие и доброжелательные люди. Если мы будем в Стамбуле, то обязательно остановимся у них снова, так как там очень тихо и чистая природа вокруг. 
My wife and two children spent all the new Year's holidays in this House. In the house everything is as described Tune. We loved the linens, it is of very good quality. The house was warm, although some days the snow fell and the temperature on the street was about 0 degrees, gas heating worked well. The house is located on a hill, if a little down, you can get to the shops, where they sell delicious bread and a limited list of products. Tune and Antonio drove us by car to the supermarket where they buy products, then we walked in it, about 20 minutes walk through the metro station. The nearest Metro station M5 10 minutes walk with a child 3 years to get to the main attractions located in the old town you need to drive to the station Uskudar and take the Metro Marmaray to reach the station SIRKECI, the time of the subway trip About 30 minutes. Tune and Antonio invited us to celebrate the new Year in the circle of their family, it was very interesting and unusual. They are very nice and friendly people. If we are in Istanbul we will definitely stay at them again as there is very quiet and clean nature around.

name: Vaucluse hideaway
summary: Bright, cosy & airy apartment in Vaucluse over looking diamond bay reserve with ocean views. This apartment has its own character it is perfect for people who are active, love nature & who are looking for a peaceful, quiet area but want to be in close proximity to the city. Free street parking, 2 bedrooms , 1 Bathroom with shower and bath. Fully functioning kitchen with dishwasher. Own laundry with washer. Fully furnished living room with tv & Large balcony. Unlimited wifi available.
description: Bright, cosy & airy apartment in Vaucluse over looking diamond bay reserve with ocean views. This apartment has its own character it is perfect for people who are active, love nature & who are looking for a peaceful, quiet area but want to be in close proximity to the city. Free street parking, 2 bedrooms , 1 Bathroom with shower and bath. Fully functioning kitchen with dishwasher. Own laundry with washer. Fully furnished living room with tv & Large balcony. Unlimited wifi available. Surrounded by lots of beautiful parks, cafes and shops ( Diamond bay park, Vaucluse light house, Watsons bay) Vaucluse is one of the most beautiful suburbs of Sydney. Surrounded by water, Vaucluse has many gorgeous harbour beaches, coastal walks and great swimming spots! Location is 5-10mins drive 15min on bus to Bondi Beach and 5 mins drive from Vaucluse Beaches and Watsons Bay is walkable (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min walk). Bus stop right out front for (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and 5min walk

notes: Must climb stairs - level 3 no lift Potential for noise
transit: Location is 5-10mins drive 15min on bus to Bondi Beach and 5 mins drive from Vaucluse Beaches and Watsons Bay is walkable (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min walk). Bus stop right out front for (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and 5min walk for 387 & 386.
house_rules: - quiet on balcony it echoes   - No clothes washing after 21:30 - No parties or events - Be considerate - Treat it as you would your own place - check out 11:00am

reviews.comments: We had a lovely stay. The apartment was clean and perfect for a family with children. Close to Parks and beach. Overall we enjoyed the apartment!

name: Double bedroom with own lounge area & bathroom
summary: The accomodation is on the ground floor of a large  newly renovated freestanding house in a quiet neighbourhood about a 15 minute walk to Bondi  beach. The double bedroom is  adjoined to  a private sitting room with television and office area. There is a separate entrance and private bathroom. The guests would have access to a large gourmet kitchen with their own fridge. Also there is a garden and swimming pool to enjoy .
space: The house was renovated last year so guests can enjoy the brand new kitchen and living area.  There are a few steps up to the garden and pool area where there is a wooden deck for sun lovers. The house has a resort -like feel in the summer . There is ducted air conditioning in the living areas  and a fan in the guests' double bedroom.
description: The accomodation is on the ground floor of a large  newly renovated freestanding house in a quiet neighbourhood about a 15 minute walk to Bondi  beach. The double bedroom is  adjoined to  a private sitting room with television and office area. There is a separate entrance and private bathroom. The guests would have access to a large gourmet kitchen with their own fridge. Also there is a garden and swimming pool to enjoy . The house was renovated last year so guests can enjoy the brand new kitchen and living area.  There are a few steps up to the garden and pool area where there is a wooden deck for sun lovers. The house has a resort -like feel in the summer . There is ducted air conditioning in the living areas  and a fan in the guests' double bedroom. The guests can have access to  the swimming pool and garden. They can also have use of the large open plan living room , dining  and kitchen area.  Also full use of the laundry. Myself and my husband are available to welcome and help our
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a quiet leafy area walking distance to both the beach and the harbour.
transit: The house is near the city about 15 minutes by car or 30 minutes by public transport.  You can get there by either bus, ferry or train.
access: The guests can have access to  the swimming pool and garden. They can also have use of the large open plan living room , dining  and kitchen area.  Also full use of the laundry.
interaction: Myself and my husband are available to welcome and help our guests.  We have a separate living area upstairs so we are happy to be as private or as social as our guests would like.  We are easy going and would like to share our lovely house given that we have just renovated and our children have left home.

reviews.comments:
This is a very clean, airy and comfortable place to stay in what is arguably Sydney's best area. The hosts, Yvonne and Cary, are very welcoming and convivial yet respectful of privacy. The house is modern with all mod cons. The large bedroom (with very comfy bed) is on the ground floor with a good deal of private space in which to relax. There's even a saltwater swimming pool in the back garden! The location is great for getting to the best of the city's beaches and Eastern Suburbs, with Bondi just 15 minutes walk and Rose Bay about 20. The nearest bus stop is just 5 minutes away. From here you can easily reach Bondi Junction, the city and beyond. 
This is a quiet area, with the nearest shops and bars 10 - 15 minutes walk away, so maybe not an ideal place for the party animal.
As far as I'm concerned, after 7 weeks staying here, this place is perfect. My only negative is that any B&B from now on will be a compromise.

We had a great stay at this beautiful place. The pictures don't do justice to reality. In real it's so much nicer! We couldn't wish for a better place to end our trip in Australia. Everything is so luxurous, cosy and tidy. We were sorry we didn't stay longer. Yvonne & Gary are a nice, social couple. They even provided some stuff for breakfast, great! Highly recommend this place!

This is the best Air Bnb I've ever stayed in; excellent value for money. It's lovely to have a private area with bedroom and living room. 
It's a wonderful house and the photos don't do it justice! The bed is very comfy, and the bathroom is great (amazing shower). The kitchen is very well stocked and great to cook in. We made good use of the washing machine, which was very helpful as we're travelling for some time.
Yvonne and Cary are incredibly warm and welcoming; they really made us feel at home. I cannot recommend this place enough!
Very comfortable bed, great hosts, private room in a great house

Spacious, clean and stylish accommodation, that you would never get in an hotel. Loved the congeniality, the  coffee and the ambiance. Great location in between the bay and the surf and close to restaurants.
Great value for money. Very accommodating hosts. Will be returning.

Yvonne was the perfect host; she provided us with an Opal card each, as well as breakfast goods to keep us going through the week. The house and location are absolutely superb and it was one of the nicest places we have ever stayed. Special mention has to go for the bed, which was something out of heaven, the comfiest thing we have ever experienced in our entire lives! Thank you so much for such a lovely stay.

My wife and our little daughter (7 Months) stayed for 10 days at Yvonne's and Cary's beautiful house. Especially the garden and the open plan kitchen and living area are wonderful spots to rest after exploring Sydney. Their location is great and we enjoyed the very pleasant and quiet neighbourhood while you could still easily get to other areas by public transport. Yvonne and Cary are both great hosts and welcomed us warmly. They managed the balance between intimacy and socialising very well. We can definitely recommend this place to anyone who wishes to explore all the nice spots in Sydney but likes to enjoy a lovely residential area close to Bondi beach afterwards.
Beautiful home, very tech Savy and amazing pool , Yvonne was a great host and honestly the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in, beautiful beautiful home would definitely recommend

Yvonne and Cari were fabulous hosts and made my month’s stay in Sydney very special with their warm generosity and beautiful accommodation. I cannot fault anything. They were there when I needed local information but never intruded in my personal space. I would thoroughly recommend this Airbnb in a heartbeat!

This place is very quiet, facility is complete, the host is helpful, friendly and hospitable, host was very generous, even offered to drive me to buy things, a very pleasant check-in process, the kitchen is very big and pretty! Thanks!
这里很安静,设施完善新装修的,主人非常有帮助,友好善良慷慨,甚至提出开车带我们熟悉环境和购物,厨房非常大很漂亮,入住过程很愉快!非常感谢!

This was my first experience of staying in an Airbnb & Yvonne has certainly set the bar extremely high!
We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful  house which was situated in a great location (10 min walk to Bondi) with friendly & attentive hosts who went out of their way to make us feel welcome (including driving us to our friends wedding to save us getting a taxi!) 
We had initial reservations of sharing a house rather than get an Airbnb to ourselves but these were diminished as soon as we walked in, with the hosts giving us the right balance of privacy whilst also being able to have some lovely chats (mostly when gathered around the amazing coffee machine!) 
Would thoroughly recommend to everyone & look forward to returning again soon.
The rooms are spacious, with the attached living and study rooms perfect to make the place feel at home, as well as giving me somewhere work. Gracious hosts, and a very stylish residence.

Yvonne’s home is amazing and she is a fantastic host. We found the room and adjacent bathroom perfect for our needs, a really lovely space. We were in town for a wedding in Watson’s Bay and it was very easy to get the ferry up and then uber back. The house is ideally located only a 15 min walk to Rose Bay and 20mins to Bondi Beach.
The host canceled this reservation 278 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A perfect location, walking distance from both Bondi and Rose Bay. A spacious and private area with a very comfortable bed and a beautiful modern bathroom in a stunning home. The outdoor pool is an added bonus. Yvonne and Cary are excellent hosts and hopefully we will be able to return next year.

Our stay at Yvonne and Cary’s incredibly beautiful home was beyond any expectations we had. 
My wife and I felt so at home here for the three days we had. 
The photos don’t do this house justice. It has been exquisitely and tastefully renovated and we wanted for nothing whilst here. 
Both our hosts were kind, warm and welcoming even to the point of offering us a ride to the railway station should we have needed it. 
The whole house was spotlessly clean and we had access to all amenities one could wish for and a couple of luxury items I wouldn’t have even thought if seeking. 
Cary is a dab hand on his rather superb coffee machine and as a coffee I must hasten to add, he knows his machine well and produces what can only be described as a top shelf brew. 
My advice to anyone searching for a place in this price range is just book it and enjoy.
Felt so welcome in Yvonne and Cary's home. Could not re commend highly enough. Perfect home away from home.

Excellent place to stay.  Yvonne and Carey's house is beautiful and extremely clean.  We felt very welcomed and they went out of their way to be gracious hosts.  Wonderful to talk to and great communicators.

Was a Great stay! Yvonne is a very Helpful host.

The home is beautiful and extremely large, was great to have the laundry, kitchen and swimming pool. 

Location is pretty perfect, It’s situated in a quiet street but still pretty close to Bondi/Rose Bay.

The room is downstairs at the front of the house, with its own lounge room. The bathroom is just outside the room. So pretty private. 

Would love to stay here again when coming back.

Thank you!

name: **Brand New**Luxe Centennial Parkside Retreat**
summary: Centennial Parkside Retreat is nestled in the heart of Sydney’s Eastern Suburbs, located  opposite Centennial Park and on one of the most prestigious streets of Randwick. There is a bus line, on the street of the apartment, to Sydney CBD.  This brand new luxury apartment, offers a large, light filled, open plan living space with all the comforts needed to provide a homely environment.  We provide free onsite parking, free unlimited internet & free Foxtel.
space: Fully equipped and furnished with quality appliances, as reflected in our photographs.  Amenities include:    •Free Internet - Unlimited WIFI  •Free Cable TV (Foxtel) •2 x Air conditioners (One Upstairs & Downstairs) •Starter Essentials (Coffee, tea, milk, sugar, butter, biscuits, toilet paper, water, eggs, bath towels, bed linen etc)  •Free Parking On Premises (1 Car only) Bedding Configuration There is one bedroom upstairs with large ensuite and a queen bed.  Downstairs is a double fold out sofa bed.   Bedding suitable for 4 adults or 2 adults &  2 children over the age of 6 years + Washer/ Dryer  all in one located in the kitchen. Soap powder & softener provided.
description: Centennial Parkside Retreat is nestled in the heart of Sydney’s Eastern Suburbs, located  opposite Centennial Park and on one of the most prestigious streets of Randwick. There is a bus line, on the street of the apartment, to Sydney CBD.  This brand new luxury apartment, offers a large, light filled, open plan living space with all the comforts needed to provide a homely environment.  We provide free onsite parking, free unlimited internet & free Foxtel. Fully equipped and furnished with quality appliances, as reflected in our photographs.  Amenities include:    •Free Internet - Unlimited WIFI  •Free Cable TV (Foxtel) •2 x Air conditioners (One Upstairs & Downstairs) •Starter Essentials (Coffee, tea, milk, sugar, butter, biscuits, toilet paper, water, eggs, bath towels, bed linen etc)  •Free Parking On Premises (1 Car only) Bedding Configuration There is one bedroom upstairs with large ensuite and a queen bed.  Downstairs is a double fold out sofa bed.   Bedding suitable for 4 adults
neighborhood_overview: SURROUNDS & ENTERTAINMENT *Centennial Parklands (Across the Road) – Enjoy jogging, bike riding, horse riding, picnics or a casual stroll with easy access to coffee shops in the park. A stone throw away from trendy Paddington." *Royal Randwick Racecourse  -2 min walk  *University of New South Wales  (UNSW) *Prince Of Wales Hospital/ Sydney Childrens Hospital *The Spot – Thriving district of Randwick with Cinema, bars, cafes & restaurants *Royal Randwick Shopping Centre On Belmore Road – Supermarkets, clothes shops, banks, optometrist & a variety of cafes & restaurants.  Belmore Road is a main bus hub to a selection of areas including beaches and sporting venues. *Fox Studios (Entertainment Quarter) – Wednesday & Saturday organic market & flower market, Hoyts cinema, cafes & restaurants, adjacent to Horden Pavilion (Concert venue) *Sydney Cricket Ground & Sydney Football Stadium (Allianz Stadium) *Bondi Junction & Westfield Bondi Junction Shopping Centre  *Close Beaches  - Bondi, Bronte,
notes: HOUSE RULES * Turn Off air conditioning & lights every time you leave apartment *No Pets *No Smoking *No Lit Candles *No Parties Or Events *No haircuts in the bathroom *Keep the Noise to a Minimum * Please do not throw sanitary items down the toilet. Please use bin provided in bathroom. *All Rubbish Should Be Disposed Of (Including Bathroom Rubbish) *All Perishable Items must be Removed From Fridge when Departing *When Departing, Please Ensure Lights, Airconditioners & TV Are Switched Off when you leave the premises. * A weekly inspection of the apartment will be conducted if guests have booked  a long stay. (Ie If booking is for one week or over) . We will contact you via email to organise a time. *Maximum Of 4 people Only at one time to Occupy Apartment (Incl. either 2Ad/2Child or 4 Adults)
transit: TRANSPORT Conveniently located on bus line (339) to Sydney CBD & Clovelly Beach Other buses are also accessible from Alison Road (2 min walk) to beaches & shopping centres, movies theatres and restaurants & cafes.
access: Access to the front yard but strictly NO ACCESS to the backyard.
interaction: As we live next door, on the premises, we are available to guests if they have  any questions or available when needed.

reviews.comments:
The accommodation was perfect
Hosts super friendly and helpful
Overall experience wonderful
Stay here

A great place with absolutely amazing hosts! They left us food, directions for the whole house, and gave us rides to the train station. They were extremely welcoming and helpful. The place itself is spacious and comfortable, close by bus stops to all areas of Sydney. Right by a great park. Would recommend to anyone, we loved our stay!
Great apartment. We stayed for a week upon moving to Sydney. Very clean and new. Well equipped kitchen, lovely bathroom, Foxtel.

Nous vous remercions de votre hospitalité, de votre disponibilité et de votre accueil, et du très bon entretien de votre appartement. Nous recommandons vivement cette appartement. Nous avons apprecier davoir le minimum de nourriture disponible à notre arriver.
Hands down the best air B and B I've stayed in highly recommend to anyone great location next to the park easy to get to the city. Clean and comfortable as well
Kathy goes out of her way to make sure your happy

Kathy's place locates at the heart of the city, we are close to everything from restaurants, parks to the famous tourist spots. The house is new, clean, well equipped. We get everything we need. It is so comfortable that we feel like being home during our stay. 

Kathy and Mary are great hosts. They helped us everything we asked for and gave us timely response. They are warm hearted and helpful which makes the whole experience so much nicer and memorable. 

Whenever we have the chance to come back we will book Kathy's place again, for sure.

Kathy and Mary were excellent hosts!  Their  accommodation was perfect for my 2 week stay.  Perfectly presented, clean and very comfortable.  Nice location opposite Centennial Park.  Highly recommended.
Great spot handy to Centennial Park. Parking is a big bonus. Easy access off Darley Road. Modern, clean and comfortable. Hostesses great to deal with.
I really enjoyed my stay. The apartment had lots of space, was very clean and was beautifully decorated. I would definitely stay here again.

My husband and I throughly enjoyed our stay at 'Kathy's place'. We choose this particular Airbnb due to its fantastic location. It is literally a stone throw from the incredible Centennial Park, Park of choice for our two young children. Kathy's place is perfect, it's modern and clean. I felt truly at home. Kathy provided us with complimentary basics (bread, milk, biscuits etc.) which after a long drive to Sydney was bliss! The bed is incredibly comfortable and if you are like me and enjoy a great shower, then you will LOVE the shower nozzle!!! Can not recommend Kathy's place more, we will without doubt be staying there again when we are next visiting Sydney. Absolutely awesome!
交通不太方便,除了步行或叫UBER去就近市中心購物就有点麻煩,希望地鐵快D建做好,但環境是非常舒適及寧靜,而房東就非常親切,回覆亦很快｡

Kathy and her daughter were such lovely, happy and accomodating laddies handling all added requests we had.

A nice cute hideaway, like a cubby house when you go to the top, so watch your head! Lovely bathroom! 

Overall great experience.

Kathy and her daughter were so friendly and warm
Their home was immaculately clean, larger than you think. All the amenities are offered and goodies in the pantry and fridge. 
Nothing was missing.
Very well decorated and styled
An absolute pleasure being there, felt comfortable in every way. recommend this place to anyone thinking of staying in the eastern suburbs of Sydney.
Thank you again 
Hope to see you again soon!

Kathy's place is nice and clean as described.  Well located to a few things if you are ok with taking uber rides then shouldn't be an issue.  Provided some snacks and drinks which was a really nice touch.  Never had any issues.

Kathy’s place was such a good choice for a family. It was close to a convenient store and bus stop so getting to Coogee beach and cbd was easy and fast. It was also super close to the airport. This could be a perfect location for people who are doing lots of day trips outside the city and who like being central from all tourist attractions. We could tell Kathy thought about great hospitality. There are everything you need in the house. A huge and beautiful park is right in front of the house so you can run and exercise too. It’s great for longer stay too.

Kathy is a wonderful hostess! She is very helpful, provided an easy check in/check out, and easy to reach with any questions. Her space is beautiful! Very stylish, clean, and had everything we needed. Even better than the photos! We truly enjoyed our stay.
We had a wonderful stay. Would highly recommend Kathy’s apartment.

Kathy is a very welcome host, if you need everything you can just knock on the door. She prepared milk, drinks and snacks for us, which save us on our first day. Definitely recommend to stay here. Close to the park so very good view, transport is also convenient by bus. The place is incredibly clean and smells great.
A great place in a great location. Easy drive to lots of lovely places and to the airport.

I stayed with Kathy at her lovely home on a recent business trip, perfectly situated across the road from Centennial Park & restaurants.
The room was spotless and the little touches such as bottled water, quality breakfast supplies and bathroom products were appreciated.
Kathy and her daughter were the perfect hosts and could not have been more helpful.
I would thoroughly recommend staying here for both business or pleasure.
Robert, February 2018
Beautiful apartment in a great spot. Kathy and Mary made us feel at home instantly
Great people, great place. Couldn’t ask for any better. We will be back!
房屋干净､舒适,房东准备了丰富的小吃食,让我居住的很舒心｡
The place was amazing, and very clean. We had a wonderful stay, and Kathy was very accomodating!! Would 100% stay there again.

We recently stayed in  Kathy's place as a base for our 2 months in Australia -  It is in a great location opposite the beautiful Centennial Park. Kathy was an amazing host and made us feel very welcome - nothing was any trouble for her and there were lots of extra touches, including welcome provisions in the  fridge and pantry and even cleaning and bathroom products too.
The apartment itself was spacious, well furnished and immaculate, with a lovely comfy bed and a fantastic shower.
We hope to see Kathy again on our next visit and would certainly recommend staying there.
Lovely place conveniently located next to Centennial Park. Kathy was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. Place is immaculately presented and newly renovated. Thanks for a great stay Kathy :)
Kathy was very responsive. A seamless entry and exit into the house. Right next to park.
房屋干净整洁舒适,房东非常热情,还有各种吃食

Kathy and Mary were lovely hosts, They were very accommodating! Their place is beautiful and has everything you need. The shower was amazing and it was a very comfortable place to stay. If your on the tall side you wil have to watch your head upstairs but i loved the space and the layout.
The apartment is lovely and ideally situated across the road from Centennial Park. Kathy ensured we had great communication and made everything easy. Will stay here again!
Great space and great location!
Great space. Made our weekend getaway super special.

Thank you for making the time there go smoothly. We were really impressed with the lay out and design of the appartment & all of the appliances. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was perfect.
Excellent apartment in great location, clean, tidy and a very friendly host. Highly recommend.
Wonderful Airbnb. Beautiful setting with easy parking. Amenities excellent and such a hospitable lovely host. Would highly recommend this place. My fiancé didn’t want to leave!

I stayed in Kathy’s place for three weeks and the overall experience was wonderful. Kathy is super friendly and thoughtful. She always responds to questions and needs timely, but you also have enough privacy as you have your own entrance. The place has all the basic kitchen stuff, so it’s ideal for people who’d like to cook themselves. The location is unbeatable as well. I would definitely recommend this place.

Great place!
Internet has issues otherwise super!
10/10 for service everything was perfect Kathy was so helpful. Will definitely be returning in the future.

Kathy is an excellent host! She has thought of everything you could need! It really is like a home away from home if you are a solo traveller, 2 couples or a family of 4. Very close to Randwick Racecourse, Coogee beach and shops. I will definitely stay here again if I’m in the same area of Sydney.
Loved the place, even let me sleep in as they didn't have a guest coming the next day :)

Great hosts and place to stay! The apartment is immaculate, very clean and tidy. 
Excellent location if you want to watch the horse races and love to walk around Centennial Park. 
We really enjoyed our stay & will definitely stay again when holidaying and visiting Sydney!

Kathy’s home in Randwick is perfect if you want something close to Sydney but gives you the option to enjoy the towns nearby.  The bus into Sydney is almost outside the house, so this provides a link to the rest of the extensive public transport system (a tram service will be available soon too).  Opposite Kathy’s house is the most amazing Centennial Park; lakes, walks, fantastic wildlife (including flying foxes roosting in the trees!) and a tasty coffee and snack mean you can spend a happy hour enjoying the peace and tranquility. 
There is so much to see and do in Sydney you will never be bored. We bought tickets for a performance at the Opera House, took ferry rides and walked miles around the streets. The Rocks and Bangaroo are beautiful and fascinating if you are interested in history, social change and architecture. Bangaroo Reserve is ‘must see’! 
Outside of the CBD are many other towns some with lovely seaside fronts and beaches. The bus to Coogee Beach is about five minutes away and takes you right to the promenade with shops, cafes and glorious golden sands in less than twenty minutes. 
Kathy is always on hand if you need some help and advice but you have your own space and privacy. A great place for exploring Sydney and the surrounding areas.
Perfectly comfortable stay. Just what I was after for work
Kathy's place was perfect, a minutes walk to the beautiful Centennial Park and great amenities. Perfect if you have a car and want it as a base to explore Sydney and its surrounds.

Not only was Kathy fabulous, also the place was great. Clean and opposite the park made it a beautiful environment inside and out. This is a home away from home with many little touches that made it even more delicious.

Kathys place was as described and she was a friendly host. There are lovely new appliances, beautiful wooden floor boards and a super comfortable couch. The upstairs space is lovely although I did hit my head on the slopes a couple of times and I wished the windows over the bed opened. I also found the mirror too low for me to do my makeup! 
The main thing that could have been improved for my stay was that I had picked the place because of the floorboards rather than carpet because I have severe asthma and allergies. Every time I stay somewhere I also have to ask hosts to clean with only bicarbonate soda/vinegar or water and ask for anything fragranced to be removed. I also asked if she used scented laundry powder. Kathy assured me that she understood my needs because her son was asthmatic. However I arrived to an automatic air ”freshener” IN in the house, two stinky bamboo stick diffusers hidden in drawers and extremely fragranced bed linen and towels. This meant that for the first night I had to wear a mask and try to air the place. To sleep I had to remove the pillow cases and cover with my own clothes and try not to breathe when using the towels. The whole experience made my asthma much worse and meant I was uncomfortable and un-well for the entire stay. 
As an Airbnb host myself I think that the host community need to take requests such as these by guests very seriously and start to prioritize the need for clean and chemical free air over the need to “fragrance” a space.
This is an amazing place to stay. Close to the wonderful Centennial Parklands and the apartment was immaculate- there is nothing I could fault about this place or the host.

name: Bright Bronte beach apartment
summary: Welcome to this lovely suburb of Bronte. Fully furnished bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment with a queen size bed and build in wardrobe. 7 minutes walk to Bronte and Tamarama beach, 10mn bus to Bondi Junction, cafés and convenience store just at the corner. Free parking on the street.
space: Very bright and modern apartment
description: Welcome to this lovely suburb of Bronte. Fully furnished bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment with a queen size bed and build in wardrobe. 7 minutes walk to Bronte and Tamarama beach, 10mn bus to Bondi Junction, cafés and convenience store just at the corner. Free parking on the street. Very bright and modern apartment Garage and extra storage room if needed Will respond within 3h Very quiet neighbourhood, perfect for recharging your batteries next to the beach Buses to Bondi Junction and the city
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet neighbourhood, perfect for recharging your batteries next to the beach
notes: Repond dans les 2h
transit: Buses to Bondi Junction and the city
access: Garage and extra storage room if needed
interaction: Will respond within 3h

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

WOW I cannot recommend these wonderful people enough! The room was spacious and clean, the area was shared but they gave me so much privacy that I would never have a problem :) Ed and his partner gave me a million amazing suggestion on places to go according to what I was interested in and made me feel at home and welcome constantly. Would highly recommend this place! Convenient right into the city yet quiet area :)

Staying here is a great base if you want to explore the Eastern beaches of Sydney. We walked to nearby Bronte beach, Bondi is a few minutes drive away but it was also comfortable and quiet. Edouard and Helena are good hosts, warm and welcoming and had great tips for good places to eat and visit.

Edouards apartment is lovely, quiet sunny in a cute suburb. Not far from a few shops, and a lovely little walk through the park to Bronte Beach. Was the perfect base for visiting friends in Bronte. The room was clean, comfortable and the entire place was nicely styled and tidy too. His flatmate was also very nice and helpful. Fully enjoyed my stay. Woke up to the sounds of the birds in the morning :)

Staying at Edouard's place was excellent, the flat is very clean and filled with style. It's walking distance to beautiful beaches, close to public transport and shops, the walk down to the beach through Bronte Gully is especially recommended. Edouard and his partner are lovely hosts and I felt welcome and and at home in their place, definitely recommend staying here!
Nice and clean, very friendly hosts
Great location, great place.  Ed wasn’t there but his flat mate Loren was an excellent host!  Highly recommend!

We had a great stay during NYE at Eduardo’s place. Nice apartment with all the facilities needed. Bus stop very close. The bus brings you to Bondi Junction, from which you can come everywhere in the city. Would recommend.

He is a friendly and tidy host.
The location is 15 mins to Bronte Beach by feet.
We had a great stay! Would stay again and recommend.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Edouard’s place. Everything was perfect and Edouard always maintained excellent communication. Highly recommended!

name: Beautiful/Spacious 1 Bedroom in LES
space: I am renting out space in extremely spacious apartment located in the heart of the Lower East Side. The apartment is in a new construction building with all modern amenities, including an elevator, air conditioning, washer/dryer,  and access to the building's shared rooftop with stunning views of lower Manhattan. The apartment can accomedate up to 5 guests. Please PLEASE "CONTACT HOST" TO INQUIRE ABOUT AVAILABILITY OF DATES & DETAILS OF THE SPACE BEING OFFERED BEFORE "REQUESTING TO BOOK." THANKS! The building is located on a quiet street just steps away from all the restaurants, cafes, bars and shopping the Lower East Side has to offer. A 5 Minute walk to Nolita/Soho, Chinatown as well as the East Village. A less than 5 minute walk to the F and B/D subway lines. As well as the JMZ which is just one stop from Brooklyn. Steps away from the Williamsburg Bridge which offers easy access to the heart of Williamsburg. The apartment itself is extremely bright, with over-sized windows overlooki
description: I am renting out space in extremely spacious apartment located in the heart of the Lower East Side. The apartment is in a new construction building with all modern amenities, including an elevator, air conditioning, washer/dryer,  and access to the building's shared rooftop with stunning views of lower Manhattan. The apartment can accomedate up to 5 guests. Please PLEASE "CONTACT HOST" TO INQUIRE ABOUT AVAILABILITY OF DATES & DETAILS OF THE SPACE BEING OFFERED BEFORE "REQUESTING TO BOOK." THANKS! The building is located on a quiet street just steps away from all the restaurants, cafes, bars and shopping the Lower East Side has to offer. A 5 Minute walk to Nolita/Soho, Chinatown as well as the East Village. A less than 5 minute walk to the F and B/D subway lines. As well as the JMZ which is just one stop from Brooklyn. Steps away from the Williamsburg Bridge which offers easy access to the heart of Williamsburg. The apartment itself is extremely bright, with over-sized windows overlooki
