transit: The apartment is located in extremely close proximity to 4 major subway stations. 3 Blocks from the 2nd Ave. F Train Station 4 Blocks from the Bowery J Train Station 4 Block to the Grand Street B/D Train Station 5 Blocks to the Delancey Street M/Z Station They are all a 5 minute walk from door to door.
house_rules: I have recently added the Instantbook feature to this listing.  I AM NOT ABLE TO HOST GROUPS HOPING TO PARTY  OR HOST EVENTS IN THE APARTMENT! Please take note that the official check-in time of the apartment is 3pm and the check-out time is 12pm.  I am always glad to accomedate an earlier check-in or a later check-out if the apartment's calendar allow. Please send me a message to discuss potential options. Until I have confirmed via a personal message, please understand that an early check-in or late check-out is not possible. I charge $25/night for each additional guest after the first. The $25/night charge includes children under 2 years old.  I always like to know a bit about my guests before hosting them. Please make sure you have filled out your profile to include some details about yourself.  When confirming your booking, please include a message describing the nature of your trip and who you will be traveling with.  I want to make sure that all potential guests understand that

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hey I'm Daniel. Originally from Chicago but have been living in NYC for 5 years now. I was extremely lucky to have found the apartment I am living in now. I have been here since I moved and don't have any plans to leave. I'm excited to to share it with cool, like minded people from all over the world. 

It really is a special apartment and could not be better located. I've put a lot of effort into making my bedroom and the apartment as a whole comfortable and beautiful.

reviews.comments:
Daniel's apartment is great. 

My firend and I stayed in his apartment for 4 nights. It was perfect for what we needed. The location is great, close to lots of bars and restaurants in the LES. Being on a smaller street the place is really quiet at night which was great. 

The apartment is very spacious (unlike most NYC apartments) and the bed was very comfortable. A huge plus for sleepy travelers! Daniel has done a great job of styling the apartment and it is equipped with everything you would need. Shower pressure is good too!

As our host Daniel was very welcoming. He went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed an gave us some great tips about what to do during our stay in NYC. He was prompt with his communications with us and the whole process of picking up and leaving the keys was easy.

When we come back to the city we will definitely stay at Daniel's place again. We would highly recommend it to everyone.

Daniel was an excellent host during our stay! He is very polite, friendly and fun and answered all our questions about New York. The apartment is spacious, modern and is located in a very nice area, very close to all shopping and good restaurants in SOHO, Lower East Side, China Town and in Little Italy. We warmly recommend Daniel as a host and the location of the apartment.

We LOVED our stay in Daniel's Apartment. The place was bigger than expected, and accommodated us (a party of 5) nicely. You couldn't ask for a better location if you want to be in the middle of it all in NYC. Walking distance from great restaurants shopping so there was always something to do day or night. Thanks Daniel! You were a great host and made out time in the City perfect.

Nous avons partagé en famille ce bel appartement, propre, joliment décoré, dans une construction récente. Il es très bien situé, disposant de commerces de proximité et de stations de métro (Essex Street, Grand Street) qui permettent de gagner rapidement les zones touristiques de Manhattan. Le quartier est calme, animé et permet de rentrer à n'importe quelle heure de la nuit. 
Daniel est un hôte adorable que l'on peut contacter à tout moment, toujours serviable avec le sourire. Nous ne pouvons que le recommander à toute personne désireuse de découvrir New York. Sans problème, nous reprendrons cet appartement si l'occasion nous est donnée de retourner arpenter les avenues de la Grosse Pomme.
Frédéric, originaire de la région parisienne

Daniel was a great host ! He greated us with a nice bottle of wine and was always present for the small questions we might have, and very responsive too. 
His appartment is very specious and filled with natural light, which makes it very homey.
The location is perfect too.
I highly recommend it for a weekly stay.

We had a great experience during our stay in NY. The place is in an excellent location, and made it easy to commute to all the places we went. The apartment is way better than it looks on the pictures and spacious. 
Daniel was great to work with, he was always available for any question I had and made sure our stay was comfortable.

We had a great time staying in Daniel's apartment! He was friendly and responsive but not obtrusive. The apartment is spacious and the bed is comfy. The building felt safe and several subway lines are nearby. I would definitely stay here again!

I came from Germany to NYC for visiting a friend of mine who works there. Since I had never rent a flat via airbnb before I decided to try it out this time, and it was definitely worth trying!!! Very clean and comfortable flat, exactly as nice as it looks on the pictures shown above.
Daniel as a host was also very nice and helpful. He put some Manhattan beer in the fridge, recommended a good club location for a Thursday night and organised an opportunity to store the luggage on the day of departure after leaving the flat.

I could recommend this place to anybody looking for a cheap and nice alternative to a hotel!!!

Daniel was a great host – communicative and flexible with arrival times etc., which were a little complicated as my friend and I were arriving separately. The apartment is clean and spacious and the location is absolutely brilliant – walking distance to the shops/cafes in SoHo/Nolita, Chinatown for cheap and delicious food, and the  lower east side bars and night life. We really enjoyed our stay. My only comment would be that there are no blinds across two sections of floor to ceiling window in both the bedroom and the living room where the extra bed was set up so you can feel a bit exposed.

Le séjour a été très agréable. Daniel était très sympathique, très avenant. Les lits étaient confortables. Il manquait un peu de lumière à notre goût mais c'était vraiment pas grand chose comme inconvénient. A la limite de Chinatown, nous avons tout fait à pied, sauf le soir où on rentrait en métro (station Bowery très proche).

Myself and three other girlfriends rented Daniel's space for a weekend in NYC. The place is so much more spacious than it shows in pictures, and it more than comfortably housed four girls. Daniel was super busy leading up to our stay and was traveling over the weekend, but still did his best to answer any questions we had about the city/the apartment/etc. If you need a place for 4-5 people with lots of natural light and comfortable sleeping, Daniel's place is perfect!
Daniel's apartment was clean, spacious, and conveniently located. Communication was great, and Daniel was always quick to respond to any questions.

Nous avons passé une semaine divine chez Daniel: un hôte exemplaire, attentionné, bienveillant, à l'écoute, et répondant immédiatement aux messages.
Son appartement est parfait. Nous étions 3, il avait mis un lit supplémentaire dans le salon. L'appartement peut accommoder 5 personnes. Salle de bains et cuisine comme on les espère. Grands placards. etc. vraiment que du bien à dire. L'appartement est en fait mieux que sur les photos. Très clair, spacieux, dans un endroit (LES) qui était idéal pour nous. Un vrai régal. Nous y retournerons avec le plus grand plaisir. Bravo Daniel!
Isabelle

We loved everything about this place! Great clean apartment, amazing location and great communication with Daniel! He gave us heaps of info on his apartment and things to do in NYC. We would stay here again in a heartbeat! Thanks for everything Daniel!

Daniel was such a wonderful host, he made the entire AirBnB experience enjoyable and easy! He always responded promptly and was professional and accommodating.   I booked his apartment when my mom came into the city last minute, even in the rushed circumstances, Daniel was prepared and the apartment was spotless.  This was my first AirBnB experience and Daniel helped me through the entire process, even taking the time to suggest great restaurants for us to try! I could not have asked for a better host! 

If you are looking for an authentic New York experience this is the perfect apartment.  The apartment was incredibly specious and beautifully decorated. The two large antique wooden letters were a personal favorite, and add NY charm and character. It is also in the perfect location for exploring the best restaurants and nightlife, or as my mother prefers, the Tenement Museum’s walking tours! 

If you want a true “New Yorker” experience without all the stereotypical attitude, this is the place to go! I will be absolutely be recommending this place to all my friends! I could not imagine a more perfect apartment. Thank you so much Daniel!! I hope to be back very soon!

My experience staying at Daniel's apartment was absolutely amazing!! This was my first time using Airbnb and it could not have worked out more perfectly. I travel to NYC quite a bit for work and my days staying in hotels are over. I will absolutely stay at Daniel's any time I come to the city. I cannot recommend his place highly enough.  I have never seen such a nice, large apartment in Manhattan. The light coming into the his corner apartment is fantastic. 

Daniel's apartment is amazingly located; close all major subway lines and waking distance to the best parts of lower Manhattan. It's impeccably decorated and as clean, if not cleaner than any hotel I have ever stayed in. The bed is also super comfortable. 

Daniel even had a 6 pack of local craft beer waiting for me in the fridge upon my arrival. Daniel's communication was amazing and made the whole process: booking, arriving and departing super easy. Daniel also had amazing recommendations for please to eat and go out in the city. 

Thank you so much for such an amazing stay Daniel. I can't wait to book your place next time I come to the city.

A friend and I spent a week in Daniel's apartment last april.
His flat has a perfect location (bars, restaurants, metro, cool areas of Manhattan and Williamsburg...) Also... the rooftop of the building is perfect for having a drink after a long day in the city. 
Daniel has been really helpful during our entire holidays, giving us great tips and advices, more generally, he did everything to make easy our trip in the city. 

I would definitely recommend the apartment to everybody who wants to stay in New York for a few days or even longer.

We stayed for an entire week in Daniel’s beautiful apartment. Everything here is just perfect!

Starting with the central location in LES, the spacious flat that can host two bedrooms, the nice decoration, the comfortable bed … it has just everything you could ask for.

Not to forget to mention that Daniel is really the perfect host. Communication, rapid answers and reliability are awesome. And that’s not it! He’s such a warmhearted person, taking care for everything and he even had a bottle of wine for us to enlighten our stay. That’s really extraordinary.

Hope to return some day to this special place.

I booked Daniel's apartment for my parents for 3 nights and they really enjoyed their stay. Daniel was a great host, extremely helpful and responsive. The apartment was spacious and clean, and located in a very convenient location. 
I highly recommend this place to anyone that is looking for a comfortable place while visiting NY.

I, along with 3 other friends stayed at Daniel's apartment for a week. 

The location was great. Close to nice places to eat and bars, as well as the subway. 
The apartment itself was also spacious, clean and full of everything you would need. 

However, what really stood out was Daniel's service and the way he treated us during our stay. He was always open to share his experiences and advice about New York and would go out of his way (such as arranging taxi's and dry cleaning) to make our stay more enjoyable which was fantastic. 

We had a great time and would definitely recommend the place.

We had a fabulous 7 night stay in Daniel’s apartment in May. He was a pleasure to deal with while we were organising the stay and even friendlier in person.

Daniel’s apartment was perfect. It is exactly as the photos depict – a beautiful light and airy space that has been thoughtfully and artistically decorated. There was enough space for our group of five girls. The kitchen is fine for preparing meals. We were pleasantly welcomed with a bottle of wine, which was a nice touch.

The apartment is ideally situated for exploring NY downtown. It is a 5 min walk from a Metro station (2nd Av) and supermarket (Wholefoods). This is a nice neighborhood filled with cafes and nice restaurants. 

We would highly recommend Daniel’s apartment for a fun and authentic stay in NY.

Thank you Daniel for being a wonderful host.

excellent location, excellent host (Daniel is very kind and helpful).
Safe, clean,beautiful and comfortable apartment .
Can't wait to come back!

Thank you

Fantastic apartment, in a great location. Daniel was very helpful, allowing us to leave our bags later than the stated check out time as our flight wasn't til later that evening. Would definitely recommend this place.

Very quiet apartment in a very crowded area. The apartment is event more spacious then it appears in the pictures. Daniel is very friendly, flexible and available for any request.
I would suggest Daniel's apartment to anyone's looking for a great stay in manhattan. 
Daniel, thank you very much for the prosecco bottle! Cheers!!!!

notre hôte, Daniel a été très accueillant ... son appartement, très bien placé, très propre et fonctionnel ... juste à côté des quartiers vivants et branchés Nolita et Soho 
pour faire du tourisme et du shopping, c'est parfait ...
nous retiendrons cette adresse pour un futur retour à NYC
Daniel was very helpful, clean, punctual, and nice. The place was awesome, tasteful, and spacious in a great part of town. Everything you could possibly need is just outside.

My girlfriend and I spent a holiday in Daniel's apartament in June.
Daniel has been a very careful person during our entire holiday and very kind to give us all the information about the apartament and the city. The apartament was perfect for us needs and was in a perfect location near the subway and very nice pubs or restaurants. 
We had to thank Daniel, because he allowed us to leave our luggage after the check out because our Fly was at 8:30 p.m.   
Daniel was a perfect home owner and during our holiday he asked us if was all ok and as we expected!
I would recommend the apartment to everybody and certainly when we return to New York, we will contact Daniel again :)
Great place in a lively, very conveniently located neighborhood and luckily located on a quiet street.

This was my first trip to NYC and only my second AirBnB experience and, I have to say, Daniel was awesome! The apartment was clean, spacious and comfortable for the two of us -- and the rooftop view at night was excellent! His recommendations for places to eat were awesome and he was so quick to answer any and all questions that we had. Added perks were the excellent A/C {it was muggy during our stay and so nice to sleep comfortably}, the stocked coffee and there was even a bottle of sparkling wine chilling for us upon arrival. I would absolutely stay here again!!!
Great place.  Will stay again.  Made changes for me, hired a plumber within the same hour, literally did everything to make my stay better.  Super awesome host.

Myself and 3 friends spent 8 nights in Daniel's apartment and had an amazing time! 
The apartment was just as pictured, spacious, clean and great A/C. The location was close to the subway and lots of great bars and restaurants. 
Communication with Daniel was  also excellent as was the list of recommendations he sent us which meant that we had a great starting point for exploring the LES and surrounding areas.
I would highly recommend this apartment and would love to stay here next time I'm in New York.

Daniel was a fantastic host, apartment as described and pictured.  The location was great, close to a couple of different subway location options and the accommodations were perfect for our family of 5.  When you can stay at Daniel's apartment for less then you can get a decent two bed hotel room, the choice is clear. 

Would stay again, no complaints!

Daniel ci ha accolto benissimo, ci ha fornito tutte le indicazioni necessarie sull'appartamento e ci ha fornito varie indicazioni riguardo alla città.
Si è sempre dimostrato gentilissimo e a totale disposizione.
Potevamo contattarlo per qualsiasi cosa. 
Appartamento molto bello e pulito, situato in una bellissima posizione.
Fermate della metropolitana e degli autobus a pochi passi.
Bellissima esperienza!
Daniel was a great host. Everything was well organized, he took care of everything and made sure that we would enjoy our days in the city. We had a fantastic time at his place.

Although we were 5 hours late coming in, Daniel was incredibly accommodating and made certain that everything was going as it should be. The apartment is just great...roomy, efficient, comfortable beds, light filled, clean and everything works! 
Thank you Daniel!

We had a great time at Daniel's apartment! It is nicely located near restaurants and shops in Soho and it is very spacious. Accomodates five perfectly well. 
Most importantly, Daniel is an awesome host. He is really kind, organized, and he is always available. Will love to stay there again. Thanks Daniel!!

Daniel was a great host.  He was super responsive and accommodating.  His recommendations for activities and venues in NYC were great.

The apartment was spacious and very clean.  It was even nicer than in the pictures.  It is nicely furnished. The bed is very comfortable and the water pressure is excellent. 

The apartment is centrally located.  There are great restaurants and bars steps and short blocks away.  There is a drop off laundry service around the corner.  The subway stop is also very closeby.  Pretty much all you need is within a few minutes walking distance.  The one downside of the location is that the apartment can be pretty loud.  Light sleepers may want to consider earplugs. 

All in all, this apartment is a great spot and Daniel is a wonderful host.

Daniel was a great host, always available to talk and help. The apartment is amazing, really clean and comfortable. Just a few blocks from the subway, a whole foods, starbucks and from bloomingdales. Everything you need just next 2 u.
I will recomend to all my friends and family. Thank you Daniel!!

Daniel was a really amazing host for my first time using airbnb. He was in contact regularly regarding the booking and if there were any changes. He went out of his way to assist me with recommendations in the area and was always a text away if I needed any assistance. The apartment was exactly as described and the photos were accurate. It felt like I was walking straight into the photographs. The neighbourhood gave me the exact NY experience I was looking for. I would highly recommend staying here. The lift was great for luggage, facilities were great and the building was secure.
Daniel was very accommodating and helpful. Great location. Clean, warm space.

Daniel was a perfect host and went his way to make sure all our questions were answered in a timely manner, both before and during our stay. We've been in NY several times before and my goal was to find a place that was close to varies transportation options which the apartment location definitely delivers.

The department is exactly as described and displayed. It was nice and clean and we made full use of the kitchen several times which worked out fine. The Whole Foods grocery is in close distance to the apartment which was nice for us, since we didn't want to spend too much time trying to find a place for breakfast every morning. Suggest that you do some research ahead of time, so you have a whitelist for places that serve the best coffee, lunches etc.. We did and it made a big difference since food, coffee and wine is important for our trips. Daniel will be more than happy to provide you with a list of places you can try.

We found several good places to eat nearby, specially since pizza was one of our missions this time. And the good news is that many of the best pizza places in NY are (both in our and various blogs' opinions) located within a 3 miles radius from the apartment.

My trip was together with my teenage daughter, so didn't have a chance to try many of the really cool bars and entertainment places that's close to the apartment, but have to say that you have plenty of options close to the apartment if you want either live music, cool and/or cozy bars. I did visit a couple of wine bars during happy hour on  our way home to the apartment in the evening and it was just perfect. Make sure to do your research because there are a lot of options within 1.5 mile radius. 

A few other things that made a positive difference is that the Internet in the apartment is really good and stable. Since there's no television in the apartment we used my surface computer for various streaming services which worked out perfectly.

The weather while we stayed moved everywhere from warm to cold, but both the heat and AC worked fine (had a minor problem with the heat in the beginning, but it was an isolated problem for the entire building and was quickly fixed)

I would definitely stay at Daniels place on my next visit to NY, primarily because of the apartment and Daniel as a host.
Beautiful apartment, well decorated. Easy access to Manhattan by train.

Abbiamo soggiornato nell'appartamento di Daniel per 5 giorni alla fine di dicembre 2014. Ci siamo trovati davvero bene. L'appartamento è esattamente come si vede nelle foto. Si trova al terzo piano (con ascensore) in una tranquilla zona residenziale al confine tra SoHo e ChinaTown, a pochi passi da due diverse stazioni della Metro . L'appartamento si trova in posizione ottimale per visitare le maggiori attrazioni  di Manhattan. In zona ci sono diversi minimarket e il fornitissimo mercato coperto di Essex. Non abbiamo avuto il piacere di incontrare Daniel personalmente, tuttavia non abbiamo avuto alcun tipo di problema, in quanto ci aveva fornito istruzioni precise con buon anticipo e  anche durante il nostro soggiorno si è premurato più volte di contattarci x sincerarsi che tutto fosse a posto e non avessimo problemi.
Thank you Daniel! we had a wonderful stay and look forward to coming back to NYC again!

Daniel is everything an Airbnb host should be! He is courteous and always responsive, his apartment is exceptionally clean and in a perfect location. The experience of booking with him is super easy whether you are a seasoned Airbnber or a first timer. He is also always ready with a suggestion for a great restaurant or bar or even a dry-cleaner/tailor in the neighborhood. 

This is the second time I have stayed with Daniel I will definitely be back! It is always a wonderful experience! 

Thanks for all your help Daniel!! Can't wait to stay again!

L'appartement correspondait parfaitement à la description, nous étions 4 et c'était parfait. L'appartement est très bien équipé, bien décoré, le WIFI fonctionne très bien. Daniel connaissait notre horaire d'arrivée et a suivi par téléphone notre bonne entrée dans l'appartement, il nous a aussi communiqué des adresses de restaurant, bar et était à notre disposition pour nous aider si besoin. 
L'adresse est dans une petite rue au calme, nous avons très bien dormi. Les commerces et le métro sont proches.

Daniel met me at the apt, quick handoff of the keys and I was all set.  Excellent space, good for a larger group if you need the bed in the bedroom as well as the living room.  Could use just a few more hand towels, maybe some basic shampoo, but the space and area are great.  Will definitely stay here again.

Perfekter Aufenthalt für unseren Mädelstrip nach NYC. Wir waren zu fünft und hatten genügend Platz (und auch Spiegel ;-) ) Daniel ist ein super Host und hat sich sehr engagiert, war jederzeit erreichbar und hat uns viele Vorschläge für Restaurants und Bars gegeben. Das Appartement war gepflegt und schön eingerichtet (wie auf den Fotos) Die Lage ist sehr gut - die nächste Subwaystation Delancy fährt zentral in den Norden Manhattens oder eben nach Brooklyn. Die Anbindung ist sehr gut. Alles in allem absolut zu empfehlen!

friendly host - clean apartment - as on pictures shown - five beds
Great apartment!  I hope to stay here again.

Daniel was extremely welcoming and responsive from the get-go. He even offered to help me store my luggage since I was coming in early prior to check-in time. His apartment was exactly as pictured and he made it a point to come meet me and provide me with easy guidelines/instructions for the apt, in addition to recommendations for local eateries, which I requested after he offered to help me find whatever interested me during my stay. The apartment was everything that I was looking for. I felt like it was really my place since it was so comfortable. The AC worked like a charm, the shower was great, and the apartment was in an amazing location to enjoy the Lower East Side or even if you had to hop on a train or jump in a car to leave Manhattan, it was an accessible journey. I would definitely stay here again! Thank you, Daniel.

You know that feeling when you know you have chosen right…. That's how I felt when I stayed at Daniels. Great location, great layout and all round greatness.  The LES is where it's at.  You really get a sense of New York with so many amazing places nearby.  Daniel was beyond helpful and the place was very clean and you can tell that thought has gone into making your experience a great one. I wish all airbnb's were like this.

This was a great apartment - clean, spacious, comfortable beds, good air con and a lift. The location was fine - just like any city - a mixture of extremes living side by side.  I stayed with my daughter (15) and we felt quite comfortable walking around after dark. It was a few minutes walk to some great shops and around the corner on Houston or Delancey there are enough breakfast places to keep you going - although we favoured the Clinton St establishment - just get there early!  And Morganstern's - if there was ever a reason to go get icecream at 10pm in the rain this is it - delicious and 5 mins away.
Two subway lines also in easy reach so very convenient for Manhattan or Brooklyn and the sky train.
Daniel was easy to communicate with and made lots of lovely recommendations. We felt well looked after and he even had emergency plans should anything go wrong while he was out of town.  Nothing did - we had a great holiday which we will remember.

Daniel's place is great, and completely as advertised.  Perfect location for where I work.  He's also very easy to communicate with.  I'll definitely make this a go to option when I travel into the city again.  Thanks!

Daniel est un hôte efficace , consciencieux , rapide et précis , toujours à l'écoute et sachant répondre à nos demandes avec une grande attention.
Son appartement , bien situé nous a permis de re-découvrir The City that never sleep en jonglant facilement entre Manhattan et Brooklyn situé à 2 pas en prenant le Williamsburgh bridge.
Nous recommandons vivement et espérons revenir un jour
Great apartment in a great area. Daniel was always reachable and extremely professional. 100% recommend this place.

Daniel was very welcoming!
Great communication from booking to checking out. Great location and very comfortable .
Thank you!

滞在直前もﾒｰﾙをもらい､ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの使い方だけではなく､周辺のﾚｽﾄﾗﾝなどの紹介をして頂きました｡
滞在中も問題がないかとﾒｰﾙも頂き､安心して滞在することができました｡
部屋もきれいで､掃除も行き届いていました｡

Great apartment, clean, spacious and quiet. We were very happy there and Daniel was very helpful with tips and advice, even popping by to say hi - much appreciated! Would recommend it and we would stay there  again. Thank you!

L'appartement est fonctionnel et en bon état. Aucune gêne par rapport au bruit. L'appartement est climatisé, c'est assez appréciable l'été, par contre la clim est assez bruyante. Les photos sont le reflet de la réalité. Très bien placé, le métro est très proche. Il est possible de faire une partie de Manhattan à pied depuis l'appartement.
Nous étions 5 dans l'appartement, et nous avions suffisamment d'espace.
Daniel vous donne les indications pratiques pour le transport ainsi que sur les lieux (bar, restos) autour de l'apart avec son avis. Très proche de l'apart, vous pouvez déposer vos bagages pour le dernier jour avant de reprendre l'avion (10$ par bagage)

Daniel's appartment is a great accomodation for a family of five. It was clean and equipped with everything necessary. Grocery store, subway station, Chinatown and Little Italy are all very close.  Daniel was very helpful and his answers to our emails were always quick and useful. The neighborhood is not quiet, with traffic noise from the nearby Delancey Street, but then you don't go to Manhattan to relax and enjoy the silence.

Todos os comentários elogiosos que os outros hóspedes já haviam feito são muito verdadeiros, o apartamento é excelente. Muito iluminado, amplo, bem equipado e seguro. Há duas estações de metrô próximas, em poucos minutos estávamos em qualquer lugar da cidade. Pudemos caminhar e explorar os bairros Soho, Litlle Italy e Chinatown. Daniel foi muito atencioso, sempre se comunicando com gentileza e rapidez, ótimo anfitrião.
Great experience dealing with Daniel. He is an amazing host. The property is as pictured. Daniel was always available and hands on. Would definitely recommend his place.

We had the best time staying at Daniels flat in the Lower East Side of NYC. We arrived and the place was as described, check in was flexible, and Daniel had communicated everything to us ahead of time so we were able to just dive into our vacation. Daniel also gave us some great recommendations for the area. The flat was in the perfect location for walking to local spots or jumping on the subway to get to some of the touristy locations and escape back to a quiet more relaxed area.

We were very pleased with the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was everything it was advertised to be....very neat and clean....great location for several ethnic neighborhoods (we were just in time for the San Gennaro Festival in Little Italy) but a bit distant for our daily theater excursions.  I would recommend it.

First off, Daniel is a great host. Wanted to know how we were enjoying our trip and eager to help in any way. Really made us feel welcome. The apartment is a good size with easy access. There is a rooftop view, but not really a place to hang out. The Lower East Side is great for most, gut still has that area in transition feel and probably always will. We love it, but it's not the upper west side, so be aware. I have no qualms recommending this place and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again

Daniel made me feel very welcome.  He was willing to help me store my bag at the apartment before and after the official check in time which was very helpful to me.  The apartment was very clean and neat and looks exactly as advertised.  The neighborhood is fine and there are many places to dine and be entertained and shop within easy walking distance.  It's a great part of New York.  Daniel had many great recommendations about where to go and what to do and where to dine.  His recommendations were excellent.  He was very responsive to my texts and replied immediately.  He made every effort to be the most gracious and caring host.  I would book again.

Great apartment ... As described. Daniel was responsive and helpful.  The neighbourhood was close to everything and had a great quintessentially real New York feel to it. Our kids loved it too. Recommend highly.

Daniel is a great host and super accommodating and helpful. After a bad experience with my last airbnb stay, this was just what I needed. Easy, beautiful, clean, spacious, comfortable, awesome location. A really great experience.

Wir haben uns in Daniels Apartement sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Betten waren groß und wir haben alle sehr gut darin geschlafen. Es war genau wie beschrieben und sehr sauber. Daniel hat uns persönlich begrüsst, uns alles gezeigt und sogar noch extra Kaffee für uns besorgt. Außerdem hat er uns noch tolle Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Die Lage war für uns perfekt, da wir mit der Metro (5 Minuten Fußweg) schnell alle Ziele erreichen konnten, aber trotzdem relativ ruhig in der Seitenstraße gewohnt haben. Zwei Straßen weiter befindet sich ein kleiner Supermarkt, in dem man Lebensmittel, Getränke und frische Brötchen besorgen kann. Das war für uns klasse, da wir "Zuhause" gefrühstückt haben. Ein "Subway" ist übrigens ebenfalls in der Nähe. Wir können das Apartement und Daniel auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen und würden wieder bei ihm wohnen, wenn wir nochmal nach NY kommen.

L'appartement de Daniel est un formidable point de départ pour visiter NYC. 
Situé au milieu de 4 stations de métro permettant d'aller absolument partout tres facilement. 
L'appartement est absolument conforme à la présentation. Il est très fonctionnel. 
Attention toutefois la proximité du carrefour avec Delancey street le rend très bruyant la nuit (boules Quies indispensables). 
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer notre hôte durant ces 5 jours mais il s'est montré très disponible à distance.

Daniel's flat was exactly as listed on the website, in a fantastic location and in a great condition. Daniel made the key pick-up and drop-off very straightforward and simple, he also visited us to check that we had everything we needed for the stay and provided great recommendations in advance. would definitely stay again when visiting NYC.
The location, size and cleaniness of Daniels apt was perfect. Everything is waking distance from the apt which made our stay very easy and comfortable. Would rec staying here again!
Daniel was very accommodating and everything was as described.  He even provided a list of things to do in the neighborhood.  The apartment was very nice and clean.  Highly recommended.

Daniel's place is exactly as shown in pictures.  The apt is spacious with all amenities.  Daniel made a feel at home.  The area is very vibrant and located near multiple subway lines only few blocks away.  We arrived late Christmas night and entry was simple.  (Website hidden by Airbnb) more item...The shower pressure is incredible!

Where do we begin! There are not enough words to describe how fantastic Daniels place is and how fabulous his hospitality has been to us! His unique condo is located in a very desirable area and from the moment we began corresponding everything was perfect. Daniel is extremely knowledgeable about his area as well as the city and he was able to guide us to ensure that our trip was beyond our expectations. Feel free to reach out to me or Daniel for any additional information as both of us will be happy to share anything and everything! His place has everything to offer you now or in the future! All the best for a fabulous 2016! We will definitely be staying here again!
todo era según lo anunciado y esperado, y daniel muy atento, sin duda repetiría

Daniel is an excellent host. The communication before, during, and after our stay was perfect. He greeted us in person when we arrived at the apartment and touched base with us several times to make sure everything was going smoothly throughout our stay.

Everything was as expected from the listing. Daniel went out of his way to make sure that we had what we needed, even going so far as to borrow a teakettle and a french press for us to use during our stay.

You can't beat this listing for a comfortable and convenient stay in NYC.

Wir haben Daniel nicht selber kennengelernt, es hat aber alles wunderbar mit der Schlüsselübergabe geklappt. Das Apartment sieht genau so aus wie auf den Fotos und liegt wunderbar! Restaurants, Bars, Cafés und Supermärkte direkt vor der Tür oder in unmittelbarer Nähe, genauso wie verschiedene Subway Stationen. Die Wohnung ist sauber und gepflegt. Einziger kleiner Nachteil, sie ist zu bestimmten Zeiten etwas laut....

Daniel Wohnung liegt zentral und ist gepflegt. 3 U-Bahn-Linien, China Town und Little Italy sind zu Fuß erreichbar. Daniel war via Handy jederzeit erreichbar und war auch sehr entgegenkommend. Wir haben die Wohnung als Familie mit 2 erwachsenen Kindern genutzt und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Great spacious apartment. great location - multiple subway stops nearby
Greeted by Daniel on arrival - very welcoming
A+ would recommend highly

Daniel is a very good host. 
The apartment is very comfortable and is near to 3 subways stations.
The apartment is near to several neighborhoods as Chinatown and Little Italy; and also the Soho.

It´s a very cool place. Enjoy!

Clean, spacious and extremely well-located, Daniel's place was perfect for my needs. My parents and my brother were traveling with me, and the apartment provided a cosy space for us to continue chatting after a day of sightseeing, in a way that wouldn't be possible if we chose hotel accommodation. It was unexpectedly warm when we visited NYC, and Daniel's apartment was thankfully equipped with AC. The shower pressure was also strong and satisfying. I will stay with Daniel again if a large group of friends/relatives travel together, and highly recommend Daniel's place to anyone with similar traveling expectations.

My stay at Daniel's place was absolutely incredible - he was the most amazing host, the apartment itself was beautiful and so close to transport, delicious food and interesting sights. Daniel was basically on call 24/7 via text/phone, and answered all our questions within a matter of minutes. He made us feel at home, and I literally didn't want to leave such a great apartment in the heart of NYC. I'd definitely return, no question!
Exactly as advertised. Solid place.

This is a really lovely appartement with a great location. We enjoyed every minute of the trip. The hospitality and service was great with absolutely no problems. Daniel is a really great host and next time I go to NYC I will book this appartement again.

Good communication. Met us at the apt. But he didnt have to! Great that the lock boc  is there in case the host couldnt meet us..
Great location in LES. Lots of neighborhood bars and restaurants. Host recommendations always spot on!

We started our 3 week long holiday in the US, with NYC. Daniels apartment seemed perfect for us (a family of 4 with 2 kids under 10). The apartment is well located - a short ride to downtown, and easily connected to mid/uptown by the subway. Within walking distance our tons of breakfast and dining options which we used to the hilt. 

Daniel is super helpful and always responsive. He is happy to answer any small query at any time of the day and made me feel absolutely at ease coming in from so far away. He made every effort to make the stay as comfortable as possible. 

I am an even bigger Airbnb fan now - there is no better way to explore a city like NY than to stay like a local.

Notre hôte Daniel a été admirablement gentil et acceuillant. 
Ses conseils et bons plans ont été d'une grande aide. 
L'appartement est tout à fait identique à l'idée que nous nous en faisions donc aux photos et descriptions. Tout était propre, les draps doux et l'air conditionné qui nous a sauvé la vie. 
Agréable, chaleureux, dans un quartier vivant. 
Nous reviendrons sans aucun doute.
Merci Daniel, notre super hôte.
Excelente recepción, excelente el lugar. Fue una comunicación buena con nuestro anfitrión.
Daniel is an excellent host.Very easy to communicate with and made checking in and out painless.The space was very clean and comfortable.Excellent rooftop views! Would book again.

Daniel is an excellent host. Available , helpful and attentive.
The apartment is well located near the subway and very close to the coolest area of NYC ( Soho - in my opinion). 
The apartment has an elevator , air conditioning and kitchen items needed for our stay.
Me and my friends had a great stay. I definitely recommend !!!

Location, Location, Location! The apartment is in a perfect location for walking anywhere. There are tons of great places for food, drinks, and getting to public transportation. It was also clean, spacious, and a perfect place to call home for our week long trip. During our stay it was very hot outside, and the AC units worked perfectly. Daniel was also super accommodating and his communication was more than excellent. I highly recommend staying here and look forward to staying here again on our next trip :) Thanks Daniel!

This place is great, located near loads of bars and restaurants plus several metro stops near by which will take you anywhere. Very quiet building and the beds were amazing (this comes from people with back problems).
Nothing bad to say!
Lovely airy, fun, light appartment. The bedroom is perfect, and the bar in the living room is a nice detail. All in all a super bolt hole in NYC!
Daniel was very helpful particularly when we locked ourselves out. We had a great stay.

A great place to stay in NYC. Very central for getting around Manhattan and Brooklyn and close to the subway. Very spacious, clean and light filled, with great a/c and heating. Daniel was a great host, very helpful and quick to respond! Highly recommended.

Great location and well-appointed 

Daniel's apartment is well-located in Manhattan's Lower East Side. The apartment is on a quiet (quiet for NYC) street with shops and quality bars/restaurants all within easy walking distance. There are also 2 subway stations close by. The apartment itself is clean, light and comfortable. As a host, Daniel was spot on - the communication in particular was great. Daniel made sure we had lots of information with regards to checking in, gave us good recommendations on things in the area (e.g. El Rey for coffee and The Meatball Shop for a meal) and even suggested a safe place to store our bags during our last afternoon in NY. 
We would definitely recommend Daniel and his apartment to anyone wanting to get an authentic taste of the Big Apple.
Daniel es un gran anfitrión! Estuvimos 10 dias y fue muy amable y siempre atento a ayudarnos. Muchas gracias Daniel! Sin duda lo recomiendo y volveria a elegirlo.

Apartment looks exactly as listed and was very clean. Daniel was very easy to get a hold of and helped with anything we needed--even giving some great recommendations of places to go. Beds were very comfortable. The only thing I never paid attention to in the listing is that there is no television. It didn't affect us too much as we were out and about so much, but if you're the type of person who wants to relax at night and watch a show or turn on news in the morning, it may be something to consider.

AMAZING location in the LES - access to everything. Loved how responsive Daniel was. Having an elevator made it easy to shuffle in and out, and the place is SUPER spacious - even more so than the pictures. Bed was extremely comfortable as well. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting NYC!
Amazing place with an amazing host! Perfect location for great food spots, bars, subway accessibility and Daniel was super good with communicating! Definitely, definitely recommend staying here!

El piso es genial, hemos estado 5 personas y todo ha ido muy bien. El piso es grande, está limpio y el edificio es muy tranquilo. Daniel es muy amable y eficiente. Desde luego si vuelvo a Nueva York contactaré de nuevo con Daniel.

This one bedroom apartment has everything one needs for a vacation in New York. The building has an elevator which is not always the case in New York. The apartment is clean, beautifully decorated, and Daniel was super attentive to any request and was an excellent communicator. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking into renting it. Overall, our experience was amazing/superb.

Highly Recommended. The apartment is clean, secure with great amenities and in a fantastic location. Daniel is also an excellent host. I really appreciated the list of recommendations of local places to eat and things to do that Daniel provided. There is so much action in the village that it's really the place to be. Would love to stay there again next time I'm in New York.

Fantastic host - great communication, friendly, extremely reliable.  Daniel was super helpful in accommodating my family on short notice.  The apartment was exactly as described, and the extra queen bed was an added plus!  Great find for the LES!
great location, very spacious , really liked our stay. Daniel was a great host with perfect communication.

Daniels place is a New York gem!  So much space, it's clean, has a great shower, stocked kitchen, comfortable couches and an amazing location in a quiet LES area, just a real short walk to amazing bars and restaurants.  Did I mention how much space!?   Such great value for money considering the cost of any decent hotel in this part of NYC.  Everything from the checkin to check out was easy, how it should be.  I was here for business and it is a fantastic option, I'll be back Daniel!

I can't event begin to describe this place! 
Awesome host, great location and really spacious and clean apartment. 
First of all I was lucky enough to meet Daniel in person! Even though we just met for a couple of minutes it was great to meet the person who lives here! He was extremely nice and helpful!!! During our stay he was always reachable and helped with any questions we had and provided us with great things that we could do in NYC. The check in and out were extremely easy. If possible Daniel makes sure that you can either check in earlier or check out later! 
The apartment itself was really clean, spacious and nicely decorated. 
For those who love to take long showers, the water pressure is great! :-) 
The apartment is in an awesome location in Lower East Side of Manhattan. There are plenty of great restaurants and (rooftop) bars within walking distance. Everything else can easily be reached with the nearby (5min) Metro or Uber.
We felt really comfortable and would recommend Daniel's apartment anytime! 
Next time we're visiting NYC we will definitely stay at Daniel's again, if his calendar allows :-)
Awesome location. Apartment was great! I recommend this place for anyone. Daniel is extremely helpful and easy to co-operate.

Daniel's communication was fast and regular throughout our trip.  Check-in and Check-out was smooth.  The A/C was wonderful, showers were hot, and the beds very comfortable.  We enjoyed the sitting area and utilized the functional kitchen some too. The space was very relaxing, and the location was excellent for our needs.  Wonderful stay!

The apartment was near countless great bars, restaurants, shops, and subway entrances. The neighborhood was eclectic, safe, and quiet during sleeping hours. I would highly recommend this apartment and the amenities within. Thank you!
Great location, Daniel was very hands on and quick to respond to any questions.

The apartment was spacious, just what we were looking for.  There were many great places very nearby-shops, restaurants, transportation.  It was easy to get into the apartment, felt secure.  Nice windows and light.   Beds were very comfortable.  Place was clean.  It served our needs for a family of 4 with 2 teens and gave us room to spread out.

Daniel was super easy to coordinate with. His place is really outstanding and in a nice, convenient area. Both beds are really comfortable and windows can open up for some fresh air. Would highly recommend for people looking for a high-quality place that's relatively affordable.
A great apartment with character and light. Great spot for shopping and night life
Awsome experience !!! Great communication and accomidating !!!!

Apartamento muy luminoso,
el Aire acondicionado funciona perfectamente.
No defrauda, es lo que ves en la web, no hay sorpresas. 
Localización excelente, muy bien comunicado por autobús y metro.
varios supermercados cercanos. 
Daniel atento a las necesidades en cualquier momento. Muy fácil contactar con él. Tuvo la amabilidad de un "late check-out" sin coste de dos horas para acomodarnos a la salda. Genial. Gran detalle por su parte.
Dos camas muy amplias, muy cómodas. La quinta plaza es un gran sofá.
Nosotros repetiríamos

Daniels Appartment hat genauso ausgesehen wie auf den Fotos. Die Betten sind sehr bequem und alles war sehr sauber und ordentlich. Gerade bei Nacht ist es auf der Dachterasse sehr schön und man hat eine tolle Aussicht. Die Ubahn ist etwa 5 Gehminuten entfernt.
Die Kommunikation mit Daniel war super, er war sehr hilfsbereit und immer erreichbar, er hat uns auch eine Aufbewahrungsmöglichkeit für unsere Koffer am Tag der Abreise verschafft.
Sollten wir jemals wieder nach New York kommen, würden wir sofort wieder in diesem Appartment wohnen. Sehr empfehlenswert!
Great place! Close to all the nice places in Lower East Side. Perfect communication with the host Daniel. Would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone

Great Airbnb experience. Daniel was a wonderful host and kept in contact throughout the duration of our trip. The space fit the 5 of us perfectly. We booked on a weekend so a lot of places were packed, so we spent a good amount of time on the rooftop of the apartment which was an amazing bonus to an already great apartment. Great restaurants and night life within walking distance, we didn't take a cab/uber the entire night out! I would book this place again in a heartbeat, thanks Daniel!

Daniel's place is in a super fun and central neighbourhood with loads of bars and restaurants nearby. Great transport links too. It's great for 2/3 people and has everything you need. No complaints at all, I would love to go back there!
Daniel's place was a wonderful - just as described. He was so helpful with neighborhood suggestions and very communicative. A great experience!

Daniel's home is quite near to China town in where we can find many great cantonese restaurants. The taste is even better than we could find in Shanghai. The apartment itself is exactly the same as Daniel describes, clean, comfort, close to two subway station. We did spend a wonderful week in this apartment exploring New York.

Daniel's place is wonderful, and Daniel is simply an amazing host. Daniel's spacious apartment was awesome for us, as a couple traveling from SF and in need of a space where we could comfortably work remotely. It was so wonderful having enough room to separate our sleeping space from our living/working space. It was well stocked with plenty of quality toilet paper, soap, hangers, soft towels, he even had an iron & travel steamer (so handy!). We found the beds and linens very comfortable, I've never experienced such little jet lag and the bed in the living room made a great makeshift desk! Located in a great area, you don't have to go more than a 1-3 blocks to find delicious food (for every meal), tasty cocktails, or another great neighborhood full of both. Daniel was communicative throughout our entire stay and gave some great local recommendations. I've only ever experienced this level of comfort while traveling when staying with close friends. Fingers crossed his place is available next time we're in Manhattan!!
Fabulous apartment, really clean with plenty of room. Daniel was incredibly prompt with any of my questions and his local tips for restaurants are on point! Thanks Daniel!

Good Location in Lower East Side - very close to Little Italy, SOHO and Tribeka. Great locations in walking distance. Close to subway stations and restaurants. Good price for New York. Very good recommendations from Daniel. Would definitely rent the apartment again.
Amazing place, very friendly and reliable host, 3 blocks from major subway line
Daniel’s place is great and he is an excellent host. Would recommend others to work with Daniel!

Great location with lots of food options nearby. Daniel provides lots of wonderful recommendations. The place is very spacious for Manhattan and was very clean. Daniel is very friendly and respectful. He also is willing to accommodate for specific needs. Really enjoyed the stay here.
Daniel's place could not have a better location. We walked everywhere! And the space is clean and simple so it was perfect for the weekend. Highly recommend.
Such an amazing deal. Great location, cool space & Daniel is very friendly & responsive

Staying at Daniel's lovely apartment was a wonderful experience. The location is superb for getting around with wonderful restaurants close by. Daniel was very responsive to all our needs and gave us some great local tips. Highly recommended
Highly recommend- large space, great windows, good location. Daniel was very responsive.
Daniel’s place is in a great location in a great part of New York. You’ll enjoy this!
Apartment was exactly as listed and neighborhood is fantastic. Host was responsive and considerate. Would definitely stay again.
Cute apartment in a hip neighborhood. Great location!

Daniel was a fantastic host and this place was perfect. Everything from the beginning of our experience with Daniel was so smooth - from the initial booking, to excellent advice on local features through to flexibility around checking in and out. Daniel was really quick to respond to any of our issues which made us feel like we were being taken care of well. We will definitely recommend this place to anyone we know who will be traveling to NYC - and I think we may have inspired some friends through our photos. The place was amazing, comfortable, clean, bright and perfectly located for a look at a different side than the typical touristy New York. If we lived in NYC, we would live in LES!

This is a great apartment, light and spacious with everything you need.
 The Lower East side has loads of interesting cafes, restaurants, galleries, parks & has a nice laid back feel.
 Daniel was very helpful about suggestions of places to go to, which we would I'm sure not have found ourselves  e.g a great little tucked away speakeasy down the street & cafes for good coffee.
 All in all a great experience.
It's a nice place to stay and convenient to reach the key spots by subway or bus.

Daniel is a fantastic  host. Very responsive and welcoming. The apartment has lots of natural light, is exactly as shown in the pictures and the beds are really comfortable. It is very well located to get around as it is near 3 different  subway stops. There are various restaurants and shops nearby.  The lower East side has a different feel.. more like old Manhattan. Great for younger adults.

Daniel was very friendly and helpful. He gave us a quick tour of the apartment, which was clean and organized as seen in the pictures. Enough space for the three of us and there were great restaurants in walking distance. If we return, we would definitely rent this property again.

The description is genuine and the place was as expected. Daniel sends a welcome message with lots of local tips. Daniel did his best to accommodate late check out request. We truly enjoyed our stay and recommends this place.
Great Stay!!
What a fantastic place! We had such a wonderful time and enjoyed our stay in New York

Apartment has the best aircon I have ever experienced, keeps things cool on those really hot days. Beds are super comfortable and the location is just amazing. Daniel is very quick to respond, great host!
Appartamento fantastico! È comodissimo alla metropolitana e vicino ci sono sia negozio che ristoranti. Consigliatissimo! Daniel è stato preciso e ci ha consigliato un sacco di posti

Great location! So many interesting sights to be done on foot. Daniel gave us so many great tips and always responded promptly to our questions. Check in and checkbout are very easy going. Just what you want after a long day travelling. 
Would recommend staying there anytime.

Looking to explore LES, SOHO and lower Manhattan then this is a great location as you can walk to most places. Want to go up town? No problem great connections with several metro stations close by.

Daniel, was a great host, quick with responses and flexible. The apartment was as described and as you see in the pictures.
Es un apartamento excelentemente bien ubicado a un paso de Little Italy y el Soho. Y muy cerca de diferentes paradas de metro. Muy recomendable.
Fabulous apartment, great location, secure and quiet.  Photos are accurate and responses and extra information provided by Daniel was first class.  Would stay again and highly recommend.

Daniel is a great host. Everything was perfect and the apartment 100% like pictures and as described. Daniel was always fast to respond and had great tipps. The location is just perfect. The rooftop is a cool add on and I enjoyed the  sunrise with my coffee. Best jetlag location ever ; )!!

Very accurate to the pictures. The place is a good space for NYC and it is SUPER clean! Daniel is a great host with good communication. There is some street noise and there is good deal of light in the rooms at night. Not a huge problem, but if you are a light sleeper, couldn't hurt to bring some plugs or noise cancelling headphones.
The apartment was as described. Daniel was very helpful and communicative. We enjoyed our short stay.

Daniel’s place is in a great location for local restaurants, bars and easy transport to elsewhere in the city. Even though it’s a lively area the apartment itself is quiet. 

Daniel was a really helpful and welcoming host and gave us great recommendations as it was our first visit. I’d highly recommend a stay!
fantastic location, comfortable, ev thing i needed, loved it. will stay here again in a heartbeat and refer friends. Thank you Daniel!!!
Todo impecable según el aviso, recomiendo y vale la pena.
Magnifica ubicacion, buena atencion del anfitrion, todo nitido en el apartamento, lavadora de platos, de ropa, y todo lo necesario para una buena estadia en NYC,
Daniel’s place is perfect for a short break in NYC. Great location and lots of local amenities. Daniel was really helpful and a great host. Thanks for everything :-)

Excelente departamento, impecablemente limpio y bien ubicado, cerca de buenos y lindos lugares, con varias paradas del metro.
A un paso de Williamsburg, lugar que no conocía y por el cual vale la pena pegar una vuelta.
Daniel es un excelente anfitrión, dando rápida respuesta a nuestras preguntas. Sin duda volvería a alojarme allí.
The location is very accesible to get Soho. I can tell the host is super attentive and very interactive. I am super satisfied with the accomodation there.

El apartamento de Daniel es muy acogedor y mucho más limpio que los que he alquilado en otras ocasiones. Este punto es muy importante para mí. Pero, además, está situado en la mejor zona de Lower East Side, es decir, al lado de todo (incluido el metro: varias líneas cerca), pero sin ruidos. Esto, en Nueva York, es básico. Para colmo, Daniel es un anfitrión perfecto. Siempre responde a los mensajes, y de forma muy amable. Volveremos, seguro.

We were in NYC for a family wedding and really enjoyed our stay at Daniel’s apartment, which provided ample space to allow us comfortable downtime throughout the weekend.  The apartment is also squeaky clean – a feature I very much appreciate in an Airbnb rental.  Though we never met Daniel in person, he communicated with us quickly whenever we emailed him with questions, i.e. about parking, etc.  He also provided a very useful guide to neighborhood restaurants and things to do.   We would definitely stay here again.
Great apartment! Easy access to public transport into town and back to airport!
Lovely spot in an amazing location. Daniel is a great host.

Nice and spacious apartment in a great NYC neighbourhood. Tons of options to explore eat and drink nearby yet the apartment is quiet and peaceful. Daniel’s a great host and was available throughout if needed. Great spot, great host!
Good host, apartment is clean and organized. Thanks Daniel
Brilliant apartment and brilliant host!

Daniel was so accommodating and quick to respond.  Comfy bed, soft linens, elevator and plenty of space.  Would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would stay here again.  We had a late flight and he even had recommendations of a place to store our luggage after check out before the flight.
Great host, super location, gorgeous comfy beds and a bright, light, hip and very clean space! Daniel did not disappoint!

Everything was perfect ! 
The appartment is perfectly located, the neighborhood is calm with all the necessary nearby. 
30 to 40 minutes walk from Brooklyn Bridge, Times Square etc. You can easily do everything on foot.
We did not meet daniel, but everything was planned so that our trip will take place at best! 
A big thank-you, hoping to come back soon !

name: Aloha! Private cozy bedroom, walk to the beach!!
summary: Welcome to the heart of Waikiki! Guests will have a newly remodeled private room. Make yourselves at home! This very spacious apartment is less than five mins away from the popular Waikiki beach and the fun spots of paradise! I work long hours every day. My guests will feel like they have the whole apartment to themselves.
space: Guests have own private room that is right next to bathroom and kitchen! Very spacious/safe/ cute apartment. Guests will feel at home. Solo traveler or group will definitely feel at ease, safe, and secure. Myself and my co-host will make you feel right at home. Shall we take a tour around the city?
description: Welcome to the heart of Waikiki! Guests will have a newly remodeled private room. Make yourselves at home! This very spacious apartment is less than five mins away from the popular Waikiki beach and the fun spots of paradise! I work long hours every day. My guests will feel like they have the whole apartment to themselves. Guests have own private room that is right next to bathroom and kitchen! Very spacious/safe/ cute apartment. Guests will feel at home. Solo traveler or group will definitely feel at ease, safe, and secure. Myself and my co-host will make you feel right at home. Shall we take a tour around the city? Guests will have full access to private bedroom, living room, balcony, bathroom and kitchen. My co-host and I are very familiar with the island. We will be able to provide all the best spots to go to. If you like, we can be your personal tourguide. Very secure and safe building. We are at the heart of waikiki. Police station is nearby, neighborhood is safe. Bus stop is onl
neighborhood_overview: Very secure and safe building. We are at the heart of waikiki. Police station is nearby, neighborhood is safe.
notes: We make sure you are completely satisfied! I will always make sure you are doing well and enjoying yourself. Let me take you around or give you some pointers on where to see the best things this island has to offer!
transit: Bus stop is only a 2 min walk away! $2.50 per ride with a free two hour transfer Uber/lyft anywhere!
access: Guests will have full access to private bedroom, living room, balcony, bathroom and kitchen.
interaction: My co-host and I are very familiar with the island. We will be able to provide all the best spots to go to. If you like, we can be your personal tourguide.
house_rules: - Please remove shoes when entering apartment. - If need to smoke, smoke on the balcony. - Do not bring unregistered guests. I can't stress this enough. If you're coming from the beach, try to dust of any sand before coming inside. -Treat my apartment like it's your own. Clean up after yourself and treat everything with care -Please be mindful of electricity and water. If you are not home please leave everything off.

host.host_about:
Aloha!

I love meeting new people and traveling! I came to this beautiful island over ten years ago on vacation. I quickly fell in love with the island and decided to not fly back! The people and culture here are unlike any other. I love it, especially here in Waikiki. There is always something new going on, which is why I love living here. I started bartending and quickly got to know a lot of the insurance and outs of Oahu. My career has brought me so much joy, and introduced me to some of the best people on Earth. It  has blessed me so much, and  I am very thankful to be here making an impact on people's lives. Now I am Food and Beverage Manager for a 5 star Resort.

For fun besides traveling, I enjoy practicing Capoeira (Brazilian martial art) , dancing, working out, speaking Japanese, reading, showing people a good time, relaxing on the beach, and of course hiking!

As a host I will provide you with all the info to have a great time in beautiful Waikiki. I'll make sure you enjoy your stay. Whether its just to relax, or have an adventure, I give you the aloha spirit that makes our little island a great place to be in. Let's have some fun!

reviews.comments: Very good location in waikiki. The room is also private and has large closet and hardwood flooring. Bathroom is shared. Chico is very nice person and provided with a microwave in the kitchen.

The bedroom is dark & quiet for sleeping at night.  We did not hear any noise at all.  It is a "bare bones" room.  There is no air conditioning, but the ceiling fan kept us cool. The bed is very soft. Not suitable for older couples.  The bed is best for only one person, because we both kept rolling toward the center. The room would suit a single male best. Sheets & towels were very nice,  clean & left in our room.  We felt safe as we were able to lock the bedroom door.  We did not meet the host at all, but we arrived past midnight. 
We would not recommend this room for single females.
You would need to take a bus or have a car to get to attractions.  It's in the Waikiki area.

Chico was the best... He was always available to suggest places to eat, and places to explore. He even took me himself to explore the island multiple times. Chico has a very welcoming and warm personality, and wants to make your trip the best that it can be. 

As I was travelling alone I was scared I would become bored of Waikiki. Not a chance with the location of this place and the help of Chico!

This place is a close walk to restaurants, abc stores, the food pantry, and of course the beach!
Great location!
Really nice place. Parking can be tricky but it's doable. Chico was a great host. He's really great at opening doors.

Exzellente Kommunikation, alles problemlos. Sehr gute Lage mitten in Waikiki. Das Zimmer hat jedoch kein Fenster und bei Regen fließt ein Regenablaufrohr direkt am Bett vorbei, was sehr laut ist. Ansonsten hatte ich aber einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt und kann die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen.

The stay at the Airbnb was amazing! The location was great and had everything within walking distance.  The issues were that there are no windows in the bedroom so it has a bad ventilation issue, however with a ceiling fan you would not feel hot at night.  The bed was also extremely soft, so if you have back problem I would not recommend.  Overall the stay was great, since the host had great response rate and tried to make our stay as comfortable as possible.

It was really close to the beach, close to public transportation, clean, and comfortable. Though I didn't really spend time with Chico, he was always available to help out. Great communication. I highly recommend this place.
A great location and value for money.
Perfect location
Great location and good price.
Great location and price! Can't beat it!
숙소의 위치는 매우 좋았고, 호스트를 만날 수는 없었지만, 친절한 메일로 체크인은 어렵지 않았다. 하지만, 주변의 숙박비 대비 저렴한 가격을 고려하더라도, 바닥에 먼지가 가득했고, 화장실 ,부엌, 휴지통 등 3일 동안 청소는 전혀 이루어지지 않아 개선이 필요하다.

If you are flying solo or a young couple this place is perfect. Chico and Bennett who helped us get settled are both real mellow dudes. This place is literally 2 blocks from the epicenter of Waikiki beach front. You couldn't pick a more perfect spot if you want easy access to Waikiki. It's easily a 5th of what you would pay for a hotel room in that area. My girlfriend and I had a blast. My only regret is that we couldn't stay longer. This will definitely be a go to when we come back to HI.

I highly recommend this appartement. I was travelling with my brother and the bed was comfortable for both of us. We often used the kitchen and had everything we need plus the location was great. Its just a short walk to the main beach. Chico was really helpful with our questions as well.
Great stay for great price!

The room has no window or ventilation, which is a problem for smells and heat. Although there is a fan on the bed (which is dirty). The lock on the unit door was broken even though the bedroom door has a lock. The bathroom was also a bit dirty.

Despite this Chico was nice. He recommended a couple of places to take something, which turned out to be very good

Value for Money accommodation with the hosts (both chico and Bennet) giving you the space to roam in and out of their apartment; but always there if you need them! their wifi is in superb condition (important for me as i need to answer work calls etc), and it is less than 5 mins walk to the bus station for diamond head hike; less than 15 mins walk to the beach and abundance restaurants; grocery store within 5-8 mins walk radius; the apartment lift needs some working though but no fault of theirs; apartment is very clean and bed is comfy - good to accommodate 1-2 pax max! there was sun block provided for by them, which is a delightful surprise; jogging trail along the canal; felt really safe as a solo lady traveler - thanks guys!

Two genuine blokes who are very accomodating to your needs. Loved the location, conveniently located within walking distance to the beach and nearby bus stops. Overall awesome first time airbnb experience that offered everything I could've asked for.
This place is in a great location. Chico wnd Bennett were both super friendly and accomodating.
Chico and Bennett were super friendly and accomodating.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is in a great spot for people who dont want to rent a car. You have the beach and restaurants within walking distance and for everything else there is a busstop close to the apartment and its an about 30 minute ride to honolulu for a 2,50$ fare. There are some small supermarkets near the apartment, bigger ones are unfortunately further out. 
I personally never met chico but he checked in  to see if everything is okay from time to time. Bennett, who lives in the apartment, was easy going and nice.
When we booked the (Website hidden by Airbnb) didnt realize that it has no window or airconditioning, but it has a fan so it didnt get too hot. 
The room has a very comfortable bed and a relatively big closet.
All in all we had a great stay and would recommend it.
A great place to stay for a few days, helped me find a place for my stuff after checkout while we went on a tour!

A student like dig in a fantastic location. The hosts were very laid back and looked out for me. The room was cozy and the apartment had everything you need. The best part was the great location and fantastic value for money.
Was travelling for a conference. Great location in Waikiki close to some amazing restaurants and walkable to the Hawaii conference center. Chico and Bennett are very friendly and accommodating.
ﾎﾉﾙﾙ･ﾋﾞｰﾁに近く､特に立地が最高でした｡
Der Aufenthalt war sehr gut, die Wohnung ist wirklich super gut gelegen. Die Kommunikation hat super funktioniert und das Zimmer würde ich wieder mieten.

The place is perfectly located, in the hearth of Waikiki, it's 5 min walk to the beach.
The room is confortable and quiet. Chico can give you good advice on Honolulu's life.
とにかく場所がとても良く､どこに行くのも便利です｡ｷｯﾁﾝも大体のものが揃っていました｡Wi-Fi環境もとても良く､部屋の広さも1人なら充分です｡ﾀｵﾙも貸してくれます｡隣の部屋に住んでいる方は夜はほとんどいないので気も使わず自由に滞在させて頂きました｡ありがとうございます｡

The first communication for the check-in with Chico was straight to the point, short and kind of unfriendly. He just wants to make sure that no one else becomes aware that he is hosting AirBnB guests. During my stay Chico never approached or talked to me, even when we were both at home. I asked him if he has parking opportunities or at least knows where to park: he blamed me for bad communication and did not care at all. He did not provide towels, so make sure to bring one if you stay here. The most upsetting thing was on the second day, when he asked me if I checked out so he can host another guest. I booked and payd for three nights and did not even think about to leave earlier. The only positive thing about my stay is the location. It is in the middle of Waikiki and everything is in walking distance. 

If you do not care about all the above mentioned issues and just need a bed on Waikiki, you can book here. Next time I would rather spend my money on a hostel where I could get two nights the same amount.

I really enjoyed my stay here. Both Chico and Bennett are very friendly and helpful and the location is really great. It is less than five minutes away from the Waikiki Beach with a couple shops and fast food places in the area. It can get quite warm since there's no window in the room, but overall it's a great place to stay.

Chico & Bennet are a great host. They made sure that I was comfortable and were always concerned about my well being. I would definitely recommend to all my friends and would stay again, if an occasion arises
Chico and his co-host were very kind and friendly. I didn't have any problems during my stay. Also, the location of the flat was quite convenient to reach to the downtown. Recommended!

A perfect place to stay on Waikiki! Close to the beach, shops, restaurant. The Bus can take you every where! Chico&Bennett are very easy going. Definitely will stay here again! There is no AC in the room only a fan. Could be to hot in summer/fall
300m from beach.Easy walk.Close to everything.Right near Food Pantry, great takeaways.Host was great.Was exactly as described.Having a large fridge extra bonus.

You can hardly beat Chico's home location, as it's within walking distance from all interesting spots in Waikiki Beach. Convenient check-in which didn't require the host to be present: very convenient and time-flexible ; same for check-out, so you can easily arrange your schedule and catch your flights or anything. The room has a good size and lots of closet space, with two power outlets located right next to the bed. There was even a EU-US outlet adapter provided! Two clean towels were provided, and a whole set of various cosmetic products like soap, toothpaste etc. Chico is a very friendly guest, he even gave me a list of places to visit in Honolulu, as well as a taste of the special Hawaii pineapple Vodka!

とにかくﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁから近いのが良いという方､朝から夜まで遊ぶから寝る場所があれば完璧という方には良いと思います｡
まずﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ時の説明は詳しくしていただきました｡部屋はｼﾝﾌﾟﾙです｡ｸﾛｰｾﾞｯﾄの大きな棚が旅の荷物を整理する際に使いやすかったです｡滞在中は良い意味でほったらかしなのでﾘﾗｯｸｽできました｡ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ時も丁寧でした｡
As advertised, would stay here again and recommend.
Very nice landlord. Perfect location. Thank you for everything.
Lovely guys... Thank you
Great location, easy-going host and simple but great apartment with ample space. He also responded immediately to any inqueries which was a big plus. Would stay here again!

Chico's accomodation is very good you feel like at your own home.

The room size is good, when i arrived chico have left towels, sheet, and shower product. there is a king size bed, with A/C into the room.

Chico pay attention at everything and he answered at my questions very quickly.

I'll definitely come back there ! I recommand it at 100%

Thanks Chico !

Awesome place. Super close to the beach and the heart of town. Comfortable bed with some great toiletries included. Chico responded very quick to everything and gave me some great food recommendations. Highly recommend this place!! Hope to be back soon
Thanks for hosting us Chico! Even though we never crossed paths, Bennett was great to talk to and checked in with us over our stay. This Airbnb is very centrally located, and the room is as pictured

Good location - very good communication and kind host(s) - I underestimated noise but that is personal ! 
Location: ask roberts or VIP airport transfer to bring you to vive hotel (20USD for back and forth), and one minute walking later you are at Chico's. Close indeed to beach, nightlife, grocery shopping, restaurants ...
Excellent communication before, during and after stay. Keen eye for needs of their guests. Chico does not live in this particular place (Bennett does) but he kindly came by especially to welcome me and make sure I settled in okay - very much appreciated. And in the few minutes we spoke he managed to pass me some good tips and information. Both Bennett and Chico are kind and respectful. They work evenings/nights.
Keep in mind this is a 'bachelor's pad' - clean and functional but not 'homey' - for me this was no problem - but maybe could be for other guests ...  The bathroom could use some TLC, but certainly more than acceptable on all fronts, no hygiene or bug issues in bathroom or kitchen. Kitchen well equipped with toaster, microwave, fridge, stove, pots, pans etc. 
The only downside for me was that I did not manage to sleep (even with earplugs and after living together with 4 people in one room previously). It seems I underestimated the impact of being smack in the centre of waikiki on thanksgiving weekend. I felt there was a lot of noise from traffic, sirens, neighbours on balconies, doors slamming in the hallways (very windy weekend too), and quite some party-people in the street all night, plus water pipes running just next to the bed (rain and/or shower drains from above). That is of course a very personal experience and out of control of the host!
thanks for having me !

The location is great, just blocks from the beach!
Because it is on the backside of Waikiki, it is a little more quiet than the main strip, which is nice.
L endroit est très bien situé et facile d'accès lors de la arrivée. Beynett peut vous donne de très bon conseils.

Wer Sauberkeit sucht, ist hier falsch. 
Chico und Bennet sind super nette und hilfsbereite Menschen. Leider wird bei einem Airbnb nicht die Persönlichkeit bewertet. 
Was Sauberkeit angeht war das Apartment nicht gut. Die Küche und das Bad waren sehr schmutzig, die Böden klebrig. Schlimm war, das die Bettwäsche benutzt schien. (Haare und Flecken waren zu sehen)
Unser Zimmer war sehr klein ohne Fenster nur mit zwei Löchern an den oberen Wänden, keine Privatsphäre. Man hat kein richtiges Bett und schläft auf Matratzen. Wir waren froh als die 4 Nächte vorbei waren! 
Trotzdem legt Chico frische Handtücher, 
Badezimmerartikel , Strandsachen und Reisesachen bereit. Auch die Kommunikation mit Chico war klasse. Die Lage des Apartments ist unschlagbar! Deshalb empfehle ich das Apartment für junge Menschen die keinen hohen Standard erwarten oder Männern die alleine reisen.
My stay was pleasant thanks to Chico and his cohost Bennett!
