Amazing location and clean comfortable stay. The bed was very comfortable and the room is quiet and peaceful.

The place was in the center of everything. Very safe neighborhood and great surroundings restaurants. The beach was basically 2 short blocks over. I only slept in the room because there was so much to do around this spot. I would stay here again.
The host is so thoughtful to offer useful advises for us to visit local places. Thank you for having us in such an amazing place.
ﾎｽﾄの方はとても親切で､安心して過ごすことができました!ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞもこまめに返信してくれるし､最高でした!

Bennett & Chico's place is perfectly located in Waikiki. It's so close to the touristic area where you find a lot of stores, restaurants, shops, parks and beach clubs. At the same time it's on a quiet street where you can have a good resting time. 
It's great value for your money! 
These guys are friendly, communication worked perfectly. They have beach stuff you can use :)
We recommend their place if you’re visiting Waikiki.

Chico and Bennett were very quick to respond! The directions and access yo the keys were very accurate and helpful pictures were provided. I felt like I had the whole place to myself! I only ran into them once! Literally out of the 4 days I was there! If you dont mind the city noise, and want a clean, safe place to stay, this is the one! I traveled alone and it was exactly what I needed. I felt super safe in the apartment and the area. I was out walking around everywhere! The beach, shopping and restaurants were within walking distance! Great value and stay for those on the go like me!
場所がﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁより少し外れているので､静かで快適でした｡すぐ近くにABCﾏｰﾄもあり､ちょっとした買い物にも困ることなく過ごせました｡何よりﾒｯｾｰｼﾞのやり取りをしていたときに､拙い英語の文章にも関わらず､困ったことがあったら何でも言ってね､と気にかけてくれたのが嬉しかったです｡今度はﾍﾞﾗﾍﾞﾗ英語が話せるようになってから来たいです!
Wonderful place to stay! Great location, you can walk to the beach easily. Chico responds very quickly and always cares about us to get the most out of our stay.

This place is very central to the beach and a ton of food options. I walked everywhere from here. Chico was very nice and accommodating when my travel plans changed on me. I would stay here again. Thank you!

This was a great location to stay! There's a decent view from the balcony and you can't beat the location... just a 5-minute walk (or less) from Waikiki beach. Loved staying here and would've stayed longer if possible.
Great stay! And cute spot !

I loved Chico’s place. First time solo female traveler. It was super clean, comfy bed, safe great location. Did not need a car . Everything is walking distance. They were very gracious hosts.  Highly recommend you book with Chico! Thanks

Chicos place was perfect! It’s in the heart of Waikiki - you can walk to the shops, to the beach or to one of the many buses that takes you pretty much anywhere - all within 5 minutes from the space. Fresh towels and sheets were provided. The room was decent size with a big closet. There truly isn’t a need for an a/c in the room! Despite it being in the busy, touristy area I slept great - really comfy bed and I didn’t hear much of the noise in the room. I would definitely stay here again if I’m back in Honolulu! Thanks again for everything guys

Everything was pretty straight forward. You get for what you pay for. Nothing more. Nothing less. Listing is as described. His responses and communication skills were very well. He will check up on you to make sure everything is well and to make sure you are having a good time. 
The only thing I can offer for constructive criticism is cleaner kitchen utensils and maybe a better shower knob. Other than that everything was okay in my book. Especially for the price. 
My favorite thing about this booking was the location. Literally walking distance for everything. 

Thanks Chico.

Chico was very communicative and made it easy for my partner and I to find the place. He checked in on us to make sure everything was okay, and was available to help us if  we needed anything. 

The apartment is just like it appears in the photos: cosy, comfortable, we were able to feel right at home. There was coffee and tea for the mornings and we stored the food that we bought in the fridge (there's a grocery store nearby). Really close to the beach too!
Great hosts, responded to all of my messages within 20 minutes and gave tips on exploring the area! I had a great time in Hawaii and staying here :)
Chico’s place is right in the heart of Waikiki. Perfect for walking anywhere downtown, even to do some of Diamond Head walks. Thanks for the great stay, would definitely stay again.
Chico is a great host , he is very accommodating and responds quickly. Place is very cozy and it’s walkable from near the main Waikiki beach. Thank you Chico had a great time.
The hosts are incredibly friendly. They do everything they can to make you feel the aloha spirit. Highly recommend!
It's super close to everything, you can take the 42 bus straight to pearl harbor.
場所が便利な上にお部屋が綺麗､そしてﾎｽﾄのお二人はとてもいい方でした｡

Perfect spot in Downtown; fairly close to everything you need. This was my first AirBnB experience and I was extremely satisfied with it. Chico made sure at every turn that I was taken care of and that everything was going well. Highly recommend staying here!

I was a little confused at first with the check in instructions, which was probably partly because I was a little tired after a full day out in the sun at the beach. But once I figured that out everything else was smooth sailing. I originally chose to stay at an Airbnb because the price was much better than hotels for the same area and I’m so glad that I did! Chico and Bennett were great hosts who clearly care about making sure their guests have the best possible time during their stay. I would definitely recommend to a friend and would keep it in mind if I’m ever back in Waikiki.

Chico’s place! So close to everything in Waikiki! Very quite and cozy! Place was clean, and cozy! Bedroom was cool and they offered a lot to make you feel at home! Chico & Bennett are amazing host! Was my first time in Hawaii and traveled by myself, and they helped in so many ways to make my stay great! Definitely Recommend staying at their place

It was a great stay..if u looking for a place to stay in waikiki..stop searching!!...just booked it while u (Website hidden by Airbnb) easy to go anywhere..place and bed comfortable..minutes from beach..easy transportation by bus..chico and bennet always make sure i enjoy my stay..and if u like to have privacy..u got it all..it feels like u have ur own place just for u..they busy working..memorable stay and cant wait to come back!!..thx chicco and bennet :)

費用は周辺に比べかなり安いです｡
深夜でも素早い返事をしていただいた頂いたので､安心して泊まれるとお思います｡

Chico is an amazing host! Easy communication, very friendly:) 
The place is located almost in the heart of Waikiki, you can walk anywhere from there.
Solid spot right in the heart of it, no wonder the place books up fast. Very helpful, Thanks!

Pros:
•Walking distance to everything. Including the beach. 
•Privacy. 
•Cozy. You feel like you’re staying at a friends house by the beach. 
•Hosts are kind and accommodating. 

Cons:
•If you can avoid needing a car while staying here do it. The free parking is a crap shot and to pay for parking is a small fortune. 
•No A/C. I guess this is common in Hawaii. 

Overall I had a great stay. I only saw the host once and it was for a short moment. I pretty much had the place to myself the whole time I was there. Would recommend and would come again. Thanks Chico.
Had a nice short stay. Unfortunately had to leave early but Chico was very helpful and friendly!
Great location and communication.
this place was perfect... it is definitely close to everything.  felt like we had the entire place to ourselves.  definitely would come back!

Location can't be beat if you're looking for easy access to Waikiki Beach.  I was at the beach after a few minute walk from the door.  Chico was great at responding to my questions as I was a first time Airbnb'er.  Beach gear, such as beach mat and inflatable, were a nice touch.

It's a great location where is easy to go wikiki beach.
The host is very kind and quick response.
Great hosts

Highly recommend! My first stay with Airbnb. Everything was just perfect! Location is the best, just two minutes walk from the beach, one minute walk from the bus stop,so many stores around and street parking on the near boulevard. About Chico and Bennet you probably will not find better host then them,Chico keeped contact with me all the time and Bennet keeped the apartment clean. They were always available for any questions or suggestions!

Chico was very welcoming and let me know he was happy to answer any questions. Great communication which made it all very easy. The self-check-in is really handy. I would happily stay again. Thank you!!

Cool apartment with a Super easy check-in and out
Great location!
The location is perfect. And the hospitality is around top 1% of all Airbnb's that I ever were at. I really recommend!

Chico and Bennett were so helpful and accommodating during my stay in O’ahu. They offered many tips on places to see in the area. They were also very responsive to any questions I had! Great hosts and a good location!
Close to everything! Great communication!
Nice place. Great location.

ﾜｲｷｷ中心部にあり､とても便利です｡
やや古い建物ではありますが､充分に広く清潔に保たれていると思います｡
ﾎｽﾄのchicoもとても穏やかな人で､こちらのﾌﾟﾗﾝを尊重しつつも､おすすめの場所を教えてくれたり､丁寧な対応をしてくれます｡
perfect stay!

我跟我的朋友在這裡住了7天,這裡的一切都很美好!附近有很多地方可以逛街､吃東西､酒吧等,交通也非常方便!最棒的是海灘就在附近!我們每天都走路過去享受美麗的景色!
房間設備齊全,足夠的浴巾可以使用,也有海灘巾,最棒的是還有一個超大泳圈!和一些海灘上必要的東西!非常貼心!
Chico十分熱情也非常幫助我們,他讓我們認識當地的民情,也推薦我們去看看當地很棒的酒吧!
Bennet也是很貼心的協助我們需要的東西!不常遇到他,住在這邊就像是自己的公寓一樣自在!
We had very awesome time in Hawaii! The location very convenient. near Waikiki beach, we went there everyday!! The room is cozy, n bed is comfortable. I can use my laptop in living room, there have a nice table n sofa. They have a basket, can find many necessary stuff use on beach.
Chico n Bennet are very kind n helpful! I have to said that they give us everything we need!!❤️ I really recommend this apartment. next time come to Hawaii, we’ll back again

Chico was GREAT. Easy to get along with & Super helpful when checking-in. The location is PRIME Location. It is an old building complex with clean grounds and friendly people. Waikiki Beach is about 5 minute walk. ABC store is a few steps away (convenient way to stock-up on water, daily essentials. Restaurants/shopping and bars ALL walking distance!  I did NOT use Lyft during my stay because everything is walking distance. Except for excursions I would make arrangements for that. They will provide keys to the Elevator and room so one can come and go as you like. I was happy they allowed me to use the fridge to store a few cold drinks. They respect privacy and they are also avaible via cell phone (including tex). Host is mostly out working during the day and night. 

Please be aware》Room is big enough for 2 adults no more. You can fit 2 large bags on the floor. It has NO VENTILATION (Extra Warm & Humid) NO windows. Plane room nothing fancy just a bed with a few pillows/closet with a fan. NO mirror or TV. They provided a few towels and iron (I was glad about that)

If you plan to visit the beach, make sure to shower remove all sand and dirt before you walk-in  REMOVE shoes and sandals. :) I had an amazing time in Waikiki! Aloha***

I had a very comfortable stay at Chico’s place. I was out most of the day and used his place to crash at night. Even though it didn’t have AC, there were two fans that were more than enough for me. The place has all the basics, and would definitely stay again. Chico is great with communication and always responsive to messages.
Chico’s place is rustic, but he is charming and the place’s challenges actually become part of the charm of your stay.

This place is a GEM! Chico and Bennett are such warm and welcoming hosts. Place is exactly as described. Very clean and simple place. Perfect for an enjoyable and fun time in Honolulu. One of the absolute BEST Airbnb’s I have stayed at. Thank you again!!! A++++++, kudos to you all!!

Nice quiet cozy place to stay at and save your $$ from going to a Hotel. The proximity to the beach makes it a really good value. It's also a short walk to almost anywhere in the Waikiki area. The host is a nice gentleman and very professional. He gave me good local tips on where to go.
Great location!

Location, location, location in real estate it’s true, also with Airbnb. In the heart of Waikiki. Chico responded quickly the few times we needed to communicate. I have been going to Hawaii for 38 years. I like the low hassle and ease of this location. Nothing fancy, but who needs that. I was outside every waking moment. It worked perfect for me.
I loved staying here! Such a perfect location and a comfortable island feel!
Great location and chill hosts!
Perfect location for spending time in waikiki

ﾋﾞｰﾁがすぐ近くにあり､
お土産もすぐに買えたりと､立地はとにかく便利で最高です｡
ﾚﾋﾞｭｰの通り､ﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽも素早く､丁寧にして下さり､
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝも無事に出来ました｡

日本にも遊びに来たことがあり､
こちらの話も興味を持って聞いてくれるので､
英語でのｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝも取りやすく､
滞在中はとても楽しく過ごすことが出来ました｡
こちらの聞き取りづらい言葉も､嫌な顔1つもせずに聞いてくれるので､安心できます｡
ﾛｰｶﾙなﾚｽﾄﾗﾝや､ﾋﾞｰﾁも教えてもらいました｡
 
ﾊﾜｲへの愛があふれた､
とても楽しく優しいﾎｽﾄさんです｡

海で遊ぶｺﾞｰｸﾞﾙや浮き輪もあるので､
ｱｳﾄﾄﾞｱでのﾊﾞｶﾝｽを中心に楽しみたい人にはとてもｵｽｽﾒです!
Chico’s place is very conveniently located in Waikiki. The room is comfortable and fairly clean. The host Chico response to any messages fairly quickly and was a friendly host
Chico welcomed me with his great hospitality. The place is clean and well located within walking distance to Wikiki beach.
Unbeatable value in perfect location in downtown Waikiki, Chico and Bennett are both friendly hosts who respect your space, thanks again for everything!

ｸﾋｵ通りから少し北に入った辺り､ﾋﾞｰﾁ沿いで言うとﾊｲｱｯﾄﾘｰｼﾞｪﾝｼｰの北方向辺りのｱﾊﾟｰﾄです｡買い物はｲﾝﾀｰﾅｼｮﾅﾙﾏｰｹｯﾄﾌﾟﾚｲｽを始めﾒｼﾞｬｰどころにすぐにｱｸｾｽ出来ますし､ﾋﾞｰﾁも真南に数分歩けば到着するのでとても便利です｡
残念ながらﾎｽﾄのﾁｺさんにはお会い出来ませんでしたが､ﾍﾞﾈｯﾄさんは気が良く優しい方で､良い意味で放置してもらえます｡
3泊の滞在でしたが､あまり顔を合わす機会もなく､ﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞを自由に使わせてもらいました｡
建物が築100年らしく､古いですがﾜｲｷｷは大体のﾎﾃﾙが古いのでさほど気になりません｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝは少し分かりづらいかも知れませんがﾎｽﾄから丁寧に写真含めてｶﾞｲﾀﾞﾝｽがありましたので全く迷いませんでした｡
宿泊費を安く抑えて基本寝るだけの方にはとても良い部屋だと思います｡

Firstly, everyone should visit Hawaii! It’s uniquely beautiful and so different compared with the mainland US. The main selling point of this Airbnb is its prime location near most tourist attractions. It is very convenient, walkable and is close to Waikiki beach, tons of food options, and stores. The room does get a bit warm, it is windowless- but fans help a bit. Cleanliness was fine. I briefly interacted in person with Bennett- he’s a chill guy. I didn’t meet Chico in person, but he was responsive to messages. It really does feel like you have your own apartment for your stay.

ｸﾋｵﾋﾞｰﾁにも近く､立地最高です｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝのやり方が上手く行かなかったけれど受付ｵﾌｨｽの方が優しく教えてくれ無事､中に入ることが出来ました｡お部屋は広くて良かったです｡別室に男性の方も住んでいて､その方はchicoのお友達でとても良い方でした‼︎ chicoも素敵な方で日本が大好きです｡旅行者があまり知らないｵｽｽﾒのﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやﾊﾞｰに連れっていってくれて嬉しかったです‼︎おかげで楽しい旅になりました｡Chico ありがとう｡mahalo★
The apartment is extremely convenient for seeing all of Waikiki and Chico was an excellent host!
It is so easy to get to everywhere in Waikiki from Chico's place. Chico and Bennett were very helpful.

No a/c which is to be expected but keep it in mind when booking. Not the cleanest Airbnb I’ve stayed in, but the hosts were accommodating. I don’t think my sheets were washed.  Only used it to crash at night. I’d rather explore the island during the day.
If you’re looking for a chill clean place this is it. Hosts are friendly and helpful. Location is great, very close to the beach right in Waikiki.
It’s really close to everything! It’s a good place.
Chico and Bernett are friendly and responsible.

Chico and Bennett offer their guest what most can’t in Hawaii!!! A very affordable quite accommodation within blocks to the beach. Chico was very fast in responding to all my questions. Their apartment was well kept and the room is extremely comfortable. They are great guys willing to help out any way they can with your stay. Highly recommended!!!!
Very centrally located! Nice amenities and Chico was very welcoming!
Chico has it down. Well hosted & accmodating. I’ll come back.

Chico and Bennett are very friendly :D 
They are very nice.   

Location is good,room is clean.  

I enjoyed stay room :).

Very nice guys! 
So friendly! 
They leave people alone but also take care. 

And located nearby the beach.  Fantastic! 

I arrived in the night. 
Check in was no problem due to great instruction before (with pictures :) ). 

The only thing which I would mention is, that there is no window in the wall. But for me as I traveled alone, it was great. 

Thank you for everything!

Great communication , easy check in, value for money and fabulous location.  Location was most important for me as I wanted to be able to walk everywhere - and the location could not have been better. Thanks guys =)
En skøn beliggenhed tæt på stranden og midt i byen. Flinke værter.

name: Arc del Triomf - Big double room in authentic flat
summary: Spacious double bedroom in a central, authentic Catalonian apartment located in Arc del Triomf.
space: The room has a double bed, a fan, nightstands, a big wardrobe with mirrored doors, a dressing table and two chairs. The apartment is surrounded by all amenities - bars, restaurants, supermarkets and so on. It is located 7 minute walk from the beautiful Ciutadella Park, 15 minute walk from La Sagrada Familia and  20 minute walk from the beach. Located right next to Nord Station as well as Arc de Triomf station where you can arrive by metro, train or bus.
description: Spacious double bedroom in a central, authentic Catalonian apartment located in Arc del Triomf. The room has a double bed, a fan, nightstands, a big wardrobe with mirrored doors, a dressing table and two chairs. The apartment is surrounded by all amenities - bars, restaurants, supermarkets and so on. It is located 7 minute walk from the beautiful Ciutadella Park, 15 minute walk from La Sagrada Familia and  20 minute walk from the beach. Located right next to Nord Station as well as Arc de Triomf station where you can arrive by metro, train or bus. As well as your private room, you will have access to a shared bathroom and the kitchen. The apartment is surrounded by all amenities - bars, restaurants, supermarkets and so on. It is located 7 minute walk from the beautiful Ciutadella Park, 15 minute walk from La Sagrada Familia and  20 minute walk from the beach. Located right next to Nord Station as well as Arc de Triomf station where you can arrive by metro, train or bus. Please, it is e
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is surrounded by all amenities - bars, restaurants, supermarkets and so on. It is located 7 minute walk from the beautiful Ciutadella Park, 15 minute walk from La Sagrada Familia and  20 minute walk from the beach.
notes: Please, it is extremely important to respect the check out time (11:00 am) since it allows us to organize everything for the following guests :-)
transit: Located right next to Nord Station as well as Arc de Triomf station where you can arrive by metro, train or bus.
access: As well as your private room, you will have access to a shared bathroom and the kitchen.
house_rules: - Respect the silence of the neighbours between 10pm and 8am (22:00-08:00). - Our neighborhood’s peace and safety is extremely important for us, so causing any trouble (noises, pressing neighbors interphones...) will mean being invited to leave the apartment.

reviews.comments: The appartement is perfect for a trip to Barcelona. Great location, quiet area, clean flat, good WiFi and friendly hosts!

We're very thankful to our host for a great hospitality,  amazing cozy room and for a helpful tips about Barcelona. The room has a separated bathroom for guests.The apartment is located in a very comfortable place. You can easily get to every important places by walk and if you need a transport there is a metro,  tram and a bus station nearby. There is a small supermarket in the same building. One of the best Airbnb propositions in Barcelona!

Andrea and Agu's place is very convenient and close to shops, bars and everything you need. It's also located right before the bus terminal which was perfect for us. The room is separated from the rest of the apartment and the place is very quiet, you have access to the kitchen ans the bathroom. The welcoming was very nice and I will think about coming back for sure :)
Muy amables y con muy buena comunicación. Nos sentimos como en casa durante la estancia.

Andrea & Agu were extremely friendly and accommodating for our stay!  Their place was very close to public transportation and centralized for all of the activities we wanted to do.   The space was perfect!  They were always available to answer any questions we had and provided several tips to make our trip more enjoyable.   Highly recommend staying at their place which felt like a home away from home!
Great location and easy to reach, but the appartment is pretty hot if one is used to less temperatures. Andrea and Agu are very friendly and welcoming hosts!
great host! Available day and night to answer questions. Perfect location- metro right outside. would deffo recommend to anyone visiting Barcelona!

Great place! Great location, clean room and bathroom a very fast communication. It was possible to dropp our luggage after check out in Andrea's and Agu' apartment and we really approciate it. Thank you for staying if we will visit Barcelona again we know place where we will stay.
Very lovely appartement, very practical when you are on holiday : quiet place, metro, bus and shop close to the flat and the appartment is near to everything you have to see in Barcelona.

Very kind and helpfull people. Andrea hosted us verry well. The room was clean also the house and the bathroom. The appartment was verry silent by day and by night.  There’s no airconditioning but instead there’s a fan.

Andrea est super et communique super bien. On passé un super moment (un peu court). Délicate attention avec les petit chocolat et bouteille d'eau quand on est arrivé. Pareil pour le café à volonté. Endroit est bien servi et tout prêt du métro et plusieurs petit épicerie ouvert la nuit. Cadre très romantique et propre. Je conseil fortement cette Airbnb.

Thanks a lot Andrea and Agu for a great hosting. Everything was wonderful (room and bath clean, kitchen all equipment you can use, washing machine and etc). Great location, you can easily reach any places of city. There is also bus station (directly to go to for instance Figueres, Costa brava). I really recommend to choose this room everyone. Many thanks from grateful guests Georgia. ❤️
Andrea and Agu have such a wonderful space and we are grateful to have been able to share it. It’s proximity to the centre of Barcelona made exploring really easy.

Muy bien ubicado, con la comodidad del ascensor y muy tranquilo. El cuarto es muy grande, colchón y almohadas comodas. Andrea y Agu son simpatiquisimoss. La cocina se puede usar libremente y eso ayuda a no gastar tanto en almuerzos y cenas en la calle.
Recomiendo 100%. Volvería.
房东很友善,位置很好,离地铁近,很好的一次巴塞罗那之旅
Host greeted us nicely. Location is good.
Andrea was a wonderful host. She was quick to respond to questions and gave great recommendations. The location was great, we were able to walk everywhere.
Excelente ubicación y hospitalidad!
Estupenda ubicación, una habitacion muy buena y cómoda, todo impecable.

Andrea & agu were great hosts, very friendly and helpful. The apartment is situated almost in the center of the city, near arc de triomf subway station. We went almost everywhere by foot (sometimes it was a little taxing but it was worth it). The apartment was clean, quiet and cozy. Great place to stay if someone wants to spend most of time in the city.

The apartment has excellent location, very central, just 2 min. from subway, and walking distance from most tourist attractions.  It is sparkling clean, with all basic amenities like pots and pans, coffee, milk, sugar etc  available in the kitchen for use. Andrea and Agu are extremely warm and helpful, very courteous hosts, and they ensure guests have a great stay at their place. Overall a fantastic stay for us.

We enjoyed staying in Andrea and Agu's apartment for 8 nights. The way the apartment is designed offers privacy, because Andrea and Agu have separate rooms and bathroom for themselves. They share only the kitchen with their guests, but we almost never see them there. They are very nice and quit people. 
The room, the bathroom and the kitchen were clean. 
The hosts were extremely responsive to our requests before we arrived and also during our stay.
The location is absolutely fantastic and  it is within 15-20 minutes walk of many of city's attractions and the beach. All means of transportation (metro, train, city buses and buses going in other cities in Spain) are 1-2 minutes walk. Very easy to reach from the airport by train (45 minutes). 
Thank you so much Andrea and Agu for your kindness.

I really enjoyed my stay in Barcelona and got really lucky to choose the apartment of Andrea and Agu! Its location was perfect - just next to a metro and the main bus station and bus stops, to some nice parks, restaurants, supermarkets, the Gothic quarter and other main attractions. It was very clean and had everything you needed, and for that price! 

Even if the bathroom and kitchen were shared with the other guests, we actually never saw them, so we had all the comfort when we needed it. 

Andrea and Agu were very fast to answer from the very beginning, they shared with us a lot of tips, and were always so positive and nice. The best hosts! (hugs guys) 
Highly recommended :)
Nice people!
Good apartment very close to the metro. The guys have been really nice and the stay was super!

Exactly as Airbnb should be, Andrea and Agu are lovely friendly hosts who are quick and easy to communicate with before and during your stay. Everything was as expected, cleanliness etc, my only issue being personally I'd prefer a harder mattress on the bed as I didn't sleep too well on the softer one. Thank you for hosting us, we enjoyed meeting you and loved the holiday in Barcelona!

Stanza essenziale ma pulitissima e completa di ogni comfort. Nonostante il bagno fosse condiviso con un'altra stanza, lo abbiamo trovato sempre pulito e in ordine. Andre e Agu sono stati gentili e disponibili dal primo all'ultimo momento. Posizione ottima per raggiungere tutti i luoghi di maggiore interesse. Consigliatissimo!

As a business traveller, I enjoyed 4 quiet nights in a simple but very clean bedroom and bathroom. Metrostation right in front of the appartment, 5 min. to placa Catalunya. Perfect price-comfort balance and therefore very recommendable.

The location of this place is great, right next to the underground red line and the Arc de Triomf. The room had nice décor, good storage space etc. Bathroom is shared with a small number of other guests but that was no problem. All in all a very pleasant stay :-)
Good location, comfortable bed, and nice host! Enjoyed my stay here.
Andrea & Agu fueron muy amables. Todo muy bien ! Volveremos a alquilar la habitación :)

Andrew & Agu were fantastic hosts at great value. They offered far beyond what I needed and made me feel very welcome. The room is a short walk from Arc de Triomph which made it very easy to travel around the city. Highly recommended :)

Andrea's and Agu's place is very well located, private and quiet. The bedroom I stayed in was comparatively large and the bed very comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom facilities were very easily shared and there were many amenities.  They are perfect hosts.
Great location, nice room, and Andre and Agu are great hosts! Definitely worth the stay!
Accueil chaleureux, propreté, bon matelas et bonne couette, le lit est un peu petit pour une personne très grande, c'est la seule remarque.

Pros:
Good location - right next to metro and bus station, nice park, shops, restaurants, safe area
Nice hosts - very welcoming

Cons:
Noisey apartment - the walls are paper thin and the apartment overlooks a central courtyard which means that you can hear EVERYTHING!  We had 2 sleepless nights, woken by noise from other guests in the apartment using the kitchen and bathroom as well as neighbours.  This is an unfortunate design fault of the building and quite common in communal blocks in Spain.  If you want to get a good nights sleep I would recommend booking elsewhere.

Shared room is small but very clean. Location is ideal for those visiting the tourist sites around Barcelona, as well as getting to the central train station. There’s also a number of nice cafes right around the flat for breakfast.

Espacio totalmente recomendable sin duda lo consideraré para futuros viajes a Barcelona. De excelente ubicación (solo a pasos del metro) cuenta con habitaciones privadas, muy limpias y una amplia cocina. Los anfitriones son muy simpáticos y atentos, preocupados de todos los detalles. (Dejaron hasta chocolates en la habitación para recibirnos)
Ce fut ma première expérience avec Airbnb et vraiment je fus enchantée par l'accueil d'Andrea & Agu. Je les recommande vivement, tout a été parfait. Et l'emplacement était idéal. Un grand merci !!
Very good location, very clean room, and very nice host.

I had a lovely stay at Andrea & Agu's home. Everything was as described, the check in and check out was easy thanks to them being quick to respond and help, and I felt very welcome and at home in their place. The location is excellent!!! The room and bed are very comfortable, everything was perfectly clean and I appreciated that they provided tea and coffee as well as space in the fridge and cupboards for my personal groceries. Thank you Andrea & Agu for your friendly and warm hospitality, I enjoyed myself very much.

Great value for money. Spent 3 nights there for an amazing price. The room was big with lots of storage and drawers. Lovely comfortable bed and nice bedding. Lovely little touches like chocolates in the room. Fantastic position. 15 mins walk to plaza Catalunya and almost opposite arc de triumph where it was a beautiful walk watching the street entertainers and down to the sea through the park. Metro literally outside too. 
Only downside was the guests that stayed also were very noisy so I guess we were unlucky!

Todo ok 
Gracias..

Very comfortable 
The apartment is very dated esp the 1980s shower. For me the fabulous old tiles and traditional Catalan style were wonderful 
Pleasant host
Definitely stay again
great place to stay in Barcelona! :)

Andrea & Agu were super nice Hosts. They are super friendly and the air bnb room is perfect located. the Metro is right in front of the door you could say (1min walking). eas to reach from the airport. The wall is a little bit thin, so it is possible that you gonna hear some noises from the corridor, but we had no problem. We were even allowed to use their kitchen and cooked there. All told i would recommend them as your air bnb Host ;D

name: Newly Built Detached Apartment.
summary: Our newly built detached apartment, 1 bedroom/1 bathroom,  kitchen, W/D and full refrigerator. Also there is an outside seating area, Koi fish pond with a open Gazebo, and a BBQ for you to use. We do live on the premises, and there will always be someone to help you with anything you may need to make your stay more  enjoyable(URL HIDDEN)Our friendly dogs  will be on the property and will be staying in a separate fence gated area.
description: Our newly built detached apartment, 1 bedroom/1 bathroom,  kitchen, W/D and full refrigerator. Also there is an outside seating area, Koi fish pond with a open Gazebo, and a BBQ for you to use. We do live on the premises, and there will always be someone to help you with anything you may need to make your stay more  enjoyable(URL HIDDEN)Our friendly dogs  will be on the property and will be staying in a separate fence gated area. host.host_about:
Aloha Kakou, 

Thank you for checking my home; My name is Mike, and I've been living in Hawaii for 28 years. 

A little bit about myself: I have a degree in Architecture, and own a construction company. I love building and seeing the smile on people's faces when they see the home of their dreams, it puts a smile in my heart. 

The same happiness I get from building, I get from hosting; I love to meet people from all walks of life learn about their cultures, and see the smile on their face when they arrive in my home.

In my free time I enjoy spending it with my family and friends, having a nice glass of good wine with my loved ones, and taking my dogs out for a swim at the beach on a beautiful sunny day.

Enjoy life to the max when you can.  
 
--Mike

reviews.comments: This is the best airbnb stay ever!  I can't say enough wonderful Mike's place is. Everything in the place is high quality and brand new. This unit has everything to make the stay great and comfortable . Having the washer and dryer is a big plus since we need to wash our wet clothes and towels from the beach every day. We were able to do some light cooking so we didn't have to eat out everyday. The best part of all is the hospitality shown by Mike and his lovely family. We walked into this cozy and beautiful unit feeling at home right away. There was a basket of fruit and goodies along with a bottle of wine on the table for us to enjoy.  Communication was always clear and Mike responded promptly whenever we contacted him. He went above and beyond to make sure our stay at his place is pleasant and comfortable while respecting our privacy. It felt like home while being away from home. Kudos to Mike and family. I highly recommend Mike's place for your stay here. You will love it! Thank you so much for being the best host, Mike.

We loved Mike's place! It was immaculate with upscale amenities like gorgeous bathroom with a washlet (now I want one in my house) and close to all major routs to take us anywhere on the island. Just perfect for a couple like us that wanted a little taste of life on Oahu. Mike made us feel very welcome and comfortable, made suggestions what to see and do and was very responsive to our inquires.

We  have stayed in many rental homes but this one is by far the (Website hidden by Airbnb) brand new studio with everything someone on vacation might need.I'ts very clean.The location is very (Website hidden by Airbnb) about 10-15 min drive from downtown Honolulu.The neighborhood is very safe and quiet.Our host Mike and his family  are wonderful people and they were very helpful.They gave us very good information about the interesting places on the island.They welcomed us like family. We will definitely recommend this place to our friends visiting Oahu.

Mike is such a gracious host. He makes sure that your stay is comfortable and is very welcoming and so kind. His studio is absolutely breath taking. You want for nothing because everything is provided. The studio is fully stocked with amenities. A beautiful fruit and snack basket welcomes you when you arrive and a bottle of wine gives a romantic touch. The washlet toilet was amazing,and the washer dryer was a nice bonus! We felt like we were staying at a 5 star hotel.
The location is central to most places on Oahu, and Mike has a designated parking spot for his Airbnb guest. The neighborhood is quiet and we really enjoyed the comfort and relaxation at Mike's. We will definitely be back!

The place is very lovely with a great view.  It is very upscale and part of the house compound that has recently been built/renovated by the architect/builder/owner.  There are a lot of artisan touches in the bedroom.  There is a koi pond and an day-time table area.  The  place is built as a studio so the bathroom is somewhat open - the walls don't reach the ceiling.  The bed is comfortable and there is a washer/dryer (brand new).  Mike the host and owner is very gracious and left us a bottle of wine and some island munchies and fruit upon arrival.  There is one parking spot next to the house on the sidewalk area - that is Alewa Heights for those who know the area - very tight.

We would definitely stay again.  Very good value for the price.  You do need a car unless you do ironman triathalons and want to like half way up Alewa Heights.

Everything you will need will be ready for you when you arrive. It was just like being home. It is close to Waikiki and other beaches in the East. Locale is close to all major freeways, so we got to see all of the North, East, and Southeast sides of Honolulu in a week. I was sceptical of staying in the same property with the owner, but it turned out awesome. Privacy was there, while help was just a phone call away. Mike is truly a great host and new friend.

Отлично провели время в гостях у Майка и его семьи! Он встретил нас как родственников и старался помочь в любом вопросе. Жильё в отличном состоянии, все новое и хорошего качества, все что нужно для комфортного пребывания есть и даже больше) спасибо Майку, обязательно вернёмся!
Mike was a phenomenal host! Place was excellent. Highly recommend.
Clean and comfortable apartment, a very nice place to stay.

Great stay! You can taste every details from the owner/designer. To make all guest feel home. We transferred from the mainland and this was our first exposure to Hawaii, and our first Airbnb experience. We say this from the heart. 
Amazing place and amazing people.

I really enjoyed my stay at Mike's place. From the minute I arrived, he and his family were in communication with me and super helpful. I was traveling alone for my birthday, and his sons treated me more like family than a guest. They are the sweetest people. The guesthouse is beautiful, clean and has everything you need. It's the perfect amount of space for 1 or 2 people. They built it themselves, and their attention to detail does not go unnoticed. There was even a bottle of wine and a basket of treats waiting when I arrived. I had a parking space and access to the outdoor common areas. My trip to Hawaii was immensely better because of my stay here. You won't be disappointed. =)

Mike's place is gorgeous and spotless, and he's one of the most hospitable, friendly hosts we've ever met. It's close enough to everything in Waikiki without being too busy and is a wonderful quiet place to relax. We wish we had stayed longer than 3 nights!

A clean, cozy, and quiet studio.  Mike and his son greeted us, and made us feel at home.  He did a fantastic job hosting.  Its a convenient place from the city.  I would recommend his place to my friends and others.

Mike's is very clean and tidy, comfortable for one or two people.  Wonderful for a business traveler who does not want to be in the middle of the tourist areas.  Mike and his sons were very helpful and friendly.  I hope to stay there on my next trip to Honolulu.

I wasn't going to write a good review only so we there will only be room for us any time we want to go there BUT that wouldn't be fair to Mike and the rest of you! :)  So.....for us, this was our first BNB stay and we're glad we selected Mike's place.  It was fantastic, roomy, clean, a great location, and Mike was a fantastic host making sure we were happy and knowing if we needed anything he'd be there for us.
Mahalo Mike....we'll be back.
Ron M

We have relatives in Hawaii and come here often. This space was a great value and had everything we needed and more. We especially enjoyed the kitchen and laundry, didn't have time to enjoy the BBQ, lanai and koi pond but it's all there. Located in a true Hawaiian neighborhood and right outside of downtown, it's great for business travelers or vacationers. I recommend a car, the parking is free.

Beautiful, spotless, modern, warm...Mike's place is just wonderful. Talk about paying attention to detail, this place has it all. Best part was the kindness and attentiveness of our host and his family. Definitely plan on returning.

Mike and his sons showed amazing hospitality. They were very quick to respond and super friendly (esp. Caleb being very chivalrous-wink wink Brock). The amenities were great-really nice soaps, thick towels, cleaning supplies, well organized and the awesome washer and dryer. It was nice having a welcome basket with goodies and drinks after arriving after a long flight. Upstairs looked amazing-we didn't get a chance to hang out on the patio. Next time!!! Thanks again.

We stayed in Mike's place during our honey moon trip. Mike and his family made our first airbnb experience INCREDIBLE!  The studio is new, clean and artistic! They provided all the things we needed, from beach towel to shower gel, from first aid box to cleansing detergent,  from laundry to all of cooking tools, and so on.  The queen-size bed was very comfortable. The full view from the balcony was excellent. Every detail makes it home. They also provided the booklets of the tourism guide which is very helpful for us to plan the trip, and Mike's son also suggested us some great local restaurants with reasonable price.  Moreover, they even prepared a bottle of wine for us as a gift for our honey moon! It’s like a dream !!

This is one of the finest airbnb stays
It looks exactly as pictured but even better than expected
The location is easy and far away from the hustle and bustle and perfectly relaxing

Mike's place is our favorite place to stay when we come back to Hawaii. Our second stay there was just as wonderful as the first time.  This home away from home for us.  Mike's place is clean, modern, cozy, and close to all the activities .  It has everything to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable.  We will definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!

This place was fantastic! It was modern, clean, had all the amenities you could think of, and was full of delightful little touches. You will not be disappointed, it felt just like home! The host and his family are incredibly nice and I wish we had had more time to hang out with them during our short trip. They really make you feel like ohana. The location is also good-away from the crowds of Waikiki, but very close to highways that can get you anywhere on the island quickly, which was perfect for us. We will definitely be back if we find ourselves on Oahu again!
Beyond Incredible!!! What an awesome find.  Kalab Mike's son was over the top, and a very helpful host. I look forward to staying there again.

This is a very good place.  It’s clean and well-decorated.  It’s far from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki and yet centrally located enough to be close to most attractions in town.  The host is very hospitable and provides us with more extras than we expected.  If we go back to Honolulu, that’s the place we’d choose next time.
Mike’s place was more outstanding than the Airbnb ad.  His place was beyond amazing from every detail decor to nice amenities.  Most importantly, it felt very comfortable and relaxing at his place.

It was my best experience with Airbnb ever!!!! After this experience I would doubt myself booking hotels in the future..This place is amazingly beautiful, modern, clean, cozy and made with purest love!!! There are so many detail oriented touches that making this place so special! You could tell that Mike is the most caring and kind person by the couple minutes of talking to him! He went above and beyond providing so much extra benefits and tips that made our vacation unforgettable!! His house is so much better then any fancy hotels I’ve been so far!! Highly recommend!!!
Thank you so much Mike!!! 
Mahalo and Aloha!!
Mike was THE best!  Great location, great accommodations & great communications with Mike even recommending local eateries & things to do. Will definitely stay here again if we come back to Honolulu.

ﾚﾝﾀｶｰを借りる人ならmikeの家を強くｵｽｽﾒします!
mikeは少しの日本語なら通じます｡会った瞬間に優しい人だと感じる､そんな方です｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝには門の所で出迎えてくれて部屋のｷｰﾅﾝﾊﾞｰ､ｺﾞﾐの出し方敷地の説明をしてくれます｡そして部屋に案内されると沢山の果物とﾜｲﾝ､日本のﾋﾞｰﾙ､ｼﾞｭｰｽで歓迎してくれます｡日本人が困らないように日本語の本まで用意してありました｡部屋は平屋の一軒家で充分な広さとﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰ､敷地内にいつでも使用可能のﾊﾞｰﾍﾞｷｭｰｾｯﾄがあります｡
すぐ隣にmikeは住んでいますがこちらから要求しない限り話しかけてくることはありません｡私たちにはとても心地よい距離感でした｡日本人には有難いｳｫｼｭﾚｯﾄ付き!新しい洗濯乾燥機もあり多めに服を持って行く心配もありません､水着もすぐに洗えました!なによりも清潔で潔癖症の旦那も文句無しの部屋でした!日本のSECOMみたいにｾｷｭﾘﾃｨがしっかりしていたので一軒家でも心配する事はありません｡困った時は電話をすればすぐに駆けつけてくれます｡
私たちはﾜｲｷｷ内のﾎﾃﾙにも2泊しましたが全然違いました｡ﾜｲｷｷ内はうるさく人の出入りが多く私たちには向かなかった､少し遠くても私たちは必ず次もここを選ぶだろう
mikeに会いにまたHawaiiに来たい｡私たちの様にのんびりしたいなら是非ｵｽｽﾒします｡

This place is perfect! The location is surprisingly central with easy access to the freeways.  The unit is beautiful- very clean and extremely well thought out. The design is functional, convenient, and thoughtful, and every amenity has been thought of, and more.  The best part of our stay was the host family.  We were greeted late at night by Caleb “Sonny” who immediately made us feel welcomed. Mike and Joele are beautiful, generous people who opened their home and their hearts to us.  We left the islands with more Ohana than before.  Hats off to an outstanding experience all around!

Our Airbnb was located in a standalone small house on the owner’s property. We had our private entrance. 

The Airbnb was a large studio with a separate bathroom.

And a kitchen that had a stovetop (no oven or toaster oven). The fridge was full size. There was also a washer and dryer unit. We used this twice and I loved that we could pack less and wash our clothes.

There was a TV and a dresser with lots of bins for “Guest Storage”. We filled these bins during our stay with baby stuff (clothes/diapers/wipes), and Alfy’s stuff.  On the bottom, were bins with extra guest supplies, such as extra blankets/towels and beach towels. There was another small closet by the bathroom with shelves where I put my stuff. There was a small boogie board and I believe an umbrella for the beach. While we didn’t use these things, it was really nice to have them as an option. 

The bathroom was fairly large for the small space. The shower had a rain shower unit, but I would have preferred a regular showerhead. There was a lot of shelf space along the mirror shelf.

When we arrived, we were greeted by the friendly host who showed us where to park our car. He then showed us our Airbnb and how the lock worked. He left out a welcome basket filled with Hawaiian treats like a pineapple, fresh fruits, and local snacks.

There was also cold water and Hawaiian drinks in the fridge, and a bottle of wine! 

We were thrilled that the host went so far out of his way to make our stay enjoyable. I felt like we had Diamond status—no, I felt more like royalty!

I also loved the sliding patio doors and the huge patio off our room. The natural light helped the place feel large, bright, and airy. At any time, we could go outside and enjoy some fresh air and the view!

Also for guest use is a large covered outdoor patio with a koi pond and waterfall, sofa, chairs, and game table. There’s a grill and table/chairs for a family meal. We had dinner there the last evening together and had a wonderful time. The weather was just right, and I loved the sound of the running water.

The hosts were very friendly, and the wife (named Joele), actually babysat our daughter on two separate occasions while we had a couple’s outing at the zipline, and a trip to Kualoa Ranch for the ATV tour. (Of course we paid her for her time). She was a wonderful sitter and my daughter fell in love with her. 

We can't wait to go back to Oahu and would love to stay here again! We made wonderful new friends and had an amazing stay!
Very comfortable, private, great location, great hosts.  Couldn't have asked for more, will definitely be back.

If you want to feel immediately at home when you check into your AirBnb, this is the place! Mike and his family are so nice and will make you feel welcome. The detached studio is immaculate and comfortable and has everything you would need to relax and enjoy your time on Oahu.

If you can believe it,  the accommodations were even better than the photographs. From the moment we arrived, our host Mike was waiting for us at the gate and during the entire stay if there was anything at all we needed or wanted to know we just had to ask. The apartment had everything we could have desired and included a lovely gift basket when we arrived. The amenities were top shelf like the washer and dryer we used after spending a week at the beach and the Japanese toilet that was just plain fun to use (too personal?) By the end of our stay we didn't want to leave and felt like we were part of the family. We'll be back.

Mike’s place is new, beautiful and has great amenities. Mike and his sons are so friendly and helpful, ready to help make your stay more comfortable. The apartment is a truly comfortable space and we also really enjoyed the peaceful patio/lanai area with the BBQ. It really is as nice as the pictures. 

The location was great for us as we were away from the crowds in Waikiki but close enough for easy access to great restaurants and shopping. There’s also easy freeway access. 

Fantastic stay and we would readily stay here again.

Don’t even hesitate when booking this place. Mike’s home is amazing, his hospitality is even better and he and his family thoughtfulness is unmatched. Honored to have connected paths with such great people.

This is a perfect spot to stay for people who want to adventure around Oahu. The location is convenient to get to/from the entire island. The amenities Mike added into the place made it feel quite luxurious and comfortable. We also found the washer and dryer were also quite handy and allowed us to pack much less for our vacation. Mike and his family were very friendly and helpful! I would definitely stay here again.

Absolutely five star. We were so sad to leave Mike’s place as it was too good. Great amenities, everything is labeled, I feel so welcomed! This might actually be the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. What a wonderful welcome to paradise! If I come back to Honolulu again, there is no question I would stay here again. Thanks Mike and your family for your hospitality! Mahalo
Mike is a great host. Staying at his place just made our Hawaii trip the best experience we could've hoped for.

Mike’s guesthouse studio was amazing. It was very stylishly decorated with amazing modern touches. Mike and his family were very thoughtful hosts and left an amazing Hawaiian care package to welcome you to his home. Although we didn’t have a need to use his patio and entertaining area, it looked beautiful. I would not hesitate to stay at Mike’s place again!

Mike's spot is centrally located, and far enough away from downtown so it does feel like a home away from home. Mike is responsive and was always available to us. We had a great BBQ and enjoyed the patio.  The place is clean and I was impressed that the place looked exactly like the pictures. Horrible weather during our stay, but Mike's venue really saved our week.

There are not enough adjectives to describe how nice  Mike and Joele’s place turned out to be! The attention to detail and personal touches stood out and were greatly appreciated. This was our first experience with Airbnb and won’t be our last thanks to our hosts. The location is away from the crowds with easy access to everything including the nightlife. The only downside here is when you have to leave a place as wonderful as this!

Mike was a great host - he greeted us when we arrived, and had a bottle of wine waiting for us. The place was clean, with everything we needed, and in a great location. The outdoor patio area with koi pond was also a great place to relax. Thanks Mike!

Being my first visit in Hawaii, I wanted to feel very homey and comfortable. Mike's guest room was wonderful! I couldn't have picked a better place. It was definitely much more enjoyable than staying in a boring hotel. The guest room is detached so all the privacy is there and it had a pretty dang good view. 

The room is very modern and had all the amenities you need. It even had a bidet! 

I would definitely stay there again. 

Mike is a wonderful host and I would absolutely recommend him to my friends and family.

This place by FAR exceeded any Airbnb rental I’ve ever stayed at in this range - and I’ve stayed at a few. The quarters is very roomy, and includes your own private lanai overlooking Honolulu city lights. First-class huge Kitchenette with full fridge, microwave, 2-burner stove AND washer and dryer with a quiet a/c for your comfort. Plus all the added details - coffee maker, bottle of wine, fresh fruit and treats- the list goes on....

I cannot say enough about the hosts Mike and Joelle. Their hospitality and Aloha beams from the very first moment you meet them. Their attention to detail is why this place feels like home away from home the moment you enter. They also offered their huge bbq lanai and outdoor space if you wanted to entertain just upstairs of your separate quarters - so much Aloha!

You will be truly blessed upon staying here, I certainly was! Mahalo nui Mike & Joelle! A hui hou, til we meet again! ♥️

정말 좋았어요. 업자들이 하는 숙소가 아니라 진짜 그들이 살고있는 예쁜 집이고 완전 독립된 1층 독채를 내어줍니다. 정말 일반 가정집이라 번지수대로 찾아가서 전화하면 마이크가 문을 열어줘요. 그는 따뜻한 아저씨입니다. 연락 정말 잘되고 그와 그의 아들은 매우 친절합니다. 와이파이 빵빵터지고, 따뜻한물 잘나옵니다. 수건 넉넉하고 침구 깨끗해요. 냄비, 후라이팬, 각종 향신료와 조미료 다 있어요. 양은냄비까지 있었어요. 젓가락도 있고요. 너구리 끓여먹었습니다. 
다 갖춰져있어요. 게다가 세탁기와 건조기 냉장고가 LG입니다ㅋㅋ 쉽게 사용할 수 있고 컴팩트한 세재도 비치되어있어요. 정말 요긴하게 썼어요. 벌레하나 없고, 사진에 나와있는 테라스같은곳도 언제든지 사용할 수 있어요. 그들이 바베큐 파티를 하는 것도 봤어요ㅋㅋ 고지대에 위치해서 선셋과 야경이 아주 멋집니다. 렌트카로 자유여행하신다면 망설이지 마세요. 다운타운과 조금 먼 것쯤은 전혀 문제가 되지 않아요. 전 하와이 다시가면 여기갈거에요 또!

A perfect spot to spend a few nights if you don't want to be right in downtown, but still close enough to shops and attractions. Nice views of the city and while the space is small, it had everything we needed for our short stay, including modern facilities and the bed was very comfortable. Mike's family were so welcoming when we arrived, we would highly recommend to friends.

Great place to stay. Located close to Honolulu and the space comes with everything you see in the pictures and more.

Mike and his sons go out of their way to ensure a pleasant visit. They’ve been living in Hawaii for decades so if you’re looking for local spots for food, activities, or scenery, make sure to inquire or open one of the many island travel books they provide in the unit. 

They’re quick to respond and you can really tell that they care about providing a memorable experience for their guests in their mannerisms and interactions with you. Would highly recommend! Thanks Mike!

Mike and his son are wonderful hosts. The space is private, brand new and very well set up. There are useful extras in the kitchen and bathroom and a welcome basket of fruit/ drinks in the fridge. The location is handy for the airport and for exploring the best parts of the island by car. Very quiet. No hesitation recommending.5*.

This place is exactly what is advertised.  I was so impressed on how charming and clean the place looked. Mike thought of everything that one could need on vacation. He was so welcoming at the moment I arrived. He was so though full to show me how everything worked and  emphasized that he was available with a simple phone call. I did not have the need to call him because the place had everything I needed. I was so impressed on how clean the place was.  The neighborhood is quiet and easy to find. Slept like a baby there.  I would definitely book this place again when I return to Hawaii.
Beyond satisfied with this choice. Great extra touches here and there and had all amenities one would need to practically live there. It was convenient to wash our clothes regularly.
This is the best B & B experience thus far.  A+ grade in all areas.,

Mike`s place is wonderful! The location is amazing. we felt so safe at his place and it`s close to the city center. Right when we arrived he warmly welcomed us and we felt at home and taken care of right away! His place is beautiful and we really appreciated how clean it was. There were so many great things about the apartment, but what we appreciated the most was the bed which was the best bed we`ve ever slept on!  Mike had also thought about absolutely everything that we might need which was so sweet and really made our stay super relaxed!  :)
Better then the pictures! I booked Mike’s place for our consultant in hawaii and he requested we book all of his future stays with Mike. Thanks again!!

My parents just loved Mike’s place! 
The location is perfect - away from the crowd but still close enough to everything you need. The place was super clean, new, well equipment and quite.
The best part of their stay was Mike and his kindness. He’s a super host and made my parents experience in Honolulu just perfect! I couldn’t ask more for them :) 
Grazie mille Mike!

Mike’s place is pristine and magical.  A perfect location, and such a wonderful base for fun on Oahu.   Close to everything, but not in the middle of hectic torusistsy Waikiki.  This place deserves more than 5 stars, it’s that good!
Very comfortable stay and great host. The guest house is clean and located in a quiet neighborhood.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay here so much! It was our favorite Airbnb that we've stayed at thus far. The entire place was spotless and had everything we needed. The ability to do laundry was great, as this was the beginning of a 2 week trip. The location was perfect too--nice neighborhood that was close enough to downtown/waikiki but far enough to avoid the traffic. Mike and his family are very kind and we will definitely stay here again the next time we venture out to Oahu!

Mike and his family are the most amazing hosts we‘ve ever had, they are so helpful and hospitable like we’ve never seen before. The apartment was so clean and every detail is made with love. There was a bottle of wine and a fruitbasket in the room, there were also water and soda in the fridge. The garden is just breathtaking with a beautiful lounge and view. Everything your heart desires. If we came back to honolulu, we would definitely go back to this apartment. We had an amazing time here. Thanks a lot guys!
Great place, great view. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks again Mike.

Can't express enough how amazing our experience was. Mike's place is even better in person. One of our favorite Airbnb's to date! Everything was so clean and beautiful and his family were so welcoming. It truly felt like a home away from home. Can't recommend it enough. A must-stay in Oahu.
Mike was so sweet. He met us at the door and gave us a tour! He helped us use his grill and we loved hanging out on the patio space in the evening! Loved every minute

싱크대 문이 고장났다고 수리비 200불 청구했습니다. 우리가 사용할때는 전혀 문제가 없었는데, 부속품이 닳아서 나사 끼워지는 부분이 갈라진건데 우리가 부러뜨렸다고 수리비 청구를 하더군요. 문을 열고 닫고만 했는데 키도 안닿는  높은곳에 붙어 있는 스텐레스를 부러뜨렸다는게 말이 안되고, 
위치도 다운타운에서 멀고, 주차도 편하지는 않았습니다.
원룸 형태 방에 화장실은 천장이 뚫려서 소리가 밖으로 굉장히 크게 들려서 민망합니다.
그래도 별탈없이 지내고 왔다고 생각했는데, 수리비 청구를 하니 어이가 없었습니다. 에어비앤비 자주 이용하는데, 나올땐 무조 사진 다 찍어서 나오는걸 추천합니다

Host requested repair cost. But we didnt do that. 
So I contacted to airbnb. 
I hope no one will be treated unfairly.

Beautiful studio apartment in a prime location with breath taking views. Mike is an incredible host, we can't find the right words to do him justice. The accommodations are perfect for relaxing and keeping organized, plenty of space. Best accommodations we've ever had thru Airbnb.

Beautiful home away from home. It was as beautiful as shown on the pictures and sparkling clean. Mike thought of everything you could need - there was even a fruit and sweet basket and a bottle of wine and also a few drinks in the refrigerator.
Simply perfect!

If you have ever wondered where to find paradise, it's right here. We have been to all sorts of different countries and places to stay, but Mikes place was the best we have been to by far. Even though our stay was only for a week, it showed us the true meaning of paradise with a huge sense of ohana because you will feel like home and enjoy Mikes great hospitality. The details: Very clean with timeless furniture, brand new washer and dryer as well as a huge fridge, AC and toaster. Toilet from the future, rain shower and amenities like in a 5 star hotel. Very comfortable bed, big enough for two. The balcony between 5:30 PM and 6:30 PM is your private sunset spot to enjoy some wine etc. A big mahalo to Mike and your family. You're awesome people! A hui hou!

This place is absolutely awesome! Super clean, great location and amazing communication with the hosts. Mike’s family is easy to talk to and they are more than welcome to help in any way they can. 

We definitely will try to come back!
Mahalo!
Mike and his family are great people! Very friendly, and helpful ! You will want for nothing !

Mikes place is just as great as it sounds. The location was awesome for all of our activities all over the island. His wife greeted us when we first arrived and they had a great gift basket for us also. My girlfriend and I had a wonderful time and would definitely stay her again should we end up in O’ahu again!

Mike was a wonderful host. As soon as we got there I felt like home. 

Free parking
Warm Welcome
Quiet Area 
Incredibly lovely studio with brand new appliances and even a smart toilet ! 
Really close from Down Town
Mike and his family provide great pieces of advice.
Private balcony.

They also allow you to use their outdoor living room which has a view on Honolulu's sunset. 

You will not regret a second booking with Mike. 

Thank you for your hospitality my friend.

Mike’s place deserves 6 stars!!!

The pictures don’t do it justice. It’s very clean with lovely little touches (for example he had plants in the guesthouse that I thought looked real... my bf later informed me they were real) :-) We were in Hawaii to celebrate my bday and he had a sweet welcome gift for me. 

Communication with Mike beforehand was great. He always got back to me promptly. When we were there I also had a few more questions and he answered usually within minutes, and always happy to help.

Mike is such a warm & welcoming host, I cannot say enough wonderful things about him and the guesthouse. 

I would recommend this Airbnb to all my friends & family without hesitation. Well maybe a little hesitation because once the word gets out on how great this place is, I hope we can still get reservations when we return ;)

I cannot write enough about our experience.  The attention to detail was outstanding.  The pictures don't do this place and the host justice.  Our trip was a 20 out 10!  It felt like home and I can't wait to come back.  Mike you and your family are rare gems of the world.  Thank you for making our experience in paradise our best trip yet.

We arrived in late but Mike was able to accommodate our check in.  The place was exactly as described. Very well thought out and sparkling clean.  Also a welcome basket of local fruits and snacks was a welcome added touch.

Mike and his boys are very accommodating and willing to offer local tips and places to eat and see.  First time to Hawaii and will definitely be going back and staying at this bnb in the future.

Great spot. Has everything you need. Close to everything and far enough from the tourist clutter. Mike and his family were very welcoming and made sure we were comfortable. Will stay here again next time we’re on the island.
Beautiful guest house with tasteful decor, a large balcony, and many useful amenities.

My boyfriend and I had an amazing stay at Mike’s place. Mike reaches out to us before our arrival to the island and welcomed us with open arms when we arrived. Mike’s beautiful home is centrally located to everything we did. The parking spot was essential to our stay. The guest house is sparkly clean and has everything we needed. We enjoyed watching the sunset from the balcony. Mike also provided us a gift basket that was very nice. I can’t say enough nice things about Mike’s place. He is a great host and is host like Mike that’s makes a great Airbnb experience. Definitely coming back next time we visit the island.

This was our second opportunity staying at Mike's studio apartment and it was as excellent as the first time.  We were excited to stay at Mike's place again.  Mike enthusiastically welcomed us back and re-familiarized us to everything the place had to offer.

We love Mike's place.  Other than its beautiful design, the location in the Alewa Heights neighborhood is ideally situated for us as it is barely a five minute drive for visiting family in my old neighborhood down the road.  It is clean, bright, perfect in size for a couple or single person.   

All that you need to get started is there in the form of the gift basket with a mixture of healthy fruits as well as some sweet snacks.  The fridge has canned local drinks and bottles of water.  The kitchen, bathroom are thoughtfully stocked with all the amenities.  Even a full size washer/dryer are provided.  The place just feels complete.

Thank you, Mike!

This was our first experience using air bnb, and I am SO happy we found Mike’s place. He was so welcoming and friendly and his space is absolutely beautiful. Everything was spotless and he made sure we were always stocked up on everything. He also gave us suggestions on some places to check out as it had been a while since either of us traveled to Oahu. Please don’t hesitate on booking this amazing place! We had an amazing time this past week and we are hoping to come back next year! 

Mahalo to Mike and family! We hope to see you again soon!

This guest house is STUNNING! Everything is new and top notch! The location is great we felt very safe the entire time. Mike is an incredible host and even better guy. Truly a servants heart. We highly recommend this place to anyone looking on Oahu. Will be staying here again!

Mike's place was beyond our expectations. The place looks identical to the photos here on airbnb. Everything is so new and modern and Mike makes sure to put extra little touches on everything in the guest house. Luckily the guests before us left early, so Mike was able to get us checked in earlier. This was very much appreciated because we were pretty tired from our plane ride in. Mike walked us through and had wine, a basket of fruit and snacks and water and drinks in the fridge. It is very rare that you encounter such a great host that provides you with these extra things, it was really nice! Mike also has beach towels and beach accessories, so you don't have to worry about bringing those items with you, or worry about going out to buy some. There is also shampoo, conditioner and body wash available, and a hair dryer too! The neighborhood is quiet, so if you are going to Hawaii to relax then this is the place to book. The parking spot in front of the main house is a bit small, so make sure you rent a compact car and you'll be just fine. We had a tiny Corolla and we fit with even some space to spare. I am already ready to visit the Island again and will definitely be looking to see if Mike's place is available to stay. Thanks for everything again Mike! Your home is amazing!

We stayed 3 nights in Mikes great and cozy place. 
It was amazing and we will definitely come back to Mikes place.
Thanks for all!

Mike’s place was incredible! One of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve had. The studio was large, open and clean. It provided everything we needed including laundry, a full sized fridge, stove top, all the bathroom amenities you could want as well as beach towels, an umbrella, and a fantastic private balcony for lounging on at the end of each day. Mike also has a huge, beautiful outdoor living area with a grill and TV that he offered for us to use as well (shown in the listing photos) we were out most of the days so we didn’t get a chance to use it, but it’s a fantastic space. The bed was very comfortable and the air conditioning was great after a long warm day of hiking. Mike and his son were easily accessible and responsive but the apartment was very private. Highly recommended! The location is in a neighborhood near some great inexpensive, authentic restaurants and it is easy to access downtown, Waikiki, and the coasts while avoiding a lot of the traffic. Don’t hesitate!
Mike’s place was a great place to stay in Honolulu. It was cozy, clean and very comfortable.  I enjoyed doing my morning yoga in the lovely common area outside our unit.
Very nice, well-equipped studio with a beautiful view.

Mike’s place is truly a home away from home. We searched many Airbnb properties across the island, and this place was the best balance of location, amenities, privacy, and comfort. Upon arriving, we parked in our own dedicated parking spot, which was provided to use during our stay. We were greeted by Mike, and he gave us a tour of his beautiful property.  Inside the place was a gift basket with local fruits, and a bottle of wine! There was an in-unit washer and dryer which allowed us to pack much lighter, and the kitchen/fridge was a nice touch as well. Can't wait to stay here again!

Quel accueil chaleureux chez Mike! Il était présent pour nous accueillir à notre arrivée et nous montrer le studio, très sympathique. Nous avons apprécié le panier de fruits laissé à notre attention, ainsi qu'une bonne bouteille de vin. Des bouteilles d'eau et de jus étaient au frigo, ainsi que quelques condiments de base pour cuisiner. La propreté était impeccable, et le logement tout à fait conforme aux photos de l'annonce. On voit que Mike a le soucis du détail et nous n'avons manqué de rien : serviettes, serviettes de plages, 2 formats d'oreiller au choix, vaisselle, ustensiles, contenants pour les lunchs etc. Bien que la cuisine n'ait pas de four, le BBQ a été très utile. Nous avons bien aimé profiter de l'espace extérieur pour écouter la télé un peu le soir, ou relaxer en prenant un verre sous le gazebo. Bien que la résidence principale soit tout juste à côté avec ses occupants, nous avons vraiment eu un sentiment d'intimité dans notre espace. 

Côté emplacement, nous avons aimé être près de la ville! C'est très bien positionné pour visiter, à environ 15 à 30 minutes en auto de la plus part des visites que nous avons faites (Kailua Beach, Diamond Head, Waikiki, Hanauma bay, Pearl Harbor et de nombreuses randonnées) et environ 1 heure du North Shore et de la charmante ville d'Haleiwa.  Le quartier en lui même est résidentiel et perché dans la colline, mais à deux pas de la ville et des autoroutes. Les maisons y sont parfois en mauvais état, et d'autres très belles comme celle de Mike, mais en tout temps nous  nous sommes sentis en sécurité dans ce secteur, les résident y sont très tranquilles. On a vraiment trouvé nécessaire d'avoir une auto et d'avoir accès au GPS/réseau cellulaire pour s'orienter dans le quartier et dans la ville.  Il faut aussi prendre en compte des heures de pointe et de savoir les éviter pour traverser Honolulu via la H1, car le trafic peut être dense à certaines heures! (direction Est le matin, et direct Ouest le soir, souvent en sens contraire de nos plans heureusement.) Finalement si vous pensez cuisiner, il y a une épicerie Times tout près qui est très pratique, mais un peu chère. Ça vaut la peine de se rendre au Walmart pour débuter la semaine. 

Au final, un gros coup de coeur pour Oahu et pour notre séjour chez Mike, un voyage vraiment mémorable!

reviews.comments: Verry good place, good bed , good explainations , we appreciated swiming and jaccuzi after whole day discoverring Sydney, more for young people , so Nice thanks we recommand this place verry cheap and good.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place is not too far from Sydney CBD, about 20 minutes walk to central station and $13 one way uber ride. Bus ride to CBD was about $3.80. Air conditioning in the room does not really cool the room properly. It was more like a fan. 

The building and location was pretty safe. There is a GoGet Pod right in front of the building which is very convenient if you use GoGet. David, the host, was also a very nice and helpful.

Overall it was a pretty good place if you're looking for a budget accomodation. Can't really complain for the price.

Good location, 10 minutes walk to the closest buses. This is in a good neighborhood and we felt safe walking in the streets at night. It's close to the airport too, shops and services are all nearby.

Hosts were friendly, quiet, and left us to do our own thing, which we all appreciate in a share apartment, and were very happy to help if we had any questions or needed anything. Definitely recommend and there is a host of amenities available if required. 

Not sure how well the air conditioner works, we used it for heating and it seemed to do the trick, even though we couldn't feel any air pressure. 

Shower and bathroom are both clean and good. 

We definitely recommend these hosts.

If you are passing buy or a backpacker this is ideal for you! Located in walking distance of 20 mins or less to everything ( MTR, temple market, mongkok market, ladies market etc.) Plenty of expensive and inexpensive options in shopping and eating. If you are looking for a cheaper homey stay this may not be for you. The space is small not suitable for lots of luggage. Lighting is minimal as well as shelf space. anything you take out will have to go right back in the suitcase. Noise levels you can hear everything almost outside and in the rooms next to you. People are pretty respectful but if your looking for quiet this place might not be for you. Keep the fan or ac on all times if you don't everything will become damp. Overall great stay for the active person who really needs just a place to crash.
房子离地铁站不会很远 按房东提供的信息或者导航都能找到 去哪里都算是方便 也有巴士站 到的时候虽然出了点小状况但是房东很快解决 因为住的是无窗 可能会有点阴湿 房间和预期一样 也不会很小 干净整洁 浴室有备拖鞋 一次性牙刷不是每天都有 由于不是靠马路 所以没有觉得很吵闹 晚上睡觉还是安静的 房东很好 晚上12点了还回答我们的疑问  总之 性价比是ok的

O anfitrião é uma pessoa extremamente acessível e não demorou para responder minhas mensagens. Existem mercados e restaurantes próximos ao local. Altamente recomendado e voltarei a utilizar o local em uma próxima oportunidade.

Eu me hospedaria novamente com ctz.

Rafa foi muito simpático e atencioso, estava fora do Brasil mas deu todo o suporte necessário, eram duas amigas suíças que iam chegar ao Rio antes do horário do check in, como o apê estava vazio, o Rafa muito solicito permitiu a entrada das meninas um pouco antes do horário. Elas amaram a hospedagem e o apê. Rafa muito obrigada por tudo

Super atento Rafa, desde el momento cero que lo contactamos estuvo predispuesto a ayudarnos. Al llegar allá el departamento estaba tal cual las fotos, super limpio y ordenado. El edificio es super seguro y los porteros son super amigables. Ante cualquier duda sobre qué lugares visitar o qué hacer en Rio, Rafa siempre nos dio una mano, muy útiles recomendaciones. Muchas gracias, estoy muy conforme y espero volver pronto a esta hermosa ciudad y alojarme en tu hogar!
