Excelente estadía, Rafa es súper atento al igual que los de seguridad del edificio.
Muy buena ubicación,limpieza,wifi,presión de agua,seguridad....
De volver a Río lo haría acá mismo.
Muchas gracias
Recomento muito a estadia no apartamento! O Rafa é extremamente atencioso, super disponível para ajudar em tudo que precisei!
Muy recomendable. Muchas gracias
Rafa atento a contestar cualquier duda, departamento bien equipado, buena ubicación cercano a playas, locales. Todo muy bien

We had a great stay at Raffa‘s apartment. It is very safe. No one who doesn’t live there can enter the building. Very clean and Raffa replied very fast when we had a question.I would book it again! Thank you!!!

O apartamento possui uma ótima localização, fica a duas quadras da praia. Tem portaria 24h o que ajuda muito. Achei que a cozinha e o quarto menor pareceram meio improvisados. Sendo uma cidade muito quente faltou ar condicionado para ter uma noite tranquila no quarto menor. Para quem não necessita muito o apartamento é ótimo!
Хорошее расположение, просторная квартира. Недалеко от пляжа. Отличный горячий душ, рядом супермаркет. Немного шумновато по вечерам. Все что нужно для жизни.
Departamento a dos cuadras de Copacabana, cerca de tiendas, restaurante, supermercado, etc

El apartamento está muy bien localizado, es muy seguro y los vigilantes son muy amigables. Rafa es un gran host, muy accesible, siempre pendiente de nuestras necesidades y en continuo contacto. El apartamento necesita mantenimiento, hay bichos y debajo hay un bar que provoca mucho ruido.
Apartamento muy completo, ordenado y limpio. Cerca de la playa y estación del Metro. Estoy muy satisfecho.

Rafa was a wonderful host! Rafa is very communicative, friendly and kind. Upon accepting your booking until your departure, Rafa communicates swiftly via messaging to all messages. He left a welcoming gift; when anything occurred in the building he urgently acted to ensure nothing affecites us as guests and he was friendly through all messaging interactions. The apartment is a little smaller and receives less natural light than the than images display; however this is space a cozy space. Very close to the beach, stores, bars, restaurants, transportation and the building is very easy for you and Uber's to find. I recommend anyone to stay at this awesome home and with this great host. 

Rafa foi um anfitrião ótimo. Ele é útil amigável, gentil e responsivo. Ele responde a todas as mensagens muito rapidamente da reserva de aceitação à sua partida. Quando você chega na casa, têm um presente para você. Qualquer coisa que ocorreu no edifício, ele assegurou que não afetou a sua estadia como um hóspede e manteve-me aconselhado o tempo todo. O apê é mais pequeno e não recebe luz natural como assim as fotos mas o espaço é bem confortável. A casa fica pertinho muitos lojas, restaurantes, bares, a praia e paradas dos ônibus e o metro. O efici
Nice and clean flat. We really had a good time there thanks to Rafa.
Todo bárbaro con el apartamento, estuve un mes trabajando, es súper funcional para trabajar y hacer turismo. Muy recomendable.

Les amis Rafael a été un hôte fantastique il a était toujours réactif... mon vol a eu 24 h de retard et Rafael a offert une nuit supplémentaire pour compenser la perte! Un geste très généreux. Super quartier proche de la plage et de tous les commerces restaurant bons et à tous les prix!!! Top......

Amigos Rafel foi um super amfitriao! Meu voo atrasou 24h! Ele nos deu uma diária de presente pra compensar a perca !! Que gesto generoso foi aquilo!! O ape fica perto de todas as comodidades...
ótimo espaço, Rafa um querido e prestativo anfitrião! um lugar pra deixar na lista quando estiver no Rio. recomendadísdimo!!!

El Depto de Rafa y su atención es todo lo que está bien ! Ubicación estratégica INMEJORABLE! Súper cerca de la playa, de la calle con bares súper buena onda en Copa y del shopping Rio Sul, la estadía perfecta. Tiene lavarropas, tostadora, licuadora, ventiladores, aire y la ropa de blanco IMPECABLE ✨muy recomendable si tu plan es PLAYA,BARES y SHOPPING cerca! Gracias!
Un apartamento cómodo, muy bien ubicado y excelente, seguro
Respuesta rapida, buena ubicacion, relacion costo beneficio buena

Apartamento ubicado muy cerca de la Playa de Copacabana, con farmacias y mercados en la misma cuadra.
El apartamento cuenta con todo lo necesario, cómodas camas, aire acondicionado, refrigerador, entre otros.
El host tiene muy buena disposición a aclarar dudas u orientación.

Tivemos uma excelente estadia no apartamento, que é muito bem localizado, com mercado, farmácia, padaria e restaurantes na mesma rua, e a apenas duas quadras da praia. O Rafa foi bastante atencioso e respondeu a todas as dúvidas. Recomendo!

We arrived at Rio and our other host had to cancel. We quickly had to make a decision and looked for other options. Rafa answered very quickly and despite it was last minute, he made sure to have the place ready! 

Rafa is always attentive and has great communication. 

The place is perfect! It has everything needed! We even made dinner at home using the stove. 

You’re super close to Copacabana beach! Literally two blocks away! You have a pharmacy and a grocery shop on the same block. 

I strongly recommend staying here! Place is secure and only access to it is passing a security guard 


Lastly, we forgot some of our things, and he made sure to let us know and will have them ready for us to pick up before heading back!

He’s a super host! ⭐️
Rafa is very kind and responds quickly. The apartment is in a great location with really nice doormen! Thank you Rafa !!
Excelente ubicacion. Si bien es un monoambiente dividido en 2 habitaciones es cómodo con todos lo necesario para una buena estadía.
Rafa is very kind and always there to offer help.
Rafa was a great host!  I booked at the last minute and everything was ready when I arrived.  Clean, no frills, close to everything.

El apartamento tiene una excelente ubicación, muy cerca al metro y estaciones de bus para ir a los puntos más turísticos o ir a la playa. Tiene mucho comercio cerca. El apartamento cuenta con todos los implementos para una buena estancia. El anfitrión muy amable. 100% recomendado.

name: Ocean front in Makaha
summary: COMPLETELY REFURBISHED UNIT WITH SOUND OF SURF AND TURQUOISE WATER! Please stay at this place if you want to get away from Waikiki city life and go to the open NONCROWDED beaches of Makaha.   This side of the island has pristine and non-crowded beaches.  The area definitely has a country farm feel with local Hawaiians.   You can read my reviews where guests have loved my hospitality and recommendations.  Plus my place is ocean front with always nice views of the water.
space: The space is a very nice 1 bedroom completely refurbished in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) with ocean views.  If you are expecting a hotel room, then Waikiki is best for you.  However, if you want to live in with the locals and visit beautiful beaches with relatively few people, then stay in Makaha. New in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) mbs high speed wifi and cable TV.

Please stay at this place if you want to get away from Waikiki city life and go to the open NONCROWDED beaches of Makaha.   This side of the island has pristine and non-crowded beaches.  The area definitely has a country farm feel with local Hawaiians.   You can read my reviews where guests have loved my hospitality and recommendations. New in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) mbs high speed wifi and cable TV. When I am in the area, I can show you my favorite beach, my favorite rock to  climb, my favorite place to see turtle, my favorite place to eat poke, m
neighborhood_overview: Local Hawaiians live in the complex so please be respectful as you would live back home.
interaction: When I am in the area, I can show you my favorite beach, my favorite rock to  climb, my favorite place to see turtle, my favorite place to eat poke, my favorite place to eat breakfast, my favorite place to snorkel, my favorite...

host.host_about: I'm cool.  Your taking care of my place allows me to go to the North for fun and camping.

reviews.comments: Location is perfect for west side sunsets on the beach. The condo is very basic, but clean and neat. Minimal furniture and kitchen equipment. Bathroom was clean and the shower was hot and powerful. There is traffic noise in the bedroom during the day. The communal pool and hot tub were clean and refreshing! Highly recommend for basic oceanfront condo life.

Stay here if you want to feel like you're in the locals part of town! Not a place for commercialism and tourism but a real taste of life in Hawaii. We loved every minute of our stay and the oceanfront views were beyond anything we could've imagined. Fil is a great host and went above and beyond to help us despite being overseas at the time. 10/10 would stay here again!

This review is actually for Fil's place in Waikiki... This is my forth time staying with him and it's just the greatest. He's very accommodating, informative and easy going. 10/10 I will always stay with Fil when I visit the islands!
Nice area, just a bit far from Honolulu. Very local so you will find that native Hawaiian means
Fil is one of the nicest fellows you will ever meet.  The stay is always enjoyable and he is very helpful and generous.  I've stated with Fil now three times and I will be back.

I chose this place because it was right next to the beach. However, the ocean it was next to was full of trash and it was a good 15 minute walk to a cleaner part of the ocean. 

The area where this condo is located was also undesirable, there was trash all along the streets. As a tourist I would not stay in this area again. To get to better beaches it's about a 15 minute drive north.

The check in process was not as easy as other AirBnBs. I met Fil across the street, and he said we had to go with him to get a day parking pass. According to him, each day we would need to get a pass. However, after speaking with the attendant, she gave us a week parking pass. To be fair, Fil was not rude, he was actually very courteous and patient.
The place was great. Fil was very accommodating and super helpful. Can't wait to go back!
Ful is the greatest host. Very helpful and accommodating. I stay at his places all the time.
Great Host,Very knowledgeable about the island.
Fil is very accomodating and had good suggestions for breakfast. Ko Olina had a nice sushi restaurant.

Fil is a great host!  From check-in to check-out.  He provided us with some great suggestions, from places to hike, eat, best places to spot sea turtles!  Everything was truly amazing!  Our stay was very special and we thank Fil.  We will most definitely be staying with Fil in the future!
Fil is an amazing host, great suggestions of things to do and places to eat. If you wan a real "live as the locals" vacation, this is the place for you.

Fil was AWESOME. He was so nice and hospitable and brought us over anything we needed whenever we needed it. He brought us out for breakfast and coffee before taking us to the airport (he offered!!) The condo was a nice size for the area and well kept. Very small issues like a leaky A/C unit, but when we told him, he said he would fix it right away because he was very caring and so nice! We would recommend staying here 10/10. Would stay again! Thanks fil!

First of, awesome host. Fil is very knowledgeable about the island. He offered us thorough recommendations of eateries and activities along with hidden gems of the island. Secondly, the place is located across the ocean where you have the chance to wake up and hear the waves and feel the gust from the beaches. It’s also situated near many valleys across the coast. The valleys for me were the highlights in Makaha. The place had enough amenities for our temporary home away from home.

Overall it was a disappointing experience for me. I never had to leave an Airbnb and cancel my stay prior to Fil's place. I know it's a preference and some might be ok staying there. But I have booked cleaner, more comfortable places in Ohau for less. Overall the value for the price in my case kept me question why I booked this place.

We do love hikes, sports, ocean and we wanted to stay away from busy Honolulu, so that was the place! We traveled everywhere through a day and came back basically to sleep to our apartment. I was able to cook breakfast, local farmers marker nearby, best veggies, fruots, eggs. It was very quiet at nights, safe parking for our rental car, very local hawaian place!!! And Fil was the best host ever!!!!

First, a big thanks to Fil for doing everything he could to make us feel at home.  Location is very west side of Island, call it quieter than normal for activities.  There are beach areas near the condo but not right there, though there is a small protected area to swim and play in the water.  But size was perfect for us for this vacation, exactly what we ordered.  He has AC and if you are a mainlander who is visiting and not used to the humidity and heat, well, you are gonna want to turn it on a bit and take advantage of the pool.  He has fridge and cooking and kitchen should you need it.

So, if you are looking for a big hotel and room service feel, this is NOT for you.  You want clean place to stay, Fil will take care of you.  He had some fantastic suggestions on "to do's" and where to eats!
Fil is an AMAZING host! He is extremely knowledgeable about the island and gave great recommendations on places to go, things to see, food to eat, etc.
J'ai passé une nuit dans l'autre logement de Fil pour découvrir une autre partie de l'île. Comme d'habitude : au top !
房東Fil會推薦很多地方和餐廳,而且都很出色,聽他說的不會後悔!

I don't even know where to begin.... The condo has one of the best views you could ask for!! The view alone made it extremely difficult to leave! We loved listening to the ocean waves! The property has a security check point when entering the parking garage so I felt safe leaving my rental car at night. It's relatively quiet on the property and the only noise comes from the maintenance crew in the mornings (8am-9am). The property is very well maintained! Hardly anyone used the pool or jacuzzi but it was very clean. There are picnic tables near the pool if you'd like to enjoy a meal outside. Beyond the locked gates, you can access the beach. There's an outdoor shower near the pool so you can wash off after the beach.  There's also a laundry room on the main level near the property entrance. 
The condo unit was very clean and has basically everything you need. Fil was kind enough to buy a couple of food items for us. We don't drink but there were several bottle of beers in the fridge, which would make for a very nice welcome to those who do.  Fil went above and beyond to make our stay very comfortable. Before our trip, I asked if there might be a shower chair for my elderly mother and he graciously provided one for her use.  
The beds were very comfortable, the bathroom was well stocked and the living room was spacious for us two.  Not gonna lie, it was pretty humid for this mainland girl but the box fan saved me!! 
If given the chance, I would stay here again in a heartbeat!!

The place was AMAZING !!!! I was returning home for a wedding and I did not want to be in Waikiki cause of the congestion so Fils place was awesome to enjoy the ocean view , beautiful beaches , and also the amazing people in the area . We had trouble with our flight ,and rental so we were a bit agitated, but Fils was there close to midnight to greet us and then help to ease the stress and help finding other solutions for our rental, he even offered to take us to the place,but everything was squared away, but Fils place makes you enjoy what REAL Hawaii is about and what her beauty holds in her environment and natives. Fils place was vacation and beach ready (shaka), we barely needed anything from the stores . Fils place was amazing !!!
Shoots braddah Fil(shaka)

As others have said Fil's tips are great, embrace his advice and you will find some great hidden areas that you would never find looking on the internet. Be sure to spend some time at the lagoon, if you stay to the left hand side (near the breakwater) it tends to be only 3-5 feet deep. Go north a few miles and you will find some awesome waves to play in, but be sure you are a good swimmer. Down south of the property about 5 miles you will find some great beaches to see the sunset. The only thing I would be somewhat critical of is that the condo can be warm (this is likely just me, I like to sleep cold) but if you open all the windows you can sometimes get a great breeze though the whole condo. I was able to sleep quite well regardless :)

Fil is amazing and his reviews and suggestions were so helpful. He took my associate out for dinner the first night and went above and beyond. You could not ask for a better host! The only down sides were no air conditioning and the location was hard to get to from time to time. However I feel that because of Fils customer service it made the stay that much better!

Fil was an amazing host. he provided us with many local places to visit and we avoided all the touristy locations. Fils place is perfect for couples looking to get away from the busy are of Waikiki. One of the most reasonably priced ocean front condos in Oahu. The kitchen was stocked with all amenities we needed and there were enough towels for us to use at the condo and the beach. close enough to some amazing restaurants  and a drug store open late where we found almost everything we needed during our stay.

Fils apartment is perfect! He has everything you could need from snorkeling gear to broom and dustpan,pots and pans, you name it. I felt very welcomed and at home. The balcony gives you amazing views of the ocean while 180 degrees in the bedroom view you have the lush green mountains. Fil was thoughtful and gracious and I will definitely be staying again in future visits! Thank you so much for everything!
Nice place, would definitely return. Fil was super polite and helpful

name: Nice Private Room: GREAT Location!
summary: Private room available in a 3 bedroom apartment. Located 3 blocks from Grand Central. Easy access to many forms of transportation. Completely safe area. 3 floor walk up. Friendly environment. Very sweet cat lives here that you will most likely fall in love with :)
space: Experience New York in the center of Manhattan.  Take the subway, a quick cab, or even walk to many close destinations!  We are close to the Empire State Building, Grand Central, Times Square, and many other places. Shared apartment- 3 bedrooms total 3 floor walk up  1 bathroom Large living room with cable TV  Kitchen (available for guests to use) 2 roommates (one of them is me :))  My cat, Meesh - she’s the best cat and loves everyone.  Includes:  Wifi Towels Sheets/Pillows/Blankets  Keys for you to come and go as you please  Full size bed-converts to a couch and comes with a temperpedic memory foam on top so it's super comfy. I look forward to meeting you!  Emily
description: Private room available in a 3 bedroom apartment. Located 3 blocks from Grand Central. Easy access to many forms of transportation. Completely safe area. 3 floor walk up. Friendly environment. Very sweet cat lives here that you will most likely fall in love with :) Experience New York in the center of Manhattan.  Take the subway, a quick cab, or even walk to many close destinations!  We are close to the Empire State Building, Grand Central, Times Square, and many other places. Shared apartment- 3 bedrooms total 3 floor walk up  1 bathroom Large living room with cable TV  Kitchen (available for guests to use) 2 roommates (one of them is me :))  My cat, Meesh - she’s the best cat and loves everyone.  Includes:  Wifi Towels Sheets/Pillows/Blankets  Keys for you to come and go as you please  Full size bed-converts to a couch and comes with a temperpedic memory foam on top so it's super comfy. I look forward to meeting you!  Emily Guests have access to all the common space areas :) Always av
neighborhood_overview: Many cute bars along the next avenue that are fun in the evenings. Great restaurants, a diner thats open 24 hours, awesome bagel place (my favorite), several local and commercial coffee shops, and a drop off wash and fold laundry place.
notes: Sweet cat lives here. She loves everyone :)
transit: Closest subways station is Grand Central (4, 5, 6, 7 and S (shuttle to Times Square). You can also walk to Times Square in 15 minutes - trains there are 1, 2, 3, N, Q, R, W, 7, S, A, C, E. Other close stop is Bryant Park - B, D, F, M (about a 8 min walk from the apartment).
access: Guests have access to all the common space areas :)
interaction: Always available via text/email (and in person when I'm home! :)) to help answer questions about sight seeing, directions, help to and from the airport etc
house_rules: Check in time varies on my schedule! Check out time is 11am. If you need to leave your luggage, it can be arranged with us before your check out day.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Singer/Songwriter. Easy going :)

reviews.comments: Emily is very friendly and nice! Answers my concerns really fast. The place is nice and clean, GREAT location, easy access to everything.

Awesome location, Emily leaves wonderful chocolates for you too. Shower has awesome water pressure, but bed I slept in wasn't the most, but worked for one night. Emily provides keys to  let you come and go as you please

Me and my parents had great time at Emily's place. The house has a fantastic location, and Emily was a great host. It was easy to communicate and the house was fully equipped. The room can be a little bit tight for three people, but the location and good vibe in the house makes it up.
Hope to stay again!

Très bonne expérience de louer chambre chez Emily ! On était 3 amis venus pour visiter New York pendant quelques jours et l'appartement est bien placé et calme. Emily et sa colocataire Louisa ont tout fait pour rendre notre séjour agréable même si on ne les a pas beaucoup vu.

Very good experience renting a room at Emily's place ! We were 3 friends visiting New York for a few days and the apartment is very well located and quiet. Emily and her roommate Louisa made our stay really good even if we did not see them a lot.

New York is an expensive city and if you want to stay in a good location in Manhattan, you have to spend money. Based on this, I would say that this location is great cause it's worth the money you spend. Well connected (5 minutes walking from Grand Central), big enough for 2 persons, clean.
Restaurants and shops 24/7 close to the flat and the neighboorhood looks safe (but I would say the same for almost all Manhattan, there's always people around :))
 The bathroom is ok even if has to be shared between more people. The building is old and there's no elevator, the stairway are noisy :-). You are provided with lines and towel. The living room and the kitchen are useful (but honestly I never cooked!). 

When me and my collegue were there, there was a friend of Emily. He's been friendly and helpful and we felt like we stayed in our home. Emily even if abroad often checked to see if everything was ok, it has been really appreciated.

We had some trouble with the WiFi connection (dropping each 5 minutes) but hard rebooting the router fix it (I only did it last day!!!), anyhow it was not a big issue and it's not depending on Emily :)

Some suggestions:

1) some additional hanger in the room for the towels
2) fix the door locker :)

Overall I would suggest this place to stay in New York, Emily is a great host!

J’ai vraiment apprécié le contact avec Emily qui m’a tout de suite mise en confiance pour ma première location avec Airbnb. La chambre était parfaite; propre, confortable et tranquille. Ma fille et moi avons très bien dormi. L’appartement est accueillant et le quartier est sécuritaire. J’ai vraiment eu une excellente expérience. Emily était en voyage pendant mon séjour mais son ami Michael a été un hôte super sympathique et très disponible. Je recommande cette chambre sans hésitation. Merci beaucoup Emily et Michael. / I really appreciated the contact with Emily who immediately put me at ease for my first vacation with Airbnb. The room was perfect; clean, comfortable and quiet. My daughter and I slept very well. The apartment is welcoming and the neighborhood is safe. I really had a great experience. Emily was traveling during my stay but her friend Michael was a very friendly and available host. I would recommend this room without hesitation. Thank you very much Emily and Michael.

It was our first airbnb experience. We (two students) spend in NY 6 days. Room which we rent is very comfortable for two people, bigger than it appears on photos. Bed is okey. Emily is very friendly host. Almost all the time she wasn't at home. So we could use the living room and the kitchen every time we need. It's great! There is one more room for rent in the apartment, however during our stay it wasn't occupied. Towels and bedsheets are provided. 

The only thing that made us feel a little bit uncomfortable is a sink which was full of dirty dishes and the lack of free space in the fridge. 

The apartment is located near the Grand Central station. It's convenient, if you want to use the subway. Because there are two express trains that stop on this station (number 5 or 4 - green line). 

Don't be afraid of the railway station! The area around the house is very safe, clean and quite. There are a lot of restaurants and shops. And the bus stop of New Airport Express (that can take you to and from JFK airport) for 16$ is very close (on 41 East St). 

Thank you, Emily, for making us feel as at home! We definitely recommend this place to stay NYC. 

Wish you the best,
Inga & Anna

It was my first time using Airbnb and I could not have picked a better place. It's a great location and everything you could need is a few steps away. I was greeted by Luiza on my first day, she showed me my room and the keys. I liked the note (and chocolates!) that were left on the fireplace, it had great tips on where to go. The air conditioning was great to have when it was super hot in the city.

The room was as pictured. The bathroom was great, the shower had good pressure and the water was hot. Didn't use the kitchen much and the living room was nice to retreat to after being out all day.

Emily is a great host responding to any questions I had.

Emily was so incredibly sweet. She helped us with our luggage and showed us where everything was in her house, and she included a list of restaurant recommendations in our room. There were even chocolates on the bed! :) The location was PERFECT. It was within walking distance to several attractions, as well as the subway system. I was very pleased with our experience here!

Our stay in Emily's place was great! 
The room was great and also the rest of the house! 
It has a very good location, you can walk to Times Square in a couple of minutes or to the grand central terminal that will take you everywhere! 
We spent short time at home but Emily was very kind and nice! 
If I go back to New York I would stay there again!!!

The apartment was in  a great location. The room is basic but manages to have a lot of privacy because it is tucked away in the apartment away from the kitchen/ living room.

Emily and Luiza were awesome hosts. They gave great suggestions about where to go and were friendly and interesting to talk to. 

Thank you for a great stay!

Although it had to be delayed due to room owner being out, check-in was overall fine. bathroom time was difficult in the morning and neither of us could shower because of it. I think adding a mirror to the room would significantly increase the value of the space.

Emily is a warm and welcoming host and I felt at home right away. The apartment is in a fabulous location and super convenient to transport and other facilities. I would happily stay with Emily again.

I and my wife picked this apartment for 2 days when we visit NYC. 
Emily is very nice and ready to help. The apartment is close to a few good restaurant and subway station. By half hour, we can get to a lot great places. We are satisfied with our experience in this place.

What a find for the money! Emily is a great host--very approachable, sweet, helpful and responsive--and the location could hardly be improved on. (A few blocks from the ever-handy Grand Central Terminal.) The place is clean and quiet. Though we shared a bathroom, it was hardly ever occupied when we needed it. Not much kitchen space, but we could easily have breakfast, etc., and go on our way in the morning. I'd happily stay there upon a return visit.
Emily is a great host. She was flexible with the check in time, and very friendly.  Location is also great.

First of all- this place is in the perfect location! We walked all over the city from here. Great starting point.
Emily and Luiza were great! Super friendly and laid back, offered suggestions on place to go and eat. The apartment was clean and the room was a great size for two people! If I go back to NYC, I'd try and stay here again!
Appartement très bien situé et bien équipé, lit confortable !

Emily was very welcoming.  She is very open if you have any questions or concerns.  She was very friendly and provided some great locations to check out around the city.

I spent most of my time outside of the apartment and really only came back to shower and sleep.  The bathroom was very clean and looks great, and the room had a great sized comfortable place to sleep as well as air conditioning during some really hot days!  Life saver!

Thank you Emily for a great stay!

Emily was very nice and friendly, we felt very welcome at her place. There was no problem when we arrived very late due to our lost luggage. She also left us to have our privacy. The room was exactly what we expected and it was also clean. The neighbourhood is very nice, we also felt safe at all times. It is very close to all main tourist attractions. If we decided to visit NY again we would be happy to stay with Emily again.

Emily was great toward us and the room was as expected from the pictures and clean. We didn't see Emily a lot during our stay but she was very helpful, she answered every questions and was very acomodating about the check-in and out. The place is great to visit NY, quiet enough.
Hey :) das Vermietete Zimmer war groß sauber und mit liebe hergerichtet. Die Lage ist echt Top

I did not know emily but her roommate luisa. she has been very nice when we arrived immediately giving us some useful information in addition to those that we have asked of us. 
it was very pleasant to talk with her. the house is in a great location, close to metro and restaurants and nightlife. the room is spacious and the house pretty.
excellent communication, the signs were very clear and there was no problem for checkin and checkout.thank luisa.

Just as advertized!  They get the Airbnb concept; a chance to meet people from other places and share life experience.  It was a delight  to sit together, share some food and also get the local info I needed about returning to the airport.

100% cotton sheets and a comfortable pillow combine with a clean bathroom to round out top ratings from me.  Thank You!

la descripción del anuncio era fiel a la realidad, las anfitrionas eran muy amables y te hacían sentir como en casa, muy educadas siempre dispuestas a ayudar y orientar. La ubicación era excelente, con muchos medios de transporte alrededor ademas de lugares para comer.
Nice experience. Recommended if you are flexible guests and need a pied-à-terre in Midtown.
Emily and Luiza were great hosts!!! The apartment is really well-located and the bedroom is cozy. Thanks for the stay.

Emily was great! She was very welcoming and sweet, she even placed chocolate hearts on the bed for us!
The room was just as advertised, nice and comfy bed, big closet, extra pillows and blankets and AC. We were very happy with the place, but what we loved the most was the location, it was really close to everything we needed.

The room is, as described, in a great location for a New York sight seeing trip. Most things to see are within walking distance. The room was clean and a good size it is a little noisy thought. Emily was a nice host and always had recommandations for us when we needed them.
Emily and Luiza were great hosts, making sure I felt comfortable and their place is clean, spacious and amazingly located. Would highly recommend

Emily and Luiza were so great! Really welcoming and made me feel at home. The location of the flat is perfect, within 10-15 mins of grand central, empire state, rockafella and times square. Really comfy bed and great size room. Couldn't recommend this place enough for your stay in New York. Would definitely stay here again, thanks Emily and Luiza!!!

First time I've used AirBnB and I am a convert - My stay with Emily and Luiza was pretty awesome made even more so by the girls local knowledge and them being the perfect hosts, always on hand in person or on the phone - got to see some sights such as Brooklyn I may not of otherwise. 

The room and their apartment is really well located in the city with just minutes walk to Grand Central meaning you are able to get pretty much anywhere in Manhattan.

The room itself was great, comfortable and had everything I needed for my stay. Was nice having a lounge area in the apartment to relax in too after a hard day sight seeing :-)

I can't recommend enough. If you want to shut yourself off after a day in the city then you can but the hosts are a great fun and happy to give ideas about what you should be doing next - if I'm back in NYC soon id definitely use again :-)
Emily and Luiza were very nice and accommodating. The location is fantastic. I would definitely stay here again.

Emily and Luiza's place is nice, spacious and spotless.  A nice large room for a NYC apt. I actually live close by and know the city well.  The location is close Grand Central so it puts you near all the subway connections you need.  My hosts were very nice , and I would certainly recommend staying there to anyone.  Great price too.

It was first time to visit in NY 
I really appreciate to Emily and Luiza
Bed was comfortable and room was speacious. They allowed to leaving our luggage untill departure time.
So we could have perfect trip 
Thank you so much!!
Hosts were great, got us settled and then we saw New York..Bed was very Comfy..will go there again.

Emily replied my e-mails really fast and was a verykind person!! The room was clean and cozy. Especially the location was very convinient to do anything! I really recommend their room to anyone who is planning to stay in NY Manhattan.

I stayed there in Christmas season. Emily and Luiza are nice, kind and lovely. Their house was also good and convenient to go anywhere cause close to Grand Central station. It is a strong point. However, there is only one small weakness that is no elevator and lots of stairs. If you have a lot of luggage, it will be a weakness to you. Apart from that, everything is excellent. In addition, if I go to  NY again, I will book Emily and Luiza's house again too. 

p.s: I think there are lots of nice house in NY but a few nice host. I was lucky to meet them.

I really lucked out with not only the room but also the hosts. The room is HUGE, the bathroom is nice, and the apartment cannot be in a better location. Also, Emily and Luiza are both very warm and welcoming. 

I would absolutely recommend their place!
Great host and the apartment is in a great part of town.  Emily and Molly were both very friendly and helpful.
Great host, great place (huge room, with a nice-sized desk for those who might need to do some work), and great location!
Emily is an outstanding hostess - quick to reply and extraordinarily nice. Her apartment is conveniently located and very homey. I was hesitant to do a “Private Room”, but Emily has sold me on it.
Excellent host, also her roomate. Great apt, very close to 5th av, Gran Central, Morgan Library and a lot of different places in midtown.
Outstanding place and host! Room is very big and comfortable, and roommates are very friendly and nice.  Overall very homey and welcoming place would recommend!
Staying at Emily’s was perfect. It’s a real nice place and a stellar location.

Emily’s place is just as described.  It was conveniently located near Grand Central Station and the Grand Hyatt where my Conference was being hosted.  It is a very spacious room with AC, a desk, side table, comfy bed and a area to hang/unpack clothes.  She also gave me soon great information of places to go, and a great music spot I’ll remember for my next visit.  Would happily stay here again on my next visit.

It was really great staying at Emily's place. The place is just 5 mins walk from 42nd grand central station, which makes it super convenient. She is very responsive and the place is very clean. She has one of the cutest cat in the world, named Meesh (Hopefully I spelled it right). Overall, it was an amazing trip, thanks Emily :)

This was only my second time at an AirBnb, the first having been something of a disaster, so I came into this with trepidation -- needlessly, it turned out. Emily's place is great: clean, plenty of space, everything you need, excellent location. Perhaps more importantly, Emily is a lovely person and made me feel at home. And perhaps even more importantly, her cat is a lovely cat :)

name: Les portes jaunes
summary: Belle grande maison sur 2 étages, avec jardin et terrasse. Au cœur du Plateau mais très calme. 2200 pieds carrés, 3 chambres fermées, cuisinière et barbecue au gaz, stationnement privé. Beaucoup de charme! Great house on 2 floors, with garden and terrace. Right in the Plateau's heart, but very quiet. 2200 square feet, gaz stove and bbq, private parking. Lots of charm!
description: Belle grande maison sur 2 étages, avec jardin et terrasse. Au cœur du Plateau mais très calme. 2200 pieds carrés, 3 chambres fermées, cuisinière et barbecue au gaz, stationnement privé. Beaucoup de charme! Great house on 2 floors, with garden and terrace. Right in the Plateau's heart, but very quiet. 2200 square feet, gaz stove and bbq, private parking. Lots of charm!

reviews.comments: Great location. Lovely house. Bigger than it looks in the pictures. Dog friendly. Would definitely recommend it.

Gorgeous home even better in person. The private parking spot is tight as we rented a van. Street parking is annoying as there's restrictions. We got two parking tickets! 
Great city with lots of parks, bakeries, markets and restaurants. Short walk to subway. Can't wait to visit again
Cette maison a beaucoup de charme. Idéalement située, elle permet de profiter des attraits du plateau tout en étant très au calme.

While Jean-Francois was out of the country during our stay, he had gone out of his way to make our experience a pleasure. This included lots of information and personal suggestions for dining and sight seeing as well as an excellent customer service including his friend who welcomed us upon our arrival. 
The appartement was very beautiful, comfortable and welcoming! We were on our business trip and this appartement, with a terrace and a charming small garden, made us feel like on holidays after long days of work. We would definitely recommend staying here!

Appartements extraordinaire. Bien situé. ( Restaurant, bar, piste cyclable) 
Parking sur place.

We loved Jean-François's place. It was comfortable and close to everything. However, there was construction that started really early in the morning, around 7am in the morning! The construction noice woke us up and unfortunately was disruptive. Apart from the construction noise, the house was great and felt like home.

Jean-François' place was delightful. It is a beautiful, two level home in charming neighborhood if Montreal. The home is clean, comfortable, and well furnished. 
The off street parking is tight. We were renting a Nissan Rouge, and it fit, but I don't think a larger vehicle would fit. This was fine because once we parked, we walked everywhere and the vehicle didn't move. 
We had a great stay and are already talking about coming back.
Its a beautiful house. Lovingly decorated. Jean-Francois was easy to get ahold of and kept in touch with us. Great location with easy walk to bars, restaurants, and shops.

Loved everything about this place, from the high ceilings, great kitchen, backyard patio, abundance of rooms to relax and recharge, this place was everything I hoped for. Central to most of Montreal, there is no trouble finding what you need from markets, coffee, parks, nightlife, and everything in between. I truly enjoyed my stay here.

Jean-Francois out of town during our stay but provided tons of information and recommendations for our weekend in advance and we had no problem checking in late on our first night. This house is incredibly beautiful and spacious! There is so much to love - the art, the library upstairs, the kitchen, patio and garden which we got to take advantage of with the fantastic weather during our stay. There was tons of room for our group of 3 couples to enjoy and recharge after wedding festivities for our friends downtown. Anything you need is walking distance. Would highly recommend this place and would consider staying here again with my friends!

Great location in Mont Royal neighborhood and 5 min walk to Metro which we used every day.  Lots of restaurants nearby and coffee shop directly across the street. The house has excellent air conditioning and the TV is large and new.  The beds were comfortable. There is  a lovely patio out back where we ate a couple of times. There is a pretty park a short walk away.

name: DIAMOND ON DIAMOND HEAD
summary: My apartment is close to WAIKIKI BEACH, KAPIOLANI PARK, HONOLULU ZOO, HONOLULU AQUARIUM... You’ll love my beautiful apartment because of LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION !!  THE MOST COMFY BED EVER....WALKING DISTANCE TO BEACH AND NOT IN THE CRAZY WAIKIKI AREA BUT FANTASTIC RESIDENTIAL AREA. I put a special attention on having my bed spray each month for bugs and also the full apartment. It is very important for me to offer a super clean, comfy , secure apartment to my guests.
space: OUR BEAUTIFUL CONDO IS VERY CLEAN & CONFORTABLE. YOU WILL HAVE ACCESS TO A OUTSIDE AREA WITH A TABLE TO TAKE YOUR COFFE , HAVING LUNCH AND ENJOY THE BEAUTIFUL VIEWS OF HONOLULU Our mattress is the best ever mattress, so confortable !! with massage control, feet up/down, head up/down and luxury linens.

neighborhood_overview: OUR NEIGHBORHOOD IS NOT A TOURIST AREA BUT A UPSCALE RESIDENTIAL AREA
notes: OUR NEIGHBORHOOD IS A VERY CLAM AREA AND WE WANT TO KEEP OUR NEIGHBORHOOD VERY CALM -EXTRA FEE FOR PARTY WILL BE CHARGE FOR $500 - EXTRA FEE FOR $450 IF POLICE IS CALL
transit: 200' FROM PUBLIC TRANSPORT, RESTAURANT, WALKING DISTANCE TO WAIKIKI BEACH, PARK... VERY EASY ACCESS TO FREEWAY....
access: YOU WILL BE ABLE TO PARK IN THE DRIVEWAY NOT ON THE STREET, VERY EASY ACCESS AT ANY TIME

reviews.comments: Great place! Roger greeted us when we arrived and Corinne was extremely responsive and accommodating. Would definitely stay again!

This apt., is a very nice place to spend a few restful days on the island. Roger, the cat is always on guard and sees all. 
The hostess is outgoing, friendly and goes out of her way to be helpful. We would definely stay there again.
Nice clean quite place!

This place is perfect for someone to get a good nights rest and be bright eyed in the AM. The beach is a 15 minute drive and it's beautiful. Quiet neighborhood,  so respect that for sure. Not a party place, which is good for us! Kitchen for cooking and a comfy bed.. lots of tv choices and privacy. The hosts were so good to us, it couldn't have been more perfect! Thank you so much for a great stay.. we will be back!
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Wakiki is a great place to visit but not everybody wants to stay there. Elizabeth’s place is in is a quiet neighborhood Walkable to Waikiki. As for myself prefer not to pay for parking there.
This is a one bedroom apartmentWith a small kitchen, best for one or two people. The place is immaculately clean and nicely decorated.
Elisabeth attentive responsive to her guest.

What an amazing stay! My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon and we loved it. Elisabeth was lovley to deal with, very accommodating and friendly. It felt like we had a piece of home in Hawaii. Close enough to everything you could want, close to bus services, coffee shops ect and a stunning view of diamond head and the honolulu sky line. The house was beautiful and clean with homely touches all around. Would 100% recommend to anybody if you are thinking of staying here, do it! Totally affordable and totally worth it. Would definitely stay again. Thanks Elisabeth!
Good location, nice clean place.

The location of this apartment is excellent. Easy to walk to Diamond Head for a hike, many local eating places nearby, both on Waikiki and less touristy places. 

The apartment is lovely, plenty of space with a living room, kitchen, bedroom, walk-in closet. The bed is super comfy.

The owner was very prompt and easy to communicate with, even extended the check-out time an extra hour for us. 

The only minus of this apartment is that rather than feeling like its own private residence, you end up feeling like you are sharing a room in the owner's house. They were quite loud and boisterous, and it was difficult to relax and/or sleep in our room after a long day of hiking. Even with earplugs, we could still hear them. Feels like they are in the next room... with the door open.

Make sure you have them go through the unit with you and show you what they want you to clean or else they will try and charge extra and it's not pet friendly when they want to charge extra for dog hair

name: Bondi Beach Pad
summary: Super bright & super handy. This great pad has all the comforts within just a few short steps to the beach & to shops and transport. The large balcony has views of the ocean and even glimpses of the city skyline. What we love about our place is its eclectic style and huge breezy balcony plus the way the apartment stays so cool even on the hottest days.  It’s really just a stones throw from the beach and to the shops but still quiet enough to enjoy some privacy.
space: Our place is spotless with the freshest of linen for every bed!! White fluffy towels and the best Smart TV ever with YouTube and internet.  There are plenty of kid friendly toys & games plus books as well.
description: Super bright & super handy. This great pad has all the comforts within just a few short steps to the beach & to shops and transport. The large balcony has views of the ocean and even glimpses of the city skyline. What we love about our place is its eclectic style and huge breezy balcony plus the way the apartment stays so cool even on the hottest days.  It’s really just a stones throw from the beach and to the shops but still quiet enough to enjoy some privacy. Our place is spotless with the freshest of linen for every bed!! White fluffy towels and the best Smart TV ever with YouTube and internet.  There are plenty of kid friendly toys & games plus books as well. Common areas out the front of the apartment and the balcony You can call me anytime and I am happy to give tips on all things fun, social and foody. As much or as little engagement as you wish The beach is literally a stones throw as are the shops & buses, with the main bus terminal 30 metres away. Buses from here take you to
neighborhood_overview: The beach is literally a stones throw as are the shops & buses, with the main bus terminal 30 metres away. Buses from here take you to the city & beyond, door to door
transit: Parking at the front of my garage numbered 4.
access: Common areas out the front of the apartment and the balcony
interaction: You can call me anytime and I am happy to give tips on all things fun, social and foody. As much or as little engagement as you wish
house_rules: Please no noise after 10pm. Treat the apartment the way you would your own home because its our home too.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I`m a foody & love a beer.  We`ve lived in Switzerland for a long time so speak English & some German/Swiss German.  We are beach goers & go nearly every day.  We especially love collecting & catching sea creatures (we let them go) & like ball games too.  We are easy going & believe in enjoying the moment !

reviews.comments: Spacious accommodations in a perfect location to get to know Bondi. Would be thrilled to stay here again.
Great location, family friendly

name: Sandstone Cottage, Great Mackerel Beach
summary: This sandstone cottage is one of the original cottages on Mackerel Beach. Set on the absolute beach front, North East facing and receiving sun all day long, this gorgeous property has a main house and separate studio with 3 bedrooms comfortably accommodating 8 people. It is just 10 metres from the water and 60 minutes from Sydney CBD.
space: The house has a prime beach front location and is situated on a double section enjoying uninterrupted views of the Pittwater, Lion Island, Barrenjoey Heads and Palm Beach. The main bedroom is the house has a queen size bed and large window that looks out over Pittwater - you go to sleep listening to the waves of the ocean and wake up to the most spectacular sunrises over Barrenjoey Heads. There is also a bunk room with 2 sets of bunks which is perfect for the kids (and even the adults). The Tree House, which is a separate studio from the main house, has a queen bed, single bed, its own bathroom and sliding doors onto a private balcony. The house is perfect for 2 families or a group of friends.  The kitchen, dining and living room is open plan, opening out onto the deck which has sweeping views of Pittwater and beyond. The kitchen features concrete bench tops, wooden cupboards and a large double sink. It is fully equipped with all the appliances and utensils you would need during your s
description: This sandstone cottage is one of the original cottages on Mackerel Beach. Set on the absolute beach front, North East facing and receiving sun all day long, this gorgeous property has a main house and separate studio with 3 bedrooms comfortably accommodating 8 people. It is just 10 metres from the water and 60 minutes from Sydney CBD. The house has a prime beach front location and is situated on a double section enjoying uninterrupted views of the Pittwater, Lion Island, Barrenjoey Heads and Palm Beach. The main bedroom is the house has a queen size bed and large window that looks out over Pittwater - you go to sleep listening to the waves of the ocean and wake up to the most spectacular sunrises over Barrenjoey Heads. There is also a bunk room with 2 sets of bunks which is perfect for the kids (and even the adults). The Tree House, which is a separate studio from the main house, has a queen bed, single bed, its own bathroom and sliding doors onto a private balcony. The house is perfec
notes: There are no shops on Mackerel Beach so you will need to bring up your own food and beverages. As noted above, there are pantry goods like oils, condiments, salt, pepper, tea and coffee which you are welcome to use.  All sheets and bath towels are provided for your stay.  Unfortunately no cats are to be bought onto Mackerel Beach and if you wish to bring your dog, it must be secured within the property on a lead at ALL times. The dog can be exercised off lead on the Northern end of the beach before 9am and after 5pm.  The house is run off water tanks, so it would be great if you can use the water sparingly. We would appreciate you using the black tub in the sink to rinse your dishes and then throwing it on the plants when it gets full.
transit: You will need to catch the ferry or book a water taxi/ barge in order to get across to Mackerel Beach.  The ferry leaves on the hour from Palm Beach Wharf on Barrenjoey Rd, returning on the half an hour from Mackerel. Check the timetable as the occasional ferry goes direct to Mackerel, rather than via Coasters, the Basin etc...  To order a water taxi call the number listed in the information sheet that we will send to you. Bookings are essential ahead of time. You will want to bring your walking shoes as there are some divine bush walks through the national park and down the valley.
access: You will have complete access to all areas of the house and should you have any issues we are always a phone call away.  All sheets and towels are provided, plus pantry goods like oils, condiments, salt, pepper, tea and coffee.
interaction: We do not live on Mackerel Beach but are only a phone call away should you need anything.

host.host_about: When we discovered Mackeral we couldn’t believe that such a beautiful and secluded spot could exist within an hours drive from central Sydney. Claudia and I instantly fell in love with Mackeral and over the years have introduced many friends to this piece of paradise.

reviews.comments: “Wow” is probably the best word I can think to describe this incredible place. The photos just don’t do it justice. Finished with impeccable taste, this place is definitely a gem.  Located on the best part of Mackeral beach, and surrounded by wildlife - including a resident wallaby who comes so close you can feed him by hand! The water as crystal clear as Thailand and just a two seconds away, down a very well paved and not too steep path. The views from the house and tree house are beyond breathtaking and the owner is super nice and attentive. Upon arrival he sent a message to see if we got in OK and during the booking phase he responded immediately to our questions. The BBQ is state of the ark (very important!) and the place is totally set up for entertaining with a great coffee machine, two fridges, plenty of cutlery, glasses, plates etc ... . Everything has been thought of, from hats and repellant to hooks to hang out your wet beach towels. We will definitely be back. Everyone who stopped by to visit us while we were there will be booking too, so I just hope we can get in! Thank you Richard. You have created a little slice of heaven.

If you are seeking a charmingly rustic, secluded getaway to a cottage located twenty metres from a stunning protected beach; look no further.

Getting to the house is a boating adventure directly from Palm Beach (either by the ferry, the friendly local boat house, or the water taxi). Not being able to drive to the house is a nice removal from the mundane, however make sure you pack accordingly.

The main sandstone cottage is designed to effortlessly entertain large or small groups of people. The generous outdoor setting is nicely accompanied by extra deck chairs and umbrellas.

Richard and Claudia have very tastefully arranged the homely living interiors and bedrooms. The tree-house (bedroom and bathroom), removed from the main cottage, is fantastic and you are treated to a stunning elevated view to the East. Watching sunrise over the ocean from the comfort of  bed is pretty special.

The quiet location means sleeping with the doors open to the sound of gentle waves is a must, and the house is well stocked with mosquito coils to make the pests don't interrupt.

The recently renovated kitchen contains everything needed for cooking, and is complemented by the large BBQ outside.

There are walking trails nearby which can take you to the West Head lookout, Aboriginal Archaeological sites, and tiny beaches dotted around the headland.

All-in-all, a very pleasant stay, and we look forward to any opportunity to return.

Hands down one of the nicest places i've ever stayed in. Beautifully perched up on the hill it gives an amazing view out to pittwater & across to palm beach. The interior is chic & understated with a perfect combination of beach retreat & stylish home. The house is nestled in the bush with frangipani trees everywhere & plenty of ample space to relax or entertain guests. I'll be back for sure!
We had a great stay at Richard's House. The view was gorgeous and the place is exactly as shown on picture. In the end we extended our stay by 1 extra night.

I recently stayed at Beach House, Great Mackeral with a few friends for a nice chilled out long weekend. The house exceeded all expectations. In an amazing location with a stunning view its was so nice to chill out and enjoy the peace and quiet in such a perfect setting. Clean, tidy and very homely, the house comes with everything you need (and more). Lots of outdoor space to have a bbq and eat with friends which was great. The beds were really comfortable and the tree house is very cool! To open up the doors each morning from there and see the ocean and boats was just lovely. I loved the fact that you had to get a little ferry over and use a wheelbarrow to get your shopping to the house - it all added to a little adventure away for a few days! Would highly recommend a holiday here! I cant wait to go back!

Thank you, Richard, for a wonderful house and experience on a lovely beach. The house is right on the beach. It is charming and thoughtfully decorated. The lizards/goannas can be a bit alarming but it's all part of the experience. The kitchen and linen cupboards are well supplied. And the fishing is excellent :)

We spent 3 gorgeous nights at Great Mackeral Beach House. The house was equipped with everything we needed and the quality furnishings made for comfortable relaxing time with family and friends. Great for 2 young families, perfect beach for little ones and older folks alike with plenty to do if you ever tire of just soaking up the beautiful view. Owner was very easy to deal with - would definitely recommend this property. The best part was its proximity to Sydney, but the feeling of being worlds away.

We headed to Great Mackeral for a spontaneous weekend away.  The beach house is idyllic - the location is spectacular, and the house is perfect.  Beachy, comfortable and has everything you need!    

We swam, lazed and read on the deck lounges, played Jenga, Uno & Scrabble, and cooked up an absolute feast in the well equipped kitchen.  Aside from all that the house has to offer, we also explored a little further afield with trail runs and bush walks in the surrounding areas.  

We also loved the remote feel of the location - we basically had the beach to ourselves, but it took us just under an hour to get there from Sydney, including the very quick ferry ride. 

We have all returned to the city refreshed, and vowing to get back here as soon as we can.  Richard and Claudia were very responsive, and provided clear instructions on all logistics involved.  

Thank you!

This is  the sort of place one wants to remain secret--but the joy of discovering it is too great not to share the surprise! Wonderful  tranquil surrounds coupled with loving attention to simple warm design that welcomes.  Perfect.

Stunning! Relaxing, charming, private, secluded and stunning again. A sanctuary. We loved being there and so will you. Although don't go! We'd hate to think it will get booked out. We want to go back! Thanks for having us, Richard. You were a helpful and kind host and we hope to deal with you again. You have a wonderful place!

Such a special place. Not only is Mackerel a special place but this home is in the perfect location on Mackerel beach. A great outlook, view and the beach 10metres away. We immediately relaxed once there and it's so quick to get to from Sydney (even though you feel far far away). 
The separate bedroom is particularly incredible. An easy house to entertain in and lots of outdoor space.  Great communication too. Thankyou. We will be back.
Richard is quick and helpful when responding to my numerous questions. The place was even more beautiful than i had imagined and there was beyond the necessary supplied for us.

We were looking for a place to stay for my mums birthday weekend. Scrolling through AIRBNB and we found this place. All I can say is amazing. Great mackerel has everything you could want and more. The house and tree house is amazing. The kitchen is perfect and the view is unbelievable. Photos definitely don't do the house justice. Strongly recommend. The hosts are contactable and super pleasant. Easy to deal with and very accommodating. We will be aiming to stay again soon.

One of the most beautiful places I have been to. The house is lovely, in perfect location, quite and peaceful, very well maintained, just a flight of stairs down to the beach, stunning ocean view from the patio. The host Richard is very helpful. 100% recommendable.

We found our heaven at Richard and Claudia's place at Mackerel. It was an ideal home and location for our family and the holiday we wanted.
Richard's communication was always prompt and helpful, and he and Claudia went out of their way to assist us with several aspects of our stay.

What a magical place! From the moment we walked in, we knew this place had something special. The view especially in the early mornings was spectacular and we couldn't be happy with our stay.      When you come, no need to bring a thing! The kitchen is amazingly equipped, linen, towels, games... It's all there. And the host was so so helpful and happy discuss any questions we had on the property or on the area.   RECOMMEND!!

We've stayed here before and were so impressed with the place we had to stay again. Richard is easy to contact, communicate with and is so accomodating. The place is amazing. Perfect for a few nights away. The view is phenomenal to wake up to. A must if you're interested!

Wonderful property that feels like a home away from home. Well stocked with everything you need to be fully relaxed, comfortable and self cater. Beautifully appointed and lots of space as well as privacy if needed. We stayed in the outside cabin - wonderful experience waking up each day to the sunrise and view - the room bathed in sun during the morning. 
Perfect beach location, amazing views and the sights and sounds of nature on your doorstep. 
Richard was very communicative, accommodating and helpful all the way through our stay.  
Will definitely stay again.

We felt perfectly welcome and warmly invited stepping off the boat and walking up to the beach house.  Everything we needed was there, and even more!  The beach house was exactly as described, and even more beautiful than the pictures.  Everything worked, and the tree house was a great treat too.  Thank you for a great long weekend and we look forward to visiting again!

Richard was great! He provided a really useful fact sheet for the beach house, which made finding everything for the stay easy and stress free. The beach house itself was incredible. I've stayed at Mackerel Beach many times and I have to say, this place is definitely the most beautiful. It was wonderful having wifi, as the places I've rented in the past have not. I would definitely stay here again!

Richard's Mackeral Beach property is a gem! A perfect escape from the city for a weekend. Good for groups, with a well appointed kitchen. Richard was an excellent host keeping in touch regularly and taking great care to ensure we had a great relaxing time at Mackeral.

The most ideal location if you are looking for quiet and peaceful. We enjoyed with our 2 children aged 2 and 4 and my husbands parents. The house is beautiful and is equipped with everything you might need. Steps from the house take you straight onto Mackerel Beach....bliss.

Richard's place and Mackerel Beach are fabulous. This house is perfect. Everything is as described, it is truly stunning and just perfect for a relaxing time. Richard is a great host and easy to contact when organising the trip. We first came to know of this place when friends stayed here last Easter and we were at another place, we are so happy to have found a chance to show my parents (from Canada) this amazing location. Loved the treehouse for my parents. Thanks for having us Richard. We WILL be back!!

Richard's place is pure serenity. Private beach front this house is perfect for a relaxing get away and the kitchen is incredible. Everything you need! The beds are comfortable and the whole area is so serene. Perfect for a little getaway from Sydney! Can't wait to come back.
Fantastic spot with loads of character. Plenty of info from Richard to make sure we had a great stay- which we did. Thanks again.

RIchard's house is a pure gem! There is no word to describe how amazing and amazingly located it is! Sleep with the sound of the waves, wake up to an amazing sunrise, go down a few steps and go for a swim, sit down at the front of the house and take in the beautiful scenery... The house itslef is very cute and cosy, the kitchen is very well equiped and the tree house is charming. Mackerel Beach is a wonderful place, and the best is it's only 1 hour from Sydney! Oh I wish I could be there every weekend! Richard is easy to communicate with and arranging, and everything was perfect :)

The view from the Beach House is a stunner - unspoilt panoramic views across the pittwater - it's truely unique and one of our favourites.  We had a wonderful family holiday our children loved the outdoor spaces and had loads of freedom within earshot of us. The house is well appointed and the kitchen has everything you need and more. Richard was a great host and easy to get in touch with. We stayed for 2 weeks and the weather overall was fantastic. We were thankful for this as the main house is small for two families (particularly when it's raining and you can't get outside). One small gripe was the main bathroom which is really in need of an update. The shower drain blocked a couple of times which we had to pump out. There were ants at night coming through the cracks in the wall. It was all pretty basic. The house is not cheap over the school holidays and at the rate we were paying we would have expected this to be in better condition. Overall we had a great stay. PS we thankfully didn't see the 1.5m goana roaming the property, just possums and wallabies!

Richards house at Mackeral Beach was amazing and Richard was a responsive and helpful guest. Despite the initial trouble locating the property in the dark and rain with three children in tow, we were thrilled to arrive and settle in to the small but very well appointed and beautifully decorated cottage. Absolutely everything you could need for a comfortable stay was at your fingertips, not to mention the beach, view, sunrises and an amazing garden, and our family of 5 had a very memorable and unique long weekend there. The only thing worth noting for families with young kids is to be aware that the 'tree house', whilst stunning, is probably not suitable for children under the age of 8-10 if sleeping alone. Despite this we would return in a heartbeat and recommend to all! Thank you Richard!
We enjoyed a fantastic stay at Mackerel Beach with our friends and family. The house is small but beautifully appointed with everything you need. So very relaxing. Thank you Ruchard!

We were blown away by Richards place at Mackarel Beach. A short ferry ride from Palm Beach and you feel instantly on holidays and relaxed. The house is right on the beach and has a fantastic view. You'll spend most of your time admiring it. Do yourself a favour and stay

Spectacular views! Gorgeous beach front cottage that is stylish and comfortable and very well equipped with all you need to make your stay a delight. Our kids loved the freedom of exploring on their own and the surrounding bushwalks and beaches were stunning.  Sleeping to the lull of the ocean was beautiful and the sun rises were incredible.  You feel a million miles away yet only a 10 min ferry ride from Palm Beach.  Such a great spot we cant wait to visit again.  Richard was a great host - communicative and responsive.

This is a fantastic location and great house.  Provides a true 'away from it all' experience while still being close to Sydney.  We we're pleasantly surprised by the beach - the kids had a great time playing on the sand below, while parents could have a wine at the house and watch from above.

We spent an excellent long weekend at this lovely spot. Even with six adults and two small children the place felt spacious. The house had everything we needed and more. You couldn't be any closer to the beach and Great Mackerel is a prefect location.

A very comfortable home in an amazing location. The perfect place for anyone that needs to switch off for a few days.

Communication with Richard was great. He did everything he could to make our stay enjoyable including having the construction workers next door turn their radio down. 

The kiddies loved the easy access to the beach and also spent lots of time playing the many games that are available.

We didn’t want for anything.

This is the perfect paradise for a quiet relaxing weekend. Beachfront is right there and omg the view all over Palm Beach and the lighthouse is simply amazing. There is also a separate tree house/parents retreat/teenagers getaway.

WOW just beautiful!
Had the most amazing weekend here with our three adult children and their partners/friends. It was perfect for us because my husband and I could retreat to the tree house for peace and quiet and enjoy the breathtaking views. 
Right from the start  communication with Richard was perfect. 
He went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable and even organised a mooring so that we could take our boat. 
The location is just spectacular, very quiet, and breathtakingly beautiful. 
The house is lovely, comfortable, clean and so well equipped. The showers were amazing and we loved the hot water outdoor shower to get all that sand off. 
The evenings cooled down enough to light the pit fire to sit around. 
Just be sure to keep doors closed when not inside, a bush turkey enjoyed a lovely cheese platter. 
Cant wait to go back.
Richard was amazing to deal with. He was great at communication and helping us know how to make the most of our time at this wonderful place. It truly is a special place and well worth a visit.
Lovely place and Richard is very helpful.

A perfect dream escape for one or many. We were a group of old friends catching up and this was perfect to swim, cook and sit together. Richard is a perfect considerate host and Great Mackerel is a place of beauty.

I have been an airbnb user for years and have never experienced a host as wonderful as Richard. He went out of his way to ensure we had a magical trip and we would recommend his place to anyone in a heartbeat. Do yourself a favour and book a getaway at Mackerel Beach - divine location, beautiful house and outstanding host.

What an incredibly beautiful location and charming beach house!! We were a group of 8 and found the house cosy and inviting with plenty of space for all of us to relax. Before our trip most of the group had not previously heard of Mackerel Beach, but it has quickly become a favourite destination in Sydney. Richard and Claudia are great hosts and were in touch before and throughout to ensure we had everything we needed. It’s not a matter of if we’ll go back but when! I have already recommended this property to family and friends. Thank you! It was a very memorable weekend away for all of us and the beautiful space you’ve created was a big part of that!

This house is only 50 minutes from Sydney CBD and a 10 minute ferry/water taxi ride. It is literally on the beach and most rooms have fantastic views across the water. It is very relaxing and accommodating with everything you might need - just byo food and drink. After 3 days it felt like we had been away for a week. We would definitely come back again.

The Sandstone Cottage in Mackerel Beach is just absolutely stunning. The architecture of the house, the choice of furniture, the high quality linen and towels around the house, the handmade ceramics, the collection of art and objects around the house, the outside shower, the list goes on and on. The house has absolutely everything you could possibly wish for. 
It's one of the most beautiful houses we have ever been in. It makes you feel like you have arrived in paradise. 
I can recommend this as a serious experience if you wanna have a teste of heaven. :)

Richard's place is exceptionally beautiful. It's chic and in a truly excellent location. Perfect for a little getaway. Richard was lovely to deal with, generous with his home and the home was thoughtfully stocked with everything you might require. We had an excellent little holiday.

My husband and I had a wonderful weekend at Richards gorgeous home, it was deeply relaxing, lovely views accross Pittwater right on the doorstep. We lots of fun and rest, a perfect weekend getaway, highly recommend
Lovely property in a very special spot

A gorgeous and secluded home that is perfect for a quiet getaway. The house is cozy and fantastically equipped. We enjoyed cooking delicious meals and enjoying the view of Pittwater by day and the fire pit at night.

Very family friendly with a number of stunning bush walks to choose from. 

We highly recommend this property.

Simply amazing little house in a relatively unknown part of Australia. We were there for 4 nights but it felt much longer. We played cards and board games at night, did not  turn the television on once. Thanks Richard!

Can't say enough good things about this place. It's in one of the most beautiful spots in Sydney, with a gorgeous, sheltered North-east aspect looking over Barrenjoey Island. The house makes the most of the space - with beautiful and ample outdoor spaces to enjoy the view, and a gorgeously landscaped garden. It's even nicer than the photos if that's possible.

The house is full of character and very stylishly appointed, yet relaxed and beachy enough so you feel at ease - and OK with kids!

The treehouse bedroom is spectacular and we loved how it was decorated :-)

Richard and Claudia have thought of everything - there's filtered tap water, coffee pods, and even a rice cooker which we used. 

We absolutely loved the fire pit - we were staying in July and were surprised at how much heat it gave as we sat around it watching the moon rise and the stars come out.

Mackeral Beach itself is stunning - so nice to have peace from cars, and go for a bush walk on Sunday to Resolute Beach. The ferry was an easy way to travel, as was the water taxi.

A wallaby came to visit us on the first night which was lovely. 

Richard was so nice and helpful to deal with via email and texts. 

Basically, we all want to move here! Falling short of that, we'll definitely be back for a holiday.

The location of Richards house is amazing! The views are beautiful and the peace and quiet is like nowhere else we’ve ever travelled! The house itself is well stocked with all the kitchen utensils you could want. It has been updated enough to have all the comforts you want and expect but still maintains the cottage feel. The only downside we experienced was with the mosquitos, even in winter you need to be mindful to keep all doors and windows closed.

Five stars is really insufficient for this place, the position is idyllic, our host was exemplary - he even fixed the weather which was perfect all weekend - and there was great attention to detail and numerous extras such as the fire pit all ready with kindling, or the kayaks on hand and the complimentary bottle of wine. Just perfect.

Richard's cottage is definitely an even better experience than the pictures suggest, very scenic views and lots of comfort. We used the cottage as a unique location for a film production. Richard was extremely helpful in providing local knowledge for ease of logistical preparations. The one trouble my team experienced was unrelated to the location, however, a result of the location's remoteness (only accessible by water). That problem was that the Barge Service cancelled on us due to unexpectedly rough (unsafe) water and wind conditions, which affected schedule on our bump in. You also must not forget anything as it is not practical to run errands if you forget to bring anything with you. Other than this, the film shoot went very well and everyone was excited by the cottage and its views. On another note: the neighbours were incredibly friendly and helpful. It was very easy to make contact with them, liaise with them leading up to the shoot and on the day they were very cooperative on a few requests of ours. The water taxi and barge service operators were also friendly, punctual and cooperative. I would recommend this place and hope to someday return for a weekend holiday to this paradise corner - it really is a hidden gem of Sydney.
Beautiful place, perfect view. Richard was v communicative. Had an awesome couple of days with my work colleagues.
I recommend anyone who'd like to get away from the tumult of the city this wonderful peaceful hideaway. They've thought of everything for a relaxing get away

Richards hospitality and beautiful home is an amazing place to stay for any occasion. We are seven women who appreciate great food and great environment. This is a perfect place to relax  read swim cook great food and be amazed by the views accords the water to Palm Beach.
Cosy cottage with magnificent tranquil views. Right on the beach so immediate access to the water!
Spectacularly located cottage perfect for walks on the beach, swims and relaxing on the deck with a good book.
Beautiful views, a very special place to stay. Richard was an excellent host. Great walks, kayaking and swimming in Mackerel Beach.

Our favourite Airbnb !! Beautiful home with a breathtaking view. We spent many afternoons watching the sun set and sipping wine. Our children loved the beach and staying at this home too. Stunning decor. Wonderful thoughtful host. A truly magical place to escape to and relax. We will be back!

We’ve stayed at The McCallister’s regularly and always recommend it to others wanting a quick getaway. The house is perfect. The beach is paradise and the view is spectacular. Great hosts and wouldn’t want to stay anywhere else in the Pittwater region.

name: 時代廣場和銅鑼灣地鐵站樓上 Above Causeway Bay MTR/Times Square
summary: 時代廣場正上方 直接住在景點中 樓下即是地鐵站､的士站､中港通巴士站 電梯自地面層始 雙人睡房 密碼入住 入住前､退房後 可以寄存行李 樓下: 時代廣場 MTR銅鑼灣港鐵站 時代廣場的士站 中港通巴士始發站 5分鐘步行距離內: SOGO崇光百貨 希慎廣場 Apple旗艦店 名店坊 維多利亞公園 24小時大賣場 15分鐘MTR距離內: 灣仔會展中心(1站) 中環自動扶梯､登山纜車站(3站) 海洋公園(3站) 尖沙咀(3站) 港澳碼頭(4站) 迪士尼樂園(9站約30分鐘) 提供: 24小時熱水 洗髮露沐浴乳 牙刷牙膏 拖鞋 浴巾 蒸汽spa眼罩 吹風機 轉換插頭 洗衣機 冰箱 熱水壺 電磁爐(可火鍋) 電飯煲 電熨斗 炒鍋 燉鍋 餐具 刀叉 嬰兒床與嬰兒座椅(如有需要) 客廳娛樂: 德州撲克 中國圍棋 國際象棋 Millions of people come to Times Square everyday but we live above it! MTR station and taxi station are just downstairs
