host.host_about: Full time lawyer, part time fiction writer. Ten percent of Airbnb earnings will be donated to charities in HK.

address.street: Causeway Bay, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Stephanie的指引非常清楚,方便入住｡房間臨時代廣場,窗戶雙層玻璃隔音還可以｡
如果不介意有些嘈杂,是非常方便的地方
Stephanie is a very nice host, and this is the second time that I booked her apartment. The location is perfect, near the MTR exit, easy to spot. The room is comfortable with everything I need.
入住很满意,离铜锣湾地铁站很近,附近很热闹,方便｡
位置很好,适合考雅思的同学
住在这里很方便  周边超繁华  购物美食一应俱全
给我的房间是客厅隔出来的｡隔断的墙较单簿,客厅的动静在房内一清二楚｡有房客常是凌晨回来,尽管对方已很小心,但仍会惊醒我｡
地理位置很好,其它一般｡

Great location and lively area in the thick of things.  Stephanie was great with communicating and is very close to transport - easy to get to from the airport and directions for arrival clear.  The room and apartment is uncluttered and simply styled.  
If you are a sensitive sleeper and to lighting the room faces straight out onto times square which has led advertisements.

Room to rent in a shared apartment. Comfortable double bed.  Shower and fridge available.

Great, lively location, overlooking Times Square in Causeway Bay area of Hong Kong.
This Airbnb is so so central, it's great for exploring HK! We didn't get to meet Stephanie unfortunately but she sent a helpful manual prior to our arrival

原本我訂的是房主這間房,因為我要多住一晚上房東就聯繫我叫我住在也是銅鑼灣的另一間公寓的合租房一晚,我也就同意了｡首先不說住的希雲大廈那個房間的環境問題,房子有股不知道什麼奇怪的異味,非常難聞並且不透氣｡在住了一晚後我想搬到自己住的選的房間房東就說因為沒整理不讓我過去住｡房東覺得房間比我本來訂的大就就應該好,結果第一晚睡的時候床就壞了,然後我在評論裏也發現之前有房客反應床壞了的問題,也就是說這並不是第一次了,我立馬和房東反應並且要求去我訂的房間,但是房東拒絕了並且說自己要動手術接下來沒法和我聯繫,這就莫名讓我在這個不是我訂的房間多住了一晚,直到最後一晚才住到了我自己一開始選的房間,而且住了才發現,我自己選的房間雖然小,但是環境和地理位置比讓我之前住的房間好太多!我是莫名奇妙的被在另一個房間多住了一晚,而且我和其他房間的住客有溝通才知道原來我訂的房間因為有人住所以房東才不讓我到這個一開始預訂的房間裡來,這讓我覺得自己被騙了而且我的權益明顯被侵犯了!總的來說這次住宿體驗我並不滿意!

房间地理位置优越,下面是时代广场希慎广场崇光百货,房间简单而温馨,是我喜欢的装修风格｡遗憾入住期间未能一睹Stephanie芳颜｡我对居住环境唯一的要求就是简单干净较安静,入住的Jasmine房间完全能满足这个要求｡由于位于世界上最繁华喧闹的街道,房间想要绝对安静是不可能的｡由于我没有任何睡眠问题,所以下面街道的喧嚣对我无影响｡如果神经脆弱睡眠困难一组,我推荐找一些郊区更为安静的房子入住｡唯一的意见是如果厨房能有一次性水杯就更好了,方便喝水卫生,应该是没有的,不过我没有仔细找｡当然重口难调,为环保考虑,推荐提供一次性纸杯,或其他可分解材料制作的水杯｡其他全是满分推荐啦!大家放心入住吧

Very good located with a lot of restaurants, malls and the MTR/Tram close by. Wifi is good. Someone comes around to clean every day. The flat is not spacious and we shared the bathroom with 2 other rooms what was okay. The room is nice and although it is just above Times Square it is quite calm. The lights could be a bit too much for people who are not used to the city, but we slept very well in Stefanies flat.
Hôte communicatif et appartement bien situé

Wow, the price for this place does not equal the quality. Such a relief to be shown into a place after you have left another due to it's poorness. The room was spotless and so welcoming. With a view straight onto Time Square, but with little noise in the room. The bathroom and shower were great, clean and very usable and the kitchen had everything i needed. And very unusual for an Airbnb they have a lovely cleaner, Jenny, who comes in each day. She even put my beers in the fridge for me. Cant ask for more than that!!
You can also take bus to this place from the airport. The bus stop to this place is different from the bus stop to the airport.

If convenience is your main concern, Stef's place would be perfect for you, you'll be surrounded by malls and MTR stations and not to mention - really amazing food. I stayed here for a month for an internship and I've throughly enjoyed my time living in causeway bay - it's easy to travel back and forth from work and since you'll be on the main line on the MTR, it'll be a short ride to really famous attractions in Hong Kong. 

However, the place did take awhile for me to get used to as the lift and entrance was kind of dodgy. 

Overall, great place to stay, would definitely consider coming back to stay with Stef. She's been nothing but helpful!
C'est propre et bien situé ! Parfait séjour.
房间正位于时代广场旁边的大厦里,非常好找,每天躺在床上抬头就能看见时代广场几个大字,可想而知有多近,晚上累了还可以趴在窗沿上看看来来往往的行人和各色的大屏幕,五光十色,别有情致｡毗邻地铁站､叮叮车等交通,美食多多,步行即可｡虽然没能见到Stefanie,但是美女房东回复超快而且热心｡
房間乾淨,交通方便...很棒....下次有機會還會入住...
Stefanie's place was centrally located and she was great about communicating with us about checking in and providing recommendations for the local area!
还可以 房子有点小 地理位置超好
Clean, cosy apartment in a great area of Hong Kong. Stephanie was quick to respond to my queries.
地理位置很好,靠近地铁

Stefanie was a great host! The place was just like the pictures, the location was in the heart of Causeway Bay which was very convenient for lots of food, shopping and close to the MTR station and other public transportation! The room was very nice with the decorations and Stefanie provided everything you needed for staying the night. She even generously offered us a cheaper rate to stay another night due to a typhoon that had delayed flights and caused shops to close all over Hong Kong. Thank you for being so considerate and we would definitely stay with Stefanie again!

因颱風滯留機場當天也無法訂尖沙咀自己常住酒店
借宿一晚是沒有什麽問題, 位置非常容易找 :-)
推荐,好的没话说,在香港有这么宽敞有闯舒适的屋子真不多的感觉｡

Excellent location and very clean flat. Stefanie was quick to respond to emails also. Highly recommended for a very central stay and if you're looking to experience a HK apartment. 

Tip: take the A11 bus from the airport and get off at the Wan Chai firestation. Even though it's 1 hour 40 minutes on the bus, it only costs $40 HKD and is less than 5 minutes walk away.

I couldn't have asked for a better host, Stefanie was welcoming upon arrival and regularly checked in with us to make sure everything was OK. When we had any questions she would reply immediately and she went out of her way to solve issues that weren't even part of the services being offered. Stefanie was also open to feedback on how to improve her Airbnb and compensated us for the minor inconveniences we encountered during our stay. As for the location, it's right next to Causway bay station with a fantastic view through a massive window overlooking Time Square. I look forward to our next visit. I highly recommend staying with Stefanie.
Perfect room, Stefanie is a great host, great location!

방은 매우 깔끔하고 좋습니다. 화장실은 공용이고 샤워기는 좀 노후 되었습니다. 수건 아이마스크 치약칫솔을 제공해줬습니다. 수건재질이 담요같아서 수건을 챙겨가길 권장합니다.위치안내 입구 안내등을 매우 자세히 설명해줘서 헤매지 않을 겁니다. 지친여행에서 집의 위치를 헤메지 않아서 좋았고,지하철 출구랑 가까워서 좋습니다.물론 출구까지는 좀 걸어야해요..암튼 괜찮습니다!
第一次住民宿,选了几天终于找到这家,地理位置真的很好,地铁口出来就是,就在时代广场旁边,去哪里都很方便,价格也很实惠,每天也有人打扫卫生,以后还会选择入住这里,房主回复都很快,只是有点遗憾,没能见到房主本人,有点挺不好意思的,退房的时候把钥匙搞丢了,房主也没有责怪｡总之很好
非常适合经济型消费的人群,普通的家庭环境,共有三间单床房,一厅一卫一厨房｡交通便利,隔壁就是时代广场,购物饮食全部都有｡很好｡
위치가 좋고 방이 편해요 에어컨도 좋았고 세심하게 준비해준 안대나 깨끗한 수건이 인상적이었습니다
房间位置非常便利,购物 地铁 吃饭都很方便｡房东很热情,及时回复消息,尽量满足需求｡房间里的设施也都比较齐全,住宿体验还是不错的｡唯一不太方便的是卫生间只有一个,房间住满的话有三户,每次占用时间不宜过长,不过大家安排的时间不太一样也不是什么的问题｡还是非常喜欢的,下次还会选择｡

This air bnb is in the heart of causeway bay and close to hysan place (shopping mall) and many other malls and eateries. I highly recommend if you're visiting Hong Kong! We had a late flight out on our departure day and without us even asking, Stefanie kindly let us store our luggage for the day, which allowed us to have a wonderful time enjoying Hong Kong!! She's a fantastic host.
我是到香港第二天入住的,交通便利,能搭末班地铁回到住处也是幸运｡遗憾是没有见到貌美的房主
Super cute place and great location, would definitely stay again!

非常喜欢这里｡交通便利,设施俱全,房间舒适,每天醒来看从时代广场飘过的云｡

楼下是铜锣湾地铁站,屋内牙膏毛巾拖鞋吹风机转换插头衣架都准备好了,什么都不用操心｡这是三个房间其中的一间｡房东Stefanie非常好,回复及时｡遇到的室友也都很好｡有一次房门从里面锁了,没拿钥匙｡隔壁室友美女被我从睡中叫醒帮忙联系房东迅速解决｡

下次还会选择这里｡也会推荐朋友｡
地理位置非常方便,下面就是商场
Great location. Central to everywhere. Great host. Easy to communicate with.

Close proximity to Times Square and other places. Very convenient as it is located in Causeway Bay. The flat is very clean and tidy. Stefanie is such a great host, very helpful and responsive to queries. Will stay again at this place in the future.
Booked a room at Stephanie’s place as we had a 23-hour layover. The location was perfect as it was 1 minute away from the Causeway Bay station. The room was comfy enough for me and my 5 yr old.

The location is the best thing about this place. The checkin was smooth. Print out Steph's instruction and you will be fine. You can't beat the price in terms of location, space and convenience. you just cant.
Great central location and close to the MTR.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'appartement est idéalement placé, à proximité de Time Square et du métro Causeway Bay. Les indications de Stephanie sont très précises. Stephanie est une hôte très réactive, ce qui nous a été d'une aide précieuse.
Seul bémol, la propreté de la salle de bain notamment laissait à désirer et nos serviettes de bain ne nous ont pas été changées durant la semaine, malgré notre demande. 
Malgré cela, nous recommandons tout de même cette bonne adresse.
Good place
非常好的房東,地點非常方便且乾淨!
位置真心不错,就在时代广场旁边,房东小姐很热情,介绍的相当详细,入住没有遇到任何困难｡楼下有保安,附近很安全,两个小姑娘晚上十二点多回去也不怕｡很遗憾铜锣湾这么好的地方只待了一个晚上,是美食和购物的天堂~
地段很好,适合购物｡
位置很棒……
Location非常便捷 就在时代广场隔壁
it is truly in the heart of the city and the location can’t be beat !!
不错的选择,推荐
房间很好,位置特别方便,房东人也特别好,一直在帮助我们解决问题,性价比很高~
地理位置超级无敌赞,去香港了太多次,每次都没机会好好逛逛铜锣湾｡这个地方简直就是方便到不行,从时代广场到希慎广场再到崇光百货,哈哈太方便我买买买啦｡地理位置很好找,我第一天去的时候一直买买买到11点才开始找住的地方,一点也不用担心｡房间隔音效果差了一点,其他的都非常棒｡我的项链不知道是不是落在房间还是厕所了,房东如果看到了,麻烦回复一下我哦｡我3月份要过去,到时候去取｡谢谢啦,么么哒｡
房子还是挺不错的  小姐姐回复的很及时  而且位置也很好找  最重点!!就在时代广场边上!超级节省车费啊~就是没有独立的卫生间  不过也不是什么大事  还是挺好的!
Stephanie’s place is very convenient and the room is petite but clean and comfy. Only problem for us is the noise but is generally acceptable. Quite a good room for a short stay!
Nice place. Good location. Easy check in. Clear communication. Simple room, but solid value.
The location  so good.
感谢stefanie的帮助,根据路线指示很快进入了大厦｡但是因各地对于楼层的叫法不同,在寻找房间的时候耽误了点时间｡比如进入大厦的那一层实为G层,如果乘电梯上去,点击6层即可;如果走楼梯上去,实为7层｡其他方面都很好,尤其是地理位置,不得不赞｡至于隔音或是临街声音什么的,于我来说还是在接受范围内的
房子位置很好 旁边就是时代广场 离地铁站也很近 干净整洁 房东姐姐很nice 帮妈妈和弟弟预定的 问问题的时候回复很迅速 总之很棒 下次我自己去香港会选择这里的
地段好,总体过得去｡
地理位置好 房间干净
Nice location.
位置非常方便,下次有机会还会过来

The view from the bedroom window down on the lively time square is amazing and quite a contrast to the nice and cozy apartment. Stephanie is a great host, communication was helpful, easy and uncomplicated! It was a great pleasure to stay for the night.
Very convenient place, just outside the MTR at a square. But the room is still quite at night. The host is very nice and fast in response. Overall a very pleasant stay at Stephanie’s place!
如果是去香港购物 这个房子地理位置很棒 但是 没有独立卫生间 要跟别人共用 还是感觉不太方便

房子地方是没得说,就在时代广场铜锣湾地铁站附近｡
但,基本联系不上房东｡找房子和询问房间设施时,只有自动回复｡根本解决不了我的问题｡
另外 最好是多人一起来住,毕竟一个女孩子和别人共用公共区域,还是有点危险｡
很棒,楼下就是时代广场,位置很好
Its description mentioned that there was a stove, but there wasn’t. So I can’t cook my food after I bought the ingredients.

地理位置非常好
物有所值
適合所有喜歡購物遊客
去其他地方非常方便
位置相當方便!回覆迅速!有貼心詢問!收拾衛生的姊姊人也很好~推薦!
位置很好,容易找到

The room is basic, good for one or two nights stay. The room size is decent given Hong Kong standards, rest of the things are pretty basic. The bed is squeaky. Location is perfect, just above time square. Bathroom is tiny and stuffy. Water was blocking in both shower and sink.

下地鐵走了10多分鍾,因為地鐵站裏面出來地面要穿过三個很長的電梯,過一條馬路｡
房間是三戶公用一個洗手間,到洗澡發現沒有拖鞋需要自己準備｡晚上發現洗手池堵住了｡
臥室是鑰匙門｡床也不太舒服很低也很薄｡
不過對面就是時代廣場…
Okay
还可以吧,就是没有图片这么好看 位置是挺好的就在铜锣湾地铁站去哪里都很方便,比预期差一点 p图有点多了,床很容易响,(情侣可以看看考虑一下这点)没有洗漱用品牙刷梳子之类的｡洗发水没有,沐浴露快挤不出了,不过地理位置是很方便｡

name: Best Location + Private Roof Deck
summary: Private bedroom (~60sq ft) within shared apartment. Center of Manhattan and five minutes from Williamsburg. Relaxed, safe space. Amazing rooftop access, full kitchen and cable. Great for women. Respectable, conscious host! Understand that these older east village buildings do not provide a ton of space, so don't expect a sprawling amount. Technically accommodates two but best for one. Roof access means top floor of the walk-up building: no elevator. Feel free to message me with any questions!
space: This is a nice, clean, relaxed but small space perfect for travelers after a long day in the city.  This bedroom includes full closet space that is located in the living room. 95% of the time I will be hosting from my own private room in the space and greeting guests. If not, I'll be nearby to help with anything anytime. 5th floor walk-up, no elevator (the charm of a classic old east village building)
description: Private bedroom (~60sq ft) within shared apartment. Center of Manhattan and five minutes from Williamsburg. Relaxed, safe space. Amazing rooftop access, full kitchen and cable. Great for women. Respectable, conscious host! Understand that these older east village buildings do not provide a ton of space, so don't expect a sprawling amount. Technically accommodates two but best for one. Roof access means top floor of the walk-up building: no elevator. Feel free to message me with any questions! This is a nice, clean, relaxed but small space perfect for travelers after a long day in the city.  This bedroom includes full closet space that is located in the living room. 95% of the time I will be hosting from my own private room in the space and greeting guests. If not, I'll be nearby to help with anything anytime. 5th floor walk-up, no elevator (the charm of a classic old east village building) Full bathroom, living room with video games, basic cable, Netflix, hulu, rooftop and full kitchen
neighborhood_overview: East village is great, tons of bars and restaurants and very near to every other neighborhood: Soho, Wall Street, Broadway, Times Square, Central Park AND 5 minutes to Williamsburg and 20 to downtown Brooklyn and Barclay's
notes: Some guests have noted the street noise in the past. On Friday and Saturday nights things can potential get a bit loud. For those sensitive to noise I provide fresh pairs of disposable ear plugs. Sleep masks also provided for those who wish to sleep in past the point where ambient sunlight in the room can get a bit bright despite the blinds being drawn. There will always be filtered water (cold and tea temperature) available on demand from the water cooler in the kitchen. That's not to say that the tap water in NYC isn't good (it's great, in fact) but I like to get the 5 gallon jugs delivered monthly. I'll leave a final note here about the size of the space. The main descriptive paragraph literally lists out the Sq footage of the room and I have previously noted that these walk up buildings are not especially spacious. The kitchen space is tight but functional and one can prepare foods in it. I've already had too many guests claim that I was less than accurate in describing the size of
transit: Five minutes from L train at 1st Avenue which connects to all other trains within 5 minutes. Could not be better.
access: Full bathroom, living room with video games, basic cable, Netflix, hulu, rooftop and full kitchen.
interaction: People tend to consider me a friendly dude and gracious host. I will more often than not be staying in the apartment along with guests and available directly or remotely to answer all questions and help out as best I can to make sure your stay is as comfortable and pleasant as possible. If you're a more private person, I will make sure to be quiet as a mouse and give all the space I can.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
A kind and generous soul who listens well, follows his passions, and runs like a crazy person.

Fueled by live & recorded music, running, hiking, dogs, strategic board games, reading, film, advertising, gaming, beer

Beauty is empty and meaningless without ugliness

reviews.comments: Joe's place is walking distance from NYU and many fun places. His apartment is clean and lovely, there's a cool rooftop with an incredible view. Joe is a very nice guy. He even let us finish a film project in the room!
Amazing location!
Nice room and Joe is also so nice!

Joe is a very friendly guy. We communicated through the app and he replied in a timely manner. He lives at the top of the building so you'll be walking up like 6 floors and careful on the stairs. It's New York so if you're not used to small and tight apartments then you'll find out the struggle is real here. I only stayed from noon to about 6pm so I don't know how it is at night time. Unfortunately, when we stayed there it was like 60 degrees and the small rooms felt hot and humid even after opening the windows due to the windows facing the sun directly. I was surprised by the rooftop and don't want to spoil it for you but if you like to make most of what you have then you'll like it. The location is dope but if you're looking for comfort you might be a bit disappointed. But the bed was nice. You'll feel like a college roommate on a tight budget for sure.
Joe was such a wonderful host. The location was perfect.
Joes place was perfect for a stay in NYC. Location was perfect for food, bars, and other entertainments. The roof top overlooking the skyline was awesome.
Joe was a great host and really enjoyed staying at his place. One of the best areas of NYC!
Joe was a great host! Exactly as I expected plus treats on our pillows and fresh towels! Def recommend.

The check-in was smooth and Joe was a great host. Very welcoming. The flat is in a good location in the east village and is very close to the subway. The roof terrace offer some amazing views of the city. The only thing I would pick up on is that the room could be a bit cleaner. Apart from that it was a very good experience and a great place to explore the city
We found the location perfect for our ventures. Very close to the Subway. This is best for someone on the go that just needs a bed and shower.
Joe was a great host! His place is exactly as described. It's close to public transport and the area is lovely and you can just walk to many restaurants. Recommended!
Joe is very helpful and nice. He provides local food and shopping advise in a timely manner.

I had a great time staying in Joe's apartment. The roof top is great for having breakfast or a sandwich in the late afternoon. Joe was really helpful with eating out recomendations - I loved the pizza! The East Village is the best place to be of all NY if you are looking to have some great time out at night in restaurants, bars and some clubs. And Joe's is right in the heart of it all.
Awesome place, great host, phenomenal price and a block away from the subway. Stay here.
Joe was very kind and the location was great. However, the apartment is filthy.

La casa de Joe está bien ubicada a solo 2 cuadras del Metro en East Village. El barrio es seguro y lindo. El departamento es pequeño aunque está bien. la habitación que nos toco era demasiado pequeña para 2 lo que no la hace del todo comoda. Más allá de eso Joe ayuda a que tengas una estancia buena en su casa.

Joe's place is logistically perfect, nestled in the East Village and very close to the subway. Joe is a lovely host, helpful and caring. The terrace is stunning. Just be aware in the summer the flat can be very warm, the room has a properly working air conditioner but it is very noisy. Also the location is very noisy, but hey, it is East Village, and it is New York so it is just expected. Expect privacy but not too much, as the other two rooms in the flat (which is actually very small) can be rented out. Note the flat is on the 5th floor with no elevator.
Great location, very friendly host!
Joe was very friendly and helpful, which made check-in smooth and easy. The rooftop deck is a great bonus!

Joe's place has a great location (You are in the middle of Manhattan,near to restaurants, sightseeing etc.) The room is comfortable and You can use a terrace on the roof, from which You literally see the great panorama of Manhattan. The view is breathtaking. Joe is a great host - very helpful and responsive, he gave us a lot of great tips and always answered our questions. We enjoyed our visit at Joe a lot!

I had a pleasant stay at Joe's apartment. He's easy to talk to and replies immediately so check in/check-out process was very easy. The location of his apartment is very central. Good restaurants and subway station are nearby. The apartment is small(I expected it to be small) there's no elevator so buckle up to walk up to the 5th (or 6th) floor. If you don't mind any of these things then this is the place to stay in the heart of New York on a budget. Oh and the rooftop is a bonus. Feels great to be up there :)
Joe is a fantastic host and is extremely accommodating. Great place, excellent rooftop view.
Great location. The accomodations are very basic. Joe's flexibility went a long way! Great budget deal. I'd stay here again.

Joe was a very welcoming and the place was really great as well. The place was clean and comfortable for two. The neighborhood had good places to eat and quick access to public transport. I would definitely recommend this place for somebody visiting the city.

Our stay at Joe's apartment was amazing. We booked it just 3 hours before and he was very friendly and helpful. The room is very cozy and the apartments rooftop is awesome. I will recommend Joe as a host and the apartment on any time! Thanks for this great time!

This is in the best location, right next to the metro. Joe had cookies made when I got there which was awesome and immediately offered me a coconut water which was so nice.  He had coffee, tea, earplugs all available plus the room was very clean. Highly recommended!

This apartment is in an incredible neighbourhood. Joe's place is really close to the trains plus tasty, affordable, and diverse array of restaurants. Outside of when I went to BK, I walked to and from most places. If you're visiting during crisp or warm seasons, I'll recommend skipping the cabs or trains when possible. Stay above ground and enjoy the local sights/sounds. As for the bedroom, the street noise is inescapable but not at all unbearable - the A/C really helps to drown it out. If you decide to stay here, you will love the charming little rooftop. That hammock is a lovely reset from the fast NY pace :) Joe is super friendly, accommodating and very easy to get a hold of. I enjoyed talking to him about running, Instagram and exchanging music recommends.

I stayed with Joe for the whole summer and it was an great time. Both the apartment and my room were very clean for the start and the apartment had a lot of great video games and activities available. Joe was always helpful for anything regarding my stay and the apartment and was a great guy to hang out with. The neighborhood is very safe and has tons of options for food and drinks. Any time I'm back in NYC and I need a place to stay Joe's will be at the top of my list!
good location, Joe was quick to respond to messages.
Joe was a great host, who was very accommodating and provided all necessary resources in the apartment. It served the need for a stay within the East Village.

Joe was very nice and welcomed us very well. He was very discret and made no noise. He gave us solar glasses for watching the eclipse and was always ready to help us for any problems or to answer any of our questions. 
Although the room is very tiny as the photos show it, the location of Joe's flat in East Village is absolutely perfect.
Beautiful area. Kind host and adorable roof top. Loved my stay.

Cool little place to crash for a couple of days. Joe is super welcoming and helpful. He will make things easy for you. 
Amazing roof top! Didn t have much time to take advantage of it.
Joes place is perfect for a weekend trip in NYC. Lots of options for food within walking distance and right by the subway. Joe was very accommodating as well. I would definitely stay here again.
Excellent location ... close to trains, union square

Please do not stay here. The place was very dirty. There was hair all over the floor in our bedroom. The bathroom also had little hairs everywhere. Not clean at all. There is also mice in the apartment. They ate through our meal bars. Also, the host was involved with a girl in the living room when we came back the first night. It was very awkward and uncomfortable. It felt very much like a college house. We would not stay here again even if it was free.
Just the best location to explore te vivid and fascinating East Village. Joe was really helpful and gave the best recommendations for taking advantage of this wonderful neighborhood.

This is a great option for those who want to stay in a great downtown location and don't need a lot of space.  Per the description, it IS the classic cozy NY walk-up apartment; if you need an elevator, a lot of floor space to do yoga, spread out all your stuff, etc. you should look elsewhere.  For everyone else, it's great: the small roof deck gives a great view of downtown (and come to think of it, you could do your yoga there); and you're walking distance to tons of great restaurants, different neighborhoods, subway stations, etc.
   Joe is a laid-back and welcoming host.  He was prompt and clear when we were coordinating my arrival, thoughtfully explained the place and how everything worked, and basically made me feel comfortable.

Great location! Joe was in constant communication.

The room is right off the kitchen, behind french doors (which was a bit unexpected), but has a blackout curtain for privacy. 

I was bummed I didn't get to use the in-apartment roof access, which is a great perk!

Joe's place is in a great area in the east village close to the L train. It's a great place if you need a place just to crash. Joe is quick to answer if you have questions as well. Highly recommend this place. The only con , but it's worth it for the private roof top,is the 6 floor walk up but it's good for a workout!

Joe is a very friendly and a respectful host.
Apt. is located at heart of East Village. Many restaurants, cafes, and all other stores are right on the footstep.
Thank you for your hospitality.
Good location, nice view on the roof. Joe is friendly and helpful.
Joe's place has an incredible view of the New York Skyline. He was very accommodating and nice.
Great stay

Joe's spot is perfect for a night in the village.  Super location in a thriving hip part of the city.  Small, modest accommodations perfect for a solo travel like myself.  Unfortunately was in and out and couldn't reap the benefits of the roof deck or neighborhood.  Did get Momofuku Ramen which was only 2 blocks away.  Joe was super helpful, communicative and responsive.  Great value.
It was a great stay. Joe was very friendly, he responds very quick and it was also a perfect location with lots of cute bars and restaurants, everything in a walk distance. I would reccomend

Joes place is the quintessential NYC bachelor pad.  The place is small and feels lived in, but you have privacy and cool features like a spiral staircase to the rooftop patio.  Walking your luggage up the five stories is a bit of a workout so be prepared. The stairwell is narrow too.  

I enjoyed my time.  The extra toiletries in the bathroom were nice if you forgot something.  Location is great and the price was right.
Joe was incredibly hospitable, great communication, amazing location, would definitely stay again!
Joe's is a basic room in a great location in the East Village. I loved being up on the roof in the early evening.
有過一般生活的感覺｡居家､自得,雖然沒有電梯搬行李有點辛苦,隔著馬路會有些吵,但其他部分都還OK

Joe is super responsive and helpful. Responds super quickly to any questions and requests. Good advice on local activities. Fantastic NYC location. Great neighborhood. Small but comfortable and charming apartment. Rooftop great for relaxing. We were very pleased.

The location of this flat is just perfect. The neighborhood is very nice, not too crowded but full of various restaurants and bars to go out. 3min walk to the subway to the city center (~15min). Joe was super cool and welcoming, always happy to help for anything. The room we had was pretty small for two people, but it s worth the price. We saved money for tours, restaurants and drinks  ;-). Think about taking earplugs, the nights are quite noisy, as it is the case everywhere in NYC. I would go def go back to this place for a next trip in NY !

Good location.  Joe gave great detailed instructions for getting into the building so there were no problems.  This seems like a nice quiet neighborhood.  Lots of schools in the area.   The bed was comfortable and there was a fan/AC unit which is good if you want to block out traffic noise.  Joe offers snacks and beverages  - a nice touch when you are tired from a long trip.  Cool spiral staircase leads up to the rooftop with a nice night view of the skyline.  The only thing I could recommend for this pace would be a little "tidying up" and decor improvement, then it would be A+.
Great location.  Walk any block in the neighborhood and something is happening.   Host is very attentive to your needs.  Great stay!

Joe mantuvo excelente comunicación y es muy amable. La ubicación también es excelente a solo un par de cuadras del metro y cerca de muchas facilidades. Considerar que es en un cuarto piso (sin elevador) y que como el departamento está ubicado cerca de bares hay mucho ruido por las noches y es difícil dormir.

El cuarto es pequeño pero es justo lo que necesitas si viajarás como turista.

Joe was a great host, responded very quickly to my messages and was kind. The location is great, lot of places to visit and eat in East Village and really close to the subway with great connections. I can't give it 5 stars cause on Friday night it was really hard to sleep because of the noise. The music was very loud outside and it didn't stop until 5 AM. But it is still a good place if you just want to crash for a reasonable price in NYC.

Great area ! Very convenient ! The room is super small but the sheets and towels are clean. We spent only one night there, to avoid the longest commute to Brooklyn after a Halloween party. With the fan on to cover street noise, we slept well. Perfect for backpackers and young people. 

Too bad we didn't meet Joe. Communication with him was really easy and clear anyways. Thanks for the chocolate left on the pillows and for the free drinks in the fridge !

Joe's place is perfectly located, close to restaurants, bars and the underground. The apartment is nice, could have been a little bit cleaner but for the rest all as described. The rooftop deck is a jewel! I didn't meet Joe, but the communication with him was effective, check-in and -out without problems and flexible from his side!
Pleasant, well kept place in an ideal location for an incredible deal. Not to mention super kind guy. I recommend it!
Good location, host was very accommodating and friendly! I’m not picky so didn’t expect much. Would stay again.

Joe has an apartment with a great location. The subway is conveniently located about 2 minutes away. The apartment itself was clean and the refrigerator was stocked with stuff to drink. In spite of other reviews,the neighborhood was fairly quiet. Joe himself was prompt with his responses. An excellent host!!!
Great service and location in a good part of town

Joe was very helpful receiving some goods before my arrival. 
Always easy to connect with him.
Joe, was a great host.  Very communicative.

While the room was small, it was what I had expected. The private rooftop is what made our trip, with views of the city skyline. This place was a great value for being in Manhattan. Joe was an amazing host, very accommodating and helped provide us with suggestions on local places to eat. We had a great vacation, and wish we could have stayed longer.
Great location, cool rooftop
Joe was very hospitable and friendly! The apartment was a little worn down but it was fine since the location definitely made up for it. Overall a great stay and would 100% recommend :)

Joe give good explanation about the flat . And what a good idea to suggest to you some good donuts ...mmm delicious 

Tks joe
Perfect location. Close to everything. Joe provided an amazing space I would absolutely stay in again and had excellent communication.
Joe is a great host!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Joe's during christmas and new years. It was a wonderful trip and Joe is really nice. Is place has a perfect location and you can walk everywhere! Theres a subway really close if you get tired of walking. We arrived late but that was not a problem, he was very understanding and helpful. He sent us a list with all of his favorite places to eat in the area.
a great host, great room, great location
Joe is a great host. Would recommend
He was responsive and dependable. Coffee there and quick WiFi
Great place to stay with great host, NYC steal for those who want to be out and about in the city. Located in a great area, the apartment is cozy and Joe is awesome. Thank you for hosting!
Exactly what was promised and in a great location!
Joe was great, nice a cozy apartment in a very convenient location
I would suggest this apartment, highly valued.

Joe is very supportive about everything. He kindly provided me slippers which he was not supposed to. The check-in process is very flexible and privacy is well eusured. The location is good although a little be far from subway station (about 8-miniute walking). It would be better if cleanness could be improved a little. To conclude, it's a ideal place for those who plan to stay in NYC for a few days.

Joe is very supportive about everything. He kindly provided me slippers which he was not supposed to. The check-in process is very flexible and privacy is well eusured. The location is good although a little be far from subway station (about 8-miniute walking). It would be better if cleanness could be improved a little. To conclude, it's a ideal place for those who plan to stay in NYC for a few days.
Joe was a great host. Check in was easy and Joe provided excellent service. I would stay again.

Joe's place was super convenient for my interview. He responds very quick and he's super stocked on coffee, tea, chocolate, and etc. He's very nice and his place is as he described it. I felt completely safe as a woman and I would recommend his place for anyone interviewing at NYU or if anyone wants to get a feel for the city.

We arrived one day early at Joe's place due to disorganization on my part. Joe offered us his room very generously and made us feel welcome even though he had no obligation to do so. He has a nice, spaceful, and hip appartment and I would reccomend it to anyone staying a few nights in New-York city. I thank him again for his hospitality and care.
Joe's place is great. Can't beat the location. Joe's a great host. He also provides some nice touches like coffee and snacks. Will definitely stay here again!
Great location, excellent value, very responsive host.
The East Village has a certain reputation and Joe's place will help you recapture it.
Sweet spot- perfect for business travel
Joe is a friendly host and the location of the apartment is awesome.

A good place to stay in manhattan. in  East Village and near a lot of restaurants and bars. And a beautifull view!! 

Un bon endroit pour visiter Manhattan. Dans le quartier d’East Village à côté de nombreux restaurants et bars sympa. Et une vue magnifique!!
I've stayed at this place a few times now because it is very conveniently located, a cute space, love the roofdeck, and Joe is easy to communicate with.
Joe's house was cozy place. And he was great host. He replied me quickly, it helped me a lot. Thank you Joe, I'll go again if I go NY next time:)
Good place, lots of activity around and great location, space not quite what we were looking for

This was a solid place to crash for a night. Like others noted, the room is small and the stairs are a hike but the rooftop deck is sweet and the neighborhood is awesome. Joe was easy to get in touch with and provided super detailed directions for check-in.

The place is close to the subway station.
I was comfortable while I was staying there.
Great location.  Joe was very responsive to any questions we had. Rooftop was amazing.
Hands down the best host I've ever had through Airbnb, super nice guy and unbelievably accommodating. Would definitely recommend.
Joe is a very kind host, and the location is perfect. 10/10 would recommend. Will be staying with him again next time I head to NYC.
Joe was such an accommodating and respectable host. The 5 floor walk up is no joke so be prepared to climb, however the views from the roof top are totally worth it.

I have stayed all over New York over the last 25 years but never in the East Village. This was by far my favorite neighborhood I’ve ever stayed in, and Joe’s location is outstanding. Affordable restaurants, great super markets, and public transit are all around. Patisserie Florentine on 10th was my favorite place to get coffee and pastries in the morning, but there is also a great place on 11th (Veniero’s) for pastry. Westside Market on 3rd Ave is a nice market for fresh fruit and prepared foods. I loved Beyond Sushi on 14th Street for fast, fresh, affordable Vegan meals (and the people there were super friendly). The Strand Bookstore is a short walk away, and the L train is just two blocks away for a quick ride into Williamsburg/Brooklyn. UCB theater is a few blocks south for cheap, fun stand-up comedy, East Village Cinema is just a couple blocks away for indie/foreign films, and of course Union Square is just right down 14th. There’s also a Trader Joe’s on 14th but it is really crowded. Lots of fun stuff to do in the area. 

I am a female and traveled alone, often returning to the apartment very late at night, and I felt completely safe. The apartment is as represented—not flashy or glamorous, just basic, convenient, and affordable. The trickiest part was the shower—it’s got a mind of it’s own but it’s not a deal breaker. The room next to mine had two guests, and Joe had his own room. There is only one bathroom but I never had to wait more than 10 minutes to use it. At one point there were four other people in the apartment when Joe had a friend staying with him. Everyone was very very quiet and respectful of others when taking time in the bathroom. However, if you are someone who does not like sharing a bathroom with so many people (and it is a small bathroom) and you do not like walking up five flights of stairs, you should probably find another place. 

I could not have been happier with this location and will definitely return to the East Village.
Great place - amazing roof terrace, good room, great location. Would definitely stay again.
Thanks Joe, room was as described - very convenient.  Glad you had an extra Iphone adapter too!

Great place to stay in NYC. We loved to watch the sun go down in the cozy rooftop. The appartment is tiny but with a lot of authentic charm. Joe is a friendly and responsible Host and did everything to make us feel AS comfy es possible (Like explain the remote control to me almost 20 Times).

Just as described - nice room in a fantastic location for a fair price, with the added bonus of a lovely skyline view from the rooftop. Joe was very friendly and accommodating, but also let me keep mostly to myself. Would definitely recommend if you're looking to be in the East Village or along the L train.

Joe was a great host and was very accommodating with checking in and out. He was very kind and I felt very comfortable as a solo female traveler staying at his place. Very walkable area. Thank you Joe!
Perfect location and room for a solo traveler looking to spend a few days in NYC. Can’t be the price and proximity and Joe is very helpful and communicative!
괜찮은 숙소입니다. 미드타운이나 로어타운가기에 적당한 위치이며, 지하철 이용시 더 좋습니다. 뿐만 아니라 roof deck에서 보는 아침 낮 저녁의 맨하튼 하늘은 너무나도 이쁩니다.

Great location & a lovely rooftop.
However, as stated, the room is good for only 1 person or 2 people (traveling light!). Cleanliness could also be improved as there were stains on the towels.
Good location and an overall satisfying stay.
Think before you take this place!
Excelente ubicación lo recomiendo en un 100%. Es un poco pequeño el lugar pero para pasar la noche es perfecto. Joe un gran anfitrión nos recibió muy bien y siempre atento a nuestras solicitudes.
Great space with an amazing view of the city! So much to do within walking distance.
I thought that he was very good with responding quickly and the description is very accurate!
Joe was very accommodating to us which we really appreciated. In a great location and the rooftop view is amazing.
Great location, tight space but convenient stay, Joe was very nice. The spiral stairs going up to the roof top was amazing I’d just perfer clean and/or newer towels and linen but the price was good.
In the heart of the East Village! The roof deck is a great place to relax and enjoy the city.

Me and a friend rented one of the bedrooms for a Saturday night. 
The price is crazy good for the location! If you like to walk or ride a bike, it’s very close to everything on manhattan. We used the subway, the station is about 3 minutes away.

Check in and out were super easy and Joe was flexible with that which was nice for us. 
It’s a nice neighborhood with actually everything you need. 

Joe is an amazing host. We talked with him for hours on the roof deck. He made sure we had everything we needed and if we would have asked for more, I’m sure he would have gotten it.
The sharing of one bathroom is usually not my favorite but it was not a problem at all there. 

We would definitely stay there again!

Joe is a truly exceptional individual and his apartment is such a gem. I truly cannot state how much I enjoyed and appreciated him and his hospitality. Needless to say, this is the first of many trips that I’ll be making to stay with him when coming to the city. I can’t recommend Joe enough. You will NOT be disappointed if you stay with him.
We (two girls, 19 and 18) were at Joes for one week. Joe was a very good host. He was friendly but not interfering. The rooftop was amazing.
Great place to stay and in an awesome neighborhood. Had great food and drinks and the rest of the city was easily accessible through the subway lines.

Joes place is fantastic! Location is unreal, room was perfect for my 5 days in New York before I flew home. Easy access to the sites and subway and great places to eat and drink!  Joe is very helpful and quick in responding to any problems you may have! Would definately stay there again
Joe is very cordial and helpful with everything from where to go for organic breakfast to how to navigate the subway. The building is old but the bed is super comfy and the neighborhood is good.

It’s a convenient place to stay. The room was great. It had its own air conditioner, too! Joe is a very nice guy and was accommodating to leaving my bags there until the late afternoon on check-out day. Thanks, Joe!

Joe was a very nice host, and the location of the apartment was absolutely perfect. Furthermore, Joe was very helpful, when we had forgot our raincoats in the apartment. However, the aparment could have been cleaner, and our check in was a bit delayed.

Joe's apartment is in the middle of action in East Village. If you are light traveler this place is for you. Five flights of stairs up to his pad on the fifth floor and the room is small of you have very large luggage.
위치가 너무 좋았고 주변 교통도 이용하기 좋았음

Joe's apartment is great and Joe is a very nice host! I really enjoyed staying at his place. He is willing to explain everything, tell you something about living in Manhattan and is very fast with answering all the questions you might have. The apartment is not huge but clean, convenient and quiet. The rooms was nice, had a huge bed, airco and a lockable door. I especially enjoyed having breakfast and dinner on the rooftop, because of the amazing view from up there! The apartment is located very close to the L-train subway station (1st ave) and in a nice and  lively neighborhood. There is a cheap deli across the street where you can buy amazing bacon,egg&cheese rolls. There are several laundromats located close to the apartment, which are convenient to use. I will definitely come back!
Great location and excellent hospitality.  I would stay here again next time I'm in the city!

Joe’s appartment is located in the very lively East Village neighborhood (which I love, I stay in that same area each time I come to New York). 
After 5 flights of stairs (Joe warns you about it) and very accurate information on how to enter the place (in case Joe’s not home at that moment), you enter his home, that will become yours for the duration of your stay. 
The appartment is not big, but this is New York! Nevertheless, you have enough space for your room and in the common areas (kitchen, living room, bathroom, and of course the rooftop). 
AC is very convenient on the hot days of the New York summer. There are units in the bedrooms and the living room. 
Kitchen is easy to use, and Joe insists on the fact you can use whatever you need in there. 
Bathroom is shared with Joe, and possibly another guest, but I never had to wait to use it. It’s a little old (but then again, old building) but clean. Be careful to the hot water in the shower: it seems to have a mind on its own ;)
Bedroom is not super big, but you have a large and comfortable bed and a closet to hang your clothes (for the bedroom I was renting, that closet is in the living room, that is not at all an issue). 
And finally, up one last flight of stairs, you have access to a private rooftop over the city. Perfect for the morning coffee or a drink after a day visiting. That was the little plus!
Joe is a very kind guy, that makes everything he can to help you have a nice stay, he’s very quiet and let you a lot of space in his own home. 

Overall a nice stay in a nice appartment with a nice host!
Joe is a very welcoming person and felt us right at home.

If you’re traveling light and need a cozy place to crash, Joe’s is the place to be. The location was great for connecting to just about anywhere in the city. There’s a rooftop deck that is a perfect oasis to relax and take in the cityscape if you need a break from the urban hustle.
Joe has a comfortable home in a great location.
Joe's place was as advertised.
Outstanding place in a really cool area. The rooftop was perfect.
Great place at an awesone location with a good price.
Logement bien situé. Hôte flexible. Bon rapport qualité prix, cependant on y va pas pour la propreté absolue xD

The location is amazing,and Joe is a great host.
The stairs are not easy (5 of them to climb) when you are like us (older people)
But, Joe warns you about it in his listing.
Joe was very flexible about our check-out.
We could stay longer at his place because our flight back home was later on the day.
Great
Good value accommodation in a really useful location.
Joe is a very smart and friendly host! The flat is very nice with a great view to NYC's Skyline! If I come back I will stay there again :-)
Joe’s apartment has an excelent location. Joe is very helpful and friendly.

Joe’s place was great. Excellent location, there’s all kinds of good food nearby and it is close to NYU’s School of Medicine which was important for my stay. The room is purely functional - there is a bed with some outlets and place to put your things. It won’t be sparking clean or organized as a hotel is, but for how nice Joe was and the location, it is pretty much a bargain. He also has all kinds of snacks, coffee, and toiletries you can use/have if needed. And lastly, his view from his roof is amazing. Super awesome and would recommend if you need a place to stay near East Village.

The host is nice and the location is great. Joe had plenty of suggestions of places to go to eat or for entertainment. The rooftop deck view had beautiful views of the city. The neighborhood was quiet and we had a good night’s sleep. The room is small for 2 people but would be fine for 1 person

bon emplacement pour navguer sur manhattan, trés belle vue du toit pour se poser apres une journée de marche , le rapport qualité prix est excellent mais il ne faut pas s'attendre a un grand confort dans les chambres ni dans les espaces communs. Joe est trés aimable , trés flexible et trés arrangeant. un endroit ideal pour les petits budgets et pour un sejour de courte durée
The place is great, Joe is great, the roof is great. Book it, enjoy NYC.

I enjoyed staying at Joe's and would go again. Joe was very kind to us, communication was prompt and helpful, and the flat is conveniently located. The room is small and cozy, surprisingly quiet given that it is in downtown NY. I would recommend Joe's place to my friends!

Joe was an amazing host! His hospitality was above and beyond what we expected. Check-in and check-out times were flexible and he offered great tips about seeing the city. The rooftop view of the skyline was unforgettable. The location is great and made subway travel very convenient. Overall, a great place to stay!

Joe's place was a great base for a visit to New York. The room is comfy, clean, and great value for the location, and the roof terrace was wonderful. Joe was also very helpful when it came to coordinating my arrival, even when transportation issues meant I ended up arriving much later than planned. Thoroughly recommended - I hope to be back!

Joe is a super nice guy, and went out of his way to accommodate me when I ran to into a snag. But if I’m being honest, I have to share that the place is very grimy. It’s not his fault, but the stairs and stair well look like they have never been mopped or scrubbed since the building has existed, and the rooms themselves are quite grimy and cluttery...bring Lysol wipes.

Awesome location and great host! Joe was very easy to get in contact with and very personable during my stay. Incredibly close to the subway and all sorts of food. The open rooftop also as cute as I pictured it to be and great for taking in the view after a long day of sightseeing.

This room is perfect for setting your belongings down in a safe space and getting out to explore the city. It's in a wonderful location on the lower east side and is close to so many amazing restaurants. Joe was very accommodating and an incredibly kind person. There is not a lot of space in the room so if you're looking for somewhere to sprawl out this may not be the best option, but for me and my purposes it was perfect. I didn't want to spend a whole lot of time in my room anyways, for the large majority of my stay I was out exploring the city. At night it's the perfect place to retire to after a long day of walking Manhattan. I'll definitely try to stay here again if I come back to NY. Thanks Joe!
Joe was great host. 5 flights up was rough but expected. Great area too!
Great place and host. 100% recommended. Thank you!
Joe is a really cool guy with a load of local knowledge, his place is in a fantastic location for the Subway, places to eat and drink, plus the view from the roof terrace is awesome.

Joe's instructions are clear and it is easy to get to his place. As he mentioned,  you definitely have to climb up 5 flights of stairs. I was winded by the third floor with a heavy suitcase, but consider it a nice workout. There is a room set aside where the bed takes up most of the space and you can put your belongings in another room. The bed is comfy and he provides 3 pillows and enough blankets to stay warm. The shower is ok; I couldn't quite figure out the temperature because it kept shifting. He provides a plethora of shampoo and one kind of conditioner. I'm a stickler when it comes to my hair so I'd suggest bringing your conditioner if you are too. He provides coffee and various breakfast foods. It can be a bit loud in the room - the outside noise seeps in. I heard a lot of construction, people singing, talking. I'm a deep sleeper however so I got through it. Thanks Joe!

There’s stairs to negotiate. The toilet flush lever is problematic, and the old style radiator heater hissed me to sleep. Otherwise a gem of an AirBnB and I’ll definitely stay here again if I can. Joe was super friendly and very considerate. The place has mad style with a nice rooftop access. Totally worth it!
A cosy little nook in the city! Great views from the roof terrace. Friendly host. Nice location. Could just do with a bit of tidying and fixing up...
Overall conveniently located & good place to stay if you’ll be out exploring the city all day!
Small room in a really nice and fun neighbourhood, easy to get around. Hence a perfect location if you are planning to explore the city all day long!
il recommend strongly a stay at Joe :).

Pros: Host seems super nice, and very accommodating.  The place is nicely located, and as someone who just needed somewhere to crash while dealing with foreign consulates in NYC, it was exactly what I needed.
Cons: Grimy building, lots of broken decor and a very noisy (though comfortably warm) radiator. I'm a bit spoiled from using AirBnB in smaller/cheaper cities and abroad, so I may have had inflated expectations; it's probably par for the course for the area.
This was my first trip alone and I couldn't have felt any safer. Plus his place is close to everything. Joe was incredibly responsive and available at all times. Definitely recommend!
Bonne location
Joe is super nice and the place is really convenient!

A super pleasant and hospitable host who goes the extra mile - even washed my bed linens in fragrance free detergent when I asked. A comfortable, cozy, casual place in a fantastic location with great restaurants, movie theaters, etc. Great value!
Great spot, Joe was a great host and was very respectful. Room was exactly as advertised.

It’s all about location location location. two blocks from the subway and bus lines. Friendly safe neighborhood to walk around and the best bagels right around the corner. Joe was quick with responses to any questions I had and check in was easy.
Joe was a great host! The place is as advertised.
Great location, excellent host. Recommend this place.
Joe is brilliant, as is his apartment. Great location, easy to get to from Penn etc. - highly recommend staying here.

La descripción es real, la ubicación es muy buena, el barrio es muy seguro y tiene estación de tren subterráneo a dos cuadras de distancia. El dormitorio es pequeño, recomiendo solo para una persona, con dos personas en el dormitorio se vuelve incómoda la estadía. el dormitorio tiene muebles algo viejos y poco funcionales. Joe entrega instrucciones reales y muy precisas de cómo llegar y lo que ofrece y cómo funciona su departamento. En resumen: buena ubicación, Joe no miente en la descripción pero podría mejorar mucho con sólo modernizar el aspecto del pequeño dormitorio que ofrece.

Accomodated all of my last minute requests, couldnt have asked for a better host in NYC. Best for anyone super low maintenance just needing a comfortable place to stay. Felt like staying at a friend's house which may sound plain to some but i cant think of a higher way to praise my guy Joe.
Absolutely would try and stay here again.

Joe was an excellent host. He made everything extremely easy and wanted to make sure I was taken care of. While I didn’t stay in the apartment much during my trip, it was still made to be everything I hoped for. Would recommend this place to anyone.
Great apartment in an amazing location.
Very nice stay in a neat part of the city
Joe's place is fabulous. Easy to get to and accessible. Very cozy set up and I thought was of great value. Thank you Joe!

Joe was an extremely accommodating host. Awesome apartment on the top floor with a roof top patio that is perfect for morning and night views of the city. Apartment and bedroom were very comfortable and made me feel right at home. Amenities beyond what I was expecting. Amazing location, right in the middle of all the best restaurants. Momofuku Noodle Bar and milk bar are just a couple minute walk. Lots of night life. Just a couple blocks from the subway, very easy to get around. Will def be staying here again!

Joe is a nice and easy going host. The place is a very typical stay in NY. It works well for me because of the location and all amenities Joe offered. He even let me leave my bag there to pick up later due to my business schedule. Good experience!
Great hospitality and homely place

name: Sua casa no Rio de Janeiro
summary: Meu imóvel fica perto dos principais Shopping da Barra, Shopping Metropolitano Barra, Outback Steakhouse, a 10min da Praia da Barra. Você vai aproveitar muito meu esse espaço por causa da área de lazer completa com piscina, bar, restaurante. O apartamento tem toda a estrutura; cozinha americana com cafeteira, torradeira, taça de vinho, etc. Quarto com cama confortável, armários, espelho grande e ar condicionado. Meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias (com crianças).
space: O condominio tem ônibus próprio com saída de meia em meia hora e de hora em hora em outros momentos.  O ônibus te leva para os principais pontos da Barra da Tijuca de graça.
description: Meu imóvel fica perto dos principais Shopping da Barra, Shopping Metropolitano Barra, Outback Steakhouse, a 10min da Praia da Barra. Você vai aproveitar muito meu esse espaço por causa da área de lazer completa com piscina, bar, restaurante. O apartamento tem toda a estrutura; cozinha americana com cafeteira, torradeira, taça de vinho, etc. Quarto com cama confortável, armários, espelho grande e ar condicionado. Meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios e famílias (com crianças). O condominio tem ônibus próprio com saída de meia em meia hora e de hora em hora em outros momentos.  O ônibus te leva para os principais pontos da Barra da Tijuca de graça. A Barra da Tijuca é um dos bairros com maior quantidade de shoppings e restaurantes fantásticos por metro quadrado.  É banhado por uma praia com mais de 22km de orla com ciclovia e vários quiosques ótimo para tomar uma agua de coco ou uma cervejinha com vista para o mar.
neighborhood_overview: A Barra da Tijuca é um dos bairros com maior quantidade de shoppings e restaurantes fantásticos por metro quadrado.  É banhado por uma praia com mais de 22km de orla com ciclovia e vários quiosques ótimo para tomar uma agua de coco ou uma cervejinha com vista para o mar.
house_rules: Acredito no bom senso das pessoas e espero que cuidem bem do apartamento durante sua hospedagem.

host.host_about:
Sou nascido no Rio de Janeiro desde 1973, adoro viajar e ser bem recebido por onde ando. Já fui para, Barcelona, Madri, Lisboa, Porto, Paris, Amsterdam, Roma, Veneza, Florença, Buenos Aires, Chicago, Nove York, Washington, Londres, etc. Por isso resolvi alugar este apartamento para viajantes.
Trabalho com publicidade e sou amante de esportes ao ar livre, vela oceânica, canoagem/surfski, mountain bike, surf, etc.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Leonardo foi um excelente anfitrião. Fácil de conversar e rápido nos retorno dos contatos. Boa alternativa para quem deseja passar um tempo no RJ
It has great potential.
Ótimo apto,  Leonardo e seu irmão Jorge bastante simpáticos. Ambiente ótimo para família, o condomínio é bem completo também. Super recomendo!

host.host_about:
ALOHA and WELCOME to Waikiki, Honolulu on Oahu!  Thank you for your interest in one of our vacation rentals.  We are a TEAM of professionals who manage individually owned condo apartments for the owners when they aren't using them within several different condo / hotel buildings in Waikiki.   We offer a range of accommodations types from small studio apartments (with or without kitchenettes) to 2 bedroom residences with full kitchens.  

We want your stay to be an enjoyable one and finding the right match for you is key.  As a general guideline, there are many different types of buildings and hotel-type of arrangements.  For those doing Hawaii on a budget, studios offer the best of both worlds providing a clean, private place to stay within walking distance to the BEACH at affordable prices (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities).   For those looking for nicer or larger accommodations, then you should target $150/night off season to $250/night peak season (vary for upgrades, views, cooking abilities, building amenities, parking included).  If you are looking for an Ocean-front experience, then target $350- $400/night and for a luxury experience, $500 to over $1000/night.  Hawaii offers something for everyone at every price point!  

Our vacation rental units are privately owned and managed.  We offer an alternative to the hotel experience allowing our guests to “live like a local” in paradise whether be for a few days, a few weeks or a few months.  Our units are well maintained, repaired when necessary and treated routinely with pest control services.  We try not to interrupt our guests during their stay, and if the unexpected happens, we do our best to resolve it quickly with the least inconvenience to our guests.   Upon arrival, we try to meet all our guests personally to register, check-in, and answer any questions.  And if you’re running late don’t worry, we can make arrangements no matter the hour and register you in the office the next day.  

Stop by our real estate office, ground floor of Kuhio Village.  We are there daily to assist and share this incredibly beautiful island, local eateries, activities and entertainment found in Waikiki and around the island.  We look forward to hosting you in one of our vacation rental units and helping to make your stay a fantastic one.  A hui hou (until we meet again)!

Aloha & Mahalo nui loa (Hello/Goodbye & Thank you very much),
Hawaii Dream Realty Team, Hi’ilani, Luise & Theresa
Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB-19373, Theresa Harden PB (R) RB-19372

Everything was great. The host was available to meet me at last notice and was accommodating with providing a much needed iron (for evening wardrobe).  Also, once messaged Louise would reply right away which was helpful. We had a very clean and nice room plus an amazing pool available to us. Downtown was just going out of the building. Restaurants and shops were minutes away from this place so it was super convenient. Our only small hassle was turning in the room keys, no other copies were available so we had the only two but managed to leave one in the room and the other at the front desk. The lady there (not affiliated with this rental company) was hesitant to keep the key, for various reasons. That wasn't enough to ruin anything - our family vacation was still awesome! Thanks again.

Professionals.  Great communication and great apartment !

When we arrived Hawaiian Dream A A rep from Hawaii Dream  Realty was sure to greet us upon our arrival at the airbnb. The building is centrally located and is very close to the Sheraton, Dukes and Sky Waikiki; however, the room is a much older unit. We actually had some issues with the water upon arrival. After a lengthy flight from the East Coast we were looking forward to a shower, but to our unortunate surprise the water was brown. In addition, we noticed that the blinds above the AC unit had gaps. We were concerned about mosquitos getting in. We brought both of these concerns to our Hawaii Dream Realty rep and she went out of her way to try to find us somewhere else to stay. Luckily they own several units and they were able to place us in another room until the water issue was fixed (we would have to just deal with the blinds). However, the room they moved us to (temporarily) only had one bed. We had specifically chose the original room because it offered two double beds for the three adults that would be staying. Our 3rd friend was taking a later flight so Hawaii Dream Realty offered us the smaller room for the time being. The water was a major concern so we took the smaller room. They told us that it was technically an upgrade because it was a newer unit. It must be said again that they did make efforts to be as accommodating as they could be; however, we were paying for a room for three adults. After being moved back to the original unit (water issue resolved), we mentioned this to Hawaii Dream Realty; but they offered no additional compensation because they said that they had to cover cleaning costs for the alternate room that they provided. We accepted the situation, but it had not been our fault that the displacement occurred in the first place and this was slightly bothersome. The room that we returned to after two days continued to provide some unpleasant surprises. The last two days we were visited by 3 cockroaches which probably got in through the blinds since we saw one on the balcony one evening. We were careful not to leave food out and were pretty clean since we spent minimal time in the room besides bedtime and showers. Also, the building had only one functioning elevator during our stay so we always needed to leave extra early to account for the amount of time it took for the elevator to get to us. Hawaii Dream Realty did check up on us throughout the rest of our trip, but we had a packed schedule. We do not recommend staying in this particular unit; however, Hawaii Dream Realty has other more promising units and they were very pleasant to deal with.

There’re 4 big pluses and 4 minor minuses that I’ve noted during my weeklong stay at this property-
 
Starting off with the big pluses:
1. Location: the location of this property can’t be beaten. It’s within minutes of walk to the Waikiki shopping plaza, International Marketplace, Waikiki beach, and popular eateries such as Marukame Udon, Marugo Brothers, Masubi Cafe, etc. There’s a Cajun shrimp restaurant right on the first floor of this apartment as well!
2. Free parking: since we rented a car for our vacation, having a designated parking spot in the apartment definitely saved us a lot of money and hassle.
3. Responsiveness: the property manager was extremely responsive to my messages and always responded to my inquiries quickly.
4. Good AC unit: the air conditioning in the room was good and reliable, which was essential for the tropical weathers of Honolulu.

Now onto the minor minuses:
1. Intermittent WiFi: we had trouble with the WiFi as soon as we checked in. When we called the property management office, we were given the phone number of the cable company and was asked to call them ourselves. I was a little put off by this. In my mind, this should be something that is resolved by the property owner, especially since we were not even the account holder and did not have the authority to call and inquire about WiFi services.
2. Clogged kitchen sink: we found the kitchen sink to be clogged during our check in. The property manager offered to have a handyman to come and fix it. But since we didn’t want to deal with the hassle, we declined the offer.
3. Shower temperature: the water temperature in the shower fluctuated a lot. The water got hot really quickly, but sometimes would turn lukewarm or cold for no reasons.
4. Check in process: in my check in instructions, I was asked to call 10 minutes before my arrival at the apartment so someone could come and hand me the keys. Well, I called 15 minutes ahead of my arrival, but still ended up waiting another half hour upon my arrival before someone showed up to give me the keys. A half hour wait was painstakingly long when you had two screaming 2yo toddlers in the car.

All in all, we had a great stay at this property despite the small inconveniences. If the property manager can get on top of the negatives that I’ve mentioned, this could easily become a 5-star experience for us.

Hawaii Dream Realty TEAMs place was very comfortable. 
The location is excellent!  Close to beach, shops, restaurants and public transport. If you drive in Hawaii, this apt is perfect for you. Would recommend to stay here. 
Mahalo :)

The unit is in an older building, with dingy hallways and elevator. The unit and furnishings are dated - think motel style, with old dark carpeting, stained doorway trim that looks dirty, rust stains in the tub, broken handle on the desk. There is quite a bit of noise from the busy streets and night life, as the wall is thin where the AC unit is. 
The location is great, with many amenities and eateries on the same street. You are literally in the heart of Waikiki, which is great because the unit comes with parking and you can walk anywhere you need to! 
The pool is located on the 6th floor, closes at 7pm. It isn't anything fancy at all. 
There are laundry facilities right across the hall, but no information in the unit on needing a laundry card which you can only get during business hours from the front desk. 
Our check in experience was not great - no information was provided on the paperwork required, only one key provided which is inconvenient as you need the key fob to use the elevator, agent didn't know where the pool was located. 
There are nice little amenities provided - Hawaiian coffee, teas, small toiletries, paper towel, dish soap.

We stayed at Tomasz's place for 4 nights. The apartment and the room are spacious. The bed at our was comfortable.  The kitchen had all amenities. Toilet and showers were very clean. My fiancee and I wanted to check out Barcelona for a couple of days and staying at Tomasz's was the perfect place for us. 
We were very warmly greeted, and given a personal map with places circled that we might like to check out. 
It was my fiancee's birthday and they gave us a bottle of wine, which we thought was super sweet. 
As far as the location goes, it's perfect. You're close to the beach and the city center. We were able to walk everywhere!

Все было хорошо.
중심가에서 좀 거리가 있지만, 엘레베이터가 있어서 편하고 무엇보다 호스트가 굉장히 친절합니다 :) 덕분에 바르셀로나에서 잘 지내다갑니다! 감사합니다

They welcomed us very nicely when we arrived. Everything was set and ready. The apartment is nice, but has 4 bedrooms, so it might be crowded. Some bedrooms had windows outside, but other ones had windows to the inside of the house hallway. The location is good, a short walk away from the ciutadella park and arc de triumph. In general it was a very good experience as everything went very smoothly. :)
