address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
William's apartment was the perfect place for my first ever visit to Hong Kong. The apartment's size was much bigger than I thought! For a 6.2 footer, I was surprised to see how spacious it was, considering how small the average apartments are in HK.
Within 5 mins walk, I had the fame Kwan Kee Claypot Rice. As much as I'd hate to admit it, was better than what I was accustomed to in Singapore.
Coffeeholics will be stoked to know 3 proper coffee makers within 1, 2 and 4 mins walk away from the apartment.
Alcoholics can find local breweries scattered about with the closest being just 1 min walk away. I highly recommend visiting Ping Pong Gintonería. An old ping pong supply store turned into a popular Spanish drinking hole.
MTR station has 2 exits just 3 mins walk/escalator ride away. Hats off to the Hong Kong Metro System, taking you to every part of the city within minutes.
Definitely will be back again to William's apartment, this time to complete Lion's Rock.

This apartment is in a great location,  The apartment was very clean, and all arrangements and communication with William was easy.  I liked the quiet building, with no noise and no cooking smells.  The apartment is well furnished, with a comfortable bed.  As usual in Hong Kong, it is a small space, but the pleasant decoration makes it feel like home.  TV system is easy to operate.  The location is the highlight, with lots to do the minute you walk out the door.

I stayed at William's apartment for a month since I needed a place to stay on short notice as my new work visa was getting processed and while I was in between rental contracts.

Communication with William was easy and he was very friendly, responsive and accommodating: I needed access to the letter box because I was supposed to receive letters from my bank and employer, so William let me have an extra key. 

As per usual in Hong Kong the apartment is small with a tiny bathroom, but just big enough for one person and it has lots of sunlight. Probably a bit crammed for two if you're staying longer than a couple of days. It has absolutely everything you might need during the stay, which is great, though a second set of sheets/duvet covers would be lovely for longer stays.
One thing to consider is the humidity - Hong Kong in general is humid but it felt extra stuffy in this flat, compared to three other places on the island I've lived in over the past few years. The only solution was to run the AC even though it wasn't particularly hot.

The location is excellent, right next to Centre Street and its escalator. Lots of eateries and cafes around, plus the market hall is just down the street. The MTR is a short walk away. The location comes at a small price though: while there isn't really a lot of traffic in the street itself, the shops will get their groceries delivered in the (EARLY) mornings right underneath the flat and across the street - the running engines are really loud and woke me up every day until I started sleeping with ear plugs. It's surprisingly quiet otherwise though. And Sai Ying Pun is an awesome area to stay in when visiting Hong Kong!

My parents stay in William's apartment for a month, and their stay is a great experience.  Ricky, the co-host, is really helpful.   My parents appreciate his prompt response to their questions and requests, and with good manner.  The apartment is clean and well-maintained.  It's a bright apartment with multiple windows.  The bedroom has a comfortable bed and is a good size for a couple.  With more space alloted to the bedroom and the living room,  the shower & kitchen appear relatively small.   However, this is understandable for an usual apartment in Hong Kong.     WIFI functions well in the apartment.   The location is very convenient:  numerous choices of restaurants downstairs;  a few steps to supermarket & fresh food market (where my mother particularly likes as she likes to cook fresh seafood and veg); short walking distance to mass transit railway station; and a number of escalators connect the streets to the north and the south.
Very local place, amazing location in sai ying pun. Small but comfortable place, although the washroom is tiny.
Great place, clean and all well organized by William from the beginning to the end of the journey !
Great location and hospitality!!!

My husband and I stayed at William's apartment for 14 days. I am afraid that we found more negatives than positives. The place wasn't clean (filthy actually), end up William has arranged the cleaner came to clean it again...Not the Best Outcome still. The unit is very small, particularly the bathroom. My husband who is 183cm tall and 93kg found it impossible to have a shower without brushing against the cold wall tiles. The basin in the bathroom is best described as a miniature (half of the A4 size paper)

The location is good, plenty of restaurants and close to Sai Ying Pun MTR.

William's place is as it is described. Great looking very location near MTR in a small apartment, that has all you need. It's a little dated and not dazzling clean , and the curtain rail tends to fall off if you open the bedroom curtains, but overall, for a HK apartment at this price, you can't grumble. If you are a big person you may seriously struggle in the bathroom.
Great neighbourhood, not for a person over 6ft and 200lbs.

Great place, great people! Loved our stay in Hong Kong.  The location of the appartment is very convenient.  William and Ricky gave very details indications on how to arrive.  Easy check in, easy check out.  Clean, nice appartment in safe neighbourhood.
The location is perfect. There were problems such as curtain and hot water but the host responses quite fast.
Close to mtr, clean place and cozy,. Fantastic hosts and available. I recommend staying with them
Nice flat in a great location near the MRT, with a nice double bed, sofa and kitchen, and a friendly host. Only downside is the small cloakroom-sized washbasin in the bathroom.

As mentioned in other reviews, this does have a small lounge area. This isn’t a problem though as you’re likely to spend more time out of the apartment than in it. It’s a very convenient location to many different style of restaurants as well as to the MTR (trains), trams and taxis. It’s also a very walkable location to many places. The bedroom is larger than a lot of HK bedrooms and is plenty of room for a couple. 

The bathroom is on the smaller side and the shower area is more of a long and narrow one rather than wide. Small bathrooms are also fairly common in HK apartments of this size (as are kitchens) so if you’re concerned about the size of this one, you may want to ask the size of the bathrooms at the other places you research before booking. It was fine for me and I didn’t expect it to be any bigger than it was. If you are looking for something bigger, it is likely you would also have a bigger lounge area and it would also be more expensive as a result. 

William and Jackie were very helpful throughout my stay (and even prior) and answered all my questions promptly. They were both very helpful and I’d be fine with staying here again. Great location, small apartment (all I needed!) and great hosts.
I was staying in William’s home for two weeks in late Mar. It was a pleasant trip and I appreciate Jackie and William’s warm hospitality. This is a affordable place with a perfect location.
The place is really cozy perfect for staying in there’s also fancy restaurants nearby like 1-2mins walk. Love the place I would definitely stay again.
Clean, nice, central location. :)
Great location, very comfortable place, clean and tidy, checking in and out supper easy and everthing was exactly as stated in the information we recieved.
Cher pour ce que c'est, mais voila c'est Hong Kong, le quartier est agreable, mais le bruit ambient et la mauvaise disposition de l'appartement le rende finalement moins agreable que prevu.
Absolute gem in a very convenient location. The place is very cozy and comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Conveniently located in a great area in SYP, spacious fully equipped apartment, lots of good eateries in the area, close to all transportation.

The host, William was fantastic - great communication to every question I had. Smooth Check-in process & a very comfortable stay at his property.

Thanks again William.
William’s place has a great location. The apartment is nice but the bathroom is a bit small. Overall the stay is good. Excellent communication.
Very clean decent size apartment in a great neighborhood. Also close to the MTR station and was very convenient. Definitely recommend.
Willian`s place is well located and had a good size for HK.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Apartamento de 30m2 no coração de Santa Teresa
summary: Apartamento de 30m2, em uma casa c/ 6 apartamentos, localizada no centro de Santa Teresa.
space: O aprtamento tem configuração de um mini-loft, com os espaços integrados. É bem luminoso e possui um balcão com vista para a rua.
description: Apartamento de 30m2, em uma casa c/ 6 apartamentos, localizada no centro de Santa Teresa. O aprtamento tem configuração de um mini-loft, com os espaços integrados. É bem luminoso e possui um balcão com vista para a rua.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou nascido e criado em Santa Teresa e adoro este bairro. Tive a oportunidade de viajar bastante pelo meu trabalho, tendo morado na França e nos Emirados Árabes Unidos. Quando voltei dos Emirados, comprei essa casa e reformei seu interior, para dividí-la em aprtamentos menores. A inspiração foi nos 'Studios' de Paris e quis criar espaços funcionais e charmosos, onde duas pessoas possam viver confortavelmente. O projeto deu tão certo que a grande maioria dos meus hóspedes ficam mêses, às vêzes anos, em seus apartamentos ! Contudo, gosto de deixar sempre um apartamento reservado para acolher o viajante que vem só por alguns dias. Esses 'visitantes' ajudam manter o clima de aubergue e enriquecem a dinâmica da casa. Sejam bem-vindos!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apartamento do Raul é perfeito, muito agradável, espaçoso, bem estruturado e com uma localização pivilegiada - perto de tudo e ao mesmo tempo reservado. Ali, eu e minha namorara desfrutamos de tudo q há de melhor em Santa Teresa. E se quiséssemos ir pra Lapa, tinha condução na porta. Super recomendo.

Santa Teresa is the place to be.

Thanks for your kindness. We had a realy great time in Santa Teresa.
It's a cool spot with nice artists and bars and your housekeeper was really sweet.
Salut Janaina&Hans

We had some lovely days. Raouls apartment is very nice with a lovely balcony to enjoy the morning  sun and it is in the absolute center of romantic Santa Teresa - just opposite one of its best bars (which, we've heard, actually serve some of the best feijoado in all of Rio)

We  will absolutely return on our next trip Rio
The location can't be better. Lovely place with a wide terrace and privacy. Clean, with good care

Lindo departamento, cómodo y con todo lo necesario para tener una buena estancia. Está en un lugar muy céntrico, Santa Teresa es un muy lindo lugar para quedarse, con muchos bares, el clásico bondinho, restaurantes y artistas cerca. Raul fue muy amable y Venina, su ayudante, muy atenta. Raul fue muy comprensivo cuando pedimos llegar antes de la hora indicada del check in. La pasamos excelente. Gracias por todo!
Wir hatten eine wunderschöne Unterkunft in zentraler Lage. Viele nette Bars in unmittelbarer Nähe. Raul beantwortete sofort alle Fragen und seine Housekeeperin war sehr nett.
Appartement super bien situé au cœur de Santa Teresa, idéal pour un couple

O bairro de Santa Teresa é muito especial e o espaço do Raul nos permitiu viver dias inesquecíveis. Tivemos fácil acesso à tudo: metrô, pontos turísticos como a escadaria de Selarón, Arcos la Lapa e também ao centro. A rua é bem movimentada com muitos bares, brechós, ateliês, restaurantes e um cinema na (Website hidden by Airbnb) fácil acesso ao bondinho de Santa Teresa.

O estúdio é limpo e perfeito para acomodar um casal. Possui entrada individual e uma frente agradável e cheia de plantas.

Foi certamente uma ótima escolha!

There's lots of charming things about the apartment, like location.  However, the bed was old and uncomfortable, plus the terrace smelt like dog pee. Hopefully those things can be addressed for the next person using the space

Apartamento muito agradavel, Caseira Dona Nina, é uma simpatia, muito hospitaleira. Imovel muito bem localizado, no coração de Santa Tereza, 4 min de carro ate o metro Gloria, onibus na porta do apto que passa no metro Carioca ou caminhada a pé 20 min ate o metro Gloria. Varias barzinhos na rua, a noite a movimentação e intensa e vc pode ficar da varanda, bebendo uma cerveja e curtinho o movimento. Recomendo com certeza

name: Ocean Blue Room
summary: Comfortable small room  located in Rego Park, Queens. Nices and safe neighborhood. Easy access to subway and 6minutes walking distance. Limited free parking included.
space: Small room with 2x Twin size comfortable beds. Bright room facing to south with huge window.  •Huge closet, night stand, air conditioner, central heating, hardwood floors. • Shared living room, bathroom and kitchen. • Shampoo, conditioner, body soap and clean towels are provided to each guest.
description: Comfortable small room  located in Rego Park, Queens. Nices and safe neighborhood. Easy access to subway and 6minutes walking distance. Limited free parking included. Small room with 2x Twin size comfortable beds. Bright room facing to south with huge window.  •Huge closet, night stand, air conditioner, central heating, hardwood floors. • Shared living room, bathroom and kitchen. • Shampoo, conditioner, body soap and clean towels are provided to each guest. • Each guest will have access code to open the front door. If we are not home, you can use the code to enter the house. • Guests will have FREE access to use washer/dryer. • Guests can have full access to common usage areas such as kitchen and living room. • Kitchen features modern appliances. Oven, gas range and hood, french door refrigerator, coffee station, kettle, toaster, microwave and blender. Utensils, wine glasses, mugs are available for guests to use. • Cooking oil, spices, tea bags, ground coffee are provided by host. • Di
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood surrounded by private townhouses and some residential buildings. The population today mixes Jewish, Eastern Europe, Chinese families. We are very close to the 3 big shopping malls, lots of restaurants and convenience stores including Century 21, Macy's, Target, Best Buy, Costco, Marshall's, TjMaxx, Sears, Bed Bath & Beyond and many more within walking distance of 5-10 mins. Longhorn Steakhouse and Olive Garden Italian Restaurant, Joe's Crab Shack and Buffalo Wild Wings are only 10 mins away. Close to CitiField, Willets Point and Corona Park.
notes: FREE parking in our backyard with limited availability. Please inquire it when you make a reservation. I will send you the instructions. •I gladly accept early arrivals and late departs. If you arrive early, you can spend time in our living room until your room is ready.  If you depart late, we can also keep your luggage and bags while you enjoy the city more and pick up later.
transit: We are only 5 mins away to nearest subway station. R, M and E (late night ONLY) trains running between Manhattan and Queens. it takes; 25 mins to Manhattan (Times Sq) via subway, 45 mins to JFK Airport via Subway and Airtran Shuttle, 30 mins to LaGuardia Airport via Q72 bus, 85 mins to Newark Liberty International Airport via Airtran shuttle + NJ transit + subway. Detailed directions and helpful tips will be sent to you automatically once you book with us.
access: • Each guest will have access code to open the front door. If we are not home, you can use the code to enter the house. • Guests will have FREE access to use washer/dryer. • Guests can have full access to common usage areas such as kitchen and living room. • Kitchen features modern appliances. Oven, gas range and hood, french door refrigerator, coffee station, kettle, toaster, microwave and blender. Utensils, wine glasses, mugs are available for guests to use. • Cooking oil, spices, tea bags, ground coffee are provided by host. • Dining table in the living room with 6x chairs. • Free Unlimited High Speed Wi-Fi (300 Mbps) and Roku, Netflix, Time Warner Cable TV and many more. • Iron and iron table are available upon request.
interaction: I am usually at home during the evenings and nights. I live in the same house. I have video door bell system that will allow you to contact me anytime even though I am not home at the moment.
house_rules: - No Shoes  - Visitors are NOT allowed in the house - No drugs - Wash your own dishes after you use the kitchen.

host.host_about: Middle class man . Like to do biking in central park . Swimming and try to taste different cousine.

reviews.comments: Great place, comfortable, private. Only problem was that the window in the bathroom was open, with a clear view to the apartments across the street.

I loved Joe's place , he was a great host ! He communicated to me very well, and made my stay very well, he's honestly one of the best Airbnb host ... this is refreshing booking him especially after recently having a bad experience from somewhere else, but he made my stay well worth the while ! I would definitely recommend him and use him again
Place is great as usual
Joe was a great host! He forgot our Check in but we were able to stay anyways! Thank you so much

Joes place the ocean blue room is amazing. Its super clean..bathroom kitchen all of it. The host is accommodating and provides everything you need. 3 blocks from public transportation to manhattan. Definitely a value stay.

Just make sure you contact joel in advance to make arrangements. Our communication was a bit slow times. Other than that this room is perfect.
Joe's place is at a convenient location and very comfortable. Thank you so much for being a nice and sweet host.

Joe is one of the nicest people I've ever met. The room itself is pretty small (not much space besides the two twin beds and the closet), but Joe gave us use of his full house, his kitchen, bathroom (though there's only one, which can cause a small line if everyone needs it) and living room and really anything we asked. When we needed to stay an extra day, he let us, and when we needed to stay an extra week, he found us another place and hooked us up with a deal. He's just a fantastic guy, and I absolutely promise that you will not regret staying here.
Joe is a really nice guy and help me a lot! He can also rent bike to guest in Manhattan, but it's a pity for me because of raining.
Place was well located, close to everything. Stay was ok.
Good but maybe causes confusing due to incorrect information.

Room as described in a safe, convenient and friendly neighbourhood. Joe is a super friendly host who goes out of his way to make you comfortable, which includes letting me wait around the house for my night flight. Thank you!

I picked this place for a simple stay ahead of a morning flight. The room itself was ok, but there were issues checking in (not helped by a slightly confusing house guide that left it ambiguous on which entrance to go through) and when the instructions on entering the property didn't work the host was uncontactable. The other guests staying there were noisy and inconsiderate, and the communal areas untidy. Would not stay there again.
Joe's place is great. He earned the reputation that he's got.

The biggest problem I had was that we were stuck outside of the home for 10 minutes because we were provided with the wrong access code. The host provided us with the correct one but by then we were late for our concert. We were also given the wrong address for our room and when I noticed it did not match the pictures nothing was done to resolve the issue until we were already asleep that night. It sounds like it was an honest mistake on the host's pet but it made our stay less enjoyable. However, the home we had access to was reasonably clean and quiet and a good value so overall it was not a terrible experience.

Joe's house is clean and comfortable, and Joe went out of his way to make sure my stay was good.  It was a short walk from all the stores, public transportation and my office, so it was very convenient.  Room A/C made it comfortable despite summer heat.  I would recommend this place to stay for one or two people.  Inside was nice and clean.
Joe place was very lovely, quiet and clean. I would definitely stay there again or recommend it.

The good: Close proximity to subway (M, R lines, and E late at night) and to eating places/watering holes, including the cluster of bars and restaurants by the intersection of Austin St. and 70th Road in Forest Hills. Safe, albeit commercial neighborhood (good depending on what you're looking for, good access to shopping since the Queens Center mall and Duane Reade is right there). Easy to come and go at any hour. Host is flexible. Parking available. 

The less good: Affordable but very spartan.  Bathroom could definitely be cleaner. Bedroom door can be bolted from inside, but no way to lock when you leave.
I have never had chance to meet Joe but the stay was great. Flexible with parking and check-in. I would repeat this place again.

The place is very convenient to the subway station. The neighborhood seemed safe. There was parking for one vehicle outside the garage. Otherwise, street parking seemed reasonable for New York standards. Check in was easy as the host provided detailed instructions. Had a hard time getting a hold of the host by phone/text and app when I had some questions. You get what you pay for. A/C was right beside the bed which was nice. Bathroom is shared with other guests but that wasn't a problem for us at all. Good value overall.
Good place to stay at reasonable price . Easy access to public transport and good eat out near this place .

Really nice place and it turned out very suitable, but I didn't hear anything back about the place until very last minute dispite many many emails. It was honestly very disconcerting. To the hosts benefit, he seems very hard working and the place he offers is very nice and in a good location but I almost counted it out until I got the directions as I was on my way to NYC. I would hesitantly reccomend staying here if you are solo or a couple but if I had kids it would be a hard no. Way too much uncertainty.

Joe's place was as advertised. A great deal for the money and a lovely neighborhood. Not only was Joe a great host, the place was clean and well maintained. The only issue I had was an initial communication hookup when I wasnt being able to reach Joe. Everything else was perfect however.

Love the location ! Secure, parking available love that! When you can't even find a parking in a city like ny! 
Bathroom no best..  but the bed sheets were very clean also the house! For the price not bad!

I didn't receive the instruction, so it took some time to enter the house. Joe was not picking up the phone and answering the ring bell. I sent airbnb message to find out that his friend took care of the house. The room is just like the picture, but the problem is I didn't get a clean towel. The location is pretty good since it's close to the metro station.
nice stay here. Super recommended.

Joe is great. Very amicable and highly intelligent. We enjoyed his conversation and hospitality.
Wonderful stay for us, very welcoming and highly independent.
If you don't mind a trip in the subway, this place is better than staying in Manhattan.
Joe is very friendly...and the room is lovely..we enjoyed it a lot..
It's a good area, the room wasn't clean enough, I found towels used before, I couldn't use the TV but it's fine cheap and comfy
good!

Joe was kind and nice to me. I'd a great time in Joe's house. Things were better than the pictures. Clean and comfortable beds, shared living and kitchen room, quiet area. Just can't say great location for Manhattan travelers.

We had a nice stay at Joe's home. He was very accommodating when we arrived our first night at 11:30pm - our room was ready for us, and he saved us a space to park in his driveway. As well, his home is near many markets, restaurants, and drug stores and very walkable to the Billie Jean King Tennis Center, the reason for our visit.
Joe is very helpful.  His place is clean.  I would stay again.
Nice and clean place.

I really liked my stay in Joe's apartment. If you are looking for a place where you sleep at night, wake up in the morning and head out to explore the city and come back late in the afternoon to go to sleep again, this is the perfect place for you. 

The thing that I liked the most is the closeness to the subway (63 Rego Park subway station - make sure to exit at 64 st) and the shopping area in Rego Park (you can find Marshall's, Burlington Coat Factory, TjMaxx and Century21) and at a subway stop away (Woodheaven Blvd) you can find the Queens Mall. 

The location 30 minutes away from Manhattan.
Had a good stay at Joe's.
Joe is a great host and very accommodating! I parked my car at the wrong house and he informed me and prevented the homeowners from having it towed. Great value close to train and restaurants!
Very good value. Clean room was as expected. Close to subway with a 40 minute trip to Manhattan. The neighbourhood feels safe and there are nearby restaurants. Wifi worked decently well.
Always good to stay here.
Just a few blocks from the subway, easy to access, and the room was perfect for one person.  A.C. was a blessing!
Nice place in a nice area, I recommend it to anyone!
great place
It was clean. It waseems what just need. A bed to sleep. The place had full kitchen.   If don't want to cook there are many food options.
Safe environment quiet place

Overall it was a pretty decent place to stay. Close to a train station, which was convenient to get around the city. It was a little confusing to find the place because the address listed is the back side of the house and you must go to the other side around the block to get in. He tells this to the guests, but only at the time of check in when someone may already probably be there waiting. Also it was an instant booking which is helpful, but I could not get a hold of the host and did not hear from him until check in time.
Friendly host, the room is clean and exactly as advertised.
Great stay
Nice place to stay for a fair price.
It was really great. The neighborhood is peaceful. The house and the room is very clean. Joe is a good guy.
Very cozy room especially if you are on budget....Best in town
Good stay
It was great staying at Joe's property. This is exactly same as described. Always recommend to anyone to stay here. Close to subway and restaurants. Clean and cozy place to stay.
Always a good stay
Unforgettable experience! Joe is a wonderful host, very nice and kind.
Nice stay ... No issues ...
Joe's home  is of good value if you are looking for a quiet place off the beaten path.
We had a very nice stay at Joe's place!
Lovely, spacious house/room, and very clean! Joe is a great host and the location is fantastic with lots of restaurants and stores within walking distance.
I like this place. The neighborhood is cool and quiet. Excellent from start to finish.

My son and I stayed at Joe's. He was friendly and helpful. 5 min. walk to the R train and a 30-40 min ride into Manhattan.  We also came from JFK a 45-60 min. ride on the airtrain(extra cost) and R train. When we left we used the Q60bus ( since the R doesn't run super early). Still took around an hour total.
It was great staying at Joe’s place. Had awesome time. Nice and cozy apartment and recommended to all to book here. Place is exactly as described and close to lot of places.
Nice area close to subway and shopping.
Udemærket sted til en enkelt overnatning
Nice place, close to transport
Very nice, great on all
Cozy house, super comfy bed in tight room, large bathroom, nice space in general, close to lots of stuff around Rego Park.
Nice place. Close to all

Great location, especially if you just need a place to crash like we did. Pretty much bare bones so it worked for us but if you need to cook, etc. might not be the place for you. We liked that it was so close to the subway and we could park for free (and safely) whenever we needed. Joe is wonderful and very responsive and helpful!
This is a comfortable place and a great value! Highly recommended.
Muy bueno

el departamento tiene una ubicacion es excelente en un barrio tranquilo, la cama es comoda y el aire acondicionado funciono perfecto y siempre estuvo silencioso, ademas tiene internet y tv con netflix, el baño es compartido y tiene buena limpieza en general. la entrada al depa es por la lavanderia y es un poco complicada y angosta pero de facil acceso por cerradura electronica.
Good place to crash for a night on short notice. Liked common balcony to chill on was not expecting that at this price. Slight hiccups on checkin but worked it out after couple calls.
Pretty basic place. Room has a small tv and Netflix. For the price it was perfect for me just staying 1 night before my flight.
Very nice place. Safe neighborhood and close to all

Great value for its price. It is near the subway station. It is very convenient for me to go to Manhattan from this place. Joe was helpful in my stay. When I asked him for new shampoo, he brought new shampoo immediately.
Communication needs improvement

Good if you need a place to crash after or before a flight - since very easy access via public transport to both JFK & LaGuadia. The place—especially the bathroom—could & should be cleaner. The WiFi didn’t work well, and the tv didn’t connect to the internet so there was no Netflix as advertised. Overall good value, given the price of lodging in NYC, but just recognize that it’s pretty bare bones accommodation. Some good places to eat nearby.

Host of hosts
Goes out of his way to help even when not present. Easy to communicate with
Have stayed here more than once. Helped me when I needed help. Great guy
Good place to lay your head

Nice area and
A thoughtful host

It was a good stay in a good location for a good price. Only 1 problem was with check in. Joe said that i can arrive after 2pm so i did and room wasn't ready so i couldn't use room until 8pm when Joe arrived
Description doesn’t match. Host isn’t hospitable.
Great place. Good area
Always great. Nice location.

Host was a no-show, no entrance information was provided, no messages or calls ever answered.  I missed my flight, booked this instant book listing at 8pm and arrived at 11pm.  I asked for the entrance information as soon as I booked and let him know what time I would be arriving, but never heard back.  I walked 4 blocks uphill from the subway to stand outside in the cold at 11pm, this was a terrible experience.  Thankfully my previous air bnb host was amazing and saved me.  5 stars to Varos in Long Island City!

Great location. Simple and overall nice place to stay. Easy and convenient check in/check out process. Quiet neighborhood and plenty of stores nearby. The subway is just a few blocks away, making it an easy commute to Manhattan.
An amazing laid back stay with all the amenities you could dream of. This is a 5 star stay.

El alojamiento de Joe es tal cual lo que se anuncia; un sitio para ir a dormir despues de recorrer todo dia Manhattan, Queens o Brooklyn. Yo renté el Blue Room (tiene un Beige room que es un poco  mas amplio y con mejor tele). El cuarto es super pequeño, pero no necesitabamos movernos mucho por la habitacion. Las camas son comodas, las almohadas y acolchados tambien. Hay que sacarse los zapatos apenas entrar.
Las areas comunes bien, pero tampoco se utilizan mucho, mas que la cocina, que si usamos.  La ubicacion es genial! Barrio residencial, muy lindo y seguro por la noche, a menos de 3 cuadras del subte que te lleva directo a Manhattan o a donde quieras! Lo recomiendo para aquellos que tienen bajo prespuesto y no les importa dormir en un cuarto compacto y no tener amenities.
Great place for the value, I've stayed several time. Joe is great, and readily available if needed.

Overall a great experience for me and my traveling companion! Joe was a nice and easy host, contact was at a minimum, but we knew he was available if we needed him. The ideal host shouldn’t need a lot of contact, in our opinion. The AirBnB had a great location and the space was perfect for getting some sleep and catching a shower at the end of each day. It could have been a little cleaner,  it it was minor things like hair and dust on the floors. ALSO, we would recommend that you verify the passcode before your arrival. We were sent the wrong one, but fortunately Joe answered our first phone call and gave us the correct one (but you might not be so lucky, so check beforehand, haha)! 

We give this AirBnB 4.5/5 stars! The improvements that could be made are minor and we would not have a problem returning in the future.
Lovely home. Located near a nice shopping area. The host is really nice. Would definitely stay here again.
I have stayed here several times. It's a good location for me. Always clean and comfortable.
It’s a perfect location for local shopping and trains to Manhattan! Excellent solution with a combination lock for the door :)

As visitors from out of state, visiting family in a nearby hospital, Joe’s place is a nice quiet place to rest up. It is spacious and clean. He has a washer and dryer to wash clothes, such a plus!! And we were able to use his driveway instead of hard to find on-street parking. Amazing host and amazing hospitality! He gets 5 stars from us! Incredibly better than staying at a hotel. Thank you Joe for everything!
Great host provided great stay. Friendly and welcoming to the big city. Couldn't be nicer and the accommodations are spot on. Thanks joe!
We had a great stay at this place.  We did not have to find parking since Joe let us use his space. Joe was also very helpful with anything we needed. I would recommend this place.
Joe's super friendly. He invited me to enjoy his meal and also offered some medicine for my mum because her got a cold. Thanks buddy!

Joe is a very nice guy. He always showed willingness to help. His neighborhood is very nice and safe. Best of all, very close to a subway station that can take you to Manhattan. If you have a car, you can talk to him to get parking as well. I’d definitely stay again & recommend it
Great host. Friendly and flexible in reasonable requests. Second time I stay there & will surely do it in the future. Thanks
Very private, clean, and quiet would recommend for a couple nights stay very friendly host

name: Spacious and Bright Brooklyn Two Bedroom Apartment
summary: A spacious, modern, newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment in a classic Boerum Hill Brick Building. The unit is on the Top floor which means tons of daylight and fresh air.  Comfortable beds and seating.  Minutes to Manhattan from 11 different subway lines.  Boerum Hill is touted as one of the most prime real estate in all of Brooklyn, with less than 10 minute walk to Smith Street, Barclays Center, unique shops and restaurants that please every foodie!
space: A spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Brooklyn's most trendy neighborhoods.  Freshly renovated and furnished . New kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a built-in dishwasher.  Plenty of natural light and fresh air. New windows, and window treatment lighting fixtures etc. Two comfortable beds one queen size and one full size to sleep 4 and for additional guest you may use an included air mattress on the living room to sleep 2 and/ the sectional sofa to sleep one.
description: A spacious, modern, newly renovated 2 bedroom apartment in a classic Boerum Hill Brick Building. The unit is on the Top floor which means tons of daylight and fresh air.  Comfortable beds and seating.  Minutes to Manhattan from 11 different subway lines.  Boerum Hill is touted as one of the most prime real estate in all of Brooklyn, with less than 10 minute walk to Smith Street, Barclays Center, unique shops and restaurants that please every foodie! A spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Brooklyn's most trendy neighborhoods.  Freshly renovated and furnished . New kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a built-in dishwasher.  Plenty of natural light and fresh air. New windows, and window treatment lighting fixtures etc. Two comfortable beds one queen size and one full size to sleep 4 and for additional guest you may use an included air mattress on the living room to sleep 2 and/ the sectional sofa to sleep one. Door buzzer and two story walk up. I will always be a text or phone call awa
neighborhood_overview: Beorum Hill, brooklyn has been the most hyped neigborhood in NYC for the past two years for a reason. from it's trendy restaurants and shops that gives the city best restaurants a run for their money. Boerum hill has been called hollywood east due to being the most favorite  place for award winning actors, directors, film makes and musicians  to live in NY.  In additions Boerum Hill is where the New Stadium (Barclays Center) is located . Also BAM ( Brooklyn Academy of Music) with all it's Music and theater events and much more. Also within a walking distance for a typical New Yorker ( depending on how much of a walker you are), there is the The Brooklyn Botanical Garden, The Brooklyn Museum, The Brooklyn Bridge park, Dumbo Park, Prospect Park.  The Brooklyn promenade, The Brooklyn Bridge and Downtown Manhattan/ financial district and Wall Street and while you are there you may as well walk a couple of blocks to The new Freedom tower and Battery Park City.
transit: about 13 Subway lines that will get you any where you need. F train and G are on smith Street 2 blocks away, The rest of the lines are within 3-5 blocks away Including the Barclay Atlantic/ Flat bush station and The Long Island Rail road station. Plenty of CitiBike Stations within a block distance and of course Uber and Lyft .
access: Door buzzer and two story walk up.
interaction: I will always be a text or phone call away to help you with any kind of guidance that you need.
house_rules: Kindly review and observe the following guides and rules for an enjoyable and convenient stay. -Please remove shoes inside the apartment.  -Please conserve energy when using the heat, lighting, Air conditioning, TV and other electronics.  -Please keep the kitchen clean at all times, No over night dirty dishes should be left inside or outside the the dishwasher or in the sink or anywhere else in the home.  - Please dispose trash and recycling according to NYC sanitation department rules. The trash gets picked up on Monday morning and Thursday morning and recycle gets picked up on Thursday morning.  Please make sure your trash is correctly sorted and deposited in the correct bins the night before. Disposing recycling material in the trash may result in violation summons from the NYC sanitation department and you will be responsible for those amount of those summons.  The following rules are very strict and breaking them once will result in removing you from our home, losing your balance

host.host_about: We are a couple from NY that lives most of the year in Los Angeles. While we are away we like to make our beautiful home available for responsible professionals to enjoy it peacefully and make it their home away from home.

reviews.comments: Shane continues to make locating our staff from London a smooth and easy one as he responds almost immediately and will remind us of things we need to do to make sure everything is set for the guests when they arrive so we can't speak highly enough of how lucky we are to have him as our host! Always extremely helpful, accommodating to our requests (usually last minute!) and goes the extra mile without question. The bonus is that our colleagues rave about this property as they feel at home, comfortable, safe and in good hands - to know that for our staff who work long hours, is priceless. Thank you so much!

Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this property or better hosts for a place in Brooklyn. Fantastic property and a relatable level of contact at any time. Easy transport into Manhattan and nice surroundings, perfect for sharers and fantastic value.
Shane & Nicole have been so helpful. They respond quickly to all messages and have ensured that everyone who has stayed with them has had the smoothest stay possible!

Shane & Nicole's place has been an amazing sanctuary for our team who have been staying there. They are fantastic hosts with excellent communication and they go out of their way to be helpful. Undoubtably a 5 star stay!

We have been using apartment's from Shane & Nicole for a while now and every time they make the process amazing! They're so helpful and responsive and all the guest that stay with them have said the apartments are 5/5. Would highly recommend staying with them!

Shane & Nicole were very attentive hosts. Eventhough they were not available in person, I was always available to reach them via phone within seconds to get any questions answered. Checkin and Checkout went smooth and we enjoyed our stay a lot!

they were absolutely amazing hosts, any questions or slight issues (coffee maker) they were able to solve immediately!! beautiful apt highly recommend!!! location is amazing! I will truly miss this apt!! thanks for hosting me!
Shane & Nicole were responsive and thoughtful hosts. The place was clean and lovely and the location perfect even for our long stay. Highly recommend it for anyone coming to Brooklyn!

name: Garden studio with own bathroom
summary: This studio is peaceful and separate from my house. It's a lovely simple space to chill out or do work/study while looking out onto the greenery and trees of my back garden. Nearby are cafes, three bus routes and Sydney Light Rail. There's on-street parking and good wi-fi is included. Note that access to the studio is via the house and there is some aircraft noise. I enjoy meeting and orientating international guests as well as welcoming locals. I own a cat :)
space: The city meets country in this studio. Located in my back garden, it is surrounded by windows with an outlook of greenery and trees.  The studio is clean and comfortable inside with a queen size bed, toilet and shower, and living area that includes two bucket chairs and TV. You can relax in your own space. If you have to do work, I can also set up table and chair for this. The studio is separate from the house. The house needs to be used for access, breakfast and cooking. But I am an experienced host and are conscious of the importance of privacy. My suburb is in the Italian area of Sydney and specialises in  restaurants and cafes. We also have excellent weekend markets focusing on food (Orange Grove Market), local art (Glebe Markets) and eclectic 2nd hand goods and clothing (Rozelle Markets). For those who enjoy walking, there are beautiful parks along the shores of Sydney Harbour, a movie cinema and an Anytime Fitness gym nearby. I also have another listing, Chic Room in Welcoming Ho
description: This studio is peaceful and separate from my house. It's a lovely simple space to chill out or do work/study while looking out onto the greenery and trees of my back garden. Nearby are cafes, three bus routes and Sydney Light Rail. There's on-street parking and good wi-fi is included. Note that access to the studio is via the house and there is some aircraft noise. I enjoy meeting and orientating international guests as well as welcoming locals. I own a cat :) The city meets country in this studio. Located in my back garden, it is surrounded by windows with an outlook of greenery and trees.  The studio is clean and comfortable inside with a queen size bed, toilet and shower, and living area that includes two bucket chairs and TV. You can relax in your own space. If you have to do work, I can also set up table and chair for this. The studio is separate from the house. The house needs to be used for access, breakfast and cooking. But I am an experienced host and are conscious of the impo
neighborhood_overview: Within a short walking distance of our house is the Norton St restaurants, the pretty Italian Forum and wonderful Saturday morning foodies market at Orange Grove School. Walk ten minutes to the Lilyfield light rail station to enjoy a beautiful scenic ride to Glebe, Ian Thorpe Aquatic Centre, Darling Harbour and the City.  In the daytime, ride the bus to trendy and colourful Newtown.
transit: I am near to bus stops on several routes to the City and Newtown. There is on street parking outside my house available for guests. Feel free to message me if you would like details.
access: The studio now has a kettle, microwave and bar fridge. You are also welcome to use the kitchen in the main house. It has an older gas stove which works well, but needs to be lit by hand. Guests who have experience with this type of stove are welcome to use it. As well as the gas stove, the main kitchen has a microwave and a fridge. Washing up is by hand. You also can share the house's verandah that can be sunny or shaded by means of a retractable awning. The verandah can be used for relaxing as well as eating meals. You will need to have footwear on the verandah as its surface is a little rough (but it meets safety standards and is still a lovely spot). Meals can also be eaten in the kitchen/living area that looks out onto the verandah and garden.  Happy to put on a load of washing for you washing every 3-4 days. I'll want you to peg it on the line, if that's okay. Drying is by means of pegging on a clothesline (it seems like the right thing to do in this warm dry country).
interaction: I am often at home working on report writing. I also occasionally go away for a few days. I am well organised when I travel, so I make sure my guests are happy.
house_rules: Please take care of all components of my property and try to avoid all damage, including minor damage. If minor damage occurs, could you let me know? I will be kind review wise if you tell me about the damage and we discuss what should be done. It is a quiet neighbourhood, so I would want you to keep the noise to normal suburban home levels when outside the cabin. However, if the door is shut and the windows are only open a little, you can  make noise in the cabin and it will be fine.  I do not want any parties. I accept smoking outside provided no-one else who is present is uncomfortable with it. I have had smokers stay and they have used my outdoor seats and the verandah and that has been fine. Note that it could be cold out there at night, particularly in June, July and August. Also, be careful not to put any item over, or within 30 cm of, the heater. Otherwise, there is a risk of fire. It is important to turn the heater off when you are out. The studio is well insulated and holds h

host.host_about:
I like connecting with nature, history and culture, and hope to visit places like New Zealand, India, Europe and Singapore. I like to read crime fiction that critiques the society we live in as well as non-fiction on the same subject. My favorite shows include all of Shaun Micallef's shows, most of the Chaser, The Castle, Roy & HG, The Wire, The Bill, Spooks, Call the Midwife, Little Britain, The Young Ones, Allo Allo (1970's). I love creative food.

I respect privacy and diversity. The most important thing is to provide my guests with decent, comfortable accommodation. However, I am interested in your background and story if you are up for a chat.

reviews.comments: Susan was very hospitable and the cabin was very comfortable.
Great little cabin. Private, warm and cosy with everything you need. Susan is a lovely and thoughtful host. Recommended to anyone

Lovely private little cabin in the back garden with en suite. Susan is a friendly and helpful host. Angelo the cat is also friendly. Close to Norton Street where there are lots of cafes and restaurants. Public transport is also close for a 30 min ride into the city.

A convenient option for those wanting to be close to the city but have a bit of peace and quiet. The cabin is a lovely space. Although access to the cabin is through the house, Susan is really obliging and friendly.
Susan was a thoughtful and considerate host.

I recently spent a Saturday night in Susan's leafy cabin in Leichhardt - my first Airbnb experience - and was pleased with the ease of booking and low cost. Susan is a friendly, relaxed and hospitable host. The cabin is spotlessly clean, cute, and had a very comfortable bed. Angelo the cat was sometimes chatty but not annoying. The area is convenient and easily accessible by public transport but also suburban which would be interesting for international visitors. The only drawback of the location is the overhead flight path which woke me on Sunday morning, although I went back to sleep once I realised what the noise was! It really felt like I was staying at an old friend's house - one where you could just please yourself - and I'd thoroughly recommend it to others.

My husband and I had a great stay at Susan's backyard cabin! We were there for 4 nights right before the holiday season and was a last minute stay.  Susan is extremely friendly and accommodating.  We enjoyed chatting with her and her cat Angelo.  The cabin is great for 2 people and was very private and clean. It also has lots of closet space for travelers.  The wifi connectivity was good and there's always street parking available.  We also enjoyed having our breakfast on her verandah. It was very peaceful.  Susan's home is located in a great Sydney suburb that's close to lots of great restaurants and cafes.  Everyday we drove to the Stanmore train station to catch the train to the city, which only takes about 30 min. Very easy and convenient!

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Susan. The cabin is clean and private, with plenty of space to relax and watch a bit of TV or read a book. It's also great to have your own clean bathroom and shower. Susan is a lovely host and I would definitely stay with her again.

We had a wonderful stay at Susans little cottage. It was perfect for our stay in the city as we were celebrating a friends birthday close by. We had some lovely chats and will be staying with Susan again.

Wonderful cottage. Two problems - on the main flight path for Sydney Airport, but tolerable. Make sure you ask Sue if the hot water booster button has been pushed, otherwise you may not get hot enough water in the shower.

Our stay here in this lovely little cabin was just perfect for our needs. Susan was a first class host, and did all she could to make us welcome and comfortable. The bed was the most comfortable we've slept in during our 3 months in Oz, (and the stars - a wonderful bonus).  If you're looking for a sterile modern glass and  plastic accommodation - this is not for you. This little cabin is a separate part of a warm and friendly real home, - our cabin had it's own privacy, charm and character, and the en-suit was small but perfectly fitted and extremely functional. 
When we first realized we had to walk through the house to get to our accommodation, we were a little daunted, but we need not have worried, nothing was simpler and we had our own keys to come and go as we pleased. When we are in this lovely area in the future,  we would definitely love stay here again.

Susan is friendly and helpful and the backyard cabin is clean, well-equipped and has a comfortable bed. The planes can be loud and frequent at times, but were not so bothersome that we needed to close the window, and there is a curfew so it doesn't go all night. Angelo the cat is sweet.
Susan was a very obliging host and made us very welcome. The cabin was everything we required and was well presented. Would definitely stay again.
Susan's accommodation was clean and comfy and I recommend it as a nice place to stay. Susan is friendly and could not do enough to ensure our comfort.

I had a long weekend in Susan's cabin and it was great.  Everything was just as described.  The cabin was comfortable and clean.  The location was very convenient with great restaurants a short walk away.  Susan was away during my stay but she arranged for someone to be there to let me in, and to show me around.  I would definitely return if I have to visit Sydney again.

The cabin is perfect, perfect location and very clean, we had a great time during our stay. Susan was very kind and extremely available for our every need, even taking us with our bags to our new home in sydney. Thanks Susan  and greetings to the beautiful cat Angel.

Sudan is a truly a great human, she is super nice and very caring. I really enjoyed staying there. It is a great value for the rate offered and the area is really nice too. Next time I am in Sydney I hope I can stay at her place again. I highly recommend staying at Susan's.

Susan was a lovely host. The cabin is adorable, and nicely separate from the house. There was plenty of fruit, nuts, juice, and tea for breakfast, and although the bread was running low the first morning, Susan was quick to let us know that evening that she'd bought some delicious bread for the next day (without us having to ask or anything). As I was staying with a vegan friend and a gluten-free/lactose-free friend, the food options were really great.

At one point one of my travelling companions had an allergic reaction to her cat, and on the way out, we casually asked if she might have some Telfast or something similar, and she was more than happy to provide that. And in a sudden rainstorm, she equipped us with two umbrellas to ensure that we got to our destination only partially soaking wet.

All in all, we had a lovely stay, and would not hesitate to stay here again.
Susan was a nice host and helpful in helping us with our sight seeing and transport.  The cabin is on it's own in the back yard which was nice for privacy. We were pleased with our stay.

We enjoyed our stay with Susan! She was amazing and gave us loads of tips on things to do in Sydney and for our further (Website hidden by Airbnb) cabin is a nice size with private bathroom...all nice and clean. We would recommend Susan to everyone.

This was probably one of our best hosts during our trip around New Zealand and Australia. She was very very helpful, giving us advice and tips about the best way to visit Sydney and their main spots.

The cabin is big, with plenty of space for two people, its own toilette and shower, and even a small living room where rest. 

The situation of the place was very good, with plenty of bus stops to the city and other spots of the city.

She was as kind to let us use her kitchen, and use some of her cooking stuff. 

She was really lovely, a perfect host, and we highly recommend staying with her.
Clean, cozy and private. Susan was a great host. I would choose to stay there again in the future.

We really enjoyed staying here. Great location, the room has all that we needed, including great shower and beds. 

Susan is lovely, helped us a lot in any kind of information we needed. 

Would surely have came back there next time we in Sydney (but afraid it will be in few years at least...)

We had a very nice stay at Susan's home. The cabin is adequately sized and comfortable. The neighborhood's commercial area has great dining options and lots of shops. The location is nicely situated for commutes to the city, airport or country. We'd highly recommend a stay at Susan's.

We had lovely stay at the Cabin. Unfortunately we did not get to meet Susan, but Angelo the lovely black cat greeted us warmly with cuddles.

Easy instructions on how to access the house and central to everything we needed. We had a lovely stay in Leichardt. Thanks for letting us stay Susan.
Very nice place and will stay again.  I stayed in the cottage, which was adequate to my needs.  Hot shower, clean and comfortable bed, good location.  What more does one need?

Susan is the perfect host..warm and friendly but unobtrusive. The cabin is private and comfortable, good shower and has easy access to all Sydney has to offer. Public transport is efficient and accessible. The aircraft noise varies so it's easy to ignore it. 
Leichhardt is an interesting area with plenty of restaurants and services. I would  certainly stay here again.

Susan made me feel very welcome and made sure I had everything I needed.  Her little backyard cabin is just perfect and provides a serene, private and relaxing green oasis so close to the centre of Sydney.  Susan willingly shares her kitchen facilities and makes her place feel like a home away from home.  It is very convenient and within easy walking distance to buses and the shops, restaurants and amenities of Leichhardt.  I highly recommend Susan's cabin and will definitely consider staying here again.

We really enjoyed staying at Susan's. The hut we lived in was really comfortable and very clean. Susan is a very nice person and gave us all kind of information we might have needed for our stay in Sydney. She was very helpful with our other issues. Susan's place made our stay in Sydney a lot more comfortable and enjoyable!

We were very happy with our stay at Garden Cabin. It was nice and private, located in the rear garden. The cabin is within walking distance to great cafes in the very cosmopolitan Norton St area and we found it very easy to visit the city via the Light Rail which is located nearby. Susan is very friendly and helped us willingly with our travel needs. There was a very generous selection available for breakfast and the bed was comfy. The flights overhead were a bit noisy the day we were there, but we expected that after reading other reviews. We would be very happy to stay with Susan again.

Susan is a helpful and accommodating host.  We appreciate the use of her kitchen and umbrella.  The neighborhood is safe with a variety of restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops and even a dry cleaner/laundry mat (but not "self-serve").  There are bus lines and a light rail within reasonable walking distance.  The heavy rail was about a mile away.  The bed is so comfortable, we slept really well!  We enjoyed the sound of the rain on the roof, and listening to the birds in the morning.  Reasonable price.

Had a wonderful week at Susan's cosy cabin. Not only was it close to Sydney, but had a comfortable bed and a relaxed feel. Susan was very approachable and nothing was an issue for her. It was a pleasant place to return after a busy day moving furniture out of my storage unit.  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants a quiet reasonably priced place that is close to the CBD.

Susan was a lovely friendly host, she provided a great breakfast and was very helpful with good restaurants to visit and local directions. The studio was perfect - clean, warm and spacious and a great price. The location in Leichhardt was within easy walking distance to eateries and transport. I'd definitely stay here again.

Great cabin - must be well insulated as it was very cosy!  Extremely comfortable bed and a very quiet place.   Friendly host and welcoming cat!  Having checked in quickly, then left, it was really nice to come back later to a well lit cabin with the heater on. 
A quick walk to a bus stop - and the Light Rail is within walking distance as well.

I stayed with Susan for a weekend and just wish that I didn't have to leave! Susan is such a great host, and Angelo the cat was just adorable. I would never have imagined that I'd be able to stay in a cabin in someone's backyard, and would recommend anyone to give it a go. Susan gives a wonderful spread of healthy breakfast everyday, which I greatly appreciate. Upon arrival, she also gave a complete set of linen and towels which is a service above and beyond that which is common. 

The bed in the cabin was so comfortable that I slept through the nights like a baby. Susan also gave me a lift to the nearby weekend market which was really nice, and the market has many fabulous stalls and produce. She also gave a lot of helpful tips and advice on what to check out in the surrounding areas. The listing is also close to the nearby light rail stations and buses into the city, which makes travelling to and fro easy. In all, I had a truly memorable experience staying with Susan and had a wonderful weekend exploring Leichardt and Sydney city. 

p.s the wifi is fast too! :D

We enjoyed our stay with Susan. We were very comfy and warm in the cabin. 
It had everything we needed and if we needed anything more Susan was very obliging. We look forward to staying there again in the future.

We were very comfortable and cosy in Susan's garden studio. Firstly because Susan is a delightful host - she's warm and welcoming and helpful and generous! I have some allergies, and Susan was so helpful in making everything work for me. The studio itself is clean, nicely presented, self contained, quiet and has everything you need to make it a great base for a few days in Sydney. There's an ensuite bathroom, sitting area, TV, tea-making facilities. Glad it was cosy, as Sydney turned on some chilly days (which we thought we'd left behind in Canberra!). Leichardt is close to the city and an interesting area with plenty of eating places nearby. All in all a great place to stay. Thanks Susan!

Adorable home owned by an amazing person! 

My mother and me went to Sydney standby and had problems from the very start! We arrived 6.5 hours before check in and Susan was amazing and accommodating, letting us go in early and cleaning up the room a bit. She then helped take us into town and buy a train pass. It was amazing for a first day. Susan is the most helpful person I have ever met and she actually cares that you have an amazing stay in her house. She helps every step of the way and doesnt let anyone fall through any vacation cracks; whether it is getting lost, grocery shopping, buying dinner, or car troubles Susan refuses to let you make a wrong decision and will stick by you through the worst of them! If I ever went back to Sydney, she is the person I would want to be with!

Second time staying in Susan's delightful backyard oasis retreat.  Ideally central to so much but a world away from the hustle and bustle.  Susan is an excellent host and goes out of her way to ensure guests needs are met.  Her place is in an ideal location close to services and facilities and easily connected to the city and the rest of Sydney.
Wonderful host. The backyard studio is very comfortable.
I enjoyed my stay at Susans cabin - everything was clean and nice there. Susan is a lovely host and is trying to make your stay as comfortable as she can!

Susan was a fantastic host who was very accomodating and willing to provide lots of recommendations. The BNB was very tidy and the bed was super comfy. Proximity to the City was great too and was easy to bike ride into. Highly recommend.

We had a wonderful time at Susan's. She was really welcoming. It was one of our best AirBNB experiences so far. The included breakfast is a hit, always fresh fruits, nuts and cereals. We would definitely recommend Susan.

What a great place! fantastic area with easy access to the city and walking distance to great cafés. Susan is amazing, she is very sweet and kind so much so I believe I will remain friends with her. The room is lovely with heaps of space and a comfortable queen.

The studio was perfect for me! I needed a quiet, private space to get my work done. Susan was extremely welcoming and also left me alone which I appreciated. The space was sparkling clean and the bed was fab with snuggly sheets! Thanks Susan
Susan was very helpful, friendly and accommodating of my needs. The studio was lovely and I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Thanks Susan!

It was lovely staying at Susan's studio. Very peaceful, super comfortable and so close to public transport. Susan was very welcoming and so easy to talk to - I was really made to feel at home.  I was able to cook in Susan's kitchen and appreciated having fridge space to use too. The little deck off the kitchen was a perfect space for breakfast. Thanks so much Susan!

Susan made us feel really welcome, the listing was exactly as stated and the area was great, we loved it. Leichardt was very accessible to the city via the Light Rail and the area felt very safe and friendly. There were lots of cafes and restaurants and a great cinema all within walking distance.

Susan was an excellent host for my friend, and had no qualms about making a 'third party booking'. She was welcoming and informative, and very happy to arrange her schedule to accommodate a late night arrival. Her house is a relaxing and cosy home away from home.

Lovely little place.
Susan was a thoughtful and accommodating host.

J ai passé trois jours très agréables dans le studio du jardin de Susan. C est un studio très confortable, très pratique dans lequel on se sent comme chez soi. Le quartier est très calme avec toutes les facilités des transports en commun. Susan m'a très bien acceuillie. C'est une hôtesse serviable et joyeuse.
Très bon souvenir !

Susan was very friendly and helpful to give us a lot of information. 
Location is good for the public transportation (we used a lot) but very noisy due to the plans!

Susan is such a lovely host.  We had a private cottage out back,  very self contained.  When we arrived she had a local map and gave us an overview of the local area and tips for transport.  The cottage was lovely.  Everything was smooth.  Thanks again Susan!
Very comfortable room with all you could need. Close to transport and restaurants. Susan is a lovely host, friendly, helpful and always ready to have a chat. I would definitely come back again.

Erika and I had a lovely time staying with Susan (and Angelo the cat) in Sydney. The room itself is quite spacious and very private, being tucked away in the backyard. Susan was generous enough to provide us with a selection of delicious free breakfast options, which was much appreciated, especially by those travelling on a tight budget! There is plenty of free parking in the street and public transport close by. We would definitely stay here again!

We were made us feel very welcome. Lovely studio at the bottom of the garden with a very comfy queen bed. 
Would happily stay there again when were next Sydney bound.

We very much enjoyed our stay in Susan's little cabin. Susan was a very warm and welcoming host, who was extremely helpful with bus schedules and so on. The cabin was depicted very accurately in her pictures. We would definitely stay with Susan again.

Susan and Angelo, her panther in crime (a super friendly black cat) are so warm and welcoming she made us feel right at home. The cabin is a great size with an ensuit and large tv, we were strapped for cash so being able to microwave some quick meals in the room was perfect for us, we were welcomed to use the kitchen but were far too lazy too. The location is fantastic as leichhardt is a safe and quiet residential suburb close to public transport heading right into the CBD. Also a great breakfast selection laid out each morning made all the difference.
We will certainly be staying again when we return to Sydney.
Thank you again

Susan has a cute little terrace house in a neighbourhood with many Italians in Sydney. We had our own bathroom in the garden studio and it was very clean and comfortable. Susan is a really relaxed host. We were well looked after.

Unfortunately our stay was cut short due to personal situation. Susan was more than accommodating, allowing us to amend the booking at very short notice, even being out of pocket herself. It was a very kind gesture during a difficult time. The space was very clean, and as described.
Comfortable & private

Really lovely home and cosy seperate cabin in backyard with own bathroom. Very easy to find and parking was good. I love this part of Sydney and Susan was very friendly and easy to talk with. Offer of a lovely breakfast but I went down the road to a lovely little square with a few cafes. Friendly and easy stay.
Wonderful quiet and clean studio, host Susan very helpful and friendly - had a lovely stay!

We loved our stay at Susan's Garden house! Susan is a very lovely lady, who always wants to help you at any time. She helped us plan a few daily trips and we enjoyed the fresh fruit she made everyday. The house is clean, comfortable and there is acces to everything you need. During our stay I haven't seen any cockroaches in the house, which tells you how clean it is. Good bed, shower, etc. can't really say something bad about this house.
We had such a lovely stay at Susan's cottage. Although she was out of town during our stay, she left us impeccable instructions and we felt cared for. I'd definitely stay here again!

Susan was very welcoming! She picked me up from the station on my arrival day! My first day it rained hard all day so I stayed at the house and caught up using wifi!  Susan kindly invited me to go to her swimming club with her which I enjoyed , the exercise was good!
Susan encourages use of kitchen and is not 'precious' about her stuff. She provides a nice breakfast of cereals , some fruit, juice and toast :-)

We highly recommend Susan as an air bnb host. She excels at customer satisfaction. We were very happy with the cabin retreat. It was easily accessible by transit.Breakfast was healthy,delicious,and nutritious. Susan gave us some excellent tourist info as well. Stay here, you won't be disappointed. Great value! We hope to see you again Susan.

We really enjoyed our stay in the Garden studio. It was excellently located and within walking distance of the light rail. The studio was well appointed and comfortable. Susan was welcoming and very helpful.
Susan was a wonderful host her little villa was so cute and just what I needed for a great getaway.

Susan is an awesome host. I had many laughs and stimulating conversations. Her cabin was fantastic value. Her breakfast selection was greatly appreciated. A great neighborhood of Sydney with Norton Street nearby. Thanks Susan !

Susan was a wonderful host and very helpful. Her little cottage was exactly as described and gave us the privacy we needed when working in the area. Susan provided a nutritious light breakfast each morning and anything else we requested. Her home is very near transport to the city and the restaurant area of Leichhardt. We had no trouble parking in the street right outside her house. I would definitely recommend this garden studio.

A wonderful private cabin behind Susan's inner city cottage. Although I did not get much time to chat I found Susan a wonderful host and the cabin was exactly what i wanted for a few nights. Public transport to the city nearby and I was able to park in the street overnight. Recommended and I'd definitely book again.

Susan's cottage was everything I had imagined from the photos. She was welcoming and accommodating - I needed to work from the studio so she set up a desk for me. She is easy going and incredibly interesting. 

An added bonus was the wonderful atmosphere she created -  the other guests, Susan and I had a wonderful meal together and shared stories. 

I definitely will be returning. Thanks Susan.

Susan is lovely. Very accommodating, helpful and nice to chat too ☺
Location is great, close to all transport, bars, restaurants and shops.
Garden house is a good size, enough for 2 ppl with your own bathroom.
Would recommend and would be happy to stay again!
Our stay with Susan was perfect. It was relaxing and inviting. The accomidation is great with everything you need and private. We would recommend it to anyone. Thanks Susan for your hospitality. :-)

Susan provided us with specific information and demonstrated a caring, sharing attitude. The room itself was cosy with a private ensuite. We are familiar with Leichhardt and knew of the plane noise but apart from that, the area was relatively quiet. Thank you Susan!

My boyfriend and I had a lovely stay in Susan's little garden house. It was our first time trying Airbnb and we were really pleased. Susan was an amazing host, she helped us whenever she could. We really liked the location of her home because it wasn't in the busy city center but you could easily reach it by bus.

Really nice place to stay, it's nice to be self-contained, basically like a little hotel room with plenty of space and a nice garden. Kitchen amenities available in house. Susan was nice and welcoming. Good location in Sydney too. To be honest the aeroplane noise was a bit of a shock at first but I was tired so I still slept really well from about 9-6 without being woken.

Susan was absolutely lovely! This was my first experience with Airbnb, and I did not know what to expect. Susan was so kind and welcoming, and I instantly felt at home. She was so helpful with recommendations of things to do in Sydney, and helped me figure out the public transport system. The breakfast provided was wonderful, and she even had a converter available for me to use when mine stopped working. The studio was very comfortable, and Susan went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed. I greatly enjoyed conversations with Susan and her other guests (who were also wonderful). I could not have asked for a better host, and I would absolutely stay here again! Thank you, Susan, for making my stay so wonderful! I cannot say enough good things about Susan and her lovely home!

Very nice and clean self-contained cabin. 
The bed is comfy. Noise from plane is acceptable. 
Susan is a welcoming host. She prepared fruits and breakfast for us. She is very helpful to suggest us what to do during heavy rain in Sydney. Finally we got to go swimming in Olympic park. 
Highly recommend Susan's place.

Susan is a very welcoming host. She provides information about the public transport, which was really helpful. She also had really good recommendations for what to do in Sydney. The Studio was very clean and comfy. The plane noise was alright. You didn't have to set an alarm so you get up early and you see something of Sydney. The breakfast was very good. There were fruits, muesli, toast and coffee or tea. All in all I really enjoyed my stay in Sydney at Susan's studio.

Private cabin in a good location with plenty of free on street parking. On the flight path for Sydney airport so long lie ins aren't an option as they seemed to start flying over around 9am. Susan was very welcoming to her home

We had a great stay at Susan's place. The cottage is as good as the pictures. Susan is a great host and help us with lots of informations before and during our stay. We highly recommend her place. Many thanks Susan.We loved Sydney and had a nice weekend in Australia. The place is very central and very close to the city centre. Buses was easy to catch even on Sunday and public holiday. We will definitely love to stay again at Susans in the future :-)

Susan has a small cottage at her home in the backyard. Perfect for one or two people. I stayed there 3 nights and really enjoyed my time there. The cottage comes with everything you need including your own bathroom. Susan is a very gracious and polite host. She took the time to explain the best way to travel in and out of the city. Took only 20-30 minutes to be right in the middle of Sydney. Such a beautiful city!! Wish I could have stayed longer. Enjoyed my time at the cottage.

Thank you Susan for this wonderful stay! 
The accomondation was very cosy and the breakfast was delicious, especially the home grown passion fruits!

Susan was a lovely and friendly host.  She went to great lengths to make us feel welcome and to offer advice with respect to transport and facilities within the suburb.  The studio was very neat and tidy, representing excellent value for a visitor to Sydney.  Being separate from the main dwelling, this studio was also very private and peaceful.

This is a lovely place to stay in Sydney's inner-west - very convenient to public transport and Leichhardt. 
Susan is a wonderful host, very accessible, welcoming and communicative.

Susan was a lovely host. Very welcoming and friendly. The house was conveniently located and Susan gave me some great recommendations. The cabin was very comfortable and clean. Would definitely book again.

Susan was nice and explain the vehicle network in very detail. Although we have not much communication but i can feel Susan is willing to talk. I may visit back to Susan place when i visit Sydney next time.

Susan is an incredibly intelligent and warm person. Her welcome was planned for in advance, as she tends to be quite busy herself. 
On my first day, I was given the rundown on the breakfast options, free wifi, chats with her pets, and the security of the household. The cabin was spacious, kitted out with a book selection, a digital TV, kettle and heater, pretty much everything. The place was pristine and my nights were very peaceful. My plans are to stay there for a retreat every now and then. Thanks very much Susan, for being so flexible and knowledgeable :)

Susan was very welcoming on our arrival. I loved the fact we could have our own studio which was clean and comfortable, all we needed for our stay in Sydney while visiting family close by. Would book again if the opportunity arises.
As we were visiting family Susan's studio was perfect for us

We were welcomed warmly into Susan's home and the cabin was warm and cosy. Situated in a lovely quaint area in a convenient location, accessible to shops, buses, etc. Very quiet, apart from planes. A generous supply of breakfast provisions each morning was appreciated. Thank you Susan.

Susan was an amazing host, she was so welcoming and the studio was a great treat for my wife and I. The studio was at the bottom of a lovely garden which included a fully equipped en-suit and the room had a kettle, TV, microwave and was furnished very comfortably. The 470 bus stop was only a 10 minute walk from the property. Susan provided a variety of cereals and tea in the morning which was a nice surprise. Overall a great stay.

Susan's studio is an excellent choice for those wanting to explore Sydney's inner west. Her place is close to public transport and and it's really easy to get into and out of town. Susan provided detailed instructions for getting to her place. The studio itself is cosy and comfortable. Breakfast in the morning in the main house was also a nice touch.

We felt very welcomed by Susan, especially since we weren't sure what time we were arriving. She was very accomodating to all of our needs. We decided to leave early due to personal responsibilities but we enjoyed our stay nonetheless :).

Susan was a great host! She was keen to give us great travelling tips and was always happy and pleasure to chat with. She makes sure to give you your space as well and is pleasantly accommodating. The location is superb (quiet neighbourhood) and are in close proximity to public transit - about 10 minutes to central station by bus.

Really appreciate the prompt reply from Susan and she got the room ready for us in less than a day after we sent our request through.
Nice and clean bedroom with our own private bathroom in the garden. Lovely and friendly cat in the main house is always ready for cuddles:)
