I was an AIRBNB virgin  and I found my first  experience overwhelmingly positive.

The garden pavilion behind a typical Sydney historic cottage was cute, clean, compact but above all comfortable.
With an ensuite bathroom, heating, microwave, hot water jug I had everything I needed for a business, conference and research related trip.
Wonderful gourmet café style breakfast options and a generous and considerate host enhanced the experience even further.
The position  is ideal for Sydney busses with several options for the Unviersity of Sydney, University of New South Wales, Central Station and the CBD. Parramatta Rd is about 10/12 mins walk away
The district is cosmopolitan and convenient with many reasonably priced restaurants, cafes, pubs and a supermarket again about 5-10 minutes walk away. I found it safe and quiet, ideal for either business or the non-extreme traveller
Like most of historic inner west/southwest Sydney, jet aircraft fly remarkably close above one's head in this suburb on occasions 
I can not praise this  facility too much and  if all AIRBNB's are like this  ... well.. viva la revolucion

I had a very enjoyable experience staying here for 3 nights! Susan was very hospitable and a lovely host.
Highlights were the ensuite bathroom (loved the hot shower) and breakfasts. I definitely plan to stay here again next time I'm in Sydney!

We enjoyed staying at the cabin in Susan's backyard. The cabin is fully self contained incl. comfy bed, fridge, microwave and ensuite. It is close to several bus stops, the light rail and the airport (you will hear airplanes).
Susan is a lovely host! She makes sure there is a good self-service breakfast each morning and above all she goes out of her way to ensure you have a great stay. She also has plenty of insider tips on Sydney.
Susan was a lovely and welcoming host. The studio is well equipped with everything you need for your stay and it's a really convenient location for buses into the city.
Great host. Lovely house n neighbourhood. Really feel like home.

Love the space and privacy of the cabin. It was so comfortable and cosy I took my time to get ready every morning and never left the cabin until 11am. Great for a solo retreat! Susan was a great hostess and I enjoyed my conversation with her.

For my first time using Airbnb, Susan's Garden Studio was such a fantastic little place to stay in! I really enjoyed my stay. Super close to transportation and supermarket! Susan was a great host and was very helpful. Highly recommend.

Had a great time in the garden suite at Susan's! It was my own private bungalow which was just lovely. 

Leichhardt is an awesome suburb of Sydney and I found the bus system to be very easy to navigate with a stop at the end of the street (1 min away). 

Tons of cool cafes along Norton street, especially Petit Fours - delicious French bakery!

If you're looking for a more quiet relaxing Sydney vacation, this is the place to be.
Our stay was so comfortable and the place was nice. It was clean, quiet and we didn't have any problems or issues. Also, Susan was very helpful and accommodating. Thumbs up!

Susan was great, we talked before my arrival, she met me at the door when I arrived. The location was perfect for me, It beats any hotel that I have ever stayed in.
Great value for money, and just really pleasant.
Thanks
Susan's place is in a great location, and the separate studio nice and private. Everything was as described and we were very happy!
Very central to light rail,to Leichhardt ,privacy is great,susan will make people's stay pleasant,I would go there again
we felt comfy in the studio,we ,my husband was building cubby house so it was great we were able to be close to my daughter's house which was worksite,privacy was good,pubs,clubs light rail close.

Lovely cozy cabin retreat tucked away in the back garden. Very comfortable stay, close to tons of restaurants and a lovely little cafe just around the corner, the local tart. Susan was very hospitable and made us feel welcome in her home.

Stayed at Susan's lovely cabin for a couple of nights on a brief trip to Sydney. Susan was very welcoming, helpful and everything was as described. Easy walk to the cafes and restaurants of Leichhardt and a very handy nearby bus stop. I would definitely stay here again.

This was my second time staying with Susan. She is absolutely the best host anyone could ask for! Susan is kind, helpful, and incredibly generous. The room is very comfortable as well. I would absolutely advise everyone I know to stay with Susan. She's the best!
Susan has a caring and lovely character. I will give her 10 stars or even more for the service and everything provided.
Susan's garden cabin was very comfortable and private. Susan was very helpful if I needed anything and the location was good.

Lovely cozy cabin retreat tucked away in the back garden. Its really like living in private resort in a tropical forest which is really nice and calm. The place is in a great location, and the separate studio nice and private. Everything was as described and we were very happy
Great quiet private cottage,in central location.Susan is a great host making our stay very pleasant.We would stay here again.
Really Nice studio close to the city!

Susan is super friendly and very helpful. Quick to reply and answer any questions I had, both before arriving and during my stay. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable, really couldn't have asked for more. I would definitely recommend staying with Susan if you plan on visiting Sydney!
Close to everything we needed with private setting.
Room is self contained in the garden with a sitting area and en-suite. Very private. Great location and on street parking.

Susan's house was a very comfortable place to stay. The little house in the garden is more than just a private room; it has chairs and a private bathroom with toilet! 

Susan was also a great host and very helpful anytime. I would definitely recommend this place.

Thank you susan!!!!
Susan was friendly and helpful.
We had a lovely stay! Susan was very helpful and kind. She gave us great advice on where to go and the best way to see the NYE fireworks that suited our style. Great, clean, private studio.

Susan was very lovely. She is a good host! The room was nice but it always smells very bad.. When we opened the Windows the Amts were going everywhere! Thats why we opened to Windows  rarely.. But we had Amts anyway.
Very very very goooooodd

It's a very good house , that u can have independent bathroom and space , Susan is a very good host , nice , very enthusiastically, and also have a good time with the little cat , every night he always talk to me , I really miss him now !

We loved the studio and Susan was such a friendly, obliging host , always available but never intrusive. It had everything we needed - especially a fabulous fan in that awful heat (!) . Eating breakfast on the back verandah was very pleasant . There is a lovely park close by and proximity to public transport makes everything accessible . Thank you Susan for your generous hospitality . We will definitely return . Hopefully Sydney won't turn n 37 degrees for us next time !!
Great, clean place! Susan was pleasant even for my short stay!

Susan was very welcoming and allow us to check-up earlier in the morning as the room wasn't occupied the day before. The only cons is that the flat is in the Sydney Airport way. So it van be noisy 1 or 2 days per weeks (Noice sharing, the airport way s changing every 2 days). Thank you Susan, I recommand this place.
Lovely little place, all the amenities you need and a very cute, friendly cat :) Susan was very accomodating and great communicator!

Susan a le coeur sur la main : sens de l'accueil et de l'hospitalité. Elle est précieuse pour donner des conseils, s'assure que nous ne manquons de rien et que tout se passe bien. Une très belle rencontre. Mille mercis et à bientôt!
Susan has been such a nice host. I would recommend staying at Susan's at any time . We had some great days. Not only because of Susan but of our little private granny flat as well! Thanks a lot Susan

Susan's studio is in a good location for transport links to the city. The studio is clean and comfortable with facilities to have drinks and heat snacks. Susan is helpful and accommodating.

We did have issues with the busy flight path on certain mornings. Make sure you get an opal card before you use any local transport and watch out for expensive taxis from the airport.
Great place, friendly host! :)

Great host. Great and prompt/easy communication. Very polite. Only issues were very small and very much a personal opinion, you have to walk through the house to get the the little cabin out the back (Susan just said g'day when we walked through and very much gave us our space after a long drive, she was very chill about us walking through at any time of the night even through we were in early and out at a reasonable time) and the planes going to/from the airpott can be a bit of pain. But the cabin out the back is beautiful, very clean everything you need shes helpful to let you know as you get there etc. 
Definitely will look her up again!

I genuinely enjoyed my one-week-stay at Susan's garden studio. It contains everything you need and if you want to cook your own meal, you can do so at the kitchen in the main house. Breakfast fast excellent, lots of variety. 
Susan herself was very helpful and always up for a nice chat. I received lots of good tips where to go and which busses or trains to use. 
You might consider bringing earplugs with you. Depending on the time of day, weather and/or logistics at the airport you could hear some airplanes. But this didn't bother me much. I would definitely stay at Susan's place again.

It was our first trip to Sydney and we weren't sure what area to stay in. Although due to the rain we ultimately ended up ubering the flat is very conveniently located near several bus stops. It's completely private as well and clean. It's got all the basics needed for a great get away. You can make breakfast in the main house and she's for oatmeas, cereals, teas and coffees to choose from. Although The weather was muggy if you keep the fan on and the windows cracked you can blow most of it out. Susan is also very down to earth and very helpful with directing us with travel! Would definitely recommend.

This is fine if you want a basic place, but it is not as private as the description. We had to walk through the whole house to get there, and then had to go back into the house to find basics like cups and tea bags and milk. There are a lot of mosquitos - we had brought our own mossie spray and I recommend it.

I stayed at Susan's place during a work trip.  It was great because I was less than 5minutes from the office.  The place is clean and comfortable with all the basics I needed.  Susan gave me more than expected as there was even breakfast items ready for me to use :)  I booked with Susan because of how affordable the room was and I really do not have any negative comments about my stay at her place.
an excellent garden studio.   Under the flight path, but fortunately there is a curfew and one did get used to the planes after 24 hours.

Staying with Susan was lovely, she was incredibly helpful. The room was very tidy, gave us our own space and had everything we needed. Public transport links and nice cafes were all only 5mins walk away. Thank you Susan!
A very comfortable stay in Leichardt with flexibility provided at all times for our visit to our daughter living nearby. Many thanks Susan.
She was so helpful to explain us how to get to the city and the places we can visit. The place was also pretty good, clean and there's nothing more than it is shown in pictures.
Good place to stay,  got a quick uber into Newtown for dinner. Nice backyard and friendly cat
Susan's place is a hidden gem. No pretentious, great price for the location, clean and down to earth comfortable space.
Susan was incredibly helpful with everything from how to get around to making me feel welcome. The quaint studio was a perfect home away from home. Will definitely stay again! Thank you Susan!
Susan's place had on street parking and was very handy to the places I needed. It was clean and comfortable. Susan is a very pleasant host.

Susan's kindness and careful consideration to accommodate to my needs began before I had even arrived at her beautiful little cabin. 
I was made to feel comfortable, warm, and well looked after. The cabin stay was just the perfect size for 2 or 3 guests. 
I enjoyed the bathroom fascilitiles also, as they were a good size. There are 2 mirrors, one in bedroom/living room, and 1 in the bathroom, which was perfect. 
We were also able to spend time in the kitchen and living areas inside the main house. 
Affordable, comfortable, close to beautiful Italian quisine, close to bus stops for transport into the city. 
Thank you for such a wonderful stay in an architecturally stunning suburb such as leichhardt. 
I will definitely consider staying again if I was to be in the area. 
Emily.

I stayed in Sydney for a working weekend and I just needed a quite place for my self, I didn't wanted to share room or bathroom. This place is good for that. And I knew I wouldn't had the time to cook, so it didn't bother me to share kitchen. Susan is really helpful. The house is easy to get to/from the CBD.
Just be aware of the noise of the airplanes... 
I think is good value.
Everything is as Susan describes. Looking forward to staying there again.

The cabin is cosy and private and just how it looks in the pictures. We were very comfortable and happy with our stay. Easy driving access to the city and inner west, as well as being a great spot to walk to cafes and transport etc. Susan is generous and friendly. We will be back!
Leichhardt is a great location to base yourself. Susan accommodation, is perfect.

I felt at home at Susan's place. It's a lovely house and a quiet neighborhood. In the mornings it was a pleasure to have breakfast listening to the birds under the shadow of trees.

Early in the morning the jets began to fly on their landing approach to the airport. Although loud, for me was an excellent way to wake up and begin my explorations of the city. Also, Im a big fan of airplanes, so I was delighted to watch and listen them pass overhead. But don't worry, at the night they stop and it is possible to sleep very well.

The studio was comfortable. And is provided with a bookshelf full of books. I loved that.
Susan was so friendly and helpful during our stay making it easy and convenient.  The facilities were great and we felt very welcome!
Good place to say.  Bungalow is private.
The bungalow is great. The areoplanes do start early

The studio is very cosy and in a great location. The light rail is just a short walk away and I found it very easy to get to everything. If you're driving, as I was, there is always a park on the street and you are just off a major arterial road (without any noise!). Susan was a lovely host, very friendly and accommodating, which made my first AirBnB experience very smooth and pleasant. Would recommend!

Susan has a vast knowledge of Sydney and was always willing to chat to us and offer advice as to things to do or the best transport links. The accommodation was clean and exactly as advertised. With breakfast provided too, our trip was very enjoyable.
Logement très bien, Bus à proximité, Quartier calme.
An amazing place to stay!
Inadequate night lighting to access studio.  Bed and pillows uncomfortable.
A convenient and comfortable studio!

Great location close to everything and we enjoyed our privacy in the backyard
This is real value for your money Thanks
Great for my first airbnb experience. Susan is accomodating and friendly. The studio is private and perfect if you are working as i was and need somewhere to rest your head
The position and access to shops and restaurants was a little stroll from Susan's place, but was perfect because once eaten you could walk off the meal on your way back to Susan's
Susan's Place is nice and clean , this is the second time we came to this flat , everything is good , great value for travel with couple in SYD .
We had a nice stay at Susan’s place. She’s a lovely host, great communication. Studio was cozy and clean. Good location, easy to get around with public transport. Everything was just as described!
Susan was so lovely to talk with and her knowledge of the area was excellent. The location was central to everything and the space was clean and cozy.
Easy check-in and out, Susan is very friendly and helpful. :)
Great convenient location to Sydney. Easy walk to the light rail and Susan was great to get along with.

Susan’s garden studio was lovely and spacious with a good size bathroom. Susan was friendly and helpful and really went the extra mile to make our stay pleasant. Excellent transport links into Sydney city centre, very easy to get in and out of the centre.
Great self contained garden bungalow.  Close to transport and a short walk to coffee and cafes in norton street.
Susan is a lovely host with a lovely home! Very helpful and welcoming. Directly underneath a flight path so it was a little noisy but love the Eco-friendliness of the place, and Angelo the cat :)

name: Beautiful and Ridiculously Spacious Master Bedroom
summary: Spacious master bedroom with a private half bathroom in a lovely pre-war apartment. There are two bedrooms total, 1.5 bath, a spacious living room, kitchen, and foyer. Apartment is near the B, Q, 2, 5 subway, short walk to Prospect Park, 20-minute train to Manhattan, and a short walk from local bars, restaurants and cafes. Card-operated laundry room in the basement. And when you thought this couldn't get any better, we have an elevator! :)
description: Spacious master bedroom with a private half bathroom in a lovely pre-war apartment. There are two bedrooms total, 1.5 bath, a spacious living room, kitchen, and foyer. Apartment is near the B, Q, 2, 5 subway, short walk to Prospect Park, 20-minute train to Manhattan, and a short walk from local bars, restaurants and cafes. Card-operated laundry room in the basement. And when you thought this couldn't get any better, we have an elevator! :) There are two of us living in the apartment. My roommate might be present, when not at work. She is wonderful and will gladly answer any questions or suggest a good local spot for dinner.

This Apartment of three Bedrooms is going to give you a unique experience of New York City. Located in the heart of SOHO, one of the most beautiful, artistic and fashionable areas of Manhattan Downtown.
space: A lovely Apartment with three Bedrooms with individual style and character so everyone can find oneself. All rooms are pretty spacious and equipped with comfortable beds, nice desks that create a working space or just room for belongings. There are two Closets, a dresser, two shelfs in the apartment. host.host_about: Friendly and positive energetic

reviews.comments: Maja's place was an incredible way to stay right in the heart of the bustling West Village. Easy commute anywhere in Manhattan and some really cool things to do and see on the doorstep. Maja herself was incredibly friendly and made me feel right at home. All in all, 10/10. Would definitely recommend it!
SOHOの中心街で､立地も良く､清潔な良いお部屋でした!

Maja was a very responsive host. The communication was clear and effective. I really liked her place because it was clean and tidy. The best thing was that the room can be locked from the outside by a key.
Great location, wonderful host... thank you for the great stay in your cozy home!!!

The apartment is in a fantastic location with a few metro stations within easy walking distance. Keep in mind it is close to the street and you will hear a fair bit of noise until late (it wasn't a problem for me, but could be for others). I had a few unexpected hiccups during my stay, but Maja was very fast in responding and trying to help and keep in touch through the app.

Decent sized room (for NYC) in a great area.  Plenty of cafes, restaurants and pubs and really close to two subway stations.  Nice and Central for getting to 9/11, Brooklyn and uptown as well as right on top of soho, Greenwich village and east village.
The place is well suited for s single traveler, excellent location, jogging in Hudson, shopping area down few blocks, number of restaurants around. Superb host who responds on the spot.
Great spot near everything you might want in Soho/Greenwich Village. Really liked having the fire escape. Pretty quiet and kitchen is fully stocked.

Maja’s place is in a great location between SoHo and Greenwich and close to the Spring St subway stop and not too far from the Hudson. Perfect for a simple stay in downtown Manhattan with easy access to other areas!
Perfect location. Maja was easy to get in touch with and she answered my questions quickly. Recommended!

Very good space for NY. Exactly as described. Very easy to check-in and smooth communications. Close to subway. Tones of eating options around. Very comfortable mattress. Could be a bit noisy on the weekends. 
Overall good experience.
Its a decent place in a very good location. Nothing fancy but good value for money in that area. Very quick responses to all questions and very pleasant.
Great space for the price and in an amazing location!
Thank you for being a great host Maja! Stay was convenient, location was great and amenities are as advertised.

name: West Maui/Napili. Entire Condo. QUIET! BEACHES!
summary: Second floor 1bd/1 ba condo in Napili (West Maui). Great price Great Place! Furnished, complete kitchen and bath. Short walk to Napili Bay beach.  Minutes away from Lahaina, Kapalua and Honolua Bay. Napili enjoys island breezes with the tradewinds. No AC but fans keep it cool. Maui is a tropical island with warm weather. Please check Napili weather for average temperatures. This is a  quiet residential condo complex.  If you like serenity, peace and quiet this is it.
space: My condo provides the quiet comforts of home at a great price. It is on the 2nd floor and has a nice garden and peekaboo ocean view from the lanai.  It is ideal for TWO people but there is a queen sofa bed for another person or maybe quiet children. There are fans in the living room and bedroom. The breezes keep it cooler than Lahaina. Free parking in assigned stall. WIFI and cable TV included.PLEASE NO SMOKING
description: Second floor 1bd/1 ba condo in Napili (West Maui). Great price Great Place! Furnished, complete kitchen and bath. Short walk to Napili Bay beach.  Minutes away from Lahaina, Kapalua and Honolua Bay. Napili enjoys island breezes with the tradewinds. No AC but fans keep it cool. Maui is a tropical island with warm weather. Please check Napili weather for average temperatures. This is a  quiet residential condo complex.  If you like serenity, peace and quiet this is it. My condo provides the quiet comforts of home at a great price. It is on the 2nd floor and has a nice garden and peekaboo ocean view from the lanai.  It is ideal for TWO people but there is a queen sofa bed for another person or maybe quiet children. There are fans in the living room and bedroom. The breezes keep it cooler than Lahaina. Free parking in assigned stall. WIFI and cable TV included.PLEASE NO SMOKING Guests have access to all amenities at the complex including the community pool and BBQ grill and laundry facilit
neighborhood_overview: Napili is on the northern coast of West Maui, approximately 10 miles north of Lahaina Town. Napili Bay and Kapalua Bay are world class beaches in the area. Kaanapali Beach is 10 minutes to the south and Honolua Bay, which is a world class surf spot and Marine Preserve, is 10 minutes away as well to the north. Napili market is a quick drive or nice walk away and has some great restaurants and a coffee shop in the market area. The world famous Gazebo is nearby as well as the Sea House and Merriman's Restaurant.
notes: Guests must observe the house rules for the condo complex which include noise limitations and parking regulations. This is a NON  SMOKING unit and pets are not allowed. Must follow check in/check out policy or assessment may occur Parking pass and keys must be returned or a fee will be charged. Please don't wash sand down tub. In Hawaii: Please remove shoes in condo! Mahalo!
transit: Maui does have a public bus, including service to Napili (the bus stop is one block away from the condo complex). There is an assigned parking stall for the condo. This condo is walking distance to Napili Bay and Kapalua. Napili Plaza is a short walk away it has a market, pharmacy, quaint shops and restaurants.
access: Guests have access to all amenities at the complex including the community pool and BBQ grill and laundry facilities. Laundry building on premises. Laundry machines take quarters. No change or soap in laundry room. One assigned parking space. Easy walk to Napili Bay, Napili Market and the Kapalua Coastal trail. Plenty of places for beach activities, exploring, hiking or rest and relaxation nearby. Please NO SMOKING
interaction: I travel frequently, when I'm on island I stay either at the condo or close by or with family in Lahaina. I can assist you by phone or email, if I am off island I have family nearby.
house_rules: This is a residential complex so if you would like a quiet place this is for you. - Quiet Hours 9pm-9am. - Guests must observe the house rules for Napili Ridge which include noise limitations and parking regulations. This is a non smoking unit and pets are not allowed. - Please remove shoes inside the home. Unit is on 2nd floor, may not be suitable for small children. It is quiet and on the second floor small children need to be carefully supervised on the lanai.

host.host_about: Exploring is my hobby but Maui no ka'oi!

reviews.comments: Everything was great! Location, equipment and surroundings were really good. I would recommend you to rent a car, but there is a bus stop really close. About 1 mile from apartment there is a nice shopping center Napili Plaza. Also it is really quit place so it is better for couples or business trip rather than for families.

We had a great stay. The apartment is as advertised - clean, spacious, quiet. Kitchen had everything we needed for cooking. Donell answered all our questions, check-in/check-out was a breeze. The beach is a short walk away and very nice.

To all looking at staying in Maui, this place is fantastic. It is a 5 minute walk to a beautiful beach with snorkelling, two restaurants, and sea turtles. By the beach there is also a rental place where you can do a week rental of all snorkelling equipment for $20 which I recommend. The place is very clean, has a bunch of amenities, and also has some beach accessories. We came as a couple but we able to make a couple breakfast meals and just relax instead of always having to go to a restaurant. It is about 45 minutes from the airport but is only 20 minutes from the main town of Lahaina (which is great to walk around, shop, and eat) and 10 minutes from kanapali which has a lot of great restaurants and shopping. If I were to come back to Maui I would stay in this same area! 
Donell has been fantastic, accommodating, and very open to offering advice and tips. We thank her very much for her help! 
Mahalo!
Check in was super easy. Location was a short walk to beach and local mini shopping plaza. House was clean and neighborhood very quiet. I would stay again for sure!

Great place to stay in upmarket Napili. Amazing sunsets and restaurants and beaches very nearby (all a walk away). We basically chose to stay close by for our 3 day trip, enjoying Merrimans, Honolua bay and Lahaina. Donnell's served as the perfect base!
Place was clean great location very close to beach store not far at all you won't regret booking mahalo

Wonderful experience. Safe neighborhood, well equipped space, and close to the beach. Great communication.
The home felt very much like a home.

Imagine everything you could need from an Airbnb apartment. You got it. And more. The apartment is BEAUTIFULL, in a very quiet and safe neighborhood. You are 5 minutes waling from a beach, and 15 minutes drive from the best beach on the Island. The place is very clean, you have a lot of beach accesories like a body board and more. Donell is very very very kind and sweet. She will respond every message within 5 minutes. Check in was super fast and easy. I definitley recomend you to stay here.

We really enjoyed our stay at Maria's place. Pleasant, quiet place for vacation.Very close to restaurants, beaches, anything you could want. Large amount of beach equipment. We would stay there again.
Walking distance from the beach and the Gazebo restaurant! We had a great stay!

Great Airbnb, Maria's place has everything you need and more. It's breeze cooled and it's great to sleep with no a/c and feel the breeze blow through at night. The location is awesome, Napili Bay is a  really nice beach and Sea House restaurant is perfect for a drink at the bar looking at the sunset. Kapalua is a couple minutes further along and is even better, spend a day there you won't regret it. Great value for money and perfect place to stay in West Maui!
Maria's home was perfect! It was exactly what we were looking for! We felt right at home, we were comfortable, and we really enjoyed the breeze and the sounds that it brought at night!

Great location for exploring west Maui! 

Beautiful view out from the back of the apartment very private feel yet minutes away from the beach and shops.
Secluded, quiet, affordable get-a-way that was close to a beautiful beach!  We walked down there a number of times.  Nice breezes through the night.
Well located, clean, well stocked Condo walking distance to Napili bay and Gazebo restaurant. Pool and barbeque too.
Best Airbnb experience so far. Wonderful apartment, cozy and clean, perfect located. Feels like a home far away :-) Highly recommended!

Great spot, apartment is fully kitted out with all the gear your need for a great stay in Hawaii. You can wake up in the morning and jump in the local Cove and swim with the turtles and grab hot cinnamon buns and coffee by the beach! Would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone! Thanks again!
Great location. Beaches and shops were very close by and the area was just amazing.

My situation is somewhat different in that I own and reside full-time in a condo at the same property, and I work for a vacation rental/property management co. that's been here 30+ years (long before Airbnb).  My husband and I stayed 3 nights when our own condo was undergoing some maintenance.  I have to say that renting from Maria was an absolute pleasure.  Her condo is clean and fresh and perfect for anyone who really wants to experience authentic Maui living. Maria's home is located in a very private and tranquil area of the property.  I'm grateful the time we rented fell on my days off from work because I got to enjoy reading on the lanai, grilling dinner and night swimming in the evening at the common area pool (hubby and I do this anyway, but this felt like an actual getaway!).  Also, the breezes everyone talks about? They're amazing.  It's a special place.  I highly recommended.

Napili is a wonderful place to stay. Napili Bay is beautiful and great for snorkeling, lots of turtles. You can walk to The Gazebo restaurant from the place. It rains a bit more up north and it's a more local vibe. I'm from the west side of Maui and really love Napili. Kapalua has excellent restaurants and is very close by. The condo had a couple little things that made it seem very "lived in" like a dirty bar of soap in the shower. The towels smelled a little musty. You must be VERY quiet as it was only two of us there, going to bed by 9:30 PM and still got a note on our car. It read "we can hear you walking heel tow down the stairs". Basically tiptoe around because the walls are very thin. Overall affordable spot, good communication and Napili is great.
Great find!

Very good location, we walked to a beautiful Napili beach every day, did not need to drive and park. It was very quiet place and the neighbors were very friendly. We found everything we needed in the kitchen for a simple cooking during our stay.
The place had very good internet connection. The breeze was wonderful and we did not feel we needed air-conditioning.

Maria's place felt homey and had everything we needed. It was a quick walk to the beach at Napili Bay and a couple fun restaurants. Breakfast at the Gazebo was fun and happy hour at Merriman's was beautiful.
Nice, quiet, clean condo, walking distances to beaches and snorkeling. Napili Market excellent for fresh fish. David
Stayed here for a friend’swedding at Merriman’s. Great location with everything we needed! Quiet neighborhood walking distance to restaurants, snorkel/surf shop, and the beach!

Walking distance to great snorkeling, beaches, hiking, and dining.  Some additional care required to comply with condo regulations like check in and tight parking.  Laundry is located in communal space, not in the unit. Relaxing and quiet location. Maria was very prompt in communication, great experience overall.

Maria made everything from our late check in to our late last minute check out effortless. Thank you so much for sharing your beautiful quiet space with us. A beach and store was a short walk away and I think in the best location of Maui. We loved your french press and that laundry was close by as well as small secret beaches. 
If you are looking for a comfortable and quiet space in a perfect location- Maria’s is it!
Great value! We had a great time and would definitely stay again!
Maria’s place was in such a prime location. Walked to the beach nearly every day and still a close drive to Lahaina. Thanks Maria for hosting us!
Great value and close to the beach. It got hot in the bedroom during the evening without ac or ceiling fan. Windows opened helped. Overall great place, would stay again

A spacious and quiet place for rest and recuperation after a day in the sun. Peaceful. Quick responses when needed from Maria. Great location, easy access to market and restaurants. Parking stall a bit narrow tho it is reserved for you.

Maria's place had everything we needed. The sheets are very soft, loved them.
Adjacent building had a security light that made the bedroom light all night.  Bring a sleep mask if you are sensitive.  
A bit longer walk to the beach than I expected.  But you can still walk to the beach!
Great location with nice restaurants nearby. The mattress was pretty hard. The boogie board was broken but the beach chairs were fantastic.

It was a wonderful stay at Maria’s place. Kitchen was fully equipped, enough towels, quite bedroom and walking distance to the beautiful beach. Maria was very responsive with all questions we had. Great place! Would stay there again!
Great place overall! Close to nice restaurants and Napili Bay. Check in/out was smooth.

Maria's place is great. I would suggest printing out the check-in instructions, as the Airbnb app isn't necessarily reliable on location. The condo is tranquil and I had the pool mostly to myself. The Napili plaza has lots of options for groceries, coffee or eating out. Definitely try the Gazeebo for breakfast or lunch. Worth the wait! The beaches are gorgeous and the marine trail is just a bit up the road. The condo has lots of handy kitchen necessities, and the wifi was handy. 
Definitely hope to go back - Mahalo!

This is a great place to stay!  Napili beach, one if the nicest beaches in Maui, is within walking distance as is the fantastic restaurants!  The place was very clean, comfortable, and Maria was extremely easy to get ahold of when I had a question. The complex is very quiet.

Maria's condo is in a great location for spending lazy days at Napili Bay, and easily accessible to adventure out to other parts of the West Coast. The condo was clean, well-equipped and quiet. Would absolutely stay here again :)
We loved our stay in Napili! Maria was super quick to answer any questions we had and great value for the location and space. Would definitely stay again!

Maria's place was really great. Nice big space with a great kitchen and lots of beach toys available to play with. Good location and nice quite spot. Maria was very responsive whenever we messaged and popped in while we were there to fix something up for us. Thanks Maria :)

Fantastic little cozy home located in a great area not far from Lahaina. Maria was quick to respond and had the place full of everything you'd expect, plus beach toys and chairs. She also had extra fans, which really helped keep the place cool. Would highly recommend. Mahalo!

Maria and her Napili apartment were perfect for our trip to Maui.  Secluded, quiet, homey and walking distance to gorgeous Napili Beach (and short drive to Ka’anapali to the south).   Walking distance to the great Gazebo restaurant, which everyone should indeed try if staying here.  Some of the great positives about this apartment are:

- Great WiFi
- peaceful, secluded and close drive to everything 
- spacious kitchen and fridge for those looking to cook in

Only two things to be privy of:

1) While we enjoyed how quiet and peaceful the community is, the HOA does monitor neighborly noise.  Leaving and returning to the apartment at early / late hours (as one is apt to do on vacation), can be met with skepticism and watchful eyes of the neighbors below and to the side.   Not a problem for us since we enjoyed the quiet, but definitely not the apartment for parties or those looking to pregame. 

2). Mattress was quite firm.  Again, our backs enjoyed it, but for those not interested in sleeping on firm surfaces, be mindful.  

Overall, we loved the apartment and would stay again if staying on west side Maui!  Mahalo Maria.

Maria's location was great.  She was very honest in her description.  While there was no AC, leaving the windows open and having the fans running kept everything cool.  I actually needed to use the blanket at night in July.  The neighbors were friendly and were very helpful when I was confused where Maria's location actually was.   The walk to a nice beach is only several minutes away.  The actual location was really nice.  The stove and kitchen were normal sized with enough pots and pans to prepare food for the week.  The large TV had a bluray player that allowed us to log into our Netflix and Hulu accounts.  There were also a lot of beach toys at the location.  Maria was super helpful.  I 
 would get a response less than 5 minutes after asking.  She was able to answer any questions I had, and I had many.  Of all the airBnBs I have stayed at, this was the nicest looking one of them all.
We had a wonderful stay at Marias place. It's a quiet residence that's close to the beach. The condo was cozy, clean and had everything we needed and more.
Maria’s apartment is so great. It’s location is near Lahaina (20 minutes driving)  and near wonderful beach areas, trails, etc. It was a comfortable stay!

Such a beautiful and well equiped condo - Comfy and with a GREAT VIEW.  Near the beach with great snorkeling, and we saw lots of sea turtles free for the viewing.  The laundry room and free parking were a nice touch.   Maria was close via phone if needed.  We will definitely be back!  (Thanks Maria!!)
It’s a beautiful condo and quiet too. The host gave us access to beach towels and chairs for the beach, that’s really appreciated. Maria is a really great host, quickly to answer to our questions.
Very nice place as advertised.  We enjoyed our stay very much.
Maria's place is very clean and comfortable with a great private outlook. She is always available to answer any questions and concerns.

This apartment is well located to go to the beach and really anywhere on the island. We liked using the beach mats and boogie boards especially, and Maria has beach chairs and sand toys as well. You’re within walking distance of Napili Bay which is a cute beach worth checking out, and also a quick drive to many other nice beaches and to restaurants. We liked the nearby Cane and Canoe for cocktails. The lush garden view from the living room and lanai also was a nice touch. And it’s a very quiet complex. We would stay here again.
nice room, quick response, I senjoyed to stay the condo very much!
Maria is a wonderful host. The location is in a quiet neighborhood and is great for anyone wanting to get away from the touristy parts of the island but be a short walk from the beach.
Maria's condo is simple but perfect if you are looking for value and convenience. It is a 5 minute walk to Napili Beach and a short drive to everything else on the west shore.

We had a great time in Napili-Honokowai.   The place was clean, quiet, peaceful like home.   
The location was great.  
Walking distance to the beach.
Nice spacious apartment. Really loved greenbelt view from the balcony. Kitchen is well equipped. Napili Bay is in 10 min walking. Kapalua a little bit further but we liked it more for snorkeling.
Beach is a 5 minute walk.  Totally worth it.  Have breakfast at the Gazebo.  Great restaurant down the street, walking distance. Maria's home is comfy and the neighbors are nice.
The condo met our expectations and is what was described.  We had a lovely stay and will definitely consider staying here again.
We enjoyed our stay at Maria’s. We would recommend it. The location, value and communication were all excellent.

Das condo ist in einer sehr ruhigen Lage. Super schön ausgestattet. Der Pool war perfekt für uns und sehr sauber. 
Immer wieder gerne.

Great location to beaches, grocery store and shops. Very responsive with communication. Lots of perks in the condo such as blender, many dishes and utensils, beach chairs, boogie boards, beach mats, etc.

name: Central Flat in Şişli
summary: 2 guest, one double-side bedroom, one small room
description: 2 guest, one double-side bedroom, one small room
access: Misafirlerin küçük odayı kullanamaz.

name: Studio WBwGG
summary: Studio fully equipped for resting, having fun, soft meals and, with a beautiful garden. We love to receive people but, respecting their space and privacy. Can park the car at front door, bus stop on the corner and subway stations 10 min. walking.
space: We envision "White Basement with Green Garden" (WBwGG) as a "waiting room " of the city of Porto, yes, because the city has so much to see and to live that, we don't want our visitors stuck in the house so, between each city tour, here will be the perfect refuge to rest and, why not, have fun with comfort and privacy. If arriving by car, can park at the front door for free. Once installed, you can reach downtown by bus, subway or, even walking for 20 minutes; the bus stop is around the corner and, any of the four subway stations are 10 minutes away. Guests can walk away and return when and, as often as they want. While in the house enjoy; read your own book or, pick one from our bookshelf, do it indoor or in the beautiful garden, if the weather allows; watch cable tv or a dvd movie or, even, rent one in the pay- per-view; wi-fi internet access is available all around and, also, one computer. To accompany the leisure time, prepare a drink and a soft meal in the fully eqquiped bar, just
description: Studio fully equipped for resting, having fun, soft meals and, with a beautiful garden. We love to receive people but, respecting their space and privacy. Can park the car at front door, bus stop on the corner and subway stations 10 min. walking. We envision "White Basement with Green Garden" (WBwGG) as a "waiting room " of the city of Porto, yes, because the city has so much to see and to live that, we don't want our visitors stuck in the house so, between each city tour, here will be the perfect refuge to rest and, why not, have fun with comfort and privacy.
