Guests can walk away and return when and, as often as they want. While in the house enjoy; read your own book or, pick one from our bookshelf, do it indoor or in the beautiful garden, if the weathe
neighborhood_overview: We are in the oriental area of the town but, Porto is not very wide and has good transportations so, everything is not far away. Our neighborhood don't have much to offer regarding leisure but, for futebol lovers F. C. Porto stadium is around the corner, and you can't miss a visit to F. C. Porto museum! It's the perfect refuge after an hip-hop in the city, which is right there, and when you return you can try yoga lessons at the school just next to our house. Relaxing comfortably installed in our garden, will be like staying in the countryside.
notes: We are permanently searching for partnerships, with people and businesses, to provide interesting services and, different kind, products that can be a plus to our guests experience. By now, we have: - yoga lessons - picnic basket
transit: Free parking, guaranteed, at the front door. The bus stop is around the corner with many buses going downtown. The subway stations "Estádio do Dragão", "Campanhã", "Rua do Heroísmo" ou "Campo 24 de Agosto" are 10 minutos walking. The Campanhã train station is close to the corresponding subway station. There are subway connection with the airport and, if using the subway station of "Campo 24 de Agosto", the buses in front of the station pass nearby our street. We are also available to provide transportation to the subway or, even the airport, for a fair price.
access: Our guests will have, for their own, a completely independent basement, sharing with us, just the access from the front door. Remark: The ceiling has wood bars on each 1 meter and it's not vey tall; it will not be very comfortable to walk for persons taller than 1.80 mts. The wide and beautiful garden is reached by the basement and, besides we also have acces to it, during guest stays, we will do our best to become invisible. The bathroom is exclusively for the guests.  The sofa-bed is huge and very comfortable. The bar is equipped with fridge, microwave, espresso&capppuccino machine, toaster and sink.  On tv, there dozens of cable channels, pay-per-view access and game console. Wi-fi with internet access is coveres in the full area, including the garden. Also available for use; foosball, drum, guitars, computer, books and magazines.
interaction: This project is based on our motivation to interact and well receive people, we just love it! Also, Porto is a passion and, we will love direct you to find the best spots of the moment and visiting our rich patrimony.
house_rules: The main rule here is common sense and, more than impose, we hope that our visitors share this same principle. Based on that, we have no restrictions about schedules we just ask to do it with elegance. We are fine with late hours talks and laughs, again, under the correct limits. You can bring your pets (*); we've had already dogs, cats and parakeets and for a while, only the neighborhood cats used to cross the garden. Recently we were adopted by Fox the dog, that just followed my son in the street on his way home! We couldn't resist! Fox is very young, so she is still learning how to behave! :) and how to not destroy the garden!!! Smoking is allowed, preferably in the garden for your own interest but, it's also allowed in the basement near the outside door. Also allowed to sing during the shower, even followed in duet with drums or guitar; it's up to you.   (*) giraffes are not allowed due the small height of the basement ceiling

host.host_about:
My main hobby is searching; I search about everything related to life-style, design, arquitecture, decoration, fashion, restaurants, shops, cool places in general and, I confess, gossip!
Poker was a mix of hobby and profession, it came to me by fun, playing online but, started to met people in the real world, and
writing for magazines and websites. During 8 years I had an weekly column in J magazine, what ended with an invitation to cooperate with BetClick for the Poker section in their Portuguese branch office. 
To handle my Poker consulting business, I founded "Coisas do Poker" ("Things about Poker). 
But, my real passion is interior design and receive people.
Until now, I only practiced in in-house projects, for personal needs, in the different appartments where I lived.
For eight years, I lived in Luxembourg, where I worked in the headquarters of the European Community Parliament, revising texts for the Portuguese publications.
After a short return to Portugal, I went to Brazil for one year, this time, just for fun, where I lived in Araras and Rio de Janeiro.
Now I've embraced, somehow, professional projects in these areas, like this WBwGG" (White Basement with Green Garden", the "Caramba!" and the "WHwTG" (White House with Tasca Gourmet).
The "Caramba!" is an, already running, project with my friend Marina where we convert old fashioned furniture, and objects, into cool stuff.
Most of my parent's furniture will be the guinea pig and, once transformed, will be exposed in hot spots in the city but, also, in the house, where guests can see and even use.
The "WHwTG" is on his half way to launch, it's also a guest house but in the countryside, in Póvoa da Raínha, a very small place on the way to Serra da Estrela.
This is my grandparent's house, a typical old stone house of the Portuguese countryside, which I've adapted to be comfortable but keeping the original trace.
The purpose here is, not only, receive guests but, also, open the "tasca gourmet" to serve, and sell, regional food and beverage and promote tasting events.
With luck, the project in Póvoa da Raínha can be extended for the family lands that will face the water mirror of the future Girabolhos dam, under construction and, expected to be finished in one, or two years.

Here is a little of myself, what I've been doing and future projects but, here, may main goal is to have the chance to receive, the best possible, everyone who decides to visit us; that will be an enormous pleasure!

reviews.comments: Le studio d'Alexandra est très agréable, vraiment bien décoré, bien équipé et très propre. Aussi, il est très agréable de profiter du sympathique jardin bien au calme. Alexandra a été fantastique avec nous, toujours très attentionnée et très bonne conseillère dans nos découvertes de la région. Et si Alexandra a été aussi parfaite, c'est certainement qu'elle tient cela de son père Antonio avec qui nous avons aussi partagé d'excellents moments ! Il nous a été difficile de quitter cette famille conviviale et cette maison !

Alexandra and his father Antonio are very welcoming, we were very happy to stay at their home.
Alexandra and Antonio have been very thoughtful with us, giving us some advice about the city, preparing the breakfast for us..
We had some wonderful times : breakfast together in the very nice garden...
About the location, very close to the metro station campanha, so very easy to access the city center.
The flat is very well decorated, and the plus is the garden : this place is definitely perfect for summer :)
We would advise it for sure !

Alexandra and her father were such wonderful hosts going out of there way to help me and my Fiancé . The experience I had living with such a fantastic family will stay with me forever. The space is large and modern with everything you could possibly require , your own door access to a magnificent garden was the icing on the cake , many days and nights were spent out there enjoying the peace and quiet of a centrally located rustic porto house. I would definitely recommend and can not wait to return :)

L'appartement est vraiment très agréable, calme, décoré avec gout et propre, un jardin très mignon.
Il y a tout ce dont on a eu besoin: frigo, de quoi faire un petit déjeuner...
Le métro campanha qui se situe à environ 10 min à pied.
Accueil est très bon: Alexandra a de multiples fois demandé si tout allait bien.
L'appartement est en sous-sol et il ne faut pas mesurer plus de 1m90 car le plafond est bas.
Le seul petit bémol est la salle de bain qui n'est pas hyper fonctionnelle mais c'est un détail.
Le lit est le canapé mais il est confortable.

Estuvimos mi pareja y mi perrita estupendamente hospedados! 

La primera impresión del studio fué impresionante; nos impacto mucho su diseño inovador y moderno. 
El studio estaba perfectamente limpio y aseado con todos los detalles justos y útiles, perfectamente colocados en el lugar correspondiente, donde debían dar el uso.

A la perrita le encantó el jardín, pasaba horas y horas y se excitaba mucho con el césped mojado al amanecer, no paraba de correr y revolcarse en él! Jajaja. Muy gratificante!

La zona era muy tranquila y apartada de la muchedumbre. Habia muy cerca un restaurante sencillo y barato y una panaderia muy recomendable por sus bollos buenisimos! Sinceramente.
Rápido se llegaba al centro y se podia disfrutar de los monumentos y visitas obligatorias en Porto.

Muchas gracias Alexandra!
A nice welcome from Alexandra's son. He explained us how to move easily in the city, prepared us all the things needed, stuff to have breakfast.

Un très agréable studio à 10 mns de la gare et du métro. Appartement très propre, décoré et équipé avec beaucoup de soins, un jardin très agréable. Alexandra est très à l'écoute de ses hôtes et son fils Gonzalo nous a accueilli parfaitement en nous donnant d'excellents conseils pour découvrir la ville de Porto. Pour ma part l'hébergement le plus sympa que j'ai eu au Portugal, je recommande vraiment cette adresse

Nous avons passé 3 nuits chez Alexandra en famille couple +bébé de 9 mois. Le séjour s est tres bien déroulé.  Nos hôtes ont été d une disponibilité et d une gentillesse remarquables. Situé pres du stade de football de Porto, nous sommes à 10min de marche de la station de métro Campanha qui vous emmène au centre en 10min également.  L'option bus est facile aussi.  A proximité boulangerie-snack où nous pouvons dejeuner et diner. L'appartement est situé en rez de jardin. Déco design. Le canapé-lit est confortable. Sdb privée.  Cuisine équipée (hormis les plaques de cuisson). Nécessaire pour le ptit dej.  Le jardin est a notre entière disposition. Merci encore Alexandra et Alvarez

Wow, what an amazing studio apartment.  It was fun, cozy, homely and practical with lots of unique and special touches.  
The studio apartment is exactly as described in the listing, but you really have to be in the space to appreciate it.
Situated just outside the main parts of the city (we walked into the city every day but the bus and tube are close by) with free street side parking. 
Alexandra is an excellent host and really ensures you have a pleasant and relaxing stay in her beautiful home.  
We arrived to complementary snacks and a fridge stocked with supplies for breakfast.  Alexandra even offered fresh bread on a morning!!
The studio has access to a lovely big back garden too, which makes for a pleasant way to start the day over breakfast.
We loved our stay here and would highly recommend it to all couples visiting the city.  I can guarantee the Sofa bed is very comfortable, we had two excellent nights sleep here.

Apartment is everything they say it is, nice and comfortable with bunch of stuff. Host are super friendly and helpful, they know their city and give you good tips where to go and what to do. Great place to stay, but not really a walking distance to the city center (have to take a bus or metro).

Nous avons passé deux petits jours supers chez Alexandra ! Un accueil très chaleureux qui fait que l'on se sent très vite comme chez soi. L'espace qui nous est réservé est très grand et confortable, aménagé avec beaucoup de goût; petite kitchenette bien équipée et salle de bain privée avec en plus une porte donnant sur le jardin ! 
De plus, Alexandra est de très bon conseil pour les visites. Nous gardons donc un très bon souvenir de notre passage dans son studio  et recommandons cet endroit !

Uma experiência inesquecível ! Tudo conforme descrito e combinado. Lugar tranquilo para umas óptimas férias.  Anfitriões super simpáticos e espectaculares, sempre disponíveis para tudo. Casa acolhedora e com óptimas condições, decoração fenomenal, nada faltava!

Royal! L'appartement qui nous attendait franchement on était loin d'imaginer un espace pareil!!! Venez et vous ne serez pas surpris!
Quant à Alexandra et son papa, ce sont des personnes sensationnels, qui ont le sens de l'hospitalité, accueillant, toujours avec le sourire et tellement généreux... On ne se sent vraiment pas étranger.
De plus, ils vous font bénéficier de toutes leurs astuces pour visiter Porto.
Pour une première expérience, nous sommes ravies à 300%. 
En plus, ils sont situés à 10mn du métro ; accessibilité à la ville facile. L'appartement se situe au sous sol avec accès au jardin. Tout le nécessaire est prévu, jusqu'au sèche cheveux et le dentifrice. Le linge de lit et de bain est également prévu. Vraiment, allez-y sans appréhension ! Alexandra et son papa sont de vrais  hôtes ; nous étions émus de repartir.
A warm and much experience... So much at ease and home...

We had a great stay at Alexandra and her dad, Antonio's place. We were as at our home,and it was the best way to begin our stay in Portugal in Porto. Alexandra was careful for us, and gave us the best advices as well as all the good addresses and places to visit. Our personal space was very big and had all the necessary comfort, and even more thon whatever we expected. We strongly recommend this address, and alexandra and her family were really carefull for us, as a second family. It is exceptional people and of the big kindness which we hope to see again in Paris or during a next stay in Porto.

We genoten van een prachtig verblijf in Studio WBwGG en werden warm onthaald door Alexandra en haar familie. De studio is geschikt voor (kleinere) mensen, mooi ingericht en het bed is comfortabel. De gastvrouw bezorgde ons heel wat informatie om de stad te bezoeken. De communicatie verliet vlot in verschillende talen (Frans en Engels). Ze waren zeer behulpzaam en attent, bereid voor een babbel (indien gewenst) en tegelijk zeer discreet. Wij voelden ons volledig thuis bij deze warme en open mensen. De ligging is uitstekend, dicht bij metro en bushaltes en we werden zelfs afgehaald en gebracht. Ontbijt in de tuin, even drum spelen of tafelvoetbal, een uitstap in de stad of gaan surfen, het was heerlijk. Een aanrader en wij hopen hen nog eens terug te zien.

We had such a great time at Alexandra's place. We had a whole floor for ourself and also the garden which is really great for having a wonderful breakfast or a few cold drinks on a hot summer night. Alexandra picked us up from the train station and also showed us the city. She provided us with a list of things to do and see in Porto. Everything was perfect and we will definitely come back to her place.

My boyfriend and I had an absolutely wonderful time staying at Alexandra's home and would recommend that anyone coming to Porto stay here! Alexandra was so friendly and kind, and her father was very sweet and gave us some excellent suggestions for what to do and see in Porto (which was a beautiful city!). The center of the city with lots of restaurants and beautiful overlooks of the river was a ten minute metro ride away. Alexandra was happy to answer questions for us and even left us some breakfast food in the kitchen, which we got to enjoy in her beautiful garden! The room itself was beautiful and very open giving us lots of space to relax after a long day of sight seeing. Alexandra also has excellent decorating sense, which made her house seem very welcoming and happy! She also has a very sweet, energetic dog that my boyfriend and I both adored. 

The night we had to fly out of Porto, Alexandra went above and beyond for us. She got up at 3:30 in the morning to take my boyfriend and I to the airport, so we didn't have to take a a cab. We told her we didn't mind taking a cab, but she insisted. It was such an incredibly nice thing to do and shows what a wonderful airbnb host she is! Thank you, Alexandra!!

Superbe studio ! Vraiment! C'était notre première expérience sur AirBnb et ça donne tellement envie de recommencer ! Alexandra et son papa sont géniaux, toujours prêt à nous aider! Idéalement placé et super propres, Alexandra offre tout le confort : frigo (avec quelques surprises qu'elle vous offre), serviettes, draps, etc.
Je recommande vivement ! 
Les commentaires sont bien réels ! 
Merci encore et si nous revenons à Porto un jour c'est sûr c'est chez Alexandra que nous iront!

Alexandra's place is beautiful. The pull out couch is very comfortable and the space is nice and big. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our time there. Alexandra is amazing and very helpful. She went above and beyond, providing breakfast and even doing our laundry so we wouldn't lose any 'tourist time'. Thank you so much Alexandra! We had a wonderful time!! Highly recommend staying at Alexandra's place.

Alexandra nous à mis les "petits" plats dans les grands.
Situé dans un quartier calme (abstraction des bruits de pavés) et proche du métro (Campanhoes), nous avons pu bénéficier à la fois des conseils bienveillants de notre hôte et de son jardin.
Le descriptif de l'appartement est conforme à la réalité.
Le petit bémol est que la douche est très proche du WC.
Par ailleurs, il y à une douche sur le jardin qui est bien précieuse pour une météo estivale.
Enfin, nous avons pu tout autant bavarder avec le père d'Alexandra, lui aussi francophone.
Je recommande vivement.

Ce fut EXCEPTIONNEL!!Nous avons passé un SUPER séjour et ce grâce à Alexandra, son père, son frère et Fox! Alexandra est une hôte remarquable! Un vrai coup de cœur en si peu de temps. Les hôtes savent recevoir, accueillir les gens et mettre à l'aise les gens. Ils sont très gentils, attentionnés, attachants et se préoccupent du bien être de ses locataires.  Nous nous sentions comme à la maison, si ce n'est mieux. Ce sont des personnes extraordinaires tout simplement. Le studio est magnifique, spacieux, propre tout comme la maison et la terrasse. N'attendez plus et RESERVEZ!!! 
Muito obrigado pelo que vocês nos ofreceram nesta estancia! Foi un verdadeiro prazer estar na vossa casa e conhecer-vos. Espero ver-vos um dia destes. Un grande beijinho para vocês todos e para Fox também.
Todo foi perfeito! A forma de bem-vindos e o resto.. Alexandra cuida muito todos os aspectos da estadia, todos os dias tivemos sempre um carinho e várias dicas e informações sobre a cidade.

It was our first airbnb stay and the best so far. The appartment was very modern, nice and very very clean. Everything could be reached with the public transport. We really liked to talk to Alexandra. She gave us so many helpful tips and she was so kind to put some stuff into the frigde before our arrival. She even picked us up at the train station. It was just a perfect stay.

Alexandra was an excellent host for us. She is a veeery nice, talkative, helpful person who likes to interact with his guest. She gave us lots of useful recommendations and tips for our stay in Porto/Portugal. Thanks to her, we had an unforgetable time in this great city. Also her father Tavares and the dog Fox are great!!!
We would love to come back to this superb place!

Nous avons organisé un séjour à Porto pour notre fille de 18 ans. Alexandra a été d'une gentillesse et d'une disponibilité incroyable... Notre fille est revenue enchantée et ne tarissant par d'éloges à propos d'Alexandra, du confort de son logement, de l'agréable terrasse. Papa et maman sont ravis, vraiment RAVIS qu'elle ait passé un si beau séjour à Porto. Merci Alexandra ! Du fond du coeur !

Ce séjour à Porto à été fabuleux. Alexandra sait tout de suite nous mettre à l'aise. En plus ce qui est bien c'est qu'elle parle français et son père aussi. Le studio est comme sur les photos c'est tout à fait semblable. 
On se sent très bien accueilli vraiment comme à la maison. Si je devais revenir à Porto c'est clair que je reprendrai la même adresse.
It is perfect!!

Alexandra was an amazing host... her home was lovely, spacious, neat and tidy and she made every effort to make sure I was comfortable. 

She went over and above on many occasions during my stay and I highly recommend staying here.

Alexandra is a perfect host. I have never expected I would use such word but I can't find a better word to describe. When I arrived at train station under a weather of heavy rain, she drove to pick me up. Even with umbrella she was soaked and became sick on the next day. I fell very sorry about it. She is very patient and helpful. Everyday she planned a tour for me according to my condition and explained it in very details. She is considerate and took care of my needs during the stay; while she respects the privacy that she never came to the room without asking. I was stupid enough to have booked a flight in the early morning that no metro operates yet, but she was so kind to get up very early, drove her car and took me to the airport. It is an unforgettable experience.
Regarding the room, it is very spacious that could let 3 people stay comfortably. It has a well-equipped kitchen area, a living-room area with sofa and table, a resting area with a huge sofa bed facing a big TV set, an office area with desk and a row of electric plugs, a music area with a complete set of jazz drums, and of course, a bathroom.
The room is next to a garden which might be a great place to enjoy the spare time. Unfortunately the weather was not good during my stay so I cannot say much about it.
The location is not the most convenient but good enough. By 10 min walking I can find metro stations, and within 3-min walking distance there is bus heading downtown.
There is a dog in the house. She is cute and hyperactive that it would be great for pet-lover. In case one does not like dogs, Alexandra would help to separate her from the guests.

This is by far the best airbnb experience we have had on this trip. Alexandra is the sweetest woman you will ever meet. Her puppy is so sweet and spirited.  We had a great time with these two. If your staying in Porto you must stay here.

This past weekend my girlfriend and I had an amazing stay in Porto with Alexandra, she goes above and beyond expectations as a host which made for a very enjoyable experience for us. Although our arrival was delayed and later in the night it was no problem at all and she was kind enough to pick us up from the train station and she also gave us a ride early the next morning to the other side of the river for a boat tour, it's things like this that are not at all common among Airbnb hosts. She and her father were so caring and thoughtful which made us feel very comfortable as if it were our own home, her communication was perfect and she was sure to suggest places to visit in the city whether a restaurant, a bar or a historical site. All in all we had an amazing weekend in Porto and it had a lot to do with the amazing apartment and Alexandra as a wonderful host, we will most certainly be coming back to stay with Alexandra in the future.

Thank you for your amazing Hospitality!

Connor&Rita

Alexandra - most hospitable woman in all Portugal, you can be sure! Her house is made with soul and head. We had everything that we need, and we felt absolutly comfortable and independently. The house is neat and tidy, and have alot of nice bonuses like drums, sony PS and lovely garden. Our personal space was very big, it's good for staing two people with a child (2 years old). Alexandra was careful for us, and gave us the best advices as well as all the good addresses and places to visit. We highly recommend staying here.

Ich hatte eine sehr gute Zeit in Port. Ich wurde von Alexandra an der Metro-Station herzlich empfangen. Alexandra konnte mir die wichtigsten Punkte von Porto zeigen und hat mir gute Typs für mein Wohlbefinden in Porto gegeben. 
Das Studio war sehr gut ausgestattet und sauber, so dass ich mich recht wohl und zu hause gefühlt habe. 
Obwohl das Studio nicht direkt im Zentrum gelegen ist, kann man mit der Metro das Zentrum schnell erreichen (von der Station Dragão oder Campanha aus nach Trinidade ca 7 - 10 min).  Ausserhalb vom Studio im Hinterhof hat es einen sehr schönen ruhig gelegen Garten wo mal sich verweilen kann.
Alexandra war eine sehr gute Gastgeberin und war sehr um mein Wohl besorgt. 
Ich hatte eine sehr schöne Zeit in Porto auch dank meiner Gastgeberin Alexandra.
Het was geweldig. Tek kelims iel harika

Hemos pasado una maravillosa semana santa en Oporto y fue también gracias a Alexandra, una anfitriona perfecta, la mujer más dulce del mundo. Nos dio mucha información para visitar la ciudad. Es muy atenta y al mismo tiempo muy discreta. Estuvimos como en nuestra casa. Su papá también es una persona increíble, siempre con una sonrisa.
La habitación es muy amplia, tiene una zona de cocina bien equipada; una zona de descanso con un enorme y cómodo sofá cama y un televisor grande; un bonito cuarto de baño y tiene acceso a un hermoso jardín.
La ubicación es excelente.
Repetiremos seguro!! Gracias por todo!!!

Alexandra and her father are the epitome of perfect hosts; she is so helpful, does everything and anything to make sure your visit is enjoyable and memorable and goes out of her way to make you feel comfortable and at home for the entire duration of your stay. The apartment is clean, tidy, has everything you need and is located in a nice quiet neighbourhood with proximity to local transport which gets you to the city centre in no time. This is our second time staying with Alexandra and her father and we will without a doubt continue to stay with them for all of our future visits.

Alexandra and her father were the best hosts, we received a very warm welcome and she kept in touch during our stay to see if we needed anything. Her house and especially the garden are beautiful and we enjoyed our stay in Porto so much thanks to her!! :-)

Un séjour incroyable,
Une hôte attentive et adorable !
Alexandra sait donner tout sens au verbe Recevoir :)

Je recommande vivement

El alojamiento cumplió nuestras expectativas: todo muy cuidado, limpio, confortable...más aún de lo que puede parecer en las fotografías...y con todo tipo de facilidades para utilizar todo y sentirse cómodo. El sofá cama, a pesar de ser un sofá, es comodísimo, está muy nuevo y descansamos estupendamente en él. Además, nos gustaría destacar que el patio es una maravilla de la que pudimos disponer en todo momento en exclusividad y que Alexandra y su padre son extremadamente cuidadosos con todo, especialmente pendientes de que estuviésemos cómodos y que no hubiese ruidos.
Viajábamos con una niña de 3 años que todos los días sigue preguntando por ella y Fox :-)
Sin duda, si tuviese que destacar algo es que Alexandra nos cuidó en todo momento como si fuésemos amigos más que huéspedes. Los detalles son muy importantes y ellas los tuvo TODOS. Muchas gracias Alexandra, sin duda, ya sabes que si volvemos a Oporto, volveremos a ir a tu casa.
 Un abrazo.

L'appartement correspond exactement aux photos: propre, spacieux et très bien équipé. Alexandra nous a même offert des collations dès notre arrivée.
Le jardin est sublime et parfait pour profiter tant des petits déjeuners que des soirées sur la terrasse. 
Alexandra et son père ont été adorables et très accueillants tout au long du séjour: ils nous ont donné de précieux conseils et vrais coups de main (Alexandra a de très bons conseils pour les restaurants notamment  :) ! )
Au final, une des meilleurs expérience Air bnb, tant pour le logement que pour l'accueil chaleureux. A réserver sans hésiter!

Alexandra has conseguido que nosotros 3 nos sintiéramos como en casa y formando parte de tu familia a la vez . Esto no se consigue en cualquier estancia vacacional. Cuando nuestro hijo estuvo mal de la barriga, te preocupaste como si fuera tu propio hijo, eso es de mucho agradecer . El niño estuvo encantado contigo y con Fox . Y también disfrutó mucho de los partidos de fútbol y de las olimpiadas con tu padre , eran compañeros de tele. 

Has estado atenta en todo, para que no nos faltara nunca nada . También has sido nuestra guía en nuestras visitas a Oporto. 
Destacar la cercanía de la casa al centro , está muy bien comunicada con autobuses y metro. 
El niño aun sigue preguntando por vosotros e igual que a nosotros . 
Ya estamos pensando en viajar el año próximo de nuevo a Oporto ( ya sabes que se nos hizo corta la estancia ) y a Lisboa , sin duda nuestra estancia será tu casa si tienes disponibilidad. 
Por cierto , unos vecinos nos dijeron que les gustaría ir a Oporto y ya les recomendé tu casa . 
La experiencia la describimos hoy ya que ayer noche llegamos de nuestras vacaciones . 
Muchas gracias por todo y espero que nos volvamos a ver pronto. Besos a todos

The Host: Alexandra is a great person. She is very passionate about Porto and wants to make sure her guests are comfortable during there stay. She offers a lot of advice and is always available to answer any questions. 

About the place: Everything in the description / pictures is accurate. The one thing I would mention is the windows and door are located at the back of the basement so the air flow was not the best and it could get a bit stuffy. 

The Location: Alexandra's place is about a 10 minute walk from the Metro. It's also about a 10 minute walk to the supermarket, a 15-20 minute walk to restaurants, and a 30 minute walk to downtown.

A really nice place to stay an discover Porto!
Comfy accommodation, in a very practical situation. 
Nearby the station, not far away from the city center. Perfect to explore Porto as pedestrians, and take the train to visit other cities in a quick day-trip.
Our hosts were friendly and helpfull.
Can't wait to visit you again Alexandra!

Fui a pasar unos dias con mi pareja en Semana Santa. La habitación es un sótano con todo lujo de detalles, tranquilo, confortable y decorado con mucho gusto.
Un mínimo bar equipado con lo imprescindible, un jardín precioso y un baño muy bonito.
Decir de Alexandra que más que una anfitriona estupenda es un encanto de persona. Nos ha facilitado todo tipo de información tanto turística como gastronómica, siempre pendiente de nosotros para que no nos faltase de nada.
Nos vamos encantados tanto con ella como de su padre y de Fox.
Ursula ha quedado encantadisima.
No os vamos olvidar. Nos llevamos de la visita a Oporto a una amiga.
No os vamos olvidar
Muchísimas gracias por todo otra vez
Muchos besos

The main feeling after being here - delight, even a mega delight)) Alexandra is a wonderful person, very friendly and ready to help in any situation. Accommodation is clean and spacious, has a separate entrance to the garden! We had a rather late arrival, and Alexandra was waiting for us and was very friendly, showing us and telling us about all we needed)) thanks to her recommendations we found wonderful places (not described in guidebooks), just what we were looking for. Recommended restaurants - just super! I want to persistently recommend this place, here you will find not just a great place to stay, but also a new friend! Alexandra thank you very much for such a warm welcome, and I hope to see you again!

Exceptionnel ! C'est le mot qui caractérise ce joli appartement. Vous y trouverez tout le confort nécessaire et bien plus encore...car ici on ne vient pas seulement pour cet appartement plein de charme, on y vient aussi pour Alexandra qui est une femme charmante et qui se plie en quatre pour vous faire plaisir et vous aider à vous sentir tout de suite à l'aise. Cette personne a le sens de l'accueil incroyable ! Toujours pleine d'attention, elle vous accueille avec le sourire, la gentillesse et plein de petites attentions (par exemple, et ce n'est qu'un exemple elle vous réserve jus de fruits, petites victuailles, viennoiseries..). Malgré son emploi du temps très chargé, elle sera toujours disponible pour le moindre petit renseignement. Pour revenir à l'appartement, tout a été parfaitement pensé et conçu. De plus le côté créatif et artistique d'Alexandra se retrouve dans la décoration et le raffinement de cet appartement. Je souhaites à tous de vivre une telle expérience dans une ville qui elle-même est accueillante et chaleureuse. Pour finir c'est le cœur lourd que je suis parti tant je me sentais bien. Lors de mon séjour j'ai eu la chance de beaucoup discuter avec Alexandra mais aussi son frère qui lui-même est un homme plein de chaleur humaine.  Le papa d'Alexandra et de Jorge est aussi un homme de cœur, chaleureux, et j'ai passé aussi des moments inoubliables en sa compagnie. Bref une famille merveilleuse. Je tiens à les remercier tous pour tout ce qu'il m'ont apporté durant ce séjour. Ils ont tous les trois une place importante dans mon cœur et je reviendrais le plus rapidement possible. Obrigado Alexandra, Antonio, Jorge et...Fox un chien adorable. Je vous embrasse tous les 3 très forts !

Notre séjour chez Alexandra fut vraiment formidable. Le logement nous a plu tout de suite; le grand divan se transforme en un grand lit confortable et l'accès au jardin est agréable et direct .  La petite cuisine nous a été utile pour les petits déjeuner. Alexandra nous a très bien conseillée et s'est occupée de nous à tout moment pour que nous ne manquions rien à Porto. L'accès au centre-ville est facile.  Le quartier est calme et sécuritaire.
Nous y reviendrons sans hésiter.
It's such a beautiful place... and such a beautiful person. Being welcomed at Alexandra's house is a very unique, heart warming experience.

Nous avons passé ma compagne et moi 8 jours chez Alexandra qui est une femme génial et pleine de petite attention,  elle nous a réservé un super accueil. On ce croirai à la maison, une ambiance très conviviale, l'appartement est vraiment top, la maison est décoré avec goût nous y retournerons des que l'occasion ce présentera même juste pour revoir nos hôtes et boire un café. Ce fut une très belle rencontres,  nous vous remercions kathleen et moi pleins de bisous.

Alexandra is very very very kind and welcoming and of a great help in visiting Porto, and the place is simply amazing. The terrace is just keeping you there and the basement is comfortable and a nice choice of architecture!
Alexandra was a lovely host. The place was very Nice with à great garden. Lot of détails were here to make us feel confortable. I totally recommande the location.

Alexandra deserve our warmest recommendations!! After a week in Lisbon with a very nice airbnb couple we didn't think it could get any better. But then we met Alexandra! She has the biggest heart and will do anything to make you feel at home and give you a life-time experience in Porto. Staying with Alexandra we didn't just explore Porto, we made a friend and learned about Portuguese culture. On top of all this her place and the backyard is really nice to relax, sunbath or enjoy breakfast. Thank you so much Alexandra! See you (hopefully) soon :)

Wow what can we say, what a neat space. It was our oasis away from the city. Alexandra was a phenomenal host with a great sense of humour. Nothing was too much bother and her local knowledge made our stay so much more special. We loved her dad, he kept us up to date with international sports including when our Kiwi won. We were sad to leave.

Alexandra est une hôte extraordinaire, elle nous a donné beaucoup d'informations très utiles, toujours très avenantes toujours disponible, son père est aussi très gentils et les deux parle bien le Francais ce qui est un plus.
Tuvimos una estancia increible en oporto gracias a la hospitalidad de alexandra y su padre. Muy recomendable!!!

El mejor sitio donde puedes quedarte en oporto no es un alojamiento mas, es como estar en tu casa o mejor, alexandra su padre y la pequeña fox, hacen que tu estancia sea magica. Volveremos sin lugar a dudas.

Se estiverem a ler este comentário e a ponderar o local onde ficar no Porto, não procurem mais: encontraram aqui o sítio perfeito para a vossa estadia! A Alexandra realmente merece a denominação de "super anfitriã". Tudo neste sítio é impecável!
Depois de um cancelamento a 1h antes da nossa viagem por parte de um outro anfitrião, não podíamos ter encontrado melhor (ficando assim agradecidos à outra pessoa que cancelou). Mesmo em cima da hora, foi nos obtida uma resposta e confirmação super rápida no seu espaço. Tanto a Alexandra, como o seu Pai e a cadela Fox, são do mais amáveis e simpáticos que já conhecemos. Fomos ao Porto a um festival e de início ficámos receosos se os nossos horários poderiam perturbar pelo estúdio ficar na casa deles, mas não houve qualquer problema e demonstraram-se bastante atenciosos e preocupados visto o tempo ter sido tão frio e chuvoso (também o meu namorado a certo dia adoeceu e tentaram sempre ajudar; até com os horários de check-out uma vez ter sido uma viagem um pouco cansativa para nós). Relativamente ao espaço, nota-se no cuidado do design e limpeza. Realçamos a cama ser tão confortável e os pequenos "mimos" que nos foram deixados.
Certamente que  quando voltarmos ao Porto quereremos repetir a experiência!  Não podíamos esperar melhor!

The best AirBnB experience ever! I felt at home, I felt loved, Alexandra was like my sister who went above and beyond to make sure I had the best experience in Porto. 
Home is beautifully designed by Alexandra, authentic azulejo tiles combined with the graphic comic book elements, all made by our creative host - from pictures hanging on the walls to pillows and chairs and dressers. 
Me and my husband stayed downstairs (enjoyed spiraling stairs so much!) and we had everything we needed for a great stay as a couple - privacy, tv with a lot of channels and great movies (in English with subtitles in Portuguese), coffee maker, fridge, sink, bar, all the stylish dishes, even food! (there was water, coffee, milk, cheese, ham, bread, yoghurt, fruit...)  Private bathroom with toilet, sink and shower, we were able to walkout to Alexandra’s beautiful garden and enjoy her lovely flowers and designs there too! 
And the dog! Our Foxy! Such a happy and sweet girl! Unconditional love. We loved to play with her every day. 
We also got the best tips and advices what to visit, where to eat, what to do in Porto, and since we don’t speak Portuguese we really appreciate Alexandra’s perfect English skills and needless to say we enjoyed our everyday conversations. 
From the very first day we arrived when she made a reservation to watch the sunset from the best spot in the city (there’s a rooftop restaurant otherwise we didn’t know about) till the last day she booked Douro River tour through her friends agency getting us last two seats on a very short notice. Alexandra drove us to eat, to trains, she did our laundry, she let us stay longer... I could go on and on... She is a woman with a heart of gold and I feel like I’ve known her forever. I will definitely stay at her place next time I’m in town. Highly recommend Alexandra’s home to anyone who is visiting Porto. 
Thank you my sweet friend for everything!!! God bless you and your family!

name: Habitación Gayfriendly l'Eixample
summary: Increíble habitación apartamento en la esquerra de l'Eixample de Barcelona. Acogedora luminosa y soleada. Con vistas a Gran Vía y a 5 minutos andando de Plaza de España y 15 del centro de la cuidad.
description: Increíble habitación apartamento en la esquerra de l'Eixample de Barcelona. Acogedora luminosa y soleada. Con vistas a Gran Vía y a 5 minutos andando de Plaza de España y 15 del centro de la cuidad. Salón, cocina y lavabo. Justo al lado del metro Rocafort
transit: Justo al lado del metro Rocafort
access: Salón, cocina y lavabo.

host.host_about: 35-years-old boy from Barcelona

name: Gran Via De Luxe 5* DaysinBarcelona
space: Splendid apartment of 230 square meters. Located on the Gran Via, in the Eixample. It is a magnificent building with high ceilings door modernist Eixample characteristic. The apartment has 5 rooms First room is a large suite with bathroom and dressing room. There is a second suite and one double room. The floor is complete with two bedrooms, each with two single beds. The apartment has 3 bathrooms, two full. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with washing machine and iron. The living room of 60 m2 is large and bright, there is a gallery converted into a second living room reading. All rooms have a balcony outside, give plenty of light on the floor. All rooms are air-conditioned. The details of the rooms and the beds are quality. Towels and sheets included. Shuttle service available Daily cleaning service available WIFI, ADSL 100MB. Metro stop very close to Girona.
description: Splendid apartment of 230 square meters. Located on the Gran Via, in the Eixample. It is a magnificent building with high ceilings door modernist Eixample characteristic. The apartment has 5 rooms First room is a large suite with bathroom and dressing room. There is a second suite and one double room. The floor is complete with two bedrooms, each with two single beds. The apartment has 3 bathrooms, two full. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with washing machine and iron. The living room of 60 m2 is large and bright, there is a gallery converted into a second living room reading. All rooms have a balcony outside, give plenty of light on the floor. All rooms are air-conditioned. The details of the rooms and the beds are quality. Towels and sheets included. Shuttle service available Daily cleaning service available WIFI, ADSL 100MB. Metro stop very close to Girona.
house_rules: Smoke or have parties are not allowed. You can not make noise after midnight and holidays. Violation of these rules will result in no refund of the deposit. And if a party, there will be legal action

host.host_about:
I am lover of the world of wine and gastronomy and fashion industry.
I worked with the main fashion companies of the world.
I'm always to looking for sites to recommend the best bars where taste tapas, restaurants more fashionable, the local cuisine, try new wines and rediscover them the classics.
I like football, running and golf.
historian's training and an entrepreneur by vocation.
Feel free to aske about turistic questions about Barcelona
I try to reply.
I hope see you

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Soy un apasionado del mundo del vino, la gastronomía y la moda he desarrollado mi trayectoria con los principales empresas  del (Website hidden by Airbnb) la moda,
Siempre estoy a buscando sitios para recomendarte los mejores bares donde degustar tapas,los restaurantes más de moda, la cocina local, probar los nuevos vinos y  re-descubrir los clásicos.
Me gusta el futbol, running y el golf.
Historiador de formación y empresario por vocación.

reviews.comments: Perfect airbnb experience. The apartment is fantastic; great central location, grand scale, newly refurbished and very tastefully decorated.  And Jordi is a perfect host; quick to respond, welcoming and extremely helpful. Thoroughly recommended.
Nice place, beware of the cleaning fee, 150 €,

Jordi was a great host - very friendly & was happy to answer all questions we had before we arrived & was quick at coming back to us.  He also sent over information about local restaurants, bars and supermarkets. When we met Jordi at the apartment again he was very helpful & had even gone out & bought us some hairdryers as we had previously inquired before we arrived by email!

The apartment itself is amazing - high ceilings, gorgeous authentic balconies & very clean inside. Plenty of space - much larger than it looks in the pictures. We stayed at the apartment for my friend's hen party - there were 10 of us & the apartment had ample room still. 

The apartment is close to Las Ramblas - maybe a 5/10 minute walk & there are plenty of authentic Spanish bars & coffee shops just a short walk away as well as supermarkets.

I would love to come visit again & would recommend the apartment and Jordi to all friends and family who stay in Barcelona.

Very happy customer :)

This place was spectacular!!  It was a million times better than the photos showed and the photos were great.  It's in a great part of town central to everything.  Jordi was an amazing host.  Anytime we needed anything he got right back to us.  I would absolutely stay there again.

We spent a long weekend in late March this year at Jordi's place.  The place was perfect for our needs.  Very large and clean.  Nicely decorated with 4 bedrooms and large living area.

The location was very good - roughly midway between the Sagrada Familia and El Born and the Gothic district.

Jordi was very helpful in getting us settled.

We would definitely recommend this apartment to any larger group going to Barcelona!

Vastaanotto oli erittäin hyvä ja koimme itsemme tervetulleiksi!

Kohteen kuvaus oli hyvä ja kuvat vastasivat hyvin todellisuutta. Varustelutaso on hyvä ja tilaa oli riittävästi 8 hengen porukallemme.

Kohde on vilkkaan kadun varrella, mutta se oli tiedossa etukäteen. Hyvät kulkuyhteydet sekä kentältä että eri nähtävyyksiin.

Suosittelen!

We loved Jordi's Gran Via De Luxe 5* apartment.  It was stunning, spacious and in impeccable condition. The description was spot on and the photos are very current. The building maintenance is great starting with the all around handyman/doorman. Anything we needed was immediately addressed.

Jordi is a great host and really saved us from an unfortunate situation -- we were in terrible rental that we desperately wanted to get out of. Jordi gave up his Sunday to help us make a change in accommodations. He worked with us via email that morning until we were able to cancel our other booking and fulfill a few other airbnb requirements. He had the Gran Via apartment cleaned quickly and personally checked us in that same afternoon.  He was very professional, courteous, pleasant and very personable.  My friends and I would highly recommend Jordi as a host and renting this apartment of course.
This flat was well positioned, clean, and really beautiful. The views overlooking the street were especially lovely in the mornings!
Eine sehr schöne Wohnung im Zentrum von Barcelona! Sehr Sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber! immer wieder gerne!

We were 9 girls and had a fantastic stay in this huge and beautiful apartment at a perfect location in BCN. Jordi is a very friendly person, he gave us helpful touristic information and organized delicious tapas and wine for our welcome. I can definitively recommend this place to any group of up to 10 people, it is very well situated, clean and it offers everything you need for a perfect stay in beautiful Barcelona. Thanks again and hope to be back soon!

This is the perfect place for a Barcelona visit. Great location at the Gran Via right in the center of the city. The apartment is very spacious and nicely decorated. Jordi is a great host. He received us very friendly and gave us a lot of great tips. Since the apartment is located right on Gran Via, it might not be ideal for people who are very sensitive to street noise.

Appartamento davvero bello, molto spazioso, pulito e accogliente. Ottima posizione a pochi passi da Passeig de Gracia e Placa de Catalunya. L'appartamento è al terzo piano ma alcune volte l'ascensore non funzionava.
Jordi è stato gentilissimo esaudento tutte le nostre richieste.

Jordi is an extremely nice person and very very helpful. The apartment was perfect. It is spacious, clean and in the perfect location. This was our first trip
to Barcelona and our first experience with Airbnb. Thank you Jordi for helping to make our visit so welcoming.
We recommend staying here if you are visiting Barcelona.

A beautiful, artistic, pristine home highlighting the peak of living in an European home.  Individually adjustable air conditioning in each room definitely compensates for the hot temperatures of Barcelona, especially during the summer (we went at the end of June).

The spacious home is tastefully decorated with plenty of storage space for longer periods of staying.  The 3 bathrooms were perfect for our group of 8 and the fully furnished kitchen was great to cook in.  The stoves are gas driven which means they are great for people who want to have better control and power over their cooking (though starting it up does require the use of either a lighter or a match).  The building was well-secured with elevators available for those who may not want to go up the 3 flights of stairs.

Both a plus and a minus, the apartment is located in a prime location with plenty of nearby restaurants, amenities, supermarkets, etc. for daily needs and is located close by to the subway.  Unfortunately, that also means that being located on a main street does mean there is the average level of city traffic noise.  Nothing that really bothered us, but for those who may want a totally tranquil location with zero noise, it might not be ideal.

Jordi was a wonderful host!  Well-mannered, sensitive to our needs, and also helped us to book a vehicle for getting to the cruise ship terminal.  He was great to deal with, and even when there was a slight booking conflict when we first made the booking, it was quickly resolved with an upgrade to this particular location for the same price.  Overall, a pleasure to deal with!

All in all, you won't regret booking this apartment!
Remarquable appartement , bonne location , hotel à l'écoute et réactif

Tuvimos una excelente experiencia. El departamento es muy espacioso, está muy bien ubicado, es muy funcional y agradable. Las fotos publicadas reflejan la realidad del departamento. Nosotros eramos 6 adultos y estuvimos muy cómodos. Jordi tiene la mejor predisposición. Muy recomendable.
Very spacious apartment and very convenient location. Was traveling with a large group and it worked out great! Thanks Jordi!
Very convenient location, and the flat is very spacious, we enjoyed a good time during stay! Jordi is very helpful for our any requests, it's really good experience for us

I went to this apartment with part of my team for a work travel. The place is very convenient for a big group, ideal for work with a 100Mb internet, large table, paperboard, and separate rooms.
Bedrooms on the street are a bit noisy though.

Great apartment in a great location. Everything was exactly as expected and in the photos. Jordi met us at the apartment and showed us around and made us feel at home. The apartment was huge and all the bedrooms were great. Lots of supplies upon arrival. We noticed later that day there was no ironing board  and the very next day Jordi brought us an ironing board , already rebooking for next trip !

Jordi was very welcoming and made us feel at home straight away. His apartments was very nice and I would recommend it to anyone who wants to stay in an apartment with lots of space in Barcelona. I was also amazed at how nicely furnished the apartments were.

Well located appartment, good service. Everything was perfect.
The only bad point is that all the furnitures are ikea, and the whole building is rent through Airbnb so it's less typical... But it was quiet and clean!
Thank you Jordi for your professional and nice welcome!

L'appartement est très spacieux et confortable et les photos sont très conformes à la réalité. Il est très bien équipé. 
L'hôte est très arrangeant même en cas d'arrivée et départ tardif, c'est très agréable.
Le quartier est idéal car très central quand on vient pour visiter Barcelone. Le métro est très proche.

Jordi was great. He waited patiently even though the traffic from the airport was horrendous. He showed me around the area, he was extremely friendly and polite and there were no issues whatsoever. Highly recommended!
The location of the apartment was wonderful.  The unit itself was spacious and the A.C. units were plus.  Jordi was very attentive to our every need and responded quickly to our requests.

The flat was absolutely perfect. Spacious, bright, clean and everything in working order (including air conditioning). It's also very conveniently located (short walk to Barrio Gotico). Highly recommend for large group looking to stay in central Barcelona!

Magnifique et immense appartement dans le centre de Barcelone à quelques minutes de l'hyper centre et donc super bien placé !
Tous les équipements étaient conforme à l'annonce. expérience parfaite.
Un seul bémol : quartier très bruillant car l'appartement donne sur un boulevard et un carrefour, beaucoup de bruits de voiture la nuit, simple vitrage et fenêtre en bois très mal isolé phoniquement ... bon on y allait pas pour dormir à Barcelone en même temps !
Merci Jordi, super hote !
This apartment was amazing. Very clean, comfortable and stylish. I would happily stay here again. Jordi was fantastic with instant responses to all my questions.
Jordi was very responsive, nice, and accommodating.  The apt was beautiful, very nice and clean. We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona!!

The flat is huge and is perfect to stay with friends and family. It looks like the pictures too. 
The only issue was the noise: there is a lot of traffic in the main street and it can be difficult to sleep at night.

Thanks for a great stay, Jordi. The apartment was just as described. Spacious apartment with great light in a very convenient location. You were very responsive and easy to reach. We would definitely stay again.
Big space with lots of light, central to many places, and very fast internet.

Beautiful and spacious 5BR, 2.5BA apartment in central Barcelona. Jordi was great and we really enjoyed our stay. My tips for future guests would be to keep an eye on the elevator weight limit (there's an indicator that fills up as you get in) and to bring earplugs since there is a lot of traffic noise outside that filters in (the downside of its central location). There's a TV but no sound system. Corner stores, cafes, and great shopping are close by - we loved being able to walk to the hip Born area. Blackout curtains also a plus with our jetlag. I'd recommend this spot for your Barcelona adventures!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment was great! Very spacious and a practical apartment for a group stay. It had beautiful views and was generally very comfortable. The Wi-Fi was decent, and the location was very convenient from a transit perspective.
The Nespresso capsules were a nice touch.

Jordi has been a great host from the moment we enquired about the apartment, to when we need a late check out on the day. Jordi's English is very good and it was easy to communicate our needs/requirements.

The pictures don't do the apartment justice, it is bloody awesome and it was a massive hit with everyone! Would definitely book with Jordi again.

BIG thank you to Jordi!
Ashley

There were 8 woman aged between 23-42 and we all had a fantastic stay in this beautiful apartment for my sister's hen do. Jordi was kind enough to let us check in early and let us leave our luggage down in the foyer the day we left. He was more then happy to give us a low down on the area and what direction certain attractions were. The apartment was well equipped and furnished beautifully. Great location, I honestly couldn't fault it, some peopl reviews have complained about the outside traffic noise at night but it's only a problem if you're a light sleeper. Thank you Jordi, this is a gem!
El apartamento es precioso, muy amplio y cómodo! la ubicación genial!Nos encantó!

L'appartement de Jordi est fidèle aux photos : il est grand, bien situé, propre et décoré avec des œuvres contemporaines. Un seul bémol toutefois, toutes les chambres sont situées côté rue donc un peu bruyante la nuit. Mais rien de grave ! Je conseille !
We had an awesome time. The apt is perfect and we will come back!
Great choice! great space! all rooms (bedrooms, living, bathroom and kitchen) are nice and big. Just like the photos presented.

This place is big with 5 bedrooms and accommodates a group beautifully.  The apt is great but the lobby and other apt's are somewhat transient so you have a variety of people coming and going and loud in hallways.  The location is stellar and overall I would recommend it with some caveats.
Très grand logement, comfort correct, bien situé.
Great place! Very nice host!

Abbiamo alloggiato da Jordi nel weekend, 10 ragazzi. Casa al 3 piano, molto grande, pulita, spaziosa e arredata con gusto. Bagni entrambe con ampia vasca/doccia e sufficienti per gestire 10 persone (maschi!). Cucina con arredi ed elettrodomestici nuovi. Posizione comoda per metro. L'intero palazzo é destinato ad appartamenti in affitto. Non abbiamo avuto necessità di utilizzare l'aria condizionata ma ogni camera ne é provvista. Unica pecca gli infissi in legno vecchi e senza doppi vetri. A tutte le ore, notte compresa, si sente in sottofondo il rumore della trafficata via sottostante. Per chi é abituato al centro di Milano non ci sono problemi, chi ha il sonno leggero porti dei tappi. Jordi comunque molto disponibile ci ha concesso il late checkout.
Jordi's 5 bedroom apartment was a perfect fit for our large group. We found it to be clean, easy to access and in a great part of town. We'd certainly stay there again.

Jordi's apartment is a large, clean space decorated with modern art from local artists. We were really into the paintings and sculptures. I stayed there on a work trip for a week with 5 others and we were quite comfortable. All the bedrooms are spacious and have their own air conditioners. The front area of the common space was our favorite place to hang out. Big doors open up making it feel like the whole space is a veranda. The only issue we had was that the washing machine was broken. I was there for a week, and continuing to travel after leaving so I really needed to wash some clothes. Jordi was responsive dealing with this, however, and did offer to pay to have the laundry done by a service. There were also not many supplies in the kitchen for cooking or cleaning. But all and all, the apartment is a great find. Centrally located, right near the metro, easy to walk to lots of places. We used the local bike share to get around mostly and there were many of them near the apartment. I'd certainly stay there again.

The place was great for a large group. We each had our own rooms, and there was plenty of space for everyone to feel private.
The host was very quick in communication and helped us with everything we needed.
The location was great as it was fairly central without being in the middle of everything, balancing ease with quiet.

Jordi and Albert were wonderful hosts. Their communication was very quick, kind and helpful. The apartment is absolutely stunning. It is extremely clean, bright and the bedrooms are lovely. The beds are very comfortable and the location is perfect! The only thing to note is that there are 6 beds, not 7, however Albert immediately brought up an extra bed for us within 3 hours to accommodate our family. They also provided local suggestions and were quick to respond for our entire stay. Would happily stay here again!
Nice flat with good location. Rooms are big and the flat has a nice feel

We had a really great stay at the apartment. It's nicely located with easy walking and bus access. It was clean, had lots of A/C units and a coffee maker (which they left coffee pods for us) Note that the 5 bedrooms are actually 5 rooms that are all continuous separated by doors that can all be opened. It was great but not totally clear in the photos. Would stay here again.
This is a large spacious apartment in the centre of the city, very recommend
Location was very nice. Very big inside the furniture could be updated more. Great deal for the price. I would definitely stay here again.
Lovely large apartment with great views - very light and airy. Perfect for our big group. We’d happily stay again. Thank you for having us!
Muy buen lugar para ir en familia....

name: Brightly lit double room in a great location.
summary: My place is close to Paddington Shops, Oxford St, Taylor Square (10 min Walk), Bondi Beach (20 min from Bus stop outside). You’ll love my place because of Brightly lit room in a artsy district close to the city centre. Great bars and pubs on your doorstep as well as boutique shopping with frequent busses to the city and the beach. Great housemates. , the location, the ambiance, the people. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travellers.
description: My place is close to Paddington Shops, Oxford St, Taylor Square (10 min Walk), Bondi Beach (20 min from Bus stop outside). You’ll love my place because of Brightly lit room in a artsy district close to the city centre. Great bars and pubs on your doorstep as well as boutique shopping with frequent busses to the city and the beach. Great housemates. , the location, the ambiance, the people. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travellers.

host.host_about: Easy going, fun loving, city dwelling professional. Love the beach, food, fitness and travel. Work to live, live to learn.

name: Portobello Manly Beach (Apartment #1)
summary: This 1st floor 3 bedroom apartment is located 50 metres from Manly Beach and 5 minutes walk to the Corso with all of its fabulous restaurants and cafes.  It has a large balcony, quiet street, ocean outlook and off street parking. The apartment includes 5 star beds and bedding, 55 & 48 inch smart TV's with Netflix in lounge & free wifi.  The apartment also has reverse cycle air conditioning in the living area and main bedroom.  Please note: there are 2 identical apartments in this block of 2.
space: Our place is unique because of the proximity to the beach and all Manly has to offer. Our place is also a a spacious, newly refurbished three bedroom (URL HIDDEN) apartment is located a 50 second walk from door to beach (I've timed it!)  There is a fantastic café/restaurant 2 minutes walk from the apartment which serves great coffee and does a mean breakfast, lunch and dinner. Less than a five minute walk further down you'll hit the Corso in the heart of Manly which boasts great restaurants, bars and shopping.  Walk the other direction and you'll wind your way along a short costal walk to the beautiful Shelly Beach which offers a beautiful eating experience at The Boathouse. Not to be missed!
description: This 1st floor 3 bedroom apartment is located 50 metres from Manly Beach and 5 minutes walk to the Corso with all of its fabulous restaurants and cafes.  It has a large balcony, quiet street, ocean outlook and off street parking. The apartment includes 5 star beds and bedding, 55 & 48 inch smart TV's with Netflix in lounge & free wifi.  The apartment also has reverse cycle air conditioning in the living area and main bedroom.  Please note: there are 2 identical apartments in this block of 2. Our place is unique because of the proximity to the beach and all Manly has to offer. neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located a 50 second walk from door to beach (I've timed it!)  There is a fantastic café/restaurant 2 minutes walk from the apartment which serves great coffee and does a mean breakfast, lunch and dinner. Less than a five minute walk further down you'll hit the Corso in the heart of Manly which boasts great restaurants, bars and shopping.  Walk the other direction and you'll wind your way along a short costal walk to the beautiful Shelly Beach which offers a beautiful eating experience at The Boathouse. Not to be missed!
transit: The Manly Wharf Ferry is an easy 8 minute walk away and takes you on a scenic boat ride through Sydney Harbour to the heart of the City at Circular Quay or to the prestigious Eastern Suburbs of Sydney at Watson's Bay.  There is a bus station that can get you to the Northern Beaches or the City and inner city.  As per usual in Sydney, Taxi's and Über function as efficient modes of transport.  If you have your own car, a parking space is provided at the apartment.
