There is a bus station that can get you to the Northern Beaches or the City and inner city.  As per usual in Sydney, Taxi's and Über function as efficient modes of transport.  If you have your own car, a parking space is provided at the apartment.
interaction: I'm happy to help my guests with anything they need including information on Sydney, local places to eat and any other information they may need to make their stay more enjoyable.

host.host_about:
Hi there!
My name is Anita and I am a fashion designer/manufacturer, wife and mother of 4 young adults. I host three Airbnb properties plus my own home on occasions and welcome any enquiries you may need answering.  I enjoy welcoming my Airbnb guests and happy to always be of service.

reviews.comments: Anita and Peter are fantastic hosts. The apartment was beautifully decorated and immaculate. Beds are exceptionally comfortable. The location in Manly was perfect, you can see the beach from the balcony, less than 10min stroll to the corso, and less than 20min to Manly Wharf. Loved our stay here and wish we could have moved in permanently!

This place is a total gem! The location is fabulous in quiet area, 30 seconds to beach, and so close to all the good cafes & restaurants. The space itself has just been completely renovated and is super fresh & comfortable. The beds, towels, carpets, everything in the flat, are all really just so nice. Anita & her family are so warm, friendly, and accommodating. Amazing stay. We couldn't have been any happier.

Great place to stay. Close to beach (2 minutes). Close to cafes, shops and restaurants and other entertainment.  Uber also available in the area. Unit is spacious and comfortable.  Hosts communicate very well and are very accommodating with ant issues.   Parking onsite Is fantastic as you always have your space.  Facilities in unit are all you need.  Enjoyed our stay and would love to spend a few days again just relaxing and walking the beach etc.

Loved the location and the spacious property.  Easy to get around with ferry close by.  Many restaurants, cafes and supermarket for essentials, all very close.  The beach is literally short stroll away.  Well appointed and tastefully furnished.  We loved our week's stay and would stay again if opportunity arose.  The hosts were also very welcoming and most importantly very responsive.

Great 3 bedroom apartment on the South end of Manly Beach.  Close to the Corso and an easy walk to the ferry.  You can see the beach from the balcony, only a minute walk.  Apartment was light and airy, and just as pictured.  The common space is pretty big and very comfortable.  It was just me and my wife, so we didn't use the other bedrooms, but enjoyed some extra common space.  There is a washer and dryer, and a brand new gas grill on the balcony.  

This is the first airbnb that we have stayed in that had hotel quality beds, pillows and linens.  Very comfortable.  Only stayed 2 nights, but would go back for a week in a heart beat.

This apartment is stunning, well equipped, - stones throw away from the beach, shops and restaurants. Anita is a great host and will accommodate where possible and makes you feel very welcome. It was perfect for our stay in Manly and felt like home from home. Would definitely recommend a stay there if you are looking for a place close to the beach with everything you could wish for when on holiday!
Anita was a great host and the apartment was very clean and in a awesome location will definitely be back

We (family of 5) have spent all together roughly 2 months in Anita's apartment in Manly. We have nothing but praise about her and her husband Peter who are very responsive and willing to help when needed. Apartment was spotless and decorated with an eye for detail. Beds were fantastic and so is the location 50 meters from the beach.

This place was just perfect for our stay. We are locals that needed a "staycation" so we know the area well, and it is in the loveliest location. Beautifully styled and safe for my 3 kids. Would definitely stay there again (even though we live only a few minutes away)!! Actually, I will definitely be calling Anita again when I have guests in town that need accommodation.

We had a wonderful getaway to Manly and thoroughly enjoyed Anita's place.  It was in a great location; steps away from the beach.  Anita was a phenomenal host and worked very hard on our behalf to work out an issue that was out of her control.  We have stayed in many Airbnb places and I can say Anita is the best host we have worked with.  The place was wonderful.  Nicely decorated and well appointed.  We loved our trip to Manly and plan to return.  Without a doubt we will reach out to Anita when we plan our next trip.  Thanks for everything Anita!

Prime location, short walking distance from Manly beach, fantastic cafes and Corso. Off street parking. Immaculately presented accommodation with thoughtful extras to make you feel at home. Great communication from host and flexible check and check out arrangements. Couldn't rate higher.
Perfect location for Manly. Very comfortable and Anita was very accommodating. Highly recommended.
Anita is a rockstarshe will go the extra mile for you
Great location in the heart of Manly with all that it has to offer. The apartment is light and bright with beautiful decor. Fully equipped with easy access from the garage or side stairs.
This apartment is ideally located in Manly. It is very clean and fresh and It was everything it was documented to be! Easy checkin and no issues at all
This place is stunning.  Location superb and an amazing lifestyle.

This is great apartment, one of the best I would say, and we have staying in a few different place in Manly over the last 12 months.  The decor is lovely, the rooms are great and beds are all super comfy.  It has a great kitchen and living area as well as a large outdoor seating space where you can see the water.  Fast wifi, Bose Bluetooth, 2 smart TV's with Netflix and Spotify.  In all, it's a great apartment that you could easily feel at home living in for either a short or long stay.

The ferry wharf and all of the sights were just a short walk from the apartment. Anita's place was really big, clean, and comfortable and had everything we needed, including an abundance of linen, wifi, Netflix, and complimentary Tim Tams in the fridge.

We love this place. A true gem and delivers everything you need for a getaway in vibrant Manly. Anita is an amazing host and has decorated the apartments in such a beautiful style. Will certainly be back.
Had a great stay! The appartment was perfectly situated and Anita was super helpful! Would highly recommend this accomodation!

This apartment is a very stylish and excellently kitted out. It's first class accommodation in a first class location. The Manly ferry is ideal  for seeing Sydney and Manly itself has a very enjoyable spot with great facilities and relaxed feel to it.

We just had a fantastic time with 4 teenagers.  Anita is a fantastic host who always responded definitely within the hour and always so helpful.  You can't beat the location of Portobello, you can just walk everywhere. Beach on one end of the street and the harbour on the other, Coles only 2 blocks away. Having a garage to park the car was great as there is only 2 hour parking on the streets.  So many thoughtful extras like a clothes stand, dish rack, heaps of cutlery and dishes, and of course the Tim Tams in the fridge.  Everything was clean, beds were comfy.  Even though there was air-cond in the living area, there was another one in the main bedroom and a heater in the living area, just to make it even more snug, along with supersoft blankets on the sofa.  Loved the view from the balcony too.  Just an amazing place - the best.

A fantastically located and beautifully renovated apartment close to the beach in Manly.  Vary spacious with all the amenities that are needed for a relaxing stay for our family of five.  Large garage and off street parking was a real bonus. Anita was a fantastic host, excellent communication and offered flexibility with our arrival.  I have no hesitation in recommending this great apartment and will definitely stay again on our next trip to Manly.  Thanks, Anita.
Anita's place is fabulous!! Great location, very spacious and Anita could not have been a more helpful host. We would certainly recommend it to anyone!

Superb apartment. 
Superb location. 
Superb host.
This property is all and more! I will be back and will continue recommending this property who wish to visit Manly. Thanks again for an amazing weekend.

Beautiful spacious Appartement to soak up the best of what Manly has to offer. Only 50 m from swim area on the beach and the Shelley beach walk, supermarket nearby, <3  min walk to the ferry and a fantastic host- we had an amazing short stay with our kids.

Very clean & comfortable apartment. 
Close to all amenities.
Host was very accommodating.
Highly recommended accommodation, we will be back.
Amazing place..awesome location..great hostess..would definitely recommend
Such a fantastic place, wonderful host and amazing location- highly recommend!

We loved staying at Anita's flat, which has a wonderful deck with big dining tables inside and outside.  The apartment is well stocked with all the comforts of home, nice decor and many kitchen items for preparing meals.  The location is a stones throw from the beach, which you can see from the living room, and a 10 minute walk to the ferry.  The communication was great, too.

Perfectly situated within easy walking distance of the wharf, beaches, restaurants and supermarkets.  The area was also surprisingly quiet and perfect for a family holiday.
The apartment is well equipped and we didn't want for anything.
I would certainly recommend Anita as a host and this apartment for anyone wanting to visit Manly.

AMAZING location, on the local-side of Manly Corso, just 50m from Manly Surf Club and 100m from Manly Cove (harbour beach). Anita made the process easy and was very hospitable. We loved our stay and hope to come back when we are next in town!

We had a mixture of ‘first time to Sydney ‘ and ‘ been before’ in our family group. The apartment was so convenient for everything - the beach - the shops and the ferry, it couldn’t have been better. If you are on the beach and have forgotten something it literally only takes a minute to return to the apartment.
We had a hire car and the large garage with electronic doors was a major ‘ plus’ as parking In Manly can be a  big challenge especially at the weekend when the beach is busy.
Anita has thought of everything - washing liquid - dishwasher tablets- sewing kit - ironing board - so many things that in other rentals you have to go out to stock up with a months supply that you only use for a week. Anita has it all - it’s a small touch that really raises the quality of the rental.
We are definitely coming back - already booked for trip two! The first timers and the experienced visitors in our family group all have new memories to cherish of our week in Manly.
Anita is very responsive and we are grateful to her for making our week in Manly so comfortable.

You can't beat the location! A lovely ocean view and comfortable place to stay. You are in walking distance to everything, but are on a one way portion of the street, so traffic is minimal. The place is clean and stylish. A good value for the money.

The department of Anita is the best of Manly, I say it without knowing the others, but I assure you that it is impossible to find a better one. Location 10, comfort 10, cleaning 10 and hostess Anita 10. I think I was clear! Thank you very much Anita, I hope to return soon

Anita and her place were fantastic. The location was amazing. The beds were comfortable and the home clean. The washer and dryer in unit was a huge convenience for our group. Anita was very quick to respond to inquiries and worked to find a place for us to store luggage before and after our check in and out. A true five star Airbnb.

the apartment is spacious and very clean quite location which is nice, the only down for is the bathrooms too small and needs air-cons in the spare rooms. 
We had a lovely time and Anita is a great host. We would stay again.

This is our second time here and it is just great.  You can really relax when you know everything is perfect, not only the location but everything is clean, functional and practical, and on top of that so many nice touches like the Tim Tams in the fridge and the lovely organic shower wash and apple shampoo.  Every time I see a green apple I will think of Portobello!  With 4 teenagers, it is just the best place.  I appreciated the garage and the extra parking spots as my kids have their own cars now and we all come together at Manly.  We are making lovely memories and are already planning our next stay.  Anita is an exceptional host, super prompt replies and so helpful and friendly. Everything is just so fantastic, come and see for yourself and stay as long as you can.
Great location obliging host
Location is second to none and the place is spotless and is equipped with everything you need and more
Fab apartment! Great location and Anita had been very accommodating.
Great Location and Amenities. Perfect for families or couples.
This apartment is in an amazing location with amazing views of manly beach. The apartment is spacious and beautifully styled. Would highly recommend

The apartment was in a very good area of Manly. Very close to all the action happening on the main street with all the markets and the restaurants. The apartment was close to the beach but  also very quiet. Great spot.
Phenomenal place (layout, size, and amenities) and location - we could see the sea from the balcony. Anita was an excellent host.

Highly recommended for location, cleanliness, friendliness, helpfulness and space. This place would suit families or couples looking for beach, cafe and restaurant break. Had everything we needed including secure parking that we can't usually get when we come to manly. Would stay again.

A very thoughtful designed place. The vibe feels like a getaway home since its very close to manly and shelly beach (with great local restaurants) yet its sootheningly quiet. The place is only 5-10minutes to ferry wharf to the city (opera house) as well, its a very convenient.l transportation choice.

Anita recommends great local places and was very responsive before, during, and after the stay.

There are plenty of house utilities as well so you dont have to worry. 

I would definitely go back.
We had a great stay in Anita's flat - it was very clean, superb location and plenty of room, would definitely recommend.

We enjoyed our stay at Portobello it had everything we needed in the unit and so close to shops and a lovely walking path by the beach would highly recommend this beautiful unit and hope we get the opportunity to stay again some time

This is our second time staying at Anita’s place in manly.  It is so convenient to everything with all the comforts of home.  Anita is a dream to work with and the apartment has everything you might need.  If you are looking for a place in Manly, you will never regret picking this place.  We love it and will return every chance we get!  Thanks Anita! ❤️
Great location, great place, definitely recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Manly!

Beautiful apartment in excellent location. Faultless presentation. Anita is an excellent host & very quick to communicate when required. We had a    great weekend & would be happy to return. Can highly recommend.

Absolute gem of an apartment just footsteps to the golden sand and crystal blue surf of Manly Beach. 

Always a pleasure to find a place that is sparkling clean and has the easy style and amenities to make your stay a perfect holiday. 

We loved everything about this apartment and can’t wait for an excuse to come back. 

We really appreciated Anita’s communication as a host too.
A lovely apartment in a great place Manly,near everything but in a nice quite street.

We were very happy to have found such a fantastic place to stay in Manly. The 3 bedroom apartment with lock up garage so close to Manly beach was clean, bright and had everything we needed for our stay from toiletries, hair dryer to kitchen extras. The responses from Anita were quick and she did everything she could to make our stay perfect. The beds were comfortable and the apartment had a great feel with lovely furnishings and everything we needed. We had wifi, netflix which was ideal for the kids as it rained a lot and there was plenty of storage, towels, beach towels and many extras  that made our stay very comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment and we look forward to staying here again in the future.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Easy walk to the ferry into Sydney.
This place is perfection in every way and Anita is a superb host. We had a great weekend in this beautiful home and will absolutely be back.
An excellent experience,  in a well maintained beautiful property , great location and management .

Great location.
Walk to everywhere necessary for a great break but close enough to enjoy the city by public transport.

This place has an awesome view from the large deck with grill, table, and seating. It is close to Blue Mountains hiking trails and lookouts and Blackheath is a nice small town to explore with restaurants, shops, antiques, and art. Katoomba is a very short drive.
Great location! Anita always responds straight away. Well equipped apartment and a great balcony! Close to everything!

A stylish, well equipped,  well proportioned  apartment in the best location.  As good as it looked in the photographs. Anita is a lovely host, quick to respond and made our arrival, stay and departure as simple and convenient to us as was possible .  Hope the apartment is free on my next visit!

Fantastic gem of an apartment with a spacious balcony and sea views. Amazing location, so near the beach! Easy to get around, great local food shops, restaurants, places for breakfast! Wish we could have stayed longer! Would recommend highly.

We had 5 nights at Anita’s place. The location could not have been better, super close to the beach and shops, and walking distance to the Manly yacht club (for the wedding we were there for).

The apartment presented as described, and did not disappoint. 

Communication with Anita was easy and she was prompt coming back to me on queries.

Highly recommend.
Great place to stay and very handy to all locations, we very much enjoyed our stay thank you Anita

neighborhood_overview: Come stay with us in our beautiful apart here in the neighbourhood with the best views of Rio, Leblon !!! Leblon is truly unique as it provides a much needed break from the hustle and bustle of the over packed tourist locations like Ipanema and Copacabana without sacrificing accessibility to all the best locations in Rio.  In addition to being surrounded by rain forest and beautiful mountains our BnB is conveniently located near all the major tourist hot spots of Rio and public transportation can be easily accessed just seconds from our doorstep nearly 24 hours a day . Ipanema and Copacabana beaches are only 15-20 minutes away by taxi and can be easily reached via public transportation as well. The nearest Metro stop is only 5 minuets away, the easiest way to navigate the city. Lapa, the best place to experience the bohemian spirit of Rio is only 45 minutes away. Leblon offers you peace, tranquility and a romantic atmosphere without sacrificing the accessibility you desire to get a tru
notes: ★ Cozinha — Se você quiser cozinhar, terá acesso a pratos, panelas, talheres e aos suprimentos básicos como óleo, sal, temperos, açúcar e café que estiverem disponíveis na despensa e na geladeira. Fique à vontade para usar qualquer coisa que tenha esquecido nas suas compras. ★ Água Filtrada  —  A água da pia não é potável. ★ Check in mais cedo ou Check out mais tarde -  É permitido mediante consulta e confirmação. Caso exceda a 2 horas, terá um custo de meia diária. ★ Eletricidade — A tensão elétrica é de 110V. A eletricidade será cobrada à parte caso exceda a cota diária. ★ Roupa de Cama e Banho Extra : R$ 18,00 por cada conjunto de toalha, R$ 35,00 por jogo de lençol de solteiro e R$ 44,00 por jogo de lençol de casal.
transit: É um local muito conveniente para o transporte - tem ponto de ônibus a dois minutos do apartamento para toda a Cidade Maravilhosa e Estação do Metrô na quadra adjacente. E o ponto de táxi fica quase na frente do prédio !
interaction: ★ Sempre que precisar de falar comigo pode ligar para meu celular ou me passar uma mensagem - (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) ou (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). ★ Any conditions or special need, do not hesitate to contact me. I will do my best to help you with a wonderful stay.
house_rules: ★ You are welcome ! Simple and common rules : Please... no drugs, no guests and parties, no smoking and, sorry, but no pets are allowed. And the Silence Hours are from 22h to 08h. Remember to remove beach sand before entering the apartment. If you want an extra cleaning, please let me know. It cost the same as it is in the ad. *********** ★ Bem - vindos ! Regras simples e básicas : Por favor ... sem convidados e festas, sem drogas, sem fumar e, sinto muito, sem pets. E o Horário de Silêncio é das 22h às 08h. Lembrar de retirar a areia de praia antes de entrar no apartamento. Caso queira uma faxina extra, me avise, por favor. É o mesmo custo que está no anúncio.

neighborhood_overview: O Méier é um bairro tradicional do subúrbio carioca, antigo centro da região histórica da “Área dos Engenhos”. O bairro se desenvolveu e abrigou boa parte da classe média alta do Rio de Janeiro até os anos 50. Entre os seus moradores ilustres estão o escritor Milôr Fernandes e o sambista João Nogueira. Atualmente ele possui uma vida bastante agitada e pulsante, de dia e de noite, com o seu ritmo bastante característico. O bairro tem tudo para a comodidade do hóspede: bancos academias, teatro, cinema, casa de espetáculos, lojas de rua e Shopping Center. A gastronomia é bastante variada, tendo opções para todos os gostos. Nossa sugestão é a Casa do Bacalhau, onde se pode apreciar as iguarias preparadas com este fruto do mar acompanhado de um bom vinho. Para aqueles que apreciam o bom futebol, estamos a 5min do Engenhão e 15min do Maracanã. A noite pode ser aproveitada no baixo Méier, onde temos diversas opções de bares.
notes: NOSSO HOSTEL NÃO TEM DEPENDÊNCIAS PARA PESSOAS COM NECESSIDADES ESPECIAIS. NÃO FAZEMOS CHECK IN AOS DOMINGOS. Não fazemos check in fora do horário que é de 13:00 as 17:00 h. Se houver necessidade justificada de atraso do hóspede o Hostel deverá ser informado imediatamente após a reserva para  ver a possibilidade de disponibilizar alguém para recebe-lo.  É proibido transitar pelas dependências da casa de pijama, camisola ou roupas de banho, exceto na área da piscina. É proibido trazer para casa qualquer tipo de droga ilícita sob pena de sua saida ser solicitada imediatamente. Visitas são bem vindas desde que permaneçam na recepção ou na área externa. É proibido qualquer tipo de discriminação seja com outro hóspede, empregados ou visitantes. É proibido qualquer tipo de violência seja ela física ou verbal. Nosso Cama e Café preza um convívio alegre e harmonioso para a felicidade de todos os hóspedes sejam eles diaristas ou moradores.
transit: Com a estação de trem "Méier" a poucos passos do Jornada Cama e Café, fica fácil se locomover para qualquer lugar do Rio de Janeiro. Ônibus também é uma boa opção, a sua maioria equipada com ar condicionado. O Centro fica a 20 minutos, as praias da Zona Sul ficam a 40 minutos, isso tudo de transporte público. Fornecemos todas as informações necessárias para os hóspedes, tornando a locomoção o mais simples possível. Damos assistência pré e pós reserva.
access: O Jornada Rio de Janeiro Hostel possui uma área externa  tranquila e familiar, com mesas e cadeiras, ideal para o bate papo com os hóspedes, além de uma sala de recepção ampla com computador e internet. No terceiro andar temos uma área de estar com sofás, cadeiras, ventiladores, televisão e um bar,varanda além da área externa com piscina e churrasqueira. A cozinha é espaçosa e equipada com todos os utensílios necessários para o preparo das refeições, e os quartos compartilhados possuem varandas onde os hóspedes podem relaxar e aproveitar para interagir com os outros hóspedes.
interaction: Estou presente sempre que possível e no meu celular 24 horas por dia.
house_rules: Ar refrigerado de 8pm às 8 am. Café da manhã de segunda a sábado das 7:30am às 9:30am. Não é permitido fumar nas dependências da casa, temos uma área livre onde é permitido fumar. É proibido transitar pela casa com roupa de dormir. Os hóspedes só poderão transitar sem camisa na área da piscina, ficando proibido em outras dependências. As visitas são bem vindas desde que permaneçam na área externa ou na recepção ficando proibido transitar em outras dependências. É proibido comer dentro dos quartos ou na área de TV, o hóspede que quiser fazer lanche ou refeição por gentileza dirija-se a cozinha para faze-lo, assim evitamos insetos indesejáveis nos quartos e dependências da casa. É proibido trazer bebida alcoólica.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Se você procura um ambiente aconchegante e confortável para se sentir em casa, esse é o lugar certo. Temos várias opções de hospedagem e moradia, seja em quartos compartilhados ou suítes privativas. Nossas instalações são equipadas de câmeras de segurança 24 horas para garantir sua total segurança.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: The Aloha Suite
summary: Aloha and thank you for checking out our Private Detached Aloha Suite The suite is a 500 sq. ft. indoor living space with a 320 sq. ft. Covered Lanai. Private parking and entrance. The Aloha Suite is a separate detached private suite 75 to 100 feet away from the main building.  SPECIAL NOTE: If you are flying into Kona Airport (KOA), the drive is about one hour and thirty minutes. We recommend late evening arrivals stay the night on the Kona side and drive over during the daylight hours.
space: Location, Location, Location. The Aloha Suite sits next to a huge Lava rock. Start your day on the large Lanai with your cup of fresh brewed coffee. Then it's off to see Hawaii. Majority of the sites to see are 25-35 minutes away. Why waste your time driving, when from the Aloha Suite your adventure is a short drive away. Want to see other side of the Island a mere one hour and 30 minutes gets you to some amazing beach sites. After a day of exploring, end the night by listen to the sounds of the ocean and our Coqui frogs.  We are so excited to share our Aloha Suite. The Aloha Suite sits on a one acre lot. The property is on a well system with great drinking water (No Catchment). Our Property has some amazing lava formation on the property. We carved out and saved as much of the natural landscaping of the property. As you pull in and park in your private spot next to your private suite, you will notice the large lava mound right there to explore. Your private Lanai awaits you as you beg
description: Aloha and thank you for checking out our Private Detached Aloha Suite The suite is a 500 sq. ft. indoor living space with a 320 sq. ft. Covered Lanai. Private parking and entrance. The Aloha Suite is a separate detached private suite 75 to 100 feet away from the main building.  SPECIAL NOTE: If you are flying into Kona Airport (KOA), the drive is about one hour and thirty minutes. We recommend late evening arrivals stay the night on the Kona side and drive over during the daylight hours. Location, Location, Location. The Aloha Suite sits next to a huge Lava rock. Start your day on the large Lanai with your cup of fresh brewed coffee. Then it's off to see Hawaii. Majority of the sites to see are 25-35 minutes away. Why waste your time driving, when from the Aloha Suite your adventure is a short drive away. Want to see other side of the Island a mere one hour and 30 minutes gets you to some amazing beach sites. After a day of exploring, end the night by listen to the sounds of the ocean
neighborhood_overview: Hawaiian Paradise Park (also known as HPP) is located in the Puna District of East Hawaii, approximately 15 miles southeast of Hilo. This subdivision fronts State Highway 130 and stretches 4 miles to the Pacific Ocean and is 3 1/2 miles wide. The community is close to shopping, dining, and cultural activities in Hilo, Volcano, and Keaau. Of all the subdivisions in lower Puna, HPP is closest to Hilo, meaning shorter commute times to Hawaii’s second largest city – the business heart of east Hawaii.
notes: We hope your stay with us brings some aloha to your life that will last a life-time. About our Ohana. Lori and I came to the Islands on vacation a few years back. Ever since then our dream was to move to one of the Islands. We officially made the Big Island (Hawaii) home. Our two 10 lb. fur babies live with us in the main house. Hawaii is about adventure, exploring, and most of all refreshing yourself. Aloha!!
transit: Best to have a rental car. A 4-wheel drive is not necessary to navigate the HPP area or majority of the sites to see here on the Big Island
access: Guest will have their own private suite separate from the main house. There is wifi for the suite along with Satellite TV. The DVR is loaded with movies. The kitchenette and large refrigerator allows you to cook and prepare your own meals. There is BBQ as well for all your grilling needs.
interaction: Our goal is to make your stay the best possible. We live on site and will be sure to advise our guests of the fun and exciting things to see and do. We are available for our guest as much as or as little as needed. This is your getaway.
house_rules: - Please Remove Shoes - Quite please after 10 pm - Kids age 13 and up  - Please no smoking inside-Smoking in designated areas only - We depend upon our guest to keep the place clean, so please be attentive        to the list in the house folder.  -Please keep counters clean of food. -If gate is locked and closed please lock and close behind you. -Please drive slow onto property (We have two small dogs) -PLEASE NOTE AT&T service is poor throughout the Big Island SHORT TERM RENTAL AGREEMENT 	This Short Term Rental Agreement (the “Agreement”) is made by and between Alan G. Yerxa (“Homeowner”) and AirBnB Named Guest (“Guest”) as of the date last set forth on the digital page of this Agreement.  For good and valuable consideration, the sufficiency of which is acknowledged, the parties hereby agree as follows: Property.  The property is located at: Hawaiian Paradise Park Keaau Hi, 96749 The property is furnished and includes Towels, Dishes, Bedding and kitchen Items also refer to AirBnB Aloh

host.host_location: Hawaiian Paradise Park, Hawaii, United States
host.host_about: We enjoy so many things, movies, golf, the ocean and of course music. We have made so many new friends here on the Big Island. Hoping you find the Aloha here at our place.

reviews.comments: We picked Alan & Lori's place to stay during the Merrie Monarch Hula event. We loved the seclusion and quiet of their place. They met us and were very flexible about our check-in time. Our plans changed and they accommodated us arriving early. They were always very communicators and answered all our questions quickly. Such nice people and we will definately stay again!
Great location with private setting and the perfect host! Would highly recommend this stay.

Great place to base camp for relaxing and exploring Hilo side of island.  Alan and Lori are fantastic hosts and provided all the insider tips for what to see, etc.  We will definitely come back here again.

We enjoyed our short stay so much!! The home was adorable with so many well thought out details including themed decorations and a wonderful porch with a grill and beautiful landscaping. They had a small basket of snacks and drinks which were perfect, and they offered an amazing information packet about the island and their recommendations. The attention to details show that they are passionate about their rental. We would recommend this site in a heartbeat and if we return to the Big Island  (as we hope to) we would be happy to return to this location. It is close to Mauna Kea, tidal pools with excellent snorkeling, and the national volcano park, as well as the town Hilo, with a great farmers market.

WOW! What a great experience! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND staying at this location. It was inexpensive and a perfect situation for us. My wife and I life on the west side of the Big Island and wanted to do a one week "Staycation" on the east side. We love hiking around Volcano National Park and we enjoy exploring Hilo on occasion too. Alan and Lori's place was centrally located for us. We just needed a bed, a fridge, a microwave, a bathroom and a grill. Alan and Lori's place provided all that but so much more as well.

Right from the start they were very responsive to questions and our planning. We were fortunate to not have someone staying there the night before or the night after our stay so Alan made early checkin available to us and offered a later checkout option as well, through we had to leave early in the morning to get back home.

The Aloha Suite was a great space! High ceilings, and very comfortable. Alan and Lori live in the house about 30 yards from this separate building. They are available if you need them but they don't hover. You can have "getaway private time" or you can chat with them. Your choice. 

We cooked on the grill outside most nights under the covered lanai, and ate out there as well. We popped popcorn in the microwave inside and relaxed with a little Netflix several nights right before bed to unwind after a long day of hiking and exploring the east side of the island. Direct TV is an option as well and there are quite a few movies and shows available on the DVR. 

Alan and Lori have put together a great booklet overview of places to see, places to eat, places to shop, etc. around the island with spot-on information. They are very personable and attentive, friendly people. We felt very welcomed and safe at the property. 

It was very clean when we arrived, Alan was there to greet us at check in. They provided some popcorn, coffee, juice drinks and other little hospitality touches that were very appreciated. The bed was comfortable and the fans scattered around the suite kept things at a comfortable temperature.

Again, we HIGHLY RECOMMEND the "Aloha Suite" of Alan and Lori and I am certain we will stay there again when our next east side staycation craving hits.

By far the best rental and experience I have ever had on the Big Island.  Very clean, safe and the hosts were terrific.  And believe me I have stayed everywhere but this is a wonderful vacation rental.
Alan & Lori are great hosts. The place is nice and clean. Very remote quiet location.

We just finished a 1 week stay at Alan and Lori 's place. This is a very nice separate unit with lots of privacy and all the amenities you will need for a great stay. Super clean and cozy. We had a great stay. Alan even took us snorkeling one morning , which is way above and beyond what you would expect from a host. Thanks again. K and G

Room is exactly as described, very picturesque scenary located short drive away. Located in a quite suburb. 

Highly recommended for those that want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city life.

I just finished up a month long stay at the Aloha Suite.  I found it to be exactly what I was looking for in an extended stay.  The location is beautiful, private, and quiet.  Alan and Lori are the perfect hosts- always available for questions and giving great recommendations for local things to do.   The suite has a very comfortable king sized bed, couch, cable tv, dedicated Wu-if.  I loved the concrete floors and covered lanai.  The Ohana itself is practically brand new and very clean.  I already have a return stay booked!
It was a great location near the coast and close to Volcano National Park. Alan was quick to respond to any requests and generously provided use of snorkeling equipment and tips on where to go.

Great place to stay! Alan was friendly and very helpful with suggestions for beach spots and dinner suggestions. Private house with great coffee in the AM and microwave/toaster oven, etc. if needed. Also had snorkel gear, beach towels and chairs available. Clean and inviting - would definitely stay here again!

We had a great time staying at the Aloha suit, Alan & Lori were very hospitable and informative on what to do and where to go in the Island.

The place was very clean and private, the kitchen was stocked with everything we needed for our stay also the bed was very comfortable to sleep.

Alan & Lori very prompt to answer our emails and questions, we would come back to stay at the Aloha Suit 

Thank you Alan and Lori

We really liked the place. It is very neat and clean. Alan & Lori were very responsive and provided a lot of information regarding local spots. We definitely would like to come back and stay at their place.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Anything you could need, Alan and Lori have thought of. This was a very clean, very comfortable stay with great tips that helped us make the most of our trip. Would definitely stay again!

We had a wonderful time at Alan and Lori’s suite. It was small but perfect for the two of us. Although close to the main house, it was very private and comfy. They had snorkel gear and beach chairs for use too! And lots of great books and resources to further explore. They were super welcoming and helpful and provided lots of good ideas for seeing the island, even when it was raining all day. We would definitely stay there again. Thanks so much!

Thank you, Alan & Lori, for having us! Your guest suite was a great stop for us after a long day - the unit was sparkling clean and stylishly decorated, which made us feel right at home. We especially loved the welcome basket with snacks and drinks :) Upon check in, we were a couple hours later than expected (and didn’t have working phones to contact the host), and Alan was super accommodating and waited up to greet us. He was lovely to chat to, and offered plenty of suggestions and information on the area. I would definitely recommend a stay here! My only regret is that we couldn’t stay longer.
This was my 2nd stay with Alan and Lori.  I love the peaceful location, just wish I could've stayed longer.
We had a wonderful stay at the Aloha Suite! Alan and Lori are gracious hosts, the accommodations are charming, and the location is perfect. We will definitely be back for a longer stay!

Alan and Lori’s place is absolutely amazing place to stay. There hospitality is and thoughtfulness of there guest is truly the best. The place is extremely clean and well cared for.  Thank you for a amazing stay!

Alan & Lori's place is in a beautiful ocean front neighbourhood. They provided so many amazing tips and ideas for things to do on this side of the island. We took a couple trips to the volcano national park and even had a chance to view the live lava flow. Great spot if you're planning on spending some time in the park!
Alan is a super helpful host, anything you need to know he’ll tell ya and the place is very clean, roomy and nice! 10/10 would recommend

This was my first air b&b experience, and I must say it was everything I hoped for.  The place is homey and clean, and perfect if you want a home base for a week of adventure in Hawaii.  The bed was comfortable, and the temperature quite nice without air conditioning.  The kitchen & coffee setup was great, as we prepared our breakfast at the house each day.  The cooler and beach supplies were a nice bonus.  The lanai was a perfect place for morning coffee or evening refreshment.  Alan was friendly & hospitable, yet allowed us complete privacy.  As long as you are not hoping to be right in the hustle and bustle of things, this place is perfect.  It is a little drive from many of the places you may want to visit, but we found it quite worth it.  I would definitely stay here again.

This place was perfect and exactly what we expected. Alan was awesome and made great recommendations on restaurants and activities. The suite was clean and had all the little extras that you need while travelling. I would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area!
My parents stayed at Alan's for 3 nights. Beautiful location, large space, and pretty much in new condition.
Very  friendly and generous reception. We had to make booking changes last-minute - yet, everything was very smooth.
Alan and Lori are great host. Clean and tranquil house. Very close to the beautiful seaside. A bit dark at the kitchen area, need some improvement.

The Aloha Suite is the perfect place to spend some needed relaxation time.  Alan and Lori were superb hosts.  As soon as we landed, Alan texted great locations for meals and food and supplies to stock the 'frig or grab extra toiletries.
Our hosts gave us our space, but were available to help us with recommendations for attractions.  We REALLY LOVED the Umauma Falls & ZipLine Experience.  
Read the Suite Handbook-the recommendations there are spot-on (don't try to walk to Green Sands Beach - use the local's shuttle).  
The close walk (or drive) down to the lava cliffs at the end of the road provided us with the ocean view we craved AND YOU CAN WATCH THE GLOW  from Fissure #8 from the lava rock just outside your bedroom window!
The Suite was uncluttered and easy to maintain.  The newly installed ceiling fan in the front room gave us relief from the expected island humidity.  The large shower had room for two!  The full-sized 'frig and microwave and electric burner meant that you could cook (if you so chose!) or just keep your beverages nice and cold.  
The Aloha Suite was perfect for our trip!

Alan and Lori were both very nice hosts and Alan provided lots of helpful tips on things to do and places to eat locally. They were also great about giving us our own space while we were there. There's a very cool shoreline within walking distance which was a great place to watch the waves. It was nice to stay in a less touristy area but still be close enough to Hilo to go to the larger city whenever we wanted to. We would definitely recommend staying there.

Great value!  Really comfy guest house in a beautiful location.  The place feels much bigger and roomier than it looks in photos, and was a very comfortable place to stay for myself, my girlfriend, and our 2 year old son.  Feels very private despite the fact that the hosts live in the main house on the property.  Alan was very responsive to any questions or needs we had.  Would highly recommend to people looking for a place to stay in Puna.
Great place. Enjoyed the dalm,quiet area. Ho in e away from home

This is one of the best Airbnbs I have EVER stayed at. The space is large, clean and comfortable (with a super comfy bed!). The kitchen in particular is exceptionally well equipped (microwave popcorn was a great touch). You can tell that Alan and Lori have put a lot of thought into the details. 

Alan has hit upon the perfect balance between providing helpful travel tips and recommendations but then stepping back and giving us the space to do our own thing. Hope to come back in the future!
Alan and Lori were amazing hosts. They provided us with get recommendations and helped plan our day trips. Their place is spacious and spotless and was a overall great experience!

Alan and Lori's place was great, they have everything you'd need in a cozy little space that is comfortable in a way that makes sense for a place where you'll be in beach mode. It's in a nice area with some cools things and that is really well located to check out everything in the Hilo region. They had a decent amount of foodstuffs and even left us a couple nice ripe papayas. 

Alan was easy to communicate with when we wanted to and gave us convenient directions and would send us (Hidden by Airbnb) map links to good restaurants and cool things around the area. Really everything you could want in an airbnb.

Alan and Lori’s Aloha Suite is one of the best AirBnB’s we have ever stayed at. It is very stylish and super clean! It is very well located!
Alan texted a location for local farmers market. It was a wonderful time there. 
Also they had foodstuff and even two nice ripe papayas for us. Yummy!
We would definitely recommend staying there. 
The Aloha Suite is awesome and was perfekt for our trip!!!!
Mahalo for the amazing stay!

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Alan and Lori’s place. It was very clean, the right price, and more spacious than we expected. We appreciated the covered outdoor space which was perfect for morning coffee.  Alan communicated promptly and gave lots of information on local attractions and places to eat.  His recommendations on what to bring were very informative. We definitely plan to come back again!

name: Lindo quarto a uma quadra da praia!
summary: Este aconchegante apartamento tem localização privilegiada: a uma quadra da famosa praia de Copacabana e bem próximo de alguns dos melhores bares, restaurantes da cidade, supermercado, shopping, bancos, loja de aluguel de carros, etc. Os hospedes irão dispor de um dos dois quartos do apartamento onde moro, cama de casal confortável, com lençóis de 300 fios, toalhas, utensílios de cozinha (incluindo máquina de café expresso), além de uma excelente acolhida e orientações turísticas necessárias.
space: Um ambiente super limpo, tolhas e lençóis de qualidade e boa internet.
description: Este aconchegante apartamento tem localização privilegiada: a uma quadra da famosa praia de Copacabana e bem próximo de alguns dos melhores bares, restaurantes da cidade, supermercado, shopping, bancos, loja de aluguel de carros, etc. Os hospedes irão dispor de um dos dois quartos do apartamento onde moro, cama de casal confortável, com lençóis de 300 fios, toalhas, utensílios de cozinha (incluindo máquina de café expresso), além de uma excelente acolhida e orientações turísticas necessárias. Um ambiente super limpo, tolhas e lençóis de qualidade e boa internet. estarei totalmento disponível para atender da melhor forma meus hóspedes. A praia quase em frente, a disponibilidade de transportes públicos na rua do apartamento, próximos dos melhores restaurantes da cidade e pontos turísticos. O segundo quarto do apartamento também pode ser alugado, tendo que os hóspedes dividirem os ambientes em comuns como a cozinha e sala.
neighborhood_overview: A praia quase em frente, a disponibilidade de transportes públicos na rua do apartamento, próximos dos melhores restaurantes da cidade e pontos turísticos.
notes: O segundo quarto do apartamento também pode ser alugado, tendo que os hóspedes dividirem os ambientes em comuns como a cozinha e sala.
interaction: estarei totalmento disponível para atender da melhor forma meus hóspedes.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou uma pessoa divertida e de bem com vida. Baiana, mas moro na Cidade Maravilhosa, Psicóloga, Gestora de RH e Administração em uma empresa Alemã. Amo minha profissão, minha família e meus amigos. Sou fã em viajar, conhecer outras culturas, degustar um bom vinho, aprender coisas novas, dar risada e ser feliz! :)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Gleice was very welcoming and helpful, the house was immaculate and perfectly located. We would recommend anyone staying here.
Muy buen depto y excelente ubicación, glaice es super amable, solo palabras de agradecimiento.
Ótima localização, apartamento totalmente reformado e um detalhe bem legal tem um banheiro amplo.. Que é difícil no Rio.. Vale muito a pena se hospedar neste apartamento..
El apartamento es muy bonito, limpio y ordenado, está muy cerca de la playa y del pan de azúcar.

O apartamento é muito bom, em uma ótima localização, muito próximo a praia e perto de tudo. A Gleice é uma pessoa muito simpática, sempre disposta a ajudar, e com ótimas dicas sobre a região. Apenas uma observação quanto ao quarto, que em nada o desabona, mas talvez seja importante para outros hóspedes: ele não possui ar condicionado, mas sim um ventilador (em minha estadia nem precisei usar) e como ele é de frente para a rua, dá pra escutar um pouco o barulho do movimento, que pra mim não fez nenhuma diferença, mas conheço pessoas que ficariam um pouco incomodadas com aquele barulhinho. No mais, tudo 10, super recomendo, e com certeza em minhas próximas viagens ao Rio ficarei lá.

Começando pelo fim, a simpatia e a disponibilidade da proprietária foi inexcedível. A casa e a sua localização correspondiam em tudo ao que fora descrito no anúncio.  A localização geográfica é otima, permitiu-nos fazer circuitos pelos pontos turísticos mais importantes da cidade, a poucos minutos de carro, e também fica a uma quadra da praia Copa cabana. Adoramos e recomendamos talvez, quem sabe, pensamos em voltar. Obrigado.

Lugar ímpar! Vale a pena demais. Muito bem localizado, poucos metros da praia e bem a frente de uma parada de ônibus. Além do bairro em si, copacabana faz rosa a diferença pra uma viagem. O quarto é ótimo, banheiro com chuveiro elétrico e 2 ventiladores. Mas o encanto principal do lugar é a sala, ótima pra relaxar depois de um dia cheio. Portaria 24 horas, o que facilita pra quem quer ficar tranquilo. Indico à todos.

Fue una estancia maravillosa, el departamento queda a una cuadra de la playa y cerca de supermercado,  farmacia y restaurantes, además la locomoción pasa fuera del edificio y hay una estación de metro a unas 4 cuadras, nos permitió movernos sin problemas en el trasporte público, el departamento muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para una estadía cómoda es tal como se ve en las fotos, además glaice muy linda y considerada con nosotros y nos ayudó siempre que necesitamos algo, por lo que esperamos volver en otra oportunidad.
Precioso el apartamento, tal cual las fotos y la ubicación muy buena, a una cuadra y media de la playa y de varios comercios. Muchas gracias.

Gente, gostei muito do apartamento, muito organizado limpo aconchegante, a decoração é como esra nas fotos, próximo a tudo e a anfitriã sempre muito atenciosa e muito disposta em querer ajudar. Super, mega, giga recomendo vcs nao irão se arrepender, farei de rudo para quamdo voltar ao Rio ficar nesse apartamento novamente.

Nossa estadia na cidade do Rio de Janeiro foi muito boa pena que estava chovendo e um pouco frio.O espaço do apartamento é muito bom,aconchegante e bem equipado.Gleice é uma anfitriã gentil e solicita,nos deixou bem a vontade,a localização também ajudou muito.Super indico.
Excelente anfitriona. Departamento muy lindo y excelente ubicación. Gleice muy preocupada de los detalles y accesible a nuestros requerimientos. Excelente estadía.
Recomiendo el departamento es muy limpio esta bien equipado y en un lugar privilegiado de Rio de janeiro
It s a very nice appartement and gleice is a very gentle and nice person.
Gleice's apartment is in a perfect location in Copa just a few steps from the beach. Very clean and felt safe. Just as described. Thank You!

Quarto maravilhoso, não tive nenhum problema. Sala MUITO aconchegante, ambiente tranquilo mesmo o quarto sendo de frente para a rua. Meu conforto foi maravilhoso. A Gleice me deixou muito a vontade, sempre prestativa e animada! Espero voltar em breve. Valeu muito a pena e o preço perfeito!

Es un bello departamento literalmente a una cuadra de la playa, muy limpio. Hay un supermercado y farmacia a solo 2 minutos caminando. Es seguro no tuvimos ningun problema, gleice es una anfitriona muy amable y preocupada

Impecable. Ubicación inmejorable (a una cuadra de la playa, frente a la parada de bus, metro cerca, shopping cerca, negocios...), seguro, tranquilo, muy cómodo... Totalmente recomendable. Gleice se comunicó muy bien, es muy amable y discreta, una excelente anfitriona.

The appartment is really well situated and the host is really accessible and kind too. The place is clean and convenient, and it's so close to the beach that you can see it from the window! Nice and safe area for tourists too.
The apartment is well-located in the center of the city and has a doorman.  The space is large, clean and safe.  Communication and check-in was simple.  Thank you, Gleice!

Adorei a localização do imóvel, a segurança, o capricho da anfintriã e sua atenção. Além de ter nos deixado super à vontade. 
Super recomendo!

Apartamento muito bem localizado ( tem tudo por perto, mercado, padaria, farmácia, hortifrúti,TUDO), super aconchegante e agradável. Estrutura para relaxar e a poucos metros da praia. Fomos muito bem acolhidos, e a Gleice foi simplesmente incrível, nos deu total atenção e liberdade.Excelente em todos os sentidos, me senti em casa.
Já sei onde ficar quando voltar pro Rio ;)
✩✩✩✩✩

Fomos recebidos por outra pessoa, e infelizmente não chegamos a conhecer a Gleice pessoalmente. Porém, ela nos forneceu várias dicas antes e durante a nossa estadia de forma muito atenciosa.

O apartamento é igual às fotos, muito limpo e organizado, e nos sentimos muito bem durante o período que ficamos lá. Recomendamos com certeza :)

Sem dúvidas um apartamento organizado, limpinho,  confortável, aconchegante e fresquinho. Tem tudo ao redor e muito próximo do mar. Além da gleice ter me deixado super a vontade no local esteve sempre a disposição para qualquer eventual dúvidas....
La ubicación es excelente, el lugar es muy acogedor, el lugar es muy limpio, la anfitriona se encargó de cada detalle. Les recomiendo el lugar, si quieren una estancia tranquila y acogedora.

Muy buena ubicación, localizado estratégicamente muy cerca a un mall, muchos restaurantes cerca, la playa Copacabana está a dos cuadras.
Definitivamente volvería.
Gleice siempre estuvo atenta a mi estadía.

O apartamento é exatamente como as fotos, bonito, limpo e organizado.
A localização é excelente, muito próximo a praia, local bem policiado.
A Gleice foi uma excelente anfitriã.
Recomendo de olhos fechado!
Ótimo apartamento, super organizado e confortável. Igual está nas fotos. Excelente custo benefício. Ótima localização, perto da praia, supermercados, farmácias, restaurantes.

Grymt läge i Rio! Gångavstånd till stranden och nära till restauranger och supermarkets. Lägenheten är superfin och även om vi inte hann träffa gleice så svarade hon alltid snabbt på våra frågor och hjälpte oss. Rekommenderar de här boendet till alla!

O espaço oferecido pela Gleice é exatamente o que mostra nas fotos. O apartamento limpo, as roupas de cama todas limpas e cheirosas, fica exatamente na Av. princesa Isabel, há um pouco de barulho ante das 11 da noite, porém nada que uma janela fechada não resolva o problema. O apartamento é todo equipados com os utensílios de cozinha para quem quer fazer uma refeição rápida e também para aqueles que gostam de fazer algo mais elaborado, como eu. Nossa estadia foi super tranquila, apesar de não ter conhecido a Gleice pessoalmente, a mesma foi sempre atenciosa e sempre deixando-se à disposição para qualquer dúvida que eu tivesse. Agradeço bastante a hospitalidade e até a próxima viagem.

너무 좋음
위치 호스트 숙소 모두다 왕추천~~~
바다도 바로 앞이에용^^
최고~~~담에도 이용하고싶어요❤️
리우 러브

Muy lindo departamento compartido. Bien ubicado, cómodo y muy limpio. Glacé fue muy atenta en todo momento y casi no la vimos en el departamento. Tiene todo lo necesario para la estadía; le faltaría aire acondicionado para que sea perfecto, pero igualmente hay ventiladores.
A una cuadra tenés la playa, hay súper mercados cerca, restaurantes, entre otros. Hay poco lugar para  estacionar pero eso se ve en todo Río; la calle más recomendada es Sampaio (paralela al Hilton) donde si buscas  siempre hay algún lugar (a  veces hay gente cobrando,  por lo general 2 o 3 reales). Recomiendo hospedarse en el departamento de Glacé en Río.

A Gleice é uma querida! Resolveu um probleminha que tivemos desde antes de viajarmos!
E durante a viagem, foi super prestativa, educada, respondia rapidamente as mensagens e nos deu várias dicas de lugares e comodidades para nossa estada. 
Recomendamos!

Em minha viagem ao Rio optei por um local bem localizado em Copacabana.

Encontrei  o apartamento da Gleice, super bem localizado à duas quadras da praia, disponibilidade de supermercado, padaria, farmácia 24hrs, locadora de veículos tudo ao lado.

O apartamento e super moderno, bem conceitual e aconchegante.

A Gleice é uma excelente anfitriã, nós deixou bem confortáveis é tem super dicas de passeios, bares e restaurantes no Rio.

Parabéns Gleice.❤️

Eu e meu marido nos hospedamos no apartamento da Gleice, ela foi super cuidadosa em nós deixar a vontade em seu lar.  Ela compartilhou suas experiências e nos deixou a vontade para compartilhar as nossas. A localização é ótima. Recomendo!

O apartamento é uma graça. Super limpo e cheiroso. A cama é super confortável. A Gleice foi uma super anfitriã, sempre atenta e gentil. Como já disse a ela, a única coisa que incomodou um pouco foi o barulho no quarto em razão de estar bem em frente à uma avenida super movimentada... Mas nada que um tampão de ouvido não resolva. De resto, super recomendo.
Lejos lo mejor! Gleice muy atenta con todo! El departamento hermoso y con excelente ubicación.
En realidad está al lado del teatro . Sobresaliente y extraordinario toda la experiencia.
O espaço é maravilhoso e aconchegante, perto da praia, farmácias, mercados, metrô, ponto de ônibus.. enfim, perto de tudo!!

reviews.comments: Super central. Très propre et tout neuf. Appartement très agréable. Hôte très disponible à nous donner des conseils

This is a great little studio . Its really clean and well maintained and right in the centre of town . Mario is a great host . I stayed for two nights and am going back for more for sure . Highly recommend this place .
Cheers 
Leo
My stay in Clerigos was wonderful. The appartment is very nice and very well located. The host was very kind and helpful. If I come back to Porto I will rent this appartment again, for sure!

A estadia correu muito bem. O Mario foi muito simpatico e flexivel com meus horarios de check in e out… muito apreciavel!
O estudio e conforme a descricao e fotos, muito bem localizado e pratico para andar na cidade. 
Uma morada que se recomenda, sem duvida ! 
Ate breve…

There is absolutely nothing bad I can say about this studio! For starters it is in the best location you could possibly imagine - about a 5 minute walk to the São Bento metro stop and within short walking distance of pretty much any place you want to go. If you are up for it, even the Casa da Musica is only about a 40min walk away.  The studio itself is tiny, but exactly as pictured - extraordinarily clean, lovely brand new supplies and modern facilities and very important, a hot hot shower.   I didn't meet José, but Mario greeted me when I arrived and gave me a map on which he pointed out all the sights and gave me a bunch of suggestions about where to go. He was also extremely accommodating when I asked to leave my bag for the day after I checked out. The only small thing I would say is that if you are extremely sensitive noise, it can be a bit noisy on the street and also the studio was very cold in mid-November. But I didn't ask them to turn on the heating, so I accept blame for that one!  Overall, highly recommend.

The apartment was perfect, very clean and very centrally located. Beautiful towels provided, shower gel and lots of facilities which certainly make your stay more pleasant.

Mi flight was delayed and that was never a problem as I could be in touch with Jose María via Whatsupp.

Muito obrigado Jose María.

F

It was perfect! The host communicated with me immediately and clearly. Check in was easy. The apartment was perfect - very stylishly decorated, with many amenities (including an iron), and the location could not have been better. I would stay here again in a heartbeat the next time I come to Porto. Highly recommend!

This is the best value accommodation I think I have ever stayed in and I've been a business traveller for 10 years staying in top hotels!! I am truly amazed!!! It is 100% perfect and has been prepared to very high standards with excellent fittings. Jose Maria has thought of every tiny little detail and requirement and Mario always on hand to assist if required. Perfect central location too. Many thanks and I will definitely be back!!!
En el centro de Porto cerca de todos los sitios y muy bien comunicado. El personal muy amble y servicial y las instalaciones perfectas y el precio de la habitación muy ajustado.

Easy check in, easy check out, great location, very clean, extremely well equip . I had a great stay. Jose took the time to explain me all thing there is to do in Porto.  I will definitely come back to the studio to my next visit in Porto.

Это небольшой 4-х этажный отель, на каждом этаже 2 номера, у меня был 1-местный номер небольшой площади, но в нем было всё, что может понадобиться путешественнику: уместился журнальный столик, обеденный стол с 2 стульями, большой шкаф, гладильная доска, утюг, кофеварка, чайник, холодильник, микроволновая печь, соковыжималка, раковина для посуды. Очень понравилось наличие полного набора кухонных принадлежностей, чай, кофе, сахар также в наличии, и можно сразу же сварить чашечку кофе после долгого перелета. В ванной комнате также было все необходимое, включая профессиональный фен (у меня дома он попроще), единственное, мне не хватало маленькой полочки в душе.  Дизайн комнаты прост, но мне очень понравились белые тона мебели, которые гармонировали с теплым натуральным полом, я бы сказала, что именно это сочетание цветов, мебели и помещения идеально подходили друг к другу, а традиционные белые ставни добавили местного колорита, получилось красиво и ничего лишнего. Wi-Fi  в комнате работал хорошо, без сбоев, мне это было важно. Отопление к сожалению, не работало, помещение отапливалось только обогревателем, но по моей просьбе мне сразу выдали второе одеяло, что несколько спасло ситуацию, все-таки в Португалии в феврале ночами холодно, да еще каждый день шел дождь. И нужно иметь в виду, что подача горячей воды в душе осуществляется с помощью водонагревателя, и провести в душе целый час не получится, потребуется время для нового нагрева. Не знаю, сколько было всего постояльцев в отеле, но шума не было, и улица вечером абсолютно тихая, можно  хорошо выспаться после многочисленных прогулок по Порту. Отель оставил очень хорошее впечатление, особенно мгновенным реагированием на просьбы, спасибо Марио. Хотя я не говорю на португальском и всего пару слов знаю на английском, с помощью интернет-переводчика мы хорошо понимали друг друга. Ресепшен здесь не круглосуточный, и у вас будут ключи от комнаты и от входной двери в отель, но в назначенную дату вас будут ждать, просто сообщите отелю подробности о времени своего приезда. Очень удачное расположение отеля: совсем рядом есть магазин продуктов со всем необходимым, но самое главное, отель недалеко от вокзала, и очень удобно ездить по соседним городам на осмотр достопримечательностей. От вокзала часть пути идти в крутую горку до отеля, но ведь это Порту, здесь все улицы такие. До отеля легко добраться на метро из аэропорта: на станции Trindade нужно сделать пересадку на другую линию и доехать до станции Sao Bento, поездка займет примерно час. Очень хорошее соотношение цены номера и качества. В следующую поездку в Порту я поселюсь именно здесь.

My stay in Porto was great thanks to the nice studio that I stayed in.  It was comfortable, clean (looked quite new), quiet and yet very accessible to all Porto has to offer from a tourist perspective.  I would not hesitate in recommending this place.  Mario was also friendly and helpful.  I would definitely stay there again.

Mario is very professional and made everything easy.
The flat is in an ideal location and has all you need for a great stay in Porto.
The building has been recently renovated and everything in the flat is new.
Highly recommended

Mario has been very kind when I met him at the apartment.
The apartment is very comfortable and well situated close to Los Clerigos.
If I come back to Porto, I will certainly come here again.
Best regards.
Stève

By Clérigos White is a very nice and clean apartment, fully equipped and exactly as shown in the pictures. It is located at the edge of the old town just 10 minutes on foot from Ribeira and only 5 minutes away from Sao Bento station from where you can take trains to Braga, Guimaraes and Aveiro. Mario is a friendly host and meeting him at my arrival was without problems. I'm sure you will like staying there. So, enjoy Porto!

This a lovely studio! Ik had a great stay. The place is so comfortable and the location is great in the heart of Porto. I will return! 
Mario is a good host, very friendly and helpful.

I had a great stay at Mario's place is Porto! Great price for a great location! It has everything you need for a solo backpacking trip. A modern room with a comfortable bed, basic amenities,  and a bathroom.  Mario also gave some great tips for where to visit and eat!

Mario was very hospitable, making my stay in Porto very comfortable and stress free. The apartment was cozy, and provided all the necessary ammemtnties. The location was ideal, not too far from the train station, and walking distance to all the beauty that Porto has to offer. I would recommend this place to anyone considering a visit.

Que du positif ! L'hôte est très professionnel et attentif à ce que tout se passe bien. Il répond dans l'heure à vos messages, mail ou sms, l'accueil est parfait et le petit porto est excellent ! La chambre est superbe et est très bien placée; près des petits restos sympathiques ( pour ne pas le citer, le Caldeireiros en descendant la rue, est excellent rapport qualité/prix ! Allez y vivement !!) Le bâtiment est calme, aux normes de sécurités et d'insonorisation ! Bravo Mario et merci !!
Very tidy and clean place, in a quiet street and right in the centre of Porto.

Excellent...5stars for Mario
Highly recommend

It was in a perfect place with perfect room
It was compact and comfotable, having everything to stay in the room

I had the most wonderful time!
The studio had everything I needed, it is small but perfect. The fittings and equipment are of good standard and the place was clean and just so welcoming .Mario was there to receive me, it was my first visit to Portugal. He was so helpful and always willing to advise and answer my questions (I do ask a lot). And he provided umbrellas for those rainy days...Unexpected and thoughtful.
 The studio is right in the center, so only 2 minutes to find a place to eat....those amazing Portuguese pastries!-  and despite that it was really quiet at night so good sleeps were the norm...
The sea gulls replaced the alarm clock, and early in the morning a lady walked down the narrow cobbled street singing....
What a beautiful atmosphere.
The only negative thing I must add is this- 
I had to leave and return home  : (
Perfect for what we needed. Great location, clean, friendly/helpful host.

It's very close to sao bento station. 
The apartment was very clean and modern style. It is fit to single traveler. Host was kind and gentle.
Highly recommended!!!!!!!

This is a AirBnB purpose built Ikea style compact studio in the authentic Porto style old town. They are several little apartments with an office downstairs. I never met Mario, just chatted online, he is easy to reach. The receptionist lives a few blocks away and gave very useful tips. The flat is small but well thought out, everything is included - hangers, iron, hairdryer, cups, microwave, water etc. The only issue was that the drainage in the shower was blocked.

Квартира отлично расположена в самом центре Порту, в 2 шагах от вокзала и площади свободы. Вы будете в шаговой доступности от всего самого интересного.  Улица тихая, соседей не слышно, кровать удобная - все это позволяет хорошо выспаться. 
Все то, что есть на фото - есть и в реальности, включая гриль и кофеварку. Электроплиты нет, если для вас это важно, но есть микроволновка. Место очень колоритное, с деревянными ставнями и каменным подоконником, помогает погрузиться в атмосферу города. За углом есть булочная, где можно вкусно и недорого позавтракать.Также в округе полно баров и ресторанов. 
Я остался полностью доволен этой квартирой. Крайне рекомендую

Mario was a very friendly and great host! He explained me all in a few minutes so understandable that i hadn' t any questions about Porto!  The apart was pretty good and the best located! Thank you for my best time at that wonderful city!!! Thank you, Mario!!!!
The studio was very clean ,well-equipped and stylish. It's very close to train station. Small but fit to single traveler.

Mario foi muito gentil em todos os momentos, inclusive quando precisei deixar as minhas malas guardadas antes de deixar a cidade. O espaço do studio é perfeito par quem viaja sozinho. Pequeno, limpo, com tudo o que é necessário e mais pequenos confortos como secador de cabelos, sabonete muito cheiroso e café. A locaclização é a melhor possível e dá para ir a pé para todas as atrações mais importantes do Porto, alé de ser ao lado da estação de trem. Se eu voltar à cidade, pretendo ficar novamente no studio.

O Mario foi muito disponível e atencioso. O estúdio é pequeno mas tem tudo que precisar para uma pessoa passar ótimos dias no Porto.  Têm chá, cafe e sabonete disponíveis para os hospedes. Fiquei uma semana e quando fui embora já estava com saudade daquele espaço! A cama é muito confortável, tudo novo e limpo, conforme as fotos apresentadas no anuncio. A localização é fantástica. Sem duvida recomendaria passar um tempo no estúdio By Clerigos White do Mario.
Perfect location. Very friendly and helpful staff. I had a wonderful time, thank you!

It was just a perfect place to stay. Felt Really safe and close to everywhere! I walked like crazy and just had a blast there. Good bars around. Great places to eat. And the flat was cozy and had everything I needed. Mario and Rafaela were both very helpful with tips on what to See. :) would totslly recommend this place.

The appartment looks like the pictures show it and it's also very clean. It's easily to find and the perfect place for one person to stay. Mario is uncomplicated and easy going and gave me as a gift a small bottle of Portwein. I really recommend staying!
I liked quite and accomodating atmosphere. Really enjoyed being here with Mario's great hospitality !

nice location, cozy and clean room, Mario is very kind. 
일단 위치가 정말 좋구요, 방은 작지만 혼자 지내기에 편안하고 깨끗해요. 조리도구 및 수건도 넉넉하고 이불도 여유분이 더 있어서 좋았어요. 호스트도 친절하고 뭘 물어보면 자세히 잘 가르쳐줘요!

L'emplacement du studio est plus que parfait. Ce logement est très confortable pour 1 personne avec les commodités nécessaires. Mario était présent à mon arrivée tel que nous avions convenu. Et le porto sur la table du studio était bon !

Mario is a great host and the apartment is very clean and luminous. It's not big but enough for one person to stay and the location is great, right in the center of the city and a couple of mins away from the train and metro stations. You can find all the necessary utilities in the apartment, wifi worked great. It was a very positive experience and I'd recommend this place to everyone.

J'ai passé un très agréable séjour. L'appartement est idéalement situé et je trouve que les prestations sont bien supérieures à ce que l'on pourrait attendre pour un si petit prix. 
Appartement très bien  rénové conforme aux photos, très propre dans une rue calme.
Accueil très agréable avec conseils de visites, de restaurants. Et très à l'écoute de nos demandes. 
Rien à dire c'est juste parfait. Merci beaucoup.
Mario is a great host and the apartment is exactly as described. Perfect for the single traveller and in a great location.

Mario était présent à mon arrivé et m a accueilli avec du porto.  Il a été flexible sur mon check out et ce fut apprécié.

La chambre était propre et confortable.

Cependant, l insonorisation avec l extérieur est inexistante.

Bon rapport qualité prix.  Très bien situé.

Mario was a great host! The room was lovely, clean, and centrally located. Equipped with everything you need to have a nice vacation in Porto. Thanks for staying up to let me in Mario, I hope to come back to Porto soon!

Everything was fine. Mario nice and helpful host.
Good location of the apartment. The apartment is located downtown. Fully consistent with the description. Clean, nice and quiet .... I recommend to all.
Mario is an excellent host with all the information you need to enjoy beautiful Porto. The apartment has an unbeatable location and is fully equipped, from bedding to utensils. Highly recommended.

The room was exactly what I was looking for. It was in a fantastic location close to all the best attractions Porto has to offer, as well as having everything you need to enjoy a small trip. With a small kitchen and a great desk overlooking a nice little street, I highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit Porto for 2-3 days. 

The hosts were great and very welcoming. I arrived to a magazine with  things to do/see in Porto, a personal map with the best attractions and restaurants, and a bottle of Port to set the scene! 

Would highly recommend this place to people looking for a very affordable stay in an exciting little town.
Mario is a nice dude and a great host. Punctual, efficient and friendly.
Small but nice room with private bathroom right in the centre of Porto. Mario was helpful and easy to get in touch with

Petit studio à deux pas ... de tout ! L'accueil était très chaleureux, le studio totalement conforme aux photos. Les plus : une literie de qualité, des petites attentions ça et là,  + un dépannage d'impression de billet très apprécié.

Appartamento piccolo ma pulitissimo, curato e con tutto il necessario per una vacanza a Porto. La casa è a due passi dalla stazione di Sao Bento, comodissima per visitare il centro e tutta la città. Màrio molto disponibile!
Excellente situation géographique. Bon accueil. Studio petit mais hyper fonctionnel. Calme. Merci pour la petite bouteille de Porto à l'arrivée !

Staying at Mario's appartment was a great experience, easy to find on arrival, got all the neccesary information on time. Studio is as cute as seen at photos, perfect for a single traveller. Even the Port wine as a welcome gift was there :) thank you! Clean, cosy, super comfortable, with a lot of equipment. Location was perfect, I wouldn't pick better one if I knew Porto previously, which I haven't, close to the train and metro stations and many attractions. Mario is a great host, gave me all the information about  Porto, special thanks for the restaurant recommendations :) We met several times and he was truly helpfull.

Mario was really friendly and welcoming host. He recommended some great places to visit and some restaurants for lunch. My studio room was small but perfectly clean and comfortable. What is most important, location is excellent and very central.  I had everything needed for short break in Porto and would really recommend.
A relação qualidade preço é excelente! Ótima localização! Recomendo e penso voltar! ;)
Great location and apartment! Thanks for everything :)

O Clérigos Single Studio encontra-se localizado na rua por trás dia Clérigos o que permite um rápido acesso a partir da estação de comboios de São Bento. Tem também fácil acesso ao metro o que facilita a deslocação por todo o Porto. O estúdio correspondeu totalmente às fotos publicitadas. É muito acolhedor. O Mário é muito simpático e disponível. E com um presente de boas vindas muito apetitoso. Atendendo a todos estes aspectos e à beleza do Porto, está experiência foi sem dúvida muito boa.

First time with AirBNB.
I want to thank Mario, that's a super host; the studio was wonderful and Mario provide me a guide with all the place to visit, restaurants and night-life places where I spent great time and enjoy fantastic food.
Thanks Mario and hope to come back in Porto very soon.

Primeira experiência nestas andanças do AIRBNB , "studio" muito agradável e com tudo o que é preciso! Muito prestavel o Sr.Mário e as senhoras da limpeza também. No final um muito obrigado e "até já" quem sabe.

Mario é um excelente anfitrião! Foi super atencioso, respondendo tudo com rapidez e me ajudou com diversas dicas sobre a cidade ! O Studio conta com toda a estrutura necessária para a estadia e a localização é perfeita! Com certeza indicarei para amigos e será meu local de estadia em uma próxima visita a cidade de Porto!
Estancia perfecta. El estudio es exactamente igual a cómo aparece en las fotografías. Mário es un host estupendo. La localización del lugar es muy buena, muy céntrica. Si vuelvo a Oporto repetiré.

O studio é muito bem localizado, é tranquilo e bem organizado. Fica perto dos principais pontos turísticos do Porto. Dá pra se deslocar a pé sem problemas e tem a Estação de São Bento bem pertinho.
Uma ótima opção de estadia na cidade do Porto.

O apartamento fica em uma região excelente, perto de tudo e acomoda muito bem uma pessoa para um curto período na cidade do Porto. O Mario foi muito atencioso quando eu cheguei, o apartamento ainda não estava disponível, então ele acomodou minha bagagem enquanto eu saia dar uma volta na cidade. Quando voltei as minhas malas já estavam no quarto. O Mário também me deu um mapa e anotou tudo de interessante que eu poderia ver na cidade, inclusive um mercado perto do local. Recomendo a estadia.
Apartamento centrico, agradable y limpio. Recomendable!!
I really enjoyed staying at the studio. It is in the heart of Porto, very clean, spacious and there were everything I needed. Everything was perfect and I highly recommend staying here.
Netter Gastgeber, kleine gemütliche saubere Wohnung. Zentral gelegen

I had a good stay at Mario's. The studio is very centrally located so that you can walk to any places that you like to visit in Porto. The studio is equipped with everything that you might need. Mario was always there to answer and support all the guests. Highly recommend!

Mario has been a great host, very welcoming and punctual: he waited for me after midnight cause my flight was arriving super late. 
The room is new, clean, bright and cozy: everything perfect for a great stay in Porto. All the furniture is new and practical: in the room you can find everything to make your stay comfortable from the hair dryer to the electric kettle. 
The position is very central and close to the Sao Bento station(less than 5 minutes walking).
I can say this is one of the best places I've been with Airbnb.

Mario was a great host.  Upon arrival, he provided me with a tourist map and pointed out some places that should be visited including some I had not thought about.  He also did a good job of explaining everything and was flexible with arrival and departure time.

The unit is a little bit small, but this is the only issue I had with it.  The location is great (near the Clergios Tower and Church) and only a 5-10  minute walk from a Metro stop.
Great price/quality
Everything was perfect! Mário is a really nice host, the place was clean and with all the comforts. Perfect position!

J'ai été très bien accueillie par Mario qui m'a présenté la ville et le quartier, m'a donné de bonnes adresses de restaurants et a été très flexible sur les horaires. Je l'en remercie.
