L'appartement est très bien situé, en plein cœur de la ville historique. Cela permet de visiter Porto très facilement
Amazing place. Excellent for one person, it is close to everything and very cozy.

The communication with Mário was excellent and he was flexible re. the time of my arrival. I was welcomed by Pedro, a friendly guy who had a few helpful tips to make the most of my time in the city. The place is ideally located in the old town, in a small typical alley. A bright place that isn't depressing to back to when you travel on your own!

The central location of the apartment is fantastic. It's tucked away off the main street, but close to the hub of downtown and the lovely area around the university. The neighbourhood is really a highlight. And it's so close the metro station as well. 

Mario and the others at By Clerigos Studios were very welcoming.They marked out many of the best attractions on my map and even left me a little bottle of port to enjoy. Mario kindly offered me extra towels and an additional heater if I wanted. 

The apartment itself is a good little nest for one person. It's tiny, but I liked that - it's a cozy space at the end of the day. It is a fair bit darker than the pictures though and there's not a lot of privacy if your windows are open - it's a direct view into the apartment across the street. The bed is comfy and there are a variety of appliances provided - even a blender for smoothies!

My biggest issue was with the bathroom - the drainage in the shower is very slow, which would leave me ankle deep in water towards the end of my shower! And the bathroom fan either didn't work or wasn't effective, because the steam just didn't dissipate. 

Nonetheless, I enjoyed my stay here and this is a pretty good choice if you're on a budget and want to spend some time in Porto.

Do appreciate Rafaela being there to greet me. She was able to direct me to the closest groovy store and local haunts. The room was exactly as explained but much closer to everything than I expected. My umbrella was destroyed the first day so greatly appreciated the ones available to share. Private shower and toilet. Single bed, clothes closet, fridge, kettle, coffee maker, grill, microwave, some utensils, just what I needed. a heater was appreciated because of the cool wet weather. Would recommend to anyone. Only one flight of stairs. The sea gulls can be noisy in the morning!

This was one of my favorite Airbnbs! I absolutely loved the cozy, modern design - it was such a beautiful place. The window overlooks a lovely little side street off of Clerigos Church. Coffee, tea, and a sample bottle of the city's signature port wine were provided. The location could not be better - walking distance to absolutely everything in the heart of the city. Great place to stay.

This suite is located right next to where most of the bars are so its a great place to stay if your young and looking for a good time at night. It was very clean and Mario was always there to help along the way. I definetly recommend it!
Excellent for one person! Right the antique centre, super cozy and quiet. Recommended.

The apartment was clean and conveniently located - a great place to stay if there's only one of you. 

Mario was helpful with suggestions for itinerary plans and food as well.

Perfect apartment for one person in Porto! Clean, modern, with nice bathroom and kitchen amenities. Excellent location - for walking, subway/metro, and Sao Bento train station. 

Mario is an excellent host. He went out of his way to make my stay comfortable. I had a flight from New York that arrived extremely early in the morning into Porto and Mario was waiting for me. He gave me a map and circled highlights. Additionally, I had accidentally locked my keys in the apartment, and Mario was easily accessible to help me resolve the situation. He went out of his way once again when I accidentally left my iphone charger in the apartment which he mailed back to me at my next destination in Portugal.

A++ on all fronts - Thank you Mario and Airbnb!

Very nice location!! I definitely can recommend it! Quite small studio, but modernly equipped. Everything you need, you can find here. The location is perfect to explore the city - everything is in walking distance. Because the location is in a small street in the city centre with hardly any traffic, the location is quite. Be aware to walk uphill and downhill a lot - the city centre is very hilly!

Really enjoyed my stay in Oporto. The studio was compact but had everything I needed and was in a great location - an old cobbled street within walking distance of everything. Handy to have a fridge and cooking facilities in the room. Had a good welcome and everything was very smooth. Recommended.
Excelente localizacao, proximo de tudo. Pequeno e confortavel. Anfitriao te deixa livre e à vontade. Restaurantes otimos por perto.

Mario was great and very helpful, communication was easy. I got there at 8am and was able to store my luggage. Wifi was a little spotty and hot water ran out a little fast.Great location and overall great value.

Great location in a lovely city. Communication with Mario was always prompt and helpful. The studio was clean, bright and quiet.  Well equipped , comfortable bed...perfect for a solo traveler. would love to return to Porto and this apt. Only one flight of stairs which were not as steep as most in Portugal.  My favorite space in 3+ weeks of traveling in Portugal.
Everything you need is well thought of from mini fridge, microwave n all utensils and within a studio apartment is just perfect.

I really enjoyed stay there. Everything was great. It's a worthy place.
Thanks Mario!
Great studio apartment, small but contains everything you need. Excellent location close to Sao bento train station.

Just perfect!!!
Small, but very clean, with everything you need - in the center of the City!!
And no noise from traffic, tram, bus, party, ...
I really can recommend this place! 
And Mario is very helpfull, too

One of the best Airbnb experience I have ever had. Mário is a very nice host who showed me cool places to go around the area. Talking about the location, it's just perfect. You can reach everywhere by walking, which in my opinion is the best way to appreciate the charm of the city. The flat is quite cute and very clean and cozy, exactly the same as on the pictures, very well equipped and super functional. I'll definitely go back next time I visit Porto.

I arrived earlier than anticipated so the flat still needed to be cleaned. No problem since Mario recommended me an excellent restaurant to eat in whilst I waited.

The accommodation had everything I needed, it felt modern and cosy at the same time. Mario was a good host too. He provided me with a map and recommended Porto's top sites which were all within easy walking distance of the flat!

Overall I had a very nice stay.
Amazing location! Apartment is the perfect size and Mario is so great! I would stay here again in a heart beat!

Ha estado todo genial, en todo momento Mario a sido muy servicial. A mi llegada él ya tenía todo preparado: planos, revistas, etc., me indicó lugares a visitar. El apartamento era tal como en las fotografías, muy limpio, todo nuevo, muy bien ubicado, me sentí como en mi casa. Sin ninguna duda volvería a la casa de Mario.
Mario's studio is ideally located in the heart of the city in a popular neighborhood. The studio is nice, clean and well-furnished for a short stay in the city !

Mario's place is sweet but small. I had a lot of issues unfortunately! First of all the entire apartment building is a hotel kinda thing that Mario runs. Every apartment has been posted on different websites. When you arrive Mario or his friends always are there to greet you and show you your place and things around Porto. THE location is great as it's central to everything but it gets extremely loud in the night as there is a pop bar right outside. The apartment is on a side street and so the rooms get really hot. I asked for a fan but was immediately denied. I actually fell sick and got heat rashes during my stay. It was unbearable...and a little bit of a put off. I requested twice for a fan but was told it's fresh in the nights but no part of the nights were fresh. I used to keep the windows open but the music from the bar would be so loud that I couldn't sleep. The bathroom shower would fill up fast and couldn't drain the water fast enough. The room was definitely neat and clean and had all amenities but I wouldn't live here again especially not with the attitude Mario had.

Mario's place was perfect for my stay in Porto. Amazing location, clean, and stocked with everything I needed and beyond. Upon my arrival he provided me with a map and pointed out many great things to see. He was very accommodating. Would highly recommend this place!

Nice and cosy small apartment. Perfect for one person. Fantastic location close to all of the main attractions. 
A bit noisy at night due to nearby bars and seagulls (yes, Porto comes with a steady seagull soundtrack).

Minha experiência foi excelente. A localização do apartamento é perfeita. Perto de várias atrações e de fácil acesso, a poucos passos da estação de trem. O serviço oferecido é impecável. O apartamento muito limpo e organizado. É pequeno mas me atendeu muito bem. Adorei a estadia. Volto outras vezes com certeza e indico a meus amigos.

This was a fantastic place to stay! I was in town for a conference, but wanted to stay near the historical center. The apartment was perfectly located to get a feel for the city, take the metro, and grab dinner and drink after a long day. The reception was incredibly friendly and genuine as well as informative of near by places to visit.

great, efficient apartment! Check-in was easy, and the apartment's location is perfect for touring! 

The studio is perfect for a single occupant, and I was very comfortable during my stay.

Με τον οικοδεσπότη υπήρξε άψογη επικοινωνία και έμεινα πολύ ευχαριστημένη από την (Website hidden by Airbnb) δωμάτιο ήταν έτσι ακριβώς όπως φαίνεται στις φωτογραφίες, καθαρό και έχει όλες τις ανέσεις για μία ευχάριστη διαμονή.Βρίσκεται στο ιστορικό κέντρο της πόλης και τα περισσότερα αξιοθέατα είναι σε κοντινή (Website hidden by Airbnb) συνιστώ ανεπιφύλακτα.

I had a great holiday in Marios studio, it was clean and in a small quiet street very close to the Clerigos tower and Sao Bento station. The studio is brand new and perfect for one person. I would stay here again.
The flat is as per description, fits one person just fine. The location is perfect! The host was absolutely helpful and the studio very clean. I'd absolutely recommend it.
Description was correct and location was amazing! Cheap and cheerful
Marion' place was great and I enjoyed my stay there. It is central, and close to everything. Mario was very helpful.

Herzlichen Dank, dass ich die Möglichkeit hatte, auch so spät anzureisen. Ich hatte einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt in Porto. Das Appartement ist klasse und für eine Person total ausreichend. Lage ist fantstisch! Vielen Dank nochmal.

Very well located and perfect for a single person without a ton of stuff. WiFi was solid and fast which was very appreciated. Does not include a full kitchen but there is little need for such with all the great food options nearby. Check-in and check-out were perfect and easy!
Central location, good price.

It's really clean and nice location. Well.. The house is on the hill so it's hard to bring your luggage but it's okay. Small place but you can get everything like iron, dryer, plates and so on. Host is really nice and helpful. I really had a great time with this place.
포르토가 작긴 하지만 위치가 정말 좋아요. 방도 정말 깨끗하고 쾌적해요. 약간 1인용 호텔같은 느낌이에요. 마리오 친구분이 대신 오긴했지만 관광지나 식사하기 좋은 곳 그리고 마트 위치도 알려줘서 도움이 됐어요. 포르토 다시 간다면 또 이용하고 싶어요.
le quartier est formidable très bien situe  proche de la gare sao bento très facile à trouver , excellent accueil appartement très propre bien équipé   court séjour très agréable!

Bei Mario war es super! 
Die Apartments sind perfekt, zentral und ruhig! Ich habe mich in Porto sehr wohl gefühlt! 
Danke
Angelika
The apartment is very central located, very good equipped. I enjoyed it. The arrival works well and Mario clarified immediately any item. I would stay again at Mario.
The whole experience was great, I highly recommend Clerigos White.

Die Unterkunft hat der Beschreibung entsprochen. Es war alles, was man so benötigt, vorhanden. Die Lage ist unschlagbar: nah an allen Sehenswürdigkeiten der Altstadt, aber gleichzeitig in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße gelegen. Nicht weit ist noch ein Supermarkt, in dem man sich gut versorgen kann; der Kühlschrank im Zimmer ist dafür richtig praktisch. Alles top!
I am impressed, awesome designed room. Quiet and relaxing even you are in the city Centre. Perfect communication and organization, strongly recommended.
시설이나 청결도 면에선 우수했어요 화장실 수압도 굉장히 좋았어요. 마리오도 굉장히 친절하게 응해줬습니다. 다만 중심가에 위치하긴했는데 상벤투 역에서 내려 위로 올라가야하는게 너무 힘들었어요. 캐리어무게가 꽤 나가면 고려해보셔야 할꺼에요
Atendimento muito bom! As instalações do estúdio são ótimas! Só tenho boas recomendações a dar sobre esta casa! Ficou como uma referência, voltarei seguramente!
O estudio e pequeno, bom gosto e funcional. Localizacao perfeita , bem servida de transportes publicos. Otimas (Website hidden by Airbnb) tenho a agradecer

Petit espace (mais suffisant pour quelques jours) ;  très fonctionnel, très bien équipé et propre.
Situé en plein centre de Porto.
Agréable séjour.

The location is right by the tower of clerigos and other major areas. Still, it is not as touristy and it is the perfect location if you are travelling alone. The room is very clean, but it is important to note that the walls are quiet thin. On my last night, the bathroom ceiling leaked but Mario came within 10 minutes of me messaging him. He was very helpful and offered another room which I rejected since it wasn't too significant. He fixed everything immediately. This leak seems to be once in a while thing so it shouldnt be a problem. Otherwise, very nice stay in Porto!
Mario was a very welcoming host. The apartment is very clean and perfect for a short stay in Porto. Super recommended!

Just like the description. Perfect location. Lovely room. Did not meet Mario but he arranged for my arrival perfectly. Loved the small kitchenette too. Bed is small but very comfy. The only downside is perhaps the noise during nighttime but since I am used to living in the city it didn't bother me much. Overall, a very nice stay. Thank you!!

I don't even have words to describe! I had the best time in Porto and a lot of that is thanks to Mário and the wonderful apartment! I would definitely recommend Clerigos white to anyone traveling to Porto!!*
I was greeted by Mario's friend. He was welcoming and described some things to do and places to see in the area. The apartment was cozy and clean. I would recommend this place.
He gave me useful information and suggestions when I checked in. Thank you.
Tudo correu muito bem, obrigado Mário!
숙소는 깨끗하고 좋았다. 글레리쿠스 성당 바로 뒤라 위치도 괜잖았고. 딱 1인이 사용하기에 적당한 크기. 다만 겨울에는 히터가 있긴 했지만 좀 추웠다. 엑스트라 이불이 있어서 그걸 이용해서 그나마 잠은 따뜻하게 잤는데 코 시려운 정도. 여름엔 괜잖을 듯 하다. 가격대비 우수하다고 본다.

Comfortable studio as what is described! clean, well equipped, perfect location. I boiled water and drank tea every day there. Mario and his friend are really nice and patient. They offered a lot helpful information about where to go, to eat well. and you feel free to connect with Mario, just as your friend. 
很舒适的单人房,整洁私密,设施齐全,提供热水壶和茶包｡房东和他的朋友非常友善耐心,提供了很多有用的建议,包括如何游玩和一些推荐的餐厅｡你可以自如地和Mario沟通,就像和朋友一样聊天｡
Great location, excellent value, everything you need for a weekend break. Strong shower, hot water and fast wifi. Clean, comfy, cosy. On the doorstep of bars, cafes, restaurants.

wonderful host. cute, very cosy and clean little studio in a nice neighbourhood. great location !! would definitely recommend.  

혼자 여행하는 분들에게 매우 적합한 스튜디오입니다. 크기는 작지만 매우 실속있고 생활하는데 필요한것들이 전부다 구비되어있습니다. 가스레인지가 없어 요리를 해먹기는 힘들지만 전자렌지와 믹서기 등등 가전제품들이 있어 냉동식품이나 외부에서 사온음식들을 편하게 먹을수 있습니다. 창문을 열면 보이는 앞 주택들이 너무 이쁘구요. 1층에 있어 계단을 한번만 오르면 됩니다. 위치가 너무 좋아서 도보로 거의 모든곳을 다 돌아다녔구요. 근처에 맛있는 음식점이나 쇼핑할수 있는곳들이 있어 편했습니다. 개인이 거주하는 집이 아닌 전체 건물이 여행객을 위한 숙소들로 제공되는것 같았어요. 다른 여행객들이 있었지만 소음같은것도 전혀 없고 매우 조용했습니다. 남자분이 지내기에는 침대가 조금 좁을수도 있을것 같지만 여자분들은 매우 좋을것 같다는 생각을 했어요. 한가지 아쉬운점은 샤워실안의 배수시설이 매우 좋지 않아 오랫동안 샤워기를 틀어놓으면 물이 고입니다. 그래서 중간에 한번 물이 빠지기를 기다렸다가 해야되는 번거로움이 있긴 하지만( 안그러면 밖으로 물이 흘러 넘쳐요) 전체적으로 가격과 모든 면에서 매우 만족스러운 곳입니다
地點非常棒,夜晚安靜,基本設施俱全｡若帶大行李要有心理準備爬坡,但是多數波爾圖旅館都有些坡度!

산벤토역 중심가와 가깝지만 오르막 + 돌길이라 짐이 많으신분은 조금 힘드실 것 같습니다. 그 외의 것들은 모두 만족스러웠습니다. 방에 있을 것은 모두 다 있었고 무엇보다 화장실이 깨끗하고 수건제공이 되었던 점이 좋았습니다. 마리오도 친절하고 체크인 시간에 맞추어 와주었으며 포르토 구경할 거리들을 이것저것 알려주어서 도움이 많이 되었어요. 혼자 여행하고 조용히 휴식하기를 원하는 분에게 추천합니다.
I had a great time in Porto! The room had everything I needed for a short stay and a great location, with lots of bars and restaurants in the area. I strongly recommend it!

It's location is perfect! Very near by the train station, metro station and most of the important view sites. It's also very convenient with restaurants and shops around nearby.

The room is quite nice with all the equipments you'll need, it even has hair dryer an iron. You can cook by yourself although I didn't cooking. 

Mario is a cool guy friendly and helpful. It was a smooth and quick check in.

Highly recommended!
Second time I've stayed here. Great location, excellent value, wifi and comfort. Well recommended.
El departamento es muy cómodo tiene todo lo necesario!
Muy central y bien ubicado. Exactamente lo que se muestra en las fotos
Ótimo apartamento, muito perto de diversas atrações turísticas podendo fazer um roteiro a pé. A 5min da estação de metro, e dos comboios que te leva a qualquer parte de portugal! Recomendo!!

This airbnb was professionally well-run.  Mario did a great communicating and informed me with everything I needed to know about porto. The place is perfectly located down the street from the Sao bento train station in central porto. It was just a 5 min walk uphill to the apartment.  The apartment is 5 min from the bar district, 2 min from the 'Harry Potter bookstore'  and an enjoyable 10 min walk to the Douro river. Highly recommended overall.
Grand little place,  a bit out of the way but that reduces noise and the city centre is still a walkable distance. Facilities are basic but functional.

a localização é muito boa, e a comunicação é simples e precisa com o mário. o apartamento é equipado para receber e fazer coisas simples na cozinha ( devido à ausência de fogão ) . a limpeza é muito boa, também.

El departamento está muy bien ubicado. Es muy fácil llegar desde el aeropuerto ya que hay una estación de metro a un par de cuadras. Además se encuentra en el centro histórico, haciendo muy fácil recorrer la ciudad a pie. 
El estudio es muy cómodo, tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía agradable. Mário tenía muy buen predisposición y estaba disponible para ayudar y dar recomendaciones sobre la ciudad. 
Muchas gracias Mário!

I loved the Hot powerful shower, the hair dryer, and everything. I would stay there again if I return to Porto.
He was at the apartment waiting for me.  Thanks

Mario's apartment was stylish and perfect for one person staying in Porto! The location was excellent, as it was close to many bars and restaurants, as well as very close to the metro and monuments for sight seeing. The studio was equipped with all the amenities one needed for a short stay in Porto (I stayed for about 2 days), and the apartment felt safe overall. The only downside is it is located on a pretty steep upward hill. However, much of the city is hilly, and this adds to its charm. If you are carrying a lot of bags, I suggest you take a cab to the apartment.
It was cozy and very centrel. Nice for 1 traveller. I didn't meet Mario but his friend met me and explained to me well enough. Thank you!
Bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, farta condução, ótimo local
I loved the place, location and the service. Well done!

Great location ,Advise from Mario's friend was accurate 
Really enjoy the location close to Soa Bento station . Nearby has so many cafe for you to eat. 
Over all is great.
Loved the location of Mários apartment. Close to many restaurants, bars, and tourist attractions. Would definitely stay here again if I'm in Porto!
Clean central quiet
깔끔하고 매우 좋았습니다!

Loved this place! So comfortable, and everything is so walkable from here I didn't even need to use the Andante metro card I'd purchased. Stairs to get up to the apartments but Mario helped me with my luggage which was super appreciated. Highly recommend!
Petit appartement en plein centre de Porto. Très propre et fonctionnel, convient parfaitement pour 1 voyageur ou 2 amis.

Mario has a great place if you're traveling alone. He's very responsive as well. We had a few hiccups along the way, but I think they were just rare occurrences. I'd still recommend this place to a friend. It's in a great location within walking distance to many of the sites.

The apartment is perfect for single travellers the bed is small but comfortable enough. Marios friend Rafael let me in and gave me a map and suggestions for things to do, visit and eat and was very friendly. The apartment has everything you need.

I loved my stay at Mario’s. My room was so cosy and it had everything I needed. The bed was very comfy and I slept really well. The location is great because you can walk everywhere really easily. Everything went really well from beginning to end and I got great tips on things plus help with booking an early morning taxi for my return to the airport. I highly recommend Mario’s place - obrigada! :)

I missed my flight to Lisbon and had to take a detour via Porto, which had to include one night. I booked the apartment minutes after I missed my flight, and the quick confirmation enabled me to confidently go to Porto. Big ups for Mario's flexibility.

The apartment was perfect for a one-night stay alone, and the bed is actually tall-people-friendly and super comfy! I wouldn't stay here for much longer, if I had plans to spend any time at home or if I came with a friend, because space is extremely limited and no one would fit next to me on the narrow bed.

However, the street and the wider area the place is in is absolutely dreamy and if you only need the place at night to sleep, while enjoying the streets of Porto by day and in the evening, this place is right for you.
Excellent location, hulpfull host.
Un appartement bien situé et bien lumineux  nous avons passé un bon séjour à Porto .
super reactivité et tres accueillant ! logement en parfait accord avec la description
Excellent location, very clean, easy check in and out, Mario was easy to communicate with. Would absolutely stay there again.
Fantastic spot! Mario is a great host!!

Exactly as pictured. Small, quaint room in the heart of Porto. Clean and very comfortable to come back to after a day of exploring. As the room is small I wouldn't recommend it for more than one person and if you're the type to spend a lot of time in your room you'll probably want more space. But if you're in Porto to check out the sights and sounds and just need somewhere to lay your head every night, doesn't get much better. Great communication too. A solid 5 star experience.
Fabulous location, comfortable space,  warm and friendly host. Thank you!

The place is very nice, pretty calm, clean, and so central it's hard to believe. Public transports, main touristic places, restaurants, nightlife spots. Everything is so clore around... The neighborhood is both trendy and popular. And most of all, Mario and is friends are always eager to help, nicely and precisely with the deep sense of Portuguese generosity and kindness. I truly recommend this place for a short or longer stay. You won't be disappointed

L'appartement était très bien placé, en plein centre de Porto, proche des différents quartiers à visiter ! Il est très bien équipé donc parfait
Le seul inconvénient est qu'il est un peu petit, mais il suffit largement pour un week-end !!!

As advertised, this apartment is TINY. It's also perfectly located, with comfortable beds (even the trundle), good sheets, and a coffee station.  I was traveling with my young adult son and while we wouldn't have wanted to spend a month here it was ideal for a short stay.  There's even a big casement window with a ledge wide enough to sit in and enjoy your morning coffee with a view down the narrow street, to a distant cathedral.  We are glad we booked with Mario.

A stone's throw from the lively Porto city centre, the studio is compact but features all of the essential amenities you'd expect – including a private bathroom, refrigerator, tea and coffee-making facilities, etc. The space would be a little tight if you were planning to spend a lot of time there outside of crashing at the end of each day, but it's in a great location and well-suited to solo travellers keen to get out and experience the city, or anyone travelling with friends who wants their own space to return to.
Everything was coolio;)
Everything was as expected. Great place!
The place is a hidden gem in the middle of everything! It is a very small studio so for me being a solo traveler it was perfect. I was close to everything and felt that it was a home I was coming to.
Really enjoyed my stay here! Clean,central and Mario made check in so easy. Would recommend this listening to any solo traveler in the area.

It was a wonderful place to stay if you are in Porto the first time and it's very near the Sao Bento station in the old part of Porto. While it is not for you if you want a quiet secluded street, the apartment is compact and very clean - a great base for touring the area. I felt very comfortable there and safe. Thanks Mario!

immeuble consacré aux touristes  airbnb le deuxième de la rue pour le moment
à bon entendeur salut
Petit appartement hyper bien placé en plein centre de Porto. Propre et fonctionnel, convient parfaitement pour un voyageur. Je recommande.

We enjoyed our stay at marios place a lot! It is a small room but still the perfect accomodation to explore beautiful porto, and we loved getting a map and useful tips for places to see / restaurants and activities! Also the location was greatWe had some perfect days and will surely come back some day!

Thanks alot! Lea and Leon
A casa é boa, serve perfeitamente para duas pessoas. Tem todas as comodidades necessárias. É central, mas não se houve barulho de noite. É um sitio muito bom! Gostamos muito da casa :)
Отличное месторасположение! Квартира совсем небольшая, однако в ней есть всё необходимое. Спасибо

El estudio es pequeño pero tiene todo lo que se necesita.
La ubicación equidistante de los lugares de paseo.
La comunicación perfecta.

Un studio idéalement placé dans le centre-ville de Porto surtout si vous arrivez par la gare depuis Lisbonne. Convient très bien en termes d'espace et de confort pour un couple ou un voyageur solo. C'est très propre. Attention toutefois, isolation phonique trop légère, voyageurs au sommeil léger s'abstenir.

The apartment is easily reached by the 602 or 601 bus (costs €1.90 and leaves every half hour from the airport, right outside arrivals). The journey takes about 45 minutes and the apartment is a few minutes walk away. There are only cobblestones so be aware of heavy luggage and the wheels.
The late night, street, foot traffic is rowdy and off-the-charts loud (up till 3.30am on a Thursday AND Friday evening) so ask for a room NOT facing the street "Rua de Tras" (the noise, as well as the motion sensor street light kept me awake for hours on both nights).
The amenities are clean, albeit spartan. Take your own docking station for music (if that's important to you). The location is central to everything so very convenient.
The shower is great with good pressure and heat.
Towelling and bedding is basic and clean. There were great touches like a blender, coffee machine, hairdryer, microwave and fridge.
The room is tiny (I was staying alone) so I believe it is suitable for a single person only...

Жилье соответствовало описанию, но наши апартаменты выходили окнами на оживленную улицу, а под окнами находился бар. Вся ночь сопровождалась шумом оттуда, который чередовался с криками чаек. Закрытые окна при этом не помогали. Кроме того, вечером мы обнаружили, что нам не доложили один комплект постельного белья. Пришлось спать на подушке, обёрнутой полотенцем и т.д., поскольку было довольно поздно и спросить про белье было не у кого. В целом жилье симпатичное, но уж очень шумно и недоразумение с постельным бельём сильно испортило впечатление. .
Mario's place is really well located and furnished. It was a bit tiny for 2 but we enjoyed our stay.
Very functional, clean and well located flat to visit Porto!
Appartement parfait, idéal pour une personne, très bien situé.

Das Apartment ist wie beschrieben und mit allem notwendigen, inkl Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle ausgestattet. W-Lan funktioniert schnell und stabil. Die Lage ist zentral und perfekt um zu Fuß und mit öffentlichen alles erreichen zu können, trotzdem in einer ruhiger Seitenstraße gelegen. Die Kommunikation ist schnell und professionell und das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis dürfte schwer zu schlagen sein. Dies alles gilt für die Belegung mit einer Person. Für zwei wäre das von mir gemietete Apartment zu klein. Für eine Person sehr empfehlenswert, komme gerne wieder.

Mario's place was in a perfect location for exploring Porto.

Check in and check out we're super easy and we were able to have our bags stored so we could explore outside of check in and out hours.

The size was difficult for two people, two bags and two beds but it was as the pictures indicate. 

Overall, I would recommend.

This is a great location in walking distance to everything in Porto. Mario was there to great us and make some recommendations for sights and places to eat.  It is small, but was perfect for my daughter and I.

Nous avons passées mon amie et moi deux jours dans cet appartement. Il était très bien situé, au cœur de Porto. L'appartement était très propre et très fonctionnel. 
Petit bémol: il n'y a pas de plaques de cuisson. 
Cependant l'appartement était très conforme aux photos et très bon rapport qualité prix!

The place is little but very well located, the area is great and full of restaurants and nice places. By walk you can reach the city center in few minutes and also the train station. The communication with Mario has been very fluid and it's been very easy  to do the check-in/out.
뒷편이  번화가라서  늦게  다니기  괜찮았어요.  앞에  식당이  저녁 9시 넘어서까지  했어요. 근데  근처에서  공사해서  공사소리가  시끄러워요.  근처에  슈퍼도  있고  대부분  호스트가  친절하게 잘  알려줬어요. :)
Great location. Easy to find and the host was very helpful.

O lugar é exatamente como o anunciado. Realmente me senti em casa. O Mário  foi muito atencioso comigo, me deu dicas de passeios e sempre muito prestativo no que precisei. Ambiente muito limpo! Perto de tudo mesmo!
Com certeza voltarei! Recomendo a todos!

Die Unterkunft ist klein aber fein, schön sauber und zentral gelegen. Wir fühlten uns dort sehr wohl und waren etwas traurig, dass wir nur eine Nacht dort waren. Man hatte jederzeit einen Ansprechpartner und das Zimmer war toll ausgestattet.

My friend and I stayed at Mário’s place for a night in Porto and it's exactly what we needed. The space is pretty small, but very clean, stylish and perfect for 1-2 people that are having a quick stay in Porto. The location was great and Mário was very helpful and flexible with our check in and provided us with recommendations. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Host was unprofessional, unwelcoming and rude. After a tiring day of touring Porto, we just wanted to rest. When we  got to his place, the door to the apartment cannot be opened with the keys provided. Luckily he was inside, and tried to open the door but he too cannot open it from the inside and outside (used the window to get out). He then yelled at me and accused me for not using the correct key when in fact the other key provided (key to our room) would not fit in the keyhole so how can i use it? He then started trying to break the doorkey lock. Even the customers at a nearby resto helped opening the door but to no avail. He then sent a message that a guest broke the doorkey lock which I didnt. I merely tried to open the door using the key provided to us. He didnt even help us get inside the apartment (so we could eat and rest, we were very tired) and let us wait outside. He just told us that if we want to get inside we just have to climb through the window so we had to do our own initiative of borrowing chair from nearby resto so we (and otherguests) can get inside. He could have just said that the doorlock broke down and not blame us for the incident.
Clean apartment, very central, with all facilities. Mario was very precise and always available. Definitely recommended!

Un pequeño estudio que cuenta con todo lo necesario para unos días en Oporto. Perfectamente ubicado, (solamente hace falta usar transporte para ir al aeropuerto, que está, igualmente, bien comunicado) y limpísimo. Recomendable 100%.
Muy buen situado y studio con las comodidades perfectas!
Super value, close to everything, superb check in and out - was able to leave a bag and pick up later before my train!
사진에 있던 아이폰도킹이나 웰컴와인기프트는 없었지만 매우 휼륭한 숙소 입니다. 체크인시 지도를 보며 근처 음식점, 관광명소, 마트 위치들을 알려주었고 숙소는 사진과 똑같습니다. 체크인/아웃 시 언덕을 좀 올라가야하긴하지만 두번이니까 감수하고 적당한 가격에 좋은 위치라서 추천합니다

Prime location with steps away from the metro, train station, restaurants, and historical sights. Quite a tiny space but just enough for a single traveler. On the weekend nights it was a little loud with traffic and people on the streets.
Everything was perfect. Very good localisation. Close to everything you need. Very good communication with host.

Mario's place is just as everyone says: small, clean, great location (in a picturesque but busy old town area; some normal noise and steep cobblestone streets). Easy walking distance to metro stop. Host was clear, prompt, easy to reach. Perfect for one person for a night or two. Wifi works well. Nearby little restaurants and cafes are good.
Ótimo custo benefício para quem não precisa de espaço. Preço e localização muito boa.

Great location, great price. Place was very clean. Very responsive communication. Apartment is small but we didnt spend much time there so it was perfect. Great shower!!! (Maybe provide some shampoo instead body wash as per the advert). Would reccomend and would stay again!! Thanks Mario.
Mario’s place was extremely well-located and convenient. Walkable to all the main attractions. The apartment was very clean too! We had a lovely stay there, though we had to squeeze a little.

Propre. Idéal pour voyageur solo. "Mini cuisine" pratique. À proximité des attractions, supermarché, café etc. Tout se visite à pied de ce studio ! Hôte très disponible via l'application, répond en quelques minutes.

Mario's  place was simply unique, small space, when your traveling to Porto you expect to spend a lot of time roaming around the streets ! Great t.v and bed space ! It was right by a restaurant called "Sanderia" delicious and also very small space. Really close to the el clérigo church . Amazing location.

Small, but extremely functional place! Mario is nice and friendly, we had very flexible and easy check-in! 
Location is great, close to Sao Bento station and cool bars. The street is quiet. Comfortable beds, everything is super clean. Bathroom is modern equipped. The place has a heater, which is great thing for humid season :)
It was perfect for our short stay.
Thank you, Mario!
Fantastic location! Compact space good for a few days to explore Porto. Mario is a reliable and considerate host. Thank you!
A good Host, he have tell us the best place for eat typical food!

Mário's place is excellent and I really enjoy my stay in Porto. Very tidy and fashionable decorations inside the studio. Highly recommend it. Great location, 5 minutes from the railway station and the metro. Mário also provided detailed suggestion about the tourist attractions and great food in Porto.
Fiel às fotos! Comunicação Excelente. Melhor localização/preço impossível!! Recomendo!
Bem localizado para quem quer conhecer a cidade do Porto e sua história. Espaço acolhedor e simpático. Será uma boa escolha para visitar o Porto.

Mario welcomed me nicely and gave me great tips for my visit in Porto. The studio is very nice located, has all facilities and made my stay in Porto very nice. I would definitely recommend it to everybody who wants to go to Porto. Thanks, Mario!
Inmejorable ubicación. En mi caso, que viajé sola, resultó perfecto. Oporto es una ciudad encantadora, pero prepárate para sus cuestas y bajadas. Maravillosa ciudad y destino ideal para viajar sola.

Wonderful space so close to the train and metro. In the heart of the city with everything close by. Mario and his team were there when I checked in and gave me a map of the city and showed me all the locations I was interested in going to. You will love this apartment!
Excelente localização. Quarto limpo e comomodo.

apartamento céntrico, cómodo, muy bien equipado y muy limpio. ideal para una persona, aunque hay posibilidad de dos camas. sin diferencias con lo que ofertaban. buena atención por parte de los anfitriones. muy recomendable

Mario and his friend are great guys. Quick responsive at all times. This place is a very cute studio with everything and anything you need ( you’ll be surprised ) Very clean nicely decorated . Strong shower (loved it) , as a solo traveler was perfect for me. You are just minutes walking distance from all the attractions. Shops.  Restaurants. Ponte Luis , bus and train stations. Absolutely everything. I highly recommend this place A+++. Thank you guys. Even to offer to take my luggage and keep it safe before heading to the Airport. You guys the best
Good clean efficient - good location.
Ótima localização, porém preço alto para o espaço oferecido. A cama estava empoeirada e o colchão era muito pequeno. Cuidado se você tiver mais de 1,70m.

El lugar es tipo un pequeño apart hotel. Esta muy buen ubicado en el centro de la ciudad! Se puede escuchar algo de ruido del resto de personas que entran y salen del edificio pero nada grave! 
Muy recomendado!

the apartment is great, very close to Sao Bento train station and right in the heart of the city. every destination was within walking distance and there are tons of great shops and restaurants at arm's length. clean, had all the amenities one could ask for and it was very easy to communicate. A+
Small clean and cozy. Very central!

A localização é ótima. O apartamento é muito limpo e bem equipado. É bom para uma estadia curta, o apartamento é muito pequeno para uma estadia maior, principalmente estando em duas pessoas. Pra gente que ficou 2 noites foi ótimo! valeu!
O espaço de Mário é muito bem localizado. Você pode ir à pé a vários lugares. Mário foi muito solícito e deu dicas muito boas. Recomendo a todos.
Great place to stay in Porto! City center is around the corner.
Fast communication. Clean place. The street was quiet even though it was pretty central, very near Clérigos, Jardim das Oliveiras, Lello’s library and so on.
Really nice location, walking distance to everything. Good food recommendations from Mário. Only minus was a springy bed - but if you're only there for a short stay, it's okay.
Local descolado, muito bem localizado e tranquilo.
Mario was very quick at responding, the place was near Clerigos in a superb location. It was small but a great value because it's near transit and close to everything.

Ich hatte einen schönen Aufenthalt in Marios Apartment. Die Kommunikation im Vorhinein verlief einwandfrei und ich wurde bei meiner Ankunft von einem guten Freund von Mario empfangen und mit Tipps versorgt.
Das Zimmer war super sauber und wie auf den Bildern gezeigt. Die Lage ist ebenfalls ideal, alle bekannten Sehenswürdigkeiten sind innerhalb weniger Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen.
Einzig und allein war es abends etwas laut, da das Zimmer/Haus  sehr hellhörig ist.
Brilliantly located, cosy, very clean and the perfect studio for easy going travelers.
petit studio très sympa et moderne, situé dans le haut d'une petite rue du centre en pente. L'accueil a été très sympa.
性价比很高,位置很好,在市中心,离教堂书店都很近,房间内设施很全,空间不大但是足够两个人住｡下次去porto还会去｡
Great place! Well located, clean and polite and accessible staff!

My stay in Mário's place was perfect! I was traveling solo, and this studio was the perfect size for one with all the amenities and comforts I wanted. It's centrally located just a few blocks from Sao Bento station, so I was able to stop by between sightseeing around town. Mário's staff was available to let me check in early and gave great local restaurant recommendations. I would definitely stay with Mário on a future visit to Porto!
Our stay there was amazing! The location is great. The flat is very cozy and the space is enough for 2 people. Both check-in and check-out were very easy to be done. We enjoyed it very much!
Absolutely perfect location and space! Highly recommended
Perfect
Alles ganz prima! Zentral, sauber, entspricht den Erwartungen.
Preço/qualidade/localização excelente
100% recomendable
Awesome place! All the amenities you could think of and the location was prime.

Thank you very much - the appartement was perfect !
Good equipment and perfect location.
The apartment is small but very quaint and located centrally. Had a great time in Porto

Mário’s space was clean, modern and central to both tourist hot spots and the local amenities. Everything was fantastic - from check in to location, helpfulness to cleanliness. As other reviewers have said, it is a small space but it has everything you would need for a city break!
Very central. Lovely apartment.

It was a pleasure to be at Mários's place.
Near to the center and to a lot of beautiful places and sure I will come back if I come again to Porto!!
L'alloggio è piccolino, rispetta pienamente le foto. È pulito e ben tenuto ed ho trovato tutto ciò che mi serviva. L'host è stato puntuale, preciso e disponibile. Posizione ottima.

Great communication and check in. Met me at the door and showed me the room and things to do in the local area. Perfectly clean room with everything you could want. The flat is in the centre of the city yet on a fairly quiet street.
A receptividade foi muito boa, e o local fica realmente perto de tudo.

Fueron unos días inolvidables, el alojamiento impecable en todos los detalles, sus anfitriones amables, fexibles, expeditos, excelente ubicación en el corazón de todo, súper fácil de encontrar y de acceder a todos los puntos y lugares estratégicos para conocer y recorrer Oporto. Toda la suerte de mi lado en todo, me tocaron días geniales, fiestas de los estudiantes, me fui llena de energía y alegría, dejé el lugar con muchísima buena onda, asi que mucha suerte para quien vaya!
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen und ist gut ausgestattet. Zu zweit war sie für uns etwas zu eng. Kommunikation und check-in/out verliefen problemlos...
Achei o espaço apertado para duas pessoas.
It was clean and the location of the appartement was just amazing. Maybe a bit small for two germans but that wasn‘t a real problem.
The location is fantastic. The room is small. Probably better for one than two. Very clean and felt very safe. I would stay here again.
Logement très bien placé, proche des commerces, de la gare Soa bento et de l'arrêt du bus venant de l'aéroport. : le 602. Logement petit mais bien équipé.

Mario's place was exactly as described and seen on the photos. It's a small place but had everything that I needed during my stay. It might be a bit too small for two people though. Location wise is excellent - a few minutes walk from San Bento train station in Porto downtown. 
Mario was helpful through messages prior my trip. I did not meet Mario in person but check-in and check-out went smoothly as his friend was waiting for me at the building. The flat was clean, supplied with towels, shower gel, and kitchen utensils. Positive experience overall.
This place is tiny, but perfect for one or two people. It’s right in the heart of it all and only a short bus ride away from anything you could want to do.

My flight was early in the morning I could let my suitcase in Mario's office and go to visit the city. The appartement is between most of the monuments, you will be perfectly located to see the city. There is a supermarket 10min of walk. The host helped me to find a place to eat and he was friendly. It was perfect. It is perfect for one person to stay few days in Porto.

My stay here was great. My flight landed early and Mário was happy to let me check in earlier than the check in time. I really appreciated that because it had been a long flight! The location was great, close to everything!

The apartment was perfect for two people. It is in a great location, close to many cute restaurants. It is walking distance to all the main attractions within the center and about a 20ish minute walk to the other side of the river.

O espaço é bem organizado e com ótima localização, apesar de pequeno, ofecere boa infraestrutura. 

Mário é atencioso e sempre respondeu às minhas dúvidas com rapidez. 

Recomendo muito o espaço de Mário!

L’emplacement était top, bien dans le centre de Porto. En revanche le ménage était très mal fait, nous avons trouvé des cheveux dans la douche et sur les draps... 
C’est beaucoup trop petit pour 2 personnes, le lit devient la table pour manger...
Dans la description il y a marqué « grill » or il s’agit d’une machine à paninis donc déçus, nous ne pouvions rien faire à manger.
Le parquet sous le lit était très abîmé. 
Nous n’avons pas rencontré l’hote Mais la personne qui était présente nous a donné quelques explications sur ce qu’il y avait à faire etc sur Porto.
Donc nous étions contentes de l’emplacement mais déçues du studio que l’on qualifierait plus de chambre.

Die Lage der Unterkunft war perfekt: zentral und daher war alles zu Fuß erreichbar (dadurch natürlich aber auch nachts etwas lauter). Es war schnuckelig aber für einen Städtetrip, bei dem man eh nur unterwegs ist Supi! Check-in und -out verlief problemlos und sogar außerhalb der angegebenen Zeiten! Gerne wieder :)

This place is very nice, very clean and about 5 mins from the Central Station, plenty of shops mins from the place to pick up food. I stayed 1 nights and enjoyed the stay before leaving Porto.

Great Host !
Muy bien situado, gracias por todo

Great, small apartment situated perfectly near all your tourist needs. We were two people and the space was a tight for 2 (with our luggage), but, if you’re like us and looking for a nice bed to sleep in at night before enjoying the city, this is a good option. It’s not the quietest of streets even though it’s residential so very light sleepers may find it difficult to find rest. We had a great experience with Mario and his colleague who met us at the apartment, gave us a map with suggestions and orientation to the city and responded promptly to any needs. An ideal place certainly for a solo traveler but no more than 2 people.
Mario was responsive to our requests and the location of the apartment is very central which makes exploring the city centre easy.

Thank you so much for a great time in Porto. The apartment was the perfect choice. The location was great, near everything, the perfect starting point to explore the city. It was easy to locate and Mario's direction were perfect. Also, Mario was always pleased to help us and the communication was really fast and efficient. The apartment is perfect for two people. It has everything you need, and probably even more, it is clean and has all the amenities, from sheets and towels to everything you need to make breakfast. I strongly recommend Marios apartment.

The appartement is perfectly fine for a weekend in Porto and the price-quality ratio is great! Also, the location is absolutely central. It's important to note that it is rather small for two people, though.

위치도 좋고 숙소 시설도 혼자쓰기에 좋습니다. 침대가 조금 좁은편이라 남성분들은 좀 불편할수도 있을것같아요, 숙소가 있는 언덕이 좀 가파른편이고 건물내에 계단이 좁아서 무겁고 큰 캐리어를 옮기는건 힘들수도 있습니다. 제 캐리어는 20인치짜리였는데도 좀 좁게느껴졌거든요. 창문 맞은편 집이랑 굉장히 가깝습니다; 밥먹다 눈마주친적이 있을정도로요. 샤워실과 변기가 유리 미닫이 문으로 분리되어있는게 아주 좋았습니다.
the location is outstanding, the room is small, but everything is easy to find. For one Person it is just great...two People I wouldn't recommend.

My best friend and I stayed here for a couple of nights. The location is great if you want to discover the city! Mario was very kind and gave us all the information we needed to check in easily. The flat has everything you need for a short trip.
El dpto esta bien ubicado en cuanto a barrio, pero la calle sobre la que esta no es muy linda. Ideal para una persona, chico para dos. El bano impecable con todo lo necesario

Mario’s place is homey and modern!  Space is small but has everything you need for your visit.  Location can’t be beat-it is a minute walk to Clérigos and five minutes to Sao Bento!  He was very responsive and let me drop a bag early before checkin.
Apartment mit perfekter Lage in der Innenstadt. Alles gut zu Fuß zu erreichen.

Si tratta di un monolocale comodissimo al centro. Va benissimo per un soggiorno breve. Puoi girare Porto tranquillamente a piedi senza utilizzare nessun mezzo. L'host è molto gentile e la comunicazione è ottima
Very central location and cozy apartment!

It was my first Airbnb (usually I go to Hotel) and it was a great experience. The flat is clean, quite, very good locate in city center and I had always responses to my questions. All was fine, thank you !
Perfect place to stay in Porto for one. Easy, clean, safe and stylish. Everything went perfectly and I would highly recommend
Excelente ubicación y con todo lo necesario! Detalles importantes que hacen la estadía muy agradable ! Súper recomendable!! Tienes todo muy cerca para poder conocer Oporto!! No se lo pierdan!
the appartament it's perfect for one person, it's small but has all the necessary. the position it's perfect to see the city, and i really enjoy my stay!

It is a perfect accommodation for a few days visit in Porto. It is very central but still in a quiet side street. The studio is small, but comfortable for one person. For two people it could be a bit difficult. Everything else just as described, the communication with Mario was optimal, the studio was clean and equipped with everything you need. I would stay there next time again!
This space is excellent and attractive, with a full kitchen set-up and a separate bath. Great view down a beautiful old street, too. The location is fabulous for walking around central Porto.
Mario’s place was great! Excellent location and really nice and very clean! Would definitely recommend!!

Though it is rather tiny, the apartment provided everything one needs for a stay on a citytrip. The location couldn't be better. I didn't meet Mario in person due to some delay on my side but check-in and communication in general via messenger and phone was easy and fast. Would definitely stay there again!
Great location for the price! Would recommend solo travelers and visitors to stay here.
Perfect location! I'll definitely stay there again!!
It's difficult to find a better place to stay like this one. It is located in the best spot in porto. Literally in its heart.
Good location, clean room, fast communication. Very nice place for few days and perfect for one person. I recommend to stay here

Séjour à porto super 
L'appartement super bien situé RAS, propriété impeccable.
Mario hyper réactif par SMS ou via rbnb. Je conseil ce studio les yeux fermer merci. Mario a bientôt

위치가 오르막에 있긴 한데 큰 길 오르막 ?? 이라서 저는 괜찮았어요! 상벤투역이랑 가깝고 동루이스 다리 2층도 10분정도 거리이고 바로 직진만 하면 되어서 편했고요!! 골목 골목 다니는 재미도 있었어용 ㅋㅋㅋ 캐리어도 체크인 할 때 감사하게도 들어주셨고 ㅠㅠ 완벽한 독립된 공간으로 여행 마지막 도시에서 편히 쉬다 갑니다 !! 가스는 없어도 전자레인지 있어서 마트에서 사다 먹느라 매일 숙소에 일찍 귀가했네요 ㅋㅋㅋ 2명이서 쓰기엔 캐리어 필 곳이 없을거 같긴 해요 저는 혼자라서 완전 편하게 잘 쉬다 갑니당

we enjoy our stay at the appartement! It was located in the middle of the historic centre of Porto. Nice, clean and cosy appartement! 
mario was very easy to communicate!
房子非常中心 很有格调 适合旅客

excelente la recepción, muy lindo el.departamento, limpio y cómodo. 
gracias
Lugar aconchegante e localização maravilhosa
This apartment is tiny but cosy! The location is amazing, so close to all the sites and restaurants. It’s a good choice if you travel by yourself!

Perfect for one person. A small space as described but fully equipped, clean, and accessible. First floor up from the street. Solid WiFi. Unbeatable location, walking distance to great restaurants, cafes, and really, the whole city. I enjoyed my stay here and would stay again.

A acomodação do Mário é boa. Ele e seu amigo Diogo foram muito prestativos, todas as vezes que precisei. Só quero enfatizar uma coisa que me surpreendeu um pouco: o apartamento é extremamente pequeno. Eu já sabia que era pequeno, pelos comentários de hóspedes anteriores, mas não imaginava que fosse tão pequeno. Deixo essa ênfase para que as pessoas que irão escolher essa acomodação possam pensar com calma se o espaço atenderá às expectativas e necessidades. No mais, tive uma estadia agradável. Obrigado, Mário e Diogo.

It's a very well located place and it has everything you need to have a good time and explore the city. Mind you, of you are a light sleeper, like I am, you may find difficult to sleep because the street is busy at nights and there are construction works taking place in the morning and throughout the afternoon.

The place is comfortable for a short stay and it's ideal for a person but I believe it'd be too cramped for two people.

I recommend it for single travellers who want to make the most of Porto and the surrounding cities.
Good place for a single traveler, apartment was small but had everything one could need.

Excelente ubicación cercana a los lugares imprescindibles a visitar en Porto, un pequeño apartamento cómodo y con todo lo necesario para la estancia, con buen calentador y agua para el frío. Excelente atención desde el primer momento por parte de Mario

5 stars room, great location, it is very clean and modernly decorated and furnished! Mario responses very quickly when I ask questions. He gave me great tips about local restaurants. His friends works at the office also give good directions when I needed help to find supermarket. I love this flat, it is perfect, I will come back again. Thank you Mario!

name: Cozy Home - 5 pax 2BR City Centre 1 min to Metro
summary: Big warm welcome to my listing!  A very clean n cozy 2BR Apartment at excellent location.  •	Newly renovated in 2017, High speed WIFI •	Spacious two big bedrooms with a big kitchen.  •	1 min walk from the subway Tsim Sha Tsui station and Airport A21 bus •	The building has 3 elevators and 24-hour security guard. Very private and secure. •	Within few mins walk to big shopping malls, Victoria Harbor, Canton Road, Avenue of Stars and etc. Hope my listing will bring you a good and comfort stay!
space: The apartment is about 450 sq ft. furnished with two double beds (155 x 195 cm) and one single sofa bed (75 x 185 cm) .  It can accommodate up to 5 guests  (Recommended for 4 pax) with 1 bathroom.  * Equipped with hair dryer, towel and hangers available for clothing in the bedroom. * Smart TV/High speed WIFI/Cable TV for entertainment/Netflix channel * Microwave/Toaster/Electric Oven/Fridge/Iron/Thermo Pot  * Big window with street view. Smoking is strictly NOT allowed.
description: Big warm welcome to my listing!  A very clean n cozy 2BR Apartment at excellent location.  •	Newly renovated in 2017, High speed WIFI •	Spacious two big bedrooms with a big kitchen.  •	1 min walk from the subway Tsim Sha Tsui station and Airport A21 bus •	The building has 3 elevators and 24-hour security guard. Very private and secure. •	Within few mins walk to big shopping malls, Victoria Harbor, Canton Road, Avenue of Stars and etc. Hope my listing will bring you a good and comfort stay! The apartment is about 450 sq ft. furnished with two double beds (155 x 195 cm) and one single sofa bed (75 x 185 cm) .  It can accommodate up to 5 guests  (Recommended for 4 pax) with 1 bathroom.  * Equipped with hair dryer, towel and hangers available for clothing in the bedroom. * Smart TV/High speed WIFI/Cable TV for entertainment/Netflix channel * Microwave/Toaster/Electric Oven/Fridge/Iron/Thermo Pot  * Big window with street view. Smoking is strictly NOT allowed. The A21 Airport Bus stop is ri
neighborhood_overview: There will be a 24 hours security at the building for safety. In the case of an emergency, all ambulances (999) will take you to a government-run public hospital where, as a visitor, you will be required to pay a service fee for using emergency services. If you have any other requests, please do not hesitate to ask. Contact me ahead of time, make sure I have enough time to prepare for you. Have a nice trip and good stay in HK!
notes: No Smoking is allowed in the apartment! There will be a 24 hours security at the building for safety. In the case of an emergency, all ambulances (999) will take you to a government-run public hospital where, as a visitor, you will be required to pay a service fee for using emergency services. If you have any other requests, please do not hesitate to ask. Contact me ahead of time, make sure I have enough time to prepare for you. Have a nice trip and good stay in HK!
transit: Within mins walk to reach all kinds of local and western food. There are many convenient stores near to the apartment and you can also find the supermarket at K11 mall and ATM across the street Easy to get around to different attractions in Hong Kong: - 10 mins walk to Canton Road (Habour City) - 5 mins  walk from Chatham road South to the Avenue of stars - 10 mins walk to Tsim Sha Tsui Ferry Terminal (Fit for those planning to visiting Macau or China) - 3 mins walk to K11 Mall - 3 MTR stops to Mong Kok - 2 MTR stops to Central (Lan Kwai Fong) - 1 MTR stops to Admiralty then change bus to The Vistoria Peak - 9 MTR stops to Lai King then change to Tung Chung Line to Sunny Bay then change to Disneyland Resort Line  Easy to reach from the airport: A) By bus: A21 bus (40 min) and get off at Mody Road stop, Chatham Road South, then 10 meters walk to the apartment. B) By Airport Express train: get off at Kowloon station (20min) then ride free shuttle K4 and stop at Park Hotel then walk 3 min
access: The A21 Airport Bus stop is right in front of the building, save your time to find the location. The Airport Express Shuttle Bus is only 2 mins walk to the Park Hotel   House main door is equipped with pass-code lock for easy Check-in. You have your private bathroom which is very clean with body wash and shampoo. Smoking is NOT strictly allowed
interaction: I will try to show you around the neighborhood or even some attractions in HK if I am free from work or something. Anything u wanna know please ask ask ask don't b shy ;)
house_rules: This is a self check-in apartment. Kindly use the given passcode to enter the apartment and check-in.  Please be quiet when you walk pass the corridor on the listing floor at all time. Thanks for your cooperation and understanding!! We are not running a hotel here, so the rules are simple not so strict as hotel management. Check in time: 3 pm to mid night  Check out time: before 12 pm  No smoking, no parties, no pets, and please keep the house clean. Please keep all your valuable personal belongings with you and we do not responsible or do any compensation any Lost and Liability. This is a private residential building, please lower your voice after 9 pm at night and respectful to the Neighborhood. If lost the keys, that will be charge HKD$200 replacement . In case, something is damage and can not be fixed, the damage cost will be deducted from the deposit. 我们不是营运酒店,所以规则很简单不像酒店那么严格｡ 入住时间:下午3点後至深夜 退房时间:中午12点前 禁止吸煙,沒有聚會,沒有寵物,請保持房子清潔｡ 请必须安全保管你的一切有价值的个人物品,我们不会对遗失的财物负责或作出任何补偿的责任｡ 这是一个私人住宅楼,请

host.host_about:
Hey, 

I am an outgoing person who like to meet new friends. I have been traveling and working in more than 40 countries. I am a friendly host.  That's why I will treat you like my guest not customer. Besides, I love Painting. Hope I can meet someone like painting so we can exchange ideas and pass it on to others. I also like people traveling to my country. By this, we can both sharing culture and fun in different ways. I wish you all have a happy journey in Hong Kong. My family and I are managing all my listings, and I need to travel sometimes, if anything you wanna know just ask don't be shy! Bon voyage!

reviews.comments: Great location n a very cozy place, room and toilet are very tidy and clean, host is very friendly and helpful, nothing more to ask for highly recommended!
Amazing home like an oasis in the desert, great location and spacious with reasonable price! Thumbs up!
Super clean and comfortable, the place is close to everything! We have a pleasant stay and will definitely be back again!

First time Airbnb, this home gave me an unforgetable experience. I hope i can find the same as good as like this one. Loads of bars n restaurants just around the corner. Most importantly, JJ's home is not just decorated with ikea stuffs like many do, he added lots of chic ideas into it. Highly recommended!
試過多次Airbnb,這次的體驗真捧｡房子很舒適,地點方便,性價比高而且房東很熱情的招待｡5星推薦!
機場巴士直接到達很方便｡大夏多個電梯和房子特別乾淨很滿意!
Smooth communication with great help on my travel plan. Love the location!
Great location, nice place very clean and few mins walk to shopping centre. Hi fly recommend . Thx Jj
Amazing home!
离尖沙咀地铁站非常近,维多利亚港也很近,海港城也是很近｡总的来说对于吃喝玩乐加购物来说,这个地理位置简直棒的没话说!!!而且房子非常干净整洁和舒适~房东人也特别好,知道我们入住之后还特意过来教我们使用电器,门锁等等~唯一美中不足的就是楼下是酒吧街,3点多还有很多人喝酒喧闹,然后可能老式的窗式空调,所以空调特别响,对于睡眠不是特别好的需要慎重选择了,我老公一晚上就没睡着~

So happy to find this place. Great location! Almost all the good things are connected to this area.. shopping, eat-out, everything. Very nice apartment. Especially I want to thank  Jj for his kind help.  I want to stay in this apartment again on the next trip to Hongkong!
Good communication, centrally located. You could find anything you want. Highly Recommend.
位置非常好｡吃喝玩乐都方便,大雨天房东亲自带路这点让我很温暖...推荐给家庭出行者!
这个房间真的性价比挺高的 不像宾馆 像自己的家 每天回去很舒服
Comfy & Clean place! This place could easily house our whole family. Large kitchen for Hong Kong, nice large refrigerator to store food. Located near TST and East TST MTR stations.

Jerry was a wonderful host! He was very accommodating with our requests for early and late checkout. He was also very thoughtful going out of his way to bring my mom some cakes when we told him it was her birthday! So nice of him! :) And of course the place was great, too! Had everything we need and the location was very convenient and close to malls, restaurants, bars, convenience stores and the train and bus stations. I definitely recommend staying at his place!
nice!离海港城很近,附近有很多茶餐厅和购物的地方,十分不错｡
很好
除了电视机开不了,其他都不错,地理位置方便,设备齐全
一百分!但因為我對香港門牌號碼的羅輯不熟!所以找了一下!

Missing my second home already! Had a lovely stay. Everything you needed was there already (coffee, towels, toothbrush, shampo, maps) you name it. The location was great - the middle of town where you could just walk down and have a bowl of noodles at 3:00am! The room was clean and perfect for a group of 5! Will definitely be back there, Jj was lovely as she wanted to drop by and say hi and always kept us updated on news. Thank you so much Jj!
房间干净整洁,位置真的超级好找,从机场大巴下了车感觉转个身就到了,而且离海港城很近,购物很方便,公交,地铁都很方便,主要房东和房东的妈妈人都非常好,总之很感谢,如果下次去香港或者有朋友去香港都会推荐入住的,给房东带来不便也非常抱歉,房东人很好,总之真的很感谢
房间还不错很整洁,位置很给力,离地铁很近,很方便｡全程自助也不麻烦,希望下次有机会还能入住｡
Awesome apartment, spacious bedrooms, walking distance from museums, MTR stations, bars, restaurants, shops... Felt like a local!
Great apartment. Exactly as advertised.
房子非常温馨,地点超级棒,完全就是香港的中心｡海港城,免税店,天星码头全部步行可达,地铁站一分钟!在香港几天,刚好遇到下了一两天的雨,可是几乎都没有淋到｡把房东的杯子打碎了,房东还关心我是否受伤,真的超贴心!
房子特别温馨,交通非常便利,很多细节都想的到位｡方便我们的入住｡把转换插头都帮我们准备好｡想的太周到太细致了!来这几天,香港下大雨,雨伞都帮我们准备好｡十足十的贴心服务!一次非常愉快的旅行!感谢!
The place is exactly as on the pictures, clean and a very central location. Great and very friendly host. Overall definitely recommended.
房东很细心,该准备的基本都替你准备了,雨伞拖鞋一次性牙刷牙膏等等,我需要一个熨斗房东阿姨也很及时送过来了｡楼下是酒吧街,白天没什么人晚上比较热闹,走路一两分钟就是地铁站和7&11,还有一个大一些的超市｡建议全家入住的话还是多带两个转换电源接头,香港的插头跟我们不通用,房东准备了三个,但还是不太够用｡基本来说非常满意,欢迎大家选择入住｡
東西設備都非常的齊全 擺設也非常的溫馨 房東人也非常的Nice 如果有機會去 一定在找你們
너무 깨끗하고 넓고 좋당 역이랑 그렇게 가깝지는 않지만 다닐만 하다
位置非常好,来往机场可以坐a21直达,处于闹市区,逛街吃饭坐地铁都很方便｡睡眠浅的人可以带一副耳塞,夏天晚上空调机的声音会比较大｡
安全､地點佳､靠近地鐵站,房間乾淨衛生,值得推薦給大家｡適合家庭入住｡有機會的話,會再次入住｡
房子位置很好,虽小但是五脏俱全｡很棒的一次旅行!
除了房间空调声音很大,夜里比较吵意外,都挺好｡交通便利,逛街吃饭都方便｡会推荐来港朋友住宿｡
Great place near from good restaurants
挺好的屋子 交通很便利 靠近商场和酒吧街
It's super near TST MTR and thus is super convenient  to travel everywhere. Room sizes were decent for HK standards.
숙소 위치도 좋고 방도 사진과 비슷했습니다.
Very nice central located apartment, Jj came to welcome us on the first day and was very friendly and helpful. Would definately come back to this place again if I come back to HK
第一次订民宿｡在香港这个寸土寸金这个地方能住到这样的房子很不错!离地铁站一分钟左右,去迪士尼,旺角等都非常方便｡距离the one,一兰拉面,龙城大药房也很近｡而且房子里还有冰箱和微波炉｡纸巾牙刷沐浴露也齐全｡房子很温馨~住宿体验很棒!不足的地方就是不方便洗衣服,空调声音略大｡

Great apartment, two huge rooms, very clean and location was great, surrounded by places to eat and drink, very close to Nathan Road.
Only odd experience was someone had been into the apartment whilst we were out for the day, freshened sheets, replaced toilet paper etc. We felt a little uncomfortable with this as we were not aware this would have been occurring and it was unusual considering the communication had been good prior.
房东人很nice,下午三点入住,上午也能帮保管行李,方便白天出去玩,下面虽然是酒吧,也没有想象中的吵,整体感觉不错!
棒
房间很不错
位置很中心,逛街吃饭方便,房子干净整洁,很好哦!
购物很方便
Lovely and warm but tiny apartment. The location is great, only few mins walking distance to public transports and shoppings.
good
房间很棒很棒,适合家庭居住,房间很雅致,服务也是棒棒的,回头来香港还会再来,谢谢房东｡
民宿地理位置方便购物~食饭方便~离地铁站近~性格比高~下次有机会还会再来!

Amazing place! First time at a AirBnB (previous stay belongs to my mum :P)

Great for my family of four (two kids, one 4yrs old, one 1+yrs old). (Two couples would be good too)

Place has one nice cozy living room, two spacious rooms with queen sized bed each, one toilet with shower (well stocked) and one kitchen (albeit narrow but well equipped with microwave oven, induction cooker, hot water flask and lots of utensils.).

Location is very near to Tsim Sha Tsui shopping district (5-10 min walk). Nearest MRT exit is J3, East Tsim Sha Tsui Station. Easy access.

JJ's mother (i think?) will pop by during the day to change the towels and make the room, so don't be surprised.

5 Stars from me. Price compared to a next door 5 Star hotel is great, no frills and much bigger space to rest between outings in Hong Kong.

Great place in great location.
Good news For some  people it has a hose in the toilet (Shattaf).شطاف
A very nice place thanks very much!
房子位置超级好,离购物中心很近但又不吵;房子里生活用品一应俱全,有回家的感觉~
位置方便,快捷｡
这是我第二次住了,由于第一次入住感觉好,第二次特意又定了这家,闹市中取静,距离海港城还有尖沙咀都很近,周边吃饭购物都很方便,推荐入住,下次如果去香港,我还会选择这家｡
The place is very near the bars

Great location. Very clean. There was 4 of us - 2 adults and 2 13 year olds. Plenty of room for what we needed. Great responses and communication throughout. Little bit noisy as night as above a couple of bars. However can highly recommend.

Fabulous location! 4 minute walk from metro, very close to Kowloon park to enjoy some quiet time,  15 minute walk from clock tower to have an amazing view of the bay, 12 minute walk from train station, tons of restaurants and bars. Apartment aa described in pictures. Quick response. I recommend it!
这次来香港是过来看演唱会的,去红馆超级方便,购物,食都很方便
房屋如实描述,位置比较好找, 出行方便,房东比较好沟通
看得出房间是很用心布置的~相对香港这个寸土寸金的地方,真的算住的很宽敞了｡地理位置也不错,会推荐给朋友^-^
十分温馨!!
很文艺的房间适合摆拍哈哈哈  很干净 住了两天中间还给换了床单 在尖沙咀能找到这么舒适宽敞的房间 感谢房东
地址真的很方便,无论是在附近购物呀还是考试什么的｡房间很干净,东西也挺全的
离地铁站很近,房间里一应俱全,生活用品准备的都很充分｡
房间性价比很高,房屋大小非常舒适,适合一家出行,所有设备一应俱全,非常满意｡地理位置也非常便捷｡在香港两天玩得很开心,住在这里 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都方便,进去房间香香的,卫生条件很好｡就是电视不太会调,不过好在有电影可以看｡热水需要提前预热｡非常感谢房东提供这么好的条件的地方,在香港两天,每天都遇见好人指路｡玩得非常开心｡下次还有朋友去会推荐这里的｡
整洁舒适,房东人很好,房间较小,适合2-3人入住,每人一个房间,如两人一张床感觉比较窄,房子离地铁很近,很方便的一处住所~
还好
地理位置很好,离尖沙咀地铁站才一个路口,出门太方便了｡家里也很温馨,设施齐全,非常干净!这一次住宿真是选对了!
在香港算是空间大的,适合家庭出游｡
这是我第一次在airbnb上选择住房｡房屋是典型的港式公寓,但是麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,厨房浴室都很不错｡最有意思的是使用老式的制冷器,我还是第一次见到,当然晚上会有些响｡不得不说,位置超级便利,走去海港城仅需五分钟,一兰拉面就在楼下红绿灯对面｡下面是酒吧街,一到晚上很是热闹｡
Great!
On par with what we expected.
Very clean and cozy apartment. Location is good too with many bars and restaurants available in the area. Recommend it for anyone that is staying in the area.
房间文艺清新,功能齐全,两间卧室,厨房以及卫生间,虽然不大,但也很齐全｡房东很会为租客着想,很多小贴士｡在寸金寸土的香港,住民宿比住酒店更能融入当地文化中｡房子的地理位置超级棒,靠近尖沙咀购物区,海港城之类的,总之体验感不错哦!
房东人很好,打扫的很干净,也帮忙我们寄存行李,非常好的体验~
地点很方便,离海港城还有很多网红小吃都很近……

位置好 房间很干净设备齐全
方便
四个人住人多很划算
位置离地铁口很近,在香港寸土寸金的地方,房间大小已经算不错了,房间内设备一应俱全,很居家
在香港这地方房子算比较大了,周边交通也很便利,硬件可以稍微改进一下
Great location, easy to access, really appreciated the aircon ! Thanks for a great stay.
位置很好 去哪里都很方便 房子也很温馨
位置很方便,图片所见即所得,就是刚进房间稍微有股味道,晚上睡觉冷气声音偏大
位置相当好了 虽然小住得也比较舒服 房东you qiu b有求必应 难忘的三天
房子干净,位置好!

Location is great ,lots of bars just downstairs. Room was clean and much spacious than what we expected. The one small issue for us is that the air conditioners could get a little too noisy at night,maybe offer some earbuds would be helpful. Overall We enjoyed our stay.
不错 东西很全
位置很方便｡楼下貌似是酒吧区,晚上很热闹,不过关上窗户后并不觉得吵｡
Good location!! it’s super convenient to MRT, and even to everywhere.

位置很方便､房间也大､格局都算不错､
不足是设施陈旧､房间十分吵､通风很差､
位置很好 坐机场大巴过去的 a21麽地道站 基本下车就是了 离地铁站也很近 很好找 房间和图片一样 床垫很软 睡着特别舒服 一切都很满意
适合2-3人入住,位置不错

Excellent location. This place is near MTR, close to the harbour and star ferry. With a fantastic selection of food available at the doorstep. It’s easy to get around HK from here. The apartment is generous in size, for HK standard and is comfortable for a longer stay. The area gets a bit noisy, but it’s part of the atmosphere

The appartment os in the city center. Very good location.
Clean and designed appartment. 2 big beds. There is air-conditioner, but we didn't use it as it was winter. There is hot water, and all bath supplies and kitchen staff.
During nights it can be a little loud because of bars on the street, but they didn't disturb us. If you don't like noise - just take ear-plugs.
We had a great stay in this place!)))
方便舒适,五人之内入住非常不错!

If I'm not present, texting is the best mode to reach me. Quiet, tree lined residential area with amenities such as the subway minutes away. The F train is around the corner and the N train is nearby also. Parking is subject to availability and must be reserved prior to booking.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Educated professional living in Brooklyn.  I love meeting new people, running, hiking, fine foods, traveling, etc.  One of my favorite trips was spending New Year's Eve in London on the Thames River.  Big Ben, spectacular fireworks and light show; and fun times with a good crowd of international tourists.  A most memorable night and trip!  Also, I generally approach life with a positive attitude.  I look forward to meeting you.

reviews.comments: John earned his status, "Super Host" and I will definitely recommend his serene place to family & friends

I had a great stay at John's! The 
home was spacious, clean, and centrally located. There was an unseasonable hot spell during the week of my stay and John was kind enough to offer another roomwas because a fan had not yet been installed in mine. I won't hesistate to stay again. Thanks John!

My stay at the house of John has been wonderful, the house has everything you need and much more! The air conditioning is new and works perfectly, the kitchen is huge and has everything, the bathroom is super clean, the location is excellent in a very quiet residential neighborhood, just 2 blocks from the F train where you get to Manhattan in just 35 minutes. And besides, John is an excellent host who has always been attentive to my needs. I highly recommend it.
Great host. John always kept the place clean and he made great conversation. Whenever I needed help with anything he was sure to give me some pointers. I would recommend this place.
Great host! Knows what's he's doing and is very helpful. Kept the place clean and made fun conversation.

The house was clean and John is the ultimate host. He’s always replying to messages quickly and tries to help any way he can, whether it’s nearby shops or nightlife advices. The house is close to F train which goes to Manhattan.
Exceptional host... safe, clean, comfortable, peaceful place... wonderful stay... I look forward to coming back!
This place is great! The neighborhood is safe. The room and the house are clean and very well taken care of. John was really nice and comprehensive and all the process was very organized.
John is great ! I enjoyed my stay and recommend this place to others
John is a great host, and the room was clean and well kept. Will definitely stay again if I return to the area.

John helped me out on very short notice when I was left in an unexpected predicament regarding my housing situation. He was welcoming, kind, and serious about making my and the other guests' stays enjoyable. The room is small, but it's clean and well-kept and satisfied my needs perfectly. While I didn't end up staying as long as I had initially intended to, I can still definitely vouch for John as a good host with a good space.
John was able to accommodate my request to book quickly. He helped show me around the neighborhood and the metro stations. Great neighborhood too
John was a great host! Gave me a tour and safety information upon check out.
Super convenient to the subway stations. Lots of restaurants and markets nearby. John Is a fantastic host. Will help you with anything he can.
John is very interested in making guests’ experience better than expectations, I highly recommend this and will be staying here again.
John is a super great host! I didn’t stay at his home for the full time I booked and he still made sure to treat me with hospitality and provide me with a thorough check-in.
Good location, kind John.
the place was very clean and I liked the neighborhood

name: Thelonious Monk room at The Harlem Townhouse
summary: Step back in time to the height of the Jazz Age in this meticulously restored 1890s Harlem Brownstone. Famed venues like The Apollo Theater and Paris Blues are steps away, as are restaurants, cafes and museums. Internationally recognized for it's charm and beauty this townhouse has been the site of many fashion and celebrity photo shoots that have included luminaries like Sharon Jones, Neil Patrick Harris and Moby.
space: Your own private room in this 4 bedroom house is tucked away from the noise on a safe, tree lined, quiet block. There are two full baths shared by all the guests, elegantly appointed with hand cut tiles and antique clawfoot tubs. This townhouse is ideal for solo travelers, writer's, composers, educators, students and couples in search of a romantic weekend.
description: Step back in time to the height of the Jazz Age in this meticulously restored 1890s Harlem Brownstone. Famed venues like The Apollo Theater and Paris Blues are steps away, as are restaurants, cafes and museums. Internationally recognized for it's charm and beauty this townhouse has been the site of many fashion and celebrity photo shoots that have included luminaries like Sharon Jones, Neil Patrick Harris and Moby. notes: Bring your favorite slippers as this is a shoeless house. There is a black and white cat named Phoebe on the premises. She is very friendly and will visit you if permitted. Otherwise it is easy to shoo her away.
transit: Nearby 125th street is a transportation hub with easy transfers to all airports, train and bus depots. A seven minute ride will bring you directly to Times Square.
