access: 除了各自私人空间外都可以自由使用
house_rules: 1天前预定.房間必须保持整潔乾淨! -  Please keep the room clean and tidy, messy room is not acceptable -no smoking

host.host_about: Started to travel all over the world 38 years ago .... Love people and  share stories . After I have been to so many places , I am ready to share with you this place where I call home ! !

address.street: 西貢, 新界, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: This was my first AirBnb trip and I couldn't have asked for a better first host. :) Michelle was very communicative and hospitable, her place was very clean and pleasant to stay in, all in all I highly recommend her place if you are curious about another side of HK!
Nice place. Nice guys. You cannot miss this place.
一個溫馨的家,主人會準備好一切生活所需,環境很舒服,而且特別多文化氛圍的裝飾物｡很適合愜意的浪費時間,周圍環境幽靜舒適,超級喜歡住這裡的日子
房東非常的好,我給母親訂的用作休息,媽媽評價很高,謝謝房東的照顧

I stayed with Michelle and Gabriel for one month while I was on exchange at HKUST. They are outgoing and helpful and made me feel very welcome. The house is located not far from Sai Kung and HKUST in a beautiful, green, exotic mountain area. I can recommend it to students at HKUST who enjoy living in a more quiet area away from the city.
谢谢Michelle暖暖的照顾,么么(温馨的房间,推荐地道的港味,和Joe一起帮我找到最快到深圳机场的路线),还要谢谢Vicky的接待和帮忙叫taxi~很温暖,西贡的小岛很美!下次来要体验更多~
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Michelle, Gabriel and Vicky are very nice and supportive. The house feels like home to me. It is also a surprise for me to find such a comfortable place to live. Actually you have large space to use besides the room. Also, you rarely need to buy new stuff for the kitchen, many appliances are free to use. If you feel comfortable to use share spaces like living room and dining room, and do not mind 10-15min walk to the bus station, I would strongly recommend this room to you.

I recommend this room.
The hosts support well visitors.
The room is good arranged and sufficiently large.
People and cars are not too many in this area.
You can feel relax so much.

I recommend this room to you.

Firstly, the host will contribute to your staying.
She will respond to your questions so quickly.
The room, its kitchen and its bathroom are arranged well for you.

Secondly, it is surrounded by a good environment.
The nature and polite people make a relaxing mood.
And the bus gets to a station within about 15 minutes, from a bus stop.

To stay at a reliable and comfortable room is one of the most important thing for you to make your trip good.
So, you should try to reserve this room.

I enjoyed staying in Ho Chung a lot. It is a bit secluded, so transportation to almost everywhere takes a while, but the surrounding is very quiet and clean. It’s a very pleasant place to stay. The hospitality is outstanding and the house is very nice. In spite it’s size, the small room is comfortable enough.

This is a pretty good value for the price. It takes 30 mins to walk to the nearest transportation stop or you can wait for the bus that runs every 30 mins. Taxis don’t go there. 
Bad transportation but very quiet and coutry. I enjoyed it. If you wanna stay in the city, maybe you should look for something else. But if you enjoy walking and a little hiking, this is not bad. And it’s reasonably priced. It’s a very nice house too. Think of an American townhouse.

Michelle isn’t there. Her husband lives there with you. You get a room on the 2nd floor in a 3 story house. Mind you he always sleeps on the couch in the living area right next to your room, out of all the rooms that are there. You have to share the restroom. He is very sensitive. You have to snoop around the house or he’s shouting at you. 
One time I came home late very early in the morning and 
I was up 2am or 3am one time and I went to the kitchen and heated up some leftover food -got hungry from all the walking and touring -and ate it in the dining room, he came downstairs and said something. because he’s not in a room but in the living room, he could hear everything. 

It doesn’t mention that you can’t eat or drink food in your room at all. Only in the dining room. 
His English is not good, so it’s hard to understand him. And he’s very bossy.

This is a good place if you are just gonna sleep there and leave. It has a good price for what you get. And if you prefer a remote area.

name: Sagrada Familia Butterfly
summary: This lovely 3 bedrooms apartment is located in the midst of all the action in Sagrada Familia Area including restaurants, bars , shops as well as the stunning Sagrada Familia. Freshly renovated, the Sagrada Familia MARIPOSA apartment with terrace, can house up to 7 people.
space: This lovely 3 bedrooms apartment is located in the midst of all the action in Sagrada Familia Area including restaurants, bars , shops as well as the stunning Sagrada Familia. Freshly renovated, the Sagrada Familia MARIPOSA apartment with terrace, can house up to 7 people. With 75 m² of space on offer this 3 bedroom/ 2 bathrooms apartment on the 2nd floor of a building (with a lift) is nestled between an abundance of restaurants, cafés, bars and shops - thus creating an authentic Barcelona experience.  If that was not enough, you are also within walking distance of the famous SAGRADA FAMILIA (700 meters), the UNESCO world heritage site of  Hospital Sant Pau (400 meters) and  Gaudi’s Park Güell which consists of architectural wonders and the Gaudi House Museum (30minutes walking). Featuring a warm and inviting living and dining room this lovely home is the ideal choice for your holiday in Barcelona. With a maximum capacity for up to 7 people, this apartment consists of 3 bedrooms in tot
description: This lovely 3 bedrooms apartment is located in the midst of all the action in Sagrada Familia Area including restaurants, bars , shops as well as the stunning Sagrada Familia. Freshly renovated, the Sagrada Familia MARIPOSA apartment with terrace, can house up to 7 people. This lovely 3 bedrooms apartment is located in the midst of all the action in Sagrada Familia Area including restaurants, bars , shops as well as the stunning Sagrada Familia. Freshly renovated, the Sagrada Familia MARIPOSA apartment with terrace, can house up to 7 people. With 75 m² of space on offer this 3 bedroom/ 2 bathrooms apartment on the 2nd floor of a building (with a lift) is nestled between an abundance of restaurants, cafés, bars and shops - thus creating an authentic Barcelona experience.  If that was not enough, you are also within walking distance of the famous SAGRADA FAMILIA (700 meters), the UNESCO world heritage site of  Hospital Sant Pau (400 meters) and  Gaudi’s Park Güell which consists of archi
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood of the Sagrada Familia in Barcelona belongs to the Eixample district and is one of the nicest residential areas of the city.  The wonderful temple of the Sagrada Familia is located in this area and gives the neighbourhood a special charm.  Also, the area is ideal if you come on vacations to Barcelona, because it has great artistic and commercial appeal, and good public transport communication with the rest of the city.In Barcelona's Eixample neighbourhood, just outside the Quadrat d'Or (Golden Square) heritage district, you'll come across a bustling, lively neighbourhood which is home to two Catalan art nouveau, or modernist, landmarks by Antoni Gaudí and Lluís Domènech i Montaner: the Hospital de Sant Pau and the church of the Sagrada Família, which attracts thousands of visitors every day and has made the neighbourhood from which it takes its name so famous. The Eixample is a chic and trendy district of Barcelona that is famous for one of Barcelona’s most iconic sym
notes: Optional services (not included in the price): - Extra Beds: Price: included in the booking. - Cot/Crib: Price: included in the booking. - Arrival out of schedule: Price: 30 € per booking.
transit: Metro Station: San Pau/Dos de Maig, Encants, Sagrada Familia
access: The kitchen is fully equipped containing fridge / freezer, microwave, toaster, kettle, oven and a coffee maker. We do provide the following laundry and room facilities: iron (clothes) + ironing board, hair dryer, bed sheets, towels, washing machine, cloth, toilet paper (limited amount).  For your comfort, the apartment has air conditioning, WiFi and TV (no satellite). Accessible with lift.
interaction: Please phone us, half an hour before arriving to the apartment: +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) In addition to the rent a city tax (€2.48/ adult/ night) must be pay in cash or by credit card at arrival. A security deposit of 300€ has to be paid. This deposit will be used in case of the loss of set of keys, damages in the apartment, noise in the building. Parties are strictly prohibited in our apartments. In case of noise complaints from the neighbours, the owners or their legal representatives, they will not give back the security deposit and have the right to ask tenants to immediately leave the apartment without the right to any financial compensation. If the apartment is in a very dirty condition, additional cleaning costs would be deducted from the deposit. CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT: Arrivals (Check-in) are made directly to the apartment from 01:00pm until 08:00pm. Arrivals after 08:00pm have a surcharge of €30, €50 after 00:00am, and €10 for each additional hour. (For example: 01:00am = €60).
house_rules: 1. Check-in schedule: From 01/01 to 31/12: everyday from 13:00h to 20:00h. 2. Check-out schedule: 11:00. 3. This accommodation does not accept groups of young people.

host.host_about:
Hello, 

KeyBarcelona we are a vacation apartment and short-term rental agency in Barcelona, Spain. After ten years in the Hospitality and Tourism business, we founded Key Barcelona in order to offer you the best possible conditions for your stay.

We have carefully selected centrally located properties in the heart of Barcelona, completely furnished and equipped so that you enjoy all the necessary comforts during your stay in the Catalan capital. We offer a diverse range of apartments including studios for couples, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments for families, and apartments with up to 6 bedrooms for groups of friends. We can also house larger groups in multiple apartments located in the same building or neighborhood.

We strive to offer consistently high quality in our apartments. The availability, engagement, and reliability of our team distinguishes us from the rest.

Contact us for your next escape to Barcelona.


The Key Barcelona team.

reviews.comments: Great location, great place, great service

Excelente localização, relação qualidade preço boa, bairro bastante tranquilo, áreas espaçosas.
Estadia bastante positiva.

The appartement was very nice, clean, well located. The street was quiet. We were just disappointed because we arrived after 11.00 pm. and there were nothing to drink or eat, not even a bottle of water, some fruits...
Apartamento muy limpio cerca de la Sagrada Familia muy indicado para familias

Beautiful cool apartment with a modern interior. Our favourite hangout was the balcony which has a view of other blocks. The neighbourhood is very peaceful and feels slightly less touristy which is a surprise given the proxemics to the Sagrada Familia. Our favourite night time spot was a local jazz bar with super strong cocktails and our favourite breakfast spot was an affordable cafe called I’aia Nita. The kitchen doesn’t have an oven! But still super easy to cook and the kitchenware was all in a really good clean state. All in all the apartment was lovely, clean and comfortable! And well located in terms of public transport!
Todo estuvo bien
can recommend. everything was perfect

demander des torchons des produits lave linge et demander de réduire les frais de ménages ou du moins ne pas sortir les poubelles pour de frais de ménages exorbitants 
des murs ont besoin d’être rafraichis

name: Double room with private WC and balcony São Bento
summary: Olá everyone! Our 7 rooms are the right choice if you wish: - a central location with ALL public transport less than 1 minute from the door; - an affordable but CLEAN place with PRIVATE WC; - an helpful host/family to assist you in all you need.
space: The room was renewed in 2012 and has 1 big double bed. Private bathroom inside. Located on a 2nd floor without elevator. -Wireless Internet There are more double rooms in the same building. Please check my 6 other listings because those rooms are also waiting for your visit! Note: I live in the hostal, so I will always be there if you need any assistance, day or night.  You will be given the key to the room but not to the building front door, but just ring the bell and we'll open it :)
description: Olá everyone! Our 7 rooms are the right choice if you wish: - a central location with ALL public transport less than 1 minute from the door; - an affordable but CLEAN place with PRIVATE WC; - an helpful host/family to assist you in all you need. The room was renewed in 2012 and has 1 big double bed. Private bathroom inside. Located on a 2nd floor without elevator. -Wireless Internet There are more double rooms in the same building. Please check my 6 other listings because those rooms are also waiting for your visit! Note: I live in the hostal, so I will always be there if you need any assistance, day or night.  You will be given the key to the room but not to the building front door, but just ring the bell and we'll open it :) - room with private bathroom inside and balcony; - common area (hall with couches). My family and I let Guests have their space, but we are more than happy with having a chat about anything, e.g. nice places where Porto locals like to go. We will make your bed ev
notes: There are bicycles for rental next to São Francisco church, next to the Douro river, down hill from our place.
transit: All attractions in Porto center are located within walking distance. -15 seconds walking to São Bento train/metro/bus/taxi station (Porto central station), that connects you to the entire country (including the amazing Douro Valley). Enter this station and be amazed at the beautiful walls and ceiling covered with old tiles. -2min walking to the most central part of Porto: Praça da Liberdade and Avenida dos Aliados, where even McDonald's restaurant is a lovely place (it's in a beautiful old style building). The door next to mine has a café/bakery with a surprisingly beautiful old decoration - it's perfect for having breakfast - very cheap and very good! For other destinations such as the west side of Porto (Foz, the beach...), we recommend using the metro. You should use the reloadable public transport card "Andante".
access: - room with private bathroom inside and balcony; - common area (hall with couches).
interaction: My family and I let Guests have their space, but we are more than happy with having a chat about anything, e.g. nice places where Porto locals like to go. We will make your bed every afternoon because we know how good it feels to arrive in a tidy room after a long day of exploring the hills of Porto. If you prefer we don't do it, just let us know!
house_rules: English language: Common sense rules in order to respect other Guests and neighbours. Please don't smoke inside rooms. Please ring the building's bell at any time when you want to enter it. Earlier baggage drop-off is possible, from 11:30, free of charge. You can also leave your baggage safely with us after check-out and come back later to pick it up. According to Portuguese Immigration Service rules, we need to see your passport (for non-EU citizens) or ID card (for EU citizens) and take note of some identification data contained on it upon arrival.  Thank you! Português: Regras de senso comum em sociedade para respeitar outros Hóspedes e os vizinhos; Por favor não fumar dentro dos quartos; Por favor toque à campainha da porta do prédio sempre que esta se encontrar fechada e pretenderem entrar; É possível chegar antes da hora de entrada nos quartos (14:00h) para deixar a bagagem, sem custos adicionais, mas só a partir das 11:30h. Também é possível deixar a bagagem depois da hora de sa

host.host_about:
I'm Vítor and I help my family run this small hotel named PENSÃO DOURO that was renewed in 2012 and now is waiting for your visit.
I am from Porto and I love my city, so I can give you some hints on where to go and what to eat, avoiding tourist traps. Experience Porto as local!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Super bem localizado, limpo e Vitor é um ótimo anfitrião, que nos recebeu muito bem.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour à la Pensao Douro chez Vitor qui est une personne très accueillante et toujours de bon conseil sur les ressources de sa ville.
Le logement de Vitor est très bien placé à Porto à 20 mètres de la gare Sao Bento et à moins de 10 mn à pied des principales attractions touristiques de Porto. Au pied de son immeuble il y a un café pour le petit déjeuner et de nombreux restaurants très bon marché et de qualité à 5 mn à pied.
Le logement que nous avions loué est en très bon état. Seul c'est idéal de le louer. Si vous êtes en couple, notez bien que les WC la douche et le lavabo sont dans la chambre, juste isolés par un rideau. Heureusement il y a un balcon qui permet à l'un d'aller prendre l'air pendant que l'autre utilise la salle de bain.
Ce logement est d'un excellent rapport qualité prix et le Wi-Fi compris, fonctionne parfaitement. 
C'est de loin l'une de nos meilleures adresses désormais et nous retournerons sans hésiter chez Vitor lors de notre prochain passage à Porto. Merci beaucoup Vitor de votre gentillesse et de ces bons moments passés ensemble !
Rémi et Christine

Chambre très bien placée au centre de Porto, tout est accessible facilement à pied: transports, lieux touristiques, un peu bruyant (travaux) mais très propre, accueil et conseils de Vitor utiles et très agréables pour un grand week-end à Porto!
This room is very well located in Porto and Vitor is one of the nicest hosts I've had with Airbnb. I was very comfortable during my stay.
Está bien ubicado, buena limpieza, y los anfitriones son muy amables. Recomendable para gente joven. No hay ascensor.

Sono stato una settimana ospite di Vitor mentre cercavo casa ed e' stato semplicemente un grande. Super disponibile, simpatico, in piu' in posizione strategica per tutti i mezzi e in centro storico. Consiglio

Victor and his wife are super nice and help out with everything you need, give you tips for sightseeing or just sit down for a nice chat. They speak different languages e.g. Portugues, german and english. 

The room is exactly as it says and the price is the best you can find for that area. It is super easy to get to the airport and you can walk from that airbnb everywhere in town easily. 

It might be useful to bring some earplugs for the noise of the station, which is just next door, if you have a light sleep. But it isnt too bad at all. So no worries about that. 

All in all we can recommend to stay with Victor and would always book the same if we would be back in town.

A good hostal in central location in porto. Vitor is very friendly and always care about you and tell you what you should see in the city.
The room was big and wifi was fast.
Very Central.  Vitoria is a helpful, welcoming host.

This is a great single/double room in very central Porto, near Sao Bento station and thereby easily accessible with public transport. Airport is reachable within 40min metro. All the tourist highlights are within walking distance from between 5-15 min, the location is therefore absolutely great. The same can be said for the host Vitor, who does everything he can to make the stay comfortable. One thing to note tho is that the room overlooks the street to the train station and it can therefore be quite noisey at night, earplugs may be helpful for people with a light sleep. Besides this, pretty much everything was great.
Spacious room, great balcony, super clean, perfect location and very welcoming and accommodating hosts. Thanks!

Both the place and Vitor's service were great. 5 stars for price-quality. This warm man was always up for a chat and to give some advice for your city explanation. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Porto!
Très bon rapport qualité/prix et excellente localisation! Hôtes disponibles. À conseiller!
Wonderful, helpful host, great central location, good size room, no problem! :)

The room is really clean, the hosts are so warm and welcoming, and it is a great place to stay in a central location. Everything is within a short walking distance. Also, the house has video surveillance throughout the stairway and the door with a buzzer, so there is no chance of any strangers just walking in (made me feel really safe). The city in general makes you feel safe and it is really a nice place to visit. Luísa and Vitor are really making an effort to make their guests feel like home and that is exactly what I felt like staying in their house.

Hay pequeños puntos que se pueden mejorar, pero la ubicacion, el precio y la perfecta atencion de Vitor y Su mujer, lo superan todo, MARAVILHOSO! al ser una pension, te da la libertad y privacidad perfecta, ademas la ubicacion es Inmejorable, justo, justo, en la calle a un costado de la estación de tren mas bonita de Europa Sao Bento, y la amabilidad de Vitor y Su mujer han echo una estancia inolvidable, repetiria! Ideal para viajar solo o en pareja (ya que el baño no es privado 100%).
APpartamento molto semplice ma molto economico, proprietario disponibile, simpatico e pronto a soddisfare qualsiasi esigenza

Probably the best room for the best price in the most Central part of beautiful Porto. A beautiful patisserie is right beneath  the pension with the best 'pastels' and original antique interior, next to it a very fine grocery store run nu an old lovely couple with fine food and drinks at very low prices,  Sao Bento station is opposite the pension: one of Porto's many highlights Above all, Vitor and his wife are very welcoming and love each other for ever to come!
La ubicación está genial y Vitor y su mujer han sido súper amables y disponibles con muchas sugerencias sobre Oporto.
Super bien placé et très bon rapport qualité prix !
Vitor était parfait, aux petits soins avec de vraies suggestions pour visiter et profiter de la ville. Je recommande vivement.

Camera come da foto. Con tutto quello che serve per un soggiorno senza troppe pretese in zona centralissima vicino a tutto. Pulito e tranquillo grazie anche a Vitor per il suo controllo dello stabile. Inoltre si è dimostrato sempre disponibile e preciso per consigli su Porto. Consiglio a tutti. Unico neo come presente nelle foto, il bagno é in camera e se si divide la stanza con una persona con cui non si ha confidenza, può risultare un problema. Per il resto super consigliato.

Une très belle chambre et un accueil super accueillant ! En plein coeur de la ville à proximité de toute commodité. 
Salle de bain dans la chambre séparée par un simple rideau, agréable pour avoir son espace mais un peu moins pour l'odeur ! 
Le bémol : environnement bruyant et fenêtre obligatoirement ouverte vu la chaleur de Porto l'été... 
On remercie pour l'accueil de Vitor !
Vitor and his wife are very nice and outgoing, good and clean room, excellent location, if we are in Porto, then we will definitely stop at them, thank you very much for the warm welcome

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto dans la pension de Vitor. La chambre que nous avions été propre Et La pension est très bien située à deux pas du métro Et de tous les sites intéressants à porto. Vitor est aux petits soins. Nous ne pouvons que recommander cette pension.

The place is very nice, safe, clean, cozy and central!
Vitor is a great host who enjoys having guests, the room is clean and the place is about a 10 second walk from sao bente. what more could you ask for?

Locatie van het appartement is perfect! De kamer met balkon is heel fijn met een mooi uitzicht op Sao Bento station. Het kan wat lawaaierig zijn. Vitor doet altijd de benedendeur voor je open, dag en nacht! Zo komen er geen gekkies in z'n huis ;-) Ook staat hij altijd paraat met een praatje, heel gezellig!

Had a great stay at Vitor's, he is a very intelligent and passionate man that talks about his city with a lot of love. He gave me a fantastic rundown on all the places to go and see. The room was very clean and big but most of all I loved having my own shower, sink and toilet. The location is ideal, across from Sao Bento train station and a short walking distance to everything. I recommend without hesitation.

The accommodation is very nice. the rooms are big and nice. I enjoyed the bathroom in the room since I travelled by myself. 
The location of the apartment is perfect and Vitor has many suggestions to see the city that I followed and i just had an amying weekend thanks to him!

Very nice hosting and I will definately come back :)

The room is perfect for one or two people. The location is very convenient, just besides Sao Bento train station.Vitor and his wife are extraordinary people. They gave me lots of tips on things to do and places to visit. I would come back if I had the chance.

La stanza si trova in una abitazione storica di 400 anni. Centralissimo attaccato alla stazione metro di sao bento. Il proprietario é molto simpatico e disponibile nel dare informazioni. La stanza é come si vede nelle foto

The apartment is amazing located, right next to the train station and metro station at Sao Bento. The location is pretty much the most central part of town, with all the must see local sights ( which Vitor kindly pointed out on our arrival)  10 minutes top from here.
Its very good value for money, no thrills, clean accommodation.
If visiting, you must visit the  pastelaria downstairs, itself and its cakes are very attractive and taste as good as they look.
One thing to consider, if you have difficulty sleeping in noisey environments, the apartment is located in the centre, next to a train station. So expect a little noise.

L'emplacement au coeur de la ville en face de la célèbre gare de Sao Bento est tout simplement parfait. Et aussi pratique pour effectuer des excursions en train. 
Vitor prend le temps de nous donner ses nombreux conseils à notre arrivée, que nous avons suivis avec plaisir. Luis et sa femme seront ensuite disponibles pendant me reste du séjour pour toute autre questions ou besoin particulier.
Séjour très agréable

This is probably the best place to stay in Porto. It’s very close to the Sao Bento Station. The room is clean, the bed is comfortable, with private WC and shower. We also enjoyed our balcony with a view of the beautiful old station on Sao Bento. The pension is close to restaurants and cafes. Everything is walking distance! 

Vitor is absolutely the best host. He has a lot of recommendations that we enjoyed. Communication and check-in were a breeze. I recommend Vitor and his pension in Porto. I would definitely come back and stay again there!
Esta habitacion esta muy bien hubicada, lo que para nosotras no fue muy como es el baño
¡Hola! El hostal estaba muy limpio y en el centro de Oporto. La dueña muy amable, nos atendió muy bien.
Gerne wieder, vielen Dank für alles!

I highly recommend this place, vitor was super helpful he is an amazing host, it is not a fancy place but at least you can feel at home with helpful people, the location is great in the heart of the city centre.. all the transportation are just in front of the building and also sight seens are walking distance frw minutes from the place.. the room was very clean..I would come again.. Thank you Vitor.

Die Lage: 
Wirklich direkt in der Innenstadt und 30 m von einer Ubahn Station entfernt, großartig!

Die Gastgeber: 
Sprechen Deutsch, Englisch und Französisch und sind wahnsinnig hilfsbereit und herzlich! Sie haben sich viel Zeit genommen uns Tipps bezüglich Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten zu geben und haben sich sehr lieb um uns gekümmert, auch mit zusätzlichen Decken, weil es im Herbst nachts im Zimmer recht kalt werden kann. 

Zimmer: 
Sehr sauber, Größe völlig ausreichend und Bad im Zimmer war für uns überhaupt kein Problem!

Wir würden jederzeit sehr gerne wiederkommen! Absolut zu empfehlen!
Très bon emplacement et hôte très aimable, toujours prêt à rendre service. Je recommande cette adresse et j'y séjournerai à nouveau si je retourne à Porto.
Nice place in a very good position! And Vitor is a very kind person!
Accueil très sympathique, logement confortable et très propre. En plein centre, au pied de l'ancienne gare et à deux pas des transports en commun .. Beaucoup de vie ... Logement à recommander.
A great place to stay in Porto! Super central and close to everything, just next to the beautiful train station. Vitor is a great host, so friendly and helpful! A good value place to stay.
A very nice place for short stay.

Very dissapointing stay!! Very cold in the room and no hot water for showering. The lady of the house was not availible in the morning when i had a question. Also the place is quite noisy. If you are staying here outside the cold period it might be worth it due to its location. But be aware the place is quite noicy.
The location is the best possible and Vitor is a very nice guy! Tons of tips, frontal good eats to local hidden places.

Vitor and his wife were very friendly and gave me a lot of tipps what I can do in Porto. They speak also german and english.

The room is really central located. Everything is within walking distance. The room was also very clean! 

It was a perfect trip to Porto. I will come back!

Room was as described and the owners are friendly and multilingual, which impressed me. Location is perfect, directly near the train station. My only problem with this room was its very thin windows, which means you hear everything outside and cold air gets in in winter. Many sheets are provided, which makes sleeping alright, but taking a shower was a rather freezing affair. I would recommend this in spring and summer. In winter only if you have spent time in the army ;)

La chambre de Vitor est située en plein centre-ville, idéal pour visiter Porto. Bon à savoir, elle ne dispose pas de chauffage, ce qui peut être un peu rude en hiver. Heureusement, plusieurs couches de couvertures permettent de dormir convenablement. Vous serez bien accueillis chez Vitor, c'est un logement que je recommande.

La gentilezza dell'ospite merita 5 stelle, è anche troppo sollecito quando qualcuno vuol starsene per conto proprio. Per il resto la stanza è come descritto e corrisponde al prezzo piuttosto basso. Ubicazione ottima, 5 stelle. Stanza pulitissima, 5 stelle. Ma il fatto che manchi il riscaldamento e che il sole non ci arrivi mai provoca, oltre al freddo (sei coperte necessarie sul letto in giornate dal clima primaverile), una grande umidità: tornato in Italia, il pigiama che avevo usato odorava di umido. Quando sono arrivato la camera non era pronta, e lampadine fulminate non erano state sostituite. Una notte lo scarico del WC non funzionava perché l'ospite si era dimenticato di aprire il rubinetto dell'acqua.
In sintesi: ubicazione e pulizia ottime. Ospite gentilissimo, un po' naive. Rapporto qualità prezzo buono.

Com uma localização excelente, perto de acessibilidades e dos locais turísticos mais importantes, tudo muito bem arranjado e preparado e sem qualquer crítica negativa a ser possível fazer. É de enaltecer os anfitriões Sr. Vitor e a D. Luísa, sempre prestáveis e muito atenciosos.
A pensão é muito bem localizada e os anfitriões atenciosos e acolhedores.

The guest house run by Victor, a very kind and helpful man, is conveniently located at Sao Bento. The building is a bit run down but acceptable. Ok, I know you get what you pay for, and the price is quite low, but I am sorry to say that I would never recommend this accommodation: it was so cold I had to sleep completely pressed under four heavy blankets and I couldn't even think of having a shower. I guess a basic electric heater would solve the problem.

O Host nos fez pagar uma taxa que não existe, e que não estava citada no anúncio. Tivemos que realizar o pagamento antes de entrar no quarto, então demos o dinheiro ao Host já que não tínhamos outra opção de lugar para ficar na cidade. Após o ocorrido enviei uma mensagem ao Airbnb explicando o ocorrido, oque me informou que eu não devo realizar nenhum pagamento extra, pois é contra a política do Airbnb, e que fariam uma comunicação disso ao Host.
Tentamos falar com o Host, mas este não quis fazer a devolução do nosso dinheiro. 
Podem imaginar o quanto ficamos irritados e desconfortáveis durante a estadia. Fiquem atentos as cobranças indevidas para turistas.
It was a very nice experience. Pensao Douro is located right next to São Bento station. The perfect place to start exploring Porto. The hosts were very kind  and helfpful. Thanks!
perfect location.

Vitor est un hote très sympathique, la chambre est basique mais il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour y dormir, peut être un peu bruyant une heure dans la soirée à cause des mouettes mais cela est indépendant de la volonté de l'hôte ou bien parfois quelques bruits de voisinage étant donné que la chambre se trouve coté gare mais cela reste correcte. 
L'emplacement est idéal, vous pouvez pratiquement visiter tout à pieds ou bien vous avez la station de métro et de la gare juste au pied de l immeuble.
Great location to all attraction. Recommended for all backpackers.

Everything was perfect. The location is ideal. Vitor is very kind, gives you a lot of tips and recommendations, and the neighbourhood is quiet and enjoyable. Would definitely recommend it to anybody ! Obrigada !
Great place, great location, great host - the toilet is in the bedroom only separated by a curtain, just to know. Good stay!

Vitor est un hôte sympathique et très serviable! Il donne de bons conseils et en prime, il parle très bien français! L’emplacement est près de tous les services et à 50mètres de la gare de Sao Bento! Chambre conforme aux photos! Merci Vitor!

Vítor’s place is located right by São Bento train station, a great spot if you are spending a couple of days in Porto!
The room, is tidy, clean and welcoming!
The bed is comfortable, everything I needed for a great night of sleep!
I would definitely return at Vitor’s place if I have the chance!
Recommended.

Zimmer war wie beschrieben. Nur von dem Foto mit der offenen Haustür sollte man sich nicht täuschen lassen. Gastgeber vertrauen nicht und kontrollieren mit Kameras und Spiegeln wer das Haus betritt und sich in ihm bewegt. Merkwürdiger Airnbnb Gedanke. Wer Überwachung statt Vertrauen mag, ist hier richtig. Hat mir nicht gefallen.

Victor is a great guy very helpful. Knows a lot about Porto. Can give very good advice.
 Local excellent we found it very handy to all you needed. His wife  very helpful too.
We had 8 great nights in there.
Wish them well.

My wife and I stayed at Vitor's for a few nights and we did like the place. Everything was at our service, we could get inside at any time of the night. Well, we saw photos of facilities behind curtains - no big problem at this price, especially for solo travelers.
Also we weren't bothered much by noises despite the neighborhood of a railway station.
Besides, Vitor is a very nice person, friendly and kind. 
All in all, Porto is a great town. 
Thank you, Vitor!

It's a great place, open minded and helpful hosts, speaking in 5 languages if not more. They did give us a lovely welcome and had ready nice ideas and information about where to explore the city and restaurants. The room was quiet from outside even so you are right at the famous train station.
Vitor was a lovely and very helpful host.  The location near the train station couldn't be more convenient.  Good value.
Vitor와 그의 부인은 정말 친절하고 잘 대해줬습니다. 아무 계획 없이 갔었는데 둘러볼 곳과 식당들도 알려주어서 여행에 큰 도움이 되었습니다. 그리고 무엇보다 가성비가 매우 좋습니다. 이만한 가격에 화장실 딸린 개인실은 아마 없을것 같네요. 방 크기도 넓고 침대도 넓어서 혼자 아주 편하게 잘 썼습니다.

Vitor's place was a perfect location for the trip- especially for first timers like us. It's location was so perfect that everything is really accessible- from tourist spots to food and stores. Vitor and his family were also down to earth and really accomodating. We felt at home at an instant because they were easy to talk to. They also gave us tips and some good infos about the city. The room was simple and tip top clean. We were very satisfied by the service.

Ich habe den Aufenthalt bei Victor und Frau sehr genossen. Die Lage ist zentral. Victor hat mir super Tipps gegeben und beide waren sehr nett. Im Zimmer habe ich mich sehr wohlgefühlt und als Einzelreisende war Toilette und Dusche im Zimmer Null Problem. Beim nächsten Mal Porto werde ich wiederkommen. Obrigado.

The hotel is very nice, quiet, calm, very well located. Vitor welcomed me very well and was very reactive in the preliminary communication. The only negative point is that mosquitoes enter through the interstices of the window (old windows) at night. But my stay was very pleasant. The room is spacious and well equipped. Right in the centre of Porto. Ideal.

This place was amazing, train station was literally 10 sec away from here. And Vitor was an amazing host. You can walk to pretty much every places in Porto from this place. I absolutely recommend to stay here :)
emplacement idéal, dans le centre de Porto. chambre spacieuse, accueil chaleureux .

The room is conveniently located near the town centre and railway station and I didn't find it too loud even though it was very centrally located. You'd need to be very comfortable with each other if sharing the room with the bathroom inside!
Vitors place is right next to the train station putting you right in the middle of everything. It is noisy at night but you get so much exercise during the day you fall right to sleep.
Great location, room was spotless, and Vitor was a great host who took the time to share recommendations and directions.

La chambre est vraiment très très bien!! L’emplacement idéal à proximité immédiate de la gare et d’une station de métro. Vitor nous a très bien accueillis et nous a donné de bons conseils de restaurants et de balade que nous avons suivis avec plaisir et bonheur! J’ai aimé cette ambiance auberge de voyageur. La salle de bain dans la chambre ne nous a pas dérangé du tout !! Nous n’avons pas non plus été dérangé par le bruit. Seul le matelas un peu trop dur à notre goût sans pour autant être inconfortable n’a pas été regretté en quittant cette location. Bref on recommande!

Vitor y Luisa son unos anfitriones maravillosos, nos hemos sentido muy a gusto desde el primer momento. La ubicación del alojamiento es inmejorable y la habitación era tal cual como aparecía en las fotos, repetiríamos sin duda.

Great hosts- they work hard and do everything in their power to ensure your comfort.  I would suponer these beautiful people again

the place- remove your tiara and expectations b4 you check in.  The balcóny is a french door that opens to the street, but dont leave the door open very long .
the bathroom is in the bedroom- no walls.  Fine for a single, but if you are traveling with another, you better be good friends.  
the place is in a stellar locación for the price.
Super stay at Vitor's stay. Super location. Vitor is realy nice and welcoming.
Good location

A good value room with a great central location, and Vitor was friendly and made great knowledgeable recommendations. No kitchen or real common areas to speak of, and coming and going required always buzzing at the front door at any hour, but was no problem. Some noise from the train station and busy street but nothing too bad.
Alloggio pulitissimo e super centrale! Vitor è una persona straordinaria che ci ha accolti dandoci subito preziosi consigli su come visitare al meglio la città! Lo consiglio vivamente
Great little pad, very close to railway station and many of Porto’s top attractions! Basic accomodation but comfortable and definitely  good value. Is up a few stairs so be mindful of heavy luggage.

Victor est un hôte très présent et attentif !!! C’est exceptionnel !!c’est un emplacement idéal et les chambres sont très propres !!! J’ai vraiment aimé mon séjour !! merci à Victor et à sa femme ! C’est un accueil authentique !!

Gli alloggi di Victor, si trovano nel pieno centro della città di Porto, al lato della stazione di Sao Bento, nei pressi della fermata della metro Sao Bento. Rispecchiano correttamente le fotografie, sono completi di tutto l'occorrente, lenzuola, cuscini, coperte, carta igienica. Victor è estremamente gentile e sempre disponibile ad accontentare gli ospiti. Posto consigliato!

Vitor est un super hôte, toujours présent pour donner des conseils sur la ville! Il parle français et anglais également.
La chambre était conforme à ce qui était annoncé, et réellement à 1 min du métro ou du bus. De ma fenêtre je voyais l’entrée de la gare, on ne peut pas faire plus dans le centre!
Super séjour, je recommande fortement ce lieu et son hôte!

super Unterkunft direkt mitten in der Stadt 
Die Top-lage wird noch von der warmherzigen Gastfreundschaft der Gastgeber übertroffen. 
Sehr empfehlenswert
Great place to stay in Porto and Vitor is a real gent who provided some great local tips!
La ubicacion no tiene precio es el mejor sitio para llegar a OPORTO obrigado

Accueil chaleureux.
Vitor est très sympathique et n'hésite pas à vous conseiller sur les choses à voir ainsi que sur les restaurants.
Appartement très bien situé.

Old building, on the second floor, no elevator, perfect location, tricky advice on visiting the city, eating and so on, great hospitality. Just you should know that it has no heating, and in winter it could be colder than outside as the building is old made of granite which is comment in Porto. You would get blanket as much as you want but no heating.

una buena a ubicación, entrada disponible siempre, limpio, estético.
hace bastante frio, no hay calefacción
Superb location. A bit confusing during check-in when the owner was not here, since the lady who does not speak English. Treated with hospitality.

name: Large 6 Bedroom Apartment in Plateau + sunroom
summary: Charming and cozy 6 bedroom apartment, at the heart of the Plateau. It can welcome up to 14 persons, and it is ideally located, seconds away from everything you need (shops, café, bars, restaurants..), 5 minutes ride from downtown, and steps away from the famous Mont-Royal Park.
space: The apartment is located at the heart of the Plateau, the tendriest place to be in Montreal. It is a very cozy and charming 5 bedroom apartment, on the ground floor. All the bedrooms are spacious, features double beds, blankets, pillows, sheets, dressers, chairs, and bed side tables. The bedroom 5 and 6 don't have a window. The living room is great with its sectional sofa, and its HD TV with Netflix and a few free channels, perfect if you want to relax after a day out. The kitchen is very spacious and has everything you need to cook, and enjoy a good meal with its big dining table. The hand towels and bath towels are included. A crib can be provided for the stay if requested upon booking the apartment.
description: Charming and cozy 6 bedroom apartment, at the heart of the Plateau. It can welcome up to 14 persons, and it is ideally located, seconds away from everything you need (shops, café, bars, restaurants..), 5 minutes ride from downtown, and steps away from the famous Mont-Royal Park. The apartment is located at the heart of the Plateau, the tendriest place to be in Montreal. It is a very cozy and charming 5 bedroom apartment, on the ground floor. All the bedrooms are spacious, features double beds, blankets, pillows, sheets, dressers, chairs, and bed side tables. The bedroom 5 and 6 don't have a window. The living room is great with its sectional sofa, and its HD TV with Netflix and a few free channels, perfect if you want to relax after a day out. The kitchen is very spacious and has everything you need to cook, and enjoy a good meal with its big dining table. The hand towels and bath towels are included. A crib can be provided for the stay if requested upon booking the apartment. You will
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is amazing, as the apartment is located in the center of the Plateau, the trendiest place in Montreal. Everything is close by : just a few steps from cafés, bars, restaurants, grocery stores (a supermarket just 100 meters from the apartment). The apartment is on a residential street, so it is very calm at night.  The apartment is just 1 min walk from the Jeanne Mance Park, which is the perfect place to chill during the summer or winter if you like iceskating.  The Mont Royal Parc is very close too, and if you want to go downtown, it will take you a few minutes walking, or faster with public transportation.
notes: PARKING If you think you will use your car while in Montreal, you can still park it on the commercial streets during the following hours (max 3 hours each time, 3$ per hour): Monday to Friday 9am to 9pm  Saturday 9am to 6pm  Sunday 1pm to 6pm You can also find free street parking (not a lot though) in the residential streets, and there are 2 parking lots nearby (I will send you the info once the place is booked). CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT When there is someone before or after you :  Check-in is at 3pm and Check-out is at 11pm.  Please contact me if you want to have an early checkin, or late checkout (I can't guarantee it, except if I say it's okay).
transit: The metro is pretty close (Mont-Royal Station, less than 10 minutes walk), and you can take the bus 55 or 80 which takes you downtown 10 minutes. The bus 11 which can take you at the top of the Mount-Royal within minutes.
access: You will have full access of the apartment, as no one will be there except you and your group.
interaction: I can be reached almost 24/7, via Airbnb, before your arrival and during your stay.
house_rules: NO PARTIES ALLOWED - You are responsible of any disturbance coming from the unit during your stay.  - A 500$ fine per night for any party or disturbance reported by neighbours. - Please act as you are at your own place and do govern yourself accordingly. - Please act as you are at your own place and do govern yourself accordingly. - If you use the kitchen please do not leave any dirty dishes or glasses when you leave. A dishwasher is provided. - There is no smoking in the apartment, you can smoke outside, If the smoke detector turns positive after your departure a smoking penalty will be charged of 150$ on your security deposit. - Late check out penalty Fee is 50$ (without notice). Please advise me if you want to enjoy late checkout. In the event where it's possible, there is no charge, otherwise please respect the 11:00am checkout since cleaning crew must prep the place for the next guests.

reviews.comments: Cool place. Close to the mountain and great food. No dryer, but the laundromat is fairly close. Ubers and traffic were definitely an issue from this location (One way), but it was a minor hindrance in what was a pretty good stay.

My friends and I booked Mano's place for a place to stay for a bachelor party. It was great. Perfect for a group of 6-8 guys looking to share one area to hang out with. Considering the building was old, I was very surprised at how well insulated the sound was. We rarely heard neighbours, if at all. I'd say the only tiny issue is the place is a little old. It's not ritzy, but it's a great place to stay for a group of friends.

The apartment is in a really incredible location, walkable to all the cool bars, restaurants and shops in trendy Mile End. The rooms and beds are big, and it is great value for money if you need a place for a bunch of people to stay.

Our group of 5 rented Mano's place in Montreal for a long weekend bachelor party. The house had 6 separate bedrooms and was in a convenient location so it worked great for our purposes. 

The location is great, with many bars/restaurants close by. There is also a bike share station down the block and a 10 minute walk from the nearest metro. Overall it was a great centralized location to see a lot of the city.

Our stay at Mano's place was very good, easy and comfortable . Mano awnser very quickly and was very nice to accommodate to our needs. The appartment is a bit old, so you can hear the wodden floor squeak, but everything else  is set up for guests to enjoy their stay.  The apartment is huge! We are a family of six and we had space to spare! The furniture was different from that shown in the pictures, but other than that it was just as described. The neighborhood seem safe. We had a few walks at night to a 24 hrs grocery store just 2 blocks away and that was very convenient. Overall we had a great time. We would definitively stay there again! Thanks Mano!

name: Private room w/private bathroom near Central Park!
summary: My place is close to Central park, Museum mile, Q and 6 trains, restaurants, bars, shopping, Bloomingdale's 59th St Flagship store. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
description: My place is close to Central park, Museum mile, Q and 6 trains, restaurants, bars, shopping, Bloomingdale's 59th St Flagship store. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Originally from Istanbul.  I enjoy shopping, traveling, playing volleyball. I work for Wine Spectator and Cigar Aficionado magazines.

reviews.comments:
Banu's shared apartment was "move in comfy." We had a nice, comfortable stay and Banu answered any question that came up. 
I would definitely recommend.

I had an amazing time at Banu's apartment. It is well located, in a safe and vibrant area, full of resraurants, the subway is two blocks away. The room was squeaky clean and Zach,  her roomate, is just a great guy.  I would book her place again.

name: Gorgeous Studio & Balcony Garden @ THE MOTHERSHIP
summary: CLEAN, COZY, PLUSH: Exceptional mattress, natural light, beautiful design, balcony garden & close to the City!  Astoria is one the most eclectic neighborhoods in the world! Find: authentic world cuisines, a vibrant nightlife, cafes, museums & parks with river views! There is even a brand new Ferry to take into the city. The ride is spectacular!  Only 4 train stops to midtown! *24hr: Diner, market & pharmacy *Near airports
space: Studio apartment vibes. I rent my place when I travel and so you will have the MOTHERSHIP to yourself.  The use of the space is genius and the Interior Design is soothing and fun to live in.  Private balcony garden is also awesome year round!
description: CLEAN, COZY, PLUSH: Exceptional mattress, natural light, beautiful design, balcony garden & close to the City!  Astoria is one the most eclectic neighborhoods in the world! Find: authentic world cuisines, a vibrant nightlife, cafes, museums & parks with river views! There is even a brand new Ferry to take into the city. The ride is spectacular!  Only 4 train stops to midtown! *24hr: Diner, market & pharmacy *Near airports Studio apartment vibes. I rent my place when I travel and so you will have the MOTHERSHIP to yourself.  The use of the space is genius and the Interior Design is soothing and fun to live in.  Private balcony garden is also awesome year round! You will have access to the studio suite, balcony garden, eat in kitchen and bathroom. We will be happy to get you settled in, share places you should visit, & help with directions. We are warm but love to give you your space to relax and do your thing. I will be available via phone and an assistant if you need anything while I’m
neighborhood_overview: Astoria has everything!!!! Culture, nightlife, amazing foods, people from all over the world, great shopping, great views, and the proximity to Manhattan is everything!
notes: We love to host people who will appreciate and care for our exclusive hideaway.  Book here if you want premier coziness in a beautiful and fun neighborhood. Come to explore yourself, this city, your work, your love or all of the above! Please note: This space is for you and reserved guests only. No parties or events.
transit: There are many ways to get around. Yellow cabs are always easy to flag down, Buses run regularly and the train is a walk away. Uber or similar services are super affordable as the main bridge into Manhattan is only down the street. New Ferry service is blocks away as well and only coast the price of a subway ride!
access: You will have access to the studio suite, balcony garden, eat in kitchen and bathroom.
interaction: We will be happy to get you settled in, share places you should visit, & help with directions. We are warm but love to give you your space to relax and do your thing. I will be available via phone and an assistant if you need anything while I’m away.
house_rules: No shoes on in the apartment. This keeps the grime and energy of the city out and our place serene and clean.  No groups of people or overnight guests that are not accounted for. This is a serene hideaway just for you.  Low alcohol and drug free environment. Smoking ok on balcony.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Lifestyle Expert and creative entrepreneur. I love relaxation, nature, good food and travel. It is a special thing for me to open up my cocoon space to you. I look forward to it!

reviews.comments: If you are visiting NYC and want a wonderful experience regarding a charming place to stay read on. This was much better than the standard hotel room. It was well designed, the colors warm and well chosen, the unit had that special touch. Gaia was warm and welcoming and did everything within her power to make sure my stay was enjoyable. I will be sure to book this accommodation again in the near future.

Gaia is a wonderful and thoughtful host  whose place is a dream location for someone looking to experience NYC. First off, the room is huge and beautifully decorated. Gaia's choice in design and decor instantly made me feel at home and feel like I had chose the perfect spot for my trip. You truly feel like you have a personal space that is more than roomy enough to stretch-out and unwind when you need privacy. 
Some of my fondest memories include waking and catching sun rays on her beautiful balcony, that provides a breathtaking view of Manhattan, curling up for bed after a long day on, hands down, the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in on Airbnb, or kicking it with Biz on a lazy Sunday, the coolest orange kitty I've met in a while. 
Honestly, there are too many superlatives to list about this place but I will say if you are looking for an outstanding location, a spacious and comfortable room, and the warmth of a caring, cool, and welcoming host..this spot can't be beat. 
Thank you Gaia for a wonderful stay! I look forward to returning!
Gaia's place is a great place to stay. The room is big and looks great. The host is nice and communicative. We would go there again.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We spent a wonderful two weeks at Gaia’s place and had a great time! Gaia is a very nice and accommodating host. She was very flexible about our check-in time (for which I was very grateful) and very helpful with any information we needed (about the area, public transportation, finding our way around the apartment, etc.). She also always immediately replied to and assisted with all our questions. The room we stayed in was very cozy and clean, and had a little balcony. Our room had a curtain, instead of a door, which was however no problem, because we had the place to ourselves, which felt luxurious! The whole apartment is very nicely done up. We could use the kitchen and Gaia put out coffee and tea for us. The apartment is also very conveniently located and the busses and metro get you to the city in no time. Astoria is a cool place to live. There are many good restaurants, coffeeshops etc., as well as a nice park with view on Manhattan, only minutes away from the apartment. All in all, I can very much recommend staying at Gaia’s!
Beautiful, relaxing space! Close to everything you need and a short walk to train! I would highly recommend this place! Thank you for a great air bnb experience!

I stayed in Gaia's place for two weeks and it was great. The room is bigger than a standard hotel room which makes packing and movement easier. The balcony is a huge plus. I'll miss taking my morning coffee there.
The bed is something else. The most comfortable bed I've slept in. After walking for hours, it's so nice looking forward to that cushy mattress at the end of the day. 
Astoria is a great place to stay when in NYC without costing you an arm and a leg. Lots of good restaurants and bars around on days you want to stay in the neighbourhood. It's a few stops from Manhattan and trains and buses are frequent. 
Gaia is quick to respond to questions, the building is in a quiet corner. All in all, good experience. Wouldn't mind booking another round next time in this Airbnb.
The room is quite spacious and private. I was usually the only person there. The apartment is clean and well-decorated.

Overall great stay! Safe area, had the place to myself for almost the entire 2 weeks, and the room is beautiful (has such great energy!) The only thing I would say which was tricky was that the room has no door, just a curtain which does keep the AC in nicely but does not provide a lot of privacy. It was my oversight as it was mentioned in the listing but I think if there’s no door this listing should be listed as a shared space. With that said, Gaia made me feel so welcome and she was super responsive, like when the WiFi went down or the closest subway stop shut down and I needed to find an alternative route to school in Manhattan ( (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps wasn’t helping!) I would recommend this space for a single traveler/student. I loved this wonderful and peaceful time in Queens, thanks Gaia!

Gaia is a great host, super friendly and helpful. The decoration in the room is very cute. Our stay is very comfortable and convenient -smooth check-in, cozy place,  easy access to transportations. Would definitely recommend Gaia's place!

name: Bed and breakfast close to Barra beach
summary: 2 spacious bedrooms for up to 6 people in a big sunny house with pool and barbeque area, very near to buses and the Barra metro station and close to a variety of colourful local shops, restaurants and bars. The house is within a charming and gated condominium.
space: The 2 bedrooms are on the second floor where there are 3 more bedrooms situated and linked via an outside veranda and that are used by the family and other guests. On the ground floor are the living room, dining and office area and kitchen. The house has a large swimming pool (that gets sun from 9h-17h), a toilet, outside shower, patios and a washing and barbecue area. The house is located in a quiet, small and charming condominium with 24/7 security and close to local shops, restaurants and bars and public buses and the Barra metro station.
description: 2 spacious bedrooms for up to 6 people in a big sunny house with pool and barbeque area, very near to buses and the Barra metro station and close to a variety of colourful local shops, restaurants and bars. The house is within a charming and gated condominium. The 2 bedrooms are on the second floor where there are 3 more bedrooms situated and linked via an outside veranda and that are used by the family and other guests. On the ground floor are the living room, dining and office area and kitchen. The house has a large swimming pool (that gets sun from 9h-17h), a toilet, outside shower, patios and a washing and barbecue area. The house is located in a quiet, small and charming condominium with 24/7 security and close to local shops, restaurants and bars and public buses and the Barra metro station. The guests can use the ground floor areas as well.
access: The guests can use the ground floor areas as well.
house_rules: - Quiet hours after 11pm - Smoking allowed on the patios of the house

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Hanno is Dutch, born in Indonesia, married to Maria, Brazilian, from Goias, with four children, two of whom live in Holland. Our youngest daughter is 13 years old. We have a playful dog and a lazy cat and live in a spacious house with swimming pool in Itanhanga/Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, within a gated condominium. Hanno lives in Rio since 1999, speaks fluently portuguese, english and dutch and some german and french. He works as an independent consultant in the oil and gas and beauty industries and play guitar in a rock/blues band. Maria takes care of the house, food, guests, and the family and pets.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Backpackers Dream @ The Funky Loft with Breakfast
summary: Enjoy your own private room in our funky artist loft!  It has 2 windows for the best possible light and funky twinkle lights on the ceiling.  If all you need is a bed to sleep in and a place to keep your luggage than this room is for you.  Plus meeting other awesome travelers like yourself and free breakfast!  1 Person Only!
space: FOR 1 GUEST ONLY - Do not ask for 2 people  Time Out Magazines "Coolest AirBNB in Brooklyn"! *Please read the DISCLAIMER under house rules before booking* WE PROVIDE: -Fresh Towels and Linens -Your own set of keys -Breakfast: Cereal, Toast &  Jam, Oatmeal, Tea and Coffee. This is a courtesy to give you a little something to start your day.  We do not customize to guests preferences. -Q Tips & Cotton Swabs -Iron -Hair Blow Dryer -Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash -Tampons/Pads ABOUT US: I (Marcella) was an AirBNB host in LA for 4 years and was featured in their magazine at the 'AirBNB Open' in November 2016.  I have moved to NY and built a pretty cool space to continue what I was doing in LA... here in Brooklyn.  Maya was one of my first friends in the city and now she lives with me too!   EXPERIENCE: We get a lot of young travelers from all over the world coming to visit NY for various reasons.  It's a funky, artsy, young & hip loft that attracts like minded people.  ALL are welcome! notes: DISCLAIMER Before you click that Instant book... Below is all the important stuff that you really want to make sure to read before booking.  FYI "Instant Book" means I do not need to accept your reservation, you can bypass my approval and book without my approval ;) SPACE: This is our home and not a hotel.  Please take that into consideration.  If you are someone who prefers a normal hotel experience our home is not for you. PHOTO SHOOTS: We have photo shoots in the loft with my business 2-4 days per month.  Must be ok with being out of the loft IF there is a shoot and only during the time of shoot.  Usually between 10am-6pm when guests are out.  Will give as much notice as possible. CHECK IN:  Please let me know the time you'd like to check in BEFORE you book.  Between 12-10pm.  If your flight lands after 9pm DO NOT book without talking to us first.  Absolutely NO checks ins after 10pm.  Check in is a mutually agreed upon time.  If you do not have a flexible check in time please talk
transit: The J Train @Kosciuszko and M Train  @Central are around the corner and we are a 10 minute walk from the L Train @Dekalb.  Just 20 minutes to get into Manhattan!

host.host_about: Hi!  I'm Marcella.  I was born and raised in Los Angeles, moved to NY 3 years ago.  I designed and built my loft in NY so I can share it with people from around the world.  I work in LA half the month and in NY the other half.  I live with my dear friend Maya so between the two of us there will always be a host present :)

reviews.comments: Great home away from until I was able to move back into my apartment.

Marcella is an incredible host! Even if she was still unpacking, her place is very comfy and decorate with great taste, she makes you feel like home. The flat is in a quiet area which is very appreciable. I hope to meet her again in my next trips to NY! I highly recommend this place !!

Come to NYC just for this experience alone, and you'll be happy. It was my first trip to NYC and I was traveling solo - Marcella welcomed me like an old friend. The layout of the place is great, you get privacy in the room (lovely view over the park) and can switch off, or you can have a chat with the other guests out in the (massively spacious and bright) loft. It's like being on a film set! There is also a very affordable laundry service in-house.

I felt genuinely at home and at ease at the place, and you really can't put a price on that.  From this location, Brooklyn and the rest of NYC is your oyster. I was visiting partly on a working holiday and was amazed by all the great options nearby for good coffee and spaces for getting work done. 

I will be back for sure next time I am in town, and will look forward to it immensely  Genuinely lovely and expertly skilled hosts like Marcella make Airbnb the amazing thing that it is.
Great place!

I would like to thank to Marcella for being a fantastic host whose provided me with a travel shelter in her home where I received a warm welcome. I would like to highlight Marcella's quick reaction to my request for a room heater (due to a very bad weather my room was cold). Marcella had it ready for me as soon as I returned from town exploration. I enjoyed returning one evening to a cozy by candles and led lights highlighted loft. I believe especially during warmer season this loft will be perfect.

Chic, stylish, genuinely warm host and outstanding placement in Bushwick, I'll 100 percent recommend this Airbnb to travelers or people coming in for work. As a creative I appreciated the aesthetic of the well designed loft. As a person I can't say enough about how comfy the little bed was, and inviting the couches were and how fun and witty the host and her roommate ARE. Close to public transit, places to eat and loaded with Brooklyn charm. Can't wait to stay here again.

Space:  Located perfectly for me. A really ideal setting--especially for one who needs a home base and a bed.  Open home. Lots of natural light. 

Host:  Marcella was really lovely--positive, responsive, able to desern level of engagement with guest.
A great place with great people ! Warm welcome, ideally placed in the city, super clean ! My only regret is to not have been able to stay more. I recommand it !
Marcella's home is unique, inviting and comfortable. It worth the stay.
A charming space. Relaxing and enjoyable to just sit an soak it all in. Wonderfully decorated with classy and style. Very accommodating from moment one. I'd stay there again.

A good designed cozy loft with a little nice room. Location of the loft is perfect to discover Bushwick, Williamsburg and Brooklyn. In walk distance you can find a lot of bars and shops. Subway is also 6 min walk distance.
Marcella is a amazing host and give you (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication is uncomplicated. A perfect stay in NYC.
GREAT PLACE!!!

Great loft in the bushwick district. Super comfi, quiet, great hosts. Although Marcella was not present, she did her best to make my visit as smooth as possible. Her roomie Marisa is also super helpful and cool. Apt is close to public transport, which makes you go to manhatten within 20 min. I d def come back!

Marcella is a very warm and welcoming host with great knowledge of the area. Her place is quirky and cool and the bed was very comfortable and in a quiet part of the neighbourhood while still being on the edge of what's happening.
Marcella is a great host, she is friendly and lets you get on with whatever you want to do. Great instructions and clean place.

Staying at the Funky Loft was definitely one of the greatest travel experience Ive ever had. Marcella was very excellent with communicating with me, answered all the questions I had plus she did my laundry pretty quickly! The place was nice and clean from the time I checked in until it was time for me to end my trip! It has everything you will ever need and the bed was super comfortable. The loft is pretty close to public transportation and walking distance to a few good spots for good eats or a drink after a long day! This was my first time in New York and first experience with airbnb and it has definitely exceeded my expectations! Thank you again, Marcella for the wonderful stay!

I really enjoyed my stay in Marcella's place! It was such a nice ambience and I really felt at home at all times cause she was a really caring host. I will recommend it to my friends and will come back asap. You should definitely go there if you're looking for something special that is worth every penny

I had a great time in NYC thanks to Marcella and her nice loft. She made the stay easy and convenient. It's super nice of her having a guest hand book provided every information  I  needed while my stay. It's pleasure to meet her and other guests and had her place to stay. A big thank you to Marcella and will definitely be back.

Marcella's place was the perfect home to stay, and absolutely my best experience with AirBNB so far, and the reason why AirBNB is such a great idea. Absolutely gorgeous space, great vibe and a good location. Marcella was amazing with check in and communication before and during my stay. I felt instantly at home and welcome here...can't recommend enough.
Cheers Marcella! x
Even though it was a really short stay and Marcella was out of town, she made sure to accommodate! Great communication. Lovely loft with a swing in the middle. Mikio was really welcoming!

This place is awesome.  Right in the thick of all the action in Bushwick, convenient to everything in Brooklyn and trouble free trips to Manhattan.  Marcella has the perfect combo of leaving you be - yet being there whenever you need her.  Great communication, great tips and a welcoming atmosphere.  Great funky style that reminded me of home and made it very comfortable.  The room though small had everything I needed and was like a little treehouse.  Loved it.  I would visit again in an instant!  Perfect host and stay <3

I spent most of my time here with a cold I caught from the airplane ride over. But the apartment is lovely! A nice little breakfast in the morning, the bed is very soft and Marcella was very sweet! I highly recommend especially since there are many rooms to chose from that will fit any budget!
Great place to stay for professionals who don't want any surprises. A great space in a great location--- clean, quiet and lovely.

Super chilled out vibes, Marcella was an amazing host, don't think I could've found a better place to stay! Perfect place to relax away from the city noise, but still walking distance to the subway in order to explore. Safe area for female solo travelers, I felt right at home :)

The Funky Loft was a super cool and affordable place to stay, sleep and relax while visiting NYC.  A few blocks from subways and buses makes it easy to get around.  Marcella was a wonderful host always making sure that I had my coffee and oatmeal in the morning and also leaving some grab and go snacks for the day.  Great vibes!!!

If you're going to stay in Brooklyn, Marcella's house is place to be! I stayed there for 2 weeks and loved every second of it. Marcella is a beautiful human and I met so many other great people at her house to explore the city with. 

Thanks again Marcella! I can confidently say that my time in New York wouldn't have even come close to this good if it wasn't for you and your amazing home.
Great funky space!
Very nice apartment and close to the subways.

Lovely loft which is well connected to all of the sights and sounds of NY. Easy to follow instructions. Comfortable bed and was able to sleep peacefully even through the hot nights (the room was not hot with the fan and by letting the air conditioning from the main room). Would definitely return!

It was a great stay at the very hip and comfy place! 
Marcella was pretty kind and I had no problem to communicate with her at all(:

My first airbnb! I've heard a lot of rumors about airbnb says how unsafe and unclean they are (that's also why I did not try it for so long). This stay in NYC totally changed my opinion. The place is clean and nice. If you plan to visit NYC, consider Marcella's funky place!

I had an wonderful stay at Marcellas house. The housing is amazing, the location is fabulous and Marcella is fantastic! Everything was very well organised and Marcellas contact with me prior to my arrival and the information at site made me feel at home at once. She also let me keep my luggage at her place after my check out so i could pick  it up later inte the afternoon.  A 5 star stay that I absolutely recommend!

Marcella's place is just as I imagined, a fun, quirky, open space with a lovely room. Her warm personality made it feel even more like a safe haven while coming in from working all day in the city. Thank you! I will be staying here again.

Really like this place, I study design myself and I find this place really attractive especially at night, it's so romantic and surprising! When arriving at home after a whole tiring day exploring the city, the peaceful lights shine in the room is so good! In all, I would definitely recommend this place to those who are still searching for a place to stay in NYC, also, the breakfast is delicious! You wouldn't regret your choice staying here!

The Funky Loft is a dream place for all funky traveller and solo entrepreneurs. The loft is beautifully designed, spacious, comfortable and super clean. Everything is made for you to have a great stay, including a booklet with everything you need to know including area recommendations such as cafes, restaurants & bars. I explored Bushwick night life with its live music bars, only a few blocks away. Creativity is everywhere, inside and outside the loft! I didn't get to meet Marcella because she had to fly to LA but she arranged everything for me to check in smoothly and be welcomed. Communication was perfect,  nice and easy. Marcella is a great host and I will definitely come back!
Quite nice place for backpackers!

Marcella's loft is uniquely and artfully designed, and her hospitality is excellent! Loved the space, and also loved how she made everything accessible and convenient for her guests. Would recommend travelers to uber or lyft to her home from the subway instead of walking if coming back at night, though. But overall, would recommend this Airbnb to anyone who's looking for a unique and fun Airbnb :)

Wow, what a beautiful home! Very cool neighborhood with train stations close by going into manhattan. Marcella and António are excellent hosts and communicated very well. Highly recommend this space for anyone looking to explore or do business in Brooklyn, Manhattan, or both!

Don't look any further for finding the perfect airbnb. Marcella's apartment is the perfect spot to start exploring Brooklyn and the whole of NYC.  Also, the place is just absolutely incredible. Marcella and António are very kind and welcoming and it doesn't happen very often that I actually feel at home in an airbnb (even in the ones I really liked) but let me just say that the two of them create such a positive and easy-going atmosphere in their home that it doesn't feel like you're staying with strangers. The J train that connects you conveniently with JFK airport also gets you to other parts of the city. I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely be back.
It's a nice space with a cute artsy feel to it. The hosts are super nice and even provide custom made guides for places to see and shop. Everything is neat and gives a sense of comfort.
Marcella & Antonio where really nice! Very helpful and communicative. Loved the loft! Room was cute & cosey, but the bed was a bit small.  Overall a great experience.

The house is clean, cute, and homey. You can tell that Marcella and Antonio really put love and thoughts into it. Wish I could have stayed longer to enjoy it! Definitely will come back in the future if possible. Thank you!

Marcella and Antonio were the most thoughtful, gracious hosts imaginable. The Funky Loft is like a travel location in itself. I can't recommend it enough to anyone looking to have a soft, lovely spot to land in New York, filled with wonderful personalities and the most unbelievable decor. Marcella is an airbnb pro and has your every need already sorted out. Looking forward to my next visit!

I had a great stay. The loft is very nice indeed and the hosts are easy going and kind. Communication was easy. The connection to Manhattan and the sights was nice aswell. All in all a great stay and would recommend it to anyone!
super cute couple and adorable place

A clean, cozy and trendy home in Brooklyn, complete with 2 lovely welcoming hosts.  Location isn't that central but very near to public transport and with a great guidebook by Marcella for advice on what to do/where to get things nearby (very helpful!)
Bedroom + bed is a little small tho this is advised before you book, and lack of secure luggage storage meant having to find another option downtown while awaiting a flight.
Overall though a great place which you will find to be both welcoming and comfortable.
Very conveniente location in a beautiful loft with a friendly host
Had a nice stay in this lovely apartment – communication and check-in were fast and easy! Thanks
감각적인 인테리어가 돋보였다..! 정말 이쁜 숙소.. 동네가 조금 무서운곳이라 우버를 이용하는 일이 많았다
The loft is beautiful. Good option if you want to stay in Brooklyn but still at a good distance from Manhattan by underground.

Marcella & António’s place is exactly as described and pictured in the photographs - absolutely beautiful.  The place is close to public transport making it very easy to get into Manhattan and is safe for solo travellers.

Marcella works with you and provides an amazing place to stay! She clearly defines the rules and responds to messages with great alacrity. The place is exactly as she described and would highly recommend for anyone looking for a quick place to stay.
Really the nicest people you will ever meet, and so organized and on top of every detail! The house is so cute and clean, and it is very easy to relax and feel refreshed there! Also, super comfy bed!

Loft super sympa et calme avec déco top.
Accueil tout aussi chaleureux par Marcella & Antonio.
Quartier un peu excentré des transports mais aucun souci à signaler. De très bons petits coffee shop et bars cool à quelques minutes de marches.

Il faudra juste faire attention à ne pas réveiller tout le monde au moment du petit dej si vous souhaitez vous lever tôt :)
Great place to stay for a short trip. Easy access to the city. Marcella & Antonia were very welcoming and friendly. Great unique apartment, all as described.
Such helpful people

A fantastic Airbnb experience in the coolest appartment ever. 
Marcella and Antonio were flawless hosts.

Très bel endroit, on a vraiment l'impression d'être comme à la maison. 
Mention spéciale pour le petit-déjeuner :)
Beautiful place and very relaxing! I wish my trip was longer than just a weekend. Will definitely come back and stay here next time!
Marcella was very responsive before the check-in process. The description is very accurate. Their place is very charming and I enjoyed my short visit. Highly recommend.

I had an awesome stay at Marcella's, the apartment was comfortable and I had everything I needed, plus the decoration is so beautiful it really adds to the experience! Marcella and Antonio were super welcoming and nice too.
