I would totally recommend this place if you plan to stay in Brooklyn as it's well communicated and close to train stations and cool spots for coffee and food.
Great hosts and a great place to stay. I very much enjoyed it!

A nice spot in an interesting local Brooklyn life area, this loft apartment is comfy, clean and hips of public transport options around, A good fit if you want to stay in a place to rest after long days exploring NYC or Brooklyn, I had a good time and Marcella is a rad host! Gracias

This apartment is clean and lovely. We can catch a bus and train easily. It’s a very convenient area!! 

清潔感のあるｱﾊﾟｰﾄﾒﾝﾄでした｡近所の治安も悪くないと思います｡ﾌﾞﾙｯｸﾘﾝ観光とﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝ観光を同時に叶えられる素晴らしいﾛｹｰｼｮﾝです!

This loft is amazing and Marcella and Antonio were extremely helpful. This was my first air bnb and it completely surpassed my expectations. I loved the helpful advice as a first time NYC visitor and would suggest to anyone.

Very cute and awesome room :)

Although they say the loft ( kitchen or ... ) is kind a cold during this season, actually it was comfortable. Not so cold.

Highly recommend!

Despite only being there for one night, my stay at Marcella and António’s place was amazing. Even though they weren't able to be there due to a trip, they still followed through with the reservation and was great at communicating and following up before and after the stay. The loft was beautiful, clean, and had everything I needed. Definitely one of the best places to stay at in NYC. The only downside is that you will probably never want to live anywhere else ever again ;)

Rent this place!! I’ve never made a bad Airbnb experience this however was probably the best. 

Marcella’s place is close to the subway station and surrounded by numerous delis and restaurants. It’s a great stay for individuals or couples that come to explore the city. Moreover it is a comfortable retreat if you’re exhausted and tired. It’s clean, it’s beautifully decorated, it’s central, it’s neat, it’s perfect. 

Marcella is doing an awesome job as a host. 5 Stars everything. Top recommend

Marcella was very friendly and welcomed me even though my flight was delayed for 5hours and she had to wake up in the middle of night. 
The apartment is very hip, artsy and clean and have everything you need. They have cereals and breads/jams in the kitchen so that you can have them for breakfast. I’m super happy that I stayed at their apartment and I would definitely recommend this place for everyone!

I loved staying at this cozy loft. Marcella and Antonio do everything possible to make sure guests feel welcome and have all the necessary amenities. I would happily book again the next time I’m in town.

I enjoyed my stay at Marcella and António’s place. The house is very stylish, cozy and clean. I was welcomed very friendly by both of them and felt right at home. When I was there I was stuck inside because of a blizzard, but I enjoyed myself in my cozy room. I definitely recommend this place. 5 star location and hosts!

El espacio es increíble!

El decorado y la vibra del lugar te hacen sentir como en casa. Si es tu primera vez en la ciudad quedarte aquí te dará una experiencia muy diferente y única de NYC.
Super nice and stylish place! Everything is as described and the hosts are very friendly. They are very accomadating and warm. Wish I could've stayed longer in their beautiful home.

Marcella & António exceed their fantastic Airbnb reputation. The loft was beautiful, clean, and gave off an all-round vibe of inclusivity. Take the time to read their curated local tips! Their free brekkie and coffee made my trip run ridiculously smoothly. Thankyou to both of you!
Hands down the most stylish and cool Airbnb I've ever been in, and Marcella and Antonio were really friendly, helpful and great to chat to. I'll definitely be staying again next time I'm in New York!

Die Unterkunft ist genauso wie sie beschrieben wird. Die Kommunikation war sehr gut. Es gab ein gutes Frühstück und es war wirklich sauber. Es ist auch gut
mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen. Es war ein wirklich schöner Aufenthalt in einer besonderen Atmosphäre. Danke und LG Sabine
Beautiful place, great vibes & great hosts! The rest of Brooklyn and Manhattan are in easy reach for those looking to explore.

Marcella & António were hospital and available. The loft was clean, bright, large and warm. Sound does travel easily through the space so do be prepared to honor the quiet hours/be open to noises during the day. All in all a great stay!

Marcella and António’s place was wonderful, artsy and quiet. Make sure to read the disclaimer thoroughly. She likes to give her guest space. A lot of the answers to your questions are in the guidebook. It wasn’t my most exciting Airbnb experience but quiet was what I came for.

What an enchanting home. I left with decor ideas for my own house. Marcella and Antonio were communicative and helpful. They are extremely conscientious of making a clean, comfortable space for guests. The room was tiny, cozy and charmingly decorated. There are three guest rooms and thin walls, so it's pretty important you only book if you're interested in respecting the rules. I had a wonderful stay -- everyone there was mellow and sweet. I would definitely stay here on a return visit.

Their home is so welcoming! Breakfast provided to get you started with your day of travel. is Marcella & Antonio were clear about the do's and don'ts as well. You will totally have an enjoyable and relaxing time at their home.

Thanks to Marcella & Antonio for being such wonderful hosts. The Loft is certainly a very special and unique place that showcase the attention to details and care of the owners! Perfect place to spend my first ever visit to NY.
Marcella & António’s place is fantastic! Such a cool space and they are so accommodating. It was the perfect spot for me to sleep and recollect after exploring the city :)
It was my second time coming here, Marcella&Antonio are great hosts. Great place to stay in Brooklyn!
Beautiful place and amazing hosts :)
As advertised. Stylish place with a great value!

I had a lovely stay at the Funky Loft. I was in town for a work trip and booked a few extra days for myself - it was the perfect spot for a solo traveller, and definitely the best place I’ve stayed in New York.  The loft is beautiful and I loved the area - away from the intensity of Manhattan but with plenty to do and easily accessible. The loft’s guidebook has loads of local recommendations to explore.

Marcella was a lovely, warm host and provided all the info I needed. Be aware, it’s a tranquil space, so they are quite strict on noise and conversations at night and before 10am in the morning. The disclaimer is true - probably not the place to stay if you want to stay in drinking or if you’re on a group trip, but then again, it’s New York so you should probably be out experiencing the city anyway! Definitely recommend this place if you want to stay somewhere fun but peaceful.
Great place for anyone looking for a cozy, affordable, tasteful place to rest when visiting New York! Good vibes all around!

This is a great loft! The location is safe and convenient. The instructions are meticulously written out.  The place is super clean and a ton of fun visually. The bed was the most comfortable Air BnB bed I have ever stayed in.

I really enjoyed my stay at Marcella and Antonios apartment. They are super nice and the loft does look exactly like in the pictures. I can 100% recommend staying with them. I felt very comfortable and the area is pretty cool. I can recommend making a street art walking tour there!

The funky loft is a great place to stay in if you want to visit New York for a few days. Although the loft is located in Brooklyn, it is near J and M train and they can take you into Manhattan in approximately 30 minutes. Marcella and Antonio are great and accommodative hosts. They respond to messages in a short time and will give clear instructions on what to do and what not to do during your stay in their house. Actually, most of the rules are already on the Airbnb websites so be sure to check that out before you book with them. The loft itself is really cool. Its retro style aesthetic makes you feel like you are one of the talented young artist in New York!
Very comfortable and charming! They are so welcoming and friendly! Also not far from things to do. Would 100% recommend staying here.
Wonderful company, a beautiful space and fantastic location - what more could you want? I wouldn’t recommend any Airbnb higher.
Great hospitality, great tips and loved the cozy place.

Marcella's place was impeccable! I loved being there. You can tell  she put a lot of thought in whatever she was doing. There were little notes around the house and a guidebook should you have any questions. Everything was very clear and Marcella or Aria is always around by text or in person.  Being able to have breakfast in the morning before heading out was great. 

There are many shops nearby and the subway is near as well. The neighborhood felt safe and I had no problems when I was staying there. The floor creaks a little when you walk so I had to be careful especially in the night to prevent waking others. I definitely would stay there again!

This was the first time I had ever stayed in an Airbnb and I was blown away by the hospitality offered to me! With a welcoming atmosphere and a beautiful place to stay, it made the trip all the more better! Marcella and her boyfriend Antonio were very welcoming and helpful and kept the space very clean. The space was also in a great location, close to everything and with Marcella’s help she offers a list of so many things to do with your spare time from cafes to nightlife to hole in the wall places with amazing food. I will definitely be back to New York because of the good experience I had

Marcella & Tiffany’s place was like no other i have stayed in! Located in a quiet neighbourhood, just five minutes walk from the subway station, it was like a peaceful, hip oasis. Every corner of the house was thoughtfully done up, it was clean, trendy and had a very positive vibe. 
Tiffany received me and explained the house rules pretty well, so there wasn't much room for confusion or doubts during my two-day stay here. I really appreciated the fact that she was very particular about cleanliness and house rules. 
I would highly highly recommend this place. Look no further!

Thank you Marcella & Tiffany! 
I really enjoyed my stay! You two were great hosts! I loved the apartment and the surroundings! Definitely my recommendation, especially if you like Bushwick!!

I needed a last minute place to book for a weekend in NYC and found this beautiful place was available for only one night (exactly what I needed). I booked and communication about check-in and to address any concerns were almost immediately addressed. I was late for my check-in and tried to give as much notification about my ETA but NYC traffic was congested with many accidents that day. Be mindful, the hosts have to be home to check you in so try to pick a check-in time when you are sure you can be there. Despite my late arrival, they were very accommodating and I felt welcomed. I stayed in one room and mostly had the place to myself. I had never been in a shared Airbnb space but this one definitely set the bar high. The other guests were quiet and clean. Every inch of the home was photographable and well thought out. My only gripe was there were ants in the bedroom which I figured had to do with it being summertime. Given my schedule, I was not able to immediately notify Marcella and Tiffany about the ants. I enjoyed having breakfast tea in the morning and check-out easily. Overall, this was a great experience and I will definitely look into booking this place again.

There isn’t much to say that hasn’t already been said but THE HYPE IS ABSOLUTELY REAL. The location, the home, and the girls, are all so lovely and welcoming. I couldn’t have asked for a better first visit to New York. Have no doubts at all if you’re thinking of staying with them. Thank you two again :)

We really felt uncomfortable with the strange communication from a host we never met. Marcella seemed to play 'bad cop' to Tiffany's 'good cop' (other host, who lives there).  There seemed to be a long list of rules that weren't clear, and we weren't difficult or rule breaking guests at all, we incorrectly ate something out of the fridge and apologised and replaced with the exact products once we realised our mistake. 

My 16 year old son started to climb the fire escape ladder outside the building (no, perhaps not the best move, but not meant to disrupt) and set of an alert to the host who then sent an officious and quite unpleasant message - saying it was against the rules set out somewhere that I never saw. I of course apologised, but it was the way Marcella communicated that really made us feel uncomfortable for the rest of our stay. 

If you want butter on your toast as part of the supplied breakfast you'll need to buy your own. Kindly they supply cereal and bread and jam, milk and tea/coffee but strangely no butter. I asked kindly where it was and was told that in the USA it's not normal to have butter on your toast and they can't be expected to cater for weird customs of people from other cultures. Really? 

I think we were polite and cleaned up after ourselves and behaved nicely, but on the last morning at 8.05am I used the hairdryer in the bathroom and was reprimanded for being 'noisy' in 'quiet time'. Really? Most people on holiday want to be able to use a hairdryer during 'normal' waking hours. Perhaps the hosts should supply a quieter, higher quality dryer. 

Honestly the place looks super cute and is wonderfully eclectically styled but it is impractical - nowhere to hang clothes, no room for full sized suitcases in room, only one bedside table on each double bed and strangely pictures are hung on the walls behind the pillows - looks nice but when you sit up in bed you lean on a picture. We all found, and the other American guests who we met (the best part of our stay) did too, that there was a distinct lack of sincerity from the hosts, and to be honest did not feel particularly welcome. One of our party left before the 3 nights were up and we wished we hadn't made the booking. It felt all about the business/$$$ and not about warm and kind homey hosting and values.
The space is exactly as pictured. All the communications were crystal clear and the bed is very comfortable! The design is delightful.

Marcella and Tiffany’s loft is a beautiful space. It has a lovely communal area and quite private bedrooms so a good mix of socialising and relaxing. Their quiet time policy at night was very welcome after a busy day. They were perfect hosts: polite, professional and on hand with excellent tips about everything in NY. For staying in a trendy, well connected area with fellow travellers this is ideal!

Very cute loft, kind host(s) and overall a great experience! 

Only drawback is the neighborhood of the apartment (it’s safe but not particularly trendy), but the loft is close to several subways and buses so it’s not a problem
The view is amazing day and night. The plaza has a very nice common area overseeing the east river .
Most charming Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. Hosts are very attentive and detailed. Highly recommend!

This is a fantastic place to stay, great location, fabulous hosts, relaxed atmosphere, nice to able able to get breakfast before heading out for the day too. I couldn't fault it. Would love to come and stay again :D

The Funky Loft rocks! The people are so nice and accommodating, the loft is super cool and comfortable, and the location is pretty great. Bushwick is full of cool restaurants/coffee joints, great nightlife and character. Quick ride to Manhattan as well. Would definitely stay here again!

This place is amazing! It makes you feel at home like you’re going to your really cool grandmothers house  the location is perfect because it makes you feel like you’re a “local” walking to the subway and going to the cafes near by, I would definitely explore that area more! The room I had is cozy, might not be big but you don’t need much to be comfortable! If do like it to be super dark, I would suggest an eye mask. Marcella and Tiffany make everything really easy to navigate because they have so many good suggestions and they are great at communicating all the NYC things to the do’s and don’ts of the funky loft ✨ must check this place out!

The loft is nicely decorated, comfortable and nice exactly as shown in the photos. The room is gracious and has a very comfortable mattress of great size for one person. Marcella and Tiffany are experienced hostesses and know how to meet the guests needs, including additional amenities such as a guide with local tips and breakfast (simple but thoughtful and providential). The nearby area is not attractive but is safe and with easy access to three metro stations and bus lines. Marcella was traveling, so I was very well received by Tiffany who is a very kind, caring and interesting person. The only negatives were the proximity of the rooms without noise insulation and only have a single bathroom for everyone at the loft (which can reach six people with full house). Pay attention to the rules outlined in the announcement, including the possibility of on-site film and photo shoots, which may temporarily remove you from the location, usually during business hours (it was not a issue for me, since I would be out all day anyway, but may be for someone who needs or wants to use the space for any reason).
The funky loft is even better than you’d imagine. It’s in a great location, has fast WiFi, breakfast, cool decor and a swing! I loved it and you will too.
I stayed for 2 nights in this Bushwick loft on the way back from a conference. Great space, comfortable and clean, in a very convenient location in Brooklyn for exploration.

Marcella and Tifanny's apartment is very charming and beautifully decorated. The communication was prompt, precise and they were very accommodating. If you are looking for a place to stay in Brooklyn I can only recommend this place.
Marcella is a lovely person and an inspiring host in her own right :) Such a pleasure staying at her thoughtfully designed home! The place is absolutely beautiful! Highly recommended

As good as it gets. Stylish communal space, wonderful host. Enjoyed a great first night chatting with Tiffany + guests at the most majestically engineered dining table in the universe. Yes, there's rules that are visible and repeatedly articulated, but I saw it as a positive - you know where you stand, and it makes for a more peaceful and clear experience for all involved. Totally gorgeous space and a lucky last minute find. Thanks for having me legends!
Loved staying at the funky loft, all was perfection!

I really enjoyed the time at this lovely loft from Britna & Marcella. Pictures and description do what they promise. Its great to stay there. Bushwick is not only with its nice street art an upcoming district. And the subway is really closed to go to Brooklyn Heights or Mannhattan or wherever you want to go. Highly recommend.
You’ll love staying with these ladies! Great experience. They are so kind &  outgoing. Great recommendations!

This loft is the perfect Brooklyn statement. Lovely people, very clean and exceptionally cool: from the vintage artwork, retro chic kitchen, funky lighting and playful swing in the living room. I absolutely recommend staying at Marcella & Britna's loft if you want a truly Brooklyn experience.

Yes, this place is fantastic as it seems. Even the most hidden corner is pretty, the bed is amazing, it's quiet (really! you'll wake up to birds singing in the morning!) but still very convenient with several subway stations nearby. And then there's the lovely hosts. Communication has been great - both before, during and after my stay. The Funky Loft really felt like home during my stay in New York.

The reviews speak for themselves, the loft is an amazing place to stay in New York - I didn't get to meet Marcella as she was away but Britna was such a lovely host, great communication even when my flight was delayed and I had to change my check in time, and even made sure there was English Breakfast Tea for me which made this Brit very happy.

the loft is as cool as it looks on the pictures, it's easy to get to from JFK and easy to get into Manhattan on the subway (look out for the great view from Williamsburg Bridge!) would recommend to anyone.

I was completely wowed from the moment I walked in! The loft is exactly as magical as it looks in the pictures - a creative’s Heaven. Britna checked me in and immediately made me feel at home! We ended up hanging out and baking together and the other guests were really nice as well. I loved every moment I got to spend here and I know you will too!
A great place with really nice hosts. Close to some cool places and quick transport to the city
great place, nice hosts
Super friendly, cosy and cute decor. Beautifully thought out place with personal touches and very attentive hosting. Didn’t want to leave!
I had a great time by Marcella &Britna. The Loft is spacious with a very nice design. I will definitely recommended it!!

If you are in New York but doesn't want to stay too close to town and okay with a quiet neighbourhood, then this is ur best bet. Britna hosted me when I was there, and I can tell you she was really lovely and helpful. She would make sure you are well briefed if the space so everyone will make the stay there pleasant. The home of Marcella and Britna is just beautiful. Every corner is artsy and comfy to your eyes. If you are going to be in NYC for a short stay, definitely consider their home. The recommended places by the host was great to. The Bushwick neighbourhood is definitely worth exploring. Travelling is easy, their home is just a 7min walk from the train stn and also the stn is well connected to the airport. If you want to have a nice place to photos and feed ur insta, then this is ur home.

10/10 in everything u want of an airbnb.
So cute and comfy! Thanks guys!

Had a wonderful experience at “The Funky Loft”. Check-in, check out and cleanliness better than most hotels. Overall it was nice to have busy days in NYC and then retreat back to the chic, cozy Loft ( ~35 minute commute to Manhattan). Plus Britna and Marcella supply a folder full of local recommendations and breakfast daily. 100 recommend.

I can't recommend this place enough! Everything is just as it looks in the photos. The flat is cozy, comfortable, and charming. Marcella and Britna are excellent hosts. They are easy to get in touch with and quick to respond. The check-in and out process is flexible and easy. Though the room is small, it's got everything you might need – a place to hang your clothes, room to store your luggage, a small table and chair, and a comfy bed with ample space for items you might need nearby at night (water or a book). Their place is conveniently located a few blocks from the M and J subway lines, making travel into the city easy. The breakfast in the morning is simple but nice to have if you want to have a small bite while planning your day. Can't think of anything that needs improvement, and I hope to stay here again!

Marcella & Britna were incredible! From the start, communication was incredibly strong and responsive with each of them and they went above and beyond to ensure that any questions I may have had were answered.

Their home is absolutely gorgeous, sparkling clean, and so conveniently located to many of Bushwick’s charming locations! I planned my stay around a concert I attended at the venue Elsewhere, which was a brief 20 minute walk away. 

The neighborhood has plenty of local shops and restaurants, and their loft is a quick walk from the Myrtle Avenue subway station. 

Britna greeted me and did a really wonderful job of making me feel right at home and welcomed. I only stayed for one night, but their home was adorably decorated and a dream loft, especially for any artist! The details in all their styling were beautiful and they provided  breakfast and great local tips. The value of this Airbnb is beyond incredible! And staying while other guests were present was a really cool experience! I couldn’t have asked for a better stay! I absolutely loved my stay at the Funky Loft :)

Beautiful, stylish loft. Close to the L, M, and J line. There is one bathroom for everyone, but it works out as we all have different schedules. Marcella and Britna were very hospitable and made sure I was comfortable during my entire stay. Love the breakfast in the morning :) Would totally come back!
Hosts we great at communicating before and during my trip! Shared communal spare was cool, clean & tidy!

I had a fantastic time! A perfect Brooklyn loft. Great hospitality, stylish loft, cozy space, easy check in, and great tips of getting around the area and places to try. I would 100% stay again its just a slightly long commute to Manhattan, but doable! You wont regret staying here. Thanks again!

Wonderful, wonderful place. It truly IS a loft, with a ton of space and light, and amazing touches. The hostess is wonderful, and the amenities are all-encompassing. Fast internet too. Really great place overall.

Marcella &Britna are very warm-hearted hosts. For its my first airbnb experience,I communicated with Marcella at very beginning from I plan my trip till arrived NYC. They feedback quickly and checked me in on time that helped me a lot.
The whole check-in and check-out progress are easy and effective.

L train central ave station is only 5 mins walk distance.Commute is convenience,30 mins can arrive Manhattan. Also can take lyft abt 15-17usd  to battery park.

The neighborhood is quite.I always wake up at very earlier morning and can hears the bird singing, very interesting.

The deco like the photos shows..

And Marcella team have sufficient experience to run the b&b

If u want to explore the different area of NYC,recommend Marcella’s place.

Much appreciated to Marcella’s team to host me during my stay

Wish good very luck in 2019
Best place to stay in NYC, home away from home.

Staying at Marcella’s loft added so much to my experience in New York. Considering how tight most spaces are, you get to live like a king/queen for a fraction of the cost. The home environment makes it even better because you truly do feel at home. You are walking distance away from amazing night life venues, restaurants, and transportation hubs. You really can’t ask for my much more. You will be very happy you chose to stay here :)

Le loft est exactement comme sur les photos très lumineux et design. Marcella était hors de la ville mais ultra disponible pour moi par message à chaque moment et son amie Connor était adorable. J’ai pu échanger avec les autres guests. C’est une très bonne alternative quand on voyage seule  Je recommande

Marcella is a great host and I felt most comfortable while staying at her place. Great communication and check in experience, I’d recommend this place to any person visiting NYC. This place is perfect for all Brooklyn exploration. Close to J line with direct connection to JFK and Manhattan. Nothing negative to say really, all good vibes :)

Hi future travelers!

When you are out looking for the best Airbnb to stay in at Brooklyn this is definitely the place to be,  so look no further and just BOOK IT!

Why?
This was my first time booking an Airbnb and I am definitely ruined for life when looking for my next Airbnb haha because I can not even imagine finding a better Airbnb than this one that I have stayed in!

Location: 
The location is quite central and easy to reach. There are several public transportation options like the Subway J line and M line- I think the M line (stop Central Av) was definitely the closest. Just a few minutes walking from the station to the loft. There are plenty of options for food and grocery stores in walking distance from the loft.  

Check in + Hosts: 
The check-in was very smoothly and Marcella explained everything in full, giving me the grand tour of the loft, explaining everything well and showing me the big book of information. This book has all the essential information about the loft (address, entrance code- currently the loft works with a code and not with keys) and other important information. Also you can find great hotspot and restaurant reviews, where to go to for medical assistance if needed, how to get around in Brooklyn etc. It is a very well organised book full of information. If you have any other questions both Marcella and Maya are there to help you. I have had the pleasure to meet them both and they are just cool chicks who are super kind and will do their best to make you feel at home.

The loft:
The loft has 3 rooms that are available for guests. I have stayed in the 'single room' - a very pretty decorated room with colored skylights and a 1 pers. bed. The bed was lifted so you could put your suitcases under the bed if needed, there was a mirror, perfect to do your hair + make up, a heater (as is in all the rooms as I understood) and a decorative small table and chair. When I read previous reviews I read that the room was 'quite small' - but I was actually surprised by the size and it was bigger than I thought. Yes, it is not the big or biggest room in the loft but when you are traveling solo it is more than enough. You are out most of the days anyways and if you want to hang in a 'bigger space' just enjoy the swing or very comfy couch. Oh, and the bed in the room was very comfy as well, the bedding was super clean and the room was very clean when I arrived too.

Cool features: 
It is perfect to take tons of pictures. The swing is a big eye catcher but also the cool colored kitchen with blue cabinets (at the time I'm writing this, not sure it will change in the future) the big red coca cola fridge and even a piano. The loft is so creatively decorated and is just a fun place to be where you immediately will feel at home.

Other things worth mentioning + overall opinion.
The bathroom is being kept very clean too and the kitschy wallpaper and design is just fun. Currently, there is a breakfast being served between 7 AM - 11 AM. As they mention themselves it is 'pretty basic' but in all honesty, Airbnb hosts don't even have to provide you with anything so this is just a cool extra. When I was staying there, there were 2 options of cereal (jummy!) and oats to make oatmeal (if I remember correctly). It is nice that when you wake up you can have a nice bowl of cereal with your cup of tea (tea is also offered for guests so you can make your own cup in the morning to enjoy while swinging on the swing or relaxing on the couch :))

I loved the loft. It was a very nice experience and both hosts were super kind. It is everything I expected and more and I will definitely book the loft again if I have the chance in the future.  Also, maybe important for those that want to know: The WiFi works super fast and perefctly in each part of the loft. So when it is rainy and you want to Netflix that is definitely not a problem.

Again, just book it! Just do it! You won't regret it!
Stylish, roomy and good location for solo traveler. Good local tips on the area and easy access to train into the city. Very quiet in the evening which is also nice. Would stay again!
lovely place, lovely hosts

When I arrived I got a warm welcome from Maya. She gave me the tour and all the info that I needed to get around in the neighbourhood. I loved the warm and feel at home vibe of the AirBnb. Big plus for the breakfast!

Marcella and Maya were lovely hosts and a special thanks to Olivia who helped me with everything while Maya and Marcella were at work.

This space is really neat and stylish of a cool and eclectic way. The space is really clean and quiet.  It was super close to my friend I was visiting in Bushwick so perfect for me.   

It’s also not far from an organic grocery store.  

I’d stay again! Great value and charm

Marcella and Maya’s place is amazing. It’s even prettier than in the photos. The apartment and the room was super clean, and my bed was very comfortable too. The house wasn’t hard to find given the detailed instructions. Getting to Manhattan/rest of Brooklyn was also very convenient with the M train. Overall a great stay!
nice space

name: Apartamento T1 Kit
summary: Apartamento com 47m2, boa localização, silenciosa e de construção recente. A sala está junta com a cozinha e o quarto de casal é espaçoso. A decoração é simples e moderna com todas as comodidades.
description: Apartamento com 47m2, boa localização, silenciosa e de construção recente. A sala está junta com a cozinha e o quarto de casal é espaçoso. A decoração é simples e moderna com todas as comodidades. A todo o apartamento. Deixo todos os electrodomésticos, os meus livros, cd´s de música, DVD´s de filmes, produtos de higiene pessoal e de limpeza. A 10 minutos da estação central de comboios. A 5 minutos duma estação de metro e a 1 minuto de autocarros para a baixa da cidade. A pé demora pouco mais de 10 minutos a chegar à baixa!
transit: A 10 minutos da estação central de comboios. A 5 minutos duma estação de metro e a 1 minuto de autocarros para a baixa da cidade. A pé demora pouco mais de 10 minutos a chegar à baixa!
access: A todo o apartamento. Deixo todos os electrodomésticos, os meus livros, cd´s de música, DVD´s de filmes, produtos de higiene pessoal e de limpeza.
house_rules: Fazer a separação de lixo orgânico do restante; não deixar cabelos no ralo da banheira; restos de comida no ralo da banca, deixar a louça lavada e o fogão limpo

host.host_about: Sou honesta, frontal, leal, exigente, organizada

reviews.comments: Un grand merci à Marta pour son accueil... dès la sortie du métro pour nous guider et avec des gourmandises qui nous attendaient! L'appartement est parfait pour un couple, suffisamment proche du métro et vraiment calme. Quelques commerces à proximité, suffisamment pour découvrir quelques spécialités et faire les premières courses. L'appartement de Marta a contribué à nous faire passer de très bonnes vacances! Notre première évasion avec Airbnb est une bonne expérience!

Marta es encantadora y disponible para cualquier cosa que se necesite. Los horarios de entrada y salida flexibles, poniéndote de acuerdo con ella. El apartamento muy bonito, tranquilo y limpio. Literalmente "como si estuvieras en su casa". Comida para salir del paso el día que llegas. Internet Wifi que funciona perfectamente. Tiene parada de autobús a unos 200 metros y la parada del metro Campo 24 agosto a menos de un kilómetro, a poca distancia más se encuentra la estación del tren Porto Campahã, es decir, apartamento muy bien comunicado sin estar en el centro. Supermercado Lidl a unos 600 metros. Desde luego que repetiría el alojamiento con Marta. Un beso desde Vigo.

Marta is a great host. I was lost and she came to the gas station near her place and I followed her. Her apt is nice and has parking. It is near a metro staton but if you rent a car get GPS. Porto streets can be confusing.

Het appartement van Marta was een prima uitvalsbasis voor de binnenstad van Porto. Mooi schoon, groter dan ik had gedacht, en alles bij de hand. De auto kon gratis voor de deur en je loopt in 20 minuten de stad in. Wifi prima, en ontbijt ook goed, niet uitgebreid maar wel voldoende. Een prima plek!
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Merci Marta pour ce magnifique logement.Il y avait tout dans l'appartement.Les bus sont a coté et le métro n'est vraiment pas tres loin.
Nous vous recommandons ce logement.Marta est tres sympathique.ON a tout aimé. Le calme malgré le cri des mouettes.

Martha made us feel very welcome in her appartment. She had done some shopping for us and told us about Porto and it's possibilities. The appartment is very complete and comfortable and close to buses, metro and shops. A good place to stay with a homely atmosphere.

The apartment was really confy and super clean. At night it is very quiet. Heating system (very useful in the winter). 10-15 minutes walking to the nearest metro station. Marta was very friendly. Would recommand it !

Marta is very welcoming and helpful host ! 
The flat is located in a quiet neighborhood with many buses (3 min walk from the flat) which take you directly to the city center within 5-10min. 
Inside the flat there is a fully equipped kitchen opened on a cosy living-dining room, and there is 
a large bedroom.
There is heating in the flat and it is great in winter. 
We're very pleased with our stay in Porto and had a great time! we recommend Marta's place.

Marta's lovely apartment was a home away from home with everything you could need. It was a great base to explore Porto with affordable local cafes and restaurants just down the road and downtown only a short walk away.  Marta was helpful and friendly too.

El apartamento está en perfecto estado, muy limpio y ordenado.  Está a 15 minutos andando del centro y muy cerca del metro, cerca de la casa hay varias pastelerias y cafeterias donde desayunar y hay tiendas de fruta y bebidas en los alrededores.

Marta es muy amable, nos trajo panecillos, algo de fruta y comida, etc... También nos informó de donde ir en Oporto y nos facilitó un mapa. Es encantadora y nos facilitó las cosas en todo momento.

Marta a été une hôte d'une gentillesse et d'une hospitalité parfaite! Elle a su nous mettre à l'aise, nous conseiller sur les bons restaurants à tester et nous a même offert quelques spécialités locales à déguster! Nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous dans cet appartement, spacieux et lumineux, parfait pour un couple et très bien équipé. Le quartier est extrêmement calme, à proximité des transports et mène directement au centre ville. Je recommande sans hésitation!

Lovely experience for our 1st time with airbnb! Marta has been a wonderful host, she gave us advices about where to go and what to see; she offered us local wine and beers to try; and she provided everything one could need in a apartment. The place is well located, 10 minutes walking from a metro station. Thank you again!

Estuvimos varios días en el piso y tiene todo lo necesario para hacer vida en el piso, tiene un baño grande y un salon con tv, todo muy limpio, también tiene una plaza de garaje. ¡Si volviese repetiría!
 Ella es una gran anfitriona, nos recibió con pan y fruta, lo cual agradecimos después de las horas de viaje, también nos dio un plano de la ciudad y nos dio unos consejos muy buenos. 
El piso queda cerca de la estación de tren de campanha que son los trenes q van a la playa.

Superbe séjour. Marta nous a chaleureusement accueillis et a été attentionnée et disponible. Le quartier est calme, à 10-15 minutes du centre historique. L'appartement est pratique, bien équipé, propre, avec une chambre spacieuse. 
Nous recommandons donc sans aucune réserve l'appartement de Marta et encore une fois merci à elle pour sa gentillesse.

Very comfortable place with a welcoming host in a good location. Quiet neighbourhood and description of the apartment is really accurate: Clean, incredibly well equipped and very comfortable.  
A wonderful experience, we will repeat for sure!

The apartment is perfect for a relaxing stay in Porto, it has everything you need, it's very quiet and comfortable. In the area you can find several cafes and shops with local prices. You can walk easily to the old town and to the river. If you are too lazy to walk back uphill you can take a Taxi from the river home for around 5 Euro. 

Marta is a great host and provided us with fruits and food in the fridge and a nice bottle of wine. We felt very much at home there :) Very recommend.

The apartment was just as described. Very comfortable and clean, close to the city center (about 15 min walk). It was perfect to discover Porto.
Marta welcomed us very well. She was very kind, she gave us advices and tips for our stay about what to visit, ... 
I highly recommand !

Marta was a great host ! We felt like home and she always was present to give us informations, advices or if we needed help. Her flat is cosy and quiet, not far away from the city center, you can join it in 10 minutes by metro. Moreover, there's a direct metro line from the airport so it's practical if you come to Porto by plane. I recommand it for couples or friends.

We stayed in the apartmentl six nights. The apartment was clean and pleasant and looked better than in pictures. Marta was very friendly and helpful.
The location is very good, and we could walk to the center easily(15 min to city center). We did not have a car so I don't know about parking arrangements there.

Great communication with Marta prior to our arrival. Upon arrival, check in was smooth, with Marta providing lots of suggestions for sightseeing and restaurants. The apartment is very comfortable with everything you might find at home. It's very clean and well maintained. The neighborhood is quiet and uphill from most sights. We really enjoyed our stay here.

Marta est une hôte très accueillante et très serviable. Elle est venu nous chercher dès notre arrivé à la station de métro afin de nous aider à transporter nos bagages ce qui était vraiment très sympa.  Son appartement est parfait pour un couple. Il est situé pas très loin du centre (30min à pied/5min en métro) et du métro (10min à pied). Nous avons fortement apprécier cette hôte. De plus une bouteille de vin local nous attendais sur la table pour nous souhaiter la bienvenu.

En bref, appartement géniale et hôte très sympathique.

Marta a été superbe avec nous , elle a dû nous attendre plus longtemps que prévu car la récupération de la voiture à l'aéroport a duré plus longtemps que prévu.
Elle nous a offert une bouteille de vin pour goûter le vin de Porto et nous a laissé des plans de la ville et du métro pour nous y retrouver. Elle a également pris le temps de nous expliquer où aller et que visiter.
L'appartement est très propre et on entend pas les voisins.
Elle a également mis sa salle de bain à disposition avec savon et shampoing si nécessaire.
À refaire on referait, merci à Marta pour sa gentillesse
Alles war gut. Vielen Dank für hilfreiche Information.

Marta nous a très gentiment accueilli et conseillé. Elle avait prévu tout le nécessaire pour le petit déjeuner et plus . . .
Elle a décoré son appartement avec goût, en professionnelle de la décoration.
Le quartier présente l'avantage d'être à quelques minutes du centre tout en bénéficiant d'un calme absolu et d'un parking privé ou , sans problème, dans la rue.
Merci Marta.

Fomos muito bem recebidos e com dicas de turismo (mapas e folhetos) mudo adequados. O apartamento nos pareceu melhor ao vivo do que pelas fotos, muito limpo, espaçoso e silencioso. Marta nos fez sentir em casa, sendo uma ótima anfitriã. Indicamos para todos,  5 estrelas.

Nous avons été très gentiment accueillis par Martha malgré notre retard. Son appartement est parfait pour un séjour de quelques jours à Porto : Idéalement placé (10-15 minutes à pieds du centre historique et 5 minutes du métro) et parfaitement équipé. Nous recommandons ! Merci Martha !

Es un apartamento genial, estuviemos 4 dias y tiene absolutamente de todo lo que puedas necesitar, barrio muy tranquilo y a escasos 15/20 minutos del centro caminando, esta mucho mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos y en la descripcion, la anfitriona muy buena.

Marta's apartment is one of the very best we ever stayed at through AirBNB. It is spacious, cozy and decorated in unusually good taste, and gets lots of pleasant sunshine in the afternoon. It is also fully equipped for basically anything you might want to do during your stay, including cooking and washing clothes. Marta received us with tips and a much appreciated bottle of Portuguese wine, and she also told us we could listen to her CD collection, which we did because she happens to have good taste for music, too. The apartment is located in a residential area, with a supermarket, a drugstore and a few local restaurants and cafés nearby. The supermarket, in particular, is very closely located, and a short walk will take you to the nearest metro station. The neighborhood is very calm and silent: the nearby church bells tolls between 7 AM and 10 PM, but during the silent hours sleep quality is excellent. The bed was also unusually good and comfortable. We would recommend her apartment and would consider renting it again in a future visit to Porto!

Marta nos dio la bienvenida con una botella de vino y algo de comer. La casa es mucho más acogedora que en las fotos. Está situada a 10-15 minutos del centro andando, en una zona muy tranquila. La casa dispone de todo lo necesario para hacer la estancia más cómoda. Como puntos negativos: poca iluminación en el salón  y que la alcachofa de la ducha no se pudiera colgar.... pero si esto es lo negativo todo lo demás es perfecto! Una casa limpia y ordenada donde sin duda nos volveríamos a alojar
Marta a été très gentille et accueillante. Le logement était impeccable. L'appartement est dans un quartier très calme ou l'on peut circuler facilement à pieds ou en transport en commun.
It was just as described, very clean and cosy. Marta was friendly and helped us finding restaurants and shops nearby. Would definitely recommend it.

Cuando llegamos al apartamento nos sorprendió para bien. Tiene todo lo necesario para estar unos dias. Marta es muy simpática y dispuesta a explicar todo lo que necesites. Todo lo que habia se podia usar o comer. Esta bien comunicado con metro o buses. El único pero es que la cama no es cómoda... se clavan los muelles... la ducha tampoco se podia colgar... 
por lo demas todo muy bien
A

A Marta é uma pessoa espetacular, muito prestavel e que nos recebeu lindamente. O apartamento é muito acolhedor, muito organizado e muito limpinho. Não tenho nada de mau apontar mas sim esperar que quando voltar consiga repetir a  experiência. A localização é fantástica, numa zona calma e vizinhos muito simpáticos. Supermercado a 5 minutos. Raramente utilizei o metro, da para ir a pé até ao centro! Gostei muito, só tenho a gabar a hospitalidade da Marta.

Marta ha sido muy amable y educada. Una anfitriona perfecta. Cuento los días para volver a su preciosa ciudad. La casa ha sido literalmente un remanso de paz, cerca del centro en un agradable paseo. Una buena forma de conocer oporto.

name: Duplex apartment with garden
summary: Duplex apartment in townhouse. A total of 2000 sqf, stunning Victorian style apartment with a beautiful 1000 sqf garden. 1 block from Central park , 4 blocks from the subway/metro. Washer, dryer, tv, AC's. Legal Airbnb rental. Two family units are exempt from NYS restrictions on Airbnb apartment rentals.
space: There are 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the garden level and a living room, kitchen and separate dining room in the upper floor.  In the living room is a Steinway grand piano, and a comfortable convertible sofa. Each floor is 1000 square feet.  A 1000 square foot garden with a gazebo, furniture and plantings is off the garden-level floor. This a beautiful apartment  situated in a historic brownstone on the Upper West Side. Its gorgeous private garden was recently redesigned and planted by an excellent landscape architect.  There is a washer, dryer, ironing board and iron within the unit. We have a twin mattress available in the laundry room which can be brought upstairs and a double electric air mattress in one of the closets.
description: Duplex apartment in townhouse. A total of 2000 sqf, stunning Victorian style apartment with a beautiful 1000 sqf garden. 1 block from Central park , 4 blocks from the subway/metro. Washer, dryer, tv, AC's. Legal Airbnb rental. Two family units are exempt from NYS restrictions on Airbnb apartment rentals. There are 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the garden level and a living room, kitchen and separate dining room in the upper floor.  In the living room is a Steinway grand piano, and a comfortable convertible sofa. Each floor is 1000 square feet.  A 1000 square foot garden with a gazebo, furniture and plantings is off the garden-level floor. This a beautiful apartment  situated in a historic brownstone on the Upper West Side. Its gorgeous private garden was recently redesigned and planted by an excellent landscape architect.  There is a washer, dryer, ironing board and iron within the unit. We have a twin mattress available in the laundry room which can be brought upstairs and a double el
neighborhood_overview: This a family-friendly neighborhood, with tons of kids and schools around, and two playgrounds within a 3-minute walk. It is also a good base to explore the nightlife of Manhattan downtown. It has two major subway lines (the 1,2,3 and the B and C) within a five minute walk. It is less than a 30-minute walk from the Metropolitan, Natural History, Guggenheim and other museums.
notes: We have a detailed memorandum for guests that you will be able to read after you book your stay.
transit: The subway is 4 blocks away, with stations at 88th and Central Park West ( the 86th Street stop on the A and C) and at 93rd and Broadway (the 96th Street stop for the 1, 2, and 3 trains). There are buses on Central Park West, Columbus, Amsterdam and Broadway. Citibike has a platform on 88th and Central Park West. There is a parking garage on our block.
access: The entire two bedroom, two bathroom apartment, grand piano in the living room, and sole access to the 1000 square foot garden. Note, we have large screen tv’s in  the bedrooms with Netflix and Pandora and a washer and dryer in the  fully stocked laundry room in the basement.
interaction: We try to be available almost all the time. We usually succeed and when we're high in the Himalayas, and off the grid, Margo, in California, covers for us and Domingo, our wonderful super, who lives and works next door, is always helpful.
house_rules: Please be kind and cheerful and enjoy yourselves. We love kids, but please no ball playing or darts in the house! There are stairs in the house, so you have to watch your young crawlers as there are no stair gates installed. Also, windows should be opened from the top only if there are young children. There are screens but no grates on the windows. Please treat the antique  furniture and paintings with the respect they so much deserve. We always try to accommodate early arrivals and late departures but it is a balancing act for us and we may ask you to accommodate our needs to clean the apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a psychologist and my husband is an investment manager. We live in this house most of the year but also spend a lot of time in California. I'm born and raised in New York, and have two grown up daughters. One of them lives in India and we spend a lot of time there. We're involved in the arts, politics and nonprofit world in New York, and also love to go the 'life long learning' classes of our college, Swarthmore.

reviews.comments: While I personally did not stay at Francesca's residence, I arrange for visitors' accommodations when they visit our offices. Francesca was very responsive and kind when making the last minute booking and was kind enough to let us extend our booking. Our freelancer was pleased with the accommodations and had no complaints about the apartment, I would definitely book with Francesca again, she made the process so easy.
The host communicated well in arranging access to the apartment at a late arrival time.  The apartment is in a wonderful location, spaceous and very secure and quiet.
Francesca and Jack are wonderful hosts. The apartment is spacious, meticulously clean, gorgeous and wonderfully situated.
Wonderful two story garden apartment on the Upper West Side.  Our hosts Francesca and John were extremely accommodating.  Perfect apartment for families!

Amazing space, but a little too quirky for our taste. Jack was very helpful bùt we did not see much of him.
The location near Central Park was great, especially in those fabulous spring  days. A long way from the action however.
Expensive, for what we got.
A good introduction to the upper Westside!

Our host met two of us and was helpful in showing us the bedrooms , closets, wc's, and all other rooms and laundry that could be used.  However, I feel a more thorough walk through might have been necessary for example explaining why some linens were not up to par or lamoshade alltorn up or any furniture which might be susceptible to damage etc 
I think our host needs to hire and monitor a better cleaning service however. The 1 tub was very dirty with moldy shower curtain and soap with hair on it the one bedroom had a child's sock and underwear under the bed and also very many dust bunnies. The washer worked but she asked we not change water hot/ cold level cause it was not working well. 

Our host was helpful, there were staples to use for breakfast but also the electric coffee maker was moldy and not cleaned 
The Internet pw's were hand written not typed and it was difficult to decipher . She also left her museum entry cards for our use which was very nice of her . Her telephone line was ringing downstairs to our unit which was a little annoying.

Francesca's home is perfect for a New York visit. It is warm, beautiful, spacious and located in the very best part of Manhattan. The listing is completely accurate. The house is amazing--a real bit of old New York that is not so easy to find anymore. You are steps from Central Park's reservoir, a 15 minute walk to the MET Museum and right on the subway line that takes you wherever you need to go. Francesca and Jack responded to our every need. They are perfect hosts. We will be staying there again. Highest rating.

Jack and Francesca were friendly, always communicative, readily available and very welcoming hosts.  The apartment was large, with a very welcome private garden at the back, in very fine decorative order and spacious of course. Air conditioning throughout was powerfully effective, useful given the high humidity for the time of year.

Jack and Francesca kindly stocked the kitchen with plenty of useful comestibles (wine, coffee and several mornings' worth of breakfast being the most important!) and Jack in particular was very helpful in providing advice for the local area and advising on entrance to several of New York's museums.  

Their Upper West Side neighbourhood is as they described it, smart, safe and convenient, with everything you'd need either a 10 minute walk or a 10 min cab ride, or anything in between. The part of Central Park that's closest by, right over Central Park West, is also lovely.  

I'd be delighted to book with them again the next time I expect to be in New York.

Francesca made us feel very welcome in this amazing duplex. She had left thoughtful groceries for our arrival and had written up some helpful local information. We particularly liked breakfasting in the garden, the proximity to Central Park and the range of pleasant eateries around about. Francesca was also helpful, allowing us to stay a little later as our flight was in the evening. All this and easy access to all the sights made our  stay in New York fantastic.
Great location. We will be back.

The apartment is in a wonderful position, 500 meters from the reservoir running track in Central Park, near 2 stops of the subway covering 4 different lines. We enjoyed our stay and the hosts are very kind and always available for any help or need.

We stayed at Francesca's apartment in August. Altough the hosts were not in town they organised an easy systsm the pick up the keys and in the apartment  there was a very comprehensive list of information about the house and the  neighbourhood.  On the first night we had some problems with the air conditioning but the host was able to have it repaired the day after. 
By way of summary the experience was positive: the apartment is big, clean, well organised and in a very good position to visit the city. Francesca is a very kind and helpful host.
Fabulosa la casa, cómoda y bien ubicada. Francesca y Jack encantadores, fue un placer.

Francesca was there when we arrived. Apartment was not quite ready. Apartment shabby. Far too shabby. Very poor internet. Dirty bed linen. Noisy air conditioning. Out dated kitchen equipment. Only one tv which was in the second bedroom! 14 cockroaches killed in 6 days. Bugs and spiders everywhere. No keys to lock main bedroom door to the garden. This is hugely dangerous. Single bed in second bedroom. Poor security main door. Broken light bulbs all over the apartment

My husband, parents, and I had a wonderful experience with Francesca's apartment. In Francesca's absence, Cedric was very helpful during our stay when we had questions about or minor problems with the apartment. When Cedric was unavailable, Domingo was available to help. There was always someone available if we had questions, and that was comforting. 

We loved the atmosphere and location, and would definitely stay here again. The apartment was clean, and had everything we needed for our stay. The lights were a little tricky, and the wi-fi was a bit spotty, but those were only minor inconveniences. 

Francesca's apartment provided us with a unique and comfortable experience that we would definitely want to experience again. Thank you, Francesca, Cedric, and Domingo!
The description was accurate but the unit should be updated.

Apartment was exactly as described and pictures accurate...great apartment and location!  Right near Central Park, train, shopping and restaurants...great neighborhood!  All communication was perfect!  Classic brownstone letting us experience NYC how it was meant to be!  Hope to be back!

What a lovely place to spend a few days "living like a local!" This was a real treat for our family -- we were able to enjoy the Upper West Side and Central Park during Thanksgiving week. Francesca's apartment is a lovely and unique place, very comfortable and spacious for our family of five.

This apartment is very charming and our group enjoyed the classic feel of the place. We were able to comfortably sleep a group of 6. The street is very quiet. Subway access is about two blocks away and there are many stores and restaurants within walking distance along Columbus. The closeness to Central Park was a definite plus, it was nice to walk through to and from the museums on the East side; like a calm to contrast a busy day of exploring. We would definitely stay here again.

This apartment is perfect for two couples.  We had plenty of space - lots of storage to unpack in the bedrooms, large comfortable common rooms to hang out in and a beautiful back yard - a rarity in NYC!  
We had a little trouble with the lock box (which was user error on my part) to get the key and the hosts were super responsive - they were on the phone with me the whole time and alerting the local caretaker to let us in etc.  The apartment is clean and well appointed and the location is wonderful - only 1 block from the park and a few more blocks from the subway.  Highly recommend!

Wir haben insgesamt 4 Wochen dort gewohnt. Es gibt riesig viel Platz( wir waren 5 Personen), die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet, Waschmaschine und Trockner stehen zur Verfügung, selbst Shampoo war vorhanden. Die Kommunikation mit Francesca hat sehr gut funktioniert, wir hatten es sehr nah zum Central Park und die Straße war sehr ruhig und sicher. Leider ist die Wohnung ( im Winter) sehr dunkel und es war auch zeitweise etwas zu kalt. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Restaurants sind um die Ecke, mit dem Taxi zum Lincoln Center dauert Ca. 10-15 Minuten. Es war eine tolle Zeit!Herzlichen Dank!!!

Appartement très spacieux, tout à fait conforme à la description et aux photos, idéalement situé ( park, métro, bus, restaus, commerces...) dans une rue très très calme. Hôte à l'écoute, réactive et facilitant au maximum le séjour. Notre séjour à New-York a été du coup particulièrement réussi. Nous le  recommandons vivement, et n'avons qu'une envie: y revenir !!!!
If you really want the upper New York brownstone experience this is it.  We really felt safe and there was lots of room to hang out with friends in the living room and large patio in the back.
Very good geographical location, in an apartment full of antiquities, charming, with trope-l´oeil ceilings! incredible!!

We loved our stay in Francesca's apartment.  We are a family of four: me, wife, and two boys ages 3 and 7 and we just spent there.  We wanted some space to spread out and this place worked out great for us. There was plenty of space for us, the dining and living rooms upstairs were lovely, and we even had dinner in the garden a few times.  It's an old (but well maintained) and charming place with a lot of character - something we explicitly prefer to a cookie-cutter type of new apartment.

Location is fantastic - two minutes from Central Park, five minutes to lots of restaurants on Amsterdam etc.  

Francesca was very welcoming and left information and checked in during our stay so we felt well supported in the event we needed any help.
Francesca的房子实在是太棒了!除了感受它的古典气息外,还能享受其优越的地理位置所带来的现代交通的便利｡强烈推荐给喜欢家庭式旅行的朋友们｡

Francesca's house is a hidden gem.  "Literally".  Only 50 meters from the Central Park (we ran there almost every day), in a super quiet residential area (our girls were thrilled to come back from our excursions to Broadway, Chinatown, Times Square, etc to "home"), with friendly neighbors, great nearby restaurants and a Whole Foods just 6 blocks away. 
The house is decorated very classy with antiquities and great taste. 
We enjoyed plenty the garden where we used to have dinner.  It has a comfortable porche and nice trees. 

My family and I cannot be more pleased to have stayed at Francesca's place and would recommend it without hesitation to anyone who wants to discover the "real" NY staying among locals while doing the tours each day. 

It's also only few blocks away from the Hudson River park.  If you are a runner, I bet there is not a better spot!!

Perfect location. Exceeds expectations. Easy access to metro and buses. Central Park on your doorstep. Away from the noise of downtown.
Nice a spacious.
Very safe area and easy access to anywhere you wanted to go

This was perfect for my Bday trip to NYC! The apt. is just as the pictures and listing describe! The street is very quiet which was a nice change from the busy streets/noise of DT. It was just steps away from Central Park which was great! Lots of room and very charming. Loved having a private Garden!! Francesca was also responsive and helpful with questions. I wanted to experience what living in a Brownstone was like and it was great. The Metro and nice restaurants are a short walk away. It fit our family of 5 great! Would recommend to anyone wishing for a great NYC experience!
Francesca's place was great.  Six of us (including two kids) fit comfortably and thoroughly enjoyed the neighborhood and the proximity to Central Park.
Francesca's duplex was great for our family.  We enjoyed the proximity to Central Park, playgrounds, and the subway.  It was a quiet home base on our trip to the City.

Eine sehr große, gemütliche Wohnung. Alles war sehr sauber und stilvoll eingerichtet. Die Kommunikation war prima und der Check-in lief problemlos. Die Lage war angenehm ruhig und der Central Park, die Supermärkte und die Subway waren schnell zu erreichen. Gerne wieder!
My wife and I had a great experience, the apartment was as described, Francesca was very helpful and responsive, and the location was perfect.

If you're looking for the perfect location from which to experience NYC, this is your spot!  The local scene had absolutely everything we needed, as well as convenient access to the subway, central park, and even the Macy's Thanksgiving parade float staging!!!
Bella casa elegante e funzionale in zona tranquilla; letti confortevoli, spazi ampi e ben arredati. Proprietari gentilissimi e disponibili. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo.

Everything was as pictured/advertised in the listing. So spacious. Quiet street away from the hustle and bustle (and tourist-dense) of midtown and lower Manhattan, but a quick walk to the subway will get you there in a jiffy. Quiet enough that I did not need my earplugs, which I required every night during a previous stay in a louder part of town. Central Park is just at the end of the block. We loved walking around the park and seeing all the sights within, eventually ending up at the Met. For any fellow runners, the street is directly adjacent to the reservoir jogging loop. The kitchen appeared to be fully equipped, although we didn’t cook (because vacation). The fridge kept our drinks cold and had an ice and water dispenser in the door. Most importantly, this place was clean and we always felt safe there. Francesca checked in on us here and there to make sure everything was satisfactory and to offer suggestions for things to do, and she and Jack were always easy to reach. We had a light bulb blow in one of the bathrooms and they replaced it right away. This place has so much charm and historical detail. I felt like a real upper west sider with my very own brownstone.

La casa es tal cual como se ve en las fotos, un sueño hecho realidad. Francesca y Jack fueron muy amables y estuvieron atentos a cubrir todas nuestras necesidades y consultas. Un lugar muy recomendable, a media cuadra del Central Park y 4 de subte.

Francesca’s place is spacious, well located, comfortable and eclectic. We loved the Italianate decor, but those used to modernity may not. It’s proximity to Central Park Francesca is also a warm and wonderful host, and if she is staying in the other apartment when you are there, an easy neighbor. I’d recommend this place to those who know what matters in life.

We spent a week with our 5 kids in Francescas home and it was excellent. The apartment is beautiful and very special with an old classic piano and great atmosphere. The location is great, very close to central park, close to grocery stores (even organic..) , coffee shops and subway stations. Francesca and her husband were very responsive , helpful and super nice. A great place to stay in manhattan, we highly recommend it.

Traveling with our son and daughter-in-law -- their first time NYC! -- we were generally delighted with this unique "Old New York" style brownstone apartment. Located on a lovely tree-lined street 1/2 block from Central Park, it is ideally suited for two couples. 
The large bedrooms are nicely spaced downstairs, away from the main public living areas upstairs, and we especially appreciated the very comfortable beds, the excellent showers (with great water pressure), the A/C and fans and the TVs in each room (although lacking in the living room). The kitchen, though small, is well-equipped and the front-facing dining room is a lovely place for a quick snack or more leisurely meal. 
Strong wifi, easy access to supermarkets, including Trader Joe’s and Whole Foods, and a range of public transportation options add to the charm and convenience of the apartment. Francesca and Jack were available, occasionally in person, always via email, to respond to questions and concerns. As frequent AirBnB’ers, we have a strong basis for comparison and this duplex apartment, with it’s wonderful back garden, ranks high on our list of favorites.

Francesca's place is extremely spacious and filled with beautiful antiques. It is near the subway, Central Park, and lots of restaurants. Great location for those who want to be near everything but also need a quiet street to retreat to after a busy day out and about in New York City!
Outstanding location, spacious Property and gracious accommodating hosts.
这是一个艺术设计格调的老房子,据说有100年,上下二层,还有一个独立的院子,出门左转离中央公园三分钟路程,右转再右转有二个不错的有机超市,生活方便,我们一家6人在这里住的非常舒适,孩子也玩的开心

We stayed at this lovely place for a few days. The location was excellent, it was spotless, comfortable and had lots of charm. The hosts were wonderful, responded quickly and were courteous. Highly recommended

We had a great time at the appartment. Francesca was a great host who was very helpful.
The appartment was charming and a great place to stay. The garden was a missed opportunity since it was so hot and humid we could not spend time outside.
We were very pleased and highly recommend it.

之前有不少好评,不赘述,加几个亮点和建议:1､位置非常方便,博物馆控步行距离去MET和自然博物馆,购物控步行距离去5街､麦迪逊和3街;2､很多超市,推荐trader joe',它对面超市有卖“锦”寿司米;3､餐馆很多,推荐92街夹broadway的perfecto pizza;4､房子对喜欢老房子的我们来说,很多惊喜;5､房东对待房子维护精心,很多给客人建议都很有用;6､院子是一个非常特别的存在,很享受;建议带拖鞋和餐垫｡总体非常推荐｡

A uncommon and so lovely private place to live like an authentic newyorker . We have traveled in NY several times with or without our children and we are quite sophisticated customers . Francesca’s house will definitely remain as one of our most amazing experience in NYC.

Francesca è stata un’ ospite inappuntabile, ogni cosa era perfetta, ogni singolo dettaglio ben curato (dal bollitore pronto per il te, all’acqua fresca nel frigorifero), la casa pulita e corredata di ogni accessorio utile (impianto stereo, tv, stampante e quant’altro). É una casa elegante con arredi di pregio, la consiglio in modo particolare per persone amanti del bello e certe di averne cura come se fossero le proprie.

remarkable! what an experience!

even in the pouring rain having the doors open onto a  a garden in the middle of NYC was a treat.
a wonderful place to stay in a wonderful location.

the whole thing family got to be together and do their own thing as well.

Francesca made us very welcome and enabled us in to check in early, as soon as the place was cleaned after the previous guest.

we enjoyed the style, the amenities,  the  steinway piano.

we felt privelidged to stay in such a place.

thank you
Outstanding. Great location. Very peaceful to stay in this great space.

We stayed here for 8 days with my parents and two children (4,2). This was a very comfortable stay. All the beds were high quality and even had a single mattress to throw on the ground for the kids. The home is beautiful and comfortable enough that the kids could play without fear of damaging anything. The home has all you need including washer and dryer which helps when having kids. Great location to explore Central Park, visit Bronx zoo, bus ride to MET and Natural history museum. Right around corner is Trader Joe’s and Whole Foods so grabbing quick foods to cook was easy. The hosts were the friendliest I’ve ever met and we’ve had 3 other NYC hosts. We like knowing a bit about the hosts and they were interested in us. Made for a good stay! We chose this location because it was ground level and had a garden and was close to the park and had two true bedrooms and private baths. We had a great visit!
We couldn't have wished for a better place to stay.  Great location.  Soft sheets, comfy beds, well-appointed kitchen, overall a lovely space.
Francesca and her husband are wonderful hosts. Tgeir home is beautiful and in a wonderful location

We had an amazing stay at Francesca's place. The house is tastefully furnished with each piece of painting/furniture that has a story to tell. Such a beautiful place to come back to after a day/night exploring NY. Very close to the metro station that takes you into the heart of NY, close to the Park to enjoy the morning walks and relatively quiet considering this is NY - a city that never stops.... 
Just a small walk away from the grocery stores / pharmacy / bakery & restaurants. 
Communication with Francesca was fantastic - she immediately answers all the questions, makes suggestions and is very helpful!

This is an exceptional apartment, beautifully furnished and perfectly located for a true New York City experience.  Central Park beckons down the street, the subway is just a few short blocks away, restaurants and shops are right where you need them.  The apartment and street itself are quiet.  The back garden is a special treat.  Francesca has provided everything you might want for your stay and goes the extra step to facilitate your stay.  My group is already talking about making this into an annual visit.

We had a great New York experience at Francesca's very spacious Brownstone.  Staying in her quiet, residential neighborhood was a very nice change from staying in a hotel.  Her house is half a block from Central Park and less than a block from Trader Joe's.  The subway stops were a short, pleasant walk away.  Francesca gave us great information about restaurants and points of interest.  Whenever we had a question, she was very responsive.  We truly hated to leave and would love to make a return visit sometime.

This period-furnished brownstone offers  warm, cultured, and spacious living and dining rooms with large windows and high ceilings, a well-equipped kitchen for entertaining, and two large bedrooms with very comfortable beds and bathrooms. The back bedroom opening onto the large private garden court is especially quiet.  The location is a perfect westside blend of cafes, restaurants and grocery stores, a short walk to the 96 street station on Broadway, and a half-block west of Central Park, with the MET and Guggenheim an easy 20 minute walk through the park. Our hostess was welcoming and communicative and attentive to our needs. We will certainly return for more visits.

Our family of 5 had a fantastic stay at Francesca's home. It was wonderful to return everyday from sightseeing to  a quiet and peaceful neighborhood.  The beds and pillows are comfortable and the home has everything you can need.  It is close to the B and C trains as well as 1,2and 3 train. There is a nice Trader Joe's close by and a very nice Whole foods within walking distance.  I highly recommend this place to stay and would definitely stay here again.
An amazing space in an incredible location. Any questions I had, Francesca was quick to respond even though she was out of the country. It felt like a home from home

We stayed at Francesca's place for a weekend and had an amazing visit. We drove and parking on the street was actually quite easy (and free Friday-Sun). The location is perfect. Very quiet, safe, lots of restaurants and shops nearby. The apartment is large- 2 floors. The beds are super comfortable and the kitchen well equipped. We had to contact Francesca on Saturday and she replied very quickly- great communication beginning to end!

If you are fortunate to find this apartment available, reserve it before someone else grabs it.  Staying at Francesca's apartment is truly a treat.  My guests and I found everything we needed and more.  The location is conveniently located close to the 86th and 96th street metro stations.  We met the most lovely neighbors and were welcomed by everyone we passed on the street.  This was our best NYC visit ever and we hope to secure this lovely apartment for a future visit.  Francesca is certainly an A+ host.
A unique place in a wonderful location.  The hosts were responsive and helpful.

This is a great place for two couples visiting NY (good for a family too).  Excellent location, quiet and very well equipped (especially kitchen and linens etc).  Spacious living room and dining room, efficient kitchen (and close to excellent grocery stores).  There's a lovely garden which we only looked at out the window since it was freezing cold outside - but in warm weather it would be a real treat.  Owner provided information about the place in advance, which we found particularly helpful, including info about check-in procedures (which were very convenient) and the neighborhood.   I hope we have the opportunity to stay at Francesca's place again.
非常好的地段,出门走几步就是中央公园,去大都会博物馆和自然博物馆都很方便,房间布置得挺好,很有美式复古风

The location of the house is its greatest highlight, the central park is only steps away and groceries and subway are within walking distance. The bed and linen are very nice. The TV programs are nostalgically attractive. The host Francesca is very responsive to all my questions, who sent a co-host even to help me out, which I appreciate a lot. The house is very clean and is stylish as seen on the pictures, but the shining pictures on the website are misleading, the house is actually much darker, gloomy I'd say, I even feared going upstairs at night, and the conditions of the house are a bit disappointing, the water closets are very loud while flushing which seem to last forever, each time you have to summon your courage to push the button, has suggested Francesca replace them; the heating devices on the wall are kinka noisy as well; the stairs are uneven and creak, the living-room sofas must have endured time and cave in when you sit on it. The host's hospitality makes up for the defects of the house, complicated feelings, the cohost once brought her talented son to play us two wonderful pieces on the piano.  Hopefully, the house can be renovated to do justice to the features and the advantage of the location it is blessed with.

If you get the opportunity to stay in this luxurious apartment on the upper West side don’t miss it!
A very spacious and comfortable apartment; well located and well appointed as far as bedding and towels being top notch; great showers and everything you might need was at our fingertips. 
We had fun regrouping in the lavish parlor both morning and night.  
The lovely private garden is such a rare treat as well.   
Groceries, food, spirits, drug stores, subway, museums, restaurants and good live music are within easy walking distance.  
This apartment is one of a kind and we thought it was fantastic!   
It’s important to note that Francesca is a Superior hostess as well! :-)

name: Private  suite
summary: Isolated 2 Private rooms suite within a house with a coffee maker, MICROWAVE  and MINI FRIGDE and full bathroom, separated away from the rest of the house by a securely locked door. The suite has its own entrance from the back of the house. Located in a safe and friendly neighborhood, close to public buses and parks. Perfect for a family or a business trip
space: One room has a sofa bed and the other a queen bed. There is also an extra air mattress in the bedroom closet.
description: Isolated 2 Private rooms suite within a house with a coffee maker, MICROWAVE  and MINI FRIGDE and full bathroom, separated away from the rest of the house by a securely locked door. The suite has its own entrance from the back of the house. Located in a safe and friendly neighborhood, close to public buses and parks. Perfect for a family or a business trip One room has a sofa bed and the other a queen bed. There is also an extra air mattress in the bedroom closet. If you have any questions or need anything, please ask. The neighborhood is very residential with stores and restaurants close by. The bus is half a block away on Horace Harding and 188 Street which will take you to either Main street where you can catch 7 train to the city or Jamaica where you can catch E or F train to the city. the bus ride is about 10-15 min to the train stations.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very residential with stores and restaurants close by.
transit: The bus is half a block away on Horace Harding and 188 Street which will take you to either Main street where you can catch 7 train to the city or Jamaica where you can catch E or F train to the city. the bus ride is about 10-15 min to the train stations.
interaction: If you have any questions or need anything, please ask.
house_rules: Please know that this is a residential area and and to respect other guests on this property, the Quiet time starts at 11pm
