host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Was a great place to stay at, would book again in the future.
Was a great place to stay at.

PROS:

1) GREAT location! Close to NYC. You can either drive into the city (abt 30 min) or catch a bus/subway. 

2)The neighborhood is neat, clean and safe. 

3) Plenty of street parking, esp before dark.

4) Walking distance to coffee, restaurants and shopping. Coffee & food are only a 2-3 block walk!

5) The bathroom is very neat, clean & in good condition. 

6) Host is very friendly!

7) Wifi (reliable)

CONS:

1) There's no A/C and no ceiling fans OR access to portable fans.

2) No microwave. No mini fridge.

3) We experienced a lack of complete sheet sets for both beds. One only had a top sheet, the other only fitted.

4) All the towels & washcloths provided were very old, worn and dingy.
Cozy and nice area
Warm hospitality

Irisha ist eine nette und kommunikative Gastgeberin. Sie bietet die sofortbuchung Option an was für Reisende die flexibel seien möchten eine gute Lösung ist. Die Unterkunft befindet sich in Queens fresh meadows, das ist für Gäste schon ein gutes Stück zu fahren bis nach Manhattan und den popülären Plätzen und man muss mehrfach umsteigen. Die Umgebung ist laut von Flugzeugen bis zu läuten Autos ist alles dabei. Man sollte sich auch selbst von den Märkten eindecken da in dem appartment nicht viel zu erwarten ist. Wifi ist verbesserungswürdig da hat (Hidden by Airbnb) teilweise nur einen geringen Empfang. Ist im allgemeinen sauber man muss sich nicht ekeln oder sonst dergleichen nur wäre etwas mehr Staub wischen wünschenswert.
+schneller Kontakt 
+nette Familie nette gastgeberin
+einfacher Zugang zum appartment 
-preis 
-läute Umgebung 
-bessere Beschreibung der öffentlichrn Verkehrsmitteln 
-Klima oder Lüftung gerade in heißen monaten unverzichtbar 
- vor der Buchung sollte man wissen was man sehen oder machen möchte für Sightseeingtour würde ich diese Unterkunft nicht empfehlen.
Private entrance, very easy check-in and check-out, rooms are clean and I don't have any problems for a week's stay.

We're a family of four (two adults, a four year old, and a 16 month toddler), and we were attending a friend's ordination at the big Greek Orthodox church in Flushing, and Irisha's place was absolutely perfect for us. It was a fantastic location, being just over a mile away from where we were going, it was in a lovely neighborhood, and it was a terrific value. The suite was clean, it had everything we needed, communication with Irisha was great and timely, and everything about the experience conveyed a real hospitality of spirit, even though Irisha herself wasn't there in person. Thank you very much, Irisha, and when we need to come to Flushing again, we'll check your availability!

I would definitely NEVER stay in this Airbnb ever again and I would NEVER recommend this place to anyone. I stayed here with my 3 kids for 15 nights. My first night at the Airbnb I noticed that the air mattress was filthy and the sheets on the beds smelled sweaty and were old. The fitted sheet on the bed had a big hole in it too and the elastic was so stretched out that it would not stay on the bed. I messaged Irisha and she brought "new" sheets the next morning. The "new" sheets were in the same conditions as the last ones and had the same smell. The same day while my daughter was getting dressed she noticed a man standing outside of the bedroom window, the curtains are so sheer and pulled back that anyone can see inside. I had to put sheets on the windows so we could get dressed. I messaged Irisha because I had no idea that other people were at the house and she said " we live at the residence ". I woke up at 7:30 the next morning because of a small child crying, running, around and screaming, also throughout the day I could hear people talking loudly. I was woken up everyday at 7 from the noise. And at late hours of the night I could hear people stomping, I have recording of this. The next night my son was sick with a virus and he had pink eye, I had to give him eyedrops at midnight after we had returned from the hospital. He has never had pink eye before so he cried when I put the drops in his eye. I immediately got a message from Irisha saying that I was being disrespectful and to keep down the noise. Mind you there are no rules for Airbnb guests for noise in this place and it is listed as family friendly. It is so hypocritical that I am condemned for making noise when it is hard for my family to go to sleep because of the noise and we were woken up early too every morning. The next day I saw Irisha outside with her children she did not say hello to me I had to approach her myself and we discussed her message. I was asking her the rules of staying in her place and the situation with her gate because its hard to close. She said to me that its okay if its open because the neighborhood is safe because no black people live here. She then said that she has one black neighbor named Mohammad and whenever she sees a black man she knows its him and she feels safe. My daughter and her two friends heard her say this too. We are a Latino family and my son is half black I felt discriminated against and unwanted. It was a big shock that someone would say that. Later that day I had a guest...

Irisha's place was cosy and as described. We stayed for four nights and were out in the city every day, but the nights at Irisha's were quiet and comfortable. Irisha provided all the essentials we needed: basic toiletries, refreshments, clean linens and a comfortable room temperature. My air conditioning unit had some troubles the first night and the next day I messaged Irisha about it. She responded immediately and had a brand new unit installed by the time I got home. I thoroughly recommend staying here and would return again next time I'm in the area.

I absolutely loved it. Irisha was an amazing host. She provided a detailed information packet on how to get to the city via bus to train, every time I had a question she had an answer, and she let us do our own thing unless we needed her. I'm very thankful that she allowed us to stay there and I'll definitely be returning soon.

Irisha was very helpful and assisted me in a tight spot
where I needed a location fast. Was very good experience and was a "home-y"
location.

Very quick communication- we decided at the last minute to book and it was super easy. The location was great for visiting my sister in Queens. The place was exactly as pictured and had lots of toys, which our 20 month old loved. Thank you!
Worst terrible
Great spot to spend a quick night. Cozy and comfortable.

The place is great. Is located on a nice and quiet neigborhood and only a few steps from stores, restaurantes, even cinemas. You can take a bus to go anywhere  just on the corner and go to Manhattan or the train station. We was really happy there.

This room where I was staying in Fresh Meadows was very relaxing to stay. Mostly recommend to anyone who’s looking for a relaxing place to stay. And can sleep better at night. Irisha is a wonderful person and honestly I have to thank her because if it’s wasn’t for this place I would’ve sleep inside my car.

Great location; close to stores and restaurants, easy access to and from I-495, safe neighborhood with nice parks nearby. We were surprised by how quiet it was despite it being so close to the highway The place is clean and comfortable. Irisha was super responsive to questions and requests we had. Would stay again.
这次住宿很愉快,房间整洁,私密性很好,也很安静｡房东回复也及时｡房子附近就有超市,餐厅,公交车,吃饭,出行都很方便,我们非常满意｡

On19 Oct 2018, my wife and I and my brother and his wife were very
disappointed upon our arrival to the room that was suppose to be a two
bedroom apt/home.  Here are some of our comments:

1.  No lights were on in front of the house so we could see the house number...
we had to walk up and down the sidewalk to find to the correct house.

2.  Once we found the house ... we then had to go to back of the house
thru a gate again, it was dark and we couldn't see ... so, we had to
use our cellphone flash lights to find our way into the back of the house.
Once we got thru the gate it was hard opening the key box. There's a light above the door but is very dim and needs to be brighter. 

3.  The grass in the back yard and front yard were overgrown and we couldn't
believe how bad it looked.  The back yard had toys and trash all over the place ... we can't believe that someone couldn't take the time to make the front/back yard look good.  Keep in mind that the rest of the neighborhood had good looking yards.

4. Once we finally got inside the house we couldn't believe there
wasn't two bedrooms. There is only one bedroom with a bed box spring and
mattress sitting on the floor (no bed frame). The other room has the hard and uncomfortable sofa bed which also includes a small table with the coffee pot and other coffee related products. The other couple decided not to stay there either night after seeing this place. 

5.  The curtains on the windows were see thru ... if someone was
outside they could see in the rooms ... (we couldn't believe this)
sad!!! We put a sheet on one window and the air mattress on the other window for privacy.

6.  Everything in the rooms were very old, worn out and out dated to
include the comforter, sheets, blankets, pillows and pillow cases. It was
clean but very old and worn.The comforter on the queen size bed was full size therefore it didn't fit appropriately.

7. With the money that you're get from renting this place out; there
should not be very dated and worn out sheets, towels, pillows. etc...

8. Until improvements are completed we don't recommend this place to
no one and I will post this comment online.

9. Fix this place up and I'll change my comment  ... We were hoping to
have a  place to come to when we visit our family in NYC but
unfortunately we won't be coming back. As a matter of a fact we only
spent Friday night there.  Saturday night we went elsewhere.
My brother and his wife didn't spend one night there based on what
they saw when we arrived on Friday evening.

10. The shower has mold in the shower grout. 

11. The space didn't have a TV or radio available either.

12. This place should be removed from the Airbnb list.

13. 1st impressions are lasting impressions.

I've attached some photos that I took while we were there. The man in
the pic is my husband (Richard)

Richard and Sandy Jones
good place located in a quite neighborhood. good value.
Nice space,  lots of close by good options and easy to get on public transport. Overall super good space. Worked really well for my family.

name: Stunning Bondi Beach Apartment (With Garage)!!!!
summary: NEWLY FULLY RENOVATED (completed 19 Oct 2017)!!!   This stunning, newly renovated luxury apartment is within short walking distance of the beach, shops, restaurants, cafes, bars and everything Bondi Beach has to offer and offers. Sunny, light and airy with leafy outlook & treetop views and has a lock up garage ($20/day additional fee).
space: NEWLY FULLY RENOVATED on 19/10/17........ Offer for the first time in 3 months and be the first to book this spectacular newly renovated apartment. Set on the top floor, north facing, flooded with natural light with leafy outlook and treetop views in Hall Street, the hub of Bondi Beach. You will love my home as it is well located on a one way, beautiful tree lined street, offers serenity and yet you are less than 150m away from transport, cafes, restaurants, shops, bars, etc and approx 500m to Bondi Beach. This new renovation features include: - Brand new open plan customised gourmet kitchen with Ceasar stone bench tops and Tom Dixon copper pendant lights over the kitchen bench including luxury European fittings and appliances, fridge freezer, dishwasher and stunning smoked mirror splashback; - Brand new air condition for the very hot summer months; - New luxury bathroom with separate shower and bathtub; - Security Intercom;  - Brand new quality tiled and laminated floors throughout; -
description: NEWLY FULLY RENOVATED (completed 19 Oct 2017)!!!   This stunning, newly renovated luxury apartment is within short walking distance of the beach, shops, restaurants, cafes, bars and everything Bondi Beach has to offer and offers. Sunny, light and airy with leafy outlook & treetop views and has a lock up garage ($20/day additional fee). NEWLY FULLY RENOVATED on 19/10/17........ Offer for the first time in 3 months and be the first to book this spectacular newly renovated apartment. Set on the top floor, north facing, flooded with natural light with leafy outlook and treetop views in Hall Street, the hub of Bondi Beach. You will love my home as it is well located on a one way, beautiful tree lined street, offers serenity and yet you are less than 150m away from transport, cafes, restaurants, shops, bars, etc and approx 500m to Bondi Beach. This new renovation features include: - Brand new open plan customised gourmet kitchen with Ceasar stone bench tops and Tom Dixon copper pendant light
neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is safe!! The apartment is in a one way quiet end residential of Hall Street, very leafy, one of the best streets in Bondi Beach and yet so close to the eateries and shops(150m) and the beach(approx 500m). Take the scenic Bondi to Coogee famous coastal walk. Only 150m to the hipster an array of fashion and bars between the apartment and the beach. Enjoy the boutiques, surf, skate park, gyms, markets and ocean pools. Bondi beach is buzzing with locals and travelers visit year-round.
notes: If you need an early check-in or late check-out please ask us in advance. If we can, we will try and accommodate you. Otherwise, check-out is strictly 10am and check-in is 2pm-5pm (face to face) and if you arrive after 5, I will leave the keys in the lock box and you can let yourself in. I usually like to meet my guests so if I don't get to greet you in person on arrival, I will greet you the next morning.
transit: The Bus stop 150m from the apartment on Glenayr Ave which takes you to the city, Circular Quay, Surry Hills, Paddington and Bondi Junction (where you can also hop on a train). Buses also run to South Head where there are a number of amazing harbour bays, including Watsons Bay and Camp Cove. For fast bus city services, 333 & 389 on Campbell parade (opposite end of Hall St), about 23 minutes bus ride will take you into the city. Uber is popular as it's only 7kms to the city. There is also a GoGet car nearby which you can hire online. Plus, enjoy your own private parking space.
access: The apartment is located on the top (3rd) floor of a secure building and has a lock-up garage (additional charge $20/day) and negotiable for longer stay.
interaction: We'll arrange to meet and greet you at the door when we can and if you want to know where to go and eat, we're always just a phone call away.
house_rules: This is my home and I have put in a lot of love and care so we can all enjoy. The home is newly renovated and new luxurious appliances and linens. Please treat the apartment with respect as you would your own and return as found. Guests are required to show a photo identification The booking guest must also be the guest staying. If you are booking for someone else, you must seek approval prior to booking as this is a violation of Airbnb's Terms of Service.  No groups under 25 years old, families welcome of all ages. Refundable deposits is 2 x current deposit for stay over 28days. This is refundable after inspection of property for damages etc. 1) Strictly NO shoes in the apartment to keep apartment clean. And do not drag heavy metallic sharp objects on the floor as this will damage the laminate floor. Also, if you spill water on the laminate floor, please wipe it immediately.   2) Bedding & Occupancy Bedding– Each Bed is for 2 people so I am assuming if the booking is for 4 people, 2 b

host.host_about:
We love meeting people and travelling with our son to new places and trying out different food.

We have been guests since 2015 and have just started hosting in March 2017.

reviews.comments:
A lovely apartment in beautiful Bondi. It matches the new photos and the Bondi beach area is easily walkable. It's a bus ride to downtown Sydney - pretty easy. 

There are a lot of stairs if that bothers you, and no AC. The street is quiet and a very short walk to shops, restaurants, beaches, pools, boutiques and some of the best walking paths (in the world?).

Lynne could not have been more helpful, what a fantastic host. Her apartment was lovely, clean and very quiet. The lockup garage was super handy. Our family of 3 really enjoyed the proximity to all of the Bondi amenities. The apartment is up a few flights of stairs which we didn't mind, but worth noting if you struggle with mobility. Would highly recommend.

Great Vacation: we enjoyed our stay
Awesome Appartment: everything there what you need
Excellent Host: she is a lovely women and made us feel like home
Magnificent Neighbourhood: Everything is quite and clean
Superb location: everything is nearby
Perfect location, waking distance to lots of great cafes and restaurants and only 10 minutes walk to Bondi Beach. The apartment was nicely furnished and very clean and Lynne was a great host.
Lynne has a lovely home in Bondi

Lynne is a fantastic host and very flexible with our check in and out time.  She has great communication skills, helpful and friendly. 
We love what Lynne has done to her apartment, it is big and spacious.  The biggest by far from most places we have stayed in Bondi Beach and other parts of Sydney.  The home is lovely, nicely decorated with leafy outlook & quite (great for sleeping) and as a bonus, super close to everything Bondi has to offer, in fact about 100m to restaurants, shops and transport and 5 mins walk to beach.  Highly recommended to friends and family.  Will definitely be back again.   Thanks Lynne for your hospitality.
Lynne was great host. We locked our keys in and she was so helpful getting us back in. Great location in quiet street yet so close to the hub of bondi.

An awesome location and place to stay! Lynne is an awesome host, she was very helpful and flexible with early check in and late check out. 
The apartment was spotless and very spacious. The home is exactly as shown on the listing, close to the beach, restaurants, shops and transport.  Will definitely come back and stay here again! I highly recommend to anyone. Loved it! Thanks Lynne!

Lynne is an awesome host, I stayed at her home last month, not only her home was really nice and everything is of high quality and most of all is her hospitality and here I am again.  Lynne is also very honest.  I didn't even know I have made an error in my booking, she quickly corrected the over payment and returned the over payment to me immediately.  Thanks heaps Lynne, what a fantastic host!!   I highly recommend her place, everything was just perfect, quite and only a short walk (200m) to beaches, restaurants and shops... I come to Sydney often and her home will now definitely be my base. This is a home away from home.  Will see you again.  Cheers.

Lynne's place is very central for cafes and the beach, whilst on a quiet road.
Lynne was very helpful and friendly.

Lynne's place is fantastic, great location!!! Just a short stroll to Bondi Beach, very close to many restaurants and shops. The place is exactly as described and extremely clean. Lynne was very accomodating, she made 100% sure we arrived safely and had everything we needed. Will definitely stay again next time we come to Sydney.
Great modern apartment in the heart of bondi! Good value and walking distance to everything you need. Lynne was a great host and very helpful if we had any queries. Would stay here again!
Lynne really went the extra mile to make our stay enjoyable. The location is perfect for beach and cafes, but still wonderfully quiet. Would definitely stay again
Amazing host and place! Absolutely loved our stay, would definitely recommend.

name: Charming place on the hippest street in NYC
summary: Cozy, small place on a 5th floor walk up in the heart of historic, bohemian Village. Very lively night life, restaurants, shops and art venues. My place is close to Please Don't Tell, Cafe Mogador, Big Gay Ice Cream Shop. Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description: Cozy, small place on a 5th floor walk up in the heart of historic, bohemian Village. Very lively night life, restaurants, shops and art venues. My place is close to Please Don't Tell, Cafe Mogador, Big Gay Ice Cream Shop. Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Any time over airbnb app and text also.
interaction: Any time over airbnb app and text also.
house_rules: - no shoes in the living room please - no smoking - no "extra" guests - please take out the trash every day to avoid attracting little uninvited creatures :)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I’m a monkey in the jungle of the city.

reviews.comments:
Annie's place is beautifully appointed; while it is a studio, it feels comfortable and cozy.  An inviting and gorgeous home, her great taste shines through in everything.  Clean, well stocked, neat, it feels inviting from the moment you walk in.  It is located in one of Manhattan's more exciting neighborhoods and surrounded by great night life.  The unfortunate trade off is the noise - while a few floors up, street level sounds still certainly make it through the windows.  

There are thick curtains to help ameliorate and I came in prepared with ear plugs just in case (ended up not needing them).  A few relics of the age of the building remains in the faucets/knobs in the bathroom, but everything is entirely functioning and nothing a little bit of wiggling cannot solve.

Annie was generous and kind, leaving us a bottle of Prosseco and birthday candles for my partner.  She was very responsive on text to all sorts of questions, and I would be thrilled to stay with her again.

The apartment is located in a great part of the city. Lots of great restaurants near by and close to several subway stops. Annie was very accommodating and responsive to all questions and needs. The apartment was very clean and tidy. Would defiently recommend to anyone visiting the city.
We absolutely loved our stay :)
Annie was a great host. She responded to every message promptly, and her place was exactly as advertised. Great spot in East Village, and overall a great experience. Would stay again in the future.

Lovely, cozy, apartment in a great part of the city.  Everything was very clean and in good working order.  You could hear street noise on a lively Saturday night but I was expecting this and wasn't disturbed by it.  I will definitely stay here again next time I'm in NYC.
Such an incredible experience. I wish I lived there.

Annie is great, check-in was smooth. She has a very well decorated house with many plants, very cute. She is easy to communicate with; the second night I was there the temperature went up a lot, she offered discount for not being able to install the AC, and sent a fan over. I recommend Annie and her house.

Annie's apartment is beautifully decorated, exceptionally clean, and very cozy (the pictures don't do it justice). The check-in/check-out processes was effortless. She was easy to communicate with and reached out multiple times to ensure our stay was going well. In summary, everything was perfect and it made our trip that much more enjoyable.

Had a fantastic stay at Annie's apartment. A small clean space in the East Village, perfect for a couple wishing to explore the area, whilst feeling a part of the community for that short time. There is so much choice right on the doorstep, but with the noise levels reduced due to apartment being on 5th floor. Great place to stay
Our stay at Annies place was great. Its location can't be beat for getting around the city. She was super communicative throughout the process. Would definitely recommend!

My partner and I had a wonderful stay in this apartment. We stayed for two nights on the weekend and loved the cosy studio flat as a base to go exploring from. The surrounding area is brilliant. Annie, though we didn't meet her, is a truly excellent host, preparing the flat to a lovely liveable standard, communicating well and making sure that we were ok and enjoying our stay. She was polite, efficient and unobtrusive to our visit, though I'm sure meeting her would have been great. Very cool, relaxed and competent attitude. If we're back in New York and the place is still available we would stay again. Thanks Annie

The apartment was lovely - just as described and everything I needed for my short stay in NYC. Annie couldn’t have been more helpful and check in/out was super smooth as a result. The neighbourhood is great - lots of cafes, bars and restaurants (best coffee I had in the city, just around the corner!). Not the quietest in the evening, but nothing that really detracted from my stay and the fab location meant you really felt you were experiencing NYC life. Thanks Annie!
Amazing location! Annie was so responsive and made everything really easy.
Annie's place is incredibly cozy and cute! Lots of great restaurants near by, and Annie is very friendly and communicative. Would highly recommend!
What an amazing stay here! I was able to get great food just around the corner and the apartment was golden. Super noce host and awesome place
A bit noisy if one minds that, but a truly wonderful place in a fantastic location. Everything went very smoothly and this was one of my best airbnb experiences

Great location! Annie’s home was super cozy and cute. The location is fantastic - close to a lot of great bars and restaurants - everything you could want in a 4-block radius. The stairs can be a bit of a workout, but not such a bad thing! Overall, I really loved this place and will definitely book again in the future.
Annie was accessible and willing to answer any questions in a timely fashion. She also provided great recommendations and has incredible taste in decor!!

Annie's place is perfect. It's well decorated, comfortable, clean, in a fantastic location with many parks and restaurants/bars nearby, and she made the checkin/checkout process seamless. One of my best AirBnB experiences to date and would love to visit again.

We completely see why Annie has earn a Superhost distinction. We had an urgent need for a place due to an unforeseen cancellation and she helped us out in a big way. Upon arrival, we were greeted by a quiet apartment with a little jazz to ease the travel stress of a long day. Highly communicative and quite thoughtful - you won't be disappointed staying with Annie.
Annie was lovely.  A great apartment right in the middle of everything you could want.
As advertised a super hip street. Loads of bars and cafés right on the block, all with a good crowd.  I’d stay there again next time I visit NYC
Great place, awesome location. Would recommend staying for sure!
An amazing apartment in an awesome location! Annie was extremely responsive and made the check-in and check-out process seamless. She was very hospitable and I highly recommend her place.
A great spot in the heart of East Village. Would love to come back in the future!
Annie's place is great...quintessential lower east side apartment, fun design style, great book collection.  Highly recommend!

A great little place in a wonderful location. Annie was always quick to respond and very helpful. We were a little hesitant about booking due to it being on the 5th floor in a building with no lift but the stairs really weren't that bad! We will be recommending to friends and would definitely stay there again.

Staying at Annie's place was so amazing it worries me I may not be able to go back to Manhattan without staying there again. 

Check in was easy and Annie was very accommodating. There is a climb up, down, then back up the stairs to get it all unlocked but that's pretty reasonable since it's security. The interior is very charming and warm and definitely feels like a place someone lives. Right outside your door is everything. Anytime I wanted to go somewhere specifically it was always "right on this street". The place was cozy, neighbors were super quiet (the street is noisy but it's right on a busy street), and the neighborhood was in fact amazing. 

Annie herself was very responsive to bigger and smaller questions from getting in to what sort of soap she had in the bathroom (because it smelled amazing). She was incredibly accommodating on us checking in and out and responded quickly that it felt like we were staying at a friends place rather than just a stranger. 

The place was cheap (relative to Manhattan) too, and it would be well worth it if it was more as well. Definitely a good stay if you want to have a good time in the city.

Had a great time and enjoyed the space!! It was nice and bright and clean!! Great location:) Starbucks was right across the street...the Thompson bagels place was unreal as well..comfortable couch and sitting area as well!

Annie is a great host. She is quick to respond and very helpful if you need anything. Her place is a small studio apartment, well kept and clean. Just the right size for a couple on vacation. It was a quick 8-10 min walk to the nearest subway to see all of New York’s landmarks. There are numerous great local bars and dinner spots within a 5 minute walk from the door if you want to end your night near home too. The neighborhood seemed friendly and safe even during the Halloween party weekend. I would definitely recommend her apartment to anyone.

El apartamento es muy confortable y bonito. La ubicación es estupenda en un barrio muy animado y lleno de sitios interesantes al que volver después de un día ajetreado por midtown y los highlights de New York

From the moment of first contact to request our dates Annie responded instantly, could not have been more helpful all the way to the last day and even left some tasty snacks and bottled water for arrival ! 

The space is very homely and perfect for an individual or a couple in size, fully equipped with soft lighting and comfortable furniture. 

The location is great as a base to travel around the city catching all the sights and bars, with local eclectic bars and shops, a Starbucks right outside and subway / bus links an easy walk away.  

As it was early December the weather in New York was cold but the apartment was always cosy in temperature and I couldn’t not fault it nor leave anything constructive to build on our stay ! 

Thank you Annie !

name: Studio au cœur de Montréal à 15 min DOWNTOWN!!!!!
summary: Un studio rénové et propre situé à 8 min à pied du métro d'Iberville. Accès au centre-ville et dans le quartier des spectacles en moins de 20 min en métro ou 15 minutes en auto. Stationnement facile et gratuit sur la rue. Près de plusieurs épiceries, pharmacies, restaurants, transport en commun, parc et toutes commodités. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour l'emplacement, et la tranquillité tout en étant à proximité la ville.  Parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les familles.
space: Studio se situant dans le sous sol (en bas porte à droite) très éclairé, dans un édifice à 2 autres logements supérieur. Endroit très calme avec gens de confiance. Machine a espresso sur place pour les amateurs de café.

host.host_about: Je suis danseuse-interprète, chorégraphe et professeure de danse.

reviews.comments: Janie was very helpful with check in and any questions we had. The place was clean and well kept.
C'est un endroit tranquille, propre et confortable , le studio est bien aménagé avec tout le nécessaire merci!
What a pleasure to stay at her place!!
Comfortable, cosy and exactly as described. 5 min to the subway in a quiet but interesting neighbourhood with typical Haitian and Thai restaurants. Janie is on the ball. Totally recommend!
Space is very cozy, comfortable, and super clean. It is very close to public transit so travelling around was easy. Janie was also very attentive and helpful. Would most definitely come back again!

If you're looking for a clean and private place to stay in a beautiful neighbourhood this is definitely where you want to go. We found Janie to be very kind and personable I would highly recommend booking with her.
Le logement était très propre et fonctionnel.Le quartier était calme et le métro proche.Janie était facilement joignable pour répondre à toutes nos questions.

Rien à redire ! 
Notre séjour dans le studio de Janie a été très agréable
L'appartement était conforme à la description. La communication était parfaite avec la propriétaire. Je n'ai rien à redire. Je recommande!

Super studio, bien équipé et propre.
Janie répond très vite et est très sympathique.

I loved that the keys were in a numbered locked box because i felt no pressure about when i could check in. The studio, beddings and washroom were very clean, it was quiet and peaceful. I did not meet Janie personnally and it was fine as i was looking for rest. However, Janie was very quick to respond to any message and overall i m giving a 10/10 to Janie and her studio because my expectations were met 100% from what i read and viewed on the application. I recommend this studio and will surely go there again if it is available. Thank you Janie.

Great stay at Janie's apartment. Janie was an excellent host, very easy to communicate with and checked to make sure we got settled in ok etc. Apartment is cosy and clean, has all you need for a short stay. Bit farther from some of the busier areas in Montreal but very close to a Bixi bike station and 10 mins to metro station which is handy. Overall a good stay, would recommend and very good value!

Hébergement conforme à sa description et à nos attentes. Hébergement très confortable et équipements en très bon état et Confort.  Excellente communication avec Janie. Un 10 min. à pied pour se rendre à la station de Métro n'est pas désagréable dans la rue aux grands arbres. Parfait pour notre Week-end à Montréal.

This was our first time checking out Montreal which is a beautiful city! Janie helped us out a lot. She responded quickly to my questions and she made check-in pretty easy. She was nice enough to have us check-out later than 10 a.m. Which gave us more time to have a latte at Crew Collective & Cafe in Old Montreal. 

Janie's place is beautiful, clean, and cozy. The neighborhood is quiet and everyone is welcoming. Her place is a little far from everything else but she is 10 minutes away from the Metro which made it easier for us to get to downtown Montreal. On the bright side you get to explore the beautiful scenery!!!! 

Thank you for everything Janie! Highly recommended!!!
Petit studio très bien amménagé et d'une propreté impeccable. Recommandé pour quiconque recherche une valeur sûre à Montréal.
Nice apartment! You can hear the neighbors upstairs but other than that the place was nice and homie. Perfect for a short stay!

Janie’s place was exactly how it looked in the pictures. It was a perfect space. Not too big not too small just right. She was very quick to answer to any questions I had. I will definitely book at her place again. Loved the fact that I booked a night before and everything was to par. I recommend staying here for anyone looking for a very cozy and quiet place to stay.
Clean, quiet and close to the city. Enjoyable stay.
c est un petit studio vraiment très bien, propre, facilité de stationnement.

Le logement est en demi-sous-sol et a donc un côté très douillet bien appréciable pendant l'hiver aussi - même pendant la vague de froid du Noël 2017!! Très bon rapport qualité-prix - Facile d'accès depuis le métro Jean Talon et le centre ville est donc bien accessible aussi. Des dépanneurs pas loin. N'hésitez pas!

I loved the location. Everything in Montreal is very far a part so even though it’s 15 min from downtown by car it takes a long time to walk anywhere. We went during January so the heating was awesome and we kept warm with the blankets provided for us on the bed. Some things to expect: there are some pipe issues, so one line of water shoots off in another direction when using the sinks and the shower. Also, the space is much smaller than I expected but it felt good for two people. Other than that it was a very clean, convenient, and open space.
Studio bien aménagé et efficace, bien situé et facilité pour stationner son véhicule Cartier tranquille . nous avons beaucoup apprécié.

Great host, Perfect location the neighbourhood is quiet with almost anything you need within walking distance and access to public transit. 10/10 would recommend and would stay again when in Montreal.
Quartier tranquille,
Loved Janie’s place! Her apartment was very clean and well stocked. Check-in was easy and the location was great. Would definitely recommend to others!

We had a lovely stay at Janie's place. The apartment is well located, with easy access to public transport. Check-in was simple, and flexible-- which we really appreciated. The apartment is exactly as described, and is a really nice space to spend the weekend. Communication with Janie was great. We really enjoyed our stay.

Beau petit logement très chaleureux qui nous donne l'impression d'être à la maison. Le quartier est tranquille et même si les transports ne sont pas super prêts, la route pour se rendre se fait très bien. Tout le séjour s'est fait naturellement. Merci à l'hôte pour les instructions très claires. Je recommande sans hésiter !
Emplacement très propre, communication facile et efficace. Tout le nécessaire est à disposition. Je recommande!
À recommander!

Janie was a friendly and communicable host and I had an easy, comfortable stay. Good space for one person or a couple. If you’re used to set-up-for-purpose AirBnBs, keep in mind that someone lives here when it’s not rented out. Villeray is a nice quiet neighbourhood and apart from upstairs neighbors walking around you don’t get any noise, it’s peaceful and quiet. Close to Metro stops, although I walked into town a couple of times... Montreal is not that big anyway!

Nós amamos a estadia e o ambiente, o apartamento fica perto do metro e do sistema de uso de bicicleta, perto de comercio e parques. Janie é ráoida nas respostas e muito solicita.

Agradecemos por tudo.
This was my second time staying at Janie's place. Amazing as always! Great host, and amazing place! Definitely recommend.
Studio sympa, propre et fonctionel; check in tres facile meme en arrivant apres 22h. Merci!

Super studio parfait pour visiter Montréal et se reposer après une journée de marche sous la chaleur.
En effet l'appartement est bien frais.

It is a cozy basement apartment that has almost everything you might need but it could be cleaner regarding towels and dust. It is sad to mention that I didn't feel very welcome there as during my 3 nights stay I was reminded twice to check out before 10 am as there are other visitors arriving right after us. For the wifi connection you would have to use a little bit of logic as the details provided are not quite right. Overall a nice place for this price.
We enjoyed staying at Janie's place. Is a small basement apartment. The metro is walking distance and parking was easy. Recommend. .
It was a pleasure.
Very quiet, safe, and friendly neighborhood.  Apartment was well equipped and neat. Would definitely recommend to friends.

Janie's place is wonderful. This place is cleaned and independent. Also, it's easy check in. This place will always my choice any time I plan to travel to Montreal. I highly recommend Janie's place because it's near to everything. it's located in a safe area.

Appartement propre et calme. 
Janie  est très réactive à nos demandes. 
Métro pas loin.

Merci beaucoup ! Très pratique pour mes parents qui ont pu rester à seulement quelques mètres de notre appartement sur l'avenue des Érables. Ils ont été satisfait de l'expérience et tout a bien été. Nous le louerons sûrement à nouveau lors de leur prochaine visite.
Very nice place close to bus/metro station. Really recommended, thanks a lot for the hospitality !

Janie’s place was great for my girlfriend and I.  We brought bikes with us to Montréal so it was super easy for us to get around the city and to see all the sights!  Janie’s place was in a great location for us since we could bike right into the city with no hassle.  The place was perfect to come home to and relax in bed while watching some television after a long day of sight seeing and bike riding.  Janie was easy to reach and always responded quickly!
Merci beaucoup

The place is super clean and cozy. I totally recommend for couples or students that need some quiet place after classes.  A bit far from the center if you don't have a car (12-15min). By metro it takes 30 - 40 minutes to get there. It worthed for me. The neighbourhood is very quiet.
Good place .good value . Small but nice . Great for our short stay. Thanks
Highly recommend it! It is a lil outside of the downtown area, but it is worth it!
L'appartement est propre, proche du transport public, facile d'arriver. Nous avons profité au maximum le lieux. Pas bruit et un excellent hospitalité!

Janie was a great host. She was quick to respond and friendly. The studio apartment was clean, cozy and just like how it looks in the pictures. Location was a 20m drive / 40m by bus/metro to downtown. Looking forward to many more stays.

Janie’s place is five out of five! It’s very clean and cozy. Easy access to public transits as well. No need to say Janie has been super helpful, she offers very clear instructions about how to check in and check out. Thank you for hosting.

reviews.comments: M's place is a cute 1 bedroom apartment in a great neighbourhood in the middle of the hip lower east side of NY. I stayed here for 30 days, for business. Perfect walking distance to wallstreet area, and public transportation around the corner. We had some complications with the ceiling but it got fixed as soon as I messaged her. Highly recommend to stay here.
The host canceled this reservation 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed at Samer apartment for one month and we enjoyed from the apartment very much. Although it is a small apartment, it was enough for us. It locate in the Chinatown very close to little italy the Soho and many resturants.  Samer was available to answer any question we had and was very helpful. I highly recommend on this apartment !
Very good communication with the host, helpful. Neighbourhood is not so nice.

The place is right at the intersection between Little Italy and China town. You are constantly surrounded by so much culture and are always amazed. The place is very cozy and exceeded my expectations. Samar is also a great host!!

name: Relaxing Stylish Room near Train and Attractions
summary: Check in as early as 10am!  Discounts for long stays! Steps from the High Line and a block from major transportation, this immaculate, sunny room is perfectly situated in one of the most desirable downtown Manhattan neighborhoods! This is a private room in a four bedroom apartment. The apartment was decorated by a designer at an international fashion brand. The decor, over-sized windows and 11 foot ceilings represents the style, modernity, and warm feeling that the Chelsea has to offer.
space: The bedroom is one in a four bedroom apartment that is in the heart of prime Chelsea.  Please note, the apartment does have a live in host - and other guests - but your bedroom is your private space and oasis in Chelsea.   The room has a high bed so you can store your luggage underneath, a sturdy shelf near the bed to store items under and place your laptop or other items on.  A small closet, and long mirror.  It's a quiet building on a quiet street, but within walking distance of some of the most popular attractions in NYC.  A block away from the Highline. The apartment and room is tastefully decorated by your host who has had his work featured in Vogue.  The apartment itself features high ceilings that create a wonderful sense of space in the bedroom, while the large windows allow light to flood in during the day, while their double-paned glass keeps the street noise at bay.  The room has a luxuriously soft mattress, private small closet in the room, blow dryer, vanity surface, and f

Steps from the High Line and a block from major transportation, this immaculate, sunny room is perfectly situated in one of the most desirable downtown Manhattan neighborhoods! This is a private room in a four bedroom apartment. The apartment was decorated by a designer at an international fashion brand. The decor, over-sized windows and 11 foot ceilings represents the style, modernity, and warm feeling that the Chelsea has to offer. The bedroom is one in a four bedroom apartment that is in the heart of prime Chelsea.  Please note, the apartment does have a live in host - and other guests - but your bedroom is your private space and oasis in Chelsea.   The room has a high bed so you can store your luggage underneath, a sturdy shelf near the bed to store items under and place your laptop or other items on.  A small closet, and long mirror.  It's a quiet building on a quiet street, but within walking distance of some of the most popul
neighborhood_overview: Chelsea is known as the Gallery District, and you will be steps from internationally renowned spaces that you can easily explore.  In addition to being within walking distance of Time Square, the Empire State Building, Koreatown, Herald Square, Penn Station, and the Village, you are central enough to be to any major site in Manhattan quickly by train. The three biggest galleries, each with multiple locations, are Gagosian (21st and 24th), David Zwirner (19th and 20th), and Pace (24th and 25th). They’re worth visiting for museum-quality shows by notable artists (you might catch Richard Serra’s massive steel sculptures at Gagosian, a Yayoi Kusama installation at Zwirner, or paintings by Mark Rothko at Pace).  You can also bank on seeing excellent art at Cheim & Read (25th), Marlborough (25th), Barbara Gladstone (24th, with a smaller space on 21st), Paula Cooper (21st), Jack Shainman (20th), and Hauser & Wirth (18th)—which is also home to the neighborhood’s best kept secret: In the back o
notes: Please note, we are very respectful of our neighbors and ask that you not loiter, or otherwise interfere with the quiet, safety, or peace our peaceful neighborhood enjoys.  I want to welcome you to a safe, stylish, serene home, and ask for your participation in creating that atmosphere!
transit: You are in the heart of Chelsea which puts you in walking distance of several major attractions.  Alternatively, you're only 1 block from C, E train.
access: You'll have full access to your bedroom, and common areas such as the Gallery/dining space, Kitchen, and Bathroom.  As well as be steps from accessing some of NYC's most popular bars, sites, and restaurants.
interaction: I give guests space but am totally available when needed. I'm a long-time New Yorker (10 years) and am happy to provide directions and recommendations for sightseeing, dancing, eating, and anything else you might need. Colin lives on the residence and can provide assistance in person!  ********But if you ever need anything and he's not around, Shane and Dan are available online only to provide quick responses, recommendations or guidance in the city!  Sometimes we do set up hang outs with the guests if schedules, interests and chemistry align!*******
house_rules: -Please note that key pick up is 1 block away from the apartment at a 24hour keycafe in a store where you can stock up for your trip since you’ll have access to an area of the fridge, and cupboard.  Please first go to the keycafe to retrieve your keys. -since it is a shared bathroom, I do ask to reserve between 8am and 8:30am on weekday mornings to prepare for work and to clean it. -lost or otherwise failure to return keys to the key cafe will result in a $75 fee. -no cigarette smoking anywhere in the apartment. ($250 fine). -please tidy up after yourself in the common areas and wash your dishes.  Reasonable fees may be assessed for failure to do so. -Please keep in mind that the bathroom is shared.  For your convenience, your room is equipped with a blow dryer plugged in and ready for use by the mirror, as well as a vanity surface for grooming / makeup. If there is anything I can do to improve it, I'll quickly add to help make it better for you. -your room will lock from the inside fo

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey!  I've lived in New York City for a while working in tech and absolutely love this city.  I don't live in the apartment, but consider me your Digital Local during your stay.  When you message through AirBnB I can step in to give you great recommendations on cool local spots,  places to eat and fun events to check out while you're in town.   Whether you're a foodie, theater buff, night owl, sightseer or just looking for a fun adventure, I can help you take advantage of NYC!

reviews.comments: The room was really clean and comfortable. There were some guides for how to use that place , it helps well. The location is nice to go Chelsy market and quite place . Easy to contact with host and especially I was impressed the day before we got snow storm. They told me to prepare for it and some good stores. Thank you guys !! I really recommend this room :)

I've stayed in a lot of hotels, and I've worked for international luxury hotels, so my expectations are high but reasonable. This was my first airbnb, and I was absolutely delighted. Clean. Upscale design details. Clear communication from the hosts throughout the stay. The host went above and beyond to ensure I felt welcomed, provided me with great tips for exploring the city, and the minor requests I had were quickly resolved. By the end of my visit, I felt as though I was staying at a dear friend's home rather than a stranger's. I would highly recommend this to anyone who appreciates high attention to detail, proactive communication and access to great NYC tips.
Thank you Simon, Shane and Dan for ensuring my trip to NYC was memorable and fun!
房主非常和善和友好,能为房客排忧解难提供方便｡该房源地理位置很好,出行方便,地铁站,公交车站很近,超市和餐馆就在门口｡入住方便,时间不限,一切非常干净整洁｡
The room is small, but if you don t want to spend too much time in then is perfect. Close to underground, bars&restaurants just across the street.
Great location and lovely clean apartment. Very well managed by Shane who was super friendly! Would highly recommend staying here.

Vinimos con mi novio por 9 días y todo fue fantástico! La entrega de las llaves con el Keycafe es ideal, la ubicación perfecta, habitación impecable y las áreas comunes también, realmente es un oasis del silencio como lo describe la publicación! Siempre estuvieron atentos a nuestras consultas. Volveremos a hospedarnos aquí sin dudas, lo recomendamos a todos!

Perfect Host.
Thank you

HI Everyone,
My  daughter stayed with Dan, Simon and Shane in the Chelsea location from May 15 - August 12, 2017.  She was a summer intern for the Today show at NBC.  Her experience was amazing at the Today show and with the Air BnB.    (Julia stayed at NYU last summer for another internship and their is NO comparison.)  This was the same price and we did not have to  basically restock a dorm room for 12 weeks, there was wireless, and it was  exceptionally clean. (The bathroom is amazing.)  I had a million questions as we were making the decision and Shane answered every single one, promptly.  Julia was safe and secure, she met some amazing people this summer at the Air B N B and her life was enriched.  The internship required her to leave as early as 3:45 am and occasionally return very late at night.  There were no safety issues.  (Shane, Dan and Simon checked on her frequently and on the occasional bumpy day , they were right there. ) This place is a gem and I know that Shane, Dan and Simon will be Julia's friends for life.   We truly are filled with gratitude.  THANK YOU!!!!!

Would highly, highly recommend staying here while visiting NYC :)
- Clean and beautifully decorated apartment.
- Located on a quiet suburbian street but still close to subway and busyness of NYC.  
- Very easy communication before and during the stay - thanks boys for all the tips for local hot spots too!
The apartment in a quiet and very well equipped. The attention has been great at all times. I really would stay there again when I return to NY.

The hosts were such warm,  welcoming and respectful people, who were always very helpful in offering local information.  The apartment was extremely well located; venues within walking distance included the Highline, Whitney Museum, Rubin Museum, Chelsea Markets, Chelsea Piers, underground stations. There were a never-ending number of eating places within a few minutes walk, a bodega downstairs and a pharmacy across the street. A pleasant surprise in the apartment was the luxury Toto toilet  (which did everything except whistle), as well as the rather amazing shower.  I definitely plan on staying here again on my next NY trip.

This place is in an awesome building, great location, and super clean. The hosts are wonderful, we were so busy we didn't ever run into anyone but they messaged everyday to see if we needed anything. I highly recommend these hosts and this apartment.

Apartment modern, clean, (fab shower and toilet too), near transport and restaurants, shops and bars all close by. Beautiful road. Amazing buildings. I love New York and Chelsea and after my first visit I can’t wait to come back. Found people in this area so friendly and helpful. Hosts very helpful and quick to respond to any questions or needs. Simon lovely to talk to and full of recommendations and advice that helped us. We visited everything from here. Subway makes it so accessible and would definitely choose Chelsea again. Amazing area. Amazing people. Thank you x
The apartment is perfect for an affordable, yet comfortable stay in Manhattan! The location is great and apartment has everything you may need. Communication is easy as well! Thanks for a great stay!
The location made our stay convenient! Me and my wife had an awesome time!

Die Unterkunft liegt super zentral und ist an alle wichtigen Subway-Linien angebunden. Der Raum ist etwas klein, jedoch zum Übernachten für zwei Leute komplett ausreichend. Die Kommunikation war super. Jede offene Frage wurde sofort beantwortet. Diese Unterkunft lässt sich nur weiterempfehlen.

Excelente ubicación a pocos metros del metro. El sistema de entrada y salida de las llaves es muy cómodo.
El apartamento es muy lindo, cómodo y con el espacio suficiente, aunque en las fotos par de un poco más grande de Lo que es.

No llegué a cruzarme con Dan en ningún momento, pero los intercambios por los mensajes instantáneos fueron rápidos y efectivos.
Very thorough in instructions. Great location. Cute interior.
Perfecto house, perfecto location. So clean and Shain and Dan so helpful!

Pongo la nota en español a parte de porque soy española porque quiero invitar a españoles a acudir a este (Website hidden by Airbnb) solo tiene una ubicación excelente, a 15 minutos andando de time square, los enlaces de metro son geniales, y está muy cerca de su casa.La zona no muy ruidosa...Simon es genial, atento, simpático,amable...nos recomendó muchos sitios y fue super atnto.El Baño muy limpio y las habitaciones pequeñas pero cómodas. Volvería sin duda!! A Dan no le conocimos pero la comunicación por teléfono también era muy buena.Un 10 os pongo chicos!!
Recommend this place for traveling to NYC have good times in NY thanks
The apartment is on a great location and is beautiful. Simon is great and can help you with everything!
Great place to stay in New York! Perfectly located for public transport, attraction, great bars and of course the Chelsea Market! I would definitely recommend this place.
Great stay.  Location was primo and the space as was described. Communication was clear and timely. No problems with heat on a winters evening.
Great value great neighborhood

It´s been a perfect location to stay at in NewYork! The room is exactly as shown in the pictures, so, small but very comfortable. The flat is nice, everything you need is there and the bathroom is super clean, everyday.
The  location of the flat in Chelsea is awesome, it was super easy to get around and explore the city. Nice cafés and restaurants around, galleries, museums, the high line, just around the corner.
But one of the best things was the easy conversation and help you get from these guys. Every question and every need answered within a short time and always to make the stay easy and comfortable. Thank you!

The place is great! Good location and very clean. The shower was amazing too. Only thing is the heat can’t be controlled so the window needed to be kept open, which obviously will be noisy in Manhattan. Other than that no complaints!

Je suis restée 10 jours dans cet appartement et je ne le regrette vraiment pas ! Il est extrêmement bien placé, à un bloc du métro et à 20min à pied de Times square pour ceux qui marche un peu vite. Il y a tout ce qu’il faut pour se sentir chez soi même si la chambre est un peu petite pour 2 mais le tout reste correct et très design. 
Je le recommande vivement !

Com certeza uma das melhores viagens que já fiz! Fui muito bem recebido por Simon e Shane, ambos muito prestativos, amigáveis e excelentes anfitriões. Pretendo voltar a NYC um dia, e não tenho dúvidas de onde ficar novamente. Apartamento encantador, limpo, organizado e bem localizado. Muito obrigado Simon e Shane!!
This place was great, close to subway, restaurants etc. The host was very kind. Place was nice and clean! Would definitely stay there again :)
Location, cleanliness, friendly host.. I can't think of any negatives. Even if the footprint of the room was small, it works well with plenty of space under the bed to push a suitcase under.

Apartamento muy bien ubicado, a 10 minutos andando al madison square garden y a las bocas de metro. Barrio muy tranquilo y agradable. 
Importante llevarse tapones para dormir, y cuando hace frío la calefacción se enciende a deshoras y hace ruido.

We stayed at the apartment during our one week New York City Trip and definitely recommend staying there. The apartment is located in Chelsea which is really central and in a great area nearby the Highline and the Chelsea Foodmarket with lots of nice restaurants and bars around. Everything was perfectly organised (check-in/check-out and the pick-up of the keys at the keycafé) and the communication was really quick and uncomplicated. Collin who lives in the apartment is very welcoming and great to chat with. The apartment/room is small but very clean, neat and stylish and in comparison with the average price of a hotel room in NYC it is an awesome deal. We had a great stay and would recommend staying with Dan to other travellers!
Great location nice appartement

El cuarto es tal cual se lo observa en las fotos, la estadía fue excelente, la zona es muy accesible, ya que hay una estación del subterráneo muy cerca. Los anfitriones siempre fueron muy atentos y dispuestos a ayudarnos con lo que necesitaramos. Lo recomiendo para quienes quieran visitar NYC.

The flat is well placed, in fact we are in Chelsea where you will find the Highline, a lot of restaurants bars and market like ChelsieMarket or the Gansevoort Market. 
The flat was maybe just a bit small but very stylish, clean and comfortable and the host was always friendly and helpful. 
We really stayed well.
Apartment was well located. Be ideal for a single person on a short stay.

The location is perfect, Chelsea is a really fun area, but also quiet and safe at night. 

The apartment itself was everything I needed. The room is small but cosy and fit me and my partner fine! The only downside were the pillows were very flat and the a/c is very loud, when you turn it off the room gets stuffy very quickly. 

Overall I loved staying here and would recommend to anyone!

place is stunning, Colin and all are lovely, room is comfortable and clean, two pillows and two towels provided. plenty of instructions on where to find stuff and Aircon easy to use. I hope you enjoyed the Tim Tams!
Great location and place. it has everything one may need to spend some time in NYC. I’d definitely stay here again.
good

Great location, close to the subway and located in the middle of Chelsea.
Minus for our room where we couldn’t close the window to the outside, we could hear traffic and people on the streets clearly from the bed.

I stayed for one night and enjoyed the experience. I met Colin when I arrived, he was very nice and friendly. The place is clean and stylish. Please keep in mind the apt is on a second floor and there is no elevator so pack light))
Lovely place in the heart of New York with a super host!
es un lugar cómodo, tranquilo y esta muy céntrico para moverte por todo Manhattan
No solo el departamento es hermoso sino que los anfitriones son muy atentos y cordiales. Sin lugar a duda lo recomiendo.
La ubicación es increíble ! El lugar impecable! Es un poco chico si vas varios días y con muchas maletas

A clean, stylish space in a fantastic neighborhood. KeyCafe works great for picking up and dropping off the keys. Easy access to the High Line and plenty of entertainment and dining options within a short walking distance. Would definitely stay there again.

Expect a very nicely located place close to most of the things one would need - Metro, Attractions, Eateries, 7*11 etc. V comfortable stay that ways. 

Concerns are two;
1. One has to go and collect keys from some distance and then drop them back also. So dragging luggage all this while is painful. 
2. Rooms are not locked from outside and thus cant leave valuables inside just like that. Have to lock in bags etc.

Dan's apartment is a nice and clean place, that's perfectly located. Really close to two trains and in a nice and safe area. Keep in mind that new York apartments aren't big, but the room is big enough if you travel by yourself. The room is layed out that you have enough space for your stuff and the closet is also spacious.
What I absolutely loved about this apartment is how clean and well organised it was and the location of this apartment. I was traveling alone as a woman and I didn't feel unsafe once! 
You share the apartment in total with 3 other rooms but you really don't notice it. Everyone is really respectful towards each other and also you don't hear a lot. The room is located at the street side, so if you're a light sleeper keep this in mind, because you're in New York! They do provide ear plugs for you if you want.
Colin lives in the apartment but you never see him, because of the self check in you can easily let yourself in and if you need anything you can just email one of the guys and they'll help you really quickly. If you're looking for more interaction with your airbnb hosts this might not be the apartment for you.
Anyways I would highly highly recommend it to anyone and I was really sad to leave. A big thank you!
Great apartment and location. I would recommend it as it's slightly away from the madness of central Manhattan. Good restaurants and bars in the area too.
Awesome location and super hosts!

Zona tranquila y céntrica, cerca del metro. 
La habitación es pequeña pero tiene todo lo que necesitas. Hemos estado muy a gusto y volveríamos a repetir.
Very professional! Easy all the way, from booking to check out.

This apartment is in a great position, on the first floor, walk up no elevator.
Check in/check out is so easy.
Kitchen is well set out and has everything you need.
We had the front room, which was very noisy, I slept with ear plugs and it was still loud... yes NYC is noisy.
There is no lounge/sofa so it’s not conducive if you would like an evening in after a huge day out exploring.
My husband n I stayed 7 nights and in my opinion the room is too small for 2 people for more than a couple of nights. The mattress could be a little better n the pillows are thin. 
Also there are 4 bedrooms so there is the potential to be sharing 1 bathroom with no separate toilet with 7 people... awkward if someone is having a shower first thing in the morning and you need the loo!!
Communication with host is brilliant and the apartment is spotless.
Great place to stay in the city. Highly recommend.

뉴욕이 많이 춥다고 해서 걱정했는데 지내는 동안에 따뜻하게 잘 지냈어요^^ 
호스트의 답장은 빨랐고 콜린은 매우 친절했어요. 
저 같은 경우에는 체크인 방법이 쉽지 않았어요 처음에는 어플이 잘 실행되지 않아서요..;-; 그리고 엘리베이터가 없으니 짐이 많으시다면 생각해보시고 예약하시는거 추천해드려요:)

My air bnb stay was exactly what I’d hoped it would be and more. The apartment is impeccably clean and provides everything you could possibly need. Responses are incredibly fast for any queries or questions I had about NYC and the location is safe and close to grocery stores and subway stations. I would absolutely recommend this air bnb for anyone looking for somewhere central, clean and well-serviced to stay during their time in New York. Thanks again, hope to be back again soon!
Great spot with the easiest check-in process of all time. Definitely recommend.
Really clean, great location, can recommend staying!

Had a great stay here! Shane responded quickly to all my inquiries and check-in was super easy. The location was ideal and safe with grocery and drug stores nearby. Would recommend this apartment to my friends and family.

name: 近新Rockdale一房一厅,近火车站,有停车位,近机场,可接送机
summary: 位于步行街上的公寓楼,一房一厅,超大阳台,超大房间,一张大床,客厅有沙发床,厨具､柴米油盐一应俱全,可以做饭,但做完需要自己清洗｡近机场,可接送机,近海滩
description: 位于步行街上的公寓楼,一房一厅,超大阳台,超大房间,一张大床,客厅有沙发床,厨具､柴米油盐一应俱全,可以做饭,但做完需要自己清洗｡近机场,可接送机,近海滩 3分钟火车站,汽车站,交通便利
transit: 3分钟火车站,汽车站,交通便利

name: Stylish, relaxing, super convenient
summary: One of the best apartments that I've lived in. Extremely convenient as the train station is just 2 minutes away from the building. Only 4 minutes away from city by catching a train. One of the best known suburbs in sydney by being right next the iconic harbour bridge and have breathtaking views from sydney skyline and opera house by only taking 2 minutes walk from the building. Very famous Luna Park is only 5 minutes walk away.Also there are plenty of restaurants and cafes around with a very short walking distance.
space: Very quiet, spacious with all the essentials that you would need
description: One of the best apartments that I've lived in. Extremely convenient as the train station is just 2 minutes away from the building. Only 4 minutes away from city by catching a train. One of the best known suburbs in sydney by being right next the iconic harbour bridge and have breathtaking views from sydney skyline and opera house by only taking 2 minutes walk from the building. Very famous Luna Park is only 5 minutes walk away.Also there are plenty of restaurants and cafes around with a very short walking distance. Very quiet, spacious with all the essentials that you would need Master bedroom, kitchen As I'll be on a trip the whole time there would be no interaction with me , but the guest will probably meet my very lovely flat mate, which has a full time job and would be at work during the office working hours. It's located in one of the safest and most up class suburbs in sydney which is very close to the city. Very modern with the the iconic sydney views. Such a convenient location
neighborhood_overview: It's located in one of the safest and most up class suburbs in sydney which is very close to the city. Very modern with the the iconic sydney views. Such a convenient location to travel to any part of the sydney.
transit: There are trains just 1-2 minutes walking distance from the building. Also ferry could be a fantastic choice to get to many more places including Darling harbour and Circular quay.
access: Master bedroom, kitchen
interaction: As I'll be on a trip the whole time there would be no interaction with me , but the guest will probably meet my very lovely flat mate, which has a full time job and would be at work during the office working hours.
house_rules: Just basic things as simple as keeping the place clean and tidy. Using the kitchen is okay as long as keeping everything clean.

name: Lovely room in design apartment in Plaza España
summary: Lovely design apartment in the centre. Only 2 minutes walking from Plaza España, Fira, WMC and Las Arenas City Mall, very close to Montjuic and Caixa Forum. Metro, Airbus and Bus only 5 minutes walking from the apartment. This beautiful and warm apartment, with wooden floor and design objects, has two bedrooms and a little terrace. There is a community swimming pool in the building.
space: You will be in love with our place if you're looking for the typical Spanish district very close to the centre of the city but enough quiet to sleep relaxed.
description: Lovely design apartment in the centre. Only 2 minutes walking from Plaza España, Fira, WMC and Las Arenas City Mall, very close to Montjuic and Caixa Forum. Metro, Airbus and Bus only 5 minutes walking from the apartment. This beautiful and warm apartment, with wooden floor and design objects, has two bedrooms and a little terrace. There is a community swimming pool in the building. You will be in love with our place if you're looking for the typical Spanish district very close to the centre of the city but enough quiet to sleep relaxed. You can use a Living room, a kitchen and a bathroom as well. We also have a community swimming pool :) Only 2 minutes walking from Plaza España, Fira, WMC and Las Arenas City Mall, very close to Montjuic and Caixa Forum. Metro, Airbus and Bus only 5 minutes walking from the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: Only 2 minutes walking from Plaza España, Fira, WMC and Las Arenas City Mall, very close to Montjuic and Caixa Forum.
transit: Metro, Airbus and Bus only 5 minutes walking from the apartment.
access: You can use a Living room, a kitchen and a bathroom as well. We also have a community swimming pool :)

host.host_about:
Hi! We are a couple of 36 years old: Alena and Cristian. Alena is a writer and Cristian is a designer.

We speak English, Spanish and Russian.

We have two amazing cats (peaceful and very kind).

We make Airbnb because we love meeting new people from all over the world. But if you're not sociable, this is not a problem: we respect it :) Sure you'll have a great time in our house, that is vey central and quiet. 

We can recommend you beautiful places in Barcelona.

reviews.comments: El sitio es perfecto, buena ubicación, muy bonito departamento y los anfitriones son una pareja increíble. Volvería 1000 y un veces.
Very good emplacement and welcoming place. And the cats are so cool ;)

Alena and Cristian are great hosts. I enjoyed staying at their apartment which is very well located and has great amenities. 

I am planning another trip to Barcelona and will be sure to try and book their place again!
Alena's place is beautiful and is located perfectly for the conference hall and many many Barcelona sights. They are very hospitable and couldn't have asked for better hosts!

name: Cozy 1BD near JFK, Beach, Subway, Buses, & Kitchen
summary: Clean 1BD near, St. John's Hospital and Beach (5mins) with big closet, dresser, with mirror. This room has a double bed and shares a bathroom with the other room. Guests have access to a huge living room with 60-inch tv and a small living room with a pull-out couch for guest's visitor. This apartment has two separate rooms. To rent the whole place, please see my other listing. This place is 4mins walk to the Subway, 25mins to JFK- by subway and or car and is accessible to city buses (5mins walk)
space: Space is unique because it has two separate living rooms for each guest when they want to be alone. And a huge living room when they want to interract.
description: Clean 1BD near, St. John's Hospital and Beach (5mins) with big closet, dresser, with mirror. This room has a double bed and shares a bathroom with the other room. Guests have access to a huge living room with 60-inch tv and a small living room with a pull-out couch for guest's visitor. This apartment has two separate rooms. And a huge living room when they want to interract. Guests have access to the two living rooms and dining room, kitchen, and backyard. I am only a phone call away.
