host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Francisca is an amazing host, with a great space, quiet relaxed and comfortable, highly recommended!
Great place for a weary traveler.  Highly recommended especially if your visiting the Rockaways.
3  Great Stays

Francisca is so hospitable, kind and thoughtful and she has been so responsive to the very question, call and text. Her place is awesome and as same as depicted in the picture i.e, Private room with the lock, comfortable and cozy, big lounge with 60" Led (tv), neat and clean washroom, well-equipped kitchen. She welcomes with tasty snacks and juices. She cooked finger licking rice for me. Out of her busy schedule, she took me to the market for shopping on her own car. She is a gem of a person and her place is matchless. If you are looking for a place in New York then believe me your search is over. Opt this and you will see the diiference. 

Only regret, my stay was just 10 days.

Great host! I'm a medical student doing a rotation at St. John's Episcopal Hospital and Fransisca's home was the perfect place to stay. She sent excellent instructions on how to find her place ahead of time and was flexible with check in time. Francisca had fruit, bottle water, and juice waiting for me when I arrived (she even offered me dinner)! She gave advice on how to get around and answered questions regarding the area. The house is spotless. The room is located in the basement and a living room, dining area, bathroom, and kitchen are shared with another bedroom that is also used for Airbnb. 1 block from a laundromat, 3 blocks from the A train (takes about an hour to Manhattan), 3 blocks from the beach, and a 7 minute walk to St. John's Hospital, CVS, Grocery store, Dunkin' Donuts, and subway. I walked home from the hospital at all hours of the night and never felt unsafe. The area is well lit and there is plenty of street parking available if you decide to bring a car. I would highly recommend staying at Francisca's home to anyone rotating at St. John's hospital or looking for a great place to stay near the beach.
10+ stars Francisca. She is great the home is very clean quiet and comfortable. I had a wonderful stay. Thanks Francisca.

Loved my stay here! Francisca was warm and hospitable, and gave me excellent clear instructions on how to find her place. The quarters are so neat and comfortable, and fabulously quiet. I hope to be staying here again!
Friendly, super clean and very respectful.  Close to the beach and transportation.
Francisca is a great host and her place is great value. She communicates well and is willing to help make your stay more enjoyable.
Francisca was very welcoming and helpful. Great place to stay! I was happy with everything and would definitely stay here again. Highly reccommended.

Francisca is nice and welcoming. She prepared a nice room and offered to pick me up/ send me off.
I enjoyed this stay.
i recommend her house 100$
A recommander pour les gens qui reste peu de temps à JFK

Overall I would give Francisca and her house a 5/5.  She was a great host and even bought us pizza when she saw we were too tired to go out and eat.  The only thing to keep in mind is to not lock the front door with a key, as it already locks by default.  If you lock it with a key you will get locked out.  Also I would give the location a 5/5 because the subway is less than 5 min walk (get on Wavecrest station [25 street]) and so is the boardwalk and beach.

Francesca goes above and beyond the expected. Easily one on the best Airbnb experienced I've has so far. I arrived late at night but she greeted me with a smile, and offered dinner on top of that. The place was quiet, calm and so close to the beach as well as close to restaurants, shops and such. I'd love to go back there but she's booked for months.

I really don't have enough words to do Francisca justice, she's just an all round amazing host who goes out of her way to make sure you're comfortable. Her kindness and hospitality made me feel at home. As a med student rotating at St John's, her place is ideal as it's only 10mins away. If I ever come back around to Far Rockaway I know where I'm staying!

Francisca is a really great host with big awareness for small details. Room is very clean and the bed is really comfortable.  The house is located a short walk to the subway station. Even though is was a really long and far ride to the city center ( almost an hour and 20 min!) It was nice to get back to such a nice room. Thx a lot!
Great place. Great location. Great host.

Francisca tried to make me feel as much at home as possible. When I told her I am a vegan, she put salad for me in the fridge and provided me with lots of directions where I need to go to find the closest supermarket for example. She is incredible friendly and willing to help if anything is needed.

Francisca is great, she welcomed me and made sure I had everything I need, she even made me salad which was very nice, she answered all the questions I had, her place is great, super clean, you get an apartment not just a room, living room with a huge tv, dining table, study desk and an entire kitchen, you just need clothes to live there, highly recommend her place and I will definitely stay there if I go again.
Fantastic, warm, place to stay. Francisca is very kind. Perfect place for Medical students. Was offered unique delicious dinners. Highly Recommended!

The location is very safe and convenient even for first time travellers in NYC just like me.no strict rules was implemented and francisca was very nice and  a great host inspite of her busy schedule she cleans the house almost everyday and communicate well with her guest.
Francisca has a kind and caring neighborly way. Her home is filled with a welcoming warmth that makes visitors feel at home.
Francisca was very welcoming and sweet. She picked me up from the airport and offered me food. The room was very comfortable and quiet. I would definitely recommend staying at Francisca's.

Francisca et son logement sont uniques! On a un "accueil-plus" exceptionnel,beaucoup trop de "petits-plus" qui font que l'on ne peut que choisir cette place,lorsqu'on descend à JFK. Qualité/prix? On ne peut trouver mieux à New-York! A part sa chambre,on a accès à un large salon,une cuisine équipée de tout ce qu'on a besoin,un très grand  réfrigérateur. On croirait que l'on est même pas sorti de chez soi! Et si on a un invité de dernier moment à rajouter,il sera le bien-venu,sur un lit fautueil confortable dans un autre coin,bien au doux.

Francisca est une hôtesse qui ne lésigne sur aucun moyen afin de mettre ses guests à l'aise.
Même lorsqu'elle part faire ses achats,elle nous propose de venir avec elle pour acquérir ce dont nous avons besoin.
Je ne la remercierais pas assez pour tous ces "petits plus",qui en font de "grands plus"!
Un grand merci Francisca!
Francisca is a lovely, welcoming and professional host. She is just what a tired traveler wants to see. The room was HUGE and the internet worked great. Thanks for everything, Francesca!

I stayed in Francisca's place for 6 weeks for my clinical rotation and it was an excellent stay. The location was awesome, the place is clean and well organized, she responds promptly to guest's concerns and addresses it immediately. She is a very friendly, accommodating and excellent host and my I really enjoyed my stay. And before I forget, she made me breakfast the morning after I arrived and showed me where I can get groceries nearby.
I will surely recommend this place to everyone and definitely stay here again when I am in new york.
Thank you Francisca.
The complimentary water, apple juice and extremely comfterable bed was way way more then i expected.
Very friendly, helpful, and hospitable

Great place to stay. I literally got the whole apartment with big TV and lots of channels, you don't just get a bedroom. Bed and pillows really comfortable and Francisca even called me from outside the country to make sure I was happy and ok. Her family were really helpful and gave me big bottle of juice and make sure I was ok! The place is so convenient, 5 mins from metro, pharmacy, fast food and take out places. Also right across from the beach so I could go running every day. Will definitely stay again.
Франческа очень приятная и заботливая хозяйка, я чувствовала себя словно в гостях у родных.

Francisca is a warm and welcoming host.  She goes out of her way to make you comfortable.  Fresh fruit, water, and juice etc were provided.    
The location is about 4 blocks from the subway.  The commute from/to JFK airport is short and commute into the city is about an hour.  It is also very close to the beach.
Francisca is a great host! I stayed for a month and enjoyed my stay. I would definitely stay again if looking for an Airbnb near the city.
Enjoyable stay.
She was nice and helpful
Great place. Better than a hotel. Very comfortable bed.
Awesome Host, Great Communication, and Super Friendly! It didn't feel like Airbnb while staying here. It felt like a friend's house. Highly Recommended! You will receive more than you expected. :) <3
Great host. Gave me the space I needed but still was available if there was any issue. Highly recommend this place . Gave pots to cook as my stay was two weeks. Very thoughtful.
It was nice to stay a night. Easy to reach.
Ms. Francisca is super sweet and kind, and a great communicator. Location is far from Manhattan but perfect for queens and so close to Rockaway beach.

I was here for the fall , I stayed a total of 5 weeks for job purposes but really it felt like a vacation. The location is by the beach. You will have no concerns getting to this property you must  take the train system(A train)  and will get you to this location in no problem. It is by the airport jfk. I was coming from Newark Liberty international, and I followed the directions to get the A train. It took around 1 hour for me. Once  I arrived I was immediately greeted with food by Francisca . Francisca is very delightful she  prepared food for me multiple times despite her busy schedule and I was able to eat. She would leave fresh food on the table for me, and I would come back to see a plate of food which was nice. She showed me  the whole apartment and I was happy to see how  bigger it is than in the pictures. Very spacious with a lovely clean bathroom you will be more than happy to see it is big and clean, not  like a small box as in other New York accommodations. I was lucky because she made me feel very comfortable in such a big space and I settled in quickly. Food options
There is key food 5 minutes work 
Deli stores ( all over which is excellent)
Cvs 5 minutes walk 
Dunkin doughnuts 5 minutes walk 
Basking and Robbin 5 minutes 
Train station 5 minutes walk 
Laundrette that has a FREE drying service $4.75 to wash, it  is about 4 minutes  walk ( Fernando is your guy, he will assist with your laundry. I recommend tipping him as well as he will wash and dry your clothes for you if you want) 
The area is by the beach, after having a stressful day in the city I would go to the beach and just relax.

It is a quiet area, all people within the area are polite. There is a strong diverse community so really you can eat a variety of foods. My favourite place to eat was Yumze Gourmet Deli and Smoothie and also a deli stores just opposite the station R&R. Fresh food, the owners are  down to earth man. I enjoyed my stay and will be coming back when I’m next in New York . Thank you so much
Had a wonderful stay. Francisca was a great host, very attentive. The place is very well kept. I would definitely stay there again.
She is an amazing host. Will definitely be coming back to her place!

Francisca place was very close to JFK airport. Francisca was very accommodating with my late check in after my original flight was cancelled. Francisca was extremely good at replying to any questions and helpful. The place was excellent value for money.

Ms. Francisca was a very warm and welcoming host. She was there when I arrived and offered dinner to me and the other guest which was very kind. The location is an 8 minute walk to St. John’s hospital.
I needed a place to stay for the night and Francisca's was perfect. It was clean and had everything that was needed for a comfortable nights stay. Guests have a private entrance and kitchen.

Francisca was the most kind, caring & courteous host I’ve ever encountered. She’s always there if you need her while still giving you your own personal space. The neighborhood is very quiet and safe. Her home is extremely clean & smells good. She even has daily coffee & tea. I would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a peaceful but nice space to stay.
Very clean place and very friendly host. Highly recommend.
I have stayed in couple of homes, but Francisca's is the best so far.

Amazing experience. Francisca is very kind and polite. The neighborhood is quiet, you can take some time relaxing out of the real mess of Manhattan. If you have no problem with subway, very recommended place.

I loved this home, but above all i loved the host. Francisca was really a great help starting from when I booked the place until I left, she helped me figure out what transportation to take which made my trip much easier and enjoyable. I definitely recommend staying at her place.

Excellent hospitality from my new “aunty” - the best part of my overall experience, hands down! I also really liked how private this space feels. It’s a great spacious room with a bathroom and kitchen in the basement,  along with a separate entrance away from the family living space. Gives you a studio apartment feel. Will definitely stay again! Thanks, aunty!
Francisca is outstanding host and pleasant to deal with. She was prompt in her responses.
Very nice and quiet and Cozy
Really great place loved it! And franscisca is so sweet! Would stay again
I will be back, thank you!!!

name: Maui Kamaole 1BR Ocean View Front Row Condo
summary: Condo, 1 Bedroom, 2 Baths (Sleeps 4) Maui Kamaole is located on the border of Kihei and Wailea, making it easy to drive to popular beaches, restaurants, and attractions in both beach towns. The property is set on a hill overlooking the ocean. Kamaole Beach Park III is right across the street, which is a very popular family-friendly beach on Maui. Take comfort in knowing that the beach has lifeguards on duty that are watching you or your children while they are in the water.

host.host_about:
Aloha, 
We are Condominium Rentals Hawaii. We have been managing condo rentals in Hawaii for 35 years now and love welcoming our guests to the islands. We manage over 375 vacation rentals on Maui and Kauai and have been serving AirBNB guests for over 5 years now.

We encourage you to read our 300+ reviews left by AirBNB guests to learn more about our service and condos! 

If you have any questions about surf breaks, golf courses, restaurants, or tours on Maui, we can absolutely help you out. Maui no ka oi!

name: Cedofeitadream
summary: Simple, practical and comfortable decoration to make you feel at home. It's a house with lots of light! Equipped to think also of children.
description: Simple, practical and comfortable decoration to make you feel at home. It's a house with lots of light! Equipped to think also of children.
neighborhood_overview: O apartamento fica próximo de hospital, farmácia, comercio, restaurantes e próximo da zona de bares para quem quiser aproveitar a noite! El apartamento está cerca de los hospitales, farmacias, tiendas, restaurantes y bares cerca de la zona para aquellos que quieran disfrutar de la noche! The apartment is close to hospital, pharmacy, shops, restaurants and close to the bars area for those who want to enjoy the night!
notes: Desde  o dia 01 de Março de 2018  é obrigatório a cobrança da Taxa municipal Turística no Porto, são 2€ por dia e por pessoa ( acima dos 13 anos) no máximo de 7 dias. A cobrança será feita pessoalmente no dia de check in. Segue o link com o folheto informativo  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Obrigada e sejam bem-vindos!
transit: A 5m da estação de metro da Trindade. Próximo de transportes públicos, vário parques de estacionamento a pagar El 5 m de la estación de metro Trindade. Cerca de transporte público, varios aparcamientos de pago 5m from Trindade metro station. Close to public transport, several car parks to pay

host.host_about: Sou uma pessoa apaixonada pela vida, adoro  viajar , dançar, amo a minha família e a minha cidade . Adoro receber bem os meu amigos e as minhas visitas , adoro flores , surpresas ,  gosto até da rotina quando é bem vivida….

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Marta's place was very nice and spacious, in a great location and walking distance from all the great sights and close to all the good cafes and pastry shops. Handing over the keys was really simple, the flat was very clean with a large bathroom and kitchen, perfect to stay over for many more days than we did. Would definitely recommend this for a group traveling to Porto, great choice!
Un apartamento muy recomendable, que es céntrico y tranquilo a la vez. Limpieza, equipamento, atención... todo excelente. Y la anfitriona de 10, te da información y ayuda que necesites.

Ottima soluzione per visitare Porto.
L'appartamento è in posizione centrale e permette di visitare il centro spostandosi a piedi.
Appartamento nuovo e in ordine . Marta molto gentile e disponibile per il check-in.
Muy céntrico, limpio y bien equipado la anfitriona muy atenta a nuestra llegada, y todo un detalle que nos dejó agua fresquita y frutas para un día caluroso. Volveremos.
Nice place to stay and good treatment overall.

El piso es excelente, mucho mejor de lo que se aprecia en La foto, totalmente recomendado, es amplio, moderno, limpio, los colchones perfecto, Cocina totalmente equipada y si llevas un bebe tiene cuna, bañera, trona...estarás como en tu casa.Además Marta es un encanto, te resuelve cualquier duda y esta a tu disposición, cuando llegamos nos tenía preparado agua y una cesta de fruto, en definitiva el alojamiento está de 10 por su ubicación, comodidad y atención.

A very well located apartment in the center of Porto. Marta has been very kind with us and thanks to her and her apartment, we spent a beautiful week ! 
The apartment is full equiped for babies or for children, it makes the difference ! 
Thank you again Marta !

Excelente ubicación,piso muy amplio, equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar unas buenas vacaciones.
Marta es una chica encantadora no tuvimos problemas con la hora de llegada y fue muy detallista dejándonos fruta leche y café.
Nuestra estancia fue muy agradable.
Totalmente recomendable.
Apartamento muy céntrico, cómodo y tranquilo. La anfitriona muy atenta y amable. Una estancia para repetir.

Apartamento estupendo, limpio y cómodo. Mejor que en las fotos. Estuvimos como en casa. No le falta detalle. Hay un parking a 200 m. Dejamos allí el coche y nos movimos andando por todo Oporto. Los dueños son una pareja encantadora. Muy serviciales. Volveremos.
A casa é óptima, com tudo o que é necessário. Boa localização. Local silencioso. Anfitriã muito simpática e sempre disponível.
Piso reformado, grande, muy limpio y muy bien ubicado. Propietaros muy amables y flexibles. Muy buena opción para visitar Oporto!

We had an incredible stay at Alexandra’s home. It was so close to the center you dont need to take any transport. The couple was super nice to us, they gave us some tips and waited for us. We want to thank them for making our trip so cool.
Des hôtes charmants, accueillants et parlant portugais, français et anglais. Très à l'écoute... un appartement parfait pour une escapade à Porto... quartier génial et calme le soir.
Joli appartement bien situé et très bien équipé. Coin nuit au calme. Nous avons visité Porto à pieds. Alexandra était à notre écoute. Je recommande!

L’accueil d’Alexandre a été très chaleureux et ponctuel. Le logement est bien placé, dans une rue piétonne parfois animée la nuit - sans déranger le sommeil car les chambres donnent à l’arrière de l’immeuble. 
Du salon-cuisine ultraspacieux et très bien équipé à neuf (mixeur à soupe, grille pain, microonde, etc. tout y est !), on a vu sur l’immeuble d’en face recouvert d’azulejos : on est bien à Porto :)
La 2e chambre avec son lit superposé et son 3ème lit est parfaite pour les enfants (+ 1 lit d’appoint si nécessaire).   
Le chauffage central (avec sèche serviettes !) et l’eau chaude à volonté sont un luxe appréciable dans une ville où la météo est parfois incertaine et ... humide ;)
La grande surface du logement est très agréable. La propreté est impeccable et le mobilier neuf et bien pensé - les poufs et le canapé ont fait notre bonheur après les longues marches dans la ville.
La position nous a séduit car nous ne souhaitions pas être au cœur du quartier touristique et bruyant de la Ribeira, tout en étant à 15 minutes à pied du fleuve et des monuments ainsi que du métro ou du bus (une ligne passe à 5 min) . Un parc splendide (Palais de Cristal) est situé à 10 minutes à pied. La rue est commerçante la journée (de quoi remplir ses valises de souvenirs ...ou de vêtements fashion !). 
Côté communication, Alexandra a toujours été très réactive (avant et pendant le séjour) et nous a aussi aidé à trouver un pédiatre quand notre fils a eu un souci de santé.

Très agréable séjour avec les enfants sur porto. De belles ballades, de longues marches et contents de se poser le soir à l appartement qui était très accueillant et très pratique dans un quartier calme. Jolie adresse.

Alexandra est très à l'écoute et réactive.
L'appartement  est situé dans une rue piétonne et commerçante au centre de Porto. La visite de Porto se fait à pied.
Surtout ne pas se priver des restos situés dans cette rue (et à Porto en général).
Le stationnement des voitures est compliqué et nous conseillons vivement les parkings payants ! Attention la police circule tout le temps !!!!!
Bien situé dans une rue piétonne et à proximité des bars et petits commerces. Spacieux, propre et lumineux. Le logement convient parfaitement pour un séjour entre amis ou en famille à Porto!

The apartment was nice and clean, well equipped, and the neighbourhood is really nice. The only problem we had, however, was that there was a rather loud construction going on in the next building, they were probably demolishing a wall, from 8 am.  As Alexandra told us it just started the day we arrived to the apartment : (
We stayed in Porto at Alexandra's for 12 days, her husband tried and on our 10th day succeeded to make the workres stop the loud noise, he called the company several times and even had to call the police to achieve that. We really appreciated that they did not give up, but we were quite disappointed in the beginning because we could not properly rest, we have a 3 year old child who would have needed an afernoon nap which was impossible. However, Alexandra did understand our problem and made a generous offer to give us one week stay for free next year to compensate. Our experience was therefore rather mixed. Porto, and the neighbourhood and the flat would have been perfect for us otherwise.

Nous avons été bien accueilli pas Alexandre. Bouteilles d'eau et fruits nous attendaient à notre arrivée. L'appartement est propre et spacieux. Il est idéalement situé pour pouvoir visiter Porto à pieds. Pas besoin de prendre le métro ni le bus. Les chambres situées à l'arrière nous ont permis de bien nous reposer.
Very nice appartment- very clean - amazing localization near the center  with bedrooms without noise according to their back location

Nous revenons d’un séjour chez Alexandra et son mari, se sont des hôtes super. Nous avons eu un très bon accueil. L’appartement est très cosi, convivial propre et en plus accessible aux différents transports 2 métros Lapa et Trindade proche de l’appartement.
Je recommande ces hôtes.
Carole
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement où l'on sait senti très bien. Il est très spacieux. Le quartier est animé ce qui est agréable d'autant plus que la rue est piétonne et ce qui est bien c'est que les chambres sont de l'autre côté de la rue et au calme. La Literie est très bien. On est arrivé à pied depuis le métro, son mari nous attendait à l'arrivée. Nous avons fait tout le séjour à pied  à environ 10 minutes des premiers lieux à visiter. Alexandra a été réactive dès notre arrivée à l'aéroport et pendant notre séjour et les petits plus achetés (thé, sucre, chocolat en poudre, fruits, gel douche, savon) ont bien rendus service.

Excellent séjour en famille à Porto. L appartement d Alexandra est idéalement situé, proche du quartier historique, dans un quartier commerçant (boulangerie, petite supérette, magasins de chaussures-vêtements et plusieurs restaurants). Son gros point fort est le calme dans les chambres car elles donnent côté cour. Porto est une chouette destination pour 3-4 jours. Prendre de bonnes chaussures car tout se fait à pieds.

Apartamento muy amplio, con capacidad para 5 personas, en pleno centro de Oporto con la posibilidad de dejar el coche a 200 metros en un garage privado bastante barato.

La zona está muy bien, una calla peatonal que aún guarda la esencia de tiendas y comercios de toda la vida, con diferentes ofertas para desayunar, tomar un café, almorzar o cenar y a escasos metros del Oporto monumental. Además de eso, hay un supermercado "Pingo Doce" a apenas 300 metros. Por la noche, para dormir, es muy tranquilo ya que no hay tráfico.

Nos recibió Alexandre que esperó pacientemente a que llegáramos algo más tarde de lo previsto. Todo hospitalidad (habla español también) con la explicación referente al apartamento en sí y a la zona. Además, me llamó cada día de nuestra escapada a Oporto para preguntar si estaba todo bien o necesitábamos algo.

El apartamento está muy bien equipado en lo referente a la cocina (vajilla completa, horno, microondas, máquina de café, batidora, etc..) lo que te dá la posibilidad de preparar desayunos o comidas con comodidad. Tiene un dormitorio con una litera y una cama extra muy amplio, el de matrimonio tiene una cuna. Televisión de última generación (en el salón y las habitaciones). En general las fotos se corresponden con lo que nos encontramos, incluso las fotos no dan la impresión de lo "grande" que es el apartamento, 

Hay pequeños detalles que mejorar (el sofá no es muy cómodo, eché en falta algún perchero, había una luz que fallaba...) y cosillas que estoy seguro que los anfitriones mejorarán porque no es difícil.

Porto es una ciudad que enamora. Nos quedamos con ganas de más, y estoy seguro que volveré a contactar con CedofeitaDream llegado el caso.

Appartement tres bien situé 
Et les chambres vraiment au calme
Je recommande sans hésitations !!!!!!

name: Near the center and the airport . Double room
summary: Habitación doble para dos en apartamento compartido . Se puede acceder a todo el apartamento . Disfruta del sol de Barcelona en nuestra terraza
space: Habitación doble , en piso compartido . Acceso a toda las áreas compartida salón , cocina , baño , terraza . Gran terraza para disfrutar de los desayunos incluidos al sol de Barcelona . Podemos facilitaros diferentes eventos , actividades , espectáculos y fiestas incluso gratuitas para completar vuestra estancia en la ciudad .
description: Habitación doble para dos en apartamento compartido . Se puede acceder a todo el apartamento . Disfruta del sol de Barcelona en nuestra terraza Habitación doble , en piso compartido . Acceso a toda las áreas compartida salón , cocina , baño , terraza . Gran terraza para disfrutar de los desayunos incluidos al sol de Barcelona . Podemos facilitaros diferentes eventos , actividades , espectáculos y fiestas incluso gratuitas para completar vuestra estancia en la ciudad . El baño es compartido , la cocina se podrá utilizar para hacerse el desayuno incluido y otras pequeñas comidas rápidas , únicamente comidas rápidas ( no se podrá utilizar el horno )  . Siempre se debe limpiar todo lo que se haya utilizado en la cocina . Se incluye el desayuno pero no la preparación y limpieza de utensilios Con previo aviso puedo registraros en eventos , museos , actividades , espectáculos y fiestas gratuitas en la ciudad , durante vuestra estancia . El apartamento se encuentra a 10 minutos caminando de pl
neighborhood_overview: El apartamento se encuentra a 10 minutos caminando de plaza España , Sants y monjuict . Cerca del metro a tan solo 4 parada de metro del las famosas Ramblas , perfecta combinación para sagrada  Familia , Park Güell y Camp Nou  , 15 minutos en metro .  Podeis encontrar supermercado cércanos , estancos , fruterías , bazar ... Incluso una gran centro comercial , con varias tiendas de ropa , restaurantes y cines  . También el metro a 5 minutos caminando , buena combinación de autobús tanto de día como de noche . La accesibilidad con el aeropuerto es muy buena , tenemos un bus metropolitano tanto de día como de noche rápido y económico . Bus 46 , bus N17 , bus N 16 .
transit: El metro más cercanos es la línea roja L1 , aunque tenemos buena comunicación con azul L5 y verde L 3 . También varios autobuses a distintas zonas de la ciudad tanto de día como de noche . En Barcelona el autobús es un transporte cómodo y rápido .
access: El baño es compartido , la cocina se podrá utilizar para hacerse el desayuno incluido y otras pequeñas comidas rápidas , únicamente comidas rápidas ( no se podrá utilizar el horno )  . Siempre se debe limpiar todo lo que se haya utilizado en la cocina . Se incluye el desayuno pero no la preparación y limpieza de utensilios
interaction: Con previo aviso puedo registraros en eventos , museos , actividades , espectáculos y fiestas gratuitas en la ciudad , durante vuestra estancia .
house_rules: La cocina solo podrá utilizarse para comidas rápidas Sandwich , bocadillos , pasta rápida ,y sin pasar más de 30 minutos de preparación . Se prohíbe utilizar el horno . Se debe limpiar todo lo que se utilice  . Ser limpio y ordenado . Para utilizar la lavadora se debe preguntar . Está prohibido invitar a gente al apartamento . El horario de entrada se debe coordinar . En caso de retraso deben ponerse en contacto conmigo a su llegada , y en pocos minutos estaré para recibirles .Solo se admite gente tranquila , no queremos gente que venga únicamente de fiesta . Horario de uso de ducha 7:30 am hasta 23:30 pm . Las duchas deben ser cortas y únicamente una vez por día .  Horario de uso de cocina 8:00am hasta 13:30 pm y de 18:30 hasta 21:00pm

reviews.comments: It is located between the airport and city center, and is close to both bus and subway station. The hosts are very friendly. Our flight arrived late at madnight but Gigi still waited for us. Their home is clean with a big bathroom and a big tub. Their dog is well trained and very quiet both in day and night.

We had a really lovely stay at Gigi's place. Though the room was a little tiny, it didn't bother us at all. It was cozy and relaxing. The bathroom was well equipped with all the things that I needed while traveling without any toiletries along with me. The shower was amazing and the breakfast was wonderful for our early start. The location worked out great for us needing to be somewhere between the city and the airport. It may be a bit out of the way for those with a longer stay and want to roam about the city center. Overall, everything was just really nice including the host and I would definitely recommend staying here for a short stay in Barcelona!

La estancia ha sido genial, la verdad que hemos parado poco por la casa pero en los pocos momentos que hemos coincidido se han mostrado simpáticos, agradables y por supuesto dispuestos a ayudar en todo lo que necesitaríamos, nos vamos muy contentas por el trato recibido y por las instalaciones de la habitación, si volvemos por Barcelona no dudaremos en repetir alojamiento!! Además tienen una perrita que es puro amor!! ❤
She did a great job welcoming us, it is very close to the metro station and much to do in the area.

Gigi and Jonny were wonderful, friendly and helpful hosts. Their place is very nice and has everything you need. It is also close to transportation and the city center. They have a very sweet dog too :)
Gigi has a lovely home and the location is good as it is close to a couple of supermarkets and a few minutes walk to the metro.

Nice apartment located between airport and city center. It has a big tube and beautiful terase where you can eat delicious breakfast. We didn't met Gigi but she gave us the best instructions about everything we needed. We reccomended 100%

Everything was allright. The room is small, but clean and nice. The breakfast offers everything you need like coffee, milk and cornflakes. Gigi was nice as well. She explained us what we can use and so on. The location is also good, the metro station to the center is only 10 minutes away.
I can absolutely recommend this accommodation.
Gigi is a great, helpful host. She has a nice apartment with all necessary facilities. I strongly recommend this b&b.
Gigi is a friendly host and everything went fine. The whole appartement and the room are very clean and comfortable. The room is quiet small but very good for a short stay in Barcelona.
Good location. Flexible and communicative host.

Gigi was an amazing host! She was extremely helpful, providing directions and landmarks to help us find her apartment. We ended up arriving hours after we had planned due to a delayed flight and she was very accommodating. Her house was beautiful, and the shower was huge! We loved sitting outside for breakfast and enjoying the sunshine on the front deck. She had an abundance of breakfast foods for us to pick from and great coffee! We'd stay with Gigi again!

We stayed a week at Gigis place, and enjoyed it very much. Gigi is helpful, but unintrusive - nice qualities in a host. As a quest you have access to the kitchen, living room and a large terrace. 

Breakfast is self-service, with several options provided - and you get a shelf in the fridge for you own use, so you can stock up additionally on whatever you like. 
The rooms (3) are very small, basically the size of a double bed and 50cm on the sides, a clothes rack and some drawers. The bed is good quality (!) and not too soft. The window can be opened, its toward a quiet inner space. Nice if backpacking, or just wanting to have a quiet place to sleep (as we did), but good to be aware of. 
The neighbourhood is residential, and there are supermercados around the corner for daily stuff. The area is some 5-10 mins metro ride (and a bit of walking) from the center - for us a good trade for the stillness compared of the loud drunk tourist infested city center.
Great place to stay while you're in Barcelona, their dog Flor is so loving and adorable
Me encontre muy agusto. Gente muy amable con una perrita encantadora.

La casa de Gigi es muy agradable y accesible, pues tienes muchos medios de transporte cerca. Nos recibieron muy bien, y nos permitieron guardar nuestras mochilas después del check out, además de que Gigi siempre nos dio buenos consejos para movernos en Barcelona. Muy recomendable.

Excelente ubicacion, muy cerca al aeropuerto, al metro y a estacion de autobus, es muy  bueno para conocer los sitios de interes de barcelona, adicional, es una zona que permite encontrar precios comodos para  alimentacion y bebidas. los anfitriones son geniales, respetuosos y muy cordiales. la pasamos en conjunto con mi mama muy bien en nuestra estadia.
Casa muy bonita, muy cerca de transporte y un párking al lado justo. Gigi fue muy amable y su perrita es un encanto

Meilleure expérience air bnb. Pas vraiment dans le centre mais on peut trouver station metro ligne 1 juste à côté. On peut aller à place espana où il y a la fontaine de monjuic dans 20 mins a pied. Jolie appart avec jolie terrasse.

We had a great experience, Gigi and her boyfriend are really nice and helpful. The breakfast is wide so you can have a large choice for your own taste. The room is quiet and there's a fan for the hottest nights. A plus is that the location is in a calm area
Nice people, nice house." Felt like home". I definitely recomend it. The dog is as nice as the owners. Thanks for everything.

Gigi is a very nice and helpful person. The apartment was nice with a wonderful terrace. Gigi has a great two dogs!!! With all my heart I recommend staying at Gigi if u are planning to travel to Barcelona.
El apartamento es espacioso, tienes acceso a la cocina lo que es muy práctico. El cuarto es un poco pequeño pero práctico.

In the case of . About the house . Large , comfortable , clean , beautiful , everything is there for life . Lovely terrace for Breakfast , dinner and a night of talk of candles , lanterns under the open sky . District . Clean , quiet, 10 minutes walk to the square of Spain . A shop nearby . At this time, August 20-25, are street festivals, street clothed in costumes of the old factory , film movie , North pole . If you love to walk then this is a great option , in my last trip I lived in the center and a little walking around the outskirts and all the time I spent in the centre , here at Gigi you will be able returning from the sea , with the square of the Catalogs to look at to see. Many beautiful historical places . Ostanovka bus and metro nearby . 5 minutes on foot . Suggest .Gigi . Kind , sweet , punctual , always connected . All prompt and tell . There is a morning Breakfast juice, milk , coffee , croissant , muffin , fruits .

En voyage avec une amie, la chambre est petite mais l'appartement est agréable. La salle de bain est propre ainsi que le reste de l'appartement. Le métro est à 7 Minutes à pied pour une des lignes principales. Les rues sont sûres pour rentrer le soir à deux filles. Je conseille ce logement les yeux fermés. 
Nous n'avons passés que très peu de temps dans l'appartement ( juste pour dormir) je n'ai donc que très peu échangé avec les hôtes, qui sont très gentils par ailleurs.
This place was perfect for our short stay in Barc. Gigi was very accommodating, letting us store our bags the next day while we explored. Love the pup too!

Gigi втретила на ночью прямо на улице. Мы прилетели поздним рейсом, и нам нужно было переночевать перед  дальнейшей дорогой. Добираться из аэропорта ночным автобусом очень удобно. Особенно нам радовалась собака, она вряд ли кого-то оставит равнодушным:) Хотя и сильно докучать не будет. Квартира просторная, сама комната очень маленькая, но этого более чем достаточно для короткого пребывания. Приятным бонусом с утра был завтрак. Да, это просто тосты с джемом, кексы и кофе, но перед дорогой тоже неплохо. В итоге, мы всем очень довольны и благодарим хозяев за гостеприимство

L'appartement est très bien situé (à proximité de la place Espagna), les transports en commun sont facilement accessibles. Gigi est très accueillante et à l'écoute, elle nous a même prêté ses parapluies durant les jours de pluie. Elle n'hésite pas à vous renseigner. Le petit déjeuner n'était pas très copieux mais fait l'affaire ! 

En ce qui concerne les points négatifs : la chambre est très étroite et le lit ne convient pas pour deux personnes. L'appartement est mal insonorisé (voisins beaucoup trop bruyants).
Sympa, belle terrasse, proche du métro (L1 Station Merca Nou Direction Place de Catalogne).

Gigi's place is as describe in the pictures. It is very clean and comfortable. Our flight got delayed and she waited for us to arrive. The location was great as it is located in a quiet and safe neighbourhood, away from the city area. Metro station is about 10 mins walk away and it gets to the city in 15 mins or less as the stop is within the same line as the city one. There is also night bus that stops near by her place, which is very convenient. She also had a dog that is very friendly. So for those that are afraid of dogs, fret not, the dog doesn't bother you at all. Gigi also provide some snacks for breakfast, which is mainly bread and cupcakes. There are variety of drinks to choose from as well. Overall it was a great stay at gigi's place and would highly recommend it for your stay in Barcelona.
Buenísima anfitriona, muy atenta en todo lo que puedas precisar. Persona agradable y hospitalaria 100x100. Recomendable sin dudas
Es una casa acogedora. Tienen una perrita que es muy lista y educada. Gigi fue muy amable y servicial. Nos  hicieron sentir como en casa.

We were staying at Gigi home for 5 days. We liked everything! Room was comfortable and clean. Breakfast on the terrasse was a good bonus. Gigi, her boyfriend and their dog were very friendly. Everything was cool!
Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable en la casa de Gigi. Lo recomendamos al 100%.
Zona tranquila. Gigi muy amable, pendiente que no falte nada. No dudaremos en coger la misma habitación la proxima vez que vayamos a barcelona.

Gigi was a great host. Was a really smooth stay and Gigi was on hand to answer questions and make sure my stay was comfortable. The apartment was well located but set back from the main road so quiet.
Everything was great, breakfast was exelent. But i smelled a bit of smoking smell, we didnt spend much time in the appartment, and it didnt conserned us much
Muy buena ubicación, cerca de algunos bares, restaurantes y supermercados, la estación de metro a 5 min. Los anfitriones atentos y buenas personas.

Recomendable la anfitriona súper amable y muy comunicativa nos indico las rutas de trasporte la atención muy buena, lo único es que el wifi no llega muy bien a la habitación en la que estábamos alojados.
El apartamento es limpio, el internet funciona muy bien, es un poco retirado de la zona turística.
Great place and close to public transportation
The host canceled this reservation 41 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Gigi was really nice, we arrived later should be, and she welcomed us without a problem. A room was nice and cosy with wifi connection, we had also access to a terrace. Flat have a good location, close to metro station.
Although we only stayed a short time, our time at Gigi's was really nice. Gigi was a very lovely lady (Beautiful dog also). Perfect for a quick stay on a budget!
Die Unterkunft war genau wie beschrieben. Sehr sauber, nicht weit von der Metro entfernt und die Kommunikation mit Gigi war sehr gut. Sie hat uns freundlich empfangen und wir kommen gerne wieder.
It is good place for staying in order to open Barcelona. Near the Placa de Espanya,  about 10 minutes by foot,  quiet location. Also there is amazing and friendly dog Flor)
Die Lage war top, direkt an der Metro. Gigi und ihr Mann waren sehr freundlich!

Ubytovanie bolo dobre situované, nie príliš hlučná area , metro a autobusy boli blízko takže ľahká dostupnosť do centra . Byt bol veľký a priestranný s veľkou terasou . Gigi bola super , v pohotovosti aj v noci ked sme dorazili. Milá a pohostinná, spoločnosť nám robil aj krásny psík ;) určite odporúčam

The room is very small but clean. The apartment is not very central but public transport is easy walking distance.  Good budget room and as previously mentioned, their dog is lovely. There is mention of breakfast being included in the listing however Gigi never mentioned anything about this so we supplied our own.

It's the perfect apartment for a short stay in Barcelona. The house is very comfortable and clean. The room is nice and the bathroom is perfect. The terrace makes every breakfast special , if you're lucky to get sunny days!

It's located in a calm neighborhood, well served by public transportation (metro/bus/night bus) which gets us anywhere we want.

Gigi was a great host who would be very accessible and help us with everything. They have a lovely dog which doesn't cause any trouble at all (you'll want to play with her!).
Buena comunicación con varios medios de transporte! Instalaciones acordes a lo publicado! Todo bien y buena comunicación! Gracias por todo!

I did not see Gigi during this stay but she was a great communicator and answered all our questions promptly. There was a bit of confusion with the check in but that was really the only issue. The room, as mentioned by others, is quite small. However since Gigi was not there we pretty much had the large common spaces to ourselves. The space was otherwise clean and in close proximity to amenities.

Gigi wasn't around for the entirety of the 6 days I spent at her place so we had the whole place to ourselves aside from another AirBnb'er who was also barely there for 2 nights.  She was great with communication and picking up the keys couldn't have been easier (just from a grocery store across the street and tell the clerk the keys are for Gigi's).  Location is great, 10 minute walk from Mercat Nou station, can be to the beach in ~30 minutes with only one transfer.  Plaça d'Espanya is only a 20 minute walk away or 2 train stops so very easy to get the bus from the airport and there is a Lidl close by for cheap grocery and beer needs.  The balcony area is amazing.  Only complaint I could have with the place is there is a bit of construction going on in the building and surrounding area which gets noisy early on weekdays so if you're a light sleeper maybe invest in some earplugs.
Nice place!
We had a very good time at Gigi’s place, and would definitely stay there again. Apartment is like 15 min away from every main attraction, so very easy to get anywhere :)

Logement intéressant pour un couple passant quelques jours à Barcelone. Bien équipé, grande terrasse et salle de bain très agréables. La chambre n'est pas très grande mais suffisante pour y dormir quelques jours. La literie est très confortable.
Bon accueil de Gigi (et de son adorable chien), toujours là pour répondre à nos questions ou conseils sur la ville. Nous recommandons ce logement !

Gigi was very nice and even the room was how I expected it to be - a little small but everything you need was in there. The Appartement was also very cool, with a big kitchen and a huge terasse ☺. 
And Gigis dog was such a cutie . 
I would totally come back there and recommend it!!

The double bed room advertised was a bit smaller than expected but that wasn’t an issue as we basically only slept there. It was quite hard to get up in the morning, because there was no outside window. Apart from that everything was great and we’ve got nothing to complain about. PS the dog was lovely. Thanks for letting us stay Gigi!

1) 40 min zu spät gekommen 
2) Zimmer viel zu klein für 2 Personen 
3) Bett voller Hunde Haare 

... 
nicht meine Ansprüchen und das Geld würdig !
Спасибо. все было хорошо)
I recommend, Gigi was amazing and is near the metro station and the bus.
Great host, the dog is absolutely adorable!
Buen apartamento
es algo retirado pero buen piso, es limpió y algo más chico de lo que se ve

Didn't have the chance to meet Gigi personally, nevertheless she made sure everything was ready for our staying, which was great! Very, very nice place!
Thank you Gigi!
Muchas gracias a Gigi y su pareja, fueron muy amables y serviciales.  La casa y el cuarto estaban muy limpios, fue una estadía muy agradable! Gracias!

L’hôte a un bébé de quelques mois, cela n’était pas précisé sur l’annonce. 

+ Localisation transports
+ Logement propre
+ Belle terrasse 

-  Chambre trop petite, mal insonorisée et orienté sur le mur d’un autre bâtiment. 
-  règlement intérieur strict (accès cuisine uniquement pour des pâtes ou sandwich)
-  accès difficile au salon pour être tranquille car l’hôte est très souvent dans cette pièce 

Si vous souhaitez juste une chambre pour dormir, sachez que la machine à laver tourne encore à 23h et que les journées commencent à 7h avec le lave vaisselle ou le réveil du bébé. 

Ps: J’adore les bébés, le sien comme les autres.
Gigi responses for all queries. the place is easily reachable by public transport. all touristic places are reachable from the here. Bed room is small but convenient. nice place to stay.

Notre séjour chez Gigi (de 3 nuits et 4 jours) s’est très bien passé. Nous n’avons pas eu le plaisir de rencontrer notre hôte mais nous avons partagé son appartement avec un autre voyageur air bnb qui avait une seconde chambre.

Tout correspondait parfaitement à la description et gigi a su répondre à nos interrogations. C’est un appartement agréable et plutôt bien situation (15 minutes a pied de la place d’Espagne). Nous y avons passé un agréable séjour !

Gigi y su chico son muy amables y atentos, junto a su perrita y su niña hacen una familia ideal. Sin molestias en ningún momento y todo facilidades. 
La casa está muy bien aclimatada y decorada, da gusto pasar el rato en su terraza y las fotos no engañan para nada.
Muy recomendable !

We arrived from airport after midnight but Gigi had no problems with a late check-in, which was nice. The space in a room is really minimal,  basically only enough to fit the bed  anda low cupboard with clothes hanger on top of it in. But for a short time stay it's good value for the money.

Las fotos del resto del piso (exceptuando la habitación) no se sujetan a la realidad. 
Exceptuando ese detalle, está bien para una rápida corta estancia, si vas a estar todo el día fuera.

Tout était très bien , très accueillant et propre .
Très calme,  tout est a disposition .
Nous recommandons !

Bien pour une ou deux nuits, assez petit mais suffisant. 
Oreillers pas du tout confortable et très petit, pas de chauffage dans la chambre. 
Réponses de l’hôte assez lente.

name: Sendme2Portugal @Apart. Eusébio - Estação S.Bento
summary: Sendme2Portugal: Loureiro situa-se em pleno coração da cidade do Porto, onde poderá desfrutar da verdadeira cultura Portuense. O meu espaço fica perto de Porto (São Bento), Teatro Nacional São João, Museu do Vinho do Porto, Ribeira do Porto, Posto de turismo, Avenida dos Aliados, Metro (São Bento), Teatro Sá da Bandeira. União de Freguesias do Centro é uma excelente escolha entre viajantes que estão interessados em arquitectura, degustar vinho e caminhadas na cidade.
space: Vai adorar o meu espaço porque tem todas as comodidades para passar uns agradáveis dias na magnífica cidade do Porto. Apartamento bastante acolhedor, onde não faltará nada, como se fosse o seu próprio lar. O meu espaço é bom para casais, viajantes de negócios, e famílias (com crianças). Inclui uma cozinha equipada com um forno, micro-ondas, torradeira, frigorífico, placa de fogão, máquina de café e chaleira, bem como os utensílios de cozinha necessários. O apartamento tem ar condicionado,  Tv por satélite (canais internacionais) , sistema de som incorporado, Wi-fi gratuito.  Casa de banho privativa com um chuveiro, produtos de higiene pessoal gratuitos e secador de cabelo. Um café da manhã continental está disponível diariamente na propriedade mediante reserva prévia (8€ por pessoa), inclui lete, café, sumo, chã, manteiga, 2 tipos de compota, pão, pastelaria e fruta). A roupa de cama e toalhas são fornecidas. Limpeza incluída no preço total. Os hóspedes têm acesso ao apartamento na tot

O apartamento tem ar condicionado,  Tv por satélite (canais internaci
neighborhood_overview: O aeroporto mais próximo é o Aeroporto do Porto, a 11 km. Estação Ferroviária de São Bento 0,1 km  Estacao de Metro de São Bento 0,1 km  Praça das Cardosas 0,2 km  Teatro Nacional São João 0,2 km  Catedral do Porto 0,3 km  Café Majestic 0,3 km  Igreja de Santo Ildefonso 0,3 km  Teatro Rivoli 0,3 km  Casa-Museu Guerra Junqueiro 0,3 km  Muralha Fernandina 0,4 km  Coliseu do Porto 0,4 km  Torre dos Clérigos 0,4 km  Rua Galerias de Paris 0,5 km  Ribeira (Porto) - Património Mundial da UNESCO 0,5 km  Mercado do Bolhão 0,5 km  Ponte D. Luis I 0,6 km  Mercado Ferreira Borges 0,6 km  Estação de Metro do Bolhão 0,6 km  Palácio da Bolsa 0,6 km
notes: Temos também à venda experiências turítsicas (assim que efetuar a reserva, também pode adquirir estes bilhetes): - Cruzeiro Porto Valley (Pinhão e Régua); - Cruzeiro das 6 pontes; - Passeio de Tram; - Funicular dos Guindais (maravilhosa vista sobre o Rio Douro); - Bus hop on hop off (paragem nos pontos principais da cidade do Porto); - Visita às caves do vinho do Porto; - Fado com jantar; - Look at Porto (experiência 5D); - Six Radical Bridges (em Jet Boat); - Missão Jet Boat; - Batismo Jet Boat; - Renting: bicycle, scooter, motorcycle; - Rent-a-car. * Preços sob consulta.
transit: Fica junto à Estação de São Bento. Aeroporto --» Apartamento (transportes públicos) - Metro aeroporto --» Metro Trindade - Metro Trindade --»Metro S.Bento Temos serviço de transfer de e para o aeroporto por 30€ por cada viagem.
access: Para sua comodidade efectuamos sempre presencialmente o Check-in, sendo que o Check-in se for feito após as 18h ser-lhe-á fornecido um código de acesso ao apartamento por e-mail , podendo assim entrar após essa hora. Qualquer situação que surja estaremos prontos a ajudá-lo.

host.host_about:
Três jovens com fibra, juntam-se para contrariar a conjuntura! 
Numa época em que faculdade já não é rede de segurança para quase ninguém, decidimos que o nosso currículo não nos define e o diploma não nos faz maiores que ninguém! 
Junta-se portanto uma Criminóloga com dois Licenciados em Solicitadoria, que têm para além da amizade e a garra da juventude, algo que os une:
Paixão por viajar, conhecer pessoas, culturas e acima de tudo,dar a conhecer este nosso Grandioso País plantado à beira mar!

Apaixonados por Turismo e pelo Mundo, convidamos cada um de vós, a viver momentos mágicos,a ouvir o canto das gaivotas, passear por ruas e ruelas mágicas, rio e mar, sentir esta beleza que nos rodeia, repleta de História e Cultura, e claro, degustar de uma das melhores e mais diversificadas gastronomias, a mediterrânica, com sabores e aromas que nos remontam à doce infância, às avós! 

Venha sonhar e descobrir O Porto, desfrute da nossa estadia , relaxe num dos nossos apartamentos e deixe-se encantar ! 

Sendme2Portugal - Alojamento Local ,vai adorar tê-lo por cá!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Gute zentrale Lage - sehr schöne saubere Unterkunft!
Jeder Zeit wieder!

Accueil chaleureux de Tiago et Catia. Ils ont su répondre à toutes nos questions. Logement très propre et bien équipé. Bien situé, près de la gare de train et de l’action.
Par contre environnement bruyant, et matelas peu confortable..
A truly excellent place to stay in Porto.  Sparklingly clean, amazing location, and, most importantly, personable and knowledgeable hosts.  I will definitely book here again should I return to Porto.

name: LAST CALL MWC - Bedroom w/ private wc and balcony
summary: Acogedor piso todo exterior, con salón muy agradable y cocina equipada. Muy bien ubicado: 5min al metro Poble Sec y 10min a Pl. Espanya. Es 1 habitación con sofá-cama doble, balcón y baño exclusivo para huéspedes. Bueno para viajeros de negocios, parejas o aventureros. Nos vemos :) Cozy apartment with great location: 5min walking to Poble Sec metro station & 10min to Pl. Espanya.  It's 1 bedroom with double sofabed + balcony and private wc. Good place for business, couples or adventurers. See u
space: 1 dormitorio con sofá cama doble, balcón y baño privado.  1 double sofabed with balcony and private wc.

Está en un barrio alternativo con restaurantes, bares de tapas y pinchos, cafeterías, teatros y galerías de arte. Muy cerca de Montjuic, Plaza de España y la estación de metro Poble Sec. It's a cool neighborhood with restaurants, bars, tasty tapas and pinchos, coffeshops, teathers and art galleries, really close to Montjuic Park, Plaza de Espanya and metro station.

name: Trendy and spacious NEW LOFT
summary: Spacious and newly renovated Loft in trendy and upcoming Kennedy Town on Hong Kong island 4' walk to subway and only 4 stops from Central. The apartment is fully new furnished with  1) high quality super king size bed & mattress  2) designer brand sofa  3) dinning table from TREE  4) high quality appliances in open kitchen   5) double glazing windows 6) new split part air conditions
space: Well designed Loft, enjoys sea view facing the water front
description: Spacious and newly renovated Loft in trendy and upcoming Kennedy Town on Hong Kong island 4' walk to subway and only 4 stops from Central. The apartment is fully new furnished with  1) high quality super king size bed & mattress  2) designer brand sofa  3) dinning table from TREE  4) high quality appliances in open kitchen   5) double glazing windows 6) new split part air conditions Well designed Loft, enjoys sea view facing the water front Plenty of new bars and restaurants are few steps away I am an Italian professional, living in Asia for quite some time; easy to deal with as I, myself, enjoy travelling with Airbnb Kennedy Town is an upcoming and trendy area in HK island, with new bars and restaurants popping up every month Lot of expats living here Subway 4' walk
neighborhood_overview: Kennedy Town is an upcoming and trendy area in HK island, with new bars and restaurants popping up every month Lot of expats living here
transit: Subway 4' walk
access: Plenty of new bars and restaurants are few steps away
interaction: I am an Italian professional, living in Asia for quite some time; easy to deal with as I, myself, enjoy travelling with Airbnb
house_rules: - No smoking in the house, can smoke on balcony in front of the entrance

host.host_about:
I am a 36 Italian professional, working and living in Hong Kong.
I have been travelling through airbnb in the past years and I am a committed host to make others' experiences great.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: It's truly an amazing space. Rare in Hong Kong.

This place is right on the water, you can see the sea from the window. The building is a little bit old, but the room is nice and clean, well designed and decorated. There are many restaurants nearby, both traditional and modern. The host is very friendly and easy to communicate. We had a pleasant stay there.

Can't recommend Alessandro's apartment enough. It's beautifully decorated, great size and a fab location. It's not over-priced (for the HK market) and Alessandro responds really quickly and with great detail to help your stay - however, he is also quite a hands-off host, meaning that he gives you the space you need to enjoy your holiday. The only thing I would say to be aware of is that there is no internet available in the apartment, but that didn't spoil our stay at all. Thanks Alessandro - we loved our trip!
Nice decorations and tidy room.

Absolutely the best place in Hong Kong . Extremely clean toilet, comfortable bed and sofa, really nice wooden table, fully equipped open kitchen, very spacious.  I especially like the corridor outside the flat, you will realize a scenario just like in the movie "ghost in the shell". It's very very Hong Kong styled. I'm a local actually, I grew up in this city so I can guarantee you this is one of the best Airbnb flat in Hong Kong , no doubt.

I absolutely loved this place. This flat was so much bigger and nicer than I expected. The building itself is old Hk style but the room is spacious, clean, super stylish, and necessay amenities prepared. The area is right next to the harbour (beautiful to have a walk) with a lot of international restaurants and bars. Alessandro replied very quickly to my msgs too. Highly recommended and will def stay again !!
Great location, space and value for money. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

The building is old but the loft itself is very modern and clean. We loved staying at kennedy town, the view was lovely and there were a lot of places to eat. The loft is also close to the station. Alessandro was responsive and helpful.
确实是很好的房子,性价比很高~房间很大,装修精美,而且设施一应俱全｡唯一要提醒的一点是,房间里没有护发素,所以需要自己买或者携带哦

Very convenient, close to transportation, restaurants, bars, excellent shower pressure, very modern, clean and cosy.

The checkin and checkout process was very simple and straightforward.

Alessandro’s please was wonderful.  It’s my third airbnb in Hong Kong and this apartment was by far my favourite. It was immaculately clean and stylishly decorated and in a great location in Kennedy Town close to lots of hip restaurants and bars. I would definitely stay here again.
A great place in an old building, clean, stylish, spacious ! 5mins to MTR station, So many good food nearby! Nice stay ;)

Because of an unforeseen accident we could not make it to Hongkong and couldn’t stay at Alessandro’s place, but he was very kind and responsive to our situation and obliged to rebook for later date once we are ready to travel. We are great full for that and we expect to experience the stay soon.

Great loft in a great neighbourhood. Building is a bit dilapidated (as expected in many buildings in HK) but the interior is furnished really well. Communication was quick and helpful from Alessandro. Just remember to get a prepaid SIM, as there is no wifi available!

name: The Porto Concierge - Marques House | 402
summary: Room in renovated house, located in Marques area with all main attractions within walking distance. Fully equipped and comfortable. 3 minute walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the house. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Independent air conditioning in each room! See other rooms available on the profile!
space: Within a building, this room is on the 4th floor, accessible by elevator. There is a TV in the room with international channels. There is a common living room with a TV, there are also several comfortable sofas. The dinning area has several tables and chairs to accommodate all the guests in the house. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, from coffee machine, water kettle, microwave, toaster, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery.  There is also two clothes washing machines,and a clothes dryer. Its fantastic location allows a quick access on foot to the main touristic spots in Oporto, like the iconic Lello Bookshop, the Clérigos Tower or even the river area.
description: Room in renovated house, located in Marques area with all main attractions within walking distance. Fully equipped and comfortable. 3 minute walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the house. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Independent air conditioning in each room! See other rooms available on the profile! Within a building, this room is on the 4th floor, accessible by elevator. There is a TV in the room with international channels. There is a common living room with a TV, there are also several comfortable sofas. The dinning area has several tables and chairs to accommodate all the guests in the house. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, from coffee machine, water kettle, microwave, toaster, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery.  There is also two clothes washing machines,and a clothes dryer. Its fantastic location allows a quick
neighborhood_overview: In downtown city centre, within 3 minutes walk to supermarkets, restaurants, coffee shops, bakeries and all sort of commerce. 20 minutes walk to all the main attractions in Porto. Metro only 3 minutes away! In the neighbourhood you can find all type of services: many restaurants, supermarkets, butcher, fruit shops, typical grocery stores, cafes, bakeries, take-away, ATMs, etc.
notes: Extra Services upon request w/ special conditions: • Private transfer to the apartment/airport (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) • Transfer service in a private bus to the Airport (private driver pick up at the apartment): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes • Sightseeing Bus + Port Wine Cellars:  - 1 day: 13€/person* - 2 days: 15€/person* • 6 Bridges Douro Cruise + Port Wine Cellars: 12,50€/person* • Sightseeing TukTuk + Port Wine Cellars: - up to 2 people: 12€/person* - more than 2 people: 10€/person* - Plus Bridges Cruise: 22€/ person* - Plus Cable railway: 17€/ person* • Home groceries delivery  • Babysitting  • Bike rental • Taxi  • Other services as requeste (Website hidden by Airbnb) years old: Free/ 4 - 12 years old: 50% discount For more information, please contact us. Prices may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. Services are provided by business partners
transit: There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment:  - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€)  - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes  - Metro (you should leave on Marques stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 3 minutes walking
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the house.When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. As to communicate your stay to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), your Passport or ID Card details will be requested during check-in.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. As to communicate your stay to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), your Passport or ID Card details will be requested during check-in.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
The room was clean when we arrived and everything was just like described. It's located 2 minutes walk away from the metro station Marquez which drives into the old town in less than 10 min. The concierge service was nice. 

But there is no room service or anything like that, so our room got dirty and there weren't any cleaning supplies in the room. That could be better but overall we really enjoyed our stay there :)
Nice place close to downtown. Have no problem while we're checking in and totally worth the price.

Had a wonderful stay in Porto!! The room is exactly as the photos, confortable and clean. There's a metro station nearby and lots of restaurants and bakerys in the same street! Definitely recomend it!
Limpio y cómodo, a 15 minutos del centro tomándonos el metro
Great location and price. Very straightforward and accurate description. Good communication from the host. Could have used a corkscrew in the kitchen for the complimentary bottle of wine :-P
Highly recommended great for budget travellers. Need to get metro into town takes about 5 mins 1.20 euro each way. Excellent kitchen facilities (3 stoves, ffridges, ovens, sinks, set storage areas)

Alloggio confortevole in un contesto che permette diversi ti pi di utilizzo della struttura, sia solo come camera pwr soggiorno brevi che come punto di riferimento per soggiorno lunghi, dotato di spazi per cucinare, frigo,  lavanderia con ferro da stiro.
Ben servito dalla meteo, pulito e con ospiti davvero gentili che ringrazio ancora. 
Davvero utili le informazioni fornitrici all'arrivo su cosa vedere e dove mangiare.
Consigliato per tutti coloro che amano uno stile di viaggio libero da vicoli,il informale e con ampia libertà di movimento.
very close to marques metro, full equipped kitchen, cable tv many channels, good air con, close to mini marts

name: Cozy Granny Flat
summary: Situated at the rear of the property our brand new 60 sqm Granny Flat is a private and enclosed space with separate access from the main house. Kingsgrove train station is located just a few minutes walk (800m) then 5 stops to Domestic / International Airport Train Stations (10min). Sydney CBD is approx. 25 mins via train.  Our place is good for couples, business travellers and families (with kids).   We are a young family and our Granny Flat is available for you to enjoy your stay.
space: This lovely brand new granny flat is perfect for 4 people provides a quiet escape in the suburbs of Sydney. Located about 16km from the Sydney CBD and a short drive to the airport.  Our place is fully equipped with everything you need. Our Granny flat has a comfy queen sized bed and double bed in the lounge area. We also provide a travel cot and high chair if needed (for up to 2 years old). Children older than 2 years old need to be booked as additional guest. The Kitchen has a Nespresso coffee machine, gas cooktop, electric oven, toaster, kettle, rice cooker, microwave, dishwasher and fridge/freezer. Tea and coffee is provided.
description: Situated at the rear of the property our brand new 60 sqm Granny Flat is a private and enclosed space with separate access from the main house. Kingsgrove train station is located just a few minutes walk (800m) then 5 stops to Domestic / International Airport Train Stations (10min). Sydney CBD is approx. 25 mins via train.  Our place is good for couples, business travellers and families (with kids).   We are a young family and our Granny Flat is available for you to enjoy your stay. This lovely brand new granny flat is perfect for 4 people provides a quiet escape in the suburbs of Sydney. Located about 16km from the Sydney CBD and a short drive to the airport.  Our place is fully equipped with everything you need. Our Granny flat has a comfy queen sized bed and double bed in the lounge area. We also provide a travel cot and high chair if needed (for up to 2 years old). Children older than 2 years old need to be booked as additional guest. The Kitchen has a Nespresso coffee machine, gas
neighborhood_overview: Kingsgrove village is located 800 m down the road next to the train station. There you can find a big supermarket (open from 7am until midnight every day), quality restaurants (Italian, Greek, Thai, Vietnamese etc.) hairdresser, a bottle shop, beautician, pharmacies, major banks, post office, butcheries etc.
notes: Host owns a small friendly dog but it doesn't have access to your place as the granny flat is fully fenced and separate from the main house.
transit: Driving? Easy on street parking and fantastic road access to the city, Southern and Eastern suburbs( entrance to the M5 highway is just around the corner, which takes you everywhere in Sydney in moments).  Public transport is just a few minutes walking distance. Trains come every 15min.  A taxi from the airport will take less than 15min if it is not in peak hour traffic.
access: You will have access to the whole house including a courtyard where you can enjoy dinner or drinks.
interaction: We are available close by for any information or help required. Otherwise guests will have total privacy.
house_rules: - Check in after 2PM and check out by 10AM (unless otherwise negotiated) - Treat our place with the same love and care you treat yours. - Please be mindful of sound levels after 10PM to avoid neighbour complaints.

host.host_about:
We are a loving family of 4, with 2 gorgeous kids 9 and 7 years old. We are easy going and enjoy meeting new people. 
Our self contained Granny Flat was built mid 2016.
New to Airbnb and so far we love it. We welcome any guests who enjoy home feel accommodation and look forward to welcoming you soon.

reviews.comments: Perfect AirBnb! Highly recommend.

I was in Sydney with my family for a holiday and we've had a lovely stay at this new granny flat. It was above and beyond our expectations. If I could rate it, it would be an easy 10/10. This place was way better than a 5-star hotel. This was my first Airbnb experience and they have set the bar so high. From day one, George and Lucia had been nothing but helpful, attentive and on the ball of everything. There was so much thought given to every little detail of the house. The house was super clean and it always had an amazing scent. Fresh linen and towels were provided, and the bed was amazingly comfortable. The kitchen was fully equipped and everything needed to cook was there, including the recipe books. Commuting was rather easy. We took the train most of the time to travel to the city. The nearest train station is Kingsgrove Station which is about 10-15 minutes walking distance. Opal cards can be purchased from a convenience store at the station. We also downloaded the "Opal Travel" app to check on the train times and fare estimate. The nearest supermarket is Woolworths which is only 2 min walk from the train station. There are many restaurants around the train station too. This place has truly made us feel like home and there is absolutely nothing better than returning to a cozy house after a really long day in the city. George and Lucia were the best host we could ever ask for. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Sydney :)

George and Lucia's Granny Flat was a great place to stay. Its new, clean and easy to reach. They were very responsive and welcoming and cared about our needs. George even gave us suggestions on how to spend our time in Sydney and took us to a shopping mall on his day off. Their place is indeed cosy and quiet and it is beautifully designed as well. I was very satisfied with my stay and I highly suggest this place if you are looking for a place in the area! 
I wish the best for this kind family hope to see them someday in my home country , Iran.

Our stay was very comfortable. We had extremely long working hours everyday, this place kept our sanity :) We always looked forward coming back to it. Highly recommended. The hosts are very easy to deal with and always willing to help. We felt as if we were a part of their family. The accommodation could not have been any cleaner and well kept. TEN STARS

George, Lucia and his family are so great and welcoming people. They treated us very well with due respect and provided swift responses to all our queries. 
Their flat is new, so clean and furnished with high quality fittings & kitchen items. The area is quiet, peaceful, close to public transport and walking distance to shopping & restaurants as well. For sure, this place is my number 1 choice for the next trip. With full confidence I recommend everyone to stay in the flat. Definitely, you will enjoy every minute over there. George & Lucia, many thanks for being a great host! If I am asked to give you a grade, I would say 10/10. Hope we shall see you soon!
Great place to stay. Clean, new, private and well set up. George was a very welcoming host, would highly recommend as a place to stay.

We needed a place to stay while our house was being painted. This granny flat was perfect for our small family. It is quite new, very clean and had all the amenities we needed for a comfortable stay. George and his family are warm and friendly. This was our first airbnb experience and we loved it.

Top Rate AirBNB.  Spotless, cosy and beautifully presented. Easy access to Transport, Shopping and Restaurants - We only drove our hire car 20 klm in 3 days!!
George and Lucia have thought of everything and are fantastic communicators.  We Highly Recommend staying with them.
Awesome place and hosts! I would stay there anytime again!
Great place to stay in Sydney, location was perfect for us and the accommodation was 5 star. Helen and Alice

We stayed at George and Lucia's lovely cottage for a week recently and found it to be perfect and our home away from home.
From offering to help with our luggage to sorting Netflix and making us welcome George was a wonderful host.
The cottage is very quiet and even has its own entrance.
Thank you for having us

Comfortable, clean modern  and private; they thought of it all - the house had everything we needed. The furniture is modern and comfortable! A great place to stay would book again without hesitation. Thank you to George great hospitality.

Thank you very much for the great hospitality ,cleanliness ,decoration, location and facilities as well your commitment  .I could never imagine more than I had during my stay in your wonderful place.
I will rent again.

This would have to be one of the best airbnbs we've stayed in. The place was brand new, immaculate and fitted out with everything one would need-awesome attention to detail. We were traveling with our toddler and George and Lucia were thoughtful enough to provide some toys and even a step stool for her in the bathroom. It's that sort of stuff you don't see all the time but makes things much easier! Great hosts.
The apartment is clean, well-equipped with different amenities. A full functioning kitchen for you to do some cooking. The owners have been really helpful during my stay.
Great hosts! Cosy and has everything you need. Very quiet, homey and comfortable for any occasion. Food and shops within a close range.
Ospiti puntuali gentilissimi e ben organizzati con pulizia e comodita'

Amazing hosts! This place is amazing and George and Lucia thought of everything to make our stay comfortable. Traveling with two small boys they were thoughtful enough to provide some toys that kept the boys busy for hours. It's things like this that makes it even more special. Would definitely book here again and recommend George and Lucia's Cozy New Granny Flat. Thank you for having us.
The house is located in Kingroves, should be less than 10 mins to train station.

We arrived after midnight but George was waiting for us with a smile. He even got us groceries so we could get down to breakfast as soon as we woke up. The house is just perfect. Well maintained and very cozy. George and his family are very warm and make you feel at home as soon as you arrive. This was our first Airbnb experience but they sure set the bar high. Thanks for everything!

Hospitality, First Class. 
Accommodation, First Class, 
We were made to feel special. Our first taste of Air BNB. 
George & Lucia`s Granny Flat will be hard to beat. They really have set the bar high. Nothing is too much trouble.
Thanks
Mick Hartley& (son) Jack .
Amazing hospitality,excellent accomodation with all the home away from home amenities, definitely recommend  George and Lucia Cozy Granny flat.
So helpful and made us feel very welcome.

Very nice place,quite, clean,not very far from public transport,with almost everything prepared.Lovely and handsome host with his lovely family,especially lovely kids and dog,are all quite friendly and hospitable.Might be lack of external scenery but terrific inner environment.
Very good
