Highly recommanded! George and lucia's place is absolutely beautiful, quite, confortable and fully equip with all the amenities which is perfact for our family of 3.
A wonderfully clean and comfortable space at a great price! Great deal!

the flat feels cozy and comfortable, tranquility and fully equipped with what you may need, especially to cook food you like.
just good for 3-person family to stay.
really good experience to feel local people live community.
it is near the train station, convenient.

Sydney's best kept secret.

Part of us, really doesn't wish to write this review, because then word will spread at how totally amazing this Air BnB is!

However, by sharing this review, brings the kudos and the praise that both George and Lucia have put into building this B'nB.

Don't be fooled by the name 'granny flat'. This is so much more than the old granny flat of yesteryear. This flat is a place where anyone, even granny won't want to go home!

It is really clear that both George and Lucia really enjoy having their 'granny' visit, because the accomodation is astounding and was originally built to lodge her when she visits from abroad.

You arrive via a second, private and secluded entrance at the rear of the main home. The terraced entrance welcomes you and is a beautiful spot to dine alfresco of a morning or enjoy the native birds and a chilled glass of wine in the afternoon.

The kitchen is modern and well appointed. Stocked with all the essentials as if you were at home. We were welcomed with fresh bread, milk, fruit, chocolates and a bottle of bubbles for new years eve. This made such a welcome sight after having been travelling for the previous ten days and really couldn't be face the shops that late in the warmth of the afternoon.

The bedroom was appointed with plush linen, mountains of pillows to dissolve into, the design features, really made you feel like you have just stepped into a double page spread of an interior design magazine.

After a weeks stay in the leafy suburb of Kingsgrove, we are leaving now as if we are new friends of the family.

Thank you for all the 'plus ones' George and Lucia, they have not gone unnoticed, and your family has really gone above and beyond what we thought was required.

As first time Air BnB users, you really have set the bar ridiculously high!

We look forward to coming back to Sydney to catch up again! Next time we'll supply the bubbles.

xxx Sally, Dwayne and Mon
A lovely spot, close to the airport with easy access to public transport. Super clean accommodation with great amenities!

Thank you George and Lucia for a wonderful stay in your amazing granny flat.  You have thought of everything for a very comfortable stay.  We were in Sydney visiting family and the location was perfect   
Wendy & Colin

Love love love this Airbnb!!! Like most of the people here have said, the granny flat looks just like the pictures :) it’s very comfortable, very cozy, very clean and has everything we could possibly need—extra towels, umbrella, washer, Netflix… the list goes on!! This is the first time my parents rented an Airbnb (they were hesitant at first) and they absolutely loved the experience; kept saying they didn’t wanna leave and if permitted, they would rent this place again the next time they’re in Sydney!  the place is also close to the train station and food shops  100% recommend!!

This was our first Airbnb experience, and it was amazing. The bar has been set extremely high for us based on this time. George and Lucia went so far above and beyond what they needed to do as hosts. They truly thought of everything and their offering is magnificent. The flat looks brand new, is very stylish, yet VERY comfortable. The location is convenient to both the airport and the train station. In total, it is an ideal place to stay in Sydney at a very reasonable price. Our only regret is not having more time to spend there.
This Granny flat is wonderful.  So many nice amenities are included.  We really enjoyed our 18 days there.  George and Lucia are great hosts.  We give them our highest rating - 5 STARS!

This was the best Airbnb experience!  George and Lucia were wonderful hosts!  The place had absolutely everything we needed and more.  It was very clean, modern and comfortable!  Highly recommend! 5 stars!

In this amazing granny you will find the maximum comfort and the stay in a highly prepared place ,very clean and healthy with all types of facilities that let you keep coming again and again.
George is a perfect host , so nice that change you from a guest to a friend level.
Outstanding in every way!!  If there were more stars in the ratings I would use every one!  They have set a very high standard for future Airbnb experiences.

This granny flat is almost the best place I’ve ever stayed on Airbnb! Rooms are really really cozy and all the things we need can be found there. George and Lucia are very nice and helped us a lot. The place is near Kingsgrove Train Station where it’s convenient to take the train to City.

The house was lovely, clean and very comfortable. All amenities were there. It was peaceful and quiet. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it for anyone wanting to stay in the area.
Absolutely the cleanest, best equipped accommodation with gracious hosts.   We will definitely stay here on our next trip to Sydney.

We stayed at the Granny Flat whilst visiting family in Sydney.  It's not in the centre of Sydney but there are good rail links from Kingsgrove station a short walk from the property.  The accommodation is of the highest quality in terms of furnishings, facilities and cleanliness. It was good to have our own entrance so we could come and go as we please.  George and Lucia have thought of everything you could need away from home including shopping bags, washing powder, toiletries and food cupboard staples such as cooking oil, herbs and pasta.  The welcome gift of a box of chocolates and a fridge stocked with milk and butter was really useful.  There is a small Coles supermarket at the petrol station nearby (right at the end of the road) and there is a Woolworths, plenty of restaurants and smaller shops in Kingsgrove. George is very friendly and willing to help in any way he can during your stay.  Would definitely recommend and we will use again.
George and Lucia are great host! everything is perfect and more than we expected

George and Lucia’s flat was perfect. We stayed there for three weeks while renovating and it had everything we needed: kitchen with all the required cookware, super comfortable bed, TV, aircon etc. Also very pleasantly decorated. The extra touches also made it stand out: welcome chocolate, cozy winter sheets, robes, and lots of coffee! Can’t speak more highly of the hosts who made us feel very welcome and offered to help with anything we needed. Train and bus transportation is also handy and nearby. The only negative was the walk to the train station is a bit grungy and industrial, otherwise the granny flat is located in a nice little cul de sac. Would highly recommend staying here. Thanks again G & L!

A stunning granny annex that is a short distance from all the amenities that is needed in a busy city. The annex is spacious, light, modern and well presented. It only took 10 min to get to the train station and a further 20 min to get into the centre of the city. George and lucias granny flat felt private, secure and like a little retreat! We highly recommend staying here with or without children.

It is actually our first time on air bnb and the first experience with this place was an awesome one, the place is very clean, tidy and George actually went on the extra mile by providing us with some toys, knowing that we have our son with us as well. George has been very helpful and we look forward to staying in this place in the near future
Sofar my best experience with AirBNB in Australia! A fantastic flat with everything you need in there, close to the station. George and Lucia are very nice.
The place is great to stay because close the community i.e train station, Chinese restaurant, shopping mall and also airport.

Oh my goodness, what an amazing stay we had. 
Perfectly presented home with wonderful touches throughout.
Will stay again and again when we are in the area!

We had a wonderful stay at the granny flat. The unit is very cosy and well equipped with all the high quality kitchen appliances. George and Lucia are very detailed and thoughtful person, they prepared everything we need. They even provided 2 full bags of lego block toys and soft toys for my children to keep them occupied and entertained.  The granny flat is highly recommended if  anyone is looking for accommodation around kingsgrove/nearby sydney Airport.

Beautiful and modern decor and we felt very at home. We loved how personalised they made they experience (instead of just stating 'dear guest') and suggested local cafes and restaurants to try. Great location with public transport a short distance away.
This place has it all, value for money
Very modern and clean, highly recommended.
George and Lucia provided a beautiful cosy space for their guests. The flat was modern, super tidy and very comfortable. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice space to call home!
A clean and well decorated modern flat.

George and Lucia's Granny Flat was amazing. It was clean, convenient and a nice home away from home. They were great and following up with us to make sure we were ok and nice and settled. I would definitely stay here again and recommend others to stay as well.
geweldig compleet. prima huis met veel privacy. Alle voorzieningen aanwezig.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. The beds were very comfortable, there we snack on the table for us when we arrived and a note with suggested places to eat around the area. George and Lucia were very responsive and I would strongly recommend booking if in the area :)

We loved our recent stay at George and Lucia’s Granny flat. The place is very stylish, modern, very clean & has all the essentials you could possibly need for your stay. It’s extremely quiet on a night too and felt very safe. 

Both George and Lucia are great hosts, very welcoming & are always available for any help you may need. 

It took about 15 minutes on the train to get into the CBD but it’s a straight line from Kingsgrove so made life really easy to get about.

Would recommend the granny flat to anyone looking to explore Sydney!

Dear George and Lucia - we had a great stay at your beautiful cozy property. You have created a wonderful environment for travellers  to stay and feel ‘at home’.  We were visiting our family who live about 10 minutes away from the Granny Flat so great location and very peaceful and quiet given it is no distance from some main roads.  The granny flat is beautifully maintained and sparkling clean. It offers all the creature comforts, including full kitchen amenities and if you just want to watch TV, Netflix is at your disposal.   George and Lucia are the perfect hosts, always there if you need them:). Thank you for the chocolates  -

George and Lucia went above and beyond our expectations. It was truely the best experience that we could have had.

They were such genuine and gracious hosts which made our very first Air bnb experience one that has set high standards.

We will certainly turn to them again for accomodation for our next visit to Sydney.

I highly recommend that you experience their ‘Cozy Granny Flat’, but not so much so that we can’t get a spot in there again haha. (I’m joking of course).

But in all seriousness, the standards are that of a 5 star hotel.
Everything you need in a compact unit. Quiet street. Great hosts. Perfect for a base as we were out often visiting cousins and sightseeing.  Very happy!

George and Lucia’s place was fantastic! Very thoughtful hosts, they went above and beyond to ensure my parents stay was enjoyable! The flat was perfect! Clean, actually spotless heaps of added extras! Highly recommend!!
I highly recommend this place! We had an amazing time in Sydney, especially Lucia’s and George’s hospitality was incredible! Thank you!

This has to be one of the nicest places I’ve ever stayed in. Immaculately clean and beautifully decorated. George and Lucia were fantastic hosts and provided just about everything. I can’t say enough about this property. Will definitely be coming back!

One of the best airbnb's I've ever stayed in. Hosts went above and beyond to make sure stay was great. There was chocolate on the counter and in the refrigerator, fresh eggs, water, and a fully stocked bathroom that had EVERYTHING you might need. I was super impressed. Never seen an airbnb with so much attention to detail.

A few other things to note:

-Beautiful decor and interior design. Pictures do not do it justice.

-AC/aircon is ice cold and does a great job in the Sydney summer

-There's a small, intimate patio outside with seating and a deck.

-internet has strong signal though Australia's 4g/lte is so fast most of the time cell phone tethering is actually faster. I got speeds of around 5mbps.

-Towels are high-end hotel quality. Very soft and fluffy.

-Washer  in unit! Very nice one at that. This flat has nicer appliances than i have at home.

-Actually has 2 full sized beds, one in the bedroom (great sheets and duvet!) and one in a small alcove behind the couch.
G & L's place is a perfect place to rest up.

George and Lucia’s home was beyond wonderful! A beautifully relaxing stay with everything and anything you could need! They were wonderful hosts, very thoughtful, easy to communicate with, and always happy to offer help or assistance! Their granny flat is very private and a cozy little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney, but with shops, trains and facilities a quick walk away! Perfect for any travellers needs!
Can’t express how wonderful their Airbnb really is!
Great place to stay at!! The house is clean and it is around 10 minutes walk from train station.
very clean.

It is a wonderful place to stay in Sydney. We found all we needed to feel “at home” during our stay. 
 
George and Lucia were very helpful with any questions and made it a wonderful experience.
They were wonderful hosts, easy to communicate with and always happy to offer help or assistance!
Their granny flat is very private and a little oasis in Sydney, with shops, trains and facilities a quick walk away! Perfect for any travellers needs! 

We really enjoyed staying there!
Very neat and tidy granny flat. Will definitely be using again.

Wonderful stay at George and Lucia’s lovely home.
Lovely private setting and sparkling clean and with everything we could ever need for our short stay.
George’s recommendation for dinner was also a real highlight to our stay.
Thank you

name: Clean and Comfortable
summary: Relax on the couch, cook a meal, read, sleep in comfort, or unwind in the backyard garden. Perfect for one or two people. A few minutes' walk from great food, coffee shops, bars, parks and a subway to Manhattan. Located in Greenpoint Brooklyn, you can walk easily through the park to Williamsburg.
space: My place is comfortable and clean. Its rare Brooklyn backyard is right outside your backdoor. Although it is a basement set up, there is some natural lighting coming through.
description: Relax on the couch, cook a meal, read, sleep in comfort, or unwind in the backyard garden. Perfect for one or two people. A few minutes' walk from great food, coffee shops, bars, parks and a subway to Manhattan. Located in Greenpoint Brooklyn, you can walk easily through the park to Williamsburg. My place is comfortable and clean. Its rare Brooklyn backyard is right outside your backdoor. Although it is a basement set up, there is some natural lighting coming through. Private entrance, tv, wifi, full fridge, kitchenette, grill, patio furniture, private half-bath.  The only shared space is the shower. I'm friendly, but enjoy my privacy and often need space and solitude to complete my work each day. You may hear some harp practice during the day. The neighborhood is residential/industrial. The immediate and surrounding neighborhood is safe, eclectic, friendly and quiet. Walk 10 minutes to great bars, restaurants and shops. The L-line subway which takes you directly to Manhattan is a 13 m
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is residential/industrial. The immediate and surrounding neighborhood is safe, eclectic, friendly and quiet. Walk 10 minutes to great bars, restaurants and shops. The L-line subway which takes you directly to Manhattan is a 13 min. walk plus a 10 minute ride to the heart of Union Square.  Take a 5 min. cab ride for $8 to Williamsburg. ( or walk there through the park when it is beautiful out. )
transit: There is free street parking and there is usually availability. Just watch for alternate side parking between 11:30am and 1:00pm.  Walk 10 minutes to great bars, restaurants and shops. The L-line subway which takes you directly to Manhattan is a 13 min. walk plus a 10 minute ride to the heart of Union Square.  Take a 5 min. cab ride for $8 to Williamsburg, or walk there through the park and Polish area when it is beautiful out.
access: Private entrance, tv, wifi, full fridge, kitchenette, grill, patio furniture, private half-bath.  The only shared space is the shower.
interaction: I'm friendly, but enjoy my privacy and often need space and solitude to complete my work each day. You may hear some harp practice during the day.
house_rules: Please respect my space as you would your own. Please respect my privacy. House Rules, helpful hints, and wifi password will be posted in the guest space. Please lock both the guest entrance door and the front apartment door.

host.host_about: I am an international harp technician and musician and a New Yorker of 19 years. I enjoy traveling, good food, music, friendships, and my cat Mister William. I can direct you to many excellent restaurants, watering holes and fun nuggets that only a seasoned New Yorker can reveal.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Liza was a super accommodating host who provided a great stay! The space was tidy and well kept and we felt very comfortable. Communication was excellent and Liza was superb in coordinating with us. We hope to come back and stay with her again!

Liza's home is the best place to stay in NY! Silent 
neighborhood, great subway connection with Manhattan, best bed we've ever sleep!, large space and as much privacy as you want to have. Many advices, just like VERY BEST DONUTS at Peter Pan's. Liza, thank you! :)
Great comfy bed.

I had a really smooth stay at Liza's place. The room is very comfy, and there is a kitchenette space that I didn't expect which I thought was nifty. She is a very friendly host and I encountered no problems during my stay!
Very cozy!
I enjoyed my stay at Liza's place. Would recommend to my friends and family to Airbnb here while in Brooklyn. Thanks so much Liza!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Liza's place was awesome, super neat and comfy.

Lizard place was perfect. When I walked in the first time she wasn't there and it took me a few minutes to figure out that my space was downstairs. Once I figured that out, everything went smoothly. The location is close to the bus stop and the space has a kick backyard. Would stay there again.

The stay at Liza's place was great, the accommodation is realy cosy, clean and the bed is so comfortable :-) Liza gave us a lot of tips where to go or eat. I can highly recommend her. Thanks Liza, it was our pleasure to stay with you. :-)
Liza's place is clean and quiet. Good value for a place to crash close to the city.
Liza was very friendly, helpful, and responsive. The place was comfortable and close to everything Greenpoint and Williamsburg have to offer.

Liza's place made for a comfortable and relaxing stay. It is a clean basement studio that has access to a nice backyard garden. The studio has a private bathroom (with only a toilet), but the shower is located in the main apartment upstairs. The apartment is in a good location, within walking distance of bars and restaurants. Overall, what I appreciated most--aside from the friendly kitty-cat-- was the value and location of this place.

Easily the best Airbnb we've stayed at. Firstly, the space is amazing. You're in the basement of an awesome Brooklyn home, which is perfect in summer because it stays nice and cool. The bed was super comfy, everything was clean and the kitchenette made life so easy! Secondly, you're a five minute walk from downtown Greenpoint, a ten minute walk from Williamsburg and a half an hour Subway trip into Manhattan. Finally, the hosts were so gracious and welcoming. I would 110% recommend this to friends and would stay back here in a heartbeat. Thank you!

The place was great! Very accurate, has a TV with Netflix and other apps, and there was even a cat from upstairs that was super cuddly and loved staying with us! The only negatives were that the shower was shared upstairs and there is only a half bathroom that is private, and the bed is a little small for two people. We also had a little bit of trouble getting in and we couldn't figure out which room it was right away. (It's straight ahead once you walk in!) Other than that, it was great! Would stay here again :)
Super nice place. Very friendly cat. Would recommend!
Exactly what I was looking for. Cute and comfortable and perfect for my stay. Would definitely recommend to one person looking to stay in Brooklyn on a budget
Nice place. Private
Liza's place was lovely, very tidy, and they were very inviting hosts. The cat was super chill as well and the backyard ended up being a perfect place to relax. very highly recomended!
Place was clean and cozy. I honestly thought it was better than the pictures. Liza also responded very quickly to any questions I asked!
Great place. Great location. Friendly host.
Nice place and very helpful people.
Nice place, very comfortable and clean.

The quality of the space was instantly comfortable - a relief after a long trip! It had the feeling of familiarity that was highly welcomed.  The great fortune of meeting the cat was a highlight of the whole trip! I appreciated how easy it was to check in, and the calm and quiet stay.  It was a real treat, and I highly recommend this space!
Liza and her cat are wonderful hosts. Fun location in Greenpoint with street parking and cool bars and restaurants nearby. Bedroom is very quiet.

A really great apartment, genuinely better than the pictures. It has a garden, cooking facilities, Netflix and is a short walk from an excellently connected subway station.
There's also a cat that is so lovely and friendly and made it feel especially homely!
Liza is kind, respectful, and an absolutely fantastic host. The place is very comfortable and feels like home. I highly recommend.
I definitely appreciate how clean she keeps the whole apartment. Lovely backyard and a super friendly cat! Easy 15 minute walk to the subway and some great restaurants. Super host!

It was a pleasant stay. Great room with good location. Less than 12 min walk from 2 metro stations. All way to Manhattan about 25 min. Everything was awesome. For cheap prise you get a very big and quiet room with garden view and your own kitchen, toilet and washbasin (shower shared in main room). Host very polite and frendly. She help us with luggage storage, and meet with beautiful cat William ). Thank you Liza!

Liza was very nice and hospitable, just what me and my father needed :) her plAce is about a 10-15 minute walk to the L train. There is a kitchenette with a microwave, a hot plate, refrigerator and coffee maker. The shower is shared upstairs with Liza but there is a private bathroom downstairs as well as a cute entrance to the backyard. Great for chilling and drinking coffee.  A added bonus was her friendly cat :)
Très bel endroit. Très cosy. Merci Liza pour l accueil et la confiance!

Nice place. A bit further from central Williamsburg than I would have liked but good otherwise. Note that there is no AC which was fine for a warm summer day but might be a bit hot in the peak of summer.

Liza's place is essentially a place to sleep and shower, which is all I needed. The room was still cozy and exceptionally clean, and has access to a beautiful backyard! The Greenpoint area has lots to see and do and you're in a great location to get to it. I like to walk so I forewent a lot of the public transportation options, but they were plentiful and nearby. Great place!

Loved it! Great setup, perfect for a private airbnb that's not overpriced. The location is great as is the space itself. Sweet, cuddly kitty who has good manners! Liza is also very sweet. It's a great spot in the middle of wherever you need to go in town. The graham L is about a 10min walk, great coffee shop, bar nearby. The bed is prime. I havent slept that well in awhile. I'd stay here again if she'd have me. Thank you!
Liza was very friendly and helpful! And her cat was a welcome part of the experience. My flight was delayed making my check-in super late, but she was very kind about it. Would definitely recommend!

The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. The couch wasn't bad either (shared a room with my sister, so this was important) Full kitchen, clean bathroom, beautiful garden space with your own entrance. Provides towels, well decorated space with bright lighting, plenty of mirrors, literature, hair dryer, TV and a Roku box. Easy to get in and out. Would stay again!

Awesome apartment and close to all kinds of great bars and restaurants and a short walk to the subway. The apartment was clean and comfortable with a nice bed. The garden is beautiful and was amazing to enjoy on a hot summer day. Liza was a great host and very easy to communicate with. Very friendly and a pleasure to meet. She also has a great cat that was very friendly. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay and highly recommend staying at Liza's place!
Very handy location and Liza is a great host.

Liza's place was clean and easy to access. It was located in an area that was easy to get around. I kept to myself while I stayed with her and don't think we came into contact, which I prefer as I was pretty busy during my time in NYC. I'd stay there again.
Great spot to stay in Brooklyn near good bars and restaurants.
Great spot for a weekend in BK!
Liza is a great host. She was clear about everything and has a lovely home.
Liza place was great! The bed would super comfortable, even though it was hot outside there were enough fans to keep the place at a comfortable temperature.
Comfortable accommodation. Price commensurate with location. Make sure you are aware, as we were, of travel times and distance to New York. Buy a metro card.

Great place. So clean and Liza is an incredibly interesting person to meet. She made my stay pleasant! The only complaint is how far the place is from the L line, but once you get to it, it's a quick 10 minutes to Manhattan.

Endroit très calme et confortable. À 15 minutes à pieds du métro L. Liza est facilement joignable et disponible. Appartement agreable avec acces sur une petite cour. Aucun problème avec le chat, M. William, malgré les allergies de mon copain, mais si vous le souhaitez il vous tiendra volontie compagnie (il est adorable).
Liza was a great host! Her place was just what my dad and I needed for a week in NYC. It was clean and well appointed. Her description was accurate. We enjoyed our week!

Liza is a great host. Helpful, friendly, and let us check in hours early as our flight arrived early. We were so grateful for that!! The place looks better than the pictures too, and was very peaceful so we got some really great sleep. 
The location is the only thing I would change in an ideal world as you have to walk a couple of blocks past quite an industrial looking area to get back from the subway. Having said that we were perfectly safe and learnt that an uber back from Manhattan is only about $25, so that was great.
Liza's apartment was great. A little far from the train station but a nice quiet neighborhood. Liza was friendly and helpful when we needed her.  We only wished for some more windows in the heat.

Liza's place was awesome, So much so that i felt right at home. The decor was very laid back and well kept. I enjoyed the unique art on the walls and the small novelties placed on the furniture's. Having access to a video streaming device, a and kitchenette made the stay even more pleasant. Stores and supermarkets are conveniently located within walking distance from the house so you can conveniently grab anything you need in a jiffy. Liza was very laid-back, courteous, respectful of my privacy and also helpful with directions, anything that I needed and recommendations of stores that I wanted to go to. The L train station is a 10 min walk and you'll arrive in Manhattan very quickly. Overall it was a great stay.
Great space! Clean and safe area. The garden is the best for lounging with coffee and drink before going out! Not right in the downtown area but not far
Thank you.

Liza was kind and the bed was soft. The unit felt like it was its own space and I did come and go as I pleased. Never had to wait for the shower and everything was clean. My main issue was that it took about 20 minutes to walk to the L, longer than expected, and the neighborhood was industrial. But for the price, you get a lovely room with a cute little stairway to a backyard garden. If you don't mind taking some time to commute most places (and the L gets crowded!!), it's nice.

Lisa is a very nice host,we liked staying here very much. The location is just convenient, close to the metro connect directly with downtown. Room is big and clean. And most of all,we love the cat so much! THANK YOU FOR everthing!
Superverblijf.
Fantastic and super clean space, friendly and accommodating host, super friendly cat.
Liza was very friendly and helpful.  Her place was very comfortable.

Logement très fonctionnel et au calme dans cette ville si bruyante. Liza est charmante et discrète, ce qui rend la cohabitation agréable. Logement proche de restaurants et bars sur Graham avenue (quartier Williamsburg). 2 stations de métro à une quinzaine de minutes à pieds.

Liza’s place was great. Perfect location for everything we wanted to do & the space was clean & comfortable. If you’re a cat person, definitely stay here so you can meet Mister William! This will definitely be my first choice for stay anytime I come to Brooklyn in the future.
Great little spot. Same as other comments. Comfy bed. Friendliest cat ever. Close enough to where I wanted to go.

L appartement est vraiment bien, grand et propre. Il y a un chat vraiment sociable. Le quartier est une zone industrielle pas des plus jolies. De plus le métro est a 15mins a pied. Pour un séjour court c est un bon rapport qualité prix.
Stayed here briefly November 2017. A great place – spacious (for New York), clean, close to public transport, and with access to a nice garden!
Liza’s place was clean & comfy! The only issue I had was the 20 minute walk to the train (which wouldn’t be as bad if it wasn’t freezing out). Other wise, I had a great stay!
Clean and spacious room in a quiet area. Short walk to subway for Manhattan.
Liza was a great host. Very kind and good with communication. Clear directions and accurate description. Recommended.

Liza's place is about 15-20 min walk from the nearest subway stations, but for the extra walk you are rewarded with a large serene private space with a galley kitchen and a half bathroom.  Also, Liza's beautiful harp music and Mister William (the resident cat) also serve to brighten the experience.  I enjoyed my weekend at Liza's place, and recommend it to others.
Was very clean. Liza waa very nice and gave us our space. The bed was very comfortable and the stay was enjoyable.

Cute space with an adorable cat.  The immediate neighborhood was a little unnerving, but this is coming from someone not used to cities so take that with a grain of salt.  This space served our purposes perfectly, and Liza is a communicative host.  Thanks again!
Liza's place was super cute and cozy..close to so much cool stuff in Brooklyn would definitely stay again!!
This was a very nice place.
Stylish, welcoming environment in a great location. Excellent value

Cutest cat ever! The space was great for a couple or two friends to stay. The bed was comfortable and the mini apartment was clean. The apartment/room is located in the basement area so lots of privacy but don’t worry you won’t feel like you are in a basement because Liza adds a personal touch. Kitchen area ( large fridge, sink, pans etc.) is good for stove top cooking only. You can actually hear Liza playing one of her several harps which is very sweet sound to hear.

Spacious apartment with a comfy bed. Free parking outside the apartment was convinent! Liza gave us great suggestions for restaurants to check out and the check-in/check-out process was flexible and easy. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to visit in Brooklyn!
This is a great quiet place out in Greenpoint.  Great price and close to everything in that area.  I’d definitley stay here again
Nice quiet space. Mr. William (house cat) is the absolute cutest thing ever! Host was out of the country so communication wasn’t the swiftest but overall I had a very good stay!
Great space! Very cozy and doesn’t feel like a basement spot. The bed was comfortable. Very responsive host and a great value for the location.
The cat is amazing but if you’re allergic they’ll keep him upstairs, location convenient, response time great and the bed is comfortable!

This was my second time staying at Liza’s place. I loved it, the bed was SUPER comfortable, the space itself was very nice and well put together, and overall it was clean and an enjoyable stay. I would recommend Liza’s airbnb to people traveling to NYC.
Had a great stay. Excellent communication. All was as described, had everything I needed and close to some great neighbourhoods. Most friendly cat I’ve ever met in my life too. All good.
Great, quiet place! Also, fantastic cat. Will be staying here again!
Comfy bed!

Liza was great! Check in was super easy and Liza was wonderful and so friendly. And Mr. Williams the house cat was so friendly and cuddly!!! I would definitely stay at Liza’s again. The bed was comfortable and the space was really pretty! I had a great stay :)
Liza’s place was great. Super clean and walking distance to cool places in Williamsburg. However the best part was getting to cuddle with Mister William.
The location is perfect, Liza's tips on local restaurants were delicious, definitely a great choice.
As advertised- clean and comfortable! Additionally, Liza provided clear, prompt communication and was a pleasant hostess.

Thanks Liza for such a warm welcome!
I really liked the place: it’s stylish and clean and the bed is sooo convenient!
I truly recommend the house:)

Liza was great, and the place was even better! The basement aparrment is decorated so nicely it doesn't even feel like you're in the basement. The door leading to the small garden outback brought in great natural light, and the bed was soft and cozy. Mr. Williams, the resident kitty, came right down and greeted us and made us feel at home as soon as we arrived. We will definitely stay here again next time we come to Brooklyn.

L'alloggio di Liza è gradevolissimo, funzionale ma anche accogliente e molto confortevole. Pur essendo, come molti appartamenti a New York, un seminterrato, ha una porta a vetri che dà sulla scaletta esterna del giardino ed è quindi luminoso. Cucina completa, letto comodissimo, l'unico spazio condiviso è la doccia al piano superiore ma privacy e libertà di movimento sono garantiti. Il wi-fi funziona perfettamente e il riscaldamento è regolabile a piacere.
Consiglio di darsi il tempo di scoprire il quartiere, industriale ma tranquillo e punteggiato di piccoli esercizi a pochi metri di distanza. Un prezioso ristorante vietnamita, un McDonalds, un punto vendita Staples (dove si possono andare a stampare self-service le carte d'imbarco o qualsiasi cosa) sono veramente a cinque passi. A poca distanza piccoli supermercati, bar, negozi di qualsiasi tipo. Con quindici/venti minuti di passeggiata si raggiunge la stazione della linea L a Graham Avenue, accanto a un negozio di frutta e verdura fresca sempre aperto. Liza sarà lieta di darvi consigli e, se lo gradite, il fantastico gatto Mr. William vi terrà compagnia come se fosse vostro, senza lasciarvi mai soli. Tornerò senz'altro!

Liza's place was awesome and just as pictured and described! She was super nice and very responsive. Mr. Williams the cat was an added delight since he is so well behaved, but could easily be kept away by shutting the door to the space (which I felt no need for). No loud noises from surrounding areas could be heard so sleeping in peace was easy. The L train is a short walk away (10-15 minutes depending on walking speed). Would completely recommend for anyone that wants to be conveniently close to Manhattan but not want to be on the island.
The space was perfect! Very close to bars and concert venues
Loved everything about this place. Very cool set-up. Clean and fresh. Location is perfect for Greenpoint. Our stay was delightful.
Quiet and private spot. The hostess was very nice and discreet. Very confortable bed, lovely backyard. Good location with easy walk to the subway.

This place was great! Very accurate to the photos, we had our own private space in the basement and only had to access the upstairs to use the shower. Beautiful backyard oasis and Mr. William the cat would come down to visit us and snuggle with us in the mornings. The bed is very comfortable, and very high off the ground so you have to be careful climbing up. All in all great experience in Brooklyn.
Convenient, affordable, and clean. Just what I was looking for!

So clean, so comfortable, and the backyard was a great place to take a moment and relax. I’ll definitely look for this spot again should I find myself back in Brooklyn. Exactly as advertised, and an incredible value.
Liza's place was clean and cozy. She was a very kind and personable host.
Comfortable and nice ground floor apartment, nice place to relax if you're in the area.
Loved our stay! The place was very clean and comfortable, as listed!!

Nice place. Exactly as described.
Easy to check in and out.
Entrence is almost completely private. Great value.
We had a great time at this property. Brooklyn is a great place and it was well positioned for where we wanted to be.
Nice place to stay

This was a great place to stay. There were a ton of great bars and restaurants within walking distance. Lizza was out of town during our stay, but she was super responsive and helpful when we needed to message her. Definitely recommend this place.

Apartment just as described! Adorable interior, cute little back garden and comfy bed. Kitties were a nice touch to the experience :) Felt very cozy and clean. Shower is separate upstairs and entrance is through Liza's apartment.  Only downside is that the place is a little of out the way so you have to Uber to Williamsburg or surrounding areas.

Easy self check in process and own private space down stairs. Nice comfortable bed. Is a shared shower upstairs but no problem as I was there on my own as owner was overseas. There is a toilet downstairs for your own use. Had a great stay and about a 12 min walk to subway. 5min walk has you near restaurants and bars as well as food markets. Nice quiet neighborhood.
Very nice stay, 5 Star everything. Would come back
Liza's place was a great value in a very convenient location. Would recommend.
綺麗で可愛らしいお部屋でした｡共用ｽﾍﾟｰｽには猫がいるので､予め知っておいた方がいいです｡

Everything was exactly as expected and written out. Liza was very nice and responded immediately if I had any questions or and updates. Location was perfect for what we were in town for, and the area was perfect size and clean! We had a great stay and I would definitely recommend staying at Liza's, or even staying there myself again in the future!

Very nice and clean 
And a very nice backyard space

Instructions on how to get there were clear. Keybox worked perfectly. Side, semi private entrance was very nice and smooth. Spotless space. Air cooling was on and waiting for me. Liza is very gracious, open, and kind. Absolutely lovely experience.
This place is a great location, great price and the perfect place to rest after a busy day in the city.
Great home, awesome location and Liza was an amazing host.

Clean place and very nice host ! 
Great place to stay in Brooklyn !
Location is a 10+ min walk from subway station. Everything else very convenient; more spacious than I thought. Overall very comfortable stay.
A nice little place not too far from the subway. The shower was shared, but still very clean. Liza was very good at giving us our personal space and we felt very welcome staying there.
Great host, place was as described and very comfortable.

Great place to stay! The space is private and well appointed. Loved the friendly “greeter” kitty Mr. Williams. We were in town for a concert at Brooklyn Bowl and it was a short & cheap (under 10 min) Uber ride there. Very good value too. Would stay again and recommend! Thanks Liza :)
Liza’s house is very clean and comfortable. She provides everything you need.

The place is a basement extremely well set.  The perfect space for a couple of people.
The toilet is private but the shower is shared... I didn’t noticed that when I booked. It’s a little uncomfortable but we adapted with no problem.
Liza was amazingly kind and friendly. We enjoyed our stay.

This apartment was a remodeled basement space in an aging building in an industrial neighborhood in Green Point. Described as a private apartment, it only sort of fits that bill. It shares a corridor with the laundry room and is accessed through the host's apartment, and is therefore (to me) only semi-private. Being what it is, i.e. a basement-type space, it was  honestly a little clammy, dusty, and smelly, though clearly Liza has made efforts to spruce it up. There aren't a lot of shops or restaurants in the immediate vicinity; there is however lots of good stuff provided one is able to walk a mile or so; same thing with a subway stop. Liza was communicative, clear and friendly, but I will probably decide next time to pay a little more for something more private, and maybe closer to transit/food.
Convenient place close to pleasant areas in WBrooklyn and métro stations to Manhattan

Liza's place was great. Everything was clean and comfortable, as the space is listed. The neighborhood is very convenient and has lots to do. While the L train is a quick 10 minute walk from the Airbnb, it was sadly closed for most of our stay. The G train is about a 20 minute (1 mile) walk. Liza leaves great recommendations for food & drink (Little Dokebi is so good and so affordable, and you must get the mashed potatoes at Conchord Hill), but the neighborhood has much to explore. We loved the shops/gift stores and cafes (go get ice cream at Van Leeuwen's! Oh, and the rainbow bagel is just around the corner from the L!), and it's also convenient to other great amenities like the Brooklyn Museum (just a few bucks in a Lyft). Manhattan is easy enough to get to as well, but I prefer the Brooklyn experience when in New York. The Greenpoint neighborhood is safe and the Airbnb is very secure and cozy. The shared shower was not an issue and the Airbnb itself was spacious. I enjoyed having a couch, easy-to-find outlets, a kitchen area, and a clean bathroom. I would definitely stay here again!
Really Enjoyed my stay at lizas place. Great hospitality and place was as advertised :)

What a fabulous place. Liza is the perfect hostess, offering valuable tips on out of the way places to go and also where to go in the neighbourhood. Steps to the basement might be a problem for some, but I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and can highly recommend.

Great place - pleasant with lots of space. Within easy walking distance of excellent spots in Brooklyn, and only a short subway ride from Manhattan. Great value too. Liza was very welcoming, and check in was extremely smooth. A last minute opportunity meant she had to be away most of the week, but it was a pleasure to hang out with Mr Williams, the resident cat!

Comfortable and clean in a very peaceful area. 
The cat is great too : )

Liza's place was perfect for a short trip. It was clean and the bed was great. One thing to note is that you do walk through a studio apartment to enter your private space (wasn't expecting that) but I didn't encounter anyone. Liza's cat was adorable and friendly. I would definitely stay again.
My second stay was just as wonderful as the first. Would absolutely recommend Liza's place for a short stay.
Very comfortable place with a relaxed feel to it.
Liza’s place is very stylish and homie. Had everything we needed. Very quite area. Highly recommend. Easy walk to the subway station and also close to the Kingsland venue where we went to a show.

Liza’s space was easy to get into, and communication with her was easy. We were a little disappointed with the cleanliness-we are not super picky, but there were hairs in the bathroom sink, the bedspread had cat hair on it, and the rugs were (Website hidden by Airbnb) could have definitely used a little more attention. Our main problem with the space was the water heater (?) that is located in the closet just steps from the bed. It turned on and off the entire night, making a lot of noise, and the pipes were very noisy as well. We woke up at 2 in the morning because of it, and were unable to get back to sleep so we left the apartment at 4 AM since there was no point in staying in bed.  This apartment is a comparatively good value, but we would not recommend it if you are not a very heavy sleeper.

It was clean, easy to find, and Mister William (Liza’s cat) was a nice addition and a lovely greeter. The bed was very comfortable and safe. Worked well for my friend and I to enjoy the night in the city.
Loved it. It was a great stay! Thank you.

We had a great time at Liza' s place. The apartment has a lot of character and has everything you need. It is a little rough around the edges but perfect as a base and its no problem with us. The walk to the subway feels like a long slog at the end of a busy day but the area it self is well connected. Mr Williams the cat was a highlight, he would come and cuddle us in the morning. You don't see much of Liza and the whole place felt very private, which was great by us. There was no orientation of the apartment so we had to find most things ourselves. The bed was comfy and the shower was powerful. We had a fantastic time.

This Airbnb is a great place to stay! It's close enough via the subway to get downtown (10ish minute walk, half hour subway ride to the Times Square area) and there are plenty of places nearby to eat or grab coffee.
Had a great stay at Liza’s place!  Would definitely recommend to friends if they were visiting Brooklyn.

name: Charming Fontainhas flat
summary: Beautiful luminous apartment for two guests at Fontainhas street. In the historical center of Porto. In our apartment you will find everything to spend you perfect vacation! Very Close to RED BULL AIR RACE!
description: Beautiful luminous apartment for two guests at Fontainhas street. In the historical center of Porto. In our apartment you will find everything to spend you perfect vacation! Very Close to RED BULL AIR RACE!

host.host_about: We are Alina and Vladimir.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Nice apartment and a good location. An authentic house, the apartment is well-equipped and clean, as in a hotel. 2 minute walk to the bridge and a beautiful view of the city and 10-15 minutes walk to all tourist places. The street is full of life and local colorful characters from the nearest cafe, it was fun to watch them from the balcony.)) Thanks to Alina for the good reception and advices.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Alina is a great welcoming host. Her flat is perfect for two people, it's more spacious then it seems on photos. The street is a bit loud, so having earplugs helps

The apt is good for a short stay in Porto. The communication was easy with Alina and her husband. The apt is new, clean and well equiped. It is close (10 minutes walk) to the historical and touristic zone. The street is busy but it is ok with the windows closed.

Отличный вариант размещения как на длительный срок пребывания, так и на пару дней. Квартира очень чистая, со всем необходимым для комфортного проживания. Плюс большое спасибо Алине за отзывчивость. Только положительные эмоции от города, квартиры и ее хозяйки. Спасибо большое.

The flat is right in the middle of everything, ideal for walking and exploring the city. Grocery stores and cafes\restaurants are all nearby.
The apartment was very nice and clean. Huge bed was extra comfy!
Coffee machine saved us in the mornings.
The apartment is for those who like to be in the epicenter of city life and actively explore the local culture. If you prefer peaceful and super quite neighborhood, it could be not the best option for you.
And the light, of course! One wall of the place is basically made of windows with a small charming balcony in the center. You could also close the windows completely with wooden blinds and enjoy a complete darkness if sunlight is not your favorite thing.
Definitely recommend the place to all active Porto explorers!

Alina é stata super disponibile insieme all'amico Pedro che ci ha accolti e ci ha consigliato posti da visitare e ristorantini da provare! La casa pulita e con tutto l'occorrente! Unica pecca un po' rumorosa ma la posizione é super comoda per muoversi a piedi o raggiungere i mezzi!

Apartamento excelente: nuevo, muy limpio, luminoso, con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en oporto. 
Localización: muy céntrico, se llega a cualquier sitio a pie, además se puede aparcar sin pagar ORA en la manzana siguiente :)
Únicamente mencionar algo ruidoso (por los coches que pasan), para nosotros no fue ningún inconveniente y sin duda lo recomendaremos a nuestras amistades.

El alojamiento es tal cual como aparece en Las fotos. Una estancia muy cómoda y todo muy limpio. La única pega que pondría es que tiene mucho ruido del exterior, porque da a una calle con mucho tráfico, que es la entrada desde el puente y se oye bastante. Es una pena porque el resto me ha parecido perfecto.

Appartement très bien situé pour visiter Porto, proche centre ville, boulangerie, supermarché,..
En revanche la rue est très bruyante, méme fenêtre fermée...
Super accueil de Pedro!
We enjoyed our stay at this Airbnb. It's located in the center of Porto so everything is in a walking distance. Unfortunately there was more noise of te street than expected.

Alina is a super hostess! Friendly, caring, polite and helpful. Deserves a medal for the way she managed to make everything work for my arrival. She can be trusted. 
The apartment is beautiful and clean and it has everything even for a longer stay. Comfortable bed and nice shower and bathroom facilities. Good area for cooking. 
Location perfect especially if you want to avoid the tourist crowds, yet it's right in the middle of things you want to see in Porto. Little hidden, but that's exactly what you might want from your travel.
The apartment might be next to a busy street but you can get well isolated from it by closing all the windows. I didn't personally suffer from any noise. Just take care if returning home late at night as the cars passing buy drive fast and the road might be a bit darker than you are used to. 
And in the morning you can open the window covers and let the light take over the apartment and enjoy your coffee while being hugged by all the light.
Surely will return to this place if ever needed. I enjoyed and wholeheartedly recommend it.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Le Plateau Mont-Royal et ses très célèbres charmes
summary: Au cœur du Plateau, le logement proposé est à quelques pas du parc du Mont-Royal! Il est situé à proximité des principales lignes d’autobus traversant l’île de Montréal, des cafés renommés, d’un grand nombre de restaurants représentant une communauté culturelle très diversifiée, ainsi que de nombreuses activités culturelles. En bref, si vous souhaitez avoir un aperçu de ce qu’est la vie montréalaise sous tout son charme, vous sonnez à la bonne porte! ;)
description: Au cœur du Plateau, le logement proposé est à quelques pas du parc du Mont-Royal! Il est situé à proximité des principales lignes d’autobus traversant l’île de Montréal, des cafés renommés, d’un grand nombre de restaurants représentant une communauté culturelle très diversifiée, ainsi que de nombreuses activités culturelles. En bref, si vous souhaitez avoir un aperçu de ce qu’est la vie montréalaise sous tout son charme, vous sonnez à la bonne porte! ;)
house_rules: Merci de bien vouloir respecter les lieux comme vous le faites en étant chez vous (retirez vos chaussures en entrant et faites la plupart de la vaisselle en quittant les lieux)

reviews.comments: Gabriel's place was perfect for the few days my husband and I spent in Montreal -- it's a great size and in a perfect location!  He was great at communicating with me before we arrived so that check in was a breeze -- he also made sure we had two lattes waiting for us at the nearby coffee shop!  We would definitely stay there again.
It was a pleasant stay and the apartment was spacious and comfortable.  There are many shops and good restaurants around the neighborhood!  Gabriel is a great host.

Gabriel’s apartment was fantastic! We were pleasantly surprised by the front and back terrace both with seating! The queen bed was very comfortable! The apartment was clean and easy to access. It is steps from Saint Laurent  and 5 minute walk to Mont Royal station. So much good food and amazing coffee around the corner. Had an almond milk flat white every morning at Paquebot!!! There is a park around the corner and a grocery store at the end of the street. Even though there wasn’t air conditioning the apartment was quiet cool being on the bottom level. Although it was still very bright with the sliding doors!! Gabriel was quick to respond and checkin and checkout was very smooth and easy!! I highly recommend staying at Gabriel’s!!

name: Warm and Bright Studio in Hollywood Rd Sheung Wan
summary: Great location near the city centre with extremely convenient transportation. You may find it incredible how easy it is to find cultural or social events within walking distance.  Spacious, comfortable and well-equipped flat, best for a recharge for the next journeys to come.
space: Bright, spacious studio with a cute balcony on the 4th Floor (no elevator)
description: Great location near the city centre with extremely convenient transportation. You may find it incredible how easy it is to find cultural or social events within walking distance.  Spacious, comfortable and well-equipped flat, best for a recharge for the next journeys to come. Bright, spacious studio with a cute balcony on the 4th Floor (no elevator) You can basically make yourself at home :) As you basically have the private access to the whole premises, the host won't be around. But his little assistant will take care of everything online and off. No worries. Sheung Wan is a place of happening, food, history, culture and arts. Near SoHo and with extremely convenient transportation. MTR (the metro system), Bus stops, Tram stops are all minutes away.

host.host_about: Live most of the year in HK I do sells and design. Very out going and love to travel.   I hope you enjoy either Hong Kong or Indy. Safe travels.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Nice balcony,convenient place,reasonable price,good reception. Thank you!

This is a fantastic place with a great location. I loved the Netflix, large screen TV and comfortable bed. The host was so gracious and accommodating. The wifi is fine but not great, so I couldn't make VOIP calls although I could email and text readily.
A nicely finished flat in a good convenient and quiet location. Only draw back being it's a fourth floor walk up, so a bit of a struggle with a suitcase, but worth it in the end!

The apartment is in an interesting neighborhood, close to many restaurants and a short walk to the MTR. It is cozy and has everything I needed during my stay.
Jerry was courteous and responsive. There was an emergency right before my arrival, and he went of out his way to get things fixed. Thanks, Jerry!

The flat was perfectly situated. You are in the heart of Hong-Kong! It is ideally conceived for two people (not more though) and has all the confort a home should have. We stayed for 10 days and were getting so used to it we were very sad to leave it. 
The host was perfect before, during and after our stay providing us with all the good tips and recommendations we would need. Thank you for everything !

Location of Jerry's apartment is impeccable. I also really like the whole apartment, which is cozy, lovely and well decorated. Jerry was also being very helpful on everything. I will definitely choose Jerry's place for my next visit in HK!

Stayed here for 2 months as I was in between homes and really enjoyed my stay there. Jerry is a great host and was really responsive and helpful during my stay. 

The place is conveniently located between central and sheung wan so a lot a lot of bars, restaurants and sights are in walking distance (including Itchi which is one of my favorite bars in hk). Please bear in mind that it's a walk up (4 floors) and a bit uphill. This wasn't an issue for me as it wasn't summer. 

The apartment has all the conveniences you need like a TV, wifi and a coffee maker. Internet is fast enough for streaming but you can't use multiple devices at once. 

Would recommend for a stay at this place for single person or couple.

Jerry is a nice host with quick response for any inquiries. The flat is located strategically in Central area, which is only 10 minutes away on foot from Sheung Wan MTR station. It also close to Lan Kwai Fong/Soho area.
The only downside is no elevator in the building.
Thanx for hosting us Jerry! :)

Great place in a wonderful part of town. The apartment has got pretty much everything you need and Jerry is a great host. Ideal size for single person or couple who want the ability to use a washing machine and do a bit of cooking (eg longer stay). The place is in a part of HK full of character with bars, restaurants and supermarkets close by. Although on Hollywood Road it was quiet and yet with taxis plentiful outside. Small downside if you are visiting in the summer is the 4 floors with no lift but in the winter it was nice to have the exercise. Overall I would stay here again.

Jerry’s apartment was fantastic! Great location with lots of good restaurants and bars close by but still quiet. Only a 5 minute walk to the MTR, so super convenient. Loved the Netflix and the cosy feel of the space. Jerry was also a pleasure to communicate with. Fast and efficient and with great recommendations. Would recommend this place and hope to stay here again for sure!

Home away from home! Beautiful home with everything that you need or would need. Great location in a hip district with great shops, bars and restaurants. Walkable distance to public transit and nightlife. Nothing bad to say. Jerry was helpful and informative. Highly recommend!

Great space and Jerry is the friendliest of hosts.

Location is on a quiet section of the street, but close to great restaurants and bars. 

Would highly recommend and look forward to booking again on future trips to Hong Kong.

Jerry’s place is located in a convenient location not far from Sheung Wan MTR station. It’s a stylishly decorated space with everything you need for a short stay. Jerry was extremely quick to respond to any questions and I wouldn’t hesitate recommending.

When I checked in at the Airbnb, I felt like I was staying over at a good friend's place because James was such a warm, kind, considerate, and helpful host. He instantly made me feel at home and I can't speak highly enough about how amazing of a host he was. James was always responsive through text and he was always attentive to what I needed or what I was looking for. He truly made the entire Airbnb experience a worthwhile and pleasant one. On top of his hospitality, James's place is the nicest Airbnb I have ever stayed in in Hong Kong. The place was beautifully lit, spotless clean, and everything was neatly placed, all of it looked new and fresh - it was perfect. I highly recommend James's place to anyone looking for a comfortable time in the heart of Hong Kong.
I stayed here for a second time and had an equally good experience. James was always prompt to reply and the apartment was in great shape. I’m looking forward to staying again!
Jame's place has become a second home for me over the past few months when I travel to HK frequently for work and I have very much appreciated his great apartment and hospitality. Highly recommended.
I had another great stay at James’s place. It’s like home-from-home now!
Another excellent stay at James’ place - thanks as usual!
A nice department with good decoration. Can always got quick response from James. Several famous small restaurants nearby.
Great location, near the MTR,  and close to clubs, restaurants. Lots of great street art in the area. The studio is cozy, secure, and has everything that you need.
An excellent stay as usual!

I had a really great time staying at James's place. The design and layout is compact but has everything I could possibly need. The little balcony adds a nice touch to relax in the evening. 

The location of the apartment couldn't get any better. It's right on Hollywood Road and has easy acccess to restaurants, bars and public transport. 

Last but not least, James is an awesome host; always responsive and   provides good tips about Hong Kong. 

I would definitely book with James again if I was ever in Hong Kong.

This apartment was just perfect for our one week stay. Located just in the middle of it all with walking distance to MTR, nice markets, shops and entertainment. Really enjoyed Hongkong and would definitely recommend staying here to anyone. Thank you for the hospitality!!
nice and warm flat, clean and bright, awesome location. excellent offer from James. highly recommended
Had a great stay as usual, James is an excellent host!
